atk-s0502a:28_0: Appeva nāma sādheyya, sabbalokassa sā hitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:37_0: Gāthānaṃ byañjanapadaṃ, yaṃ tattha na vibhāvitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:39_0: Kevalaṃ taṃ vibhāvetvā, sesaṃ tameva atthato;
atk-s0502a:46_0: Manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-s0502a:47_0: Tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, cakkaṃva vahato pada”nti. –
atk-s0502a:48_0: Ayaṃ dhammadesanā kattha bhāsitāti? Sāvatthiyaṃ. Kaṃ ārabbhāti? Cakkhupālattheraṃ.
atk-s0502a:49_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira mahāsuvaṇṇo nāma kuṭumbiko ahosi aḍḍho mahaddhano mahābhogo aputtako.
atk-s0502a:49_1: So ekadivasaṃ nhānatitthaṃ nhatvā natvā āgacchanto antarāmagge sampannapattasākhaṃ ekaṃ vanappatiṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:49_2: “ayaṃ mahesakkhāya devatāya pariggahito bhavissatī”ti tassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ sodhāpetvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ
atk-s0502a:49_3: kārāpetvā vālukaṃ okirāpetvā dhajapaṭākaṃ ussāpetvā vanappatiṃ alaṅkaritvā añjaliṃ karitvā “sace puttaṃ
atk-s0502a:49_5: tumhākaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti patthanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:50_0: Athassa na cirasseva bhariyāya kucchiyaṃ gabbho patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:50_1: Sā gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā tassa ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:50_4: Taṃ nāmaggahaṇadivase seṭṭhi attanā pālitaṃ vanappatiṃ nissāya laddhattā tassa pāloti nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:50_6: Tassa cūḷapāloti nāmaṃ katvā itarassa mahāpāloti nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:51_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbenāgantvā anāthapiṇḍikena mahāseṭṭhinā catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0502a:51_1: vissajjetvā kārite jetavanamahāvihāre viharati mahājanaṃ saggamagge ca mokkhamagge ca patiṭṭhāpayamāno.
atk-s0502a:51_3: pitipakkhato asītiyāti dveasītiñātikulasahassehi kārite nigrodhamahāvihāre ekameva vassāvāsaṃ vasi,
atk-s0502a:51_5: visākhāya sattavīsatikoṭidhanapariccāgena kārite pubbārāme chabbassānīti dvinnaṃ kulānaṃ guṇamahattataṃ
atk-s0502a:51_6: paṭicca sāvatthiṃ nissāya pañcavīsativassāni vassāvāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0502a:51_7: Anāthapiṇḍikopi visākhāpi mahāupāsikā nibaddhaṃ divasassa dve vāre tathāgatassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0502a:51_8: gacchantā ca “daharasāmaṇerā no hatthe olokessantī”ti tucchahatthā na gatapubbā.
atk-s0502a:51_10: pacchābhattaṃ gacchantā pañca bhesajjāni aṭṭha ca pānāni.
atk-s0502a:51_11: Nivesanesu pana tesaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ bhikkhusahassānaṃ niccaṃ paññattāsanāneva honti.
atk-s0502a:51_14: Tesu anāthapiṇḍikena ekadivasampi satthā pañhaṃ na pucchitapubbo.
atk-s0502a:51_17: gahapatī’ti mayhaṃ dhammaṃ desento kilameyyā”ti satthari adhimattasinehena pañhaṃ na pucchati.
atk-s0502a:51_18: Satthā pana tasmiṃ nisinnamatteyeva “ayaṃ seṭṭhi maṃ arakkhitabbaṭṭhāne rakkhati.
atk-s0502a:51_19: Ahañhi kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ attano sīsaṃ chinditvā akkhīni
atk-s0502a:51_20: uppāṭetvā hadayamaṃsaṃ uppāṭetvā pāṇasamaṃ puttadāraṃ pariccajitvā pāramiyo pūrento paresaṃ dhammadesanatthameva pūresiṃ.
atk-s0502a:51_21: Esa maṃ arakkhitabbaṭṭhāne rakkhatī”ti ekaṃ dhammadesanaṃ kathetiyeva.
atk-s0502a:52_1: Tesu satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā pañcakoṭimattā manussā ariyasāvakā jātā,
atk-s0502a:52_5: pacchābhattaṃ gandhamālādihatthā vatthabhesajjapānakādīni gāhāpetvā dhammassavanatthāya gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:52_6: Athekadivasaṃ mahāpālo ariyasāvake gandhamālādihatthe vihāraṃ gacchante disvā “ayaṃ mahājano kuhiṃ gacchatī”ti
atk-s0502a:52_7: pucchitvā “dhammassavanāyā”ti sutvā “ahampi gamissāmī”ti gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā parisapariyante nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:53_0: Buddhā ca nāma dhammaṃ desentā saraṇasīlapabbajjādīnaṃ upanissayaṃ oloketvā ajjhāsayavasena dhammaṃ desenti,
atk-s0502a:53_1: tasmā taṃ divasaṃ satthā tassa upanissayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ desento anupubbikathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:53_10: “paralokaṃ gacchantaṃ puttadhītaro vā bhātaro vā bhogā vā nānugacchanti,
atk-s0502a:53_13: So desanāpariyosāne satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a:53_19: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā gehaṃ gantvā kaniṭṭhaṃ pakkosāpetvā – “tāta,
atk-s0502a:53_20: yaṃ mayhaṃ imasmiṃ gehe saviññāṇakampi aviññāṇakampi dhanaṃ kiñci atthi,
atk-s0502a:53_26: tvaṃ me mātari matāya mātā viya,
atk-s0502a:53_31: ahaṃ satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā gharāvāse vasituṃ na sakkomi.
atk-s0502a:53_32: Satthārā hi atisaṇhasukhumaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇo dhammo desito,
atk-s0502a:53_33: na sakkā so agāramajjhe vasantena pūretuṃ,
atk-s0502a:53_37: mahallakassa hi attano hatthapādāpi anassavā honti,
atk-s0502a:55_0: Yassa so vihatatthāmo, kathaṃ dhammaṃ carissati”. –
atk-s0502a:56_1: tātāti tassa viravantasseva satthu santikaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācitvā laddhapabbajjūpasampado ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:56_2: santike pañca vassāni vasitvā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā satthāramupasaṅkamitvā vanditvā pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:56_9: “Attano paññānurūpena ekaṃ vā dve vā nikāye sakalaṃ vā pana tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā tassa dhāraṇaṃ, kathanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:56_11: sallahukavuttino pana pantasenāsanābhiratassa attabhāve khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sātaccakiriyavasena vipassanaṃ
atk-s0502a:56_13: ahaṃ mahallakakāle pabbajito ganthadhuraṃ pūretuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:56_16: Athassa satthā yāva arahattaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:57_0: So satthāraṃ vanditvā attanā sahagāmino bhikkhū pariyesanto saṭṭhi bhikkhū labhitvā tehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:57_1: vīsayojanasatamaggaṃ gantvā ekaṃ mahantaṃ paccantagāmaṃ patvā tattha saparivāro piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:57_2: Manussā vattasampanne bhikkhū disvāva pasannacittā āsanāni paññāpetvā nisīdāpetvā paṇītenāhārena parivisitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:57_3: kuhiṃ ayyā gacchantī”ti pucchitvā “yathāphāsukaṭṭhānaṃ upāsakā”ti vutte paṇḍitā manussā “vassāvāsaṃ senāsanaṃ pariyesanti bhadantā”ti ñatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:57_4: sace ayyā imaṃ temāsaṃ idha vaseyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a:57_5: mayaṃ saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya sīlāni gaṇheyyāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:57_6: Tepi “mayaṃ imāni kulāni nissāya bhavanissaraṇaṃ karissāmā”ti adhivāsesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:58_0: Manussā tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ paṭijaggitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni sampādetvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:58_1: Te nibaddhaṃ tameva gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanti.
atk-s0502a:58_6: Thero vassūpanāyikadivase te bhikkhū āmantetvā pucchi, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:58_12: “Mayañhi dharamānakassa buddhassa santikā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā āgatā,
atk-s0502a:58_13: buddhā ca nāma na sakkā pamādena ārādhetuṃ,
atk-s0502a:58_15: Pamattassa ca nāma cattāro apāyā sakagehasadisā,
atk-s0502a:59_0: Atha therassa niddaṃ anokkamantassa paṭhamamāse atikkante majjhimamāse sampatte akkhirogo uppajji.
atk-s0502a:59_1: Chiddaghaṭato udakadhārā viya akkhīhi assudhārā paggharanti.
atk-s0502a:59_2: So sabbarattiṃ samaṇadhammaṃ katvā aruṇuggamane gabbhaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:59_8: Bhikkhū tassa akkhīhi assūni paggharante disvā, “kimetaṃ,
atk-s0502a:59_16: Thero nāsāya telaṃ āsiñcanto nisinnakova āsiñcitvā antogāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:59_26: kiṃ nu kho rogo na vūpasanto”ti cintetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:59_31: So “vihāraṃ gantvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ olokessāmī”ti cintetvā – “tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:59_32: gacchathā”ti theraṃ vissajjetvā vihāraṃ gantvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ olokento caṅkamananisīdanaṭṭhānameva disvā sayanaṭṭhānaṃ adisvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:59_37: samaṇadhammo nāma sarīraṃ yāpentena sakkā kātuṃ,
atk-s0502a:59_48: Anamataggasmiñhi saṃsāravaṭṭe tava akkhikāṇassa gaṇanā nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:59_51: idāni imaṃ antovassaṃ tayo māse na nipajjissāmīti temāsaṃ nibaddhavīriyaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0502a:59_52: Tasmā te cakkhūni nassantu vā bhijjantu vā,
atk-s0502a:59_54: mā cakkhūnī”ti bhūtakāyaṃ ovadanto imā gāthāyo abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:72_0: Evaṃ tīhi gāthāhi attano ovādaṃ datvā nisinnakova natthukammaṃ katvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:72_13: ajjato paṭṭhāya ‘asukena me telaṃ pakka’nti mā vadittha,
atk-s0502a:72_14: ahampi ‘mayā vo telaṃ pakka’nti na vakkhāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:72_15: So vejjena paccakkhāto vihāraṃ gantvā tvaṃ vejjenāpi paccakkhātosi,
atk-s0502a:75_0: Imāya gāthāya attānaṃ ovaditvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:75_1: Athassa majjhimayāme atikkante apubbaṃ acarimaṃ akkhīni ceva kilesā ca bhijjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:75_2: So sukkhavipassako arahā hutvā gabbhaṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:76_8: Te tassa akkhīni oloketvā assupuṇṇanettā hutvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:76_10: mayaṃ vo paṭijaggissāmā”ti theraṃ samassāsetvā kattabbayuttakaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:76_12: amhākaṃ ayyo kuhi”nti pucchitvā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā yāguṃ pesetvā sayaṃ piṇḍapātamādāya gantvā theraṃ vanditvā pādamūle parivattamānā roditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:77_0: Tato paṭṭhāya nibaddhaṃ yāgubhattaṃ vihārameva pesenti.
atk-s0502a:77_1: Theropi itare saṭṭhi bhikkhū nirantaraṃ ovadati.
atk-s0502a:77_2: Te tassovāde ṭhatvā upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya sabbeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:77_3: Te vuṭṭhavassā ca pana satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmā hutvā theramāhaṃsu, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:77_8: mayi etehi saddhiṃ gacchante sabbe kilamissanti,
atk-s0502a:77_16: mayi tumhehi saddhiṃ gacchante sabbe kilamissatha,
atk-s0502a:77_19: mayaṃ tumhehi saddhiṃyeva gamissāmā”ti. “Mā vo, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:77_22: mayhaṃ kaniṭṭho pana tumhe disvā pucchissati,
atk-s0502a:77_26: tumhe mama vacanena dasabalañca asītimahāthere ca vandathā”ti te uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:78_1: Manussā te disvā nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ datvā “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:78_4: Te punappunaṃ yācitvā tesaṃ gamanachandameva ñatvā anugantvā paridevitvā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:78_5: Tepi anupubbena jetavanaṃ gantvā satthārañca asītimahāthere ca therassa vacanena vanditvā punadivase yattha therassa kaniṭṭho vasati,
atk-s0502a:78_7: Kuṭumbiko te sañjānitvā nisīdāpetvā katapaṭisanthāro “bhātikatthero me, bhante,
atk-s0502a:78_10: So taṃ sutvāva tesaṃ pādamūle parivattento roditvā pucchi – “idāni, bhante,
atk-s0502a:78_13: tassa gatakāle tena saddhiṃ āgamissatī”ti. “Ayaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0502a:78_21: Atha naṃ pabbājetvā aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ pattacīvaraggahaṇādīni sikkhāpetvā maggaṃ ācikkhitvā pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:79_0: So anupubbena taṃ gāmaṃ patvā gāmadvāre ekaṃ mahallakaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:79_1: “imaṃ gāmaṃ nissāya koci āraññako vihāro atthī”ti pucchi. “Atthi,
atk-s0502a:79_11: So theraṃ vanditvā aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā theraṃ sammā paṭijaggitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:79_12: mātulakuṭumbiko me tumhākaṃ āgamanaṃ paccāsīsati, etha,
atk-s0502a:79_15: So yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ gahetvā therena saddhiṃ antogāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:79_19: Te nānappakārena yācitvā alabhantā theraṃ uyyojetvā upaḍḍhapathaṃ gantvā roditvā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:79_20: Sāmaṇero theraṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā ādāya gacchanto antarāmagge aṭaviyaṃ kaṭṭhanagaraṃ nāma therena upanissāya vuṭṭhapubbaṃ gāmaṃ sampāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a:79_21: so gāmato nikkhamitvā araññe gītaṃ gāyitvā dārūni uddharantiyā ekissā itthiyā gītasaddaṃ sutvā sare nimittaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:79_22: Itthisaddo viya hi añño saddo purisānaṃ sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā ṭhātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:80_3: yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0502a:81_0: Sāmaṇero tattha nimittaṃ gahetvā yaṭṭhikoṭiṃ vissajjetvā “tiṭṭhatha tāva, bhante,
atk-s0502a:81_1: kiccaṃ me atthī”ti tassā santikaṃ gato.
atk-s0502a:81_6: So ca kho itthiyā saddo chijji,
atk-s0502a:81_8: so tāya saddhiṃ sīlavipattiṃ patto bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:81_13: So tuṇhī hutvā therena punappunaṃ puṭṭhopi na kiñci kathesi.
atk-s0502a:81_16: So saṃvegappatto kāsāyāni apanetvā gihiniyāmena paridahitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:81_19: pabbajantopi ca svāhaṃ na saddhāya pabbajito,
atk-s0502a:81_23: tvaṃ samaṇabhāve ṭhatvāpi sīlamattaṃ pūretuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a:81_24: gihī hutvā kiṃ nāma kalyāṇaṃ karissasi,
atk-s0502a:81_25: tādisena pāpena mama yaṭṭhikoṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthī”ti āha. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:81_31: idheva me nipajjitvā marantassāpi aparāparaṃ parivattantassāpi tayā saddhiṃ gamanaṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:83_0: Seyyamāno na gacchāmi, natthi bāle sahāyatā.
atk-s0502a:85_0: Marissāmi no gamissāmi, natthi bāle sahāyatā”ti.
atk-s0502a:86_0: Taṃ sutvā itaro saṃvegajāto “bhāriyaṃ vata me sāhasikaṃ ananucchavikaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti bāhā paggayha
atk-s0502a:86_1: kandanto vanasaṇḍaṃ pakkhanditvā tathā pakkantova ahosi.
atk-s0502a:86_2: Therassāpi sīlatejena saṭṭhiyojanāyāmaṃ paññāsayojanavitthataṃ pannarasayojanabahalaṃ jayasumanapupphavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:86_3: nisīdanuṭṭhahanakālesu onamanunnamanapakatikaṃ sakkassa devarañño paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:86_4: Sakko “ko nu kho maṃ ṭhānā cāvetukāmo”ti olokento dibbena cakkhunā theraṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a:90_0: Dhammagaruko ayaṃ pālo, nisinno sāsane rato”ti.
atk-s0502a:91_1: “sacāhaṃ evarūpassa pāpagarahino dhammagarukassa ayyassa santikaṃ na gamissāmi,
atk-s0502a:94_0: Upagantvā ca pana therassa avidūre padasaddamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:94_12: mayā saddhiṃ gacchantassa tava papañco bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:94_14: ahampi ayyena saddhiṃ gacchanto dasasu puññakiriyavatthūsu ekaṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:94_20: Sakko tathā katvā pathaviṃ saṅkhipanto sāyanhasamaye jetavanaṃ sampāpesi.
atk-s0502a:97_0: So theraṃ netvā therassevatthāya kaniṭṭhakuṭumbikena kāritaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ netvā phalake nisīdāpetvā piyasahāyakavaṇṇena tassa santikaṃ gantvā, “samma,
atk-s0502a:97_5: idāni ahaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā theraṃ tayā kāritapaṇṇasālāya nisinnakaṃ disvā āgatomhī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:97_6: Kuṭumbikopi vihāraṃ gantvā theraṃ disvā pādamūle parivattanto roditvā “idaṃ disvā ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:97_7: tumhākaṃ pabbajituṃ nādāsi”ntiādīni vatvā dve dāsadārake bhujisse katvā therassa santike pabbājetvā “antogāmato
atk-s0502a:98_0: Athekadivasaṃ disāvāsino bhikkhū “satthāraṃ passissāmā”ti jetavanaṃ āgantvā tathāgataṃ vanditvā asītimahāthere ca,
atk-s0502a:98_1: vanditvā vihāracārikaṃ carantā cakkhupālattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā “idampi passissāmā”ti sāyaṃ tadabhimukhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:98_9: Tadā ca pana navavuṭṭhāya bhūmiyā bahū indagopakā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:98_11: Antevāsikā therassa caṅkamanaṭṭhānaṃ kālasseva na sammajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:98_12: Itare bhikkhū “therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ passissāmā”ti āgantvā caṅkamane matapāṇake disvā “ko imasmiṃ caṅkamatī”ti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:98_17: sacakkhukakāle nipajjitvā niddāyanto kiñci akatvā idāni cakkhuvikalakāle ‘caṅkamāmī’ti ettake pāṇake māresi ‘atthaṃ karissāmī’ti anatthaṃ karotī”ti.
atk-s0502a:99_0: Atha kho te gantvā tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:99_6: tatheva sopi te pāṇe na passati.
atk-s0502a:99_9: arahattassa upanissaye sati kasmā andho jāto”ti?
atk-s0502a:100_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ kāsiraññe rajjaṃ kārente eko vejjo gāmanigamesu caritvā vejjakammaṃ karonto ekaṃ cakkhudubbalaṃ itthiṃ disvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:100_6: ahaṃ te saddhiṃ puttadhītāhi dāsī bhavissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:100_11: “na kho pana maṃ saṇhena sammācārena samudācarissati,
atk-s0502a:100_14: bhadde”ti puṭṭhā “pubbe me akkhīni thokaṃ rujjiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:100_17: na me etāya dinnāya bhatiyā attho,
atk-s0502a:100_18: idāneva naṃ andhaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā gehaṃ gantvā bhariyāya etamatthaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a:100_20: So ekaṃ bhesajjaṃ yojetvā tassā santikaṃ gantvā “bhadde,
atk-s0502a:100_22: Athassā dve akkhīni dīpasikhā viya vijjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:101_1: tadā mama puttena katakammaṃ pacchato pacchato anubandhi.
atk-s0502a:101_2: Pāpakammañhi nāmetaṃ dhuraṃ vahato balibaddassa padaṃ cakkaṃ viya anugacchatīti idaṃ vatthuṃ kathetvā
atk-s0502a:101_3: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā patiṭṭhāpitamattikaṃ sāsanaṃ rājamuddāya lañchanto viya dhammarājā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:104_0: Manasā ce paduṭṭhena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-s0502a:105_0: Tato naṃ dukkhamanveti, cakkaṃva vahato pada”nti.
atk-s0502a:106_1: Imasmiṃ pana pade tadā tassa vejjassa uppannacittavasena niyamiyamānaṃ vavatthāpiyamānaṃ paricchijjiyamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:106_4: Dhammāti guṇadesanāpariyattinissattanijjīvavasena cattāro dhammā nāma. Tesu –
atk-s0502a:107_0: “Na hi dhammo adhammo ca, ubho samavipākino;
atk-s0502a:108_0: Adhammo nirayaṃ neti, dhammo pāpeti suggati”nti. –
atk-s0502a:109_6: ekacce kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ geyya”nti ayaṃ pariyattidhammo nāma.
atk-s0502a:109_11: So atthato tayo arūpino khandhā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandhoti.
atk-s0502a:109_12: Ete hi mano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā nāma.
atk-s0502a:110_0: Kathaṃ panetehi saddhiṃ ekavatthuko ekārammaṇo apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇe uppajjamāno mano pubbaṅgamo nāma hotīti?
atk-s0502a:110_2: Yathā hi bahūsu ekato gāmaghātādīni kammāni karontesu “ko etesaṃ pubbaṅgamo”ti vutte yo nesaṃ paccayo hoti,
atk-s0502a:110_3: yaṃ nissāya te taṃ kammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a:110_4: so datto vā mitto vā tesaṃ pubbaṅgamoti vuccati,
atk-s0502a:110_6: Iti uppādapaccayaṭṭhena mano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā.
atk-s0502a:110_7: Na hi te mane anuppajjante uppajjituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:110_8: mano pana ekaccesu cetasikesu anupajjantesupi uppajjatiyeva.
atk-s0502a:110_9: Adhipativasena pana mano seṭṭho etesanti manoseṭṭho.
atk-s0502a:110_10: Yathā hi corādīnaṃ corajeṭṭhakādayo adhipatino seṭṭhā.
atk-s0502a:110_11: Tathā tesampi mano adhipati manova seṭṭhā.
atk-s0502a:110_12: Yathā pana dāruādīhi nipphannāni tāni tāni bhaṇḍāni dārumayādīni nāma honti,
atk-s0502a:110_13: tathā tepi manato nipphannattā manomayā nāma.
atk-s0502a:111_3: Yathā hi pasannaṃ udakaṃ āgantukehi nīlādīhi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nīlodakādibhedaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:111_6: tathā tampi āgantukehi abhijjhādīhi dosehi paduṭṭhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:111_14: bhāsati vā karoti vā so bhāsamāno catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritameva bhāsati,
atk-s0502a:111_16: abhāsanto akaronto tāya abhijjhādīhi paduṭṭhamānasatāya tividhaṃ manoduccaritaṃ pūreti.
atk-s0502a:112_0: Tato naṃ dukkhamanvetīti tato tividhaduccaritato taṃ puggalaṃ dukkhaṃ anveti,
atk-s0502a:112_2: manussesu vā tamattabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ kāyavatthukampi itarampīti iminā pariyāyena kāyikacetasikaṃ vipākadukkhaṃ anugacchati.
atk-s0502a:112_4: Cakkaṃva vahato padanti dhure yuttassa dhuraṃ vahato balibaddassa padaṃ cakkaṃ viya.
atk-s0502a:112_5: Yathā hi so ekampi divasaṃ dvepi pañcapi dasapi aḍḍhamāsampi māsampi vahanto cakkaṃ nivattetuṃ jahituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:112_6: atha khvassa purato abhikkamantassa yugaṃ gīvaṃ bādhati,
atk-s0502a:112_8: Imehi dvīhi ākārehi bādhantaṃ cakkaṃ tassa padānupadikaṃ hoti;
atk-s0502a:112_9: tatheva manasā paduṭṭhena tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā ṭhitaṃ puggalaṃ nirayādīsu tattha tattha gatagataṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:113_0: Gāthāpariyosāne tiṃsasahassā bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:116_0: 2. Manopubbaṅgamā dhammāti dutiyagāthāpi sāvatthiyaṃyeva maṭṭhakuṇḍaliṃ ārabbha bhāsitā.
atk-s0502a:117_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira adinnapubbako nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:117_5: bhattavetanaṃ dātabbaṃ bhavissatī”ti sayameva suvaṇṇaṃ koṭṭetvā maṭṭhāni kuṇḍalāni katvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:117_14: kiṃ tvaṃ mama dhanacchedaṃ na olokessasī”ti?
atk-s0502a:117_19: So vejjānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “asukarogassa nāma tumhe kiṃ bhesajjaṃ karothā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:117_20: Athassa te yaṃ vā taṃ vā rukkhatacādiṃ ācikkhanti.
atk-s0502a:117_24: Brāhmaṇo tassa dubbalabhāvaṃ ñatvā ekaṃ vejjaṃ pakkosi.
atk-s0502a:117_25: So taṃ oloketvāva “amhākaṃ ekaṃ kiccaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:117_26: aññaṃ vejjaṃ pakkositvā tikicchāpehī”ti taṃ pahāya nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:117_27: Brāhmaṇo tassa maraṇasamayaṃ ñatvā “imassa dassanatthāya āgatā antogehe sāpateyyaṃ passissanti,
atk-s0502a:117_28: bahi naṃ karissāmī”ti puttaṃ nīharitvā bahiāḷinde nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0502a:118_0: Taṃ divasaṃ bhagavā balavapaccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya pubbabuddhesu katādhikārānaṃ ussannakusalamūlānaṃ
atk-s0502a:118_1: veneyyabandhavānaṃ dassanatthaṃ buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento dasasahassacakkavāḷesu ñāṇajālaṃ patthari.
atk-s0502a:118_2: Maṭṭhakuṇḍalī bahiāḷinde nipannākāreneva tassa anto paññāyi.
atk-s0502a:118_3: Satthā taṃ disvā tassa antogehā nīharitvā tattha nipajjāpitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “atthi nu kho mayhaṃ ettha gatapaccayena attho”ti upadhārento idaṃ addasa –
atk-s0502a:118_4: ayaṃ māṇavo mayi cittaṃ pasādetvā kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsadevaloke tiṃsayojanike kanakavimāne nibbattissati,
atk-s0502a:118_6: brāhmaṇopi taṃ jhāpetvā rodanto āḷāhane vicarissati.
atk-s0502a:118_7: Devaputto tigāvutappamāṇaṃ saṭṭhisakaṭabhārālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ accharāsahassaparivāraṃ attabhāvaṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a:118_8: “kena nu kho kammena mayā ayaṃ sirisampatti laddhā”ti oloketvā mayi cittappasādena laddhabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:118_9: “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo dhanacchedabhayena mama bhesajjamakatvā idāni āḷāhanaṃ gantvā rodati,
atk-s0502a:118_10: vippakārappattaṃ naṃ karissāmī”ti pitari rodante maṭṭhakuṇḍalivaṇṇena āgantvā āḷāhanassāvidūre nipajjitvā rodissati.
atk-s0502a:118_15: “Kiṃ kammaṃ katvā”ti vutte mayi cittappasādena nibbattabhāvaṃ ācikkhissati.
atk-s0502a:118_16: Brāhmaṇo “tumhesu cittaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbatto nāma atthī”ti maṃ pucchissati.
atk-s0502a:118_17: Athassāhaṃ “ettakāni satāni vā sahassāni vā satasahassāni vāti na sakkā gaṇanā paricchinditu”nti vatvā dhammapade gāthaṃ bhāsissāmi.
atk-s0502a:118_21: Iti imaṃ kulaputtaṃ nissāya mahādhammābhisamayo bhavissatīti disvā punadivase katasarīrapaṭijaggano mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0502a:118_22: sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā anupubbena brāhmaṇassa gehadvāraṃ gato.
atk-s0502a:119_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe maṭṭhakuṇḍalī antogehābhimukho nipanno hoti.
atk-s0502a:119_1: Athassa satthā attano apassanabhāvaṃ ñatvā ekaṃ rasmiṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a:119_2: Māṇavo “kiṃ obhāso nāmeso”ti parivattetvā nipannova satthāraṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:119_3: “andhabālapitaraṃ nissāya evarūpaṃ buddhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kāyaveyyāvaṭikaṃ vā kātuṃ dānaṃ vā dātuṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ nālatthaṃ,
atk-s0502a:119_7: So tathāgate cakkhupathaṃ vijahanteyeva pasannamano kālaṃ katvā suttappabuddho viya devaloke tiṃsayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:120_0: Brāhmaṇopissa sarīraṃ jhāpetvā āḷāhane rodanaparāyaṇo ahosi,
atk-s0502a:120_5: “kena me kammena laddhā”ti upadhārento “satthari manopasādenā”ti ñatvā “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo mama aphāsukakāle
atk-s0502a:120_7: vippakārappattameva naṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti maṭṭhakuṇḍalivaṇṇena āgantvā āḷāhanassāvidūre bāhā paggayha rodanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:120_8: Brāhmaṇo taṃ disvā “ahaṃ tāva puttasokena rodāmi,
atk-s0502a:135_0: Taṃ sutvā māṇavo “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo puttassa bhesajjamakatvā puttapatirūpakaṃ maṃ disvā rodanto ‘suvaṇṇādimayaṃ rathacakkaṃ karomī’ti vadati,
atk-s0502a:135_1: hotu niggaṇhissāmi na”nti cintetvā “kīva mahantaṃ me cakkayugaṃ karissasī”ti vatvā “yāva mahantaṃ ākaṅkhasi,
atk-s0502a:135_2: tāva mahantaṃ karissāmī”ti vutte “candimasūriyehi me attho,
atk-s0502a:146_0: “Kiṃ pana paññāyamānassatthāya rodanto bālo hoti, udāhu apaññāyamānassatthāyā”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:151_0: Taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo “yuttaṃ esa vadatī”ti sallakkhetvā –
atk-s0502a:156_0: Vatvā tassa kathāya nissoko hutvā māṇavassa thutiṃ karonto imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:158_0: Vārinā viya osiñcaṃ, sabbaṃ nibbāpaye daraṃ.
atk-s0502a:162_0: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇavā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:165_0: Ko vā tvaṃ kassa vā putto, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti. –
atk-s0502a:185_0: Tasmiṃ kathenteyeva brāhmaṇassa sakalasarīraṃ pītiyā paripūri. So taṃ pītiṃ pavedento –
atk-s0502a:199_0: Āha. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:201_0: Karomi tuyhaṃ vacanaṃ, tvaṃsi ācariyo mama.
atk-s0502a:209_1: ahaṃ ajja samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nimantetvā pañhaṃ pucchissāmi,
atk-s0502a:209_2: sakkāraṃ karohī”ti vatvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ neva abhivādetvā na paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito,
atk-s0502a:209_4: adhivāsehi ajjatanāya bhattaṃ saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:209_6: So satthu adhivāsanaṃ viditvā vegenāgantvā sake nivesane paṇītaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyañca paṭiyādāpesi.
atk-s0502a:209_7: Satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tassa gehaṃ gantvā paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:209_10: Micchādiṭṭhikena kira tathāgate nimantite dve janakāyā sannipatanti micchādiṭṭhikā “ajja samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ
atk-s0502a:209_13: Atha kho brāhmaṇo katabhattakiccaṃ tathāgatamupasaṅkamitvā nīcāsane nisinno pañhaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a:209_15: tumhākaṃ dānaṃ adatvā pūjaṃ akatvā dhammaṃ asutvā uposathavāsaṃ avasitvā kevalaṃ manopasādamatteneva sagge nibbattā nāma hontī”ti?
atk-s0502a:209_18: nanu te puttena maṭṭhakuṇḍalinā mayi manaṃ pasādetvā attano sagge nibbattabhāvo kathito”ti? “Kadā,
atk-s0502a:209_20: Nanu tvaṃ ajja susānaṃ gantvā kandanto avidūre bāhā paggayha kandantaṃ ekaṃ māṇavaṃ disvā “alaṅkato maṭṭhakuṇḍalī,
atk-s0502a:209_21: māladhārī haricandanussado”ti dvīhi janehi kathitakathaṃ pakāsento sabbaṃ maṭṭhakuṇḍalivatthuṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:210_0: Taṃ kathetvā ca pana “na kho, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0502a:210_2: atha kho mayi manaṃ pasādetvā sagge nibbattānaṃ gaṇanā nāma natthī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:210_4: athassa anibbematikabhāvaṃ viditvā satthā “maṭṭhakuṇḍalidevaputto vimāneneva saddhiṃ āgacchatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:210_5: So tigāvutappamāṇeneva dibbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitena attabhāvena āgantvā vimānato oruyha satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:210_6: Atha naṃ satthā “tvaṃ imaṃ sampattiṃ kiṃ kammaṃ katvā paṭilabhī”ti pucchanto –
atk-s0502a:212_0: Obhāsentī disā sabbā, osadhī viya tārakā;
atk-s0502a:213_0: Pucchāmi taṃ deva mahānubhāva, manussabhūto kimakāsi puñña”nti. –
atk-s0502a:214_7: adinnapubbakabrāhmaṇassa nāma putto aññaṃ kiñci puññaṃ akatvā satthari cittaṃ pasādetvā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ paṭilabhī”ti tuṭṭhiṃ pavedesi.
atk-s0502a:215_2: Pasannena hi manena kataṃ kammaṃ devalokaṃ manussalokaṃ gacchantaṃ puggalaṃ chāyāva na vijahatīti idaṃ
atk-s0502a:215_3: vatthuṃ kathetvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā patiṭṭhāpitamattikaṃ sāsanaṃ rājamuddāya lañchanto viya dhammarājā
atk-s0502a:217_0: Manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā;
atk-s0502a:219_0: Tattha kiñcāpi manoti avisesena sabbampi catubhūmikacittaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0502a:219_1: imasmiṃ pana pade niyamiyamānaṃ vavatthāpiyamānaṃ paricchijjiyamānaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ labbhati.
atk-s0502a:219_2: Vatthuvasena panāhariyamānaṃ tatopi somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttacittameva labbhati.
atk-s0502a:219_5: Ete hi uppādapaccayaṭṭhena somanassasampayuttamano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā nāma.
atk-s0502a:219_6: Yathā hi bahūsu ekato hutvā mahābhikkhusaṅghassa cīvaradānādīni vā uḷārapūjādhammassavanādīni vā mālāgandhasakkārakaraṇādīni
atk-s0502a:219_7: vā puññāni karontesu “ko etesaṃ pubbaṅgamo”ti vutte yo tesaṃ paccayo hoti,
atk-s0502a:219_8: yaṃ nissāya te tāni puññāni karonti,
atk-s0502a:219_9: so tisso vā phusso vā tesaṃ pubbaṅgamoti vuccati,
atk-s0502a:219_11: Iti uppādapaccayaṭṭhena mano pubbaṅgamo etesanti manopubbaṅgamā.
atk-s0502a:219_12: Na hi te mane anuppajjante uppajjituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:219_13: mano pana ekaccesu cetasikesu anuppajjantesupi uppajjatiyeva.
atk-s0502a:219_14: Evaṃ adhipativasena pana mano seṭṭho etesanti manoseṭṭhā.
atk-s0502a:219_15: Yathā hi gaṇādīnaṃ adhipati puriso gaṇaseṭṭho seṇiseṭṭhoti vuccati,
atk-s0502a:219_17: Yathā pana suvaṇṇādīhi nipphāditāni bhaṇḍāni suvaṇṇamayādīni nāma honti,
atk-s0502a:219_18: tathā etepi manato nipphannattā manomayā nāma.
atk-s0502a:220_1: Bhāsati vā karoti vāti evarūpena manena bhāsanto catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritameva bhāsati,
atk-s0502a:220_3: abhāsanto akaronto tāya anabhijjhādīhi pasannamānasatāya tividhaṃ manosucaritaṃ pūreti.
atk-s0502a:221_0: Tato naṃ sukhamanvetīti tato tividhasucaritato naṃ puggalaṃ sukha manveti.
atk-s0502a:221_3: duggatiyaṃ vā sukhānubhavanaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ kāyavatthukampi itaravatthukampi avatthukampīti kāyikacetasikaṃ vipākasukhaṃ anugacchati,
atk-s0502a:221_6: Chāyāva anapāyinīti yathā hi chāyā nāma sarīrappaṭibaddhā sarīre gacchante gacchati,
atk-s0502a:221_10: “saṇhena vā pharusena vā nivattāhī”ti vatvā vā pothetvā vā nivattāpetuṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0502a:221_12: Evameva imesaṃ dasannaṃ kusalakammapathānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇakusalamūlikaṃ kāmāvacarādibhedaṃ kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:221_13: gatagataṭṭhāne anapāyinī chāyā viya hutvā na vijahatīti.
atk-s0502a:225_0: Akkocchi manti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:226_0: So kirāyasmā tissatthero bhagavato pitucchāputto ahosi,
atk-s0502a:226_1: mahallakakāle pabbajitvā buddhānaṃ uppannalābhasakkāraṃ paribhuñjanto thūlasarīro ākoṭitapaccākoṭitehi
atk-s0502a:226_2: cīvarehi nivāsetvā yebhuyyena vihāramajjhe upaṭṭhānasālāyaṃ nisīdati.
atk-s0502a:226_3: Tathāgataṃ dassanatthāya āgatā āgantukabhikkhū taṃ disvā “eko mahāthero bhavissatī”ti saññāya tassa santikaṃ gantvā vattaṃ āpucchanti,
atk-s0502a:226_6: Atha naṃ eko daharabhikkhu “kativassā tumhe”ti pucchitvā “vassaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:226_11: ettake mahāthere disvā sāmīcikammamattampi na karosi,
atk-s0502a:226_14: So khattiyamānaṃ janetvā “tumhe kassa santikaṃ āgatā”ti pucchitvā “satthu santika”nti vutte “maṃ pana ‘ko eso’ti sallakkhetha,
atk-s0502a:226_15: mūlameva vo chindissāmī”ti vatvā rudanto dukkhī dummano satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:226_16: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ nu tvaṃ tissa dukkhī dummano assumukho rodamāno āgatosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:226_17: Tepi bhikkhū “esa gantvā kiñci āloḷaṃ kareyyā”ti teneva saddhiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:226_37: etaṃ vattaṃ akarontena vihāramajjhe nisīdituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:226_51: pubbepi esa dubbacoyevā”ti vatvā “idāni tāvassa, bhante,
atk-s0502a:226_53: atīte esa kiṃ akāsī”ti vutte “tena hi,
atk-s0502a:227_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ bārāṇasiraññe rajjaṃ kārente devilo nāma tāpaso aṭṭha māse himavante vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya
atk-s0502a:227_1: cattāro māse nagaramupanissāya vasitukāmo himavantato āgantvā nagaradvāre dārake disvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:227_5: Tāpaso kumbhakārasālaṃ gantvā dvāre ṭhatvā “sace te bhaggava agaru,
atk-s0502a:227_11: Tasmiṃ pavisitvā nisinne aparopi nārado nāma tāpaso himavantato āgantvā kumbhakāraṃ ekarattivāsaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a:227_12: Kumbhakāro “paṭhamaṃ āgato iminā saddhiṃ ekato vasitukāmo bhaveyya vā no vā,
atk-s0502a:227_20: pavisitvā ekamante vasāhī”ti vutte pavisitvā puretaraṃ paviṭṭhassa devilassa aparabhāge nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:228_0: Sayanakāle nārado devilassa nipajjanaṭṭhānañca dvārañca sallakkhetvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a:228_1: So pana devilo nipajjamāno attano nipajjanaṭṭhāne anipajjitvā dvāramajjhe tiriyaṃ nipajji.
atk-s0502a:228_2: Nārado rattiṃ nikkhamanto tassa jaṭāsu akkami.
atk-s0502a:228_8: khamatha me”ti vatvā tassa kandantasseva bahi nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:228_9: Itaro “ayaṃ pavisantopi maṃ akkameyyā”ti parivattetvā pādaṭṭhāne sīsaṃ katvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a:228_11: idānissa pādapassena pavisissāmī”ti cintetvā āgacchanto gīvāya akkami.
atk-s0502a:228_14: paṭhamaṃ mama jaṭāsu akkamitvā idāni gīvāya akkamasi,
atk-s0502a:228_17: ahaṃ tumhākaṃ evaṃ nipannabhāvaṃ na jānāmi,
atk-s0502a:230_0: Pātodayante sūriye, muddhā te phalatu sattadhā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:231_1: mayhaṃ doso natthīti mama vadantasseva tumhe abhisapatha,
atk-s0502a:233_0: Pātodayante sūriye, muddhā te phalatu sattadhā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:234_3: Tasmā “kassa nu kho upari abhisapo patissatī”ti upadhārento “ācariyassā”ti ñatvā tasmiṃ anukampaṃ paṭicca iddhibalena aruṇuggamanaṃ nivāreti.
atk-s0502a:235_1: tayi rajjaṃ kārente aruṇo na uṭṭhahati,
atk-s0502a:235_3: Rājā attano kāyakammādīni olokento kiñci ayuttaṃ adisvā “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti cintetvā “pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0502a:235_4: vivādena bhavitabba”nti parisaṅkamāno “kacci imasmiṃ nagare pabbajitā atthī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:235_5: “Hiyyo sāyaṃ kumbhakārasālāyaṃ āgatā atthi devā”ti vutte taṃkhaṇaññeva rājā ukkāhi dhāriyamānāhi tattha
atk-s0502a:235_6: gantvā nāradaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno āha –
atk-s0502a:237_0: Kena loko tamobhūto, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti.
atk-s0502a:238_0: Nārado sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā iminā kāraṇena ahaṃ iminā abhisapito,
atk-s0502a:238_3: tasseva upari abhisapo patatū”ti vatvā abhisapiṃ.
atk-s0502a:238_4: Abhisapitvā ca pana “kassa nu kho upari abhisapo patissatī”ti upadhārento “sūriyuggamanavelāya ācariyassa
atk-s0502a:238_5: muddhā sattadhā phalissatī”ti disvā etasmiṃ anukampaṃ paṭicca aruṇassa uggamanaṃ na demīti.
atk-s0502a:238_11: maṃ jaṭāsu ca gīvāya ca akkami,
atk-s0502a:238_16: “Muddhā te sattadhā phalissatī”ti vuttepi na khamāpetiyeva.
atk-s0502a:238_17: Atha naṃ rājā “na tvaṃ attano ruciyā khamāpessasī”ti hatthapādakucchigīvāsu gāhāpetvā nāradassa pādamūle onamāpesi.
atk-s0502a:238_23: tattha naṃ sīse mattikāpiṇḍaṃ katvā galappamāṇe udake ṭhapāpehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:238_26: mayā iddhiyā vissaṭṭhāya sūriyasantāpe uṭṭhahante udake nimujjitvā aññena ṭhānena uttaritvā gaccheyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:239_4: nārado ahamevāti evaṃ tadāpesa dubbacoyevā”ti vatvā tissattheraṃ āmantetvā, “tissa,
atk-s0502a:239_8: asuko kho me bhaṇḍaṃ ahāsī’ti cintentassa veraṃ nāma na vūpasammati,
atk-s0502a:239_9: evaṃ pana anupanayhantasseva upasammatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:241_0: “Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
atk-s0502a:242_0: Ye ca taṃ upanayhanti, veraṃ tesaṃ na sammati.
atk-s0502a:244_0: “Akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me;
atk-s0502a:245_0: Ye ca taṃ nupanayhanti, veraṃ tesūpasammatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:246_2: Ajinīti kūṭasakkhiotāraṇena vā vādapaṭivādena vā karaṇuttariyakaraṇena vā ajesi.
atk-s0502a:246_3: Ahāsi meti mama santakaṃ pattādīsu kiñcideva avahari.
atk-s0502a:246_4: Ye ca tanti ye keci devatā vā manussā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā taṃ “akkocchi ma”ntiādivatthukaṃ kodhaṃ
atk-s0502a:246_5: sakaṭadhuraṃ viya naddhinā pūtimacchādīni viya ca kusādīhi punappunaṃ veṭhetvā upanayhanti,
atk-s0502a:246_6: tesaṃ sakiṃ uppannaṃ veraṃ na sammatīti vūpasammati.
atk-s0502a:246_7: Ye ca taṃ nupanayhantīti asatiyā amanasikāravasena vā kammapaccavekkhaṇādivasena vā ye taṃ akkosādivatthukaṃ
atk-s0502a:246_8: kodhaṃ tayāpi koci niddoso purimabhave akkuṭṭho bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:246_11: kassaci te pasayha kiñci acchinnaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:246_12: tasmā niddoso hutvāpi akkosādīni pāpuṇāsīti evaṃ na upanayhanti.
atk-s0502a:246_13: Tesu pamādena uppannampi veraṃ iminā anupanayhanena nirindhano viya jātavedo vūpasammatīti.
atk-s0502a:250_0: Na hi verenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ vañjhitthiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:251_0: Eko kira kuṭumbikaputto pitari kālakate khette ca ghare ca sabbakammāni attanāva karonto mātaraṃ paṭijaggi.
atk-s0502a:251_5: khette ca ghare ca kiccaṃ tvameva karosi,
atk-s0502a:251_6: tena mayhaṃ cittasukhaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-s0502a:251_9: Sā ekaṃ kulaṃ gantukāmā gehā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:251_10: Atha naṃ putto “kataraṃ kulaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “asukakulaṃ nāmā”ti vutte tattha gamanaṃ paṭisedhetvā attano abhirucitaṃ kulaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a:251_11: Sā tattha gantvā kumārikaṃ vāretvā divasaṃ vavatthapetvā taṃ ānetvā tassa ghare akāsi.
atk-s0502a:251_21: Vañjhitthī taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “puttā nāma mātāpitūnaṃ vacanaṃ atikkamituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:251_22: idāni aññaṃ vijāyiniṃ itthiṃ ānetvā maṃ dāsibhogena bhuñjissati.
atk-s0502a:251_23: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ sayameva ekaṃ kumārikaṃ āneyya”nti cintetvā ekaṃ kulaṃ gantvā tassatthāya kumārikaṃ vāretvā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, amma,
atk-s0502a:251_26: tumhākaṃ pana dhītā puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā labhitvā kuṭumbikassa sāminī bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:251_27: mayhaṃ sāmikassa naṃ dethā”ti yācitvā sampaṭicchāpetvā ānetvā sāmikassa ghare akāsi.
atk-s0502a:252_8: Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā gabbhe patiṭṭhite tassā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:252_9: Itarissā pana sā sayameva niccaṃ yāgubhattaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a:252_18: ayaṃ tava issariyabhayena gabbhassa pātanabhesajjaṃ yojetvā deti,
atk-s0502a:252_20: mā puna evamakatthā”ti vuttā tatiyavāre na kathesi.
atk-s0502a:252_21: Atha sā itarissā udaraṃ disvā “kasmā mayhaṃ gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ na kathesī”ti vatvā “tvaṃ maṃ ānetvā vañcetvā dve vāre gabbhaṃ pātesi,
atk-s0502a:252_22: kimatthaṃ tuyhaṃ kathemī”ti vutte “naṭṭhā dānimhī”ti cintetvā tassā pamādaṃ olokentī pariṇate gabbhe okāsaṃ labhitvā bhesajjaṃ yojetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:252_23: Gabbho pariṇatattā patituṃ asakkonto tiriyaṃ nipati,
atk-s0502a:252_27: tvameva maṃ ānetvā tvameva tayopi vāre dārake nāsesi,
atk-s0502a:252_29: ito dāni cutā yakkhinī hutvā tava dārake khādituṃ samatthā hutvā nibbatteyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:252_30: kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva gehe majjārī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:252_31: Itarampi sāmiko gahetvā “tayā me kulūpacchedo kato”ti kapparajaṇṇukādīhi supothitaṃ pothesi.
atk-s0502a:252_32: Sā tenevābādhena kālaṃ katvā tattheva kukkuṭī hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0502a:253_4: “tayo vāre mama aṇḍāni khāditvā idāni mampi khāditukāmāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a:253_5: “Ito cutā saputtakaṃ taṃ khādituṃ labheyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā tato cutā araññe dīpinī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:253_7: Tassā vijātakāle dīpinī āgantvā tayo vāre puttake khādi.
atk-s0502a:253_8: Migī maraṇakāle “ayaṃ me tikkhattuṃ puttake khāditvā idāni mampi khādissati,
atk-s0502a:253_9: ito dāni cutā etaṃ saputtakaṃ khādituṃ labheyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā ito cutā yakkhinī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:253_10: Dīpinīpi tatheva tato cutā sāvatthiyaṃ kuladhītā hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:253_13: Yakkhinīpi tassā piyasahāyikāvaṇṇena āgantvā “kuhiṃ me sahāyikā”ti “antogabbhe vijātā”ti vutte “puttaṃ nu kho vijātā,
atk-s0502a:253_14: udāhu dhītaranti passissāmi na”nti gabbhaṃ pavisitvā passantī viya dārakaṃ gahetvā khāditvā gatā.
atk-s0502a:253_16: Tatiyavāre itarā garubhārā hutvā sāmikaṃ āmantetvā, “sāmi,
atk-s0502a:253_17: imasmiṃ ṭhāne ekā yakkhinī mama dve putte khāditvā gatā,
atk-s0502a:253_18: idāni mama kulagehaṃ gantvā vijāyissāmī”ti kulagehaṃ gantvā vijāyi.
atk-s0502a:254_0: Tadā sā yakkhinī udakavāraṃ gatā hoti.
atk-s0502a:254_1: Vessavaṇassa hi yakkhiniyo vārena anotattadahato sīsaparamparāya udakamāharanti.
atk-s0502a:254_4: Sā pana udakavārato muttamattāva vegena taṃ gharaṃ gantvā “kuhiṃ me sahāyikā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:254_6: tassā imasmiṃ ṭhāne jātajātadārake yakkhinī āgantvā khādati,
atk-s0502a:254_9: na me muccissatī”ti veravegasamussāhitamānasā nagarābhimukhī pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:254_10: Itarāpi nāmaggahaṇadivase naṃ dārakaṃ nhāpetvā nāmaṃ katvā, “sāmi,
atk-s0502a:254_11: idāni sakagharaṃ gacchāmā”ti puttamādāya sāmikena saddhiṃ vihāramajjhe gatamaggena gacchantī puttaṃ sāmikassa
atk-s0502a:254_12: datvā vihārapokkharaṇiyā nhātvā sāmike nhāyante uttaritvā puttassa thaññaṃ pāyamānā ṭhitā yakkhiniṃ āgacchantiṃ
atk-s0502a:254_17: ayaṃ sā yakkhinī”ti uccāsaddaṃ katvā yāva tassa āgamanaṃ saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī nivattetvā antovihārābhimukhī pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:255_0: Tasmiṃ samaye satthā parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a:255_1: Sā puttaṃ tathāgatassa pādapiṭṭhe nipajjāpetvā “tumhākaṃ mayā esa dinno,
atk-s0502a:255_3: Dvārakoṭṭhake adhivattho sumanadevo nāma yakkhiniyā anto pavisituṃ nādāsi.
atk-s0502a:255_10: mā saddamakāsī”ti vatvā taṃ āgantvā ṭhitaṃ “kasmā evaṃ karosi,
atk-s0502a:255_11: sace tumhe mādisassa buddhassa sammukhībhāvaṃ nāgamissatha,
atk-s0502a:255_12: ahinakulānaṃ viya acchaphandanānaṃ viya kākolūkānaṃ viya ca kappaṭṭhitikaṃ vo veraṃ abhavissa,
atk-s0502a:258_0: Averena ca sammanti, esa dhammo sanantano”ti.
atk-s0502a:259_0: Tattha na hi verenāti yathā hi kheḷasiṅghāṇikādīhi asucīhi makkhitaṃ ṭhānaṃ teheva asucīhi dhovantā suddhaṃ niggandhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:259_1: atha kho taṃ ṭhānaṃ bhiyyosomattāya asuddhatarañceva duggandhatarañca hoti;
atk-s0502a:259_2: evameva akkosantaṃ paccakkosanto paharantaṃ paṭipaharanto verena veraṃ vūpasametuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:259_3: atha kho bhiyyo bhiyyo verameva karoti.
atk-s0502a:259_4: Iti verāni nāma verena kismiñci kāle na sammanti,
atk-s0502a:259_6: Averena ca sammantīti yathā pana tāni kheḷādīni asucīni vippasannena udakena dhoviyamānāni nassanti,
atk-s0502a:259_8: evameva averena khantimettodakena yoniso manasikārena paccavekkhaṇena verāni vūpasammanti paṭippassambhanti abhāvaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:259_9: Esa dhammo sanantanoti esa averena verūpasamanasaṅkhāto porāṇako dhammo;
atk-s0502a:260_0: Gāthāpariyosāne yakkhinī sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi. Sampattaparisāyapi dhammadesanā sātthikā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:261_4: natthi te etaṃ nissāya paripantho”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:261_6: Sā taṃ cumbitvā āliṅgetvā puna mātuyeva datvā rodituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:261_8: ahaṃ pubbe yathā vā tathā vā jīvikaṃ kappentīpi kucchipūraṃ nālatthaṃ,
atk-s0502a:261_10: Atha naṃ satthā “mā cintayī”ti samassāsetvā taṃ itthimāha –
atk-s0502a:261_11: “imaṃ netvā attano gehe nivāsāpetvā aggayāgubhattehi paṭijaggāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:261_12: Sā taṃ netvā piṭṭhivaṃse patiṭṭhāpetvā aggayāgubhattehi paṭijaggi,
atk-s0502a:261_13: tassā vīhipaharaṇakāle musalaggena muddhaṃ paharantaṃ viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:261_14: Sā sahāyikaṃ āmantetvā “imasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0502a:261_15: aññattha maṃ patiṭṭhāpehī”ti vatvā musalasālāya udakacāṭiyaṃ uddhane nibbakose saṅkārakūṭe gāmadvāre
atk-s0502a:261_16: cāti etesu ṭhānesu patiṭṭhāpitāpi idha me musalena sīsaṃ bhindantaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0502a:261_21: idha gāmadārakā lakkhayoggaṃ karontīti sabbāni tāni paṭikkhipi.
atk-s0502a:261_22: Atha naṃ bahigāme vivittokāse patiṭṭhāpetvā tattha tassā aggayāgubhattādīni haritvā paṭijaggi.
atk-s0502a:261_30: Sesajanehi katasassaṃ atiudakena vā anodakena vā nassati,
atk-s0502a:261_38: mayaṃ tassā vacanena thalesu ninnesu sassāni karoma,
atk-s0502a:261_46: Sāpi tato paṭṭhāya sabbesaṃ kammante olokentī lābhaggappattā ahosi mahāparivārā.
atk-s0502a:264_0: Pare ca na vijānantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosambake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:265_0: Kosambiyañhi ghositārāme pañcasatapañcasataparivārā dve bhikkhū vihariṃsu vinayadharo ca dhammakathiko ca.
atk-s0502a:265_1: Tesu dhammakathiko ekadivasaṃ sarīravalañjaṃ katvā udakakoṭṭhake ācamanaudakāvasesaṃ bhājane ṭhapetvāva nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:265_2: Pacchā vinayadharo tattha paviṭṭho taṃ udakaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā itaraṃ pucchi, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:265_12: Vinayadharopi attano nissitakānaṃ “ayaṃ dhammakathiko āpattiṃ āpajjamānopi na jānātī”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:265_13: Te tassa nissitake disvā “tumhākaṃ upajjhāyo āpattiṃ āpajjitvāpi āpattibhāvaṃ na jānātī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:265_16: “ayaṃ vinayadharo pubbe anāpattīti vatvā idāni āpattīti vadati,
atk-s0502a:265_20: Kato vinayadharo okāsaṃ labhitvā dhammakathikassa āpattiyā adassane ukkhepanīyakammamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:265_21: Tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ paccayadāyakā upaṭṭhākāpi dve koṭṭhāsā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:265_22: ovādapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhuniyopi ārakkhadevatāpi tāsaṃ sandiṭṭhasambhattā ākāsaṭṭhadevatāpīti yāva brahmalokā sabbepi puthujjanā dve pakkhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:265_23: Cātumahārājikaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva akaniṭṭhabhāvanā pana ekaninnādaṃ kolāhalaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:266_0: Atheko aññataro bhikkhu tathāgatamupasaṅkamitvā ukkhepakānaṃ vinayadharaantevāsikānaṃ “dhammikenevāyaṃ vinayakammena ukkhitto”ti laddhiñca,
atk-s0502a:266_1: ukkhittānuvattakānaṃ dhammakathikaantevāsikānaṃ pana “adhammikeneva kammena ukkhitto”ti laddhiñca,
atk-s0502a:266_2: ukkhepakehi vāriyamānānampi ca tesaṃ taṃ anuparivāretvā vicaraṇabhāvañca ārocesi bhagavā “samaggā kira hontū”ti dve vāre pesetvā “na icchanti, bhante,
atk-s0502a:266_4: bhinno bhikkhusaṅgho”ti tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā ukkhepakānaṃ ukkhepane,
atk-s0502a:266_5: itaresañca āpattiyā adassane ādīnavaṃ kathetvā puna tesaṃ tattheva ekasīmāyaṃ uposathādīni anujānitvā
atk-s0502a:266_6: bhattaggādīsu bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ “āsanantarikāya nisīditabba”nti bhattagge vattaṃ paññāpetvā “idānipi bhaṇḍanajātāva
atk-s0502a:266_12: Kalahaṃ nissāya hi laṭukikāpi sakuṇikā hatthināgaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesī”ti laṭukikajātakaṃ kathetvā,
atk-s0502a:266_16: Vivādaṃ nissāya hi anekasatasahassā vaṭṭakāpi jīvitakkhayaṃ pattā”ti vaṭṭakajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:266_17: Evampi tesu bhagavato vacanaṃ anādiyantesu aññatarena dhammavādinā tathāgatassa vihesaṃ anicchantena “āgametu,
atk-s0502a:266_23: mayameva tena bhaṇḍanena kalahena viggahena vivādena paññāyissāmā”ti vutte atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:267_3: Brahmadattena dīghītissa kosalarañño rajjaṃ acchinditvā aññātakavesena vasantassa pituno māritabhāvañceva
atk-s0502a:267_4: dīghāvukumārena attano jīvite dinne tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ samaggabhāvañca kathetvā “tesañhi nāma,
atk-s0502a:267_6: rājūnaṃ ādinnadaṇḍānaṃ ādinnasatthānaṃ evarūpaṃ khantisoraccaṃ bhavissati.
atk-s0502a:267_9: yaṃ tumhe evaṃ svākhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitā samānā khamā ca bhaveyyātha soratā cā”ti ovaditvāpi neva te samagge kātuṃ asakkhi.
atk-s0502a:267_10: So tāya ākiṇṇavihāratāya ukkaṇṭhito “ahaṃ kho idāni ākiṇṇo dukkhaṃ viharāmi,
atk-s0502a:267_11: ime ca bhikkhū mama vacanaṃ na karonti.
atk-s0502a:267_12: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ ekakova gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho vihareyya”nti cintetvā kosambiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā anapaloketvā
atk-s0502a:267_13: bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ekakova attano pattacīvaramādāya bālakaloṇakagāmaṃ gantvā tattha bhaguttherassa ekacārikavattaṃ
atk-s0502a:267_14: kathetvā pācinavaṃsamigadāye tiṇṇaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sāmaggiyānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā yena pālileyyakaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:267_16: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā pālileyyakaṃ upanissāya rakkhitavanasaṇḍe bhaddasālamūle pālileyyakena hatthinā upaṭṭhiyamāno phāsukaṃ vassāvāsaṃ vasi.
atk-s0502a:268_0: Kosambivāsinopi kho upāsakā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ apassantā “kuhiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:268_4: mayaṃ pana na samaggā ahumhā”ti. “Kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:268_5: tumhe satthu santike pabbajitvā tasmiṃ sāmaggiṃ karonte samaggā nāhuvatthā”ti?
atk-s0502a:268_7: “Manussā ime satthu santike pabbajitvā tasmiṃ sāmaggiṃ karontepi samaggā na jātā,
atk-s0502a:268_8: mayaṃ ime nissāya satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhimhā,
atk-s0502a:268_10: na abhivādanādīni karissāmā”ti tato paṭṭhāya tesaṃ sāmīcimattampi na kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:268_11: Te appāhāratāya sussamānā katipāheneva ujukā hutvā aññamaññaṃ accayaṃ desetvā khamāpetvā “upāsakā mayaṃ samaggā jātā,
atk-s0502a:268_17: satthu khamāpitakāle mayampi tumhākaṃ purimasadisā bhavissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:268_18: Te antovassabhāvena satthu santikaṃ gantuṃ avisahantā dukkhena taṃ antovassaṃ vītināmesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:268_19: Satthā pana tena hatthinā upaṭṭhiyamāno sukhaṃ vasi.
atk-s0502a:268_20: Sopi hi hatthināgo gaṇaṃ pahāya phāsuvihāratthāyeva taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:269_1: “ahaṃ kho ākiṇṇo viharāmi hatthīhi hatthīnīhi hatthikalabhehi hatthicchāpehi,
atk-s0502a:269_5: ogāhā cassa me uttiṇṇassa hatthiniyo kāyaṃ upanighaṃsantiyo gacchanti,
atk-s0502a:269_7: Atha kho so hatthināgo yūthā apakkamma yena pālileyyakaṃ rakkhitavanasaṇḍaṃ bhaddasālamūlaṃ,
atk-s0502a:269_9: upasaṅkamitvā pana bhagavantaṃ vanditvā olokento aññaṃ kiñci adisvā bhaddasālamūlaṃ pādeneva paharanto tacchetvā soṇḍāya sākhaṃ gahetvā sammajji.
atk-s0502a:269_10: Tato paṭṭhāya soṇḍāya ghaṭaṃ gahetvā pānīyaṃ paribhojanīyaṃ upaṭṭhāpeti,
atk-s0502a:269_11: uṇhodakena atthe sati uṇhodakaṃ paṭiyādeti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0502a:269_13: tattha dārūni pakkhipanto aggiṃ jāletvā tattha pāsāṇe pakkhipitvā pacitvā dārudaṇḍakena pavaṭṭetvā paricchinnāya khuddakasoṇḍikāya khipati,
atk-s0502a:269_14: tato hatthaṃ otāretvā udakassa tattabhāvaṃ jānitvā gantvā satthāraṃ vandati.
atk-s0502a:269_15: Satthā “udakaṃ te tāpitaṃ pālileyyakā”ti vatvā tattha gantvā nhāyati.
atk-s0502a:269_17: Yadā pana satthā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
atk-s0502a:269_18: tadā satthu pattacīvaramādāya kumbhe patiṭṭhapetvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva gacchati.
atk-s0502a:269_19: Satthā gāmūpacāraṃ patvā “pālileyyaka ito paṭṭhāya tayā gantuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0502a:269_20: āhāra me pattacīvara”nti āharāpetvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:269_21: Sopi yāva satthu nikkhamanā tattheva ṭhatvā āgamanakāle paccuggamanaṃ katvā purimanayeneva pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0502a:269_22: gahetvā vasanaṭṭhāne otāretvā vattaṃ dassetvā sākhāya bījati,
atk-s0502a:269_23: rattiṃ vāḷamigaparipanthanivāraṇatthaṃ mahantaṃ daṇḍaṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā “satthāraṃ rakkhissāmī”ti yāva
atk-s0502a:269_25: tato paṭṭhāyayeva kira so vanasaṇḍo pālileyyakarakkhitavanasaṇḍo nāma jāto.
atk-s0502a:269_26: Aruṇe uggate mukhodakadānaṃ ādiṃ katvā tenevūpāyena sabbavattāni karoti.
atk-s0502a:270_0: Atheko makkaṭo taṃ hatthiṃ uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya divase divase tathāgatassa ābhisamācārikaṃ karontaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:270_1: “ahampi kiñcideva karissāmī”ti vicaranto ekadivasaṃ nimmakkhikaṃ daṇḍakamadhuṃ disvā daṇḍakaṃ bhañjitvā
atk-s0502a:270_2: daṇḍakeneva saddhiṃ madhupaṭalaṃ satthu santikaṃ āharitvā kadalipattaṃ chinditvā tattha ṭhapetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:270_4: Makkaṭo “karissati nu kho paribhogaṃ na karissatī”ti olokento gahetvā nisinnaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho”ti cintetvā
atk-s0502a:270_5: daṇḍakoṭiyaṃ gahetvā parivattetvā upadhārento aṇḍakāni disvā tāni saṇikaṃ apanetvā puna adāsi.
atk-s0502a:270_7: So tuṭṭhamānaso taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ gahetvā naccantova aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:270_9: So ekasmiṃ khāṇumatthake patitvā niviṭṭhagatto satthari pasanneneva cittena kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane tiṃsayojanike kanakavimāne nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:271_0: Tathāgatassa tattha hatthināgena upaṭṭhiyamānassa vasanabhāvo sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:271_1: Sāvatthinagarato “anāthapiṇḍiko visākhā ca mahāupāsikā”tievamādīni mahākulāni ānandattherassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “satthāraṃ no, bhante,
atk-s0502a:271_3: Disāvāsinopi pañcasatā bhikkhū vuṭṭhavassā ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “cirassutā no,
atk-s0502a:271_8: labheyyāma bhagavato sammukhā dhammiṃ kathaṃ savanāyā”ti yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:271_9: Thero te bhikkhū ādāya tattha gantvā “temāsaṃ ekavihārino tathāgatassa santikaṃ ettakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:271_10: upasaṅkamituṃ ayutta”nti cintetvā te bhikkhū bahi ṭhapetvā ekakova satthāraṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0502a:271_15: So tattheva daṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ āpucchi.
atk-s0502a:271_18: satthu nisīdanapāsāṇaphalake attano parikkhāraṃ na ṭhapessatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:271_20: Vattasampannā hi garūnaṃ āsane vā sayane vā attano parikkhāraṃ na ṭhapenti.
atk-s0502a:272_0: Thero satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:272_2: ekova āgatosī”ti pucchitvā pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “kahaṃ panete”ti vatvā “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0502a:272_3: cittaṃ ajānanto bahi ṭhapetvā āgatomhī”ti vutte “pakkosāhi ne”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:272_5: Te bhikkhū āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:272_6: Satthā tehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā tehi bhikkhūhi,
atk-s0502a:272_9: tumhehi temāsaṃ ekakehi tiṭṭhantehi nisīdantehi ca dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:272_13: Evarūpañhi sahāyaṃ labhantena ekatova vasituṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:272_14: alabhantassa ekacārikabhāvova seyyo”ti vatvā imā nāgavagge tisso gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:283_0: Eko care na ca pāpāni kayirā,
atk-s0502a:285_0: Gāthāpariyosāne pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:285_2: anāthapiṇḍikappamukhā te pañca ariyasāvakakoṭiyo tumhākaṃ āgamanaṃ paccāsīsantī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:285_3: Satthā “tena hi gaṇhāhi pattacīvara”nti pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:285_13: Hatthīpi vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā panasakadaliphalādīni nānāphalāni saṃharitvā rāsiṃ katvā punadivase bhikkhūnaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:285_16: Nāgo bhikkhūnaṃ antarantarena gantvā satthu purato tiriyaṃ aṭṭhāsi.

atk-s0502a:285_24: Taṃ sutvā nāgo mukhe soṇḍaṃ pakkhipitvā rodanto pacchato pacchato agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:285_25: So hi satthāraṃ nivattetuṃ labhanto teneva niyāmena yāvajīvaṃ paṭijaggeyya,

atk-s0502a:285_29: So rodamāno tattheva ṭhatvā satthari cakkhupathaṃ vijahante hadayena phalitena kālaṃ katvā satthari pasādena
atk-s0502a:286_1: Kosambakā bhikkhū “satthā kira sāvatthiṃ āgato”ti sutvā satthāraṃ khamāpetuṃ tattha agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:286_2: Kosalarājā “te kira kosambakā bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū āgacchantī”ti sutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:286_3: tesaṃ mama vijitaṃ pavisituṃ na dassāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:286_6: kevalaṃ aññamaññaṃ vivādena mama vacanaṃ na gaṇhiṃsu,

atk-s0502a:286_11: Sāvatthiyaṃ anuppattānaṃ pana tesaṃ bhagavā ekamante vivittaṃ kārāpetvā senāsanaṃ dāpesi.

atk-s0502a:286_24: pacchā dvīsu raṭṭhesu rajjaṃ kārayiṃsū”ti vatvā punadeva kosambikajātakaṃ kathetvā “evaṃ,
atk-s0502a:286_26: dīghāvukumāro mātāpitūsu jīvitā voropiyamānesupi tesaṃ ovādaṃ anatikkamitvā pacchā brahmadattassa dhītaraṃ
atk-s0502a:286_28: tumhehi pana mama vacanaṃ akarontehi bhāriyaṃ kata”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:289_0: Ye ca tattha vijānanti, tato sammanti medhagā”ti.
atk-s0502a:290_0: Tattha pareti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe bhaṇḍanakārakā pare nāma.
atk-s0502a:290_1: Te tattha saṅghamajjhe kolāhalaṃ karontā “mayaṃ yamāmase uparamāma vinassāma satataṃ samitaṃ maccusantikaṃ gacchāmā”ti na vijānanti.
atk-s0502a:290_2: Ye ca tattha vijānantīti ye tattha paṇḍitā “mayaṃ maccusantikaṃ gacchāmā”ti vijānanti.
atk-s0502a:290_3: Tato sammanti medhagāti evañhi te jānantā yonisomanasikāraṃ uppādetvā medhagānaṃ kalahānaṃ vūpasamāya paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0502a:290_4: Atha nesaṃ tāya paṭipattiyā te medhagā sammantīti.
atk-s0502a:290_5: Atha vā pare cāti pubbe mayā “mā,
atk-s0502a:290_7: bhaṇḍana”ntiādīni vatvā ovadiyamānāpi mama ovādassa apaṭiggahaṇena atikkamanena amāmakā pare nāma.
atk-s0502a:290_8: “Mayaṃ chandādivasena micchāgāhaṃ gahetvā ettha saṅghamajjhe yamāmase bhaṇḍanādīnaṃ vuddhiyā vāyamāmā”ti na vijānanti.
atk-s0502a:290_9: Idāni pana yoniso paccavekkhamānā tattha tumhākaṃ antare ye ca paṇḍitapurisā “pubbe mayaṃ chandādivasena vāyamantā ayoniso paṭipannā”ti vijānanti,
atk-s0502a:290_10: tato tesaṃ santikā te paṇḍitapurise nissāya ime dāni kalahasaṅkhātā medhagā sammantīti ayamettha atthoti.
atk-s0502a:294_0: Subhānupassinti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā setabyanagaraṃ upanissāya siṃsapāvane viharanto cūḷakāḷamahākāḷe ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:295_3: Tesu jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhā disāsu vicaritvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi bhaṇḍaṃ āharanti,

atk-s0502a:295_9: ahaṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ gacchāmī”ti vatvā gantvā tathāgataṃ vanditvā parisapariyante nisīdi.

atk-s0502a:295_23: So taṃ nānappakārehi yācitvā nivattetuṃ asakkonto “sādhu, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:295_27: Aparabhāge mahākāḷo upasampadaṃ labhitvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā sāsane dhurāni pucchitvā satthārā dvīsu dhuresu kathitesu “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:295_28: mahallakakāle pabbajitattā ganthadhuraṃ pūretuṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0502a:295_29: vipassanādhuraṃ pana pūressāmī”ti yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā sosānikadhutaṅgaṃ samādāya paṭhamayāmātikkante
atk-s0502a:295_30: sabbesu niddaṃ okkantesu susānaṃ gantvā paccūsakāle sabbesu anuṭṭhitesuyeva vihāraṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0502a:296_0: Athekā susānagopikā kālī nāma chavaḍāhikā therassa ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ caṅkamitaṭṭhānañca disvā “ko nu kho idhāgacchati,
atk-s0502a:296_1: pariggaṇhissāmi na”nti pariggaṇhituṃ asakkontī ekadivasaṃ susānakuṭikāyameva dīpaṃ jāletvā puttadhītaro
atk-s0502a:296_2: ādāya gantvā ekamante nilīyamānā majjhimayāme theraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā gantvā vanditvā, “ayyo, no, bhante,
atk-s0502a:296_5: susāne viharantehi nāma vattaṃ uggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:296_6: Thero “kiṃ pana mayaṃ tayā kathitavatte vattissāmā”ti avatvā “kiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati upāsike”ti āha. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:296_7: sosānikehi nāma susāne vasanabhāvo susānagopakānañca vihāre mahātherassa ca gāmabhojakassa ca kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:296_9: “Katakammā corā dhanasāmikehi padānupadaṃ anubaddhā susāne bhaṇḍakaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyanti,
atk-s0502a:296_11: etesaṃ pana kathite ‘mayaṃ imassa bhaddantassa ettakaṃ nāma kālaṃ ettha vasanabhāvaṃ jānāma,
atk-s0502a:297_1: susāne vasantena nāma ayyena macchamaṃsatilapiṭṭhatelaguḷādīni vajjetabbāni,
atk-s0502a:297_7: paccūsakāle sabbesu anuṭṭhitesuyeva vihāraṃ gantabbaṃ. Sace, bhante,
atk-s0502a:297_8: ayyo imasmiṃ ṭhāne evaṃ viharanto pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0502a:297_10: ahaṃ kambalakūṭāgāraṃ āropetvā gandhamālādīhi sakkāraṃ katvā sarīrakiccaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0502a:297_12: citakaṃ āropetvā aggiṃ jāletvā saṅkunā ākaḍḍhitvā bahi khipitvā pharasunā koṭṭetvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinditvā aggimhi pakkhipitvā jhāpessāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:297_14: ekaṃ pana rūpārammaṇaṃ disvā mayhaṃ katheyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:297_17: Cūḷakāḷatthero pana uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya gharāvāsaṃ cinteti,
atk-s0502a:298_0: Athekā kuladhītā taṃmuhuttasamuṭṭhitena byādhinā sāyanhasamaye amilātā akilantā kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:298_1: Tamenaṃ ñātakādayo dārutelādīhi saddhiṃ sāyaṃ susānaṃ netvā susānagopikāya “imaṃ jhāpehī”ti bhatiṃ datvā niyyādetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:298_2: Sā tassā pārutavatthaṃ apanetvā taṃmuhuttamataṃ pīṇitapīṇitaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:298_3: “imaṃ ayyassa dassetuṃ patirūpaṃ ārammaṇa”nti cintetvā gantvā theraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:298_6: Thero “sādhū”ti vatvā pārupanaṃ nīharāpetvā pādatalato yāva kesaggā oloketvā “atipīṇitametaṃ rūpaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:298_7: aggimhi naṃ pakkhipitvā mahājālāhi gahitamattakāle mayhaṃ āroceyyāsī”ti vatvā sakaṭṭhānameva gantvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:298_10: Jālāya pahaṭapahaṭaṭṭhānaṃ kabaragāviyā viya sarīravaṇṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0502a:298_14: Thero “idaṃ sarīraṃ idāneva olokentānaṃ apariyantakaraṃ hutvā idāneva khayaṃ pattaṃ vayaṃ patta”nti rattiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:301_0: Gāthaṃ vatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:302_0: Tasmiṃ arahattaṃ patte satthā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto cārikaṃ caramāno setabyaṃ gantvā siṃsapāvanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:302_1: Cūḷakāḷassa bhariyāyo “satthā kira anuppatto siṃsapāvana”nti sutvā “amhākaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti pesetvā satthāraṃ nimantāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:302_2: Buddhānaṃ pana apariciṇṇaṭṭhāne āsanapaññattiṃ ācikkhantena ekena bhikkhunā paṭhamataraṃ gantuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0502a:302_3: Buddhānañhi majjhimaṭṭhāne āsanaṃ paññāpetvā tassa dakkhiṇato sāriputtattherassa,
atk-s0502a:302_5: tato paṭṭhāya ubhosu passesu bhikkhusaṅghassa āsanaṃ paññāpetabbaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a:302_8: tvaṃ purato gantvā āsanapaññattiṃ ācikkhā”ti cūḷakāḷaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a:302_9: Tassa diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya gehajanā tena saddhiṃ parihāsaṃ karontā nīcāsanāni saṅghattherassa koṭiyaṃ attharanti,
atk-s0502a:302_15: Itthiyo tassa vacanaṃ asuṇantiyo viya “tvaṃ kiṃ karonto vicarasi,
atk-s0502a:302_16: kiṃ tava āsanāni paññāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:302_19: kasmā idhāgatosī”ti vatvā nivāsanapārupanaṃ acchinditvā setakāni nivāsetvā sīse ca mālācumbuṭakaṃ ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0502a:302_22: Na ciraṃ bhikkhubhāve ṭhatvā avassikova uppabbajitattā lajjituṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0502a:302_23: tasmā so tena ākappena nirāsaṅkova gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādāya āgato.
atk-s0502a:302_24: Bhikkhusaṅghassa pana bhattakiccāvasāne mahākāḷassa bhariyāyo “imāhi attano sāmiko gahito,
atk-s0502a:302_25: mayampi amhākaṃ sāmikaṃ gaṇhissāmā”ti cintetvā punadivase satthāraṃ nimantayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:302_26: Tadā pana āsanapaññāpanatthaṃ añño bhikkhu agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:302_27: Tā tasmiṃ khaṇe okāsaṃ alabhitvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:302_38: Gāmadvāraṃ patvā bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu “kiṃ nāmetaṃ satthārā kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:302_41: Hiyyo cūḷakāḷassa purato gatattā pabbajjantarāyo jāto,
atk-s0502a:302_42: ajja aññassa purato gatattā antarāyo nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:302_46: Satthā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā nivattitvā ṭhito “kiṃ kathetha,
atk-s0502a:302_61: Mayhaṃ pana putto mahākāḷo asubhānupassī viharati,
atk-s0502a:302_62: ghanaselapabbato viya acalo”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:306_0: Taṃ ve pasahati māro, vāto rukkhaṃva dubbalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:310_0: Taṃ ve nappasahatī māro, vāto selaṃva pabbata”nti.
atk-s0502a:311_2: Yo hi puggalo nimittaggāhaṃ anubyañjanaggāhaṃ gaṇhanto “nakhā sobhanā”ti gaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a:311_4: “hatthapādā, jaṅghā, ūru, kaṭi, udaraṃ, thanā, gīvā, oṭṭhā, dantā, mukhaṃ, nāsā, akkhīni, kaṇṇā, bhamukā, nalāṭaṃ, kesā,
atk-s0502a:311_5: sobhanā”ti gaṇhāti, “kesā, lomā, nakhā, dantā, taco,
atk-s0502a:311_13: Pariyesanamattā paṭiggahaṇamattā paribhogamattāti imissā mattāya ajānanato bhojanamhi cāmattaññuṃ.
atk-s0502a:311_14: Apica paccavekkhaṇamattā vissajjanamattāti imissāpi mattāya ajānanato amattaññuṃ,
atk-s0502a:311_20: Vāto rukkhaṃva dubbalanti balavavāto chinnapapāte jātaṃ dubbalarukkhaṃ viya.
atk-s0502a:311_21: Yathā hi so vāto tassa dubbalarukkhassa pupphaphalapallavādīnipi pāteti,
atk-s0502a:311_24: samūlakampi taṃ rukkhaṃ uppāṭetvā uddhaṃmūlaṃ adhosākhaṃ katvā gacchati,
atk-s0502a:311_25: evameva evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ anto uppanno kilesamāro pasahati,
atk-s0502a:311_26: balavavāto dubbalarukkhassa pupphaphalapallavādipātanaṃ viya khuddānukhuddakāpattiāpajjanampi karoti,
atk-s0502a:311_30: mūlakaṃ heṭṭhāsākhaṃ katvā pātanaṃ viya pārājikāpattiāpajjanampi karoti,
atk-s0502a:311_31: svākkhātasāsanā nīharitvā katipāheneva gihibhāvaṃ pāpetīti evaṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ kilesamāro attano vase vattetīti attho.
atk-s0502a:312_0: Asubhānupassinti dasasu asubhesu aññataraṃ asubhaṃ passantaṃ paṭikūlamanasikāre yuttaṃ kese asubhato
atk-s0502a:312_1: passantaṃ lome nakhe dante tacaṃ vaṇṇaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ asubhato passantaṃ.
atk-s0502a:312_5: Saddhanti kammassa ceva phalassa ca saddahanalakkhaṇāya lokikāya saddhāya ceva tīsu vatthūsu aveccappasādasaṅkhātāya
atk-s0502a:312_8: Taṃ veti evarūpaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ yathā dubbalavāto saṇikaṃ paharanto ekagghanaṃ selaṃ cāletuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:312_10: khobhetuṃ vā cāletuṃ vā na sakkotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:313_0: Tāpi kho tassa purāṇadutiyikāyo theraṃ parivāretvā “tvaṃ kaṃ āpucchitvā pabbajito,
atk-s0502a:313_1: idāni gihī bhavissasi na bhavissasī”tiādīni vatvā kāsāvaṃ nīharitukāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:313_2: Thero tāsaṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā nisinnāsanā vuṭṭhāya iddhiyā uppattitvā kūṭāgārakaṇṇikaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā
atk-s0502a:313_3: ākāsenāgantvā satthari gāthā pariyosāpenteyeva satthu suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ abhitthavanto ākāsato otaritvā
atk-s0502a:317_0: Anikkasāvoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto rājagahe devadattassa kāsāvalābhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:318_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye dve aggasāvakā pañcasate pañcasate attano attano parivāre ādāya satthāraṃ āpucchitvā vanditvā jetavanato rājagahaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:318_1: Rājagahavāsino dvepi tayopi bahūpi ekato hutvā āgantukadānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:318_2: Athekadivasaṃ āyasmā sāriputto anumodanaṃ karonto “upāsakā eko sayaṃ dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a:318_12: so nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne kañjikamattampi kucchipūraṃ na labhati,
atk-s0502a:318_16: so nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne attabhāvasatepi attabhāvasahassepi attabhāvasatasahassepi bhogasampadañceva
atk-s0502a:319_0: Tameko paṇḍitapuriso dhammaṃ sutvā “acchariyā vata bho,
atk-s0502a:319_3: mayā imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ sampattīnaṃ nipphādakaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:319_4: sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti theraṃ nimantesi.
atk-s0502a:319_14: tumhe kittakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhaṃ dātuṃ sakkhissatha,
atk-s0502a:319_20: “tena hi ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samāgamaṃ katvā ekatova parivisissāma,
atk-s0502a:319_21: sabbe tilataṇḍulasappimadhuphāṇitādīni samāharathā”ti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samāharāpesi.
atk-s0502a:320_0: Athassa eko kuṭumbiko satasahassagghanikaṃ gandhakāsāvavatthaṃ datvā –
atk-s0502a:320_10: kāsāvaṃ ekena kuṭumbikena evaṃ nāma vatvā dinnaṃ atirekaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0502a:320_14: devadatto amhākaṃ maṅgalāmaṅgalesu sahāyo udakamaṇiko viya niccaṃ patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0502a:320_16: Sambahulikāya kathāyapi “devadattassa dātabba”nti vattāro bahutarā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:320_18: So taṃ chinditvā sibbitvā rajitvā nivāsetvā pārupitvā vicarati.
atk-s0502a:320_21: Devadatto attano ananucchavikaṃ nivāsetvā pārupitvā vicaratī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:320_22: Atheko disāvāsiko bhikkhu rājagahā sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro satthārā dvinnaṃ
atk-s0502a:320_23: aggasāvakānaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchito ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:320_24: Satthā “na kho bhikkhu idāneveso attano ananucchavikaṃ vatthaṃ dhāreti,
atk-s0502a:321_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasivāsī eko hatthimārako hatthiṃ māretvā māretvā dante
atk-s0502a:321_1: ca nakhe ca antāni ca ghanamaṃsañca āharitvā vikkiṇanto jīvitaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0502a:321_2: Athekasmiṃ araññe anekasahassā hatthino gocaraṃ gahetvā gacchantā paccekabuddhe disvā tato paṭṭhāya gacchamānā
atk-s0502a:321_7: kiṃ nu kho disvā vandantī”ti cintento –
atk-s0502a:321_9: “mayāpi idāni kāsāvaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ekassa paccekabuddhassa jātassaraṃ oruyha nhāyantassa
atk-s0502a:321_10: tīre ṭhapitesu kāsāvesu cīvaraṃ thenetvā tesaṃ hatthīnaṃ gamanāgamanamagge sattiṃ gahetvā sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nisīdati.
atk-s0502a:321_13: So tesaṃ sabbapacchato gacchantaṃ sattiyā paharitvā māretvā dantādīni gahetvā sesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇitvā gacchati.
atk-s0502a:321_14: Aparabhāge bodhisatto hatthiyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā hatthijeṭṭhako yūthapati ahosi.
atk-s0502a:321_23: “ekasmiṃ ṭhāne kāsāvaṃ pārupitvā nisinnassa santikā paripanthena bhavitabba”nti parisaṅkitvā,
atk-s0502a:321_24: “taṃ pariggaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sabbe hatthī purato pesetvā sayaṃ pacchato vilambamāno āgacchati.
atk-s0502a:321_25: So sesahatthīsu vanditvā gatesu mahāpurisaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā cīvaraṃ saṃharitvā sattiṃ vissajji.
atk-s0502a:321_26: Mahāpuriso satiṃ uppaṭṭhapetvā āgacchanto pacchato paṭikkamitvā sattiṃ vivajjesi.
atk-s0502a:321_27: Atha naṃ “iminā ime hatthī nāsitā”ti gaṇhituṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:321_28: Itaro ekaṃ rukkhaṃ purato katvā nilīyi.
atk-s0502a:321_29: Atha “naṃ rukkhena saddhiṃ soṇḍāya parikkhipitvā gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ pothessāmī”ti tena nīharitvā dassitaṃ kāsāvaṃ disvā –
atk-s0502a:321_31: anekasahassesu me buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavesu lajjā nāma bhinnā bhavissatī”ti adhivāsetvā –
atk-s0502a:321_32: “tayā me ettakā ñātakā nāsitā”ti pucchi. “Āma, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:321_34: attano ananucchavikaṃ vītarāgānaṃ anucchavikaṃ vatthaṃ paridahitvā evarūpaṃ kammaṃ karontena bhāriyaṃ tayā kata”nti.
atk-s0502a:321_35: Evañca pana vatvā uttaripi naṃ niggaṇhanto “anikkasāvo kāsāvaṃ…pe…
atk-s0502a:322_2: tassa niggāhako hatthināgo ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānetvā, “na,
atk-s0502a:322_4: pubbepi devadatto attano ananucchavikaṃ vatthaṃ dhāresiyevā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:330_3: Apeto damasaccenāti indriyadamena ceva paramatthasaccapakkhikena vacīsaccena ca apeto,
atk-s0502a:330_5: Na soti so evarūpo puggalo kāsāvaṃ paridahituṃ nārahati.
atk-s0502a:330_6: Vantakasāvassāti catūhi maggehi vantakasāvo chaḍḍitakasāvo pahīnakasāvo assa.
atk-s0502a:330_9: Upetoti indriyadamena ceva vuttappakārena ca saccena upagato.
atk-s0502a:330_10: Sa veti so evarūpo puggalo taṃ gandhakāsāvavatthaṃ arahatīti.
atk-s0502a:331_0: Gāthāpariyosāne so disāvāsiko bhikkhu sotāpanno ahosi,
atk-s0502a:334_0: Asāre sāramatinoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto aggasāvakehi niveditaṃ sañcayassa anāgamanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:335_1: amhākañhi satthā ito kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake amaravatiyā nāma nagare
atk-s0502a:335_2: sumedho nāma brāhmaṇakumāro hutvā sabbasippesu nipphattiṃ patvā mātāpitūnaṃ accayena anekakoṭisaṅkhyaṃ
atk-s0502a:335_3: dhanaṃ pariccajitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavante vasanto jhānābhiññā nibbattetvā ākāsena gacchanto
atk-s0502a:335_4: dīpaṅkaradasabalassa sudassanavihārato rammavatīnagaraṃ pavisanatthāya maggaṃ sodhayamānaṃ janaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:335_5: sayampi ekaṃ padesaṃ gahetvā maggaṃ sodheti.
atk-s0502a:335_6: Tasmiṃ asodhiteyeva āgatassa satthuno attānaṃ setuṃ katvā kalale ajinacammaṃ attharitvā “satthā sasāvakasaṅgho
atk-s0502a:335_7: kalalaṃ anakkamitvā maṃ akkamanto gacchatū”ti nipanno.
atk-s0502a:335_9: anāgate kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ pariyosāne gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākato.
atk-s0502a:335_10: Tassa satthuno aparabhāge “koṇḍañño maṅgalo sumano revato sobhito anomadassī padumo nārado padumuttaro
atk-s0502a:335_11: sumedho sujāto piyadassī atthadassī dhammadassī siddhattho tisso phusso vipassī sikhī vessabhū kakusandho
atk-s0502a:335_12: koṇāgamano kassapo”ti lokaṃ obhāsetvā uppannānaṃ imesampi tevīsatiyā buddhānaṃ santike laddhabyākaraṇo,
atk-s0502a:335_15: dasa paramatthapāramiyo”ti samattiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā vessantarattabhāve ṭhito pathavikampanāni mahādānāni
atk-s0502a:335_16: datvā puttadāraṃ pariccajitvā āyupariyosāne tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā dasa sahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi
atk-s0502a:341_0: Pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tato cuto sakyarājakule paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasamāsaccayena mātukucchito vijāyi.
atk-s0502a:341_1: Soḷasavassakāle tattha mahāsampattiyā parihariyamāno anukkamena bhadrayobbanaṃ patvā tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu
atk-s0502a:341_2: tīsu pāsādesu devalokasiriṃ viya rajjasiriṃ anubhavanto uyyānakīḷāya gamanasamaye anukkamena jiṇṇabyādhimatasaṅkhāte
atk-s0502a:341_3: tayo devadūte disvā sañjātasaṃvego nivattitvā catutthavāre pabbajitaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:341_4: “sādhu pabbajjā”ti pabbajjāya ruciṃ uppādetvā uyyānaṃ gantvā tattha divasaṃ khepetvā maṅgalapokkharaṇītīre
atk-s0502a:341_5: nisinno kappakavesaṃ gahetvā āgatena vissakammena devaputtena alaṅkatapaṭiyatto rāhulakumārassa jātasāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:341_8: tāvadeva naṃ chindissāmī”ti cintetvā sāyaṃ nagaraṃ pavisanto –
atk-s0502a:342_0: “Nibbutā nūna sā mātā, nibbuto nūna so pitā;
atk-s0502a:343_0: Nibbutā nūna sā nārī, yassāyaṃ īdiso patī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:344_0: Kisāgotamiyā nāma pitucchādhītāya bhāsitaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a:344_1: “ahaṃ imāya nibbutapadaṃ sāvito”ti muttāhāraṃ omuñcitvā tassā pesetvā attano bhavanaṃ pavisitvā sirisayane
atk-s0502a:344_2: nisinno niddopagatānaṃ nāṭakitthīnaṃ vippakāraṃ disvā nibbinnahadayo channaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā kaṇḍakaṃ āharāpetvā
atk-s0502a:344_3: taṃ āruyha channasahāyo dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi parivuto mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā anomānadītīre
atk-s0502a:344_4: pabbajitvā anukkamena rājagahaṃ gantvā tattha piṇḍāya caritvā paṇḍavapabbatapabbhāre nisinno magadharaññā
atk-s0502a:344_5: rajjena nimantiyamāno taṃ paṭikkhipitvā sabbaññutaṃ patvā attano vijitaṃ āgamanatthāya tena gahitapaṭiñño
atk-s0502a:344_6: āḷārañca udakañca upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ santike adhigatavisesaṃ analaṅkaritvā chabbassāni mahāpadhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:344_7: padahitvā visākhapuṇṇamadivase pātova sujātāya dinnapāyasaṃ paribhuñjitvā nerañjarāya nadiyā suvaṇṇapātiṃ
atk-s0502a:344_8: pavāhetvā nerañjarāya nadiyā tīre mahāvanasaṇḍe nānāsamāpattīhi divasabhāgaṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0502a:344_9: sottiyena dinnaṃ tiṇaṃ gahetvā kāḷena nāgarājena abhitthutaguṇo bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha tiṇāni santharitvā
atk-s0502a:344_11: yāva me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ na muccissatī”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā puratthābhimukho nisīditvā sūriye anatthaṅgamiteyeva
atk-s0502a:344_13: majjhimayāme cutūpapātañāṇaṃ patvā pacchimayāmāvasāne paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāretvā aruṇuggamane dasabalacatuvesārajjādisabbaguṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0502a:344_14: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhimaṇḍe vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe ajapālanigrodhamūle
atk-s0502a:344_16: sahampatibrahmunā āyācitadhammadesano buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ voloketvā brahmuno ajjhesanaṃ adhivāsetvā,
atk-s0502a:344_17: “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti olokento āḷārudakānaṃ kālakatabhāvaṃ ñatvā pañcavaggiyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:344_18: bhikkhūnaṃ bahūpakārataṃ anussaritvā uṭṭhāyāsanā kāsipuraṃ gacchanto antarāmagge upakena saddhiṃ mantetvā
atk-s0502a:344_19: āsāḷhipuṇṇamadivase isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā te ananucchavikena samudācārena
atk-s0502a:344_20: samudācarante saññāpetvā aññātakoṇḍaññappamukhe aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ pāyento dhammacakkaṃ
atk-s0502a:344_21: pavattetvā pavattitavaradhammacakko pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa sabbepi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā taṃ
atk-s0502a:344_22: divasameva yasakulaputtassa upanissayasampattiṃ disvā taṃ rattibhāge nibbinditvā gehaṃ pahāya nikkhantaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:344_23: “ehi yasā”ti pakkositvā tasmiṃyeva rattibhāge sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpetvā punadivase arahattaṃ pāpetvā aparepi
atk-s0502a:344_24: tassa sahāyake catupaṇṇāsa jane ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā arahattaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0502a:345_0: Evaṃ loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu jātesu vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā, “caratha,
atk-s0502a:345_2: cārika”nti saṭṭhi bhikkhū disāsu pesetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kappāsikavanasaṇḍe tiṃsa jane bhaddavaggiyakumāre vinesi.
atk-s0502a:345_3: Tesu sabbapacchimako sotāpanno sabbuttamo anāgāmī ahosi.
atk-s0502a:345_4: Te sabbepi ehibhikkhubhāveneva pabbājetvā disāsu pesetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gantvā aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni
atk-s0502a:345_5: dassetvā uruvelakassapādayo sahassajaṭilaparivāre tebhātikajaṭile vinetvā ehibhikkhubhāveneva pabbājetvā
atk-s0502a:345_6: gayāsīse nisīdāpetvā ādittapariyāyadesanāya arahatte patiṭṭhāpetvā tena arahantasahassena parivuto “bimbisārarañño
atk-s0502a:345_7: dinnaṃ paṭiññaṃ mocessāmī”ti rājagahanagarūpacāre laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0502a:345_8: “satthā kira āgato”ti sutvā dvādasanahutehi brāhmaṇagahapatikehi saddhiṃ āgatassa rañño madhuradhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:345_9: kathento rājānaṃ ekādasahi nahutehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā ekanahutaṃ saraṇesu patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:345_10: punadivase sakkena devarājena māṇavakavaṇṇaṃ gahetvā abhitthutaguṇo rājagahanagaraṃ pavisitvā rājanivesane
atk-s0502a:345_11: katabhattakicco veḷuvanārāmaṃ paṭiggahetvā tattheva vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a:346_1: anuppanneyeva hi buddhe rājagahato avidūre upatissagāmo kolitagāmoti dve brāhmaṇagāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:346_2: Tesu upatissagāme sāriyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā gabbhassa patiṭṭhitadivaseyeva kolitagāme moggaliyā nāma brāhmaṇiyāpi gabbho patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:346_3: Tāni kira dvepi kulāni yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā ābaddhapaṭibaddhasahāyakāneva ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:346_6: Nāmaggahaṇadivase sāriyā brāhmaṇiyā puttassa upatissagāmake jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā upatissoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu,
atk-s0502a:346_7: itarassa kolitagāme jeṭṭhakulassa puttattā kolitoti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:346_8: Te ubhopi vuḍḍhimanvāya sabbasippānaṃ pāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:346_9: Upatissamāṇavassa kīḷanatthāya nadiṃ vā uyyānaṃ vā gamanakāle pañca suvaṇṇasivikasatāni parivārāni honti,
atk-s0502a:346_12: Rājagahe ca anusaṃvaccharaṃ giraggasamajjo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a:346_14: Dvepi ekato nisīditvā samajjaṃ passantā hasitabbaṭṭhāne hasanti,
atk-s0502a:346_17: Tesaṃ imināva niyāmena ekadivasaṃ samajjaṃ passantānaṃ paripākagatattā ñāṇassa purimadivasesu viya hasitabbaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:346_18: hāso vā saṃvegaṭṭhāne saṃvego vā dātuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne dānaṃ vā nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:346_22: amhehi pana ekaṃ mokkhadhammaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:346_25: na tvaṃ aññesu divasesu viya haṭṭhapahaṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:346_31: attano mokkhadhammaṃ gavesituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti idaṃ cintayanto nisinnomhi.
atk-s0502a:346_34: Athassa attanā saddhiṃ ekajjhāsayataṃ ñatvā upatisso āha –
atk-s0502a:346_36: mokkhadhammaṃ pana gavesantehi ekā pabbajjā laddhuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0502a:347_0: Tena kho pana samayena sañcayo nāma paribbājako rājagahe paṭivasati mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya saddhiṃ.
atk-s0502a:347_1: Te “tassa santike pabbajissāmā”ti pañcamāṇavakasatāni “sivikāyo ca rathe ca gahetvā gacchathā”ti uyyojetvā
atk-s0502a:347_2: ekāya sivikāya ekena rathena gantvā sañcayassa santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:347_3: Tesaṃ pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sañcayo atirekalābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi.
atk-s0502a:347_4: Te katipāheneva sabbaṃ sañcayassa samayaṃ parimadditvā, “ācariya,
atk-s0502a:347_10: so imassa santike uppādetuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0502a:347_12: gāmanigamarājadhāniyo carantā addhā mokkhadhammadesakaṃ kañci ācariyaṃ labhissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:347_16: Tehi puṭṭhaṃ pañhaṃ aññe kathetuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:347_18: Evaṃ sakalajambudīpaṃ pariggaṇhitvā nivattitvā sakaṭṭhānameva āgantvā,
atk-s0502a:348_0: Evaṃ tesu katikaṃ katvā viharantesu satthā vuttānukkamena rājagahaṃ patvā veḷuvanaṃ paṭiggahetvā veḷuvane viharati.
atk-s0502a:348_3: cārikaṃ bahujanahitāyā”ti ratanattayaguṇapakāsanatthaṃ uyyojitānaṃ ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantānaṃ antare pañcavaggiyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:348_5: punadivase pātova pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:348_6: Tasmiṃ samaye upatissaparibbājakopi pātova bhattakiccaṃ katvā paribbājakārāmaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a:348_8: ye loke arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā,
atk-s0502a:348_18: yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ bhikkhuṃ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandheyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:348_20: So theraṃ laddhapiṇḍapātaṃ aññataraṃ okāsaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā nisīditukāmatañcassa ñatvā attano paribbājakapīṭhakaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi,
atk-s0502a:348_21: so bhattakiccapariyosānepissa attano kuṇḍikāya udakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:349_0: Evaṃ ācariyavattaṃ katvā katabhattakiccena therena saddhiṃ madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ katvā evamāha –
atk-s0502a:349_7: kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:349_15: na tāvāhaṃ sakkhissāmi vitthārena dhammaṃ desetu”nti.
atk-s0502a:349_18: tvaṃ yathāsattiyā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā vada,
atk-s0502a:349_19: etaṃ nayasatena nayasahassena paṭivijjhituṃ mayhaṃ bhāro”ti cintetvā āha –
atk-s0502a:350_0: “Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā bhāsassu, atthaṃyeva me brūhi;
atk-s0502a:351_0: Attheneva me attho, kiṃ kāhasi byañjanaṃ bahu”nti. ;
atk-s0502a:352_2: Paribbājako paṭhamapadadvayameva sutvā sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍite sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi,
atk-s0502a:352_4: So sotāpanno hutvā uparivisese appavattante “bhavissati ettha kāraṇa”nti sallakkhetvā theraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:352_11: amhehi ca aññamaññaṃ katikā katā ‘amhesu yo amataṃ paṭhamaṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0502a:352_13: Ahaṃ taṃ paṭiññaṃ mocetvā sahāyakaṃ gahetvā tumhākaṃ gatamaggeneva satthu santikaṃ āgamissāmīti pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0502a:352_14: therassa pādesu nipatitvā tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā theraṃ uyyojetvā paribbājakārāmābhimukho agamāsi”.
atk-s0502a:353_0: Atha kho kolitaparibbājako taṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:353_1: “ajja mayhaṃ sahāyakassa mukhavaṇṇo na aññadivasesu viya,
atk-s0502a:353_2: addhā tena amataṃ adhigataṃ bhavissatī”ti amatādhigamaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:353_4: amataṃ adhigata”nti paṭijānitvā tameva gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0502a:353_9: evaṃ no ācariyena assajittherena kathita”nti. “Tena hi, samma, āyāma,
atk-s0502a:353_13: amhehi adhigataṃ amataṃ amhākaṃ ācariyassa sañcayaparibbājakassāpi kathessāma,
atk-s0502a:353_18: Tato dvepi janā sañcayassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:354_1: koci vo amatamaggadesako laddho”ti pucchi. “Āma, ācariya, laddho,
atk-s0502a:354_12: vicarantassa me antevāsikavāso cāṭiyā udañcanabhāvappatti viya hoti,
atk-s0502a:354_18: loke buddhassa uppannakālato paṭṭhāya mahājano gandhamālādihattho gantvā tameva pūjessati,
atk-s0502a:354_21: kiṃ nu kho imasmiṃ loke dandhā bahū,
atk-s0502a:354_23: paṇḍitā ca nāma katipayā eva hontī”ti. “Tena hi, tātā,
atk-s0502a:354_24: paṇḍitā paṇḍitassa samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gamissanti,
atk-s0502a:354_32: So tucchaṃ ārāmaṃ disvā uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0502a:354_33: Tehipi saddhiṃ gacchantesu pañcasu paribbājakasatesu sañcayassa aḍḍhateyyasatāni nivattiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:354_34: atha kho te attano antevāsikehi aḍḍhateyyehi paribbājakasatehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:355_0: Satthā catuparisamajjhe nisinno dhammaṃ desento te dūratova disvā bhikkhū āmantesi – “ete,
atk-s0502a:355_2: dve sahāyakā āgacchanti kolito ca upatisso ca,
atk-s0502a:355_3: etaṃ me sāvakayugaṃ bhavissati aggaṃ bhaddayuga”nti.
atk-s0502a:356_0: Atha nesaṃ parisāya caritavasena satthā dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0502a:356_1: Ṭhapetvā dve aggasāvake avasesā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:356_5: Athāyasmā mahāmoggallāno pabbajitadivasato sattame divase magadharaṭṭhe kallavālagāmakaṃ upanissāya viharanto
atk-s0502a:356_6: thinamiddhe okkamante satthārā saṃvejito thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā tathāgatena dinnaṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:356_7: suṇantova uparimaggattayakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto.
atk-s0502a:356_8: Sāriputtattheropi pabbajitadivasato aḍḍhamāsaṃ atikkamitvā satthārā saddhiṃ tameva rājagahaṃ upanissāya
atk-s0502a:356_9: sūkarakhataleṇe viharanto attano bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasuttante desiyamāne
atk-s0502a:356_10: suttānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā parassa vaḍḍhitabhattaṃ paribhuñjanto viya sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto.
atk-s0502a:356_12: atha kasmā mahāmoggallānato ciratarena sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ pāpuṇīti?
atk-s0502a:356_14: Yathā hi duggatamanussā yattha katthaci gantukāmā khippameva nikkhamanti,
atk-s0502a:356_15: rājūnaṃ pana hatthivāhanakappanādiṃ mahantaṃ parikammaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:357_0: Taṃ divasaññeva pana satthā vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya veḷuvane sāvakasannipātaṃ katvā dvinnaṃ therānaṃ aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0502a:357_3: aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ dadantena nāma paṭhamaṃ pabbajitānaṃ pañcavaggiyānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:357_4: ete anolokentena yasatherappamukhānaṃ pañcapaṇṇāsabhikkhūnaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:357_7: ete pana ettake mahāthere pahāya sabbapacchā pabbajitānaṃ aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ dadantena mukhaṃ oloketvā dinna”nti. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:357_13: etesaṃ pana attanā attanā patthitapatthitameva demi.
atk-s0502a:357_14: Aññātakoṇḍañño hi ekasmiṃ sasse nava vāre aggasassadānaṃ dadanto aggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthetvā nādāsi,
