atk-s0502a:357_15: aggadhammaṃ pana arahattaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ patthetvā adāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a:358_1: ito ekanavutikappe vipassī nāma bhagavā loke udapādi.
atk-s0502a:358_2: Tadā mahākāḷo cūḷakāḷoti dvebhātikā kuṭumbikā mahantaṃ sālikkhettaṃ vapāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:358_3: Athekadivasaṃ cūḷakāḷo sālikkhettaṃ gantvā ekaṃ sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā khādi,
atk-s0502a:358_5: So buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa sāligabbhadānaṃ dātukāmo hutvā jeṭṭhabhātikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhātika,
atk-s0502a:358_6: sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā buddhānaṃ anucchavikaṃ katvā pacāpetvā dānaṃ demā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:358_8: sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā dānaṃ nāma neva atīte bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:358_13: “tena hi sālikkhettaṃ dve koṭṭhāse katvā mama koṭṭhāsaṃ anāmasitvā attano koṭṭhāse khette yaṃ icchasi,
atk-s0502a:358_15: So “sādhū”ti khettaṃ vibhajitvā bahū manusse hatthakammaṃ yācitvā sāligabbhaṃ phāletvā nirudakena khīrena
atk-s0502a:358_16: pacāpetvā sappimadhusakkharādīhi yojetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā bhattakiccapariyosāne – “idaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:358_17: mama aggadānaṃ aggadhammassa sabbapaṭhamaṃ paṭivedhāya saṃvattatū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:359_0: So khettaṃ gantvā olokento sakalakkhettaṃ kaṇṇikabaddhehi viya sālisīsehi sañchannaṃ disvā pañcavidhapītiṃ paṭilabhitvā,
atk-s0502a:359_1: “lābhā vata me”ti cintetvā puthukakāle puthukaggaṃ nāma adāsi,
atk-s0502a:359_9: Evaṃ ekasasse nava vāre aggadānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:359_12: Dhammo hi nāmesa attānaṃ rakkhantaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0502a:364_0: “Evamesa vipassīsammāsambuddhakāle aggadhammaṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ patthento nava vāre aggadānāni adāsi.
atk-s0502a:364_1: Ito satasahassakappamatthake pana haṃsavatīnagare padumuttarasambuddhakālepi sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:364_2: tassa bhagavato pādamūle nipajjitvā aggadhammassa paṭhamaṃ paṭivijjhanatthameva patthanaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:364_3: Iti iminā patthitameva mayā dinnaṃ, nāhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:365_2: “Etepi ekassa buddhassa santike arahattaṃ patthentā bahuṃ puññakammaṃ katvā aparabhāge anuppanne buddhe
atk-s0502a:365_3: sahāyakā hutvā vaggabandhanena puññāni karontā anāthamatasarīrāni paṭijaggantā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:365_4: Te ekadivasaṃ sagabbhaṃ itthiṃ kālakataṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:365_6: Tesu pañca jane ‘tumhe jhāpethā’ti susāne ṭhapetvā sesā gāmaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0502a:365_7: Yasadārako taṃ matasarīraṃ sūlehi vijjhitvā parivattetvā parivattetvā jhāpento asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhi,
atk-s0502a:365_11: kabaragorūpaṃ viya asuciṃ duggandhaṃ paṭikūla’nti dassesi.
atk-s0502a:365_13: Te pañcapi janā gāmaṃ gantvā sesasahāyakānaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:365_14: Yaso pana dārako gehaṃ gantvā mātāpitūnañca bhariyāya ca kathesi.
atk-s0502a:365_18: tāya ca upanissayasampattiyā sabbesampi visesādhigamo nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:366_2: “Etepi pubbabuddhānaṃ santike arahattaṃ patthetvā puññāni katvā aparabhāge anuppanne buddhe tiṃsa dhuttā
atk-s0502a:366_3: hutvā tuṇḍilovādaṃ sutvā saṭṭhivassasahassāni pañca sīlāni rakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:367_3: Ito hi dvenavutikappe tisso phussoti dve buddhā uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:367_4: Phussabuddhassa mahindo nāma rājā pitā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:367_5: Tasmiṃ pana sambodhiṃ patte rañño kaniṭṭhaputto paṭhamaaggasāvako purohitaputto dutiyaaggasāvako ahosi.
atk-s0502a:367_13: namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassā’ti tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānetvā satthu pādamūle nipajjitvā, ‘bhante,
atk-s0502a:367_14: idāni me navutivassasahassaparimāṇassa āyuno koṭiyaṃ nisīditvā niddāyanakālo viya aññesaṃ gehadvāraṃ agantvā yāvāhaṃ jīvāmi,
atk-s0502a:367_15: tāva me cattāro paccaye adhivāsethā’ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā nibaddhaṃ buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:367_16: Rañño pana aparepi tato puttā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:367_20: Te ‘mayampi bhātikaṃ bhojessāmā’ti pitaraṃ okāsaṃ yācitvā alabhamānā punappunaṃ yācantāpi alabhitvā paccante
atk-s0502a:367_21: kupite tassa vūpasamanatthāya pesitā paccantaṃ vūpasametvā pitu santikaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:367_22: Atha ne pitā āliṅgitvā sīse cumbitvā,
atk-s0502a:368_0: “Te ‘sādhu devā’ti varaṃ gahitakaṃ katvā puna katipāhaccayena pitarā ‘gaṇhatha, tātā,
atk-s0502a:368_4: imaṃ no varaṃ dehī”ti āhaṃsu. ‘Na demi, tātā’ti.
atk-s0502a:368_5: ‘Niccakālaṃ adento satta saṃvaccharāni detha, devā’ti. ‘Na demi, tātā’ti.
atk-s0502a:368_6: ‘Tena hi cha pañca cattāri tīṇi dve ekaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ detha, devā’ti. ‘Na demi, tātā’ti. ‘Tena hi, deva,
atk-s0502a:368_8: ‘Cha māse pañca māse cattāro māse tayo māse detha, devā’ti. ‘Na demi, tātā’ti. ‘Hotu, deva,
atk-s0502a:368_9: ekekassa no ekekaṃ māsaṃ katvā tayo māse dethā’ti. ‘Sādhu, tātā,
atk-s0502a:368_10: tena hi tayo māse bhojethā’ti āha.
atk-s0502a:368_11: Te tuṭṭhā rājānaṃ vanditvā sakaṭṭhānameva gatā.
atk-s0502a:368_16: ‘mayaṃ imaṃ temāsaṃ dasa sīlāni gahetvā dve kāsāvāni nivāsetvā satthārā sahavāsaṃ vasissāma,
atk-s0502a:368_17: tumhe ettakaṃ nāma dānavattaṃ gahetvā devasikaṃ navutisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yodhasahassassa ca sabbaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pavatteyyātha.
atk-s0502a:368_18: Mayañhi ito paṭṭhāya na kiñci vakkhāmā’ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:369_0: “Te tayopi janā parivārasahassaṃ gahetvā dasa sīlāni samādāya kāsāyavatthāni nivāsetvā vihāreyeva vasiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:369_1: Koṭṭhāgāriko ca āyuttako ca ekato hutvā tiṇṇaṃ bhātikānaṃ koṭṭhāgārehi vārena vārena dānavattaṃ gahetvā dānaṃ denti,
atk-s0502a:369_2: kammakārānaṃ pana puttā yāgubhattādīnaṃ atthāya rodanti.
atk-s0502a:369_3: Te tesaṃ bhikkhusaṅghe anāgateyeva yāgubhattādīni denti.
atk-s0502a:369_4: Bhikkhusaṅghassa bhattakiccāvasāne kiñci atirekaṃ na bhūtapubbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:369_5: Te ‘aparabhāge dārakānaṃ demā’ti attanāpi gahetvā khādiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:369_8: Te saṅghassa dinnadānavattaṃ khāditvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā pettivisaye nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:369_9: Tebhātikā pana purisasahassena saddhiṃ kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbattitvā devalokā manussalokaṃ,
atk-s0502a:369_11: ‘Evaṃ te tayo bhātaro arahattaṃ patthentā tadā kalyāṇakammaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:370_0: Tadā pana tesaṃ āyuttako bimbisāro rājā ahosi,
atk-s0502a:370_3: Tesaṃ kammakārā tadā petesu nibbattitvā sugatiduggativasena saṃsarantā imasmiṃ kappe cattāri buddhantarāni petalokeyeva nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:370_4: Te imasmiṃ kappe sabbapaṭhamaṃ uppannaṃ cattālīsavassasahassāyukaṃ kakusandhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:370_7: mama pacchato mahāpathaviyā yojanamattaṃ abhiruḷhāya koṇāgamano nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0502a:370_9: Te tattakaṃ kālaṃ khepetvā tasmiṃ uppanne taṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:370_11: mama pacchato mahāpathaviyā yojanamattaṃ abhiruḷhāya kassapo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0502a:370_13: Te tattakaṃ kālaṃ khepetvā tasmiṃ uppanne taṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:370_15: mama pana pacchato mahāpathaviyā yojanamattaṃ abhiruḷhāya gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0502a:370_16: tadā tumhākaṃ ñātako bimbisāro nāma rājā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:370_17: so satthu dānaṃ datvā tumhākaṃ pattiṃ pāpessati,
atk-s0502a:370_20: Te tathāgate uppanne bimbisāraraññā paṭhamadivasaṃ dāne dinne pattiṃ alabhitvā rattibhāge bheravasaddaṃ katvā rañño attānaṃ dassayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:370_21: So punadivase veḷuvanaṃ gantvā tathāgatassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:371_2: ito dvenavutikappamatthake phussabuddhakāle ete tava ñātakā,
atk-s0502a:371_3: bhikkhusaṅghassa dinnadānavattaṃ khāditvā petaloke nibbattitvā saṃsarantā kakusandhādayo buddhe pucchitvā
atk-s0502a:371_4: tehi idañcidañca vuttā ettakaṃ kālaṃ tava dānaṃ paccāsīsamānā hiyyo tayā dāne dinne pattiṃ alabhamānā
atk-s0502a:371_9: Rājā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā punadivase mahādānaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:371_10: ito tesaṃ petānaṃ dibbaannapānaṃ sampajjatū”ti pattiṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a:371_17: Rājāpi punadivase buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa cīvaradānaṃ datvā,
atk-s0502a:371_21: Satthā anumodanaṃ karonto “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”tiādinā tirokuṭṭānumodanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:371_23: Iti satthā tebhātikajaṭilānaṃ vatthuṃ kathetvā imampi dhammadesanaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a:372_3: Ito kappasatasahassādhikassa hi kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyassa matthake sāriputto brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:372_8: Tesu saradamāṇavo pitu accayena kusalantakaṃ mahādhanaṃ paṭipajjitvā ekadivasaṃ rahogato cintesi –
atk-s0502a:372_12: mayā ekaṃ pabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā mokkhadhammagavesanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:372_21: “paralokaṃ gacchanto sahāye vā ñātimitte vā gahetvā gato nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:372_23: Tato ratanakoṭṭhāgāraṃ vivarāpetvā kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0502a:372_24: Tassa eko dve tayoti evaṃ anupabbajjaṃ pabbajitā catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:372_26: aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā tesaṃ jaṭilānaṃ kasiṇaparikammaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a:372_27: Tepi sabbe pañca abhiññā aṭṭha ca samāpattiyo nibbattesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:373_0: Tena samayena anomadassī nāma sammāsambuddho loke udapādi.
atk-s0502a:373_5: nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0502a:373_7: sundarā ca sumanā ca dve aggasāvikā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:373_12: So ekadivasaṃ paccūsakāle mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento saradatāpasaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:373_13: “ajja mayhaṃ saradatāpasassaṃ santikaṃ gatapaccayena dhammadesanā ca mahatī bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:373_16: desanāpariyosāne cassa parivārā catusattatisahassamattā jaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissanti,
atk-s0502a:373_17: mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano pattacīvaramādāya aññaṃ kañci anāmantetvā sīho viya ekacaro hutvā
atk-s0502a:373_18: saradatāpasassa antevāsikesu phalāphalatthāya gatesu “buddhabhāvaṃ me jānātū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā passantasseva
atk-s0502a:373_20: Saradatāpaso buddhānubhāvañceva sarīranipphattiñcassa disvā lakkhaṇamante sammasitvā “imehi lakkhaṇehi
atk-s0502a:373_21: samannāgato nāma agāramajjhe vasanto rājā hoti cakkavattī,
atk-s0502a:373_23: Ayaṃ puriso nissaṃsayaṃ buddho”ti jānitvā paccuggamanaṃ katvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā aggāsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:373_25: Saradatāpasopi attano anucchavikaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:374_0: Tasmiṃ samaye catusattatisahassajaṭilā paṇītapaṇītāni ojavantāni phalāphalāni gahetvā ācariyassa santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:374_1: sampattā buddhānañceva ācariyassa ca nisinnāsanaṃ oloketvā āhaṃsu – “ācariya,
atk-s0502a:374_2: mayaṃ ‘imasmiṃ loke tumhehi mahantataro natthī’ti vicarāma,
atk-s0502a:374_3: ayaṃ pana puriso tumhehi mahantataro maññe”ti? “Tātā,
atk-s0502a:374_5: sāsapena saddhiṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhaṃ sineruṃ samaṃ kātuṃ icchatha,
atk-s0502a:374_6: sabbaññubuddhena saddhiṃ mamaṃ upamaṃ mā karittha puttakā”ti.
atk-s0502a:374_9: amhākaṃ ācariyo na evarūpaṃ upamaṃ āharissa,
atk-s0502a:374_10: yāva mahā vatāyaṃ puriso”ti sabbeva pādesu nipatitvā sirasā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:374_16: taṃ taṃ āharathā”ti āharāpetvā hatthe dhovitvā sayaṃ tathāgatassa patte patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:374_17: Satthārā phalāphale paṭiggahitamatte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:374_18: So tāpaso udakampi sayameva parissāvetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:374_19: Tato bhattakiccaṃ katvā nisinne satthari sabbe antevāsike pakkositvā satthu santike sāraṇīyakathaṃ kathento nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:374_20: Satthā “dve aggasāvakā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:374_21: Te satthu cittaṃ ñatvā satasahassakhīṇāsavaparivārā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:375_3: ajja tumhehi uḷāraṃ buddhasakkāraṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:375_6: iddhimato pana iddhivisayo acinteyyoti muhuttamatteneva te tāpasā vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni āharitvā
atk-s0502a:375_11: “Kathaṃ ekasmiṃ assamapade tāva mahantāni āsanāni paññattānī”ti na cintetabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:375_13: Evaṃ paññattesu āsanesu saradatāpaso tathāgatassa purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:375_14: mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya imaṃ pupphāsanaṃ abhiruhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:382_0: Evaṃ nisinne satthari dve aggasāvakā sesabhikkhū ca attano attano pattāsane nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:382_1: Saradatāpaso mahantaṃ pupphacchattaṃ gahetvā tathāgatassa matthake dhārento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:382_2: Satthā “jaṭilānaṃ ayaṃ sakkāro mahapphalo hotū”ti nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0502a:382_3: Satthu samāpattiṃ samāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā dve aggasāvakāpi sesabhikkhūpi samāpattiṃ samāpajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:382_4: Tathāgate sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne antevāsikā bhikkhācārakāle sampatte vanamūlaphalāphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:382_5: paribhuñjitvā sesakāle buddhānaṃ añjaliṃ paggayha tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0502a:382_6: Saradatāpaso pana bhikkhācārampi agantvā pupphacchattaṃ dhārayamānova sattāhaṃ pītisukhena vītināmesi.
atk-s0502a:382_7: Satthā nirodhato vuṭṭhāya dakkhiṇapasse nisinnaṃ paṭhamaaggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ āmantesi – “nisabha,
atk-s0502a:382_9: Thero cakkavattirañño santikā paṭiladdhamahālābho mahāyodho viya tuṭṭhamānaso sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhatvā pupphāsanānumodanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:382_12: Anomatthero tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ sammasitvā dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:382_13: Dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ desanāya ekassāpi abhisamayo nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:382_14: Atha satthā aparimāṇe buddhavisaye ṭhatvā dhammadesanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:382_15: Desanāpariyosāne ṭhapetvā saradatāpasaṃ sabbepi catusattatisahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:383_2: So kira buddhānaṃ dutiyāsane nisīditvā sāvakapāramiñāṇe ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desayato aggasāvakassa dhammadesanaṃ sotuṃ āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya,
atk-s0502a:383_3: “aho vatāhampi anāgate uppajjanakabuddhassa sāsane iminā sāvakena paṭiladdhadhuraṃ labheyya”nti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0502a:383_4: So tena parivitakkena maggaphalapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:383_5: Tathāgataṃ pana vanditvā sammukhe ṭhatvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:383_6: tumhākaṃ anantarāsane nisinno bhikkhu tumhākaṃ sāsane ko nāma hotī”ti?
atk-s0502a:383_7: “Mayā pavattitaṃ dhammacakkaṃ anupavattento sāvakapāramiñāṇassa koṭippatto soḷasa paññā paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0502a:383_8: ṭhito mayhaṃ sāsane aggasāvako nisabho nāma eso”ti. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:383_9: yvāyaṃ mayā sattāhaṃ pupphacchattaṃ dhārentena sakkāro kato,
atk-s0502a:383_10: ahaṃ imassa phalena aññaṃ sakkattaṃ vā brahmattaṃ vā na patthemi,
atk-s0502a:383_11: anāgate pana ayaṃ nisabhatthero viya ekassa buddhassa aggasāvako bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsinti.
atk-s0502a:383_12: Satthā “samajjhissati nu kho imassa purisassa patthanā”ti anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pesetvā olokento kappasatasahassādhikaṃ
atk-s0502a:383_16: anāgate pana kappasatasahassādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0502a:383_17: tassa mātā mahāmāyā nāma devī bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:383_22: tvaṃ panassa paṭhamaaggasāvako dhammasenāpati sāriputto nāma bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0502a:383_23: Evaṃ tāpasaṃ byākaritvā dhammakathaṃ kathetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:384_0: Saradatāpasopi antevāsikattherānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sahāyakassa sirivaḍḍhanakuṭumbikassa sāsanaṃ pesesi, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:384_2: sahāyakena te saradatāpasena anomadassībuddhassa pādamūle anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamabuddhassa sāsane paṭhamaaggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:384_4: Evañca pana vatvā therehi puretarameva ekapassena gantvā sirivaḍḍhanassa nivesanadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:384_5: Sirivaḍḍhano “cirassaṃ vata me ayyo āgato”ti āsane nisīdāpetvā attanā nīcāsane nisinno,
atk-s0502a:384_9: mayaṃ tassa attano balena sakkāraṃ akarimhā,
atk-s0502a:384_11: desanāpariyosāne ṭhapetvā maṃ sesā arahattaṃ patvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:384_12: Ahaṃ satthu paṭhamaaggasāvakaṃ nisabhattheraṃ disvā anāgate uppajjanakassa gotamabuddhassa nāma sāsane paṭhamaaggasāvakaṭṭhānaṃ patthesiṃ,
atk-s0502a:385_0: Sirivaḍḍhano tassa vacanaṃ sutvā attano nivesanadvāre rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsamattaṃ ṭhānaṃ samatalaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0502a:385_1: vālukaṃ okirāpetvā lājapañcamānipupphāni vikirāpetvā nīluppalacchadanaṃ maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā buddhāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:385_2: paññāpetvā sesabhikkhūnampi āsanāni paṭiyādetvā mahantaṃ sakkārasammānaṃ sajjetvā buddhānaṃ nimantanatthāya
atk-s0502a:385_4: Tāpaso buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ gahetvā tassa nivesanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:385_5: Sirivaḍḍhanopi paccuggamanaṃ katvā tathāgatassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā maṇḍapaṃ pavesetvā paññattāsanesu
atk-s0502a:385_6: nisinnassa buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā paṇītena bhojanena parivisitvā bhattakiccapariyosāne
atk-s0502a:385_9: imināva niyāmena sattāhaṃ anukampaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:385_11: So teneva niyāmena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ pavattetvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:385_12: mama sahāyo saradatāpaso yassa satthussa paṭhamaaggasāvako bhaveyya”nti patthesi,
atk-s0502a:386_0: Satthā anāgataṃ oloketvā tassa patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ disvā byākāsi –
atk-s0502a:386_1: “tvaṃ ito kappasatasahassādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā gotamabuddhassa dutiyaaggasāvako bhavissasī”ti.
atk-s0502a:386_2: Buddhānaṃ byākaraṇaṃ sutvā sirivaḍḍhano haṭṭhapahaṭṭho ahosi.
atk-s0502a:386_3: Satthāpi bhattānumodanaṃ katvā saparivāro vihārameva gato. “Ayaṃ,
atk-s0502a:387_0: Evaṃ vutte dve aggasāvakā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:387_1: mayaṃ agāriyabhūtā samānā giraggasamajjaṃ dassanāya gatā”ti yāva assajittherassa santikā sotāpattiphalapaṭivedhā sabbaṃ paccuppannavatthuṃ kathetvā,
atk-s0502a:387_3: ācariyassa sañcayassa santikaṃ gantvā taṃ tumhākaṃ pādamūle ānetukāmā tassa laddhiyā nissārabhāvaṃ kathetvā idhāgamane ānisaṃsaṃ kathayimhā.
atk-s0502a:387_4: So idāni mayhaṃ antevāsikavāso nāma cāṭiyā udañcanabhāvappattisadiso,
atk-s0502a:387_6: idāni mahājano gandhamālādihattho gantvā satthārameva pūjessati,
atk-s0502a:387_7: tumhe kathaṃ bhavissathā”ti vutte “kiṃ pana imasmiṃ loke paṇḍitā bahū,
atk-s0502a:387_9: “Dandhā”ti kathite “tena hi paṇḍitā paṇḍitassa samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gamissanti,
atk-s0502a:387_17: Tumhe pana attano paṇḍitatāya sārañca sārato,
atk-s0502a:387_18: asārañca asārato ñatvā asāraṃ pahāya sārameva gaṇhitthā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:394_2: tassā upanissayabhūtā dhammadesanāti ayaṃ asāro nāma,
atk-s0502a:394_5: tassā upanissayabhūtā dhammadesanāti ayaṃ sāro nāma,
atk-s0502a:394_7: Te sāranti te pana taṃ micchādiṭṭhiggahaṇaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vasena micchāsaṅkappagocarā hutvā sīlasāraṃ,
atk-s0502a:394_16: Te sāranti te paṇḍitā evaṃ sammādassanaṃ gahetvā ṭhitā nekkhammasaṅkappādīnaṃ vasena sammāsaṅkappagocarā
atk-s0502a:395_0: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Sannipatitānaṃ sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:398_0: Yathā agāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:399_0: Satthā hi pavattitavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ gantvā veḷuvane viharanto –
atk-s0502a:399_1: “puttaṃ me ānetvā dassethā”ti suddhodanamahārājena pesitānaṃ sahassasahassaparivārānaṃ dasannaṃ dūtānaṃ
atk-s0502a:399_2: sabbapacchato gantvā arahattappattena kāḷudāyittherena gamanakālaṃ ñatvā maggavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā vīsatisahassakhīṇāsavaparivuto
atk-s0502a:399_3: kapilapuraṃ nīto ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ atthuppattiṃ katvā vessantarajātakaṃ kathetvā punadivase
atk-s0502a:399_8: Bhattakiccāvasāne pana rāhulamātuguṇakathaṃ nissāya candakinnarījātakaṃ kathetvā tato tatiyadivase nandakumārassa
atk-s0502a:399_9: abhisekagehappavesanavivāhamaṅgalesu pavattamānesu piṇḍāya pavisitvā nandakumārassa hatthe pattaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:399_10: maṅgalaṃ vatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamanto nandakumārassa hatthato pattaṃ na gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:399_20: Kumāro nivattitukāmo aruciyā gacchanto satthugāravena “pattaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vattuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0502a:400_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe aññā itthiyo taṃ disvā janapadakalyāṇiyā ācikkhiṃsu – “ayye,
atk-s0502a:400_3: Sā udakabindūhi paggharanteheva aḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi vegena gantvā,
atk-s0502a:400_7: Taṃ tassā vacanaṃ tassa hadaye tiriyaṃ patitvā viya ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:400_8: Satthāpissa hatthato pattaṃ aggaṇhitvāva taṃ vihāraṃ netvā,
atk-s0502a:400_13: Satthā kapilapuraṃ gantvā tatiyadivase nandaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:401_0: Sattame divase rāhulamātā kumāraṃ alaṅkaritvā bhagavato santikaṃ pesesi – “passa, tāta,
atk-s0502a:401_5: gaccha naṃ dāyajjaṃ yācassu – ‘ahaṃ, tāta, kumāro,
atk-s0502a:401_10: Kumāro bhagavato santikaṃ gantvāva pitusinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā haṭṭhacitto “sukhā te, samaṇa,
atk-s0502a:401_11: chāyā”ti vatvā aññampi bahuṃ attano anurūpaṃ vadanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:401_12: Bhagavā katabhattakicco anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:401_17: Parijanopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ nivattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:401_18: Iti so bhagavatā saddhiṃ ārāmameva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:402_3: handassa bodhitale paṭiladdhaṃ sattavidhaṃ ariyadhanaṃ demi,
atk-s0502a:402_5: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi –
atk-s0502a:402_10: Pabbajite ca pana kumāre rañño adhimattaṃ dukkhaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0502a:402_11: Taṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto bhagavato nivedetvā, “sādhu, bhante, ayyā,
atk-s0502a:402_12: mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ puttaṃ na pabbājeyyu”nti varaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a:402_13: Bhagavā tassa taṃ varaṃ datvā punekadivasaṃ rājanivesane katapātarāso ekamantaṃ nisinnena raññā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:402_14: tumhākaṃ dukkarakārikakāle ekā devatā maṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:402_16: Ahaṃ tassā vacanaṃ asaddahanto ‘na mayhaṃ putto bodhiṃ appatvā kālaṃ karotī’ti paṭikkhipi”nti vutte –
atk-s0502a:402_19: ‘putto te mato’ti vutte na saddahitvā”ti imissā atthuppattiyā mahādhammapālajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:402_21: Iti bhagavā pitaraṃ tīsu phalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto punadeva rājagahaṃ gantvā tato anāthapiṇḍikena
atk-s0502a:402_22: sāvatthiṃ āgamanatthāya gahitapaṭiñño niṭṭhite jetavane vihāre tattha gantvā vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a:403_0: Evaṃ satthari jetavane viharante āyasmā nando ukkaṇṭhitvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi –
atk-s0502a:403_5: Bhagavā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ pakkosāpetvā etadavoca –
atk-s0502a:403_18: janapadakalyāṇī gharā nikkhamantassa aḍḍhullikhitehi kesehi apaloketvā maṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0502a:404_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ bāhāyaṃ gahetvā iddhibalena tāvatiṃsadevalokaṃ ānento antarāmagge
atk-s0502a:404_1: ekasmiṃ jhāmakkhette jhāmakhāṇuke nisinnaṃ chinnakaṇṇanāsanaṅguṭṭhaṃ ekaṃ paluṭṭhamakkaṭiṃ dassetvā tāvatiṃsabhavane
atk-s0502a:404_2: sakkassa devarañño upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatāni kakuṭapādāni pañca accharāsatāni dassesi.
atk-s0502a:404_6: katamā nu kho abhirūpatarā vā dassanīyatarā vā pāsādikatarā vā sākiyānī vā janapadakalyāṇī,
atk-s0502a:404_13: imesaṃ pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ upanidhāya saṅkhyampi na upeti,
atk-s0502a:404_16: Atha kho imāneva pañca accharāsatāni abhirūpatarāni ceva dassanīyatarāni ca pāsādikatarāni cā”ti.
atk-s0502a:404_18: ahaṃ te pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādāna”nti. “Sace me,
atk-s0502a:405_0: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ gahetvā tattha antarahito jetavaneyeva pāturahosi.
atk-s0502a:405_2: “āyasmā kira nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto accharānaṃ hetu brahmacariyaṃ carati.
atk-s0502a:405_3: Bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādāna”nti.
atk-s0502a:405_4: Atha kho āyasmato nandassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ bhatakavādena ca upakkitakavādena ca samudācaranti,
atk-s0502a:405_8: Bhagavā kirassa pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādāna”nti.
atk-s0502a:405_9: Atha kho āyasmā nando sahāyakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhatakavādena ca upakkitakavādena ca aṭṭiyamāno harāyamāno
atk-s0502a:405_10: jigucchamāno eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto na cirasseva yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva
atk-s0502a:405_12: tadanuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi,
atk-s0502a:405_17: Aññataro ca kho panāyasmā nando arahataṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:406_0: Athekā devatā rattibhāge sakalaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ārocesi – “āyasmā, bhante,
atk-s0502a:406_1: nando bhagavato bhātā mātucchāputto āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme
atk-s0502a:406_3: Bhagavatopi kho ñāṇaṃ udapādi “nando āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme
atk-s0502a:406_5: Sopāyasmā nando tassā rattiyā accayena bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā etadavoca – “yaṃ me, bhante,
atk-s0502a:406_6: bhagavā pāṭibhogo pañcannaṃ accharāsatānaṃ paṭilābhāya kakuṭapādānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:406_10: cetasā ceto paricca vidito ‘nando āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme
atk-s0502a:406_13: nando āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
atk-s0502a:406_17: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a:408_0: Mohakkhayaṃ anuppatto, sukhadukkhesu na vedhatī sa bhikkhū”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:409_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū taṃ āyasmantaṃ nandaṃ pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:409_9: atītadivasesu ‘ukkaṇṭhitomhī’ti vatvā idāni ‘natthi me gihibhāvāya ālayo’ti kathetī”ti gantvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:409_13: Ayañhi dibbaccharānaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya pabbajitakiccassa matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ vāyamanto taṃ kiccaṃ patto”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:415_0: Evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ, rāgo na samativijjhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:416_3: Abhāvitanti taṃ agāraṃ vuṭṭhi viya bhāvanāya rahitattā abhāvitaṃ cittaṃ rāgo samati vijjhati.
atk-s0502a:416_5: dosamohamānādayo sabbakilesā tathārūpaṃ cittaṃ ativiya vijjhantiyeva.
atk-s0502a:416_7: Evarūpaṃ cittaṃ succhannaṃ gehaṃ vuṭṭhi viya rāgādayo kilesā ativijjhituṃ na sakkontīti.
atk-s0502a:417_0: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Mahājanassa desanā sātthikā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:418_0: Atha kho bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:418_2: janapadakalyāṇiṃ nissāya ukkaṇṭhito nāmāyasmā nando satthārā devaccharā āmisaṃ katvā vinīto”ti.
atk-s0502a:418_9: pubbepesa mayā mātugāmena palobhetvā vinītoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:419_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bārāṇasivāsī kappaṭo nāma vāṇijo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:419_3: So ekasmiṃ samaye gadrabhabhārakehi saddhiṃ takkasilaṃ gantvā yāva bhaṇḍassa vissajjanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:419_5: Athassa so gadrabho parikhāpiṭṭhe caramāno ekaṃ gadrabhiṃ disvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0502a:419_6: Sā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karontī āha –
atk-s0502a:419_21: Kappaṭopi bhaṇḍaṃ vissajjetvā tassa santikaṃ āgantvā – “ehi, tāta,
atk-s0502a:421_0: Sañchindissāmi te kāyaṃ, evaṃ jānāhi gadrabhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:422_0: Taṃ sutvā gadrabho “evaṃ sante ahampi te kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:425_0: Dantaṃ te pātayissāmi, evaṃ jānāhi kappaṭā”ti.
atk-s0502a:426_1: “kena nu kho kāraṇena esa evaṃ vadatī”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0502a:426_2: ito cito ca olokento taṃ gadrabhiṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:426_4: ‘evarūpiṃ nāma te gadrabhiṃ ānessāmī’ti mātugāmena naṃ palobhetvā nessāmī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:428_0: Bhariyaṃ te ānayissāmi, evaṃ jānāhi gadrabhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:429_0: Taṃ sutvā tuṭṭhacitto gadrabho imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:431_0: Bhariyaṃ me ānayissasi, evaṃ jānāhi kappaṭa;
atk-s0502a:433_3: “nanu maṃ tumhe ‘bhariyaṃ te ānayissāmī’ti avocutthā”ti? “Āma, vuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:433_7: tuyhaṃ vetanaṃ dutiyassa pahotu vā mā vā,
atk-s0502a:433_9: Ubhinnaṃ pana vo saṃvāsamanvāya puttā vijāyissanti,
atk-s0502a:433_10: tehipi bahūhi saddhiṃ tuyhaṃ taṃ pahotu vā mā vā,
atk-s0502a:434_5: Evaṃ pubbepesa mayā mātugāmena palobhetvā vinīto”ti jātakaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti.
atk-s0502a:437_0: Idha socetīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto cundasūkarikaṃ nāma purisaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:438_0: So kira pañcapaṇṇāsa vassāni sūkare vadhitvā khādanto ca vikkiṇanto ca jīvikaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a:438_1: Chātakāle sakaṭena vīhiṃ ādāya janapadaṃ gantvā ekanāḷidvenāḷimattena gāmasūkarapotake kiṇitvā sakaṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:438_2: pūretvā āgantvā pacchānivesane vajaṃ viya ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ parikkhipitvā tattheva tesaṃ nivāpaṃ ropetvā,
atk-s0502a:438_3: tesu nānāgacche ca sarīramalañca khāditvā vaḍḍhitesu yaṃ yaṃ māretukāmo hoti,
atk-s0502a:438_4: taṃ taṃ āḷāne niccalaṃ bandhitvā sarīramaṃsassa uddhumāyitvā bahalabhāvatthaṃ caturassamuggarena pothetvā,
atk-s0502a:438_5: “bahalamaṃso jāto”ti ñatvā mukhaṃ vivaritvā antare daṇḍakaṃ datvā lohathāliyā pakkuthitaṃ uṇhodakaṃ mukhe āsiñcati.
atk-s0502a:438_6: Taṃ kucchiṃ pavisitvā pakkuthitaṃ karīsaṃ ādāya adhobhāgena nikkhamati,
atk-s0502a:438_9: suddhe udare acchaṃ anāvilaṃ hutvā nikkhamati.
atk-s0502a:438_12: Tato tiṇukkāya lomāni jhāpetvā tikhiṇena asinā sīsaṃ chindati.
atk-s0502a:438_13: Paggharaṇataṃ lohitaṃ bhājanena paṭiggahetvā maṃsaṃ lohitena madditvā pacitvā puttadāramajjhe nisinno khāditvā sesaṃ vikkiṇāti.
atk-s0502a:438_14: Tassa imināva niyāmena jīvikaṃ kappentassa pañcapaṇṇāsa vassāni atikkantāni.
atk-s0502a:438_15: Tathāgate dhuravihāre vasante ekadivasampi pupphamuṭṭhimattena pūjā vā kaṭacchumattaṃ bhikkhadānaṃ vā aññaṃ vā kiñci puññaṃ nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:438_18: Avīcisantāpo nāma yojanasate ṭhatvā olokentassa akkhīnaṃ bhijjanasamattho pariḷāho hoti.
atk-s0502a:441_0: Nāgasenattherena panassa pākatikaggisantāpato adhimattatāya ayaṃ upamā vuttā – “yathā, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:441_1: kūṭāgāramatto pāsāṇopi nerayikaggimhi pakkhitto khaṇena vilayaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0502a:441_2: nibbattasattā panettha kammabalena mātukucchigatā viya na vilīyantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:441_3: Tassa tasmiṃ santāpe upaṭṭhite kammasarikkhako ākāro uppajji.
atk-s0502a:441_4: Gehamajjheyeva sūkararavaṃ ravitvā jaṇṇukehi vicaranto puratthimavatthumpi pacchimavatthumpi gacchati.
atk-s0502a:441_5: Athassa gehamānusakā taṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā mukhaṃ pidahanti.
atk-s0502a:441_6: Kammavipāko nāma na sakkā kenaci paṭibāhituṃ.
atk-s0502a:441_7: So viravantova ito cito ca vicarati.
atk-s0502a:441_8: Samantā sattasu gharesu manussā niddaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0502a:441_9: Maraṇabhayena tajjitassa pana bahinikkhamanaṃ nivāretuṃ asakkonto sabbo gehajano yathā antoṭhito bahi vicarituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:441_10: tathā gehadvārāni thaketvā bahigehaṃ parivāretvā rakkhanto acchati.
atk-s0502a:441_11: Itaro antogeheyeva nirayasantāpena viravanto ito cito ca vicarati.
atk-s0502a:441_12: Evaṃ sattadivasāni vicaritvā aṭṭhame divase kālaṃ katvā avīcimahāniraye nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:442_0: Bhikkhū tassa gharadvārena gacchantā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a:442_1: “sūkarasaddo”ti saññino hutvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthu santike nisinnā evamāhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:442_2: cundasūkaritassa gehadvāraṃ pidahitvā sūkarānaṃ māriyamānānaṃ ajja sattamo divaso,
atk-s0502a:442_5: sūkare mārentassa ekampi mettacittaṃ vā kāruññaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0502a:442_6: na vata no evarūpo kakkhaḷo pharuso satto diṭṭhapubbo”ti. Satthā – “na,
atk-s0502a:442_11: So tena santāpena satta divasāni sūkararavaṃ ravanto antonivesane vicaritvā ajja kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbatto”ti vatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:442_12: idha loke evaṃ socitvā puna gantvā socanaṭṭhāneyeva nibbatto”ti vutte, “āma,
atk-s0502a:442_14: pamattā nāma gahaṭṭhā vā hontu pabbajitā vā,
atk-s0502a:448_0: Tattha pāpakārīti nānappakārassa pāpakammassa kārako puggalo “akataṃ vata me kalyāṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:448_1: kataṃ pāpa”nti ekaṃseneva maraṇasamaye idha socati,
atk-s0502a:448_6: Teneva kāraṇena jīvamānoyeva so cundasūkarikopi socati.
atk-s0502a:448_7: Disvā kammakiliṭṭhanti attano kiliṭṭhakammaṃ passitvā nānappakārakaṃ vilapanto vihaññatīti.
atk-s0502a:449_0: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:452_0: Idha modatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammikaupāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:453_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcasatā dhammikaupāsakā nāma ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:453_1: Tesu ekekassa pañca pañca upāsakasatāni parivārā.
atk-s0502a:453_4: Tesu ekekassa ekekā salākayāgu salākabhattaṃ pakkhikabhattaṃ nimantanabhattaṃ uposathikabhattaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:453_6: Iti cuddasannaṃ puttānaṃ bhariyāya upāsakassāti soḷasa salākayāguādīni pavattanti.
atk-s0502a:453_7: Iti so saputtadāro sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo dānasaṃvibhāgarato ahosi.
atk-s0502a:453_10: So dhammaṃ sotukāmo “aṭṭha vā me soḷasa vā bhikkhū pesethā”ti satthu santikaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:453_12: Te gantvā tassa mañcaṃ parivāretvā paññattesu āsanesu nisinnā. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:453_15: ekaṃ me suttaṃ sajjhāyathā”ti vutte “kataraṃ suttaṃ sotukāmo upāsakā”ti?
atk-s0502a:453_20: Tasmiṃ khaṇe chahi devalokehi sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā sahassasindhavayuttā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikā cha rathā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:453_23: ambho mattikabhājanaṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇabhājanaṃ gaṇhanto viya amhākaṃ devaloke abhiramituṃ idha nibbattāhi,
atk-s0502a:453_24: amhākaṃ devaloke abhiramituṃ idha nibbattāhī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:454_0: Athassa puttadhītaro “amhākaṃ pitā pubbe dhammassavanena atitto ahosi,
atk-s0502a:454_1: idāni pana bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā sayameva vāreti,
atk-s0502a:454_4: Upāsako thokaṃ vītināmetvā satiṃ paṭilabhitvā putte pucchi –
atk-s0502a:454_6: tumhe bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā dhammaṃ suṇantā sayameva vārayittha,
atk-s0502a:454_7: atha mayaṃ ‘maraṇassa abhāyanakasatto nāma natthī’ti kandimhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:454_10: ayyehi saddhiṃ kathemī”ti vutte “atha kena saddhiṃ kathethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:454_11: “Chahi devalokehi devatā cha rathe alaṅkaritvā ādāya ākāse ṭhatvā ‘amhāhi devaloke abhirama,
atk-s0502a:454_28: mama santike nibbattitukāmā hutvā mayā kataniyāmeneva puññāni karothā”ti vatvā kālaṃ katvā rathe patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:455_3: Tepi bhikkhū vihāraṃ anuppatte satthā pucchi – “sutā,
atk-s0502a:455_11: chahi devalokehi devatā cha rathe alaṅkaritvā āharitvā taṃ upāsakaṃ pakkosiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:455_12: So dhammadesanāya antarāyaṃ anicchanto tāhi saddhiṃ kathesī”ti. “Evaṃ,
atk-s0502a:455_18: idāni idha ñātimajjhe modamāno vicaritvā idāneva gantvā puna modanaṭṭhāneyeva nibbatto”ti. “Āma,
atk-s0502a:455_20: appamattā hi gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā sabbattha modantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:461_0: Tattha katapuññoti nānappakārassa kusalassa kārako puggalo “akataṃ vata me pāpaṃ,
atk-s0502a:461_4: Kammavisuddhinti dhammikaupāsakopi attano kammavisuddhiṃ puññakammasampattiṃ disvā kālakiriyato pubbe idhalokepi modati,
atk-s0502a:462_0: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:465_0: Idha tappatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:466_0: Devadattassa vatthu pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya yāva pathavippavesanā devadattaṃ ārabbha bhāsitāni sabbāni jātakāni vitthāretvā kathitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:466_2: satthari anupiyaṃ nāma mallānaṃ nigamo atthi.
atk-s0502a:466_3: Taṃ nissāya anupiyambavane viharanteyeva tathāgatassa lakkhaṇapaṭiggahaṇadivaseyeva asītisahassehi ñātikulehi “rājā vā hotu,
atk-s0502a:466_6: Tesu yebhuyyena pabbajitesu bhaddiyaṃ nāma rājānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:466_8: devadattanti ime cha sakye apabbajante disvā,
atk-s0502a:466_10: ime cha sakyā na ñātakā maññe,
atk-s0502a:466_13: Atha kho mahānāmo sakyo anuruddhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:466_19: Ekadivasañhi tesu chasu khattiyesu guḷakīḷaṃ kīḷantesu anuruddho pūvena parājito pūvatthāya pahiṇi,
atk-s0502a:466_23: Mātā panassa pahite pahite tikkhattuṃ pūve pahiṇitvā catutthavāre “pūvā natthī”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:466_24: So “natthī”ti vacanassa asukapubbattā “esāpekā pūvavikati bhavissatī”ti maññamāno “natthipūvaṃ me āharathā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a:466_28: iminā pana upāyena naṃ etamatthaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti tucchaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ aññāya suvaṇṇapātiyā paṭikujjitvā pesesi.
atk-s0502a:466_30: “anuruddhasakyena annabhārakāle attano bhāgabhattaṃ upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa datvā “‘natthī’ti me vacanassa savanaṃ mā hotu,
atk-s0502a:466_35: Atha naṃ pātiṃ dibbapūvehi puṇṇaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:466_36: Kassā guḷamaṇḍale ṭhapetvā ugghāṭitamattāya pūvagandho sakalanagare chādetvā ṭhito.
atk-s0502a:467_2: ettakaṃ me kālaṃ imaṃ natthipūvaṃ nāma na paci,
atk-s0502a:467_3: ito paṭṭhāya aññaṃ pūvaṃ nāma na khādissāmī”ti,
atk-s0502a:467_7: ekakkhino akkhi viya ca hadayaṃ viya ca ativiya piyo me ahosī”ti.
atk-s0502a:467_8: “Atha kasmā ettakaṃ kālaṃ mayhaṃ natthi pūvaṃ na pacittha, ammā”ti?
atk-s0502a:467_13: evarūpā pūvā nāma me na diṭṭhapubbā”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:467_16: devatāhi pātiṃ pūretvā pūvā pahitā bhavissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:467_18: ito paṭṭhāyāhaṃ aññaṃ pūvaṃ nāma na khādissāmi,
atk-s0502a:467_20: Sāpissa tato paṭṭhāya “pūvaṃ khāditukāmomhī”ti vutte tucchapātimeva aññāya pātiyā paṭikucchitvā pesesi.
atk-s0502a:468_0: So ettakampi ajānanto pabbajjaṃ nāma kiṃ jānissati?
atk-s0502a:468_1: Tasmā “kā esā pabbajjā nāmā”ti bhātaraṃ pucchitvā “ohāritakesamassunā kāsāyanivatthena kaṭṭhattharake
atk-s0502a:468_2: vā bidalamañcake vā nipajjitvā piṇḍāya carantena viharitabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:468_5: Nāhaṃ sakkhissāmi pabbajitu”nti āha. “Tena hi, tāta,
atk-s0502a:468_7: Na hi sakkā amhesu ekena apabbajitu”nti.
atk-s0502a:468_8: Atha naṃ “ko esa kammanto nāmā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:468_9: “Bhattuṭṭhānaṭṭhānampi ajānanto kulaputto kammantaṃ nāma kiṃ jānissatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:468_14: Atha naṃ bhaddiyo “tvaṃ bhattassa uṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na jānāsi,
atk-s0502a:468_17: bhattaṃ nāma ratanamakuḷāya suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ uṭṭhahatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:469_0: Tesu kira ekadivasaṃ kimilo koṭṭhato vīhī otāriyamāne disvā,
atk-s0502a:469_2: Bhaddiyo ekadivasaṃ ukkhalito bhattaṃ vaḍḍhiyamānaṃ disvā “ukkhaliyaññeva uppanna”nti saññī ahosi.
atk-s0502a:469_8: Evaṃ tayopi te bhattuṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0502a:469_10: “paṭhamaṃ khettaṃ kasāpetabba”ntiādikaṃ saṃvacchare saṃvacchare kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0502a:469_12: kadā mayaṃ appossukkā bhoge bhuñjissāmā”ti vatvā kammantānaṃ apariyantatāya akkhātāya “tena hi tvaññeva gharāvāsaṃ vasa,
atk-s0502a:469_15: pabbajissāmī”ti vatvā tāya nānappakārehi tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā,
atk-s0502a:469_17: tena saddhiṃ pabbajāhī”ti vutte taṃ upasaṅkamitvā,
atk-s0502a:469_19: pabbajjā tava paṭibaddhā”ti vatvā taṃ nānappakārehi saññāpetvā sattame divase attanā saddhiṃ pabbajanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:470_0: Tato bhaddiyo sakyarājā anuruddho ānando bhagu kimilo devadattoti ime cha khattiyā upālikappakasattamā
atk-s0502a:470_1: devā viya dibbasampattiṃ sattāhaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavitvā uyyānaṃ gacchantā viya caturaṅginiyā senāya nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:470_2: paravisayaṃ patvā rājāṇāya senaṃ nivattāpetvā paravisayaṃ okkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:470_3: Tattha cha khattiyā attano attano ābharaṇāni omuñcitvā bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā,
atk-s0502a:470_6: alaṃ te ettakaṃ jīvikāyā”ti tassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:470_7: So tesaṃ pādamūle parivattitvā paridevitvā tesaṃ āṇaṃ atikkamituṃ asakkonto uṭṭhāya taṃ gahetvā nivatti.
atk-s0502a:470_9: vanaṃ ārodanappattaṃ viya pathavīkampamānākārappattā viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:470_10: Upāli kappakopi thokaṃ gantvā nivattitvā “caṇḍā kho sākiyā,
atk-s0502a:470_12: Ime hi nāma sakyakumārā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ pahāya imāni anagghāni ābharaṇāni kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya chaḍḍetvā pabbajissanti,
atk-s0502a:470_13: kimaṅgaṃ panāha”nti bhaṇḍikaṃ omuñcitvā tāni ābharaṇāni rukkhe laggetvā “atthikā gaṇhantū”ti vatvā tesaṃ
atk-s0502a:470_14: santikaṃ gantvā tehi “kasmā nivattosī”ti puṭṭho tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:470_15: Atha naṃ te ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “mayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:470_20: evaṃ no māno nimmānāyissatī”ti vatvā taṃ paṭhamataraṃ pabbājetvā pacchā sayaṃ pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:470_21: Tesu āyasmā bhaddiyo teneva antaravassena tevijjo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:470_22: Āyasmā anuruddho dibbacakkhuko hutvā pacchā mahāvitakkasuttaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:470_24: Bhagutthero ca kimilatthero ca aparabhāge vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:471_0: Aparabhāge satthari kosambiyaṃ viharante sasāvakasaṅghassa tathāgatassa mahanto lābhasakkāro nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:471_9: kuhiṃ kimilatthero”ti asītimahāsāvakānaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ olokentā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a:471_18: Kena nu kho saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kaṃ pasādetvā mama lābhasakkāraṃ nibbatteyya”nti.
atk-s0502a:471_20: “ayaṃ kho rājā bimbisāro paṭhamadassaneneva ekādasahi nahutehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0502a:471_21: na sakkā etena saddhiṃ ekato bhavituṃ,
atk-s0502a:471_23: Ayaṃ kho pana rañño putto ajātasattu kumāro kassaci guṇadose na jānāti,
atk-s0502a:471_25: So kosambito rājagahaṃ gantvā kumārakavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā cattāro āsīvise catūsu hatthapādesu ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:471_26: gīvāya pilandhitvā ekaṃ sīse cumbaṭakaṃ katvā ekaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā imāya ahimekhalāya ākāsato oruyha
atk-s0502a:471_27: ajātasattussa ucchaṅge nisīditvā tena bhītena “kosi tva”nti vutte “ahaṃ devadatto”ti vatvā tassa bhayavinodanatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:471_28: taṃ attabhāvaṃ paṭisaṃharitvā saṅghāṭipattacīvaradharo purato ṭhatvā taṃ pasādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0502a:471_29: So lābhasakkārābhibhūto “ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī”ti pāpakaṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā saha cittuppādena
atk-s0502a:471_30: iddhito parihāyitvā satthāraṃ veḷuvanavihāre sarājikāya parisāya dhammaṃ desentaṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0502a:471_35: niyyādetha me bhikkhusaṅgha”nti vatvā satthārā kheḷāsakavādena apasādetvā paṭikkhitto anattamano imaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgate āghātaṃ bandhitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:472_7: yaṃ tvaṃ kumārova samāno kālaṃ kareyyāsi,
atk-s0502a:472_10: ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ hantvā buddho bhavissāmī”ti vatvā tasmiṃ rajje patiṭṭhite tathāgatassa vadhāya purise
atk-s0502a:472_11: payojetvā tesu sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā nivattesu sayaṃ gijjhakūṭapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā,
atk-s0502a:472_12: “ahameva samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ jīvitā voropessāmī”ti silaṃ pavijjhitvā ruhiruppādakakammaṃ katvā imināpi upāyena
atk-s0502a:472_14: Tasmiṃ āgacchante ānandatthero attano jīvitaṃ satthu pariccajitvā purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:472_15: Satthā nāgaṃ dametvā nagarā nikkhamitvā vihāraṃ gantvā anekasahassehi upāsakehi abhihaṭaṃ mahādānaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0502a:472_16: tasmiṃ divase sannipatitānaṃ aṭṭhārasakoṭisaṅkhātānaṃ rājagahavāsīnaṃ anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā caturāsītiyā
atk-s0502a:472_17: pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamaye jāte “aho āyasmā ānando mahāguṇo,
atk-s0502a:472_18: tathārūpe nāma hatthināge āgacchante attano jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā satthu puratova aṭṭhāsī”ti therassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā “na,
atk-s0502a:472_20: pubbepesa mamatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajiyevā”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito cūḷahaṃsa –
atk-s0502a:472_25: na vadhakānaṃ payojitattā na silāya paviddhattā pākaṭaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0502a:472_31: evarūpaṃ nāma pāpakaṃ gahetvā rājā vicaratī”ti kolāhalamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:473_0: Rājā mahājanassa kathaṃ sutvā pañca thālipākasatāni nīharāpetvā na puna tassūpaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0502a:473_1: nāgarāpissa kulaṃ upagatassa bhikkhāmattampi na adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:473_2: So parihīnalābhasakkāro kohaññena jīvitukāmo satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañca vatthūni yācitvā bhagavato “alaṃ,
atk-s0502a:473_15: so mayā saddhiṃ āgacchatū”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:473_16: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā ekacce navakapabbajitā mandabuddhino “kalyāṇaṃ devadatto āha,
atk-s0502a:473_17: etena saddhiṃ vicarissāmā”ti tena saddhiṃ ekato ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:473_18: Iti so pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ tehi pañcahi vatthūhi lūkhappasannaṃ janaṃ saññāpento kulesu viññāpetvā
atk-s0502a:473_23: saṅghabhedāya parakkamasi cakkabhedāyā”ti puṭṭho “saccaṃ bhagavā”ti vatvā,
atk-s0502a:473_26: saṅghabhedo”tiādīhi ovaditopi satthu vacanaṃ anādiyitvā pakkanto āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:473_34: “devadatto sadevakassa lokassa anatthanissitaṃ attano avīcimhi paccanakakammaṃ karotī”ti vitakketvā –
atk-s0502a:475_0: Yaṃ ve hitañca sādhuñca, taṃ ve paramadukkara”nti. –
atk-s0502a:476_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā puna imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a:479_0: Atha kho devadatto uposathadivase attano parisāya saddhiṃ ekamantaṃ nisīditvā,
atk-s0502a:479_2: so salākaṃ gaṇhatū”ti vatvā pañcasatehi vajjiputtakehi navakehi appakataññūhi salākāya gahitāya saṅghaṃ bhinditvā te bhikkhū ādāya gayāsīsaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:479_3: Tassa tattha gatabhāvaṃ sutvā satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ānayanatthāya dve aggasāvake pesesi.
atk-s0502a:479_4: Te tattha gantvā ādesanāpāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā ceva iddhipāṭihāriyānusāsaniyā ca anusāsantā te amataṃ pāyetvā ādāya ākāsena āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:479_11: pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti vatvā jaṇṇukena hadayamajjhe pahari,
atk-s0502a:479_12: tassa tattheva uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ mukhato uggañchi.
atk-s0502a:479_13: Āyasmantaṃ pana sāriputtaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaparivutaṃ ākāsena āgacchantaṃ disvā bhikkhū āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:479_19: pubbe tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattakālepi mayhaṃ putto mama santikaṃ āgacchanto sobhiyevā”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:483_2: devadatto kira dve aggasāvake ubhosu passesu nisīdāpetvā ‘buddhalīḷāya dhammaṃ desessāmī’ti tumhākaṃ anukiriyaṃ karotī”ti vutte, “na,
atk-s0502a:490_0: Ādinā jātakaṃ vatvā aparāparesupi divasesu tathānurūpameva kathaṃ ārabbha –
atk-s0502a:495_0: “Lasī ca te nipphalikā, matthako ca padālito;
atk-s0502a:496_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, ajja kho tvaṃ virocasī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:497_0: Evamādīni jātakāni kathesi. Puna “akataññū devadatto”ti kathaṃ ārabbha –
atk-s0502a:499_0: Migarāja namo tyatthu, api kiñci labhāmase.
atk-s0502a:501_0: Dantantaragato santo, taṃ bahuṃ yampi jīvasī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:502_0: Ādīni jātakāni kathesi. Puna vadhāya parisakkanamassa ārabbha –
atk-s0502a:504_0: Aññaṃ sepaṇṇi gacchāmi, na me te ruccate phala”nti. –
atk-s0502a:505_1: Punadivase “ubhato parihīno devadatto lābhasakkārato ca sāmaññato cā”ti kathāsu pavattamānāsu “na,
atk-s0502a:506_0: “Akkhī bhinnā paṭo naṭṭho, sakhigehe ca bhaṇḍanaṃ;
atk-s0502a:507_0: Ubhato paduṭṭhā kammantā, udakamhi thalamhi cā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:508_1: Evaṃ rājagahe viharantova devadattaṃ ārabbha bahūni jātakāni kathetvā rājagahato sāvatthiṃ gantvā jetavane vihāre vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a:508_2: Devadattopi kho nava māse gilāno pacchime kāle satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmo hutvā attano sāvake āha –
atk-s0502a:508_5: “Tvaṃ samatthakāle satthārā saddhiṃ verī hutvā acari,
atk-s0502a:508_9: satthu pana mayi kesaggamattopi āghāto natthi”.
atk-s0502a:511_2: Tassa āgamanaṃ sutvā bhikkhū satthu ārocesuṃ – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:511_6: Devadatto kira pañcannaṃ vatthūnaṃ āyācitakālato paṭṭhāya puna buddhaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na labhati,
atk-s0502a:511_19: Devadattaṃ gahetvā āgatā jetavanapokkharaṇītīre mañcaṃ otāretvā pokkharaṇiṃ nhāyituṃ otariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:511_20: Devadattopi kho mañcato vuṭṭhāya ubho pāde bhūmiyaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:511_26: yāva gīvato pavisitvā hanukaṭṭhikassa bhūmiyaṃ paviṭṭhakāle –
atk-s0502a:516_1: Idaṃ kira ṭhānaṃ disvā tathāgato devadattaṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:516_5: pabbajitvā ca pana kiñcāpi kammaṃ bhāriyaṃ karissati,
atk-s0502a:516_6: āyatiṃ bhavanissaraṇapaccayaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissatīti taṃ satthā pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:516_7: So hi ito satasahassakappamatthake aṭṭhissaro nāma paccekabuddho bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:516_9: Niccale buddhe aparajjhabhāvena pana niccalova hutvā paccatūti yojanasatike anto avīcimhi yojanasatubbedhamevassa sarīraṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:516_10: Sīsaṃ yāva kaṇṇasakkhalito upari ayakapallaṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0502a:516_11: pādā yāva gopphakā heṭṭhā ayapathaviyaṃ paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a:516_12: mahātālakkhandhaparimāṇaṃ ayasūlaṃ pacchimabhittito nikkhamitvā piṭṭhimajjhaṃ bhinditvā urena nikkhamitvā purimabhittiṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0502a:516_13: aparaṃ dakkhiṇabhittito nikkhamitvā dakkhiṇapassaṃ bhinditvā vāmapassena nikkhamitvā uttarabhittiṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0502a:516_14: aparaṃ upari kapallato nikkhamitvā matthakaṃ bhinditvā adhobhāgena nikkhamitvā ayapathaviṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:517_0: Bhikkhū “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ devadatto āgacchanto satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ alabhitvāva pathaviṃ paviṭṭho”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:517_3: devadatto idāneva mayi aparajjhitvā pathaviṃ pāvisi,
atk-s0502a:517_4: pubbepi paviṭṭhoyevā”ti vatvā hatthirājakāle maggamūḷhaṃ purisaṃ samassāsetvā attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā
atk-s0502a:517_5: khemantaṃ pāpitassa puna tikkhattuṃ āgantvā aggaṭṭhāne majjhimaṭṭhāne mūlehi evaṃ dante chinditvā tatiyavāre
atk-s0502a:517_6: mahāpurisassa cakkhupathaṃ atikkamantassa tassa pathaviṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ –
atk-s0502a:519_0: Sabbaṃ ce pathaviṃ dajjā, neva naṃ abhirādhaye”ti. –
atk-s0502a:520_0: Idaṃ jātakaṃ kathetvā punapi tatheva kathāya samuṭṭhitāya khantivādibhūte attani aparajjhitvā kalāburājabhūtassa
atk-s0502a:520_2: cūḷadhammapālabhūte attani aparajjhitvā mahāpatāparājabhūtassa tassa pathaviṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ cūḷadhammapālajātakañca kathesi.
atk-s0502a:521_0: Pathaviṃ paviṭṭhe pana devadatte mahājano haṭṭhatuṭṭho dhajapaṭākakadaliyo ussāpetvā puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapetvā “lābhā vata no”ti mahantaṃ chaṇaṃ anubhoti.
atk-s0502a:521_5: pubbepi tussiyevā”ti vatvā sabbajanassa appiye caṇḍe pharuse bārāṇasiyaṃ piṅgalaraññe nāma mate mahājanassa tuṭṭhabhāvaṃ dīpetuṃ –
atk-s0502a:530_5: idha tappanto vicaritvā puna gantvā tappanaṭṭhāneyeva nibbatto”ti. “Āma,
atk-s0502a:530_8: pamādavihārino ubhayattha tappantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:532_0: “Idha tappati pecca tappati, pāpakārī ubhayattha tappati;
atk-s0502a:533_0: Pāpaṃ me katanti tappati, bhiyyo tappati duggatiṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0502a:534_0: Tattha idha tappatīti idha kammatappanena domanassamattena tappati.
atk-s0502a:534_1: Peccāti paraloke pana vipākatappanena atidāruṇena apāyadukkhena tappati.
atk-s0502a:534_3: Ubhayatthāti iminā vuttappakārena tappanena ubhayattha tappati nāma.
atk-s0502a:534_4: Pāpaṃ meti so hi kammatappanena kappanto “pāpaṃ me kata”nti tappati.
atk-s0502a:534_6: vipākatappanena pana tappanto bhiyyo tappati duggatiṃ gato atipharusena tappanena ativiya tappatīti.
atk-s0502a:535_0: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:538_0: Idha nandatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sumanādeviṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:539_0: Sāvatthiyañhi devasikaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa gehe dve bhikkhūsahassāni bhuñjanti,
atk-s0502a:539_2: Sāvatthiyaṃ yo yo dānaṃ dātukāmo hoti,
atk-s0502a:539_3: so so tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ okāsaṃ labhitvāva karoti.
atk-s0502a:539_5: “Tumhākaṃ dānaggaṃ anāthapiṇḍiko vā visākhā vā āgatā”ti pucchitvā,
atk-s0502a:539_6: “nāgatā”ti vutte satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā katadānampi “kiṃ dānaṃ nāmeta”nti garahanti.
atk-s0502a:539_7: Ubhopi hi te bhikkhusaṅghassa ruciñca anucchavikakiccāni ca ativiya jānanti,
atk-s0502a:539_9: Tasmā sabbe dānaṃ dātukāmā te gahetvāva gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:539_10: Iti te attano attano ghare bhikkhū parivisituṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0502a:539_12: “ko nu kho mama ṭhāne ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisissatī”ti upadhārentī puttassa dhītaraṃ disvā taṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:539_15: Sā bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karontī dhammaṃ suṇantī sotāpannā hutvā patikulaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:539_17: Sāpi tatheva karontī sotāpannā hutvā patikulaṃ gatā.
atk-s0502a:539_19: Sā pana dhammaṃ sutvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā kumārikāva hutvā tathārūpena aphāsukena āturā āhārupacchedaṃ katvā pitaraṃ daṭṭhukāmā hutvā pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0502a:539_20: So ekasmiṃ dānagge tassā sāsanaṃ sutvāva āgantvā, “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:539_30: So sotāpannopi samāno seṭṭhidhītari uppannasokaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto dhītu sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā rodanto satthu santikaṃ gantvā, “kiṃ, gahapati,
atk-s0502a:539_31: dukkhī dummano assumukho rodamāno āgatosī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:539_38: sā maraṇakāle satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ asakkontī vilapamānā matā,
atk-s0502a:539_58: Sā maggaphalehi tayā mahallikattā taṃ evamāhā”ti. “Evaṃ,
atk-s0502a:539_65: mama dhītā idha ñātakānaṃ antare nandamānā vicaritvā ito gantvāpi nandanaṭṭhāneyeva nibbattā”ti.
atk-s0502a:539_67: appamattā nāma gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā idha loke ca paraloke ca nandantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:541_0: “Idha nandati pecca nandati, katapuñño ubhayattha nandati;
atk-s0502a:542_0: Puññaṃ me katanti nandati, bhiyyo nandati suggatiṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0502a:543_0: Tattha idhāti idha loke kammanandanena nandati.
atk-s0502a:543_6: Puññaṃ meti idha nandanto pana “puññaṃ me kata”nti somanassamatteneva kammanandanaṃ upādāya nandati.
atk-s0502a:543_7: Bhiyyoti vipākanandanena pana sugatiṃ gato sattapaññāsavassakoṭiyo saṭṭhivassasatasahassāni dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanto tusitapure ativiya nandatīti.
atk-s0502a:544_0: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:547_0: Bahumpi ceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve sahāyake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:548_0: Sāvatthivāsino hi dve kulaputtā sahāyakā vihāraṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā kāme pahāya sāsane
atk-s0502a:548_1: uraṃ datvā pabbajitvā pañca vassāni ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike vasitvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā sāsane
atk-s0502a:548_2: dhuraṃ pucchitvā vipassanādhurañca ganthadhurañca vitthārato sutvā eko tāva “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:548_3: mahallakakāle pabbajito na sakkhissāmi ganthadhuraṃ pūretuṃ,
atk-s0502a:548_4: vipassanādhuraṃ pana pūressāmī”ti yāva arahattā vipassanādhuraṃ kathāpetvā ghaṭento vāyamanto saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:548_5: Itaro pana “ahaṃ ganthadhuraṃ pūressāmī”ti anukkamena tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā gatagataṭṭhāne dhammaṃ katheti,
atk-s0502a:548_9: Bhikkhū satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā itarassa therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tassa ovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ patvā theraṃ vanditvā,
atk-s0502a:548_12: mama vacanena satthāraṃ vanditvā asīti mahāthere vandatha,
atk-s0502a:548_13: sahāyakattherampi me ‘amhākaṃ ācariyo tumhe vandatī’ti vadathā”ti peseti.
atk-s0502a:548_14: Te bhikkhū vihāraṃ gantvā satthārañceva asīti mahāthere ca vanditvā ganthikattherassa santikaṃ gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:548_19: Evaṃ there punappunaṃ sāsanaṃ pahiṇante so bhikkhu thokaṃ kālaṃ sahitvā aparabhāge sahituṃ asakkonto “amhākaṃ ācariyo tumhe vandatī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:548_23: kiṃ tīsu piṭakesu ekaṃ piṭaka”nti vatvā “catuppadikampi gāthaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0502a:548_26: tassa āgatakāle mayā pañhaṃ pucchituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:549_0: Atha aparabhāge thero satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgato.
atk-s0502a:549_1: Sahāyakassa therassa santike pattacīvaraṃ ṭhapetvā gantvā satthārañceva asīti mahāthere ca vanditvā sahāyakassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ paccāgami.
atk-s0502a:549_2: Athassa so vattaṃ kāretvā samappamāṇaṃ āsanaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0502a:549_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā “esa evarūpaṃ mama puttaṃ viheṭhetvā niraye nibbatteyyā”ti tasmiṃ anukampāya vihāracārikaṃ
atk-s0502a:549_5: caranto viya tesaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:549_6: Tattha tattha nisīdantā hi bhikkhū buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvāva nisīdanti.
atk-s0502a:549_8: Nisajja kho pana ganthikabhikkhuṃ paṭhamajjhāne pañhaṃ pucchitvā tasmiṃ akathite dutiyajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:549_9: aṭṭhasupi samāpattīsu rūpārūpesu ca pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:549_17: bhikkhū”ti abhinanditvā sesamaggesupi paṭipāṭiyā pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:549_20: Satthā catūsupi ṭhānesu tassa sādhukāraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:549_21: Taṃ sutvā bhummadeve ādiṃ katvā yāva brahmalokā sabbā devatā ceva nāgasupaṇṇā ca sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:549_22: Taṃ sādhukāraṃ sutvā tassa antevāsikā ceva saddhivihārino ca satthāraṃ ujjhāyiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:549_24: kiñci ajānantassa mahallakattherassa catūsu ṭhānesu sādhukāraṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a:549_25: amhākaṃ panācariyassa sabbapariyattidharassa pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pāmokkhassa pasaṃsāmattampi na karī”ti.
atk-s0502a:549_30: tumhākaṃ ācariyo mama sāsane bhatiyā gāvo rakkhaṇasadiso,
atk-s0502a:549_31: mayhaṃ pana putto yathāruciyā pañca gorase paribhuñjanakasāmisadiso”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:562_1: Taṃ ācariye upasaṅkamitvā uggaṇhitvā bahumpi paresaṃ bhāsamāno vācento taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā yaṃ kārakena puggalena kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:562_4: Eso yathā nāma divasaṃ bhatiyā gāvo rakkhanto gopo pātova niravasesaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sāyaṃ gahetvā sāmikānaṃ niyyādetvā divasabhatimattaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a:562_5: yathāruciyā pana pañca gorase paribhuñjituṃ na labhati,
atk-s0502a:562_6: evameva kevalaṃ antevāsikānaṃ santikā vattapaṭivattakaraṇamattassa bhāgī hoti,
atk-s0502a:562_8: Yathā pana gopālakena niyyāditānaṃ gunnaṃ gorasaṃ sāmikāva paribhuñjanti,
atk-s0502a:562_9: tathā tena kathitaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā kārakapuggalā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā keci paṭhamajjhānādīni pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0502a:563_0: Iti satthā sīlasampannassa bahussutassa pamādavihārino aniccādivasena yonisomanasikāre pamattassa bhikkhuno vasena paṭhamaṃ gāthaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0502a:563_2: Dutiyagāthā pana appassutassapi yonisomanasikāre kammaṃ karontassa kārakapuggalassa vasena kathitā.
atk-s0502a:564_1: Dhammassa hoti anudhammacārīti atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya navalokuttaradhammassa anurūpaṃ dhammaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a:564_4: So imāya sammāpaṭipattiyā rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohaṃ sammā hetunā nayena parijānitabbe dhamme parijānanto
atk-s0502a:564_6: anupādiyāno idha vā huraṃ vāti idhalokaparalokapariyāpannā vā ajjhattikabāhirā vā khandhāyatanadhātuyo
atk-s0502a:564_7: catūhi upādānehi anupādiyanto mahākhīṇāsavo maggasaṅkhātassa sāmaññassa vasena āgatassa phalasāmaññassa
atk-s0502a:564_8: ceva pañcaasekkhadhammakkhandhassa ca bhāgavā hotīti ratanakūṭena viya agārassa arahattena desanāya kūṭaṃ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0502a:565_0: Gāthāpariyosāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:571_0: Appamādo amatapadanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kosambiṃ upanissāya ghositārāme viharanto sāmāvatippamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ itthisatānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:571_1: māgaṇḍiyappamukhānañca etissā pañcannaṃ ñātisatānaṃ maraṇabyasanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:572_2: veṭhadīpakaraṭṭhe veṭhadīpakarājā nāmāti ime dve daharakālato paṭṭhāya sahāyakā hutvā ekācariyakule sippaṃ
atk-s0502a:572_3: uggaṇhitvā attano attano pitūnaṃ accayena chattaṃ ussāpetvā āyāmena dasadasayojanike raṭṭhe rājāno ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:572_4: Te kālena kālaṃ samāgantvā ekato tiṭṭhantā nisīdantā nipajjantā mahājanaṃ jāyamānañca jīyamānañca mīyamānañca
atk-s0502a:572_9: pabbajissāmā”ti mantetvā rajjāni puttadārānaṃ niyyādetvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantappadese vasantā mantayiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:572_12: Te mayaṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasantā apabbajitasadisāyeva homa,
atk-s0502a:572_19: tvaṃ pana tava pabbate aggiṃ jāleyyāsi,
atk-s0502a:573_0: Atha aparabhāge veṭhadīpakatāpaso kālaṃ katvā mahesakkho devarājā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0502a:573_1: Tato aḍḍhamāse sampatte aggiṃ adisvāva itaro “sahāyako me kālakato”ti aññāsi.
atk-s0502a:573_2: Itaropi nibbattakkhaṇeyeva attano devasiriṃ oloketvā kammaṃ upadhārento nikkhamanato paṭṭhāya attano
atk-s0502a:573_3: tapacariyaṃ disvā “gantvā mama sahāyakaṃ passissāmī”ti taṃ attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā maggikapuriso viya tassa
atk-s0502a:573_22: Api nu kho ayyānaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne vasantānaṃ koci upaddavo atthī”ti? “Āma, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:573_27: svāhaṃ laṇḍaṃ chaḍḍento paṃsuṃ samaṃ karonto kilamāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:573_30: “Tena hi tesaṃ anāgamanaṃ karissāmī”ti tāpasassa hatthikantavīṇañceva hatthikantamantañca adāsi.
atk-s0502a:573_31: Dadanto ca pana vīṇāya tisso tantiyo dassetvā tayo mante uggaṇhāpetvā “imaṃ tantiṃ paharitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:573_32: mante vutte nivattitvā oloketumpi asakkontā hatthī palāyanti,
atk-s0502a:573_33: imaṃ tantiṃ paharitvā imasmiṃ mante vutte nivattitvā pacchato olokentā olokentā palāyanti,
atk-s0502a:573_34: imaṃ tantiṃ paharitvā imasmiṃ mante vutte hatthiyūthapati piṭṭhiṃ upanāmento āgacchatī”ti ācikkhitvā,
atk-s0502a:573_36: taṃ kareyyāthā”ti vatvā tāpasaṃ vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:573_37: Tāpaso palāyanamantaṃ vatvā palāyanatantiṃ paharitvā hatthī palāpetvā vasi.
atk-s0502a:574_0: Tasmiṃ samaye kosambiyaṃ pūrantappo nāma rājā hoti.
atk-s0502a:574_1: So ekadivasaṃ gabbhiniyā deviyā saddhiṃ bālasūriyatapaṃ tappamāno abbhokāsatale nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:574_2: Devī rañño pārupanaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ rattakambalaṃ pārupitvā nisinnā raññā saddhiṃ samullapamānā
atk-s0502a:574_3: rañño aṅgulito satasahassagghanikaṃ rājamuddikaṃ nīharitvā attano aṅguliyaṃ pilandhi.
atk-s0502a:574_4: Tasmiṃ samaye hatthiliṅgasakuṇo ākāsena gacchanto dūrato rattakambalapārupanaṃ deviṃ disvā “maṃsapesī”ti saññāya pakkhe vissajjetvā otari.
atk-s0502a:574_5: Rājā tassa otaraṇasaddena bhīto uṭṭhāya antonivesanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:574_6: Devī garugabbhatāya ceva bhīrukajātikatāya ca vegena gantuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:574_7: Atha naṃ so sakuṇo ajjhappatto nakhapañjare nisīdāpetvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:574_8: Te kira sakuṇā pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhārenti.
atk-s0502a:574_9: Tasmā ākāsena netvā yathārucitaṭṭhāne nisīditvā maṃsaṃ khādanti.
atk-s0502a:574_14: Evaṃ sante saha gabbhena jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇissāmi,
atk-s0502a:574_15: yasmiṃ pana ṭhāne nisīditvā maṃ khādituṃ ārabhissati,
atk-s0502a:575_0: Tadā ca himavantapadese thokaṃ vaḍḍhitvā maṇḍapākārena ṭhito eko mahānigrodho hoti.
atk-s0502a:575_1: So sakuṇo migarūpādīni tattha netvā khādati,
atk-s0502a:575_2: tasmā tampi tattheva netvā viṭapabbhantare ṭhapetvā āgatamaggaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0502a:575_5: “idāni imaṃ palāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ubho hatthe ukkhipitvā pāṇisaddañceva mukhasaddañca katvā taṃ palāpesi.
atk-s0502a:575_9: ayye”ti vacanamattampi alabhamānāya dukkhaparetāya sabbarattiṃ niddā nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:575_10: Vibhātāya pana rattiyā valāhakavigamo ca aruṇuggamanañca tassā gabbhavuṭṭhānañca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.
atk-s0502a:575_11: Sā meghautuñca pabbatautuñca aruṇautuñca gahetvā jātattā puttassa utenoti nāmaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:576_0: Allakappatāpasassapi kho tato avidūre vasanaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a:576_1: So pakatiyāva vassadivase sītabhayena phalāphalatthāya vanaṃ na pavisati,
atk-s0502a:576_2: taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ gantvā sakuṇehi khāditamaṃsānaṃ aṭṭhiṃ āharitvā koṭṭetvā rasaṃ katvā pivati.
atk-s0502a:576_3: Tasmā taṃ divasaṃ “aṭṭhiṃ āharissāmī”ti tattha gantvā rukkhamūle aṭṭhiṃ pariyesento upari dārakasaddaṃ
atk-s0502a:576_4: sutvā ullokento deviṃ disvā “kāsi tva”nti vatvā “mānusitthimhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:576_14: So ekena passena abhiruhanamaggaṃ katvā abhiruhitvā dārakaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:576_15: “Mā maṃ hatthena chupī”ti ca vutte taṃ achupitvāva dārakaṃ otāresi.
atk-s0502a:576_17: Atha naṃ assamapadaṃ netvā sīlabhedaṃ akatvāva anukampāya paṭijaggi,
atk-s0502a:576_18: nimmakkhikamadhuṃ āharitvā sayaṃjātasāliṃ āharitvā yāguṃ pacitvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:576_19: Evaṃ tasmiṃ paṭijaggante sā aparabhāge cintesi –
atk-s0502a:576_23: Sace panāyaṃ amhe pahāya katthaci gamissati,
atk-s0502a:576_25: yaṃkiñci katvā imassa sīlaṃ bhinditvā yathā maṃ na muñcati,
atk-s0502a:576_27: Atha naṃ dunnivatthaduppārutadassanena palobhetvā sīlavināsaṃ pāpesi.
atk-s0502a:577_0: Athekadivasaṃ tāpaso nakkhattayogaṃ ullokento pūrantappassa nakkhattamilāyanaṃ disvā “bhadde kosambiyaṃ pūrantapparājā mato”ti āha. “Kasmā, ayya,
atk-s0502a:577_2: Kiṃ te tena saddhiṃ āghāto atthī”ti? “Natthi, bhadde,
atk-s0502a:577_5: Atha naṃ “kasmā rodasī”ti pucchitvā tāya tassa attano sāmikabhāve akkhāte āha – “mā, bhadde, rodi,
atk-s0502a:577_11: Idāni mahājāniko vata jāto’ti sokena rodāmi, ayyā”ti. “Hotu, bhadde,
atk-s0502a:577_16: Tadā anekāni hatthisahassāni āgantvā vaṭarukkhamūle nisīdanti.
atk-s0502a:577_18: “hatthīsu anāgatesuyeva rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā tesu āgatesu imaṃ mantaṃ vatvā imaṃ tantiṃ pahara,
atk-s0502a:577_21: So tathā katvā āgantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:577_23: “ajja imaṃ mantaṃ vatvā imaṃ tantiṃ pahareyyāsi,
atk-s0502a:577_27: “ajja imaṃ mantaṃ vatvā imaṃ tantiṃ pahareyyāsi,
atk-s0502a:578_5: maṃ sagabbhaṃ hatthiliṅgasakuṇo ānesī”ti vatvā senāpatiādīnaṃ nāmāni ācikkhitvā “asaddahantānaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0502a:578_6: pitu pārupanakambalañceva pilandhanamuddikañca dasseyyāsī”ti vatvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:578_8: “Rukkhassa heṭṭhimasākhāya nisīditvā imaṃ mantaṃ vatvā imaṃ tantiṃ pahara,
atk-s0502a:578_10: tassa piṭṭhiyaṃ nisinnova raṭṭhaṃ gantvā rajjaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:578_11: So mātāpitaro vanditvā tathā katvā āgatassa hatthino piṭṭhiyaṃ nisīditvā kaṇṇe mantayi –
atk-s0502a:578_13: pettikaṃ me rajjaṃ gaṇhitvā dehi sāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:578_14: So taṃ sutvā “anekāni hatthisahassāni sannipatantū”ti hatthiravaṃ ravi,
atk-s0502a:578_20: So anekehi yūthahatthisahasseheva parivuto paccantagāmaṃ patvā “ahaṃ rañño putto,
atk-s0502a:578_21: sampattiṃ patthayamānā mayā saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:578_22: “Tato paṭṭhāya manussānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karonto gantvā nagaraṃ parivāretvā ‘yuddhaṃ vā me detu,
atk-s0502a:578_27: tassā atthibhāvaṃ vā natthibhāvaṃ vā mayaṃ na jānāma.
atk-s0502a:578_32: Tato kumāro “ahaṃ tassā putto”ti vatvā senāpatiādīnaṃ nāmāni kathetvā tathāpi asaddahantānaṃ kambalañca muddikañca dassesi.
atk-s0502a:578_33: Te kambalañca muddikañca sañjānitvā nikkaṅkhā hutvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā taṃ rajje abhisiñciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:579_0: Allakapparaṭṭhe pana dubbhikkhe jīvituṃ asakkonto eko kotuhaliko nāma manusso kāpiṃ nāma taruṇaputtañca
atk-s0502a:579_1: kāḷiṃ nāma bhariyañca ādāya “kosambiṃ gantvā jīvissāmī”ti pātheyyaṃ gahetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:579_3: Te gacchantā pātheyye parikkhīṇe khudābhibhūtā dārakaṃ vahituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:579_12: Mātā attano vāre pupphadāmaṃ viya naṃ ukkhipitvā ure nipajjāpetvā aṅkena vahitvā pituno deti.
atk-s0502a:579_13: Tassa taṃ gahetvā gamanakāle chātakatopi balavatarā vedanā uppajji.
atk-s0502a:579_18: Dārako vārena parivattiyamāno kilanto pitu hatthe niddāyi.
atk-s0502a:579_19: So tassa niddāyanabhāvaṃ ñatvā mātaraṃ purato katvā ekassa gacchassa heṭṭhā paṇṇasanthare taṃ nipajjāpetvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:579_25: ānehi me putta”nti uraṃ paharitvā paridevi.
atk-s0502a:579_28: Iti so ettake ṭhāne puttaṃ chaḍḍetvā tassa nissandena bhavantare satta vāre chaḍḍito.
atk-s0502a:580_2: Gopālakassa gehe nibaddhaṃ eko paccekabuddho bhuñjati.
atk-s0502a:580_6: “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchitvā sabbaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā mudujātiko kulaputto tesu anukampaṃ katvā bahukena sappinā pāyāsaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:580_10: yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjāhī”ti sappiñca dadhiñca tadabhimukhaññeva katvā attanā mandasappinā thokameva bhuñji.
atk-s0502a:580_11: Itaro bahuṃ bhuñjitvā sattaṭṭhadivase chātatāya āhārataṇhaṃ chindituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:580_12: Gopālako tesaṃ pāyāsaṃ dāpetvā sayaṃ bhuñjituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:580_13: Kotuhaliko taṃ olokento nisīditvā heṭṭhāpīṭhe nipannāya sunakhiyā gopālakena vaḍḍhetvā diyyamānaṃ pāyāsapiṇḍaṃ disvā “puññā vatāyaṃ sunakhī,
atk-s0502a:580_15: So rattibhāge taṃ pāyāsaṃ jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto kālaṃ katvā tassā sunakhiyā kucchimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:581_0: Athassa bhariyā sarīrakiccaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva gehe bhatiṃ katvā taṇḍulanāḷiṃ labhitvā pacitvā paccekabuddhassa patte patiṭṭhāpetvā,
atk-s0502a:581_6: devasikaṃ vandantī veyyāvaccaṃ karontī cittaṃ pasādentī bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:581_8: Sāpi sunakhī chaṭṭhe vā sattame vā māse ekameva kukkuraṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0502a:581_11: Athassa paccekabuddho bhuñjanto nibaddhaṃ ekaṃ bhattapiṇḍaṃ deti.
atk-s0502a:581_13: Gopālakopi nibaddhaṃ dve vāre paccekabuddhassupaṭṭhānaṃ yāti.
atk-s0502a:581_14: Gacchantopi antarāmagge vāḷamigaṭṭhāne daṇḍena gacche ca bhūmiñca paharitvā “susū”ti tikkhattuṃ saddaṃ katvā vāḷamige palāpeti.
atk-s0502a:582_6: So ekavacaneneva pakkhanditvā sāmikassa gacchapothanabhūmipothanaṭṭhāne tikkhattuṃ bhussitvā tena saddena
atk-s0502a:582_7: vāḷamigānaṃ palātabhāvaṃ ñatvā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā paṇṇasālaṃ pavisitvā nisinnassa paccekabuddhassa
atk-s0502a:582_8: vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṇṇasāladvāre tikkhattuṃ bhussitvā attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā ekamante nipajjati,
atk-s0502a:582_9: paccekabuddhe velaṃ sallakkhetvā nikkhante bhussanto purato gacchati.
atk-s0502a:582_10: Antarantarā paccekabuddho taṃ vīmaṃsanto aññaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjati.
atk-s0502a:582_11: Athassa purato tiriyaṃ ṭhatvā bhussitvā itaramaggameva naṃ āropeti.
atk-s0502a:582_12: Athekadivasaṃ aññaṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjitvā tena purato tiriyaṃ ṭhatvā vāriyamānopi anivattitvā sunakhaṃ pādena paharitvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:582_13: Sunakho tassa anivattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā nivāsanakaṇṇe ḍaṃsitvā ākaḍḍhanto itaramaggameva naṃ āropesi.
atk-s0502a:583_10: upāsakā”ti gopālakaṃ nivattāpetvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā gandhamādanābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:583_11: Sunakhassa taṃ ākāsena gacchantaṃ disvā bhukkaritvā ṭhitassa tasmiṃ cakkhupathaṃ vijahante hadayaṃ phalitvā mato.
atk-s0502a:583_12: Tiracchānā kira nāmete ujujātikā honti akuṭilā.
atk-s0502a:584_0: Iti so tāya ujucittatāya akuṭilatāya kālaṃ katvā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatto accharāsahassaparivuto mahāsampattiṃ anubhosi.
atk-s0502a:584_1: Tassa kaṇṇamūle mantayantassa saddo soḷasayojanaṭṭhānaṃ pharati,
atk-s0502a:584_2: pakatikathāsaddo pana sakalaṃ dasayojanasahassaṃ devanagaraṃ chādeti.
atk-s0502a:584_6: So tattha na ciraṃ ṭhatvā cavi.
atk-s0502a:584_7: Devalokato hi devaputtā āyukkhayena puññakkhayena āhārakkhayena kopenāti catūhi kāraṇehi cavanti.
atk-s0502a:585_0: Tattha yena bahuṃ puññakammaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:585_1: so devaloke uppajjitvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā uparūpari nibbattati.
atk-s0502a:585_4: tassa rājakoṭṭhāgāre pakkhittaṃ ticatunāḷimattaṃ dhaññaṃ viya antarāva taṃ puññaṃkhīyati,
atk-s0502a:585_7: Aparopi kāmaguṇe paribhuñjamāno satisammosena āhāraṃ aparibhuñjitvā kilantakāyo kālaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:585_9: Aparopi parassa sampattiṃ asahanto kujjhitvā kālaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:586_0: Ayaṃ pana kāmaguṇe paribhuñjanto muṭṭhassati hutvā āhārakkhayena cavi,
atk-s0502a:586_1: cavitvā ca pana kosambiyaṃ nagarasobhiniyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:586_4: imaṃ dārakaṃ kattarasuppe āropetvā saṅkārakūṭe chaḍḍehī”ti chaḍḍāpesi.
atk-s0502a:586_9: Paccekabuddhe sinehappabhavassa bhukkaraṇassa nissandena ekopi upagantuṃ na visahi.
atk-s0502a:586_10: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko manusso bahi nikkhanto taṃ kākasunakhasannipātaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:586_11: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti gantvā dārakaṃ disvā puttasinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā “putto me laddho”ti gehaṃ nesi.
atk-s0502a:586_12: Tadā kosambakaseṭṭhi rājakulaṃ gacchanto rājanivesanato āgacchantaṃ purohitaṃ disvā, “kiṃ, ācariya,
atk-s0502a:586_18: imasmiṃ pana nagare ajja jātadārako jeṭṭhakaseṭṭhi bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:586_20: Tasmā so sīghaṃ gehaṃ purisaṃ pesesi –
atk-s0502a:586_22: jānāhi naṃ vijātā vā, no vā”ti.
atk-s0502a:586_23: “Na vijāyatī”ti sutvā rājānaṃ disvāva vegena gehaṃ gantvā kāḷiṃ nāma dāsiṃ pakkositvā sahassaṃ datvā,
atk-s0502a:586_25: imasmiṃ nagare upadhāretvā sahassaṃ datvā ajja jātadārakaṃ gaṇhitvā ehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:586_26: Sā upadhārentī taṃ gehaṃ gantvā dārakaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:586_27: “ayaṃ dārako kadā jāto”ti gahapatāniṃ pucchitvā “ajja jāto”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:586_28: “imaṃ mayhaṃ dehī”ti ekakahāpaṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā mūlaṃ vaḍḍhentī sahassaṃ datvā taṃ ānetvā seṭṭhino dassesi.
atk-s0502a:586_30: tāya naṃ saddhiṃ nivesetvā seṭṭhiṭṭhānassa sāmikaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0502a:586_32: māressāmi na”nti cintetvā taṃ gehe kāresi.
atk-s0502a:587_1: Seṭṭhi “imasmiṃ asati mama puttova seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ labhissati,
atk-s0502a:587_2: idāneva taṃ māretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā kāḷiṃ āmantetvā, “gaccha, je,
atk-s0502a:587_3: vajato gunnaṃ nikkhamanavelāya vajadvāramajjhe imaṃ tiriyaṃ nipajjāpehi,
atk-s0502a:587_6: Sā gantvā gopālakena vajadvāre vivaṭamatteyeva taṃ tathā nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0502a:587_7: Gogaṇajeṭṭhako usabho aññasmiṃ kāle sabbapacchā nikkhamantopi taṃ divasaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ nikkhamitvā dārakaṃ catunnaṃ pādānaṃ antare katvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:587_8: Anekasatagāviyo usabhassa dve passāni ghaṃsantiyo nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:587_10: ajja pana sabbapaṭhamaṃ nikkhamitvā vajadvāramajjhe niccalova ṭhito,
atk-s0502a:587_11: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti cintetvā gantvā tassa heṭṭhā nipannaṃ dārakaṃ disvā puttasinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā,
atk-s0502a:588_0: Kāḷī gantvā seṭṭhinā pucchitā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, “gaccha,
atk-s0502a:588_1: naṃ puna sahassaṃ datvā ānehī”ti vuttā sahassaṃ datvā puna ānetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:588_3: kāḷi imasmiṃ nagare pañca sakaṭasatāni paccūsakāle uṭṭhāya vāṇijjāya gacchanti,
atk-s0502a:588_10: Athassa goṇā taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā dhuraṃ chaḍḍesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:588_11: punappunaṃ āropetvā pājiyamānāpi purato na gacchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:588_12: Evaṃ tassa tehi saddhiṃ vāyamantasseva aruṇaṃ uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:588_13: So “kiṃ nāmetaṃ goṇā kariṃsū”ti maggaṃ olokento dārakaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:588_15: “putto me laddho”ti tuṭṭhamānaso taṃ gehaṃ nesi.
atk-s0502a:589_0: Kāḷī gantvā seṭṭhinā pucchitā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā, “gaccha,
atk-s0502a:589_1: naṃ puna sahassaṃ datvā ānehī”ti vuttā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:589_7: Sā taṃ netvā tattha nipajjāpetvā ekamante aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:589_8: Taṃ sunakho vā kāko vā amanusso vā upasaṅkamituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:589_9: “Nanu cassa neva mātā na pitā na bhātikādīsu koci rakkhitā nāma atthi,
atk-s0502a:589_11: Sunakhakāle paccekabuddhe sinehena pavattitabhukkaraṇamattameva taṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0502a:589_12: Atheko ajapālako anekasahassā ajā gocaraṃ nento susānapassena gacchati.
atk-s0502a:589_13: Ekā ajā paṇṇāni khādamānā gacchantaraṃ paviṭṭhā dārakaṃ disvā jaṇṇukehi ṭhatvā dārakassa thanaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a:589_14: ajapālakena “he he”ti sadde katepi na nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:589_15: So “yaṭṭhiyā naṃ paharitvā nīharissāmī”ti gacchantaraṃ paviṭṭho jaṇṇukehi ṭhatvā dārakaṃ khīraṃ pāyantiṃ ajiṃ disvā dārake puttasinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā,
atk-s0502a:590_0: Kāḷī gantvā seṭṭhinā pucchitā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā, “gaccha,
atk-s0502a:590_1: taṃ puna sahassaṃ datvā ānehī”ti vuttā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:590_4: imaṃ ādāya corapapātapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā papāte khipa,
atk-s0502a:590_5: pabbatakucchiyaṃ paṭihaññamāno khaṇḍākhaṇḍiko hutvā bhūmiyaṃ patissati,
atk-s0502a:590_7: Sā taṃ tattha netvā pabbatamatthake ṭhatvā khipi.
atk-s0502a:590_8: Taṃ kho pana pabbatakucchiṃ nissāya mahāveḷugumbo pabbatānusāreneva vaḍḍhi,
atk-s0502a:590_10: Dārako patanto kojavake viya tasmiṃ pati.
atk-s0502a:590_11: Taṃ divasañca naḷakārajeṭṭhakassa veḷubali patto hoti.
atk-s0502a:590_12: So puttena saddhiṃ gantvā taṃ veḷugumbaṃ chindituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:590_14: So “dārakasaddo viyā”ti ekena passena abhiruhitvā taṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:591_0: Kāḷī seṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā tena pucchitā taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhitvā, “gaccha,
atk-s0502a:591_1: naṃ puna sahassaṃ datvā ānehī”ti vuttā tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:591_2: Seṭṭhino idañcidañca karontasseva dārako vaḍḍhito “ghosako”tvevassa nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:591_3: So seṭṭhino akkhimhi kaṇṭako viya khāyi,
atk-s0502a:591_5: Athassa māraṇūpāyaṃ cintento attano sahāyakassa kumbhakārassa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0502a:591_8: “tena hi idaṃ sahassaṃ gahetvā mama ekaṃ kammaṃ karohī”ti āha. “Kiṃ, sāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a:591_11: atha naṃ gahetvā gabbhaṃ pavesetvā tikhiṇāya vāsiyā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chinditvā cāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā āvāpe paceyyāsi,
atk-s0502a:591_13: Uttariṃ pana te kattabbayuttakaṃ pacchā karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:591_16: “hiyyo mayā kumbhakāro ekaṃ kammaṃ āṇatto, ehi,
atk-s0502a:591_17: tvaṃ tassa santikaṃ gantvā evaṃ vadehi –
atk-s0502a:591_18: ‘hiyyo kira me pitarā āṇattaṃ kammaṃ nipphādehī”’ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:591_20: Taṃ tattha gacchantaṃ itaro seṭṭhino putto dārakehi saddhiṃ guḷaṃ kīḷanto disvā taṃ pakkositvā,
atk-s0502a:591_21: “kuhiṃ gacchasi bhātikā”ti pucchitvā “pitu sāsanaṃ gahetvā kumbhakārassa santika”nti vutte “ahaṃ tattha gamissāmi.
atk-s0502a:591_22: Ime maṃ dārakā bahuṃ lakkhaṃ jiniṃsu,
atk-s0502a:592_2: Sopi taṃ “tena hi gantvā kumbhakāraṃ vadehi –
atk-s0502a:592_3: ‘pitarā kira me hiyyo ekaṃ kammaṃ āṇattaṃ,
atk-s0502a:592_5: So tassa santikaṃ gantvā tathā avaca.
atk-s0502a:592_6: Atha naṃ kumbhakāro seṭṭhinā vuttaniyāmeneva māretvā āvāpe khipi.
atk-s0502a:592_7: Ghosakopi divasabhāgaṃ kīḷitvā sāyanhasamaye gehaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tāta,
atk-s0502a:592_8: na gatosī”ti vutte attano agatakāraṇañca kaniṭṭhassa gatakāraṇañca ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:592_9: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhi “ahaṃ dhī”ti mahāviravaṃ viravitvā sakalasarīre pakkuthitalohito viya hutvā, “ambho,
atk-s0502a:592_12: mā maṃ nāsayī”ti bāhā paggayha kandanto tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:592_16: So pabbatena viya mahantena sokena avatthaṭo hutvā anappakaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedesi.
atk-s0502a:601_0: Evaṃ santepi puna naṃ seṭṭhi ujukaṃ oloketuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0502a:601_2: “mama gāmasate āyuttakassa santikaṃ pesetvā māressāmī”ti upāyaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:601_5: evaṃ kate ahaṃ mātulassa kattabbayuttakaṃ pacchā jānissāmī”ti tassa paṇṇaṃ likhitvā,
atk-s0502a:601_8: imaṃ paṇṇaṃ haritvā tassa dehī”ti vatvā paṇṇaṃ tassa dussante bandhi.
atk-s0502a:601_10: Daharakālato paṭṭhāya hi naṃ mārāpentova seṭṭhi māretuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a:601_12: Iti so attano mārāpanapaṇṇameva dussante bandhitvā nikkhamanto āha –
atk-s0502a:601_17: tassa ghare pātarāsaṃ katvā purato gacchāhī”’ti.
atk-s0502a:601_18: So “sādhū”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā nikkhanto taṃ gāmaṃ patvā seṭṭhissa gharaṃ pucchitvā gantvā seṭṭhijāyaṃ passi.
atk-s0502a:601_24: Tassā saha dassaneneva tasmiṃ puttasineho uppajji.
atk-s0502a:601_25: Seṭṭhino panekā dhītā atthi pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikā abhirūpā pāsādikā,
atk-s0502a:601_26: taṃ rakkhituṃ ekameva pesanakārikaṃ dāsiṃ datvā sattabhūmikassa pāsādassa uparimatale sirigabbhe vasāpenti.
atk-s0502a:601_27: Seṭṭhidhītā tasmiṃ khaṇe taṃ dāsiṃ antarāpaṇaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a:601_32: puttassa me pīṭhakaṃ attharitvā pāde dhovitvā telaṃ makkhitvā sayanaṃ attharitvā dehi,
atk-s0502a:602_4: tassa idañcidañca katvā tattha gantvā āgatāmhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:602_5: Seṭṭhidhītāya “seṭṭhiputto ghosako”ti nāmaṃ sutvāva pemaṃ chaviyādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:602_6: Kotuhalakālasmiñhi sā tassa pajāpatī hutvā nāḷikodanaṃ paccekabuddhassa adāsi,
atk-s0502a:602_8: Iti taṃ so pubbasineho avattharitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:604_0: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodake”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:605_5: Sā “kiṃ paṇṇaṃ nu kho eta”nti tasmiṃ niddāyante mātāpitūnaṃ aññavihitatāya apassantānaṃ otaritvā samīpaṃ
atk-s0502a:605_6: gantvā taṃ paṇṇaṃ mocetvā ādāya attano gabbhaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya vātapānaṃ vivaritvā akkharasamaye
atk-s0502a:605_11: natthissa jīvita”nti taṃ paṇṇaṃ phāletvā seṭṭhissa vacanena aparaṃ paṇṇaṃ likhi –
atk-s0502a:605_13: gāmasatato paṇṇākāraṃ āharāpetvā imassa janapadaseṭṭhino dhītarā saddhiṃ maṅgalaṃ katvā attano vasanagāmassa
atk-s0502a:605_14: majjhe dvibhūmakaṃ gehaṃ kāretvā pākāraparikkhepena ceva purisaguttiyā ca susaṃvihitārakkhaṃ karotu,
atk-s0502a:605_16: evaṃ kate ahaṃ mātulassa kattabbayuttakaṃ pacchā jānissāmī”ti,
atk-s0502a:605_17: likhitvā ca pana saṅgharitvā otaritvā dussanteyevassa bandhi.
atk-s0502a:606_0: So divasabhāgaṃ niddāyitvā uṭṭhāya bhuñjitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:606_1: Punadivase pātova taṃ gāmaṃ gantvā āyuttakaṃ gāmakiccaṃ karontaṃyeva passi.
atk-s0502a:606_6: āharā”ti paṇṇaṃ gahetvā vācetvā tuṭṭhamānaso “passatha, bho,
atk-s0502a:606_7: mama sāmino mayi sinehaṃ katvā jeṭṭhaputtassa me maṅgalaṃ karotū”ti mama santikaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:606_8: “Sīghaṃ dāruādīni āharathā”ti gahapatike vatvā gāmamajjhe vuttapakāraṃ gehaṃ kārāpetvā gāmasatato paṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0502a:606_9: āharāpetvā janapadaseṭṭhino santikā dhītaraṃ ānetvā maṅgalaṃ katvā seṭṭhissa sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “idañcidañca
atk-s0502a:607_4: Puttasokena saddhiṃ so soko ekato hutvā kucchiḍāhaṃ uppādetvā atisāraṃ janesi.
atk-s0502a:607_6: mama akathetvā seṭṭhiputtassa paṭhamataraṃ mā kathayitthā”ti jane āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a:607_7: Seṭṭhipi kho “dāni taṃ duṭṭhaputtaṃ mama sāpateyyassa sāmikaṃ na karissāmī”ti cintetvā ekaṃ āyuttakaṃ āha – “mātula,
atk-s0502a:607_9: ekaṃ pādamūlikaṃ pesetvā mama puttaṃ pakkosāpehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:607_10: So “sādhū”ti vatvā paṇṇaṃ datvā ekaṃ purisaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a:607_11: Seṭṭhidhītāpi tassa āgantvā dvāre ṭhitabhāvaṃ sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā, “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:607_14: puttaṃ passituṃ pakkosāpesi, ayye”ti. “Kiṃ, tāta, balavā,
atk-s0502a:607_18: Sā seṭṭhiputtaṃ ajānāpetvāva tassa nivesanañca paribbayañca dāpetvā “mayā pesitakāle gamissasi,
atk-s0502a:607_21: na te mama puttassa santikaṃ pahita”nti? “Pahitaṃ, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:607_30: na te mama puttassa santikaṃ pahita”nti? “Pahitaṃ, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:607_34: Seṭṭhidhītā tatiyavāre āgatampi taṃ pavattiṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:607_39: Seṭṭhidhītā “idāni gantuṃ kālo”ti seṭṭhiputtassa “pitā te kira gilāno”ti ārocetvā “kiṃ vadesi bhadde”ti vutte “aphāsukamassa,
atk-s0502a:607_43: So “sādhū”ti paṇṇākāraṃ āharāpetvā sakaṭehi ādāya pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:608_1: ettakaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gacchantānaṃ papañco bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:608_2: etaṃ nivattāpehī”ti vatvā taṃ sabbaṃ attano kulagehaṃ pesetvā puna taṃ āha – “sāmi,
atk-s0502a:608_5: Gehaṃ pavisamānāyeva ca “gehassa purato ca pacchato ca ārakkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti attano purise āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a:608_6: Paviṭṭhakāle pana seṭṭhiputto pitu pādapasse aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0502a:609_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe seṭṭhi uttānako nipanno hoti.
atk-s0502a:609_1: Āyuttako pana tassa pāde parimajjanto “putto te, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:609_8: upabhogaparibhogabhaṇḍānaṃ pana vanagāmakkhettadvipadacatuppadayānavāhanānañca ayañca ayañca paricchedo”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:609_9: “ahaṃ ettakaṃ dhanaṃ mama puttassa ghosakassa na demī”ti vattukāmo “demī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:609_10: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhidhītā “ayaṃ puna kathento aññaṃ kiñci katheyyā”ti cintetvā sokāturā viya kese vikiritvā rodamānā “kiṃ nāmetaṃ, tāta, vadetha,
