atk-s0502a:1058_28: teneva ime satte vatthukāmehi ceva kilesakāmehi ca atitte eva antako attano vase vattetvā kandante paridevante
atk-s0502a:1062_0: Tattha pupphāni heva pacinantanti pupphārāme mālākāro nānāpupphāni viya attabhāvapaṭibaddhāni ceva upakaraṇapaṭibaddhāni
atk-s0502a:1062_4: Atittaṃyeva kāmesūti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu pariyesanenapi paṭilābhenapi paribhogenapi nidhānenapi atittaṃ eva samānaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1062_5: Antako kurute vasanti maraṇasaṅkhāto antako kandantaṃ paridevantaṃ gahetvā gacchanto attano vasaṃ pāpetīti attho.
atk-s0502a:1063_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā, desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1066_0: Yathāpi bhamaro pupphanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto macchariyakosiyaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1067_0: Rājagahanagarassa kira avidūre sakkāraṃ nāma nigamo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1067_1: Tattheko macchariyakosiyo nāma seṭṭhi asītikoṭivibhavo paṭivasati.
atk-s0502a:1067_2: So tiṇaggena telabindumpi paresaṃ na deti,
atk-s0502a:1067_7: Satthā ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattito vuṭṭhāya sakalalokadhātuyaṃ bodhaneyyabandhave
atk-s0502a:1067_8: olokento pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake vasantassa seṭṭhino sapajāpatikassa sotāpattiphalassa upanissayaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a:1067_9: Tato purimadivase pana so rājānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ rājagehaṃ gantvā rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ katvā āgacchanto ekaṃ chātajjhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1067_10: janapadamanussaṃ kummāsapūraṃ kapallakapūvaṃ khādantaṃ disvā tattha pipāsaṃ uppādetvā attano gharaṃ gantvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a:1067_12: bahū manussā mayā saddhiṃ khāditukāmā bhavissanti,
atk-s0502a:1067_13: evaṃ me bahūni tilataṇḍulasappiphāṇitādīni parikkhayaṃ gamissanti,
atk-s0502a:1067_14: na kassaci kathessāmī”ti taṇhaṃ adhivāsento carati.
atk-s0502a:1067_15: So gacchante gacchante kāle uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto jāto.
atk-s0502a:1067_16: Tato taṇhaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto gabbhaṃ pavisitvā mañcake upagūhitvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a:1067_17: Evaṃ gatopi dhanahānibhayena na kassaci kiñci kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1068_0: Atha naṃ bhariyā upasaṅkamitvā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā, “kiṃ te, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:1068_5: “Atha kiṃ te puttadhītāhi vā dāsakammakarādīhi vā kiñci amanāpaṃ kataṃ atthī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1068_8: Evaṃ vuttepi dhanahānibhayena kiñci avatvā nissaddova nipajji,
atk-s0502a:1068_10: sāmi kismiñci te taṇhā atthī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1068_11: So vacanaṃ parigilanto viya “atthi me taṇhā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1068_23: “Tena hi te puttadāramattasseva pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1068_25: “Kiṃ pana tuyhañca mayhañca pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1068_27: “Tena hi ekakasseva te pahonakaṃ katvā pacāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1068_29: Sakalataṇḍule ṭhapetvā bhinnataṇḍule ca uddhanakapallāni ca ādāya thokaṃ khīrasappimadhuphāṇitañca gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1068_32: Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā gahetabbaṃ gāhāpetvā pāsādaṃ abhiruyha dāsiyo vissajjetvā seṭṭhiṃ pakkosāpesi,
atk-s0502a:1068_33: so ādito paṭṭhāya dvārāni pidahanto sabbadvāresu sūcighaṭikaṃ datvā sattamatalaṃ abhiruhitvā tatthapi dvāraṃ pidahitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1068_34: Bhariyāpissa uddhane aggiṃ jāletvā kapallaṃ āropetvā pūve pacituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:1069_2: rājagahassa avidūre sakkāranigame macchariyaseṭṭhi ‘kapallakapūve khādissāmī’ti aññesaṃ dassanabhayena sattabhūmike pāsāde kapallakapūve pacāpeti,
atk-s0502a:1069_3: tvaṃ tattha gantvā seṭṭhiṃ dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā ubhopi jāyampatike pūve ca khīrasappimadhuphāṇitāni ca gāhāpetvā attano balena jetavanaṃ ānehi,
atk-s0502a:1069_4: ajjāhaṃ pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vihāre eva nisīdissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1070_1: bhante”ti satthu vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā tāvadeva iddhibalena taṃ nigamaṃ gantvā tassa pāsādassa sīhapañjaradvāre
atk-s0502a:1070_2: sunivattho supāruto ākāse eva maṇirūpakaṃ viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1070_4: So ahaṃ evarūpānaṃyeva dassanabhayena imaṃ ṭhānamāgato,
atk-s0502a:1070_6: So gahetabbagahaṇaṃ apassanto aggimhi pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya dosena taṭataṭāyanto evamāha – “samaṇa,
atk-s0502a:1070_8: ākāse apade padaṃ dassetvā caṅkamantopi neva labhissasī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1070_9: Thero tasmiṃ eva ṭhāne aparāparaṃ caṅkami.
atk-s0502a:1070_11: ākāse pallaṅkena nisīdantopi na labhissasiyevā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1070_14: āgantvā vātapānassa ummāre ṭhitopi na labhissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1070_20: Seṭṭhino akkhīnaṃ sūciyā vijjhanakālo viya ahosi,
atk-s0502a:1070_21: gehajjhāyanabhayena pana “tvaṃ pajjalantopi na labhissasī”ti avatvā “ayaṃ samaṇo suṭṭhu laggo,
atk-s0502a:1070_24: “bhadde ekaṃ khuddakapūvaṃ pacitvā samaṇassa datvā uyyojehi na”nti.
atk-s0502a:1070_25: Sā thokaṃ eva piṭṭhaṃ kapallapātiyaṃ pakkhipi,
atk-s0502a:1070_26: mahāpūvo hutvā sakalapātiṃ pūretvā uddhumāto hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1071_0: Seṭṭhi taṃ disvā “bahuṃ tayā piṭṭhaṃ gahitaṃ bhavissatī”ti sayameva dabbikaṇṇena thokaṃ piṭṭhaṃ gahetvā pakkhipi,
atk-s0502a:1071_6: Tassā pacchito ekaṃ pūvaṃ gaṇhantiyā sabbe ekābaddhā allīyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1071_11: Ubhopi janā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā kaḍḍhantāpi viyojetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu eva.
atk-s0502a:1071_12: Athassa pūvehi saddhiṃ vāyamantasseva sarīrato sedā mucciṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1071_17: Sā pacchiṃ ādāya theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1071_21: atthi yiṭṭha”nti dinnadānādīnaṃ phalaṃ gaganatale puṇṇacandaṃ viya dassesi.
atk-s0502a:1072_1: āgantvā imasmiṃ pallaṅke nisīditvā paribhuñjathā”ti āha. Thero,
atk-s0502a:1072_3: sammāsambuddho ‘pūve khādissāmī’ti pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vihāre nisinno,
atk-s0502a:1072_4: tumhākaṃ ruciyā sati ahaṃ vo nessāmi,
atk-s0502a:1072_5: seṭṭhibhariyaṃ pūve ca khīrādīni ca gaṇhāpetha,
atk-s0502a:1072_11: kālaṃ anatikkamitvā ettakaṃ addhānaṃ kathaṃ gamissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1072_13: tumhākaṃ ruciyā sati ahaṃ vo attano iddhibalena nessāmi,
atk-s0502a:1072_14: tumhākaṃ pāsāde sopānasīsaṃ attano ṭhāne eva bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:1073_0: Thero sopānasīsaṃ tattheva katvā “sopānapādamūlaṃ jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1073_2: Iti thero seṭṭhiñca seṭṭhibhariyañca uparipāsādā heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ otaraṇakālato khippataraṃ jetavanaṃ sampāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1073_3: Te ubhopi satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā kālaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1073_4: Satthā bhattaggaṃ pavisitvā paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0502a:1073_9: Seṭṭhi khīrasappimadhusakkharādīni dadamāno na khayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1073_10: Satthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1073_13: Sakalavihāre bhikkhūnañca vighāsādānañca dinnesupi pariyanto na paññāyateva. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:1073_14: pūvā parikkhayaṃ na gacchantī”ti bhagavato ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1073_16: Atha ne dvārakoṭṭhakassa avidūre pabbhāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1073_18: Mahāseṭṭhi saha bhariyāya bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1073_20: Anumodanāvasāne ubhopi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya satthāraṃ vanditvā dvārakoṭṭhake sopānaṃ āruyha attano pāsādeyeva patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1074_0: Tato paṭṭhāya seṭṭhi asītikoṭidhanaṃ buddhasāsaneyeva vikkiri.
atk-s0502a:1074_4: anupahacca bhoge macchariyaseṭṭhiṃ muhutteneva dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā pūve gāhāpetvā jetavanaṃ ānetvā
atk-s0502a:1074_6: aho mahānubhāvo thero”ti therassa guṇaṃ kathentā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1074_7: Satthā dibbāya sotadhātuyā kathaṃ sutvā āgantvā,
atk-s0502a:1074_15: kulaṃ akilametvā aviheṭhetvā pupphato reṇuṃ gaṇhantena bhamarena viya upasaṅkamitvā buddhaguṇaṃ jānāpetabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1074_16: tādiso mama putto moggallāno”ti theraṃ pasaṃsitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1077_0: Paleti rasamādāya, evaṃ gāme munī care”ti.
atk-s0502a:1078_1: Pupphanti pupphārāme caranto pupphañca vaṇṇañca gandhañca aheṭhayanto avināsento vicaratīti attho.
atk-s0502a:1078_2: Paletīti evaṃ caritvā yāvadatthaṃ rasaṃ pivitvā aparampi madhukaraṇatthāya ādāya paleti,
atk-s0502a:1078_3: so evaṃ vanagahanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā ekasmiṃ rukkhasusire taṃ rajamissakaṃ rasaṃ ṭhapetvā anupubbena madhurarasaṃ madhuṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:1078_4: na tassa pupphārāme vicaritapaccayā pupphaṃ vā vaṇṇagandhaṃ vāssa vigacchati,
atk-s0502a:1078_6: Evaṃ gāme munī careti evaṃ sekhāsekhabhedo anāgāriyamuni kulapaṭipāṭiyā gāme bhikkhaṃ gaṇhanto vicaratīti attho.
atk-s0502a:1078_7: Na hi tassa gāme caraṇapaccayā kulānaṃ saddhāhāni vā bhogahāni vā honti.
atk-s0502a:1078_9: Evaṃ caritvā ca pana nikkhamitvā sekhamuni tāva bahigāme udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā nisinno
atk-s0502a:1078_11: vanasaṇḍaṃ anupavisitvā ajjhattikakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasanto cattāro magge,
atk-s0502a:1080_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ vatvā uttaripi therassa guṇaṃ pakāsetuṃ “na,
atk-s0502a:1080_3: pubbepi naṃ dametvā kammaphalasambandhaṃ jānāpesi evā”ti vatvā imamatthaṃ pakāsento atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:1082_0: Ubhinnaṃ piḷakā jātā, nāhaṃ passāmi illisa”nti. –
atk-s0502a:1086_0: Na paresaṃ vilomānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto pāveyyaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1087_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekā gahapatānī puttaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā pāveyyaṃ nāma ājīvakaṃ paṭijaggi.
atk-s0502a:1087_1: Tassānantaragharesu manussā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā āgantvā,
atk-s0502a:1087_2: “aho acchariyā buddhānaṃ dhammadesanā”ti nānappakārehi buddhaguṇe vaṇṇenti.
atk-s0502a:1087_3: Sā buddhānaṃ guṇakathaṃ sutvā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sotukāmā ājīvakassa etamatthaṃ kathetvā,
atk-s0502a:1087_6: So “mā gacchāhī”ti nivāretvā taṃ punappunaṃ yācamānampi nivāresi eva.
atk-s0502a:1087_7: Sā “ayaṃ mama vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ sotuṃ na deti,
atk-s0502a:1087_8: satthāraṃ nimantetvā idheva dhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti sāyanhasamaye puttaṃ pakkositvā, “gaccha, tāta,
atk-s0502a:1087_10: So gacchanto paṭhamataraṃ ājīvakassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1087_21: “amhākaṃ gehaṃ asukaṭṭhāne vā asukavīthiyaṃ vā asukamaggena vā gantabba”nti mā ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a:1087_22: “Santike ṭhito viya aññena maggena gacchanto viya palāyitvā ehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1087_23: So ājīvakassa vacanaṃ sutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā nimantetvā ājīvakena vuttaniyāmeneva sabbaṃ katvā tassa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0502a:1087_28: tassa sakkāraṃ ubhopi khādissāmā”ti vatvā punadivase ājīvako pātova taṃ gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1088_0: Paṭivissakamanussā taṃ gehaṃ allagomayena upalimpitvā lājapañcamāni pupphāni vikiritvā satthu nisīdanatthāya mahārahaṃ āsanaṃ paññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1088_1: Buddhehi saddhiṃ aparicitamanussā hi āsanapaññattiṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0502a:1088_3: bodhimūle dasasahassisokadhātuṃ kampetvā sambodhiṃ pattadivaseyeva hi nesaṃ “ayaṃ maggo nirayaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0502a:1088_10: Tasmā satthā pātova pattacīvaramādāya mahāupāsikāya gehadvāraṃ gato.
atk-s0502a:1088_11: Sā gehā nikkhamitvā satthāraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā antonivesanaṃ pavesetvā āsane nisīdāpetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1088_13: Upāsikā katabhattakiccassa satthuno anumodanaṃ kāretukāmā pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:1088_17: Ājīvakopi pacchāgabbhe nisinnova tassā sādhukāraṃ datvā dhammaṃ suṇantiyā saddaṃ sutvā sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:1088_19: etassa evaṃ sakkāraṃ karotī”ti nānappakārena upāsikañca satthārañca akkosanto palāyi.
atk-s0502a:1088_20: Upāsikā tassa kathāya lajjitā aññathattaṃ gataṃ cittaṃ desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:1088_21: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ upāsike cittaṃ desanānugataṃ kātuṃ na sakkosī”ti? “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:1088_22: etassa me kathāya cittaṃ aññathattaṃ upagata”nti.
atk-s0502a:1088_23: Satthā “evarūpassa visabhāgajanassa kathitaṃ kathaṃ nāma āvajjituṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:1088_24: evarūpaṃ asamannāharitvā attano katākatameva oloketuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1092_0: Tattha na paresaṃ vilomānīti paresaṃ vilomāni pharusāni mammacchedakavacanāni na manasikātabbāni.
atk-s0502a:1092_1: Na paresaṃ katākatanti “asuko upāsako assaddho appasanno,
atk-s0502a:1092_19: na bhāvanārāmatāya ussāhamattampī”ti evaṃ paresaṃ katākataṃ nāma na oloketabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1092_20: Attanova avekkheyyāti “kathaṃ bhūtassa me rattindivā vītivattantīti pabbajitena abhiṇhaṃ paccavekkhitabba”nti
atk-s0502a:1092_21: imaṃ ovādaṃ anussaranto saddhāpabbajito kulaputto “kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ ‘aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti tilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1093_0: Desanāvasāne sā upāsikā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā, desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1096_0: Yathāpi ruciraṃ pupphanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto chattapāṇiupāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1097_0: Sāvatthiyañhi chattapāṇi nāma upāsako tipiṭakadharo anāgāmī.
atk-s0502a:1097_1: So pātova uposathiko hutvā satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1097_7: Evaṃ anāgāmino pakatiyāva ekabhattikā ca brahmacārino ca honti.
atk-s0502a:1097_8: Sopi tatheva uposathiko hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā dhammakathaṃ suṇanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1097_9: Tasmiṃ samaye rājā pasenadi kosalo satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1097_10: Chattapāṇi upāsako taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “uṭṭhātabbaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0502a:1097_13: tassa me padesarājānaṃ disvā uṭṭhātuṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1097_14: rājā kho pana me anuṭṭhahantassa kujjhissati,
atk-s0502a:1097_16: Rājānaṃ disvā uṭṭhahantena hi rājā garukato hoti,
atk-s0502a:1097_19: Paṇḍitapurisā nāma garutarānaṃ santike nisīditvā anuṭṭhahantaṃ disvā na kujjhanti.
atk-s0502a:1097_20: Rājā pana taṃ anuṭṭhahantaṃ disvā kupitamānaso satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1097_23: ayaṃ chattapāṇi upāsako paṇḍito diṭṭhadhammo tipiṭakadharo atthānatthakusalo”ti upāsakassa guṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1097_24: Rañño tassa guṇakathaṃ suṇantasseva cittaṃ mudukaṃ jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1098_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā uparipāsāde ṭhito chattapāṇiṃ upāsakaṃ katabhattakiccaṃ chattamādāya upāhanamāruyha rājaṅgaṇena gacchantaṃ disvā pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1098_1: So chattupāhanaṃ apanetvā rājānamupasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1098_9: “Yadi evaṃ kasmā purimadivase satthu santike nisinno maṃ disvā na uṭṭhahī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1098_12: padesarājānaṃ disvā uṭṭhahanto satthari agāravaṃ pavedeyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1098_15: “Tumhe kira diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ atthānatthānaṃ kusalā tipiṭakadharā amhākaṃ antepure dhammaṃ vācethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1098_21: ‘purimadivase maṃ disvā na uṭṭhitomhī’ti mā kukkuccaṃ karothā”ti. “Deva,
atk-s0502a:1098_25: gacchatha tumhe”ti taṃ uyyojetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ yāci, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1098_26: mallikā ca devī vāsabhakhattiyā ca dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇissāmāti vadanti,
atk-s0502a:1098_27: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nibaddhaṃ mama gehaṃ gantvā tāsaṃ dhammaṃ uddisathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1098_32: Thero nibaddhaṃ gantvā tāsaṃ uddesaṃ uddisati.
atk-s0502a:1098_33: Tāsu mallikā sakkaccaṃ gahetvā sajjhāyitvā uddesaṃ paṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1099_8: Tumhākaṃ pana ñātidhītā neva sakkaccaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a:1099_12: mayā kathitadhammo nāma sakkaccamasuṇantassa aggaṇhantassa asajjhāyantassa adesentassa vaṇṇasampannaṃ agandhakapupphaṃ viya aphalo hoti,
atk-s0502a:1099_13: sakkaccaṃ pana savanādīni karontassa mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso”ti vatvā imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1102_0: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, aphalā hoti akubbato.
atk-s0502a:1105_0: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācā, saphalā hoti kubbato”ti.
atk-s0502a:1106_3: Evaṃ subhāsitā vācāti subhāsitā vācā nāma tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1106_5: Yathā pana agandhakapupphaṃ yo naṃ dhāreti,
atk-s0502a:1106_7: evaṃ etampi yo naṃ sakkaccaṃ savanādīhi na samācarati,
atk-s0502a:1106_8: tassa sakkaccaṃ asamācarantassa yaṃ tattha kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1106_9: taṃ akubbato sutagandhañca vācāgandhañca paṭipattigandhañca na āvahati aphalā hoti.
atk-s0502a:1106_14: Evanti yathā taṃ pupphaṃ dhārentassa sarīre gandho pharati,
atk-s0502a:1106_16: Kubbatoti yo sakkaccaṃ savanādīhi tattha kattabbaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:1107_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1110_0: Yathāpi puppharāsimhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ upanissāya pubbārāme viharanto visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1111_0: Sā kira aṅgaraṭṭhe bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino aggamahesiyā sumanadeviyā kucchismiṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:1111_1: Tassā sattavassikakāle satthā selabrāhmaṇādīnaṃ bodhaneyyabandhavānaṃ upanissayasampadaṃ disvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivāro
atk-s0502a:1112_1: tasmiṃ nagare pañcannaṃ mahāpuññānaṃ jeṭṭhako hutvā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:1112_8: bimbisārarañño pana vijite pañca amitabhogā nāma ahesuṃ – jotiko, jaṭilo, meṇḍako, puṇṇako,
atk-s0502a:1112_10: Tesu ayaṃ meṇḍakaseṭṭhi dasabalassa attano nagaraṃ sampattabhāvaṃ ñatvā puttassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino dhītaraṃ visākhaṃ dārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā āha – “amma,
atk-s0502a:1112_13: tava parivārehi pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ pañca rathasatāni āruyha pañcahi dāsisatehi parivutā dasabalassa paccuggamanaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1112_15: Kāraṇākāraṇesu pana kusalattā yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi,
atk-s0502a:1112_16: yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikāva satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1112_18: Sā desanāvasāne pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:1112_19: Meṇḍakaseṭṭhipi kho satthāramupasaṅkamitvā dhammakathaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya svātanāya nimantetvā
atk-s0502a:1112_20: punadivase attano nivesane paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā
atk-s0502a:1113_0: Tena kho pana samayena bimbisāro ca pasenadi kosalo ca aññamaññaṃ bhaginipatikā honti.
atk-s0502a:1113_4: yaṃnūnāhaṃ bimbisārassa santikaṃ gantvā ekaṃ mahāpuññaṃ yāceyya”nti.
atk-s0502a:1113_5: So tattha gantvā raññā katapaṭisanthāro “kiṃ kāraṇā āgatosī”ti puṭṭho “‘tumhākaṃ vijite pañca amitabhogā mahāpuññā vasanti,
atk-s0502a:1113_10: Rājā amaccehi saddhiṃ mantetvā “jotikādīnaṃ mahākulānaṃ cālanaṃ nāma mahāpathaviyā cālanasadisaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1113_12: tena saddhiṃ mantetvā paṭivacanaṃ te dassāmī”ti vatvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā, tāta,
atk-s0502a:1113_20: So taṃ ādāya sabbattha ekarattivāsena gacchanto ekaṃ phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ patvā nivāsaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a:1113_30: Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne nagaraṃ māpetvā tassa datvā agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1113_31: Tasmiṃ padese sayaṃ vasanaṭṭhānassa gahitattā nagarassa sāketantveva nāmaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1114_0: Sāvatthiyampi kho migāraseṭṭhino putto puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumāro nāma vayappatto ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1114_6: So punappunaṃ vuccamāno “tena hi pañcakalyāṇasamannāgataṃ dārikaṃ labhamāno tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ karissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1114_13: Mahāpuññāya hi itthiyā kesā morakalāpasadisā hutvā muñcitvā vissaṭṭhā nivāsanantaṃ paharitvā nivattitvā uddhaggā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0502a:1114_15: dantāvaraṇaṃ bimbaphalasadisaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ samaṃ suphusitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:1114_17: dantā sukkā samā aviraḷā ussāpetvā ṭhapitavajirapanti viya samacchinnasaṅkhapanti viya ca sobhanti,
atk-s0502a:1114_19: kāḷiyā cuṇṇakādīhi avilitto eva chavivaṇṇo siniddho nīluppaladāmasadiso hoti,
atk-s0502a:1114_22: dasakkhattuṃ vijātāpi kho pana sakiṃ vijātā viya avigatayobbanāyeva hoti,
atk-s0502a:1114_24: Athassa mātāpitaro aṭṭhuttarasatabrāhmaṇe nimantetvā bhojetvā “pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā itthiyo nāma hontī”ti pucchiṃsu. “Āma, hontī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1114_25: “Tena hi evarūpaṃ dārikaṃ pariyesituṃ aṭṭha janā gacchantū”ti bahuṃ dhanaṃ datvā “āgatakāle vo kattabbaṃ jānissāma,
atk-s0502a:1114_28: diṭṭhakāle ca imaṃ pilandhanaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇamālaṃ datvā uyyojesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1115_0: Te mahantamahantāni nagarāni gantvā pariyesamānā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgataṃ dārikaṃ adisvā nivattitvā āgacchantā
atk-s0502a:1115_3: Tasmiṃ pana nagare anusaṃvaccharaṃ vivaṭanakkhattaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a:1115_4: Tadā bahi anikkhamanakulānipi parivārena saddhiṃ gehā nikkhamitvā appaṭicchannena sarīrena padasāva nadītīraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:1115_5: Tasmiṃ divase khattiyamahāsālādīnaṃ puttāpi “attano samānajātikaṃ manāpaṃ kuladārikaṃ disvā mālāguḷena
atk-s0502a:1115_6: parikkhipissāmā”ti taṃ taṃ maggaṃ nissāya tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0502a:1115_7: Tepi kho brāhmaṇā nadītīre ekaṃ sālaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1115_8: “Tasmiṃ khaṇe visākhā pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikā hutvā sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitā pañcahi kumārikāsatehi
atk-s0502a:1115_9: parivutā nadiṃ gantvā nhāyissāmī”ti taṃ padesaṃ pattā,
atk-s0502a:1115_11: Pañcasatā kumārikāyo vegena gantvā sālaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1115_12: Brāhmaṇā olokentā tāsu ekampi pañcakalyāṇasamannāgataṃ na passiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1115_15: Brāhmaṇā tassā cattāri kalyāṇāni disvā dante passitukāmā “alasajātikā amhākaṃ dhītā,
atk-s0502a:1115_16: etissā sāmiko kañjikamattampi na labhissati maññe”ti aññamaññaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1115_20: Madhuro hi tassā saddo kaṃsatāḷasaro viya niccharati.
atk-s0502a:1115_21: Atha ne puna madhurasaddena “kiṃ kāraṇā bhaṇathā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1115_22: “Tava parivāritthiyo vatthālaṅkāre atemetvā vegena sālaṃ paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a:1115_23: tuyhaṃ ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ vegena āgamanamattampi natthi,
atk-s0502a:1116_3: kāraṇaṃ pana sallakkhetvā javena nāgatāmhī”ti. “Kiṃ, ammā”ti? “Tātā,
atk-s0502a:1116_6: “Katame cattāro janā javamānā na sobhanti, ammā”ti? Tātā,
atk-s0502a:1116_7: abhisittarājā tāva sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito kacchaṃ bandhitvā rājaṅgaṇe javamāno na sobhati,
atk-s0502a:1116_8: “kiṃ ayaṃ rājā gahapatiko viya dhāvatī”ti aññadatthu garahaṃ labhati,
atk-s0502a:1116_10: Rañño maṅgalahatthīpi alaṅkato javamāno na sobhati,
atk-s0502a:1116_13: “kiṃ ayaṃ samaṇo gihī viya dhāvatī”ti kevalaṃ garahameva labhati,
atk-s0502a:1116_16: “kiṃ esā itthī puriso viya dhāvatī”ti garahitabbāva hoti,
atk-s0502a:1116_17: “ime cattāro janā javamānā na sobhanti, tātā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1116_19: mātāpitaro nāma dhītaraṃ aṅgapaccaṅgāni saṇṭhāpetvā posenti.
atk-s0502a:1116_22: Sace javamānānaṃ nivatthadussakaṇṇe vā akkamitvā bhūmiyaṃ vā pakkhalitvā patitakāle hattho vā pādo vā bhijjeyya,
atk-s0502a:1116_25: Imaṃ kāraṇaṃ sallakkhetvā na dhāvitāmhi, tātā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1117_0: Brāhmaṇā tassā kathanakāle dantasampattiṃ disvā “evarūpā no dantasampatti diṭṭhapubbā”ti tassā sādhukāraṃ datvā, “amma,
atk-s0502a:1117_1: tuyhamevesā anucchavikā”ti vatvā taṃ suvaṇṇamālaṃ pilandhayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1117_9: Sā “samānajātikaṃ no kula”nti adhivāsetvā pitu sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “amhākaṃ rathaṃ pesetū”ti.
atk-s0502a:1117_10: Kiñcāpi hi sā āgamanakāle padasā āgatā,
atk-s0502a:1117_11: suvaṇṇamālāya pana pilandhanakālato paṭṭhāya tathā gantuṃ na labhati,
atk-s0502a:1117_14: chattaṃ vā tālapaṇṇaṃ vā upari karonti,
atk-s0502a:1117_15: tasmimpi asati nivatthasāṭakassa dasantaṃ ukkhipitvā aṃse khipantā gacchanti eva.
atk-s0502a:1117_16: Tassā pana pitā pañca rathasatāni pesesi.
atk-s0502a:1117_29: dārikāya pana ārakkhamattāya laddhakālato paṭṭhāya kiṃ aññena kāraṇenā”ti adhivāsesi.
atk-s0502a:1117_30: So tesaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā ekāhadvīhaṃ vasāpetvā uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:1118_0: Te sāvatthiṃ gantvā migāraseṭṭhissa “laddhā no dārikā”ti ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1118_4: khippameva naṃ ānetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tattha gamanatthaṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1118_5: Rājā “‘mahākulaṃ etaṃ mayā bimbisārassa santikā ānetvā sākete nivesitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1118_6: tassa sammānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī’ti ahampi āgamissāmī”ti āha,
atk-s0502a:1118_10: mahantaṃ rājabalaṃ ettakassa janassa kattabbayuttakaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0502a:1118_14: Migāraseṭṭhi tāva mahante nagare gehagopakamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sesajanaṃ ādāya gantvā aḍḍhayojanamatte ṭhāne ṭhatvā “āgatāmhā”ti sāsanaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:1118_15: Dhanañcayaseṭṭhi bahupaṇṇākāraṃ pesetvā dhītarā saddhiṃ mantesi, “amma,
atk-s0502a:1118_16: sasuro kira te kosalaraññā saddhiṃ āgato,
atk-s0502a:1118_20: Paṇḍitā seṭṭhidhītā vajiraggatikhiṇañāṇā kappasatasahassaṃ patthitapatthanā abhinīhārasampannā “sasurassa me asukagehaṃ paṭijaggatha,
atk-s0502a:1118_22: uparājādīnaṃ asukānī”ti saṃvidahitvā dāsakammakare pakkosāpetvā “ettakā rañño kattabbakiccaṃ karotha,
atk-s0502a:1118_27: “‘Mayaṃ visākhāya maṅgalaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā na kiñci labhimha,
atk-s0502a:1118_28: assarakkhaṇādīni karontā sukhaṃ na vicarimhā’ti keci vattuṃ mā labhiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0502a:1119_0: Taṃ divasameva visākhāya pitā pañcasate suvaṇṇakāre pakkosāpetvā “dhītu me mahālatāpasādhanaṃ nāma karothā”ti rattasuvaṇṇassa nikkhasahassaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1119_2: Rājā katipāhaṃ vasitvāva dhanañcayaseṭṭhissa sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “na sakkā seṭṭhinā amhākaṃ ciraṃ posanaṃ nāma kātuṃ,
atk-s0502a:1119_7: tumhākaṃ balakāyassa yaṃ yaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:1119_10: Tato paṭṭhāya sāketanagaraṃ niccanakkhattaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1119_11: Rājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbesaṃ mālāgandhavatthādīni paṭiyattāneva honti.
atk-s0502a:1119_20: imasmiṃ nagare parijiṇṇā hatthisālādayo ceva parijiṇṇakāni ca gehāni gahetvā pacathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1119_24: dussakoṭṭhāgārāni vivaritvā thūlasāṭakehi vaṭṭiyo katvā telacāṭīsu temetvā bhattaṃ pacathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1120_0: Tasmiṃ pasādhane catasso vajiranāḷiyo upayogaṃ agamaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1120_4: Iti etehi ca aññehi ca ratanehi niṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1120_7: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne muddikā yojetvā katā suvaṇṇamayā gaṇṭhikā honti,
atk-s0502a:1120_15: Tasmiṃ kho pana pasādhane ekaṃ moraṃ kariṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1120_16: tassa dakkhiṇapakkhe rattasuvaṇṇamayāni pañca pattasatāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:1120_23: So visākhāya matthakamajjhe pabbatakūṭe ṭhatvā naccanamayūro viya khāyati.
atk-s0502a:1120_24: Pattanāḷisahassassa saddo dibbasaṅgītaṃ viya pañcaṅgikatūriyaghoso viya ca pavattati.
atk-s0502a:1121_1: Sā kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ cīvarasāṭakaṃ datvā suttampi sūciyopi rajanampi attano santakameva adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1121_2: Tassa cīvaradānassa nissandena imaṃ mahālatāpasādhanaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a:1121_5: Evaṃ mahāseṭṭhi catūhi māsehi dhītu parivacchaṃ katvā tassā deyyadhammaṃ dadamāno kahāpaṇapūrāni pañca sakaṭasatāni adāsi,
atk-s0502a:1121_15: “mama dhītu gataṭṭhāne ‘asukena nāma me attho’ti mā parassa gehadvāraṃ pahiṇī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1121_17: Ekekasmiṃ rathe sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā tisso tisso vaṇṇadāsiyo ṭhapetvā pañca rathasatāni adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1121_18: “Etaṃ nhāpentiyo bhojentiyo alaṅkarontiyo vicarathā”ti diyaḍḍhasahassaparicārikāyo adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1121_22: “gacchatha bhaṇe cūḷavajassa dvāraṃ vivaritvā tīsu gāvutesu tisso bheriyo gahetvā tiṭṭhatha,
atk-s0502a:1121_23: puthulato usabhamatte ṭhāne ubhosu passesu tiṭṭhatha.
atk-s0502a:1121_24: Gāvīnaṃ tato paraṃ gantuṃ mā adattha.
atk-s0502a:1121_27: Te gāvīnaṃ vajato nikkhamitvā gāvutaṃ gatakāle bherisaññaṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1121_32: puthulato usabhamatte ṭhāne gāviyo aññamaññaṃ nighaṃsantiyo aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1122_2: Dvārasmiṃ pidahite visākhāya puññabalena balavagāvo ca dhenuyo ca uppatitvā uppatitvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1122_3: Manussānaṃ vārentānaṃ vārentānameva saṭṭhisahassā balavagāvo ca saṭṭhisahassā dhenuyo ca nikkhantā,
atk-s0502a:1122_4: tattakā balavavacchā tāsaṃ dhenūnaṃ usabhā uppatitvā anubandhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1122_7: Sā kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kikissa rañño sattannaṃ dhītānaṃ kaniṭṭhā saṅghadāsī nāma hutvā vīsatiyā
atk-s0502a:1122_8: bhikkhusahassānaṃ pañcagorasadānaṃ dadamānā therānañca daharānañca sāmaṇerānañca pattaṃ pidahitvā, “alaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1122_11: Evaṃ tassa nissandena vāriyamānāpi gāvo nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1122_12: Seṭṭhinā ettakassa dhanassa dinnakāle seṭṭhibhariyā āha –
atk-s0502a:1122_17: Ahañhi tāya saddhiṃ āgacchamānake gīvāya gahetvā na pahiṇāmi,
atk-s0502a:1122_18: yānaṃ āruyha gamanakāleyeva etāya saddhiṃ gantukāmā gacchantu,
atk-s0502a:1123_0: Atha “sve mama dhītā gamissatī”ti gabbhe nisinno dhītaraṃ samīpe nisīdāpetvā, “amma,
atk-s0502a:1123_1: patikule vasantiyā nāma imañca imañca ācāraṃ rakkhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ovādamadāsi.
atk-s0502a:1123_2: Ayampi migāraseṭṭhi anantaragabbhe nisinno dhanañcayaseṭṭhino ovādaṃ assosi.
atk-s0502a:1124_1: sasurakule vasantiyā nāma antoaggi bahi na nīharitabbo,
atk-s0502a:1125_0: Imaṃ dasavidhaṃ ovādaṃ datvā punadivase sabbā seniyo sannipātetvā rājasenāya majjhe aṭṭha kuṭumbike pāṭibhoge gahetvā,
atk-s0502a:1125_2: tumhehi sodhetabbo”ti vatvā navakoṭiagghanakena mahālatāpasādhanena dhītaraṃ pasādhetvā nhānacuṇṇamūlakaṃ
atk-s0502a:1125_3: catupaṇṇāsakoṭidhanaṃ datvā yānaṃ āropetvā sāketassa sāmantā attano santakesu anurādhapuramattesu cuddasasu
atk-s0502a:1125_7: “amhākaṃ ayyāya gamanakāle kiṃ amhākaṃ idhā”ti cuddasa gāmakā kiñci asesetvā nikkhamiṃsu?
atk-s0502a:1125_8: Dhanañcayaseṭṭhipi rañño ca migāraseṭṭhino ca sakkāraṃ katvā thokaṃ anugantvā tehi saddhiṃ dhītaraṃ uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:1126_0: Migāraseṭṭhipi sabbapacchato yānake nisīditvā gacchanto balakāyaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:1126_11: ko ete posessatī”ti leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi pothetvā palāpetvā sesake “alaṃ amhākaṃ ettakehī”ti gahetvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:1126_16: “paṭicchannayānena me pavisantiyā mahālatāpasādhanassa viseso na paññāyissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1126_17: Sā sakalanagarassa attānaṃ dassentī rathe ṭhatvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1126_20: evarūpā ayaṃ sampatti etissāva anucchavikā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1126_21: Iti sā mahāsampattiyā seṭṭhino gehaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1126_22: Gatadivase cassā sakalanagaravāsino “amhākaṃ dhanañcayaseṭṭhi attano nagaraṃ sampattānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1126_24: Visākhā pahitapahitaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ tasmiṃyeva nagare aññamaññesu kulesu sabbatthakameva dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1126_28: idaṃ mayhaṃ bhaginiyā dethā”ti tesaṃ tesaṃ vayānurūpaṃ piyavacanaṃ vatvā paṇṇākāraṃ pesentī sakalanagaravāsino ñātake viya akāsi.
atk-s0502a:1126_30: Sā dāsīhi daṇḍadīpikā gāhāpetvā tattha gantvā vaḷavaṃ uṇhodakena nhāpetvā telena makkhāpetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1127_0: Migāraseṭṭhipi puttassa āvāhamaṅgalaṃ karonto dhuravihāre vasantampi tathāgataṃ amanasikaritvā dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1127_1: naggasamaṇakesu patiṭṭhitena pemena codiyamāno “mayhaṃ ayyānampi sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti ekadivasaṃ anekasatesu
atk-s0502a:1127_2: navabhājanesu nirudakapāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā pañcasate acelake nimantāpetvā antogehaṃ pavesetvā,
atk-s0502a:1127_5: Sā “arahanto”ti vacanaṃ sutvā sotāpannā ariyasāvikā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā tesaṃ bhojanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā te oloketvā,
atk-s0502a:1127_8: dhī”ti seṭṭhiṃ garahitvā attano vasanaṭṭhānameva gatā.
atk-s0502a:1127_9: Acelakā taṃ disvā sabbe ekappahāreneva seṭṭhiṃ garahiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:1127_12: samaṇassa gotamassa sāvikaṃ mahākāḷakaṇṇiṃ idha pavesesi,
atk-s0502a:1127_14: So “na sakkā mayā imesaṃ vacanamatteneva nikkaḍḍhāpetuṃ,
atk-s0502a:1127_16: daharā nāma jānitvā vā ajānitvā vā kareyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a:1127_17: tumhe tuṇhī hothā”ti te uyyojetvā sayaṃ mahārahe āsane nisīditvā suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ nirudakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0502a:1128_0: Tasmiṃ samaye eko piṇḍapātikatthero piṇḍāya caranto taṃ nivesanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1128_1: Visākhā sasuraṃ bījayamānā ṭhitā taṃ disvā “sasurassa ācikkhituṃ ayutta”nti yathā so theraṃ passati,
atk-s0502a:1128_3: So pana bālo theraṃ disvāpi apassanto viya hutvā adhomukho bhuñjateva.
atk-s0502a:1128_4: Visākhā “theraṃ disvāpi me sasuro saññaṃ na karotī”ti ñatvā,
atk-s0502a:1128_7: So nigaṇṭhehi kathitakāle adhivāsetvāpi “purāṇaṃ khādatī”ti vuttakkhaṇeyeva hatthaṃ apanetvā,
atk-s0502a:1128_10: ayaṃ maṃ evarūpe maṅgalakāle asucikhādakaṃ nāma karotī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1128_11: Tasmiṃ kho pana nivesane sabbepi dāsakammakarā visākhāya santakāva,
atk-s0502a:1128_12: ko naṃ hatthe vā pāde vā gaṇhissati,
atk-s0502a:1128_16: nāhaṃ tumhehi udakatitthato kumbhadāsī viya ānītā,
atk-s0502a:1128_17: dharamānakamātāpitūnaṃ dhītaro nāma na ettakeneva nikkhamanti,
atk-s0502a:1128_18: eteneva me kāraṇena pitā idhāgamanakāle aṭṭha kuṭumbike pakkosāpetvā ‘sace me dhītu doso uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:1128_19: sodheyyāthā’ti vatvā maṃ tesaṃ hatthe ṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a:1129_0: Seṭṭhi “kalyāṇaṃ esā kathetī”ti aṭṭha kuṭumbike pakkosāpetvā,
atk-s0502a:1129_1: “ayaṃ dārikā maṅgalakāle nisīditvā suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ nirudakapāyāsaṃ paribhuñjantaṃ maṃ ‘asucikhādako’ti vadatī”ti āha,
atk-s0502a:1129_5: ekasmiṃ pana piṇḍapātikatthere gharadvāre ṭhite sasuro me appodakaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjanto taṃ na manasikaroti,
atk-s0502a:1129_6: ahaṃ “mayhaṃ sasuro imasmiṃ attabhāve puññaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0502a:1129_15: ayaṃ pana ekadivasaṃ majjhimayāme dāsīparivutā pacchāgehaṃ agamāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1129_18: imasmiṃ pana gehe ājāneyyavaḷavāya vijātāya saññampi akatvā nisīdituṃ nāma ayutta”nti daṇḍadīpikā gāhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1129_19: uṇhodakādīnipi gāhāpetvā dāsīhi saddhiṃ gantvā vaḷavāya vijātaparihāraṃ kārāpesiṃ,
atk-s0502a:1129_22: amhākaṃ dhītā tava gehe dāsīhipi akattabbayuttakaṃ kammaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:1130_2: imissā pana pitā idhāgamanakāle imaṃ ovadanto guyhe paṭicchanne dasa ovāde adāsi,
atk-s0502a:1130_5: Imissā pana pitā “antoaggi bahi na nīharitabbo”ti āha,

atk-s0502a:1168_3: kiṃ nu khvassā pittaṃ vā kupitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1168_9: sā ‘patthitapatthanā me matthakaṃ pattā’ti tuṭṭhamānasā udānaṃ udānentī vicaratī”ti vatvā “kadā pana, bhante,

atk-s0502a:1169_8: tassa aggaupaṭṭhāyikā ekā upāsikā aṭṭha vare yācitvā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā satthāraṃ catūhi paccayehi paṭijaggantī sāyaṃpātaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0502a:1169_9: Tassā ekā sahāyikā tāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ nibaddhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0502a:1169_10: Sā tassā satthārā saddhiṃ vissāsena kathanañca vallabhabhāvañca disvā,
atk-s0502a:1169_11: ‘kiṃ nu kho katvā evaṃ buddhānaṃ vallatā hotī’ti cintetvā satthāraṃ pucchi – ‘bhante,
atk-s0502a:1169_18: bhikkhusatasahassena saddhiṃ sattāhaṃ mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1169_20: Sā sattāhaṃ dānaṃ datvā osānadivase cīvarasāṭake datvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pādamūle nipajjitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1169_21: nāhaṃ imassa dānassa phalena devissariyādīnaṃ aññataraṃ patthemi,
atk-s0502a:1169_22: tumhādisassa panekassa buddhassa santike aṭṭha vare labhitvā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā catūhi paccayehi paṭijaggituṃ
atk-s0502a:1169_24: Satthā “samijjhissati nu kho imissā patthanā”ti anāgataṃ āvajjento kappasatasahassaṃ oloketvā “kappasatasahassapariyosāne
atk-s0502a:1169_26: tadā tvaṃ visākhā nāma upāsikā hutvā tassa santike aṭṭha vare labhitvā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā catūhi paccayehi
atk-s0502a:1169_28: Tassā sā sampatti sveva laddhabbā viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1170_0: Sā yāvatāyukaṃ puññaṃ katvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā devamanussesu saṃsarantī kassapasammāsambuddhakāle
atk-s0502a:1170_1: kikissa kāsirañño sattannaṃ dhītānaṃ kaniṭṭhā saṅghadāsī nāma hutvā parakulaṃ agantvā tāhi jeṭṭhabhaginīhi
atk-s0502a:1170_2: saddhiṃ dīgharattaṃ dānādīni puññāni katvā kassapasammāsambuddhassa pādamūlepi “anāgate tumhādisassa
atk-s0502a:1170_3: buddhassa mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā catupaccayadāyikānaṃ aggā bhaveyya”nti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:1170_4: Sā tato paṭṭhāya pana devamanussesu saṃsarantī imasmiṃ attabhāve meṇḍakaseṭṭhiputtassa dhanañcayaseṭṭhino dhītā hutvā nibbattā.
atk-s0502a:1170_5: Mayhaṃ sāsane bahūni puññāni akāsi. Iti kho,
atk-s0502a:1170_8: patthitapatthanāya pana nipphattiṃ disvā udānaṃ udānetī”ti vatvā satthā dhammaṃ desento,
atk-s0502a:1170_10: yathā nāma cheko mālākāro nānāpupphānaṃ mahantaṃ rāsiṃ katvā nānappakāre mālāguṇe karoti,
atk-s0502a:1170_11: evameva visākhāya nānappakārāni puññāni kātuṃ cittaṃ namatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1173_0: Evaṃ jātena maccena, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti.
atk-s0502a:1174_2: Mālāguṇe bahūti ekato vaṇṭikamālādibhedā nānappakārā mālāvikatiyo.
atk-s0502a:1174_3: Maccenāti maritabbasabhāvatāya “macco”ti laddhanāmena sattena cīvaradānādibhedaṃ bahuṃ kusalaṃ kattabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1174_6: mālākāro ca cheko neva bahū mālāguṇe kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:1174_7: acheko pana appesu bahūsupi pupphesu na sakkotiyeva.
atk-s0502a:1174_8: Bahūsu pana pupphesu sati cheko mālākāro dakkho kusalo bahū mālāguṇe karoti,
atk-s0502a:1174_9: evameva sace ekaccassa saddhā mandā hoti,
atk-s0502a:1174_12: mandāya ca pana saddhāya mandesu ca pana bhogesu na sakkoti.
atk-s0502a:1174_13: Uḷārāya ca pana saddhāya mandesu ca bhogesu na sakkotiyeva.
atk-s0502a:1174_14: Uḷārāya ca pana saddhāya uḷāresu ca bhogesu sati sakkoti.
atk-s0502a:1175_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpannādayo ahesuṃ. Mahājanassa sātthikā dhammadesanā jātāti.

atk-s0502a:1180_0: “Atha kho āyasmā ānando sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,

atk-s0502a:1181_13: kiñci gandhajātaṃ yassa anuvātampi gandho gacchati,

atk-s0502a:1186_1: ‘amukasmiṃ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti,
atk-s0502a:1186_9: anuvātapaṭivātampi gandho gacchatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1195_0: Tattha na pupphagandhoti tāvatiṃsabhavane paricchattakarukkho āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanasatiko,
atk-s0502a:1195_1: tassa pupphānaṃ ābhā paññāsa yojanāni gacchati,
atk-s0502a:1195_4: paṭivātaṃ pana aṭṭhaṅgulamattampi gantuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:1195_7: Tagaramallikā vāti imesampi gandho eva adhippeto.
atk-s0502a:1195_8: Sāragandhānaṃ aggassa hi lohitacandanassāpi tagarassapi mallikāyapi anuvātameva vāyati,
atk-s0502a:1195_10: Satañca gandhoti sappurisānaṃ pana buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ sīlagandho paṭivātameti.
atk-s0502a:1195_12: Sabbā disā sappuriso pavāyati yasmā pana sappuriso sīlagandhena sabbāpi disā ajjhottharitvāva gacchati,
atk-s0502a:1195_13: tasmā “tassa gandho na paṭivātametī”ti na vattabbo.
atk-s0502a:1195_16: Etesanti imesaṃ candanādīnaṃ gandhajātānaṃ gandhato sīlavantānaṃ sappurisānaṃ sīlagandhova anuttaro asadiso apaṭibhāgoti.
atk-s0502a:1196_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1199_0: Appamatto ayaṃ gandhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahākassapattherassa piṇḍapātadānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1200_0: Ekasmiñhi divase thero sattāhaccayena nirodhā vuṭṭhāya “rājagahe sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya carissāmī”ti nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:1200_1: Tasmiṃ pana samaye sakkassa devarañño paricārikā kakuṭapādiniyo pañcasatā accharāyo “therassa piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0502a:1200_2: dassāmā”ti ussāhajātā pañca piṇḍapātasatāni sajjetvā ādāya antarāmagge ṭhatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1200_9: Thero ñatvā puna paṭikkhipitvā punapi apagantuṃ anicchamānā yācantiyo “attano pamāṇaṃ na jānātha,
atk-s0502a:1200_11: Tā therassa accharasaddaṃ sutvā santhambhitvā sammukhā ṭhātuṃ asakkontiyo palāyitvā devalokameva gantvā,
atk-s0502a:1200_13: “‘samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa therassa piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmā’ti gatāmhā, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1200_19: Sakko “tumhādisiyo therassa piṇḍapātaṃ kiṃ dassantī”ti sayaṃ dātukāmo hutvā,
atk-s0502a:1200_20: jarājiṇṇo mahallako khaṇḍadanto palitakeso otaggasarīro mahallakatanta vāyo hutvā sujampi devadhītaraṃ
atk-s0502a:1200_21: tathārūpameva mahallikaṃ katvā ekaṃ pesakāravīthiṃ māpetvā tantaṃ pasārento acchi.
atk-s0502a:1201_0: Theropi “duggatānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti nagarābhimukho gacchanto bahinagare eva taṃ vīthiṃ disvā olokento dve jane addasa.
atk-s0502a:1201_4: “ime mahallakakālepi kammaṃ karontiyeva imasmiṃ nagare imehi duggatatarā natthi maññe,
atk-s0502a:1201_5: imehi dinnaṃ uḷuṅkamattampi sākamattampi gahetvā imesaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1201_7: Sakko taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā sujaṃ āha – “bhadde,
atk-s0502a:1201_9: tvaṃ apassantī viya tuṇhī hutvā nisīda,
atk-s0502a:1201_12: Tepi apassantā viya attano kammameva karontā thokaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1202_0: Atha sakko “gehadvāre eko thero viya ṭhito,
atk-s0502a:1202_3: So gehā nikkhamitvā theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā ubhohi hatthehi jaṇṇukāni olambitvā nitthunanto
atk-s0502a:1202_4: uṭṭhāya “kataro thero nu kho ayyo”ti thokaṃ osakkitvā “akkhīni me dhūmāyantī”ti vatvā nalāṭe hatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1202_6: ayyo no mahākassapatthero cirassaṃ me kuṭidvāraṃ āgato,
atk-s0502a:1202_7: atthi nu kho kiñci gehe”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1202_10: lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti acintetvā saṅgahaṃ no karothā”ti pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:1202_11: Thero “etehi dinnaṃ sākaṃ vā hotu kuṇḍakamuṭṭhi vā,
atk-s0502a:1202_13: So antogharaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭiodanaṃ nāma ghaṭiyā uddharitvā pattaṃ pūretvā therassa hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:1203_6: “bhāriyaṃ te kammaṃ kataṃ duggatānaṃ sampattiṃ vilumpantena,
atk-s0502a:1203_7: ajja mayhaṃ dānaṃ datvā kocideva duggato senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ vā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ vā labheyyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1203_10: “Kiṃ kāraṇā tvaṃ duggato devaloke rajjasiriṃ anubhavanto”ti? “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:1203_12: mayā pana anuppanne buddhe kalyāṇakammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:1203_13: buddhuppāde vattamāne kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā cūḷarathadevaputto mahārathadevaputto anekavaṇṇadevaputtoti
atk-s0502a:1203_14: ime tayo samānadevaputtā mama āsannaṭṭhāne nibbattā,
atk-s0502a:1203_16: Ahañhi tesu devaputtesu ‘nakkhattaṃ kīḷissāmā’ti paricārikāyo gahetvā antaravīthiṃ otiṇṇesu palāyitvā gehaṃ pavisāmi.
atk-s0502a:1203_17: Tesañhi sarīrato tejo mama sarīraṃ ottharati,
atk-s0502a:1203_18: mama sarīrato tejo tesaṃ sarīraṃ na ottharati,
atk-s0502a:1203_21: ‘Evaṃ santepi ito paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ mā evaṃ vañcetvā dānamadāsī”’ti.
atk-s0502a:1203_22: “Vañcetvā tumhākaṃ dāne dinne mayhaṃ kusalaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:1203_27: So evaṃ vatvā theraṃ vanditvā sujaṃ gahetvā theraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā “aho dānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1204_0: “Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
atk-s0502a:1204_1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākassapo pippaliguhāyaṃ viharati,
atk-s0502a:1204_2: sattāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinno hoti aññataraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā.
atk-s0502a:1204_3: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo tassa sattāhassa accayena tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1204_4: Atha kho āyasmato mahākassapassa tamhā samādhimhā vuṭṭhitassa etadahosi –
atk-s0502a:1205_0: “Tena kho pana samayena pañcamattāni devatāsatāni ussukkaṃ āpannāni honti āyasmato mahākassapassa piṇḍapātapaṭilābhāya.
atk-s0502a:1205_1: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo tāni pañcamattāni devatāsatāni paṭikkhipitvā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1206_0: “Tena kho pana samayena sakko devānamindo āyasmato mahākassapassa piṇḍapātaṃ dātukāmo hoti.
atk-s0502a:1206_3: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo rājagahe sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno yena sakkassa devānamindassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0502a:1206_4: addasā kho sakko devānamindo āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1206_5: disvā gharā nikkhamitvā paccuggantvā hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā gharaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭiyā odanaṃ uddharitvā pattaṃ pūretvā āyasmato mahākassapassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1206_6: So ahosi piṇḍapāto anekasūpo anekabyañjano anekarasabyañjano.
atk-s0502a:1206_11: ‘sakko kho ayaṃ devānamindo’ti viditvā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0502a:1207_0: “Atha kho sakko devānamindo āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā ākāse antalikkhe tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a:1208_0: Atha kho bhagavā vihāre ṭhito eva tassa taṃ saddaṃ sutvā bhikkhū āmantetvā –
atk-s0502a:1208_3: sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā ākāsena gacchanta”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:1208_6: “Vañcetvā tena mayhaṃ puttassa kassapassa piṇḍapāto dinno,
atk-s0502a:1208_7: taṃ datvā tuṭṭhamānaso udānaṃ udānento gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1208_11: mama puttena sadisaṃ nāma piṇḍapātikaṃ devāpi manussāpi pihayantīti vatvā sayampi udānaṃ udāne”si.
atk-s0502a:1209_0: “Assosi kho bhagavā dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya sakkassa devānamindassa vehāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1209_1: abbhuggantvā ākāse antalikkhe tikkhattuṃ udānaṃ udānentassa “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ kassape suppatiṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1210_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a:1215_2: sakko devānamindo mama puttassa sīlagandhena āgantvā piṇḍapātaṃ adāsī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1218_0: Yo ca sīlavataṃ gandho, vāti devesu uttamo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1219_1: Yo ca sīlavatanti yo pana sīlavantānaṃ sīlagandho,
atk-s0502a:1219_2: so tagaraṃ viya lohitacandanaṃ viya ca parittako na hoti,
atk-s0502a:1219_4: Teneva kāraṇena vāti devesu uttamoti pavaro seṭṭho hutvā devesu ca manussesu ca sabbatthameva vāyati,
atk-s0502a:1220_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1223_0: Tesaṃ sampannasīlānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane viharanto godhikattherassa parinibbānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1224_0: So hi āyasmā isigilipasse kāḷasilāyaṃ viharanto appamatto ātāpī pahitatto sāmāyikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusitvā
atk-s0502a:1224_1: ekassa anussāyikassa rogassa vasena tato parihāyi.
atk-s0502a:1224_2: So dutiyampi tatiyampi chakkhattuṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā parihīno,
atk-s0502a:1224_6: idāneva satthaṃ āharissāmī”ti kesoropanasatthakaṃ gahetvā galanāḷiṃ chindituṃ pañcake nipajji.
atk-s0502a:1224_7: Māro tassa cittaṃ ñatvā “ayaṃ bhikkhu satthaṃ āharitukāmo,
atk-s0502a:1224_8: satthaṃ āharantā kho pana jīvite nirapekkhā honti,
atk-s0502a:1224_12: satthāraṃ vārāpessāmī”ti aññātakavesena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha –
atk-s0502a:1230_0: Appattamānaso sekkho, kālaṃ kayirā jane sutā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1231_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe therena satthaṃ āharitaṃ hoti. Satthā “māro aya”nti viditvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1234_0: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ therassa satthaṃ āharitvā nipannaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1234_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe māro pāpimā “kattha nu kho imassa paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ patiṭṭhita”nti dhūmarāsi viya timirapuñjo
atk-s0502a:1234_2: viya ca hutvā sabbadisāsu therassa viññāṇaṃ samanvesati.
atk-s0502a:1234_3: Bhagavā taṃ dhūmatimirabhāvaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dassetvā “eso kho,
atk-s0502a:1234_5: māro pāpimā godhikassa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṃ samanvesati ‘kattha godhikassa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṃ patiṭṭhita’nti.
atk-s0502a:1234_9: Māropi tassa viññāṇaṭṭhānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkonto kumārakavaṇṇo hutvā beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:1235_0: “Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyaṃ, disā anudisā svahaṃ;
atk-s0502a:1236_0: Anvesaṃ nādhigacchāmi, godhiko so kuhiṃ gato”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1242_0: Evaṃ vutte māro pāpimā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1245_2: Tassa hi nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ tumhādisānaṃ satampi sahassampi daṭṭhuṃ na sakkotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1248_0: Sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ, māro maggaṃ na vindatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1249_0: Tattha tesanti yathā appatiṭṭhitena viññāṇena godhiko kulaputto parinibbuto,
atk-s0502a:1249_4: Sammadaññā vimuttānanti hetunā ñāyena kāraṇena jānitvā “tadaṅgavimuttiyā,
atk-s0502a:1249_9: Māro maggaṃ na vindatīti evarūpānaṃ mahākhīṇāsavānaṃ sabbathāmena maggantopi māro gatamaggaṃ na vindati na labhati na passatīti.
atk-s0502a:1250_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pattā. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā jātāti.
atk-s0502a:1253_0: Yathā saṅkāraṭṭhānasminti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto garahadinnaṃ nāma nigaṇṭhasāvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1254_0: Sāvatthiyañhi sirigutto ca garahadinno cāti dve sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1254_4: “tava sahāyakaṃ siriguttaṃ ‘kiṃ tvaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamasi,
atk-s0502a:1254_5: tassa santike kiṃ labhissasī’ti vatvā yathā amhe upasaṅkamitvā amhākañca deyyadhammaṃ dassati,
atk-s0502a:1254_7: Garahadinno tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā abhikkhaṇaṃ gantvā ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānādīsu siriguttaṃ evaṃ ovadati – “samma,
atk-s0502a:1254_11: upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1254_12: Sirigutto tassa kathaṃ sutvāpi bahū divase tuṇhī hutvā nibbijjitvā ekadivasaṃ, “samma,
atk-s0502a:1254_13: tvaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ āgantvā maṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānādīsu evaṃ vadesi,
atk-s0502a:1254_14: ‘samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kiṃ labhissasi, mama, ayye,
atk-s0502a:1254_20: sabbaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ sabbaṃ kāyavacīmanokammaṃ idaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:1254_21: idaṃ na bhavissatī’ti sabbaṃ bhabbābhabbaṃ jānantī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1254_27: ajja mayā ayyānaṃ ñāṇānubhāvo ñāto, gaccha, samma, ayye,
atk-s0502a:1254_29: So nigaṇṭhānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā te vanditvā “mayhaṃ sahāyako sirigutto svātanāya tumhe nimantetī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1254_32: siriguttassa amhesu pasannakālato paṭṭhāya kā nāma sampatti amhākaṃ na bhavissatī”ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1255_1: So tasmiṃ dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare ubhato dīghaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā gūthakalalassa pūrāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1255_2: Bahiāvāṭe dvīsu pariyantesu khāṇuke koṭṭāpetvā tesu rajjuyo bandhāpetvā āsanānaṃ purimapāde āvāṭassa
atk-s0502a:1255_4: “Evaṃ nisinnakāle evaṃ avaṃsirā patissantī”ti maññamāno yathā āvāṭo na paññāyati,
atk-s0502a:1255_6: Mahantā mahantā cāṭiyo ṭhapāpetvā kadalipaṇṇehi ca setapilotikāhi ca mukhāni bandhāpetvā tā tucchā eva
atk-s0502a:1255_8: Garahadinno pātova tassa gharaṃ vegena gantvā,
atk-s0502a:1255_16: So “sādhū”ti vatvā gato tassa gatakāle pañcasatā nigaṇṭhā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1255_17: Sirigutto gehā nikkhamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena nigaṇṭhe vanditvā tesaṃ purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0502a:1255_22: Mama gehaṃ paviṭṭhānañhi vo neva yāgu atthi,
atk-s0502a:1255_25: gūthaāvāṭe vo pātetvā pothessāmī”ti evaṃ cintetvā purisānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1255_26: Evaṃ tesaṃ nisīdanabhāvaṃ ñatvā pacchimapasse ṭhatvā āsanānaṃ upari paccattharaṇāni apaneyyātha,
atk-s0502a:1256_7: “Amhākaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ ayyānaṃ vattaṃ ñatvā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1256_9: “Attano attano pattāsanamūlesu ṭhatvā sabbepi ekappahāreneva nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1256_12: avasesā āsane nisīdantū’ti vattuṃ mā labhatū”ti.
atk-s0502a:1256_13: Te “sādhū”ti vatvā “imehi kathitakathaṃ amhehi kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1256_14: Atha sabbe attano attano pattāsanamūle paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha ne, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1256_15: khippaṃ ekappahāreneva nisīdathā”ti vatvā tesaṃ nisinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā āsanānaṃ upari paccattharaṇāni nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1256_19: Sirigutto tesu patitesu dvāraṃ pidahitvā te uttiṇṇuttiṇṇe “atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ kasmā na jānāthā”ti
atk-s0502a:1256_20: daṇḍehi pāthetvā “ettakaṃ etesaṃ vaṭṭissatī”ti dvāraṃ vivarāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1256_22: Gamanamagge pana tesaṃ sudhāparikammakataṃ bhūmiṃ picchilaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1256_23: Te tattha asaṇṭhahitvā patite patite puna pothāpetvā “alaṃ ettakaṃ tumhāka”nti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:1256_25: nāsitamhā tayā”ti kandantā upaṭṭhākassa gehadvāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1257_0: Garahadinno taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā kuddho “nāsitamhi siriguttena,
atk-s0502a:1257_1: hatthaṃ pasāretvā vandantānaṃ sadevake loke yathāruciyā dātuṃ samatthe nāma puññakkhettabhūte mama, ayye,
atk-s0502a:1257_2: pothāpetvā byasanaṃ pāpesī”ti rājakulaṃ gantvā tassa kahāpaṇasahassaṃ daṇḍaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a:1257_9: mayhaṃ sahāyako nigaṇṭhasāvako maṃ upasaṅkamitvā ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānādīsu abhiṇhaṃ evaṃ vadesi – “samma,
atk-s0502a:1257_11: taṃ upasaṅkamitvā kiṃ labhissasī”ti idaṃ ādiṃ katvā sirigutto sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā “deva,
atk-s0502a:1257_12: sace imasmiṃ kāraṇe daṇḍaṃ gahetuṃ yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1257_14: Rājā garahadinnaṃ oloketvā “saccaṃ kira te evaṃ vutta”nti āha. “Saccaṃ, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1257_15: Tvaṃ ettakampi ajānante satthāroti gahetvā vicaranto “sabbaṃ jānantī”ti kiṃ kāraṇā tathāgatasāvakassa kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1257_16: “Tayā āropitadaṇḍo tuyhameva hotū”ti evaṃ sveva daṇḍaṃ pāpito,
atk-s0502a:1258_0: So taṃ kujjhitvā tato paṭṭhāya aḍḍhamāsamattampi siriguttena saddhiṃ akathetvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a:1258_2: etassa kulūpakānampi mayā byasanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti siriguttaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha –
atk-s0502a:1258_7: tava mayā saddhiṃ akathanato na kathemī”ti. “Yaṃ, samma, kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:1258_8: katameva taṃ na mayaṃ mettiṃ bhindissāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1258_9: Tato paṭṭhāya ubhopi ekaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanti nisīdanti.
atk-s0502a:1258_13: mama satthāraṃ upasaṅkamituṃ vā ayyānaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ vā kiṃ te na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1258_15: tenassa kaṇḍuvanaṭṭhāne nakhena vilekhitaṃ viya ahosi. So,
atk-s0502a:1258_23: kasmā mayhaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ na kathesi,
atk-s0502a:1258_27: pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ mama bhikkhaṃ gaṇhituṃ vadehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1259_2: pañcahi kira bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ sve tassa bhikkhaṃ gaṇhatha,
atk-s0502a:1259_3: purimadivase kho pana tassa kulūpakānaṃ mayā idaṃ nāma kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:1259_5: tumhākaṃ suddhacittena bhikkhaṃ dātukāmatampi na jānāmi,
atk-s0502a:1259_9: Satthā “kiṃ nu kho so amhākaṃ kātu kāmo”ti āvajjetvā addasa “dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare mahantaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1259_10: asītisakaṭamattāni khadiradārūni āharāpetvā pūrāpetvā aggiṃ datvā amhe aṅgāraāvāṭe pātetvā niggaṇhitukāmo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1259_12: “kiṃ nu kho tattha gatapaccayā attho atthi,
atk-s0502a:1259_21: ahaṃ tasmiṃ samāgame dvīhi gāthāhi anumodanaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1259_23: sirigutto ca garahadinno ca sotāpannā bhavissanti,
atk-s0502a:1259_25: imaṃ kulaputtaṃ nissāya mayā gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti bhikkhaṃ adhivāsesi.
atk-s0502a:1260_0: Sirigutto gantvā satthu adhivāsanaṃ garahadinnassa ārocetvā “lokajeṭṭhassa sakkāraṃ karohī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1260_1: Garahadinno “idānissa kattabbayuttakaṃ jānissāmī”ti dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare mahantaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1260_2: asītisakaṭamattāni khadiradārūni āharāpetvā pūrāpetvā aggiṃ datvā khadiraṅgārarāsīnaṃ yojāpetvā sabbarattiṃ
atk-s0502a:1260_3: dhamāpetvā khadiraṅgārarāsiṃ kārāpetvā āvāṭamatthake rukkhapadarāni ṭhapāpetvā kilañjena paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0502a:1260_4: gomayena limpāpetvā ekena passena dubbaladaṇḍake attharitvā gamanamaggaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0502a:1260_5: “evaṃ akkantaakkantakāle daṇḍakesu bhaggesu parivaṭṭetvā aṅgārakāsuyaṃ patissantī”ti maññamāno gehapacchābhāge
atk-s0502a:1260_8: Sirigutto pātova tassa gehaṃ gantvā “kato te, samma,
atk-s0502a:1260_15: Micchādiṭṭhikena hi nimantite mahanto sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1261_0: Punadivase satthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ garahadinnassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1261_1: So gehā nikkhamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā purato añjaliṃ paggayha ṭhito cintesi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1261_3: sattānaṃ soḷasahākārehi cittaṃ paricchindathā’ti evaṃ tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhākena mayhaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1261_8: sabbe kho pana tumhe aṅgārakāsuyaṃ pātetvā niggaṇhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1261_9: Evaṃ cintetvā satthu pattaṃ gahetvā “ito etha bhagavā”ti vatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1261_10: amhākaṃ gehaṃ āgatānaṃ vattaṃ ñatvā āgantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1261_12: “Ekekassa pavisitvā purato gantvā nisinnakāle pacchā aññena āgantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1261_14: “purato gacchantaṃ aṅgārakāsuyaṃ patitaṃ disvā avasesā na āgacchissanti,
atk-s0502a:1261_17: Garahadinno aṅgārakāsuṃ patvā apasakkitvā ṭhito “purato yātha,
atk-s0502a:1261_22: Satthā padumakaṇṇikā akkamanto gantvā paññatte buddhāsane nisīdi,
atk-s0502a:1262_3: “Pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ gehe yāgu vā bhattādīni vā natthi,
atk-s0502a:1262_6: Ahaṃ dvinnaṃ gehānaṃ antare mahantaṃ āvāṭaṃ aṅgārassa pūraṃ kāresiṃ –
atk-s0502a:1262_9: Sabbe padumakaṇṇikā akkamitvā gantvā paññattāsanesu nisinnā,
atk-s0502a:1262_17: Taṃ khaṇaññeva tena yāsu cāṭīsu “yāgū”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1262_21: Taṃ sampattiṃ disvāva garahadinnassa sarīraṃ pītipāmojjena paripūritaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1262_23: So sakkaccaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā katabhattakiccassa satthuno anumodanaṃ kāretukāmo pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:1262_24: Satthā anumodanaṃ karonto “ime sattā paññācakkhuno abhāveneva mama sāvakānaṃ buddhasāsanassa guṇaṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0502a:1262_26: paññavanto sacakkhukā nāmā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:1269_6: Puthujjaneti puthūnaṃ kilesānaṃ jananato evaṃladdhanāme lokiyamahājane.
atk-s0502a:1269_8: yathā nāma mahāpathe chaḍḍite saṅkārarāsimhi asucijegucchiyapaṭikūlepi sucigandhaṃ padumaṃ jāyetha,
atk-s0502a:1269_9: taṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃ manoramaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ uparimatthake patiṭṭhānārahameva bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a:1269_10: evameva saṅkārabhūtesupi puthujjanesu jāto nippaññassa mahājanassa acakkhukassa antare nibbattopi attano paññābalena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1269_11: nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā nikkhamitvā pabbajito pabbajjāmattenapi,
atk-s0502a:1269_13: Sammāsambuddhasāvako hi khīṇāsavo bhikkhu andhabhūte puthujjane atikkamitvā rocati virocati sobhatīti.
atk-s0502a:1270_1: Garahadinno ca sirigutto ca sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1270_2: Te sabbaṃ attano dhanaṃ buddhasāsane vippakiriṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1270_6: tathārūpaṃ nāma khadiraṅgārarāsiṃ bhinditvā padumāni uṭṭhahiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0502a:1270_13: yaṃ mama etarahi buddhabhūtassa aṅgārarāsimhā padumāni uṭṭhitāni,
atk-s0502a:1270_14: aparipakke ñāṇe vattamānassa bodhisattabhūtassapi me uṭṭhahiṃsū”ti vatvā, “kadā, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1279_0: Dīghā jāgarato rattīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pasenadikosalañceva aññatarañca purisaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1280_0: Rājā kira pasenadi kosalo ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sabbasetaṃ ekaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ nāma hatthiṃ
atk-s0502a:1280_1: abhiruyha mahantena rājānubhāvena nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:1280_2: Ussāraṇāya vattamānāya leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi pothiyamāno mahājano palāyanto gīvaṃ parivaṭṭetvāpi oloketiyeva.
atk-s0502a:1280_4: Aññatarassāpi duggatapurisassa bhariyā sattabhūmikassa pāsādassa uparitale ṭhitā ekaṃ vātapānakavāṭaṃ vivaritvā rājānaṃ oloketvāva apagacchi.
atk-s0502a:1280_5: Rañño puṇṇacando valāhakantaraṃ paviṭṭho viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1280_6: So tassā paṭibaddhacitto hatthikkhandhato patanākārappatto viya hutvā khippaṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:1280_7: antepuraṃ pavisitvā ekaṃ vissāsakaṃ amaccaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:1280_11: So gantvā tassā sasāmikabhāvaṃ ñatvā āgantvā rañño “sasāmikā”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1280_12: Atha raññā “tena hi tassā sāmikaṃ pakkosāhī”ti vutte so gantvā, “ehi, bho,
atk-s0502a:1280_14: So “bhariyaṃ me nissāya bhayena uppannena bhavitabba”nti cintetvā rañño āṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto gantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1280_15: Atha naṃ rājā “maṃ ito paṭṭhāya upaṭṭhāhī”ti āha. “Alaṃ, deva,
atk-s0502a:1280_16: ahaṃ attano kammaṃ katvā tumhākaṃ suṅkaṃ dadāmi,
atk-s0502a:1280_19: ajjato paṭṭhāya maṃ upaṭṭhāhī”ti tassa phalakañca āvudhañca dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1280_22: Atha naṃ so maraṇabhayabhīto appamatto hutvā upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1281_0: Rājā tassa dosaṃ apassanto kāmapariḷāhe vaḍḍhante “ekamassa dosaṃ āropetvā rājāṇaṃ karissāmī”ti pakkosāpetvā evamāha –
atk-s0502a:1281_1: “ambho ito yojanamatthake nadiyā asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma gantvā sāyaṃ mama nhānavelāya kumuduppalāni ceva aruṇavatīmattikañca āhara.
atk-s0502a:1281_6: piṭṭhi me rujjatī”ti vatvā acchituṃ labhantiyeva.
atk-s0502a:1281_10: kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikā nāma nāgabhavane uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:1281_11: ahaṃ kuhiṃ labhissāmī”ti cintento maraṇabhayabhīto vegena gehaṃ gantvā, “bhadde,
atk-s0502a:1281_15: tāva sandhāretuṃ asakkonto uḷuṅkena kañjikaṃ harāpetvā yathāladdhena byañjanena saddhiṃ allameva bhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1281_16: pacchiyaṃ opīḷetvā ādāya yojanikaṃ maggaṃ pakkhando,
atk-s0502a:1281_18: So anucchiṭṭhaṃ katvāva thokaṃ bhattaṃ apanetvā bhuñjanto ekaṃ addhikaṃ disvā mayā apanetvā ṭhapitaṃ
atk-s0502a:1281_19: thokaṃ anucchiṭṭhaṃ bhattameva atthi gahetvā bhuñja sāmīti.
atk-s0502a:1281_21: Itaropi bhuñjitvā ekaṃ bhattamuṭṭhiṃ udake khipitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā mahantena saddena “imasmiṃ nadīpadese
atk-s0502a:1281_22: adhivatthā nāgā supaṇṇā devatā ca vacanaṃ me suṇantu,
atk-s0502a:1281_23: rājā mayhaṃ āṇaṃ kātukāmo ‘kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikaṃ āharā’ti maṃ āṇāpesi,
atk-s0502a:1281_28: Ettakaṃ puññaphalaṃ tumhākaṃ pattiṃ katvā dammi,
atk-s0502a:1281_29: mayhaṃ kumuduppalehi saddhiṃ aruṇavatīmattikaṃ āharathā”ti tikkhattuṃ anussāvesi.

atk-s0502a:1322_0: Theraṃ kira rājagahaṃ nissāya pippaliguhāyaṃ vasantaṃ dve saddhivihārikā upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1322_2: eko tena kataṃ kataṃ attanā kataṃ viya dassento mukhodakadantakaṭṭhānaṃ paṭiyāditabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1322_7: “ayaṃ niccakālaṃ mayā kataṃ kataṃ attanā kataṃ viya katvā dasseti, hotu,
atk-s0502a:1322_9: Tassa bhuñjitvā supantasseva nhānodakaṃ tāpetvā ekasmiṃ ghaṭe katvā piṭṭhikoṭṭhake ṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a:1322_10: udakatāpanabhājane pana nāḷimattaṃ udakaṃ sesetvā usumaṃ muñcantaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:1322_11: Taṃ itaro sāyanhasamaye pabujjhitvā usumaṃ nikkhantaṃ disvā “udakaṃ tāpetvā koṭṭhake ṭhapitaṃ bhavissatī”ti vegena gantvā theraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1322_13: nhāyathā”ti vatvā therena saddhiṃyeva koṭṭhakaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1322_16: Daharo aggisālaṃ gantvā bhājane uḷuṅkaṃ otāretvā tucchabhāvaṃ ñatvā “passatha duṭṭhassa kammaṃ tucchabhājanaṃ uddhane āropetvā kuhiṃ gato,
atk-s0502a:1322_17: ahaṃ ‘koṭṭhake udaka’nti saññāya ārocesi”nti ujjhāyanto ghaṭaṃ ādāya titthaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1322_18: Itaropi piṭṭhikoṭṭhakato udakaṃ āharitvā koṭṭhake ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:1323_1: “ayaṃ daharo ‘udakaṃ me tāpetvā koṭṭhake ṭhapitaṃ, etha, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1323_2: nhāyathā’ti vatvā idāni ujjhāyanto ghaṭaṃ ādāya titthaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0502a:1323_3: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti upadhārento “ettakaṃ kālaṃ esa daharo iminā kataṃ vattaṃ attanāva kataṃ viya pakāsetī”ti
atk-s0502a:1323_5: bhikkhunā nāma ‘attanā katameva kata’nti vattuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:1323_8: bhante’ti vatvā mayi pavisitvā ṭhite ghaṭaṃ ādāya ujjhāyanto gacchasi,
atk-s0502a:1323_9: pabbajitassa nāma evaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1323_11: udakamattakaṃ nāma nissāya maṃ evaṃ vadesī”ti kujjhitvā punadivase therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya na pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1323_12: Thero itarena saddhiṃ ekaṃ padesaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1323_13: So tasmiṃ gate therassa upaṭṭhākakulaṃ gantvā “thero kahaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1323_18: “Evarūpaṃ kira nāma āhāraṃ dethā”ti vutte tena vuttaniyāmeneva sampādetvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1323_19: So antarāmaggeva taṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0502a:1323_20: Theropi gataṭṭhāne mahantaṃ sukhumavatthaṃ labhitvā attanā saddhiṃ gatadaharassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1323_21: So taṃ rajitvā attano nivāsanapārupanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:1324_1: ‘tumhākaṃ kira aphāsukaṃ jāta’nti amhehi daharena vuttaniyāmeneva paṭiyādetvā āhāro pesito,
atk-s0502a:1324_2: paribhuñjitvā vo phāsukaṃ jāta”nti vutte tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1324_3: Vihāraṃ pana gantvā taṃ daharaṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ evamāha – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:1324_8: So kujjhitvā there āghātaṃ bandhitvā “purimadivase udakamattaṃ nissāya maṃ musāvādiṃ katvā ajja attano
atk-s0502a:1324_9: upaṭṭhākakule bhattamuṭṭhiyā bhuttakāraṇā maṃ ‘viññattiṃ katvā bhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti vadati,
atk-s0502a:1324_12: jānissāmissa kattabbayuttaka”nti punadivase there gāmaṃ pavisante sayaṃ vihāre ohīyitvā daṇḍaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1324_13: paribhogabhājanāni bhinditvā therassa paṇṇasālāya aggiṃ datvā yaṃ na jhāyati,
atk-s0502a:1324_14: taṃ muggarena paharanto bhinditvā nikkhamitvā palāto.
atk-s0502a:1325_1: “therassa kira saddhivihāriko ovādamattaṃ asahanto kujjhitvā paṇṇasālaṃ jhāpetvā palāto”ti.
atk-s0502a:1325_2: Atheko bhikkhu aparabhāge rājagahā nikkhamitvā satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmo jetavanaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā
atk-s0502a:1325_7: eko pana saddhivihāriko ovādamattena kujjhitvā paṇṇasālaṃ jhāpetvā palāto”ti.
atk-s0502a:1325_8: Satthā “na so idāneva ovādaṃ sutvā kujjhati,
atk-s0502a:1326_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente himavantapadese eko siṅgilasakuṇo kulāvakaṃ katvā vasi.
atk-s0502a:1326_1: Athekadivasaṃ deve vassante eko makkaṭo sītena kampamāno taṃ padesaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1328_0: Atha kena nu vaṇṇena, agāraṃ te na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1329_1: yāya pana paññāya vicāretvā agāraṃ kareyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1329_2: sā me paññā natthī”ti cintetvā tamatthaṃ viññāpetukāmo imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1331_0: Yāhu seṭṭhā manussesu, sā me paññā na vijjatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1332_0: Atha naṃ “evarūpassa tava kathaṃ gharāvāso ijjhissatī”ti garahanto siṅgilo imaṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0502a:1337_0: Makkaṭo “ayaṃ maṃ anavaṭṭhitacittaṃ lahucittaṃ mittadubbhiṃ addhuvasīlaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:1337_1: idānissa mittadubbhibhāvaṃ dassessāmī”ti kulāvakaṃ viddhaṃsetvā vippakiri.
atk-s0502a:1337_2: Sakuṇo tasmiṃ kulāvakaṃ gaṇhante eva ekena passena nikkhamitvā palāyi.
atk-s0502a:1338_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi –
atk-s0502a:1338_6: pubbepi so ovādakkhaṇe kujjhitvā kuṭiṃ dūsesi,
atk-s0502a:1338_7: mama puttassa kassapassa evarūpena bālena saddhiṃ vasanato ekakasseva nivāso seyyo”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1341_0: Ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā, natthi bāle sahāyatā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1342_0: Tattha caranti iriyāpathacāraṃ aggahetvā manasācāro veditabbo,
atk-s0502a:1342_2: Seyyaṃ sadisamattanoti attano sīlasamādhipaññāguṇehi adhikataraṃ vā sadisaṃ vā na labheyya ce.
atk-s0502a:1342_3: Ekacariyanti etesu hi seyyaṃ labhamāno sīlādīhi vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a:1342_5: hīnena pana saddhiṃ ekato vasanto ekato saṃbhogaparibhogaṃ karonto sīlādīhi parihāyati.
atk-s0502a:1342_7: “evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1342_8: Tasmā sace kāruññaṃ paṭicca “ayaṃ maṃ nissāya sīlādīhi vaḍḍhissatī”ti tamhā puggalā kiñci apaccāsīsanto taṃ saṅgaṇhituṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:1342_11: ekacariyaṃ daḷhaṃ kayirā ekībhāvameva thiraṃ katvā sabbairiyāpathesu ekakova vihareyya.
atk-s0502a:1342_13: Natthi bāle sahāyatāti sahāyatā nāma cūḷasīlaṃ majjhimasīlaṃ mahāsīlaṃ dasa kathāvatthūni terasa dhutaṅgaguṇā
atk-s0502a:1342_14: vipassanāguṇā cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso vijjā cha abhiññā.
atk-s0502a:1346_0: Puttā matthīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto ānandaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1347_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ānandaseṭṭhi nāma cattālīsakoṭivibhavo mahāmaccharī ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1347_1: So anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ ñātake sannipātetvā puttaṃ mūlasiriṃ nāma tīsu velāsu evaṃ ovadati –
atk-s0502a:1347_5: Ekekampi hi kahāpaṇaṃ vayaṃ karontassa pana khīyateva. Tasmā –
atk-s0502a:1350_0: So aparena samayena attano pañca mahānidhiyo puttassa anācikkhitvā dhananissito maccheramalamalino kālaṃ
atk-s0502a:1350_1: katvā tasseva nagarassa ekasmiṃ dvāragāmake caṇḍālānaṃ kulasahassaṃ paṭivasati.
atk-s0502a:1350_3: Rājā tassa kālakiriyaṃ sutvā puttamassa mūlasiriṃ pakkosāpetvā seṭṭhiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:1350_4: Tampi caṇḍālakulasahassaṃ ekatova bhatiyā kammaṃ katvā jīvamānaṃ tassa paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya neva bhatiṃ labhati,
atk-s0502a:1350_6: Te “mayaṃ etarahi kammaṃ karontāpi piṇḍabhattampi na labhāma,
atk-s0502a:1350_7: amhākaṃ antare kāḷakaṇṇiyā bhavitabba”nti dve koṭṭhāsā hutvā yāva tassa mātāpitaro visuṃ honti,
atk-s0502a:1350_8: tāva vibhajitvā “imasmiṃ kule kāḷakaṇṇī uppannā”ti tassa mātaraṃ nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1351_1: tāva yāpanamattampi kicchena labhitvā puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0502a:1351_2: Tassa hatthā ca pādā ca akkhīni ca kaṇṇā ca nāsā ca mukhañca yathāṭhāne na ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1351_3: So evarūpena aṅgavekallena samannāgato paṃsupisācako viya ativirūpo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1351_4: Evaṃ santepi taṃ mātā na pariccaji.
atk-s0502a:1351_6: Sā taṃ kicchena posayamānā taṃ ādāya gatadivase kiñci alabhitvā gehe katvā sayameva gatadivase bhatiṃ labhati.
atk-s0502a:1351_7: Atha naṃ piṇḍāya caritvā jīvituṃ samatthakāle sā kapālakaṃ hatthe ṭhapetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:1351_11: tattha bhikkhāya caritvā jīvāhī”ti taṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a:1351_12: So gharapaṭipāṭiyā caranto ānandaseṭṭhikāle nivuttaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā jātissaro hutvā attano gehaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1351_13: Tīsu pana dvārakoṭṭhakesu na koci sallakkhesi.
atk-s0502a:1351_14: Catutthe dvārakoṭṭhake mūlasiriseṭṭhino puttakā disvā ubbiggahadayā parodiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1351_15: Atha naṃ seṭṭhipurisā “nikkhama kāḷakaṇṇī”ti pothetvā nīharitvā saṅkāraṭṭhāne khipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1351_16: Satthā ānandattherena pacchāsamaṇena piṇḍāya caranto taṃ ṭhānaṃ patto theraṃ oloketvā tena puṭṭho taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a:1351_19: Satthā mūlasiriṃ āmantetvā “jānāsi eta”nti pucchitvā “na jānāmī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:1351_20: “pitā te ānandaseṭṭhī”ti vatvā asaddahantaṃ “ānandaseṭṭhi puttassa te pañca mahānidhiyo ācikkhāhī”ti ācikkhāpetvā saddahāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1354_0: Attā hi attano natthi, kuto puttā kuto dhana”nti.
atk-s0502a:1355_3: iti bālo puttataṇhāya ceva dhanataṇhāya ca haññati vihaññati dukkhayati,
atk-s0502a:1355_9: “Putte posessāmī”ti rattiñca divā ca thalajalapathādīsu nānappakārato vāyamantopi vihaññati,
atk-s0502a:1355_11: Evaṃ vihaññassa ca attā hi attano natthi tena vighātena dukkhitaṃ attānaṃ sukhitaṃ kātuṃ asakkontassa pavattiyampissa attā hi attano natthi,
atk-s0502a:1355_12: maraṇamañce nipannassa māraṇantikāhi vedanāhi aggijālāhi viya pariḍayhamānassa chijjamānesu sandhibandhanesu,
atk-s0502a:1355_13: bhijjamānesu aṭṭhisaṅghāṭesu nimīletvā paralokaṃ ummīletvā idhalokaṃ passantassāpi divase divase dvikkhattuṃ
atk-s0502a:1355_14: nhāpetvā tikkhattuṃ bhojetvā gandhamālādīhi alaṅkaritvā yāvajīvaṃ positopi sahāyabhāvena dukkhaparittāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:1355_15: kātuṃ asamatthatāya attā hi attano natthi.
atk-s0502a:1355_16: Kuto puttā kuto dhanaṃ puttā vā dhanaṃ vā tasmiṃ samaye kimeva karissanti,
atk-s0502a:1355_17: ānandaseṭṭhinopi kassaci kiñci adatvā puttassatthāya dhanaṃ saṇṭhapetvā pubbe vā maraṇamañce nipannassa,
atk-s0502a:1355_18: idāni vā imaṃ dukkhaṃ pattassa kuto puttā kuto dhanaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1355_19: Puttā vā dhanaṃ vā tasmiṃ samaye kiṃ dukkhaṃ hariṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1356_0: Desanāvasāne caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Desanā mahājanassa sātthikā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:1359_0: Yo bāloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto gaṇṭhibhedakacore ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1360_0: Te kira dve sahāyakā dhammassavanatthāya gacchantena mahājanena saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ gantvā eko dhammakathaṃ assosi,
atk-s0502a:1360_2: Tesu eko dhammaṃ suṇamāno sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a:1360_3: itaro ekassa dussante baddhaṃ pañcamāsakamattaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a:1360_6: Atha naṃ sahāyakacoro attano bhariyāya saddhiṃ uppaṇḍayamāno “tvaṃ atipaṇḍitatāya attano gehe pākabhattamūlampi na nipphādesī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1360_7: Itaro pana “bālabhāveneva vatāyaṃ attano paṇḍitabhāvaṃ maññatī”ti taṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocetuṃ ñātīhi saddhiṃ jetavanaṃ gantvā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1360_8: Satthā tassa dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1362_0: “Yo bālo maññati bālyaṃ, paṇḍito vāpi tena so;
atk-s0502a:1363_0: Bālo ca paṇḍitamānī, sa ve ‘bālo’ti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1364_0: Tattha yo bāloti yo andhabālo apaṇḍito samāno “bālo aha”nti attano bālyaṃ bālabhāvaṃ maññati jānāti.
atk-s0502a:1364_1: Tena soti tena kāraṇena so puggalo paṇḍito vāpi hoti paṇḍitasadiso vā.
atk-s0502a:1364_2: So hi “bālo aha”nti jānamāno aññaṃ paṇḍitaṃ upasaṅkamanto payirupāsanto tena paṇḍitabhāvatthāya ovadiyamāno
atk-s0502a:1364_3: anusāsiyamāno taṃ ovādaṃ gaṇhitvā paṇḍito vā hoti paṇḍitataro vā.
atk-s0502a:1364_4: Sa ve bāloti yo ca bālo samāno “ko añño mayā sadiso bahussuto vā dhammakathiko vā vinayadharo vā dhutaṅgadharo vā atthī”ti evaṃ paṇḍitamānī hoti.
atk-s0502a:1364_5: So aññaṃ paṇḍitaṃ anupasaṅkamanto apayirupāsanto neva pariyattiṃ uggaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a:1365_0: Desanāpariyosāne itarassa ñātakehi saddhiṃ mahājano sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:1368_0: Yāvajīvampi ce bāloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto udāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1369_0: So kira mahātheresu paṭikkantesu dhammasabhaṃ gantvā dhammāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1369_1: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ āgantukā bhikkhū disvā “ayaṃ bahussuto mahāthero bhavissatī”ti maññamānā khandhādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0502a:1369_3: buddhehi saddhiṃ ekavihāre vasamāno khandhadhātuāyatanamattampi na jānātī”ti garahitvā taṃ pavattiṃ tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1369_4: Satthā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1372_0: Na so dhammaṃ vijānāti, dabbī sūparasaṃ yathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1373_1: bālo nāmesa yāvajīvampi paṇḍitaṃ upasaṅkamanto payirupāsanto “idaṃ buddhavacanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1373_2: ettakaṃ buddhavacana”nti evaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ vā “ayaṃ cāro,
atk-s0502a:1373_11: idaṃ sacchikātabba”nti evaṃ paṭipattipaṭivedhadhammaṃ vā na jānāti.
atk-s0502a:1373_14: Yathā hi dabbī yāva parikkhayā nānappakārāya sūpavikatiyā samparivattamānāpi “idaṃ loṇikaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1373_22: evameva bālo yāvajīvampi paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsamāno vuttappakāraṃ dhammaṃ na jānātīti.
atk-s0502a:1374_0: Desanāvasāne āgantukā bhikkhū āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1377_0: Muhuttamapi ce viññūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tiṃsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1378_0: Tesañhi bhagavā itthiṃ pariyesantānaṃ kappāsikavanasaṇḍe paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a:1378_1: Tadā te sabbeva ehibhikkhubhāvaṃ patvā iddhimayapattacīvaradharā hutvā terasa dhutaṅgāni samādāya vattamānā
atk-s0502a:1378_2: punapi dīghassa addhuno accayena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā anamataggadhammadesanaṃ sutvā tasmiṃyeva āsane
atk-s0502a:1378_4: Bhikkhū “aho vatimehi bhikkhūhi khippameva dhammo viññāto”ti dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1378_7: pubbepi ime tiṃsamattā sahāyakā dhuttā hutvā tuṇḍilajātake mahātuṇḍilassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvāpi khippameva dhammaṃ viññāya pañca sīlāni samādiyiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1378_8: te teneva upanissayena etarahi nisinnāsaneyeva arahattaṃ pattā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1381_0: Khippaṃ dhammaṃ vijānāti, jivhā sūparasaṃ yathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1382_1: viññū paṇḍitapuriso muhuttamapi ce aññaṃ paṇḍitaṃ payirupāsati,
atk-s0502a:1382_2: so tassa santike uggaṇhanto paripucchanto khippameva pariyattidhammaṃ vijānāti.
atk-s0502a:1382_3: Tato kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā paṭipattiyaṃ ghaṭento vāyamanto yathā nāma anupahatajivhāpasādo puriso rasavijānanatthaṃ
atk-s0502a:1382_4: jivhagge ṭhapetvā eva loṇikādibhedaṃ rasaṃ vijānāti,
atk-s0502a:1386_0: Caranti bālā dummedhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto suppabuddhakuṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.

atk-s0502a:1387_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko devarājā “ayaṃ suppabuddhakuṭṭhi attano satthu sāsane paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātukāmo”ti

atk-s0502a:1392_8: Suppabuddhopi kho kuṭṭhi satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārā katapaṭisanthāro sammodamāno attanā paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ ārocetvā vuṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.

atk-s0502a:1401_0: Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kassakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1402_0: So kira sāvatthito avidūre ekaṃ khettaṃ kasati.
atk-s0502a:1402_1: Corā udakaniddhamanena nagaraṃ pavisitvā ekasmiṃ aḍḍhakule umaṅgaṃ bhinditvā bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ gahetvā udakaniddhamaneneva nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1402_2: Eko coro te vañcetvā ekaṃ sahassatthavikaṃ ovaṭṭikāya katvā taṃ khettaṃ gantvā tehi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍaṃ bhājetvā
atk-s0502a:1402_3: ādāya gacchanto ovaṭṭikato patamānaṃ sahassatthavikaṃ na sallakkhesi.
atk-s0502a:1402_4: Taṃ divasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento taṃ kassakaṃ attano ñāṇajālassa antopaviṭṭhaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:1402_5: “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti upadhārayamāno idaṃ addasa –
atk-s0502a:1402_7: bhaṇḍasāmikā corānaṃ anupadaṃ gantvā ovaṭṭikato patamānaṃ sahassatthavikaṃ disvā etaṃ gaṇhissanti,
atk-s0502a:1402_8: maṃ ṭhapetvā tassa añño sakkhī nāma na bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:1402_13: Kassako satthāraṃ disvā gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā puna kasituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:1402_14: Satthā tena saddhiṃ kiñci avatvāva sahassatthavikāya patitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ disvā ānandattheraṃ āha – “passa, ānanda,
atk-s0502a:1403_0: Kassako taṃ kathaṃ sutvā “mama velāya vā avelāya vā vicaraṇaṭṭhānametaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1403_1: āsīviso kirettha atthī”ti cintetvā satthari ettakaṃ vatvā pakkante “māressāmi na”nti patodalaṭṭhiṃ ādāya
atk-s0502a:1403_2: gato sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ disvā “imaṃ sandhāya satthārā kathitaṃ bhavissatī”ti taṃ ādāya nivatto,
atk-s0502a:1403_3: abyattatāya ekamante ṭhapetvā paṃsunā paṭicchādetvā puna kasituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:1403_4: Manussā ca vibhātāya rattiyā gehe corehi katakammaṃ disvā padānupadaṃ gacchantā taṃ khettaṃ gantvā tattha
atk-s0502a:1403_5: corehi bhaṇḍassa bhājitaṭṭhānaṃ disvā kassakassa padavalañjaṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1403_6: Te tassa padānusārena gantvā thavikāya ṭhapitaṭṭhānaṃ disvā paṃsuṃ viyūhitvā thavikaṃ ādāya “tvaṃ gehaṃ
atk-s0502a:1403_7: vilumpitvā khettaṃ kasamāno viya vicarasī”ti tajjetvā pothetvā netvā rañño dassayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1403_8: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tassa vadhaṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1403_9: Rājapurisā taṃ pacchābāhaṃ bandhitvā kasāhi tāḷentā āghātanaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1403_10: So kasāhi tāḷiyamāno aññaṃ kiñci avatvā “passānanda,
atk-s0502a:1403_13: Atha naṃ rājapurisā “tvaṃ satthu ceva ānandattherassa ca kathaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0502a:1403_15: “rājānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhamāno kathessāmī”ti vutte rañño santikaṃ netvā rañño taṃ pavattiṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1403_16: Atha naṃ rājā “kasmā evaṃ kathesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1403_18: coro”ti vatvā kasanatthāya nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a:1403_19: Rājā tassa kathaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ bhaṇe loke aggapuggalaṃ satthāraṃ sakkhiṃ apadisati,
atk-s0502a:1403_21: ahamettha kattabbaṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ ādāya sāyanhasamaye satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a:1403_22: “bhagavā kacci tumhe ānandattherena saddhiṃ etassa kassakassa kasanaṭṭhānaṃ gatā”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0502a:1403_32: tumhehi pana kathitakathaṃ kathetvā tena jīvitaṃ laddha”nti.
atk-s0502a:1403_35: paṇḍitena nāma yaṃ kammaṃ katvā pacchānutappaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:1403_36: taṃ na kattabba”nti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –

atk-s0502a:1407_0: Tattha na taṃ kammanti yaṃ nirayādīsu nibbattanasamatthaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ kammaṃ katvā anussaranto anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe anutappati anusocati,
atk-s0502a:1407_1: taṃ kataṃ na sādhu na sundaraṃ niratthakaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1407_2: Yassa assumukhoti yassa assūhi tintamukho rodanto vipākaṃ anubhotīti.
atk-s0502a:1411_0: Tañca kammaṃ kataṃ sādhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sumanaṃ nāma mālākāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1412_0: So kira devasikaṃ bimbisārarājānaṃ pātova aṭṭhahi sumanapupphanāḷīhi upaṭṭhahanto aṭṭha kahāpaṇe labhati.
atk-s0502a:1412_1: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃ pupphāni gahetvā nagaraṃ paviṭṭhamatte bhagavā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivuto chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo
atk-s0502a:1412_2: vissajjetvā mahatā buddhānubhāvena mahatiyā buddhalīḷāya nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1412_3: Bhagavā hi ekadā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo cīvarena paṭicchādetvā aññataro piṇḍapātiko viya carati tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0502a:1412_6: Tasmimpi divase sarīrato chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo vissajjento mahantena buddhānubhāvena mahatiyā buddhalīḷāya rājagahaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1412_8: oloketvā pasannacitto “kiṃ nu kho satthu adhikāraṃ karomī”ti cintetvā aññaṃ apassanto “imehi pupphehi
