atk-s0502a:1413_0: So “yāva me pasannaṃ cittaṃ na patikuṭati,
atk-s0502a:1413_1: taṃ tāvadeva pūjaṃ karissāmī”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭho udaggudaggo satthāraṃ pūjesi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0502a:1413_2: Paṭhamaṃ tāva dveva pupphamuṭṭhiyo tathāgatassa upari khipi,
atk-s0502a:1413_10: Evaṃ aṭṭha nāḷiyo aṭṭha muṭṭhiyo hutvā catūsu ṭhānesu tathāgataṃ parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1413_15: Pupphāni acittakānipi sacittakaṃ nissāya sacittakāni viya abhijjitvā apatitvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva gacchanti,
atk-s0502a:1413_17: Satthu sarīrato satasahassavijjulatā viya raṃsiyo nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1413_18: Purato ca pacchato ca dakkhiṇato ca vāmato ca sīsamatthakato ca nirantaraṃ nikkhantaraṃsīsu ekāpi sammukhasammukhaṭṭhāneneva
atk-s0502a:1413_19: apalāyitvā sabbāpi satthāraṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā taruṇatālakkhandhappamāṇā hutvā purato eva dhāvanti.
atk-s0502a:1413_22: bahinagare nava koṭiyoti aṭṭhārasasu koṭīsu ekopi puriso vā itthī vā bhikkhaṃ gahetvā anikkhanto nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:1413_23: Mahājano sīhanādaṃ nadanto celukkhepasahassāni karonto satthu puratova gacchati.
atk-s0502a:1413_24: Satthāpi mālākārassa guṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ tigāvutappamāṇe nagare bhericaraṇamaggeneva acari.
atk-s0502a:1414_0: So thokaññeva tathāgatena saddhiṃ caritvā manosilārase nimuggo viya buddharasmīnaṃ anto paviṭṭho satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1414_1: thometvā vanditvā tucchapacchimeva gahetvā gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1414_5: “Rājā maṃ ghātetu vā raṭṭhato vā nīharatu,
atk-s0502a:1414_9: Mahājano ukkuṭṭhisahassāni karonto satthārā saddhiṃ carati,
atk-s0502a:1414_12: Athassa bhariyā andhabālatāya evarūpe pāṭihāriye pasādaṃ nāma ajanetvā taṃ akkositvā paribhāsitvā “rājāno nāma caṇḍā,
atk-s0502a:1414_13: sakiṃ kuddhā hatthapādādicchedanena bahumpi anatthaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a:1414_14: tayā katakammena mayhampi anattho siyā”ti putte ādāya rājakulaṃ gantvā raññā pakkositvā “kiṃ eta”nti pucchitā āha –
atk-s0502a:1414_15: “mama sāmiko tumhākaṃ upaṭṭhānapupphehi satthāraṃ pūjetvā tucchahattho gharaṃ āgantvā ‘kahaṃ pupphānī’ti mayā puṭṭho idaṃ nāma vadesi,
atk-s0502a:1414_17: sakiṃ kuddhā hatthapādādicchedanena bahumpi anatthaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a:1414_18: tayā katakammena mayhampi anattho siyā’ti taṃ chaḍḍetvā idhāgatā,
atk-s0502a:1414_19: tena kataṃ kammaṃ sukataṃ vā hotu,
atk-s0502a:1414_23: Rājā paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphalaṃ patto saddho pasanno ariyasāvako cintesi –
atk-s0502a:1414_28: mayhaṃ upaṭṭhānapupphehi tena pūjā katā”ti? “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1414_30: mama pupphehi pūjākārassa ahaṃ kattabbayuttakaṃ jānissāmī”ti taṃ uyyojetvā vegena satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva vicari.
atk-s0502a:1415_0: Satthā rañño cittappasādaṃ ñatvā bhericaraṇavīthiyā nagaraṃ caritvā rañño gharadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1415_1: Rājā pattaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ gehaṃ pavesetukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1415_3: Rājā taṃ ñatvā “sīghaṃ maṇḍapaṃ karothā”ti taṅkhaṇaññeva maṇḍapaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1415_5: Kasmā pana satthā rājagehaṃ na pāvisi?
atk-s0502a:1416_4: rājaṅgaṇe pana maṃ nisinnaṃ mahājano daṭṭhuṃ labhissati,
atk-s0502a:1416_6: Guṇavantānañhi guṇaṃ buddhā eva pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:1416_11: Satthā bhattakiccāvasāne anumodanaṃ katvā purimanayeneva catūhi pupphapaṭehi parikkhitto sīhanādaṃ nadanto mahājanena parivuto vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1416_12: Rājā satthāraṃ anugantvā nivatto mālākāraṃ pakkosāpetvā “mama āharitapupphehi kinti katvā satthāraṃ pūjesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1416_13: Mālākāro “rājā maṃ ghātetu vā raṭṭhato vā pabbājetūti jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pūjesiṃ devā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1416_14: Rājā “tvaṃ mahāpuriso nāmā”ti vatvā aṭṭha hatthī ca asse ca dāse ca dāsiyo ca mahāpasādhanāni ca aṭṭha
atk-s0502a:1416_15: kahāpaṇasahassāni ca rājakulato nīharitvā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍitā aṭṭha nāriyo ca aṭṭha gāmavare cāti
atk-s0502a:1417_1: “ajja pātova paṭṭhāya sīhanādasahassāni ceva celukkhepasahassāni ca pavattanti,
atk-s0502a:1417_5: iminā mālākārena appamattakaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti mā sallakkhesi,
atk-s0502a:1417_6: ayañhi mayhaṃ jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:1421_1: Satthu pana vihāraṃ gantvā gandhakuṭipavisanakāle tāni pupphāni dvārakoṭṭhake patiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1421_4: dharamānakabuddhassa jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā pupphapūjaṃ katvā taṅkhaṇaññeva sabbaṭṭhakaṃ nāma labhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1421_5: Satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā tiṇṇaṃ gamanānaṃ aññatarena gamanena dhammasabhaṃ gantvā buddhāsane nisīditvā “kāya nuttha,
atk-s0502a:1421_7: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “āma,
atk-s0502a:1421_9: yassa kammassa katattā pacchānutappaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0502a:1421_11: evarūpaṃ kammaṃ kattabbamevā”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –

atk-s0502a:1425_0: Tattha yaṃ katvāti yaṃ devamanussasampattīnañceva nibbānasampattiyā ca nibbattanasamatthaṃ sukhudrayaṃ kammaṃ katvā nānutappati,
atk-s0502a:1425_1: atha kho diṭṭhadhammeyeva anussaritānussaritakkhaṇeyeva pītivegena patīto somanassavegena ca sumano hutvā
atk-s0502a:1429_0: Madhuvā maññatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uppalavaṇṇattheriṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1430_0: Sā kira padumuttarabuddhassa pādamūle patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā kappasatasahassaṃ puññāni kurumānā devesu
atk-s0502a:1430_1: ca manussesu ca saṃsarantī imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devalokato cavitvā sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhikule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:1430_3: Athassā vayappattakāle sakalajambudīpe rājāno ca seṭṭhino ca seṭṭhissa santikaṃ sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:1430_10: Tassā pacchimabhavikattā taṃ vacanaṃ sīse āsittaṃ satapākatelaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1430_13: So tassā mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā bhikkhunīupassayaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:1430_14: Tassā acirapabbajitāya eva uposathāgāre kālavāro pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1430_15: Sā dīpaṃ jāletvā uposathāgāraṃ sammajjitvā dīpasikhāya nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā ṭhitāva punappunaṃ olokayamānā
atk-s0502a:1430_16: tejokasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattetvā tameva pādakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi saddhiṃ paṭisambhidāhi ceva
atk-s0502a:1431_0: Sā aparena samayena janapadacārikaṃ caritvā paccāgantvā andhavanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1431_2: Athassā tattha kuṭikaṃ katvā mañcakaṃ paññāpetvā sāṇiyā parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1431_4: Mātulaputto panassā nandamāṇavo nāma gihikālato paṭṭhāya paṭibaddhacitto.
atk-s0502a:1431_5: So tassā āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā theriyā āgamanato puretarameva andhavanaṃ gantvā taṃ kuṭikaṃ pavisitvā heṭṭhāmañcake
atk-s0502a:1431_6: nilīno theriyā āgantvā kuṭikaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya mañcake nisinnamattāya bahi ātapato āgatattā
atk-s0502a:1431_7: cakkhupathe andhakāre avigateyeva heṭṭhāmañcakato nikkhamitvā mañcakaṃ abhiruyha “mā nassi bāla,
atk-s0502a:1431_8: mā nassi bālā”ti theriyā vāriyamānoyeva abhibhavitvā attanā patthitakammaṃ katvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:1431_9: Athassa aguṇaṃ dhāretuṃ asakkontī viya mahāpathavī dvedhā bhijji.
atk-s0502a:1431_10: So pathaviṃ paviṭṭho gantvā mahāavīcimhi eva nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:1431_16: bhikkhubhikkhūnī upāsakaupāsikāsu yo koci bālo pāpakammaṃ karonto madhusakkharādīsu kiñci deva madhurarasaṃ
atk-s0502a:1431_17: khādamāno puriso viya tuṭṭhahaṭṭho udaggudaggo viya karotī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ
atk-s0502a:1433_0: “Madhuvā maññati bālo, yāva pāpaṃ na paccati;
atk-s0502a:1434_0: Yadā ca paccati pāpaṃ, bālo dukkhaṃ nigacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1435_0: Tattha madhuvāti bālassa hi pāpaṃ akusalakammaṃ karontassa taṃ kammaṃ madhu viya madhurarasaṃ viya iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0502a:1435_3: Pāpaṃ na paccatīti diṭṭhadhamme vā samparāye vā vipākaṃ na deti,
atk-s0502a:1435_5: Yadā cāti yadā panassa diṭṭhadhamme vā vividhā kammakāraṇā kayiramānassa,
atk-s0502a:1435_6: samparāye vā nirayādīsu mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantassa taṃ pāpaṃ paccati,
atk-s0502a:1435_7: atha so bālo dukkhaṃ nigacchati vindati paṭilabhatīti.
atk-s0502a:1437_0: Aparena pana samayena dhammasabhāyaṃ mahājano kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “khīṇāsavāpi maññe kāmasukhaṃ sādiyanti,
atk-s0502a:1437_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “na,
atk-s0502a:1437_17: yathā ca āragge sāsapo na vilimpati,
atk-s0502a:1437_20: evaṃ khīṇāsavassa citte duvidhopi kāmo na vilimpati,
atk-s0502a:1437_21: na saṇṭhātī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ brāhmaṇavagge gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1439_0: Yo na limpati kāmesu, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti. ;
atk-s0502a:1440_4: evaṃ kuladhītaropi mahantaṃ ñātigaṇañca bhogakkhandhañca pahāya pabbajitvā araññe viharanti.
atk-s0502a:1440_5: Tā evaṃ viharamānā rāgarattā pāpapuggalā omānātimānavasena viheṭhentipi,
atk-s0502a:1440_7: tasmā bhikkhunisaṅghassa antonagare vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1440_8: Rājā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā nagarassa ekapasse bhikkhunisaṅghassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1443_0: Māse māseti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto jambukaṃ ājīvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1444_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle gāmavāsī eko kuṭumbiko ekassa therassa vihāraṃ katvā taṃ tattha viharantaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:1444_2: Atheko khīṇāsavo bhikkhu divā piṇḍāya caranto tassa gehadvāraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1444_3: Kuṭumbiko taṃ disvā tassa iriyāpathe pasanno gehaṃ pavesetvā sakkaccaṃ paṇītena bhojanena parivisitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1444_4: imaṃ sāṭakaṃ rajitvā nivāseyyāthā”ti mahantaṃ sāṭakaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1444_7: sayanatthāya ca vo mañcakaṃ gāhāpetvā āgamissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1444_8: Nibaddhaṃ gehe bhuñjanto kulūpako bhikkhu taṃ tassa sakkāraṃ disvā cittaṃ pasādetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a:1444_9: “ayaṃ taṃ muhuttaṃ diṭṭhakassa evarūpaṃ sakkāraṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:1444_10: nibaddhaṃ gehe bhuñjantassa pana mayhaṃ na karotī”ti cintetvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1444_11: Itaropi teneva saddhiṃ gantvā kuṭumbikena dinnasāṭakaṃ rajitvā nivāsesi.
atk-s0502a:1444_12: Kuṭambikopi nhāpitaṃ ādāya gantvā therassa kese ohārāpetvā mañcakaṃ attharāpetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1444_13: imasmiṃyeva mañcake sayathā”ti vatvā dvepi there svātanāya nimantetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:1445_0: Nevāsiko tassa taṃ sakkāraṃ kayiramānaṃ adhivāsetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:1445_1: Athassa so sāyaṃ therassa nipannaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā catūhākārehi theraṃ akkosi, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:1445_2: āgantuka kuṭumbikassa te gehe bhattaṃ bhuñjanato varataraṃ mīḷhaṃ khādituṃ,
atk-s0502a:1445_3: kuṭumbikena ānītanhāpitena kesohārāpanato varataraṃ tālaṭṭhikena kese luñcāpetuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1445_5: kuṭumbikena ābhatamañcake nipajjanato varataraṃ bhūmiyaṃ nipajjitu”nti.
atk-s0502a:1445_6: Theropi “mā esa bālo maṃ nissāya nassī”ti nimantanaṃ anādiyitvā pātova uṭṭhāya yathāsukhaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1445_7: Nevāsikopi pātova vihāre kattabbavattaṃ katvā bhikkhācāravelāya “idānipi āgantuko niddāyati,
atk-s0502a:1445_8: ghaṇḍikasaddena pabujjheyyā”ti saññāya nakhapiṭṭheneva ghaṇḍiṃ paharitvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1445_9: Kuṭumbikopi sakkāraṃ katvā therānaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ olokento nevāsikaṃ disvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1445_14: tava nikkhantavelāya ovarakaṃ pavisitvā niddaṃ okkanto pātova uṭṭhāya mama vihārasammajjanasaddampi pānīyaghaṭaparibhojanīyaghaṭesu
atk-s0502a:1445_15: udakasiñcanasaddampi ghaṇḍikasaddampi karontassa na jānātī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1445_17: “tādisāya iriyāpathasampattiyā samannāgatassa me ayyassa yāva imamhā kālā niddāyanaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:1445_18: maṃ pana tassa sakkāraṃ karontaṃ disvā addhā iminā bhadantena kiñci vuttaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1445_19: So attano paṇḍitabhāvena taṃ sakkaccaṃ bhojetvā tassa pattaṃ sādhukaṃ dhovitvā nānaggarasabhojanassa pūretvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1446_2: imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne paluddho bhavissatī”ti antarāmagge taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ chaḍḍetvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ tattha olokento na addasa.
atk-s0502a:1446_3: Atha naṃ ettakassa kammassa katattā vīsativassasahassāni katopi samaṇadhammo rakkhituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:1446_4: Āyupariyosāne pana kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:1446_5: buddhuppāde rājagahanagare ekasmiṃ bahvannapāne kulaghare nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:1446_6: So padasā gamanakālato paṭṭhāya neva sayane sayituṃ,
atk-s0502a:1446_15: kevalaṃ alajjanako ājīvakānaṃ esa anucchaviko”ti tesaṃ santikaṃ netvā “imaṃ dārakaṃ pabbājethā”ti adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1446_17: Pabbājentā ca pana galappamāṇe āvāṭe ṭhapetvā dvinnaṃ aṃsakūṭānaṃ upariṃ padarāni datvā tesaṃ upari nisīditvā tālaṭṭhikhaṇḍena kese luñciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1446_18: Atha ne tassa mātāpitaro svātanāya nimantetvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1447_4: Atha naṃ punappunaṃ vatvā anicchamānaṃ ohāya agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1447_5: Sopi tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā vaccakuṭiyā padaraṃ vivaritvā oruyha ubhohi hatthehi ālopaṃ ālopaṃ katvā gūthaṃ khādi.
atk-s0502a:1447_12: Evaṃ dutiye tatiye catutthepi divase tehi bahumpi vuccamāno “ahaṃ idheva bhavissāmī”ti gāmaṃ gantuṃ na icchi.
atk-s0502a:1447_13: Ājīvakā “ayaṃ divase divase neva gāmaṃ pavisituṃ icchati,
atk-s0502a:1447_17: pariggaṇhissāma na”nti gāmaṃ pavisantā ekaṃ dve jane tassa pariggaṇhanatthaṃ ohāya gamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1447_18: Te pacchato gacchantā viya hutvā nilīyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1447_19: Sopi tesaṃ gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā purimanayeneva vaccakuṭiṃ oruyha gūthaṃ khādi.
atk-s0502a:1448_0: Itare tassa kiriyaṃ disvā ājīvakānaṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1448_3: ‘ājīvakā gūthaṃ khādamānā vicarantī’ti amhākaṃ akittiṃ pakāseyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a:1448_4: nāyaṃ amhākaṃ anucchaviko”ti taṃ attano santikā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1448_5: So tehi nīharito mahājanassa uccārakaraṇaṭṭhāne pattharito eko piṭṭhipāsāṇo atthi.
atk-s0502a:1448_8: So tattha gantvā rattiṃ gūthaṃ khāditvā mahājanassa sarīravalañjanatthāya āgamanakāle ekena hatthena
atk-s0502a:1448_9: pāsāṇassa ekaṃ antaṃ olubbha ekaṃ pādaṃ ukkhipitvā jaṇṇuke ṭhapetvā uddhaṃvātābhimukho mukhaṃ vivaritvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0502a:1448_11: kasmā ayyo mukhaṃ vivaritvā ṭhito”ti pucchati.
atk-s0502a:1448_14: Atha “kasmā ekaṃ pādaṃ jaṇṇuke katvā ṭhitosi,
atk-s0502a:1448_17: mayā dvīhi pādehi akkantā pathavī kampati,
atk-s0502a:1448_18: tasmā ekaṃ pādaṃ ukkhipitvā jaṇṇuke ṭhapetvā ṭhitomhi.
atk-s0502a:1448_25: na no evarūpā diṭṭhapubbā”ti yebhuyyena aṅgamagadhavāsino saṅkhubhitvā upasaṅkamitvā māse māse mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ abhiharanti.
atk-s0502a:1448_28: Aññañhi me khādantassa tapo nassatī”ti tehi abhihaṭaṃ na kiñci icchati.
atk-s0502a:1448_30: tumhādisena ghoratapena paribhoge kate amhākaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattatī”ti punappunaṃ yācanti.
atk-s0502a:1448_32: Mahājanassa pana yācanāya pīḷito tehi ābhatāni sappiphāṇitādīni kusaggena jivhagge ṭhapetvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0502a:1448_33: alaṃ vo ettakaṃ hitāya sukhāya cā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:1448_34: Evaṃ so pañcapaññāsa vassāni naggo gūthaṃ khādanto kese luñcanto bhūmiyaṃ sayamāno vītināmesi.
atk-s0502a:1449_0: Buddhānampi kho paccūsakāle lokavolokanaṃ avijahitameva hoti.
atk-s0502a:1449_1: Tasmā ekadivasaṃ bhagavato paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokentassa ayaṃ jambukājīvako ñāṇajālassa anto paññāyi.
atk-s0502a:1449_2: Satthā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjetvā tassa saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattassūpanissayaṃ disvā “ahaṃ etaṃ ādiṃ katvā ekaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1449_4: Imaṃ kulaputtaṃ nissāya mahājano sotthibhāvaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti ñatvā punadivase rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ānanda,
atk-s0502a:1449_7: ahamevā”ti evaṃ vatvā satthā vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya tassa santikaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:1450_2: so ca jegucche uccārapassāvadantakaṭṭhakiliṭṭhe piṭṭhipāsāṇe vasati,
atk-s0502a:1450_3: devaṃ vassāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti attano ānubhāvena taṃ muhuttaṃyeva devaṃ vassāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1450_6: Satthā sāyaṃ jambukājīvakassa santikaṃ gantvā “jambukā”ti saddamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:1450_8: dujjano maṃ jambukavādena vadatī”ti cintetvā “ko eso”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1450_26: visuṃ visuṃ pana gahetvā vicaraṇaṃ dukkha’nti abbhantareneva gahetvā carāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1451_0: Satthā tassa vasanaṭṭhānato avidūre ekaṃ pabbhāraṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:1451_1: taṃ niddisanto “etasmiṃ pabbhāre ko vasatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1451_8: Paṭhamayāme cattāro mahārājāno catuddisaṃ ekobhāsaṃ karontā satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1451_9: Jambuko obhāsaṃ disvā “ko obhāso nāmeso”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:1451_14: dasahi dasa cakkavāḷāni obhāsetuṃ samattho mahābrahmā sakalaṃ araññaṃ ekobhāsaṃ karonto āgami.
atk-s0502a:1451_15: Jambuko tampi disvā “ko nu kho eso”ti cintetvā pātova satthu santikaṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito satthāraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a:1451_17: tumhākaṃ santikaṃ catasso disā obhāsento ke āgatā”ti?
atk-s0502a:1451_21: “Kiṃ pana tvaṃ catūhi mahārājehi uttaritaro”ti? “Āma, jambuka,
atk-s0502a:1451_32: “Yaṃ loke brāhmaṇādayo khipitvā pakkhalitvā ‘namo mahābrahmuno’ti vadanti,
atk-s0502a:1451_38: mayhaṃ pana pañca paññāsa vassāni idha vasantassa etesu ekopi maṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ nāgatapubbo.
atk-s0502a:1451_39: Ahañhi ettakaṃ addhānaṃ vātabhakkho hutvā ṭhitakova vītināmesiṃ,
atk-s0502a:1451_40: na tāva te mayhaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatapubbā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1452_1: tvaṃ lokasmiṃ andhabālaṃ mahājanaṃ vañcayamāno mampi vañcetukāmo jāto,
atk-s0502a:1452_2: nanu tvaṃ pañcapaññāsa vassāni gūthameva khādi,
atk-s0502a:1452_6: Atha ca pana lokaṃ vañcento “ahaṃ vātabhakkho,
atk-s0502a:1452_10: “mamampi vañcetukāmosi pubbepi tvaṃ pāpikaṃ lāmikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya ettakaṃ kālaṃ gūthabhakkho bhūmisayo
atk-s0502a:1452_20: So taṃ nivāsetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1452_21: Satthāpissa anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathetvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a:1452_22: So desanāvasāne saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pabbajjañca upasampadañca yāci.
atk-s0502a:1452_24: Ayañhi khīṇāsavamahātheraṃ catūhi akkosehi akkositvā yāvāyaṃ mahāpathavī tigāvutādhikaṃ yojanaṃ ussannā,
atk-s0502a:1452_25: tāva avīcimhi paccitvā tattha pakkāvasesena pañcapaññāsa vassāni imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto.
atk-s0502a:1452_27: Vīsati pana vassasahassāni iminā katassa samaṇadhammassa phalaṃ nāsetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0502a:1452_29: cara brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1452_30: Tāvadevassa gihiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyi aṭṭhaparikkhāradharo saṭṭhivassikamahāthero viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1453_0: Aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ tassa sakkāraṃ gahetvā āgatadivaso kiresa,
atk-s0502a:1453_1: tasmā ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino sakkāraṃ gahetvā āgatā tathāgataṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho amhākaṃ ayyo jambuko mahā,
atk-s0502a:1453_2: udāhu samaṇo gotamo”ti cintetvā “sace samaṇo gotamo mahā bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a:1453_4: jambukājīvakassa pana mahantatāya samaṇo gotamo imassa santikaṃ āgato”ti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1453_8: ettakameva paccāsīsāmī”ti vatvā catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā uṭṭhāya tālappamāṇaṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā “satthā me,
atk-s0502a:1453_10: sāvakohamasmī”ti vatvā oruyha vanditvā puna dvitālamattaṃ titālamattanti evaṃ sattatālamattaṃ vehāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:1453_12: Taṃ disvā mahājano “aho buddhā nāma acchariyā anopamaguṇā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:1453_14: “ayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ tumhehi ābhataṃ sakkāraṃ kusaggena jivhagge ṭhapetvā ‘tapacaraṇaṃ pūremī’ti idha nivuṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:1453_15: sacepi iminā upāyena vassasataṃ tapacaraṇaṃ pūreyya,
atk-s0502a:1453_16: yā cassa idāni kālaṃ vā bhattaṃ vā kukkuccāyitvā abhuñjantassa bhattacchedanakusalacetanā,
atk-s0502a:1453_17: tassā taṃ tapacaraṇaṃ soḷasiṃ kalampi na agghatī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1456_0: Na so saṅkhātadhammānaṃ, kalaṃ agghati soḷasi”nti.
