atk-s0502a:1507_2: Pāpicchatāniddese vuttanayeneva bālo “asaddho dussīlo appassuto appavivitto kusīto anupaṭṭhitassati asamāhito
atk-s0502a:1507_3: duppañño akhīṇāsavova samāno ‘aho vata maṃ jano ayaṃ saddho, sīlavā,
atk-s0502a:1507_10: “Aho vata maṃ sakalavihāre bhikkhū parivāretvā pañhaṃ pucchantā vihareyyu”nti evaṃ icchācāre ṭhatvā purekkhārañca bhikkhūsu icchati.
atk-s0502a:1507_11: Āvāsesūti saṅghikesu ca āvāsesu yāni vihāramajjhe paṇītasenāsanāni,
atk-s0502a:1507_12: tāni attano sandiṭṭhasambhattādīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ “tumhe idha vasathā”ti vicārento sayampi varataraṃ senāsanaṃ palibodhento,
atk-s0502a:1507_13: sesānaṃ āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ paccantimāni lāmakasenāsanāni ceva amanussapariggahitāni ca “tumhe idha vasathā”ti vicārento āvāsesu issariyaṃ icchati.
atk-s0502a:1507_14: Pūjā parakulesu cāti neva mātāpitūnaṃ na ñātakānaṃ paresuyeva kulesu “aho vatime mayhameva dadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a:1507_15: na aññesa”nti evaṃ catuppaccayehi pūjaṃ icchati.
atk-s0502a:1508_0: Mameva kata maññantūti yassa ca bālassa “yaṃkiñci vihāre uposathāgārādikaraṇavasena kataṃ navakammaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1508_1: taṃ sabbaṃ amhākaṃ therena katanti evaṃ gihī ca pabbajitā ca ubhopi mameva nissāya kataṃ parikammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ maññantū”ti saṅkappo uppajjati.
atk-s0502a:1508_2: Mamevātivasā assūti “gihī ca pabbajitā ca sabbepi mameva vase vattantu,
atk-s0502a:1508_5: evarūpesu kiccākiccesu khuddakamahantesu karaṇīyesu kismiñci ekakiccepi mameva vase vattantu,
atk-s0502a:1508_7: Iti bālassāti yassa bālassa sā ca icchā ayañca evarūpo saṅkappo uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:1508_10: Kevalaṃ panassa candodaye samuddassa udakaṃ viya chasu dvāresu uppajjamānā taṇhā ceva navavidhamāno ca vaḍḍhatīti.
atk-s0502a:1510_0: Sudhammattheropi imaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ vanditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tena anudūtena bhikkhunā
atk-s0502a:1510_1: saddhiṃ gantvā upāsakassa cakkhupathe āpattiṃ paṭikaritvā upāsakaṃ khamāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1510_4: khamatha me”ti paṭikhamāpito satthārā dinne ovāde ṭhatvā katipāheneva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1510_9: So tilataṇḍulasappiphāṇitavatthacchādanādīhi paripūrāni pañca sakaṭasatāni yojāpetvā “satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmā āgacchantu,
atk-s0502a:1510_10: piṇḍapātādīhi na kilamissantī”ti bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocāpetvā bhikkhunīsaṅghassāpi upāsakānampi upāsikānampi ārocāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1510_11: Tena saddhiṃ pañcasatā pañcasatā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca upāsakā ca upāsikāyo ca nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1510_12: So tesañceva attano parisāya cāti tiṇṇaṃ janasahassānaṃ yathā tiṃsayojane magge yāgubhattādīhi kiñci vekallaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0502a:1510_14: Tassa pana nikkhantabhāvaṃ ñatvā yojane yojane devatā khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā dibbehi yāgukhajjakabhattapānakādīhi taṃ mahājanaṃ upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1510_16: Evaṃ devatāhi upaṭṭhiyamāno devasikaṃ yojanaṃ gacchanto māsena sāvatthiṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a:1510_18: Devatāhi ceva manussehi ca abhihaṭaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ vissajjentova agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1511_1: ajja vaḍḍhamānakacchāyāya citto gahapati pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto āgantvā maṃ vandissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1511_3: tassa tumhākaṃ vandanakāle kiñci pāṭihāriyaṃ bhavissatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1511_7: Tassa āgantvā “maṃ vandanakāle rājamānena aṭṭhakarīsamatte padese jaṇṇukamattena odhinā pañcavaṇṇānaṃ dibbapupphānaṃ ghanavassaṃ vassissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1511_8: Taṃ kathaṃ sutvā nagaravāsino “evaṃ mahāpuñño kira citto nāma gahapati āgantvā ajja satthāraṃ vandissati,
atk-s0502a:1511_10: mayampi taṃ mahāpuññaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhissāmā”ti paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya maggassa ubhosu passesu aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1511_11: Vihārasamīpe āgatakāle pañca bhikkhusatāni paṭhamaṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1511_13: tumhe pacchato āgacchathā”ti mahāupāsikāyo ṭhapetvā pañcahi upāsakasatehi parivuto satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1511_14: Buddhānaṃ sammukhaṭṭhāne pana ṭhitā vā nisinnā vā ito vā etto vā na honti,
atk-s0502a:1511_17: Tīṇi phalāni pattena ariyasāvakena olokitolokitaṭṭhānaṃ kampi.
atk-s0502a:1511_19: So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaṇṇānaṃ buddharasmīnaṃ anto pavisitvā dvīsu gopphakesu satthu pāde gahetvā vandi.
atk-s0502a:1511_23: vasamāno ca sakalaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ vihāreyeva nisīdāpetvā mahādānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a:1511_24: attanā saddhiṃ āgatepi antovihāreyeva katvā paṭijaggi.
atk-s0502a:1511_25: Ekadivasampi attano sakaṭesu kiñci gahetabbaṃ nāhosi,
atk-s0502a:1511_29: ahaṃ ‘tumhākaṃ dānaṃ dassāmī’ti āgacchanto māsaṃ antarāmagge ahosiṃ.
atk-s0502a:1511_31: mayā ābhataṃ paṇṇākāraṃ kiñci gahetuṃ na labhāmi,
atk-s0502a:1511_32: ettakaṃ kālaṃ devamanussehi ābhatapaṇṇākāreneva dānaṃ adāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a:1512_1: upāsakassa ekaṃ padesaṃ tucchaṃ kāretvā dehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1512_4: Upāsakopi attanā saddhiṃ āgatehi tīhi janasahassehi saddhiṃ tucchasakaṭehi puna maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0502a:1512_6: tayā tucchasakaṭehi gamanakammaṃ kata”nti sattahi ratanehi sakaṭāni pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1512_7: So attano ābhatapaṇṇākāreneva mahājanaṃ paṭijagganto agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1512_11: ettakaṃ kālaṃ devamanussehi abhihaṭapaṇṇākāreneva mahāvadānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a:1512_12: idāni pañca sakaṭasatāni tucchāni katvā māseneva kira gamissati,
atk-s0502a:1512_14: tayā tucchasakaṭehi gamanakammaṃ kata’nti pañca sakaṭasatāni sattaratanehi pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1512_15: So puna attano ābhatapaṇṇākāreneva kira mahājanaṃ paṭijagganto gamissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1512_17: etassa tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchantassevāyaṃ sakkāro uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:1512_19: mama santikaṃ āgacchantassāpi aññattha gacchantassāpi etassa uppajjateva.
atk-s0502a:1512_21: evarūpo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati,
atk-s0502a:1512_22: tattha tatthevassa lābhasakkāro nibbattatī”ti vatvā satthā imaṃ pakiṇṇakavagge gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1514_0: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:1516_0: Evaṃ vutte ānandatthero cittassa pubbakammaṃ pucchi. Athassa satthā ācikkhanto āha –
atk-s0502a:1517_1: ayaṃ padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle katābhinīhāro kappasatasahassaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā kassapabuddhakāle
atk-s0502a:1517_2: migaluddakakule nibbatto vuddhimanvāya ekadivasaṃ deve vassante migānaṃ māraṇattāya sattiṃ ādāya araññaṃ
atk-s0502a:1517_3: gantvā mige olokento ekasmiṃ akaṭapabbhāre sasīsaṃ pārupitvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ nisinnaṃ disvā “eko, ayyo,
atk-s0502a:1517_5: bhattamassa āharissāmī”ti vegena gehaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ uddhane hiyyo,
atk-s0502a:1517_7: ekasmiṃ bhattaṃ pacāpetvā aññe piṇḍapātacārike bhikkhū disvā tesampi patte ādāya paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā bhikkhaṃ sampādetvā, “ayye,
atk-s0502a:1517_8: parivisathā”ti aññaṃ āṇāpetvā taṃ bhattaṃ puṭake pakkhipitvā ādāya gacchanto antarāmagge nānāpupphāni
atk-s0502a:1517_9: ocinitvā pattapuṭe katvā therassa nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā “mayhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1517_10: saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti vatvā pattaṃ ādāya pūretvā therassa hatthe ṭhapetvā tehi pupphehi pūjaṃ katvā “yathā
atk-s0502a:1517_11: me ayaṃ rasapiṇḍapāto pupphapūjāya saddhiṃ cittaṃ tosesi,
atk-s0502a:1517_12: evaṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne paṇṇākārasahassāni ādāya āgantvā mayhaṃ cittaṃ tosentu,
atk-s0502a:1517_14: So yāvajīvaṃ kusalaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:1517_16: Idānipissa jātadivase ceva idha ca āgatassa pupphavassavassanañca paṇṇākārābhihāro ca sattahi ratanehi sakaṭapūraṇañca tasseva kammassa nissandoti.
atk-s0502a:1520_0: Aññā hi lābhūpanisāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vanavāsikatissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1521_0: Sāriputtattherasa kira pitu vaṅgantabrāhmaṇassa sahāyako mahāsenabrāhmaṇo nāma rājagahe vasati.
atk-s0502a:1521_1: Sāriputtatthero ekadivasaṃ piṇḍāya caranto tasmiṃ anukampāya tassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1521_3: So “mama putto mayhaṃ gehadvāraṃ piṇḍāya carituṃ āgato bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:1521_6: natthi me koci deyyadhammo”ti therassa sammukhā bhavituṃ asakkonto nilīyi.
atk-s0502a:1521_10: Athekadivasaṃ ekasmiṃ brāhmaṇavācake thūlasāṭakena saddhiṃ pāyasapātiṃ labhitvā ādāya gehaṃ gantvāva theraṃ anussari,
atk-s0502a:1521_12: Theropi taṃ khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā “brāhmaṇo deyyadhammaṃ labhitvā mama āgamanaṃ paccāsīsati,
atk-s0502a:1521_13: mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti saṅghāṭiṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ ādāya tassa gehadvāre ṭhitameva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:1522_1: Atha naṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā antogehe nisīdāpetvā pāyasapātiṃ gahetvā therassa patte ākiri.
atk-s0502a:1522_2: Thero upaḍḍhaṃ sampaṭicchitvā hatthena pattaṃ pidahi.
atk-s0502a:1522_9: Athassa bhattakiccapariyosāne tampi sāṭakaṃ datvā vanditvā evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1522_11: Thero “evaṃ hotu brāhmaṇā”ti tassa anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamanto anupubbena cārikaṃ caranto jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1522_12: “Duggatakāle dinnadānaṃ pana ativiya tosetī”ti brāhmaṇopi taṃ dānaṃ datvā pasannacitto somanassajāto there adhimattaṃ sinehamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:1522_13: So there sineheneva kālaṃ katvā sāvatthiyaṃ therassūpaṭṭhākakule paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:1522_14: Taṃkhaṇeyeva panassa mātā “kucchiyaṃ me gabbho patiṭṭhito”ti ñatvā sāmikassa ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1523_0: Tassā accuṇhaatisītaatiambilādiparibhogaṃ vajjetvā sukhena gabbhaṃ parihariyamānāya evarūpo dohaḷo uppajji
atk-s0502a:1523_1: “aho vatāhaṃ sāriputtattherappamukhāni pañca bhikkhusatāni nimantetvā gehe nisīdāpetvā asambhinnakhīrapāyasaṃ
atk-s0502a:1523_2: datvā sayampi kāsāyavatthāni paridahitvā suvaṇṇasarakaṃ ādāya āsanapariyante nisīditvā ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1523_4: Tassā kira so kāsāyavatthaparidahane dohaḷo kucchiyaṃ puttassa buddhasāsane pabbajjāya pubbanimittaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1523_5: Athassā ñātakā “dhammiko no dhītāya dohaḷo”ti sāriputtattheraṃ saṅghattheraṃ katvā pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ asambhinnakhīrapāyasaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1523_6: Sāpi ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā suvaṇṇasarakaṃ gahetvā āsanapariyante nisinnā ucchiṭṭhapāyasaṃ paribhuñji,
atk-s0502a:1523_9: dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijātāya katamaṅgalesupi sāriputtattherappamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1523_10: Pubbe kiresa dārakena brāhmaṇakāle dinnapāyasassa nissando.
atk-s0502a:1524_0: Jātamaṅgaladivase pana taṃ dārakaṃ pātova nhāpetvā maṇḍetvā sirisayane satasahassagghanikassa kambalassa upari nipajjāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1524_1: So tattha nipannakova theraṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ me pubbācariyo,
atk-s0502a:1524_2: mayā theraṃ nissāya ayaṃ sampatti laddhā,
atk-s0502a:1524_3: mayā imassa ekaṃ pariccāgaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sikkhāpadagahaṇatthāya ānīyamāno taṃ kambalaṃ cūḷaṅguliyā veṭhetvā aggahesi.
atk-s0502a:1524_4: Athassa “aṅguliyaṃ kambalo laggo”ti te taṃ harituṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1524_7: mā dārakaṃ rodāpethā”ti kambaleneva saddhiṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1524_8: So theraṃ vandanakāle kambalato aṅguliṃ apakaḍḍhitvā kambalaṃ therassa pādamūle pātesi.
atk-s0502a:1524_9: Ñātakā “daharakumārena ajānitvā kata”nti avatvā “puttena no dinnaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1524_12: satasahassagghanikena kambalena pūjākārakassa tumhākaṃ dāsassa sikkhāpadāni dethā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1524_16: Thero kira gihikāle upatissamāṇavo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1524_19: Evaṃ dārakassa nāmakaraṇamaṅgalaṃ katvā puna tassa āhāraparibhogamaṅgalepi puna tassa kaṇṇavijjhanamaṅgalepi
atk-s0502a:1524_20: dussagahaṇamaṅgalepi cūḷākappanamaṅgalepi sāriputtattherappamukhānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1525_2: pubbevāhaṃ ‘na mayā puttassa ajjhāsayo bhinditabbo’ti manaṃ akāsiṃ, pabbaja,
atk-s0502a:1525_3: puttā”ti theraṃ nimantāpetvā tassa āgatassa bhikkhañca datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1525_5: imaṃ ādāya sāyaṃ vihāraṃ āgamissāmā”ti theraṃ uyyojetvā sāyanhasamaye mahantena sakkārasammānena puttaṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā therassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a:1525_12: ahaṃ tumhehi vuttaniyāmeneva sabbaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1525_13: Thero “sādhū”ti vatvā tassa paṭikūlamanasikāravasena tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā taṃ pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:1525_15: Sabbaṃ kathetuṃ asakkontena pana tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetabbameva.
atk-s0502a:1525_17: Kesādīsu ekekakoṭṭhāsesu arahattaṃ pattānaṃ bhikkhūnampi bhikkhunīnampi upāsakānampi upāsikānampi paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0502a:1525_18: Abyattā bhikkhū pana pabbajentā arahattassūpanissayaṃ nāsenti.
atk-s0502a:1525_19: Tasmā thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā pabbājetvā dasasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1526_0: Mātāpitaro puttassa pabbajitasakkāraṃ karontā sattāhaṃ vihāreyeva buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1526_1: Bhikkhūpi “nibaddhaṃ appodakamadhupāyasaṃ paribhuñjituṃ na sakkomā”ti ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1526_2: Tassapi mātāpitaro sattame divase sāyaṃ gehaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1526_3: Sāmaṇero aṭṭhame divase bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1526_5: sakkāramassa karissāmā”ti pañcahi sāṭakasatehi cumbaṭakāni katvā pañca piṇḍapātasatāni sajjetvā ādāya paṭipathe ṭhatvā adaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1526_7: Evaṃ sāmaṇero dvīheva divasehi sāṭakasahassehi saddhiṃ piṇḍapātasahassaṃ labhitvā bhikkhusaṅghassa dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1527_0: Punekadivasaṃ sāmaṇero sītakāle vihāracārikaṃ caranto bhikkhū tattha tattha aggisālādīsu visibbente disvā āha – “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1527_7: kambalatthikā mayā saddhiṃ āgacchantū”ti sakalavihāre ārocāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1527_8: Atha bhikkhū “sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ gantvā kambalaṃ āharissāmā”ti sattavassikasāmaṇeraṃ nissāya sahassamattā bhikkhū nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1527_9: So “ettakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kuto kambalaṃ labhissāmī”ti cittampi anuppādetvā te ādāya nagarābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:1527_10: Sudinnassa hi dānassa evarūpo ānubhāvo hoti.
atk-s0502a:1527_11: So bahinagareyeva gharapaṭipāṭiyā caranto pañca kambalasatāni labhitvā antonagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1527_12: Manussā ito cito ca kambale āharanti.
atk-s0502a:1528_0: Eko pana puriso āpaṇadvārena āgacchanto pañca kambalasatāni pasāretvā nisinnaṃ ekaṃ āpaṇikaṃ disvā āha – “ambho,
atk-s0502a:1528_6: “Evaṃ sante sace icchāmi, dassāmi, no ce,
atk-s0502a:1528_9: Maccharino hi andhabālā evarūpesu dānaṃ dadamānesu maccharāyitvā asadisadānaṃ disvā maccharāyanto kāḷo viya niraye nibbattanti.
atk-s0502a:1528_11: “ayaṃ puriso attano dhammatāya āgacchamāno ‘tava kambale paṭicchādehī’ti maṃ āha.
atk-s0502a:1528_13: ahaṃ pana ‘mama santakaṃ sace icchāmi, dassāmi, no ce,
atk-s0502a:1528_19: Dvepi kambale dasāya dasaṃ sambandhitvā tesaṃ antare pakkhipitvā paṭicchādesi.
atk-s0502a:1528_20: Sāmaṇeropi bhikkhusahassena saddhiṃ taṃ padesaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1528_26: Te dvepi kambale nīharitvā sāmaṇerassa pādamūle ṭhapetvā vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1529_1: Evaṃ ekadivasaṃyeva kambalasahassaṃ labhitvā bhikkhusahassassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1529_3: Evaṃ nāmakaraṇadivase dinnakambalo sattavassikakāle kambalasahassabhāvaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1530_3: yathārūpe bhikkhusaṅghe appaṃ dinnaṃ bahuṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:1531_0: Evaṃ sāmaṇero ekakambalassa nissandena sattavassikova kambalasahassaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a:1531_1: Tassa jetavane viharantassa abhikkhaṇaṃ ñātidāyakā santikaṃ āgantvā kathāsallāpaṃ karonti.
atk-s0502a:1531_3: “mayā idha vasantena ñātidāyakesu āgantvā kathentesu akathetumpi na sakkā,
atk-s0502a:1531_4: etehi saddhiṃ kathāpapañcena attano patiṭṭhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0502a:1531_5: yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhitvā araññaṃ paviseyya”nti.
atk-s0502a:1531_6: So satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā upajjhāyaṃ vanditvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a:1531_8: ñātakā maṃ pakkosissantī”ti vīsati yojanasataṃ maggaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1531_9: Athekena gāmadvārena gacchanto ekaṃ mahallakapurisaṃ disvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:1531_15: Mahallakaupāsakassa pana taṃ disvāva puttasineho udapādi.
atk-s0502a:1531_18: Sāmaṇero tena saddhiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge nānāpupphaphalapaṭimaṇḍite rukkhapabbatapadese disvā “ayaṃ, upāsaka,
atk-s0502a:1531_20: ayaṃ upāsaka kiṃ padeso nāmā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1531_21: Sopissa tesaṃ nāmāni ācikkhanto āraññakavihāraṃ patvā “idaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1531_24: ko nāmo tva”nti nāmaṃ pucchitvā “ahaṃ vanavāsītisso nāma upāsakā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:1531_25: “sve amhākaṃ gāme bhikkhāya carituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā nivattitvā antogāmameva gato.
atk-s0502a:1532_0: Sāmaṇero paṭhamameva tisso nāma hutvā tato piṇḍapātadāyakatisso kambaladāyakatisso vanavāsītissoti tīṇi
atk-s0502a:1532_1: nāmāni labhitvā sattavassabbhantare cattāri nāmāni labhi.
atk-s0502a:1532_2: So punadivase pātova taṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1532_6: Ekamanussopi tassa bhikkhaṃ datvā puna gehaṃ gantuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a:1532_10: tumhesu imaṃ temāsaṃ idha vasantesu mayaṃ tīṇi saraṇāni gahetvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāya māsassa aṭṭha uposathakammāni upavasissāma,
atk-s0502a:1532_12: So upakāraṃ sallakkhetvā tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā nibaddhaṃ tattheva piṇḍapātacāraṃ cari.
atk-s0502a:1532_15: So tatthevapaṭhamamāsañca dutiyamāsañca vītināmetvā tatiyamāse gacchante saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1533_0: Athassa pavāretvā vuṭṭhavassakāle upajjhāyo satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā āha – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1533_3: So attano parivāre pañcasate bhikkhū ādāya pakkanto,
atk-s0502a:1533_8: Etenupāyena mahākassapatthero anuruddhatthero upālitthero puṇṇattheroti sabbe mahāsāvakā pañcahi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1533_9: Sabbepi mahāsāvakānaṃ parivārā cattālīsa bhikkhusahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1533_10: Te vīsatiyojanasataṃ maggaṃ gantvā gocaragāmaṃ sampattā.
atk-s0502a:1533_11: Sāmaṇerassa nibaddhūpaṭṭhāko upāsako dvāreyeva disvā paccuggantvā vandi.
atk-s0502a:1534_15: Upāsako oloketvā dhammasenāpatiṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbepi mahāsāvake sañjānitvā nirantaraṃ pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā “tiṭṭhatha tāva,
atk-s0502a:1534_17: sāriputtattheraṃ ādiṃ katvā asīti mahāsāvakā attano attano parivārehi saddhiṃ sāmaṇerassa santikaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0502a:1534_19: Manussā “tāvadeva mañcādīni gahetvā therānaṃ padānupadikā hutvā therehi saddhiṃyeva vihāraṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1534_20: Sāmaṇero bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sañjānitvā katipayānaṃ mahātherānaṃ pattacīvarāni paṭiggahetvā vattamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:1534_21: Tassa therānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ saṃvidahantassa pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmentasseva andhakāro jātā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1534_28: ito pubbe dhammassavanampi natthī”ti. “Tena hi, sāmaṇera,
atk-s0502a:1534_36: dukkhā muccathā’ti imāni dve padāni ṭhapetvā aññaṃ dhammakathaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0502a:1534_38: “Sāmaṇero pana arahattaṃ patvāpi neva tesaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1535_3: ‘kathaṃ pana dukkhā muccantī’ti imesaṃ no dvinnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ kathehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1535_5: bhante”ti cittabījaniṃ gahetvā dhammāsanaṃ āruyha pañcahi nikāyehi atthañca kāraṇañca ākaḍḍhitvā ghanavassaṃ
atk-s0502a:1535_6: vassanto cātuddīpakamahāmegho viya khandhadhātuāyatanabodhipakkhiyadhamme vibhajanto arahattakūṭena dhammakathaṃ kathetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1535_9: sesajanā jātidukkhādīhi ceva nirayadukkhādīhi ca na parimuccantī”ti āha. “Sādhu, sāmaṇera,
atk-s0502a:1535_13: Aruṇe uggacchante sāmaṇerassa upaṭṭhākamanussā dve bhāgā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1535_14: Ekacce “na vata no ito pubbe evarūpo kakkhaḷo diṭṭhapubbo.
atk-s0502a:1535_15: Kathañhi nāma evarūpaṃ dhammakathaṃ jānanto ettakaṃ kālaṃ mātāpituṭṭhāne ṭhatvā upaṭṭhahantānaṃ manussānaṃ ekampi dhammapadaṃ na kathesī”ti kujjhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1535_17: ye mayaṃ evarūpaṃ bhadantaṃ guṇaṃ vā aguṇaṃ vā ajānantāpi upaṭṭhahimha,
atk-s0502a:1535_18: idāni ca panassa santike dhammaṃ sotuṃ labhimhā”ti tussiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1536_0: Sammāsambuddhopi taṃ divasaṃ paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento vanavāsītissassa upaṭṭhāke attano ñāṇajālassa
atk-s0502a:1536_1: anto paviṭṭhe disvā “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento imamatthaṃ upadhāresi “vanavāsītissasāmaṇerassa
atk-s0502a:1536_4: mayhaṃ puttassa pana sāmaṇerassa kuddhā nirayabhāgino bhavissanti,
atk-s0502a:1536_6: mayi gate sabbepi te sāmaṇere mettacittaṃ katvā dukkhā muccissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1536_7: Tepi manussā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā gāmaṃ gantvā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā yāgubhattādīni sampādetvā āsanāni
atk-s0502a:1536_9: Bhikkhūpi sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhācāravelāya gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisantā sāmaṇeraṃ pucchiṃsu – “kiṃ, tissa,
atk-s0502a:1537_0: Satthā jetavanasmiṃyeva cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya ekacittakkhaṇeneva gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ purato ṭhitameva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:1537_2: Manussā udaggacittā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ datvā khajjakaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1537_4: Gāmavāsino nīharitvā tassa sakkaccaṃ bhikkhaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1537_5: So yāpanamattaṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā pattaṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0502a:1537_10: Thero satthu hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā sāmaṇerassa datvā “gaccha,
atk-s0502a:1537_11: attano pattaṭṭhāne nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ karohī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1538_0: Gāmavāsino buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā anumodanaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1538_3: ye tumhe attano kulūpakaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ nissāya sāriputtaṃ moggallānaṃ kassapaṃ anuruddhanti asītimahāsāvake dassanāya labhatha,
atk-s0502a:1538_5: buddhadassanampi vo imaṃ nissāyeva laddhaṃ, lābhā vo,
atk-s0502a:1538_9: buddhānañceva bhikkhusaṅghassa ca ārādhanasamatthaṃ amhākaṃ ayyaṃ dassanāya labhāma,
atk-s0502a:1538_10: deyyadhammañcassa dātuṃ labhāmā”ti sāmaṇerassa kuddhā manussā tussiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1538_18: ayaṃ padeso konāmo”ti pubbe tassa upāsakena dassitapadese pucchanto agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1538_22: Satthā tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pabbatamatthakaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0502a:1538_25: pabbatamatthake ṭhito ito cito ca oloketvā kiṃ passasī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1538_29: “Mama dukkhitakāle rodantassa catūhi mahāsamuddehi atirekatarena assunā bhavitabbanti idaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1538_32: Ekekassa hi sattassa dukkhitakāle paggharitaassūni catūhi mahāsamuddehi atirekatarānevā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1543_5: “Mayā marantena imasmiṃ ṭhāne katassa sarīranikkhepassa paricchedo ‘natthī’ti cintesiṃ,
atk-s0502a:1543_8: Imesañhi sattānaṃ pathaviyaṃ nipajjitvā amataṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:1545_0: Asmiṃ padese daḍḍhāni, natthi loke anāmataṃ.
atk-s0502a:1546_0: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
atk-s0502a:1547_0: Etaṃ ariyā sevanti, etaṃ loke anāmata”nti. (jā.1.2.31-32) –
atk-s0502a:1548_1: Iti pathaviyaṃ sarīranikkhepaṃ katvā marantesu sattesu amatapubbapadese marantā nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:1549_0: Ānandatthero kira vīsavassasatikakāle āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokento parikkhīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ito sattame divase parinibbāyissāmī”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1549_1: Taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā rohiṇīnadiyā ubhayatīravāsikesu manussesu orimatīravāsikā “mayaṃ therassa bahūpakārā,
atk-s0502a:1549_5: Thero tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “ubhayatīravāsino mayhaṃ upakārā,
atk-s0502a:1549_6: ime nāma anupakārāti na sakkā vattuṃ,
atk-s0502a:1549_8: paratīravāsino dhātugahaṇatthaṃ tehi saddhiṃ kalahaṃ karissanti.
atk-s0502a:1549_12: vūpasamamānopi maṃ nissāyeva vūpasamissatī”ti cintetvā “orimatīravāsinopi mayhaṃ upakārā,
atk-s0502a:1549_17: Tato sattame divase majjhenadiyā sattatālappamāṇe ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā mahājanassa dhammaṃ kathetvā
atk-s0502a:1549_18: “mama sarīraṃ majjhe bhijjitvā eko bhāgo orimatīre patatu,
atk-s0502a:1549_19: eko bhāgo paratīre”ti adhiṭṭhāya yathānisinnova tejodhātuṃ samāpajji,
atk-s0502a:1549_21: Sarīraṃ majjhe bhijjitvā eko bhāgo orimatīre pati,
atk-s0502a:1549_26: Manussā cattāro māse rodantā paridevantā “satthu pattacīvaraggāhake tiṭṭhante satthu ṭhitakālo viya no ahosi,
atk-s0502a:1549_27: idāni no satthā parinibbuto”ti vippalapantā viravantā vicariṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1550_4: apica kho pana me etesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā vanarati nāma uppajjatī”ti vatvā saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi vanavaṇṇanaṃ nāma kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1551_2: paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāyassa ñātakā sattasu maṅgalesu pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1551_3: pabbajitakāle antovihāre buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa satta divasāni appodakamadhupāyasameva adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1551_4: Pabbajitvā aṭṭhame divase antogāmaṃ pavisanto dvīheva divasehi sāṭakasahassena saddhiṃ piṇḍapātasahassaṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a:1551_7: idāni evarūpaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ chaḍḍetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā missakāhārena yāpeti,
atk-s0502a:1551_12: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “āma,
atk-s0502a:1551_16: ‘Evaṃ lābhaṃ labhissāmī’ti hi āraññikādidhutaṅgasamādānavasena lābhūpanisaṃ rakkhantassa bhikkhuno cattāro apāyā vivaṭadvārā eva tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0502a:1551_17: nibbānagāminiyā pana paṭipadāya uppannaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ pahāya araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭento vāyamanto arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:1551_18: gaṇhātī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1556_1: aññā nibbānagāminīti lābhūpanisā nāmesā aññā eva,
atk-s0502a:1556_3: Lābhuppādakena hi bhikkhunā thokaṃ akusalakammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:1556_7: Pāyasapātiyañhi vaṅkaṃ akatvā ujukameva hatthaṃ otāretvā ukkhipantassa hattho makkhitamattakova hoti,
atk-s0502a:1556_8: vaṅkaṃ katvā otāretvā ukkhipantassa pana pāyasapiṇḍaṃ uddharantova nikkhamati,
atk-s0502a:1556_11: Upadhisampadā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ bāhusaccaṃ parivāro araññavāsoti evarūpehi pana kāraṇehi uppanno lābho dhammiko nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a:1556_12: Nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrentena pana bhikkhunā kāyavaṅkādīni pahātabbāni.
atk-s0502a:1556_17: Evametanti etaṃ lābhuppādanaṃ paṭipadañca nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadañca evaṃ ñatvā sabbesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ
atk-s0502a:1556_18: bujjhanaṭṭhena buddhassa savanante jātaṭṭhena ovādānusāsaniṃ vā savanaṭṭhena sāvako bhikkhu adhammikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1558_0: Imaṃ tividhampi vivekaṃ brūheyya vaḍḍheyya, upasampajja vihareyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:1565_0: Nidhīnaṃva pavattāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto āyasmantaṃ rādhattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1566_0: So kira gihikāle sāvatthiyaṃ duggatabrāhmaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1566_1: So “bhikkhūnaṃ santike jīvissāmī”ti cintetvā vihāraṃ gantvā appaharitakaṃ karonto pariveṇaṃ sammajjanto mukhadhovanādīni dadanto antovihāreyeva vasi.
atk-s0502a:1566_5: Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho”ti upadhārento “arahā
atk-s0502a:1566_6: bhavissatī”ti ñatvā sāyanhasamaye vihāracārikaṃ caranto viya brāhmaṇassa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0502a:1566_14: Satthā etasmiṃ nidāne bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā tamatthaṃ pucchitvā,
atk-s0502a:1566_16: atthi koci imassa brāhmaṇassa adhikāraṃ saratī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1566_18: ayaṃ me rājagahe piṇḍāya carantassa attano abhihaṭaṃ kaṭacchubhikkhaṃ dāpesi,
atk-s0502a:1566_22: evaṃ katūpakāraṃ dukkhato mocetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vutte, “sādhu, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1566_28: idaṃ te na kattabba”nti ovadi anusāsi.
atk-s0502a:1566_30: Tasmā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāno katipāheneva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1567_0: Thero taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1567_1: Atha naṃ satthā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā āha –
atk-s0502a:1567_16: pubbepi sāriputto kataññū katavedīyevā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ –
atk-s0502a:1573_1: Tadā kira vaḍḍhakīhi pādassa arogakaraṇabhāvena kahaṃ attano upakāraṃ ñatvā sabbasetassa hatthipotakassa
atk-s0502a:1573_2: dāyako ekacāriko hatthī sāriputtatthero ahosīti evaṃ theraṃ ārabbha jātakaṃ kathetvā rādhattheraṃ ārabbha,
atk-s0502a:1573_4: bhikkhunā nāma rādhena viya suvacena bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1573_6: ovādadāyako pana nidhiācikkhaṇako viya daṭṭhabbo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1577_0: Tādisaṃ bhajamānassa, seyyo hoti na pāpiyo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1578_0: Tattha nidhīnanti tattha tattha nidahitvā ṭhapitānaṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇādipūrānaṃ nidhikumbhīnaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1578_2: sukhena jīvanūpāyaṃ dassessāmī”ti nidhiṭṭhānaṃ netvā hatthaṃ pasāretvā “imaṃ gahetvā sukhena jīvā”ti ācikkhitāraṃ viya.
atk-s0502a:1578_3: Vajjadassinanti dve vajjadassino “iminā naṃ asāruppena vā khalitena vā saṅghamajjhe niggaṇhissāmī”ti randhagavesako ca,
atk-s0502a:1578_4: aññātaṃ ñāpanatthāya ñātaṃ anuggahaṇatthāya sīlādīnamassa vuddhikāmatāya taṃ taṃ vajjaṃ olokanena ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhito ca.
atk-s0502a:1578_6: Yathā hi duggatamanusso “imaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti tajjetvāpi pothetvāpi nidhiṃ dassente kopaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0502a:1578_8: evameva evarūpe puggale asāruppaṃ vā khalitaṃ vā disvā ācikkhante kopo na kātabbo,
atk-s0502a:1578_11: mayhaṃ ācariyupajjhāyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā ovadantehi punapi maṃ vadeyyāthā”ti pavāretabbameva.
atk-s0502a:1578_12: Niggayhavādinti ekacco hi saddhivihārikādīnaṃ asāruppaṃ vā khalitaṃ vā disvā “ayaṃ me mukhodakadānādīhi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahati,
atk-s0502a:1578_15: evaṃ me parihāni bhavissatī”ti vatthuṃ avisahanto na niggayhavādī nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a:1578_17: Yo pana tathārūpaṃ vajjaṃ disvā vajjānurūpaṃ tajjento paṇāmento daṇḍakammaṃ karonto vihārā taṃ nīharanto sikkhāpeti,
atk-s0502a:1578_25: Tādisañhi ācariyaṃ bhajamānassa antevāsikassa seyyo hoti,
atk-s0502a:1582_0: Ovadeyyānusāseyyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto assajipunabbasukabhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1583_0: Te kira dve bhikkhū kiñcāpi aggasāvakānaṃ saddhivihārikā,
atk-s0502a:1583_2: Te pāpakehi attano parivārehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ kīṭāgirismiṃ viharantā “mālāvacchaṃ ropentipi
atk-s0502a:1583_3: ropāpentipī”tiādikaṃ nānappakāraṃ anācāraṃ karontā kuladūsakakammaṃ katvā tato uppannehi paccayehi jīvikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1583_4: kappentā taṃ āvāsaṃ pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anāvāsaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1583_5: Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā tesaṃ pabbājanīyakammakaraṇatthāya saparivāre dve aggasāvake āmantetvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0502a:1583_7: tesu ye tumhākaṃ vacanaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0502a:1583_11: Ovadanto hi anusāsanto apaṇḍitānaṃyeva appiyo hoti amanāpo,
atk-s0502a:1583_12: paṇḍitānaṃ pana piyo hoti manāpo”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1586_0: Satañhi so piyo hoti, asataṃ hoti appiyo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1587_0: Tattha ovadeyyāti uppanne vatthusmiṃ vadanto ovadati nāma,
atk-s0502a:1587_1: anuppanne vatthusmiṃ “ayasopi te siyā”tiādivasena anāgataṃ dassento anusāsati nāma.
atk-s0502a:1587_3: parammukhā dūtaṃ vā sāsanaṃ vā pesento anusāsati nāma.
atk-s0502a:1587_6: Ovadanto eva vā anusāsati nāmāti evaṃ ovadeyya anusāseyya.
atk-s0502a:1587_9: Satañhi so piyo hotīti so evarūpo puggalo buddhādīnaṃ sappurisānaṃ piyo hoti.
atk-s0502a:1587_10: Ye pana adiṭṭhadhammā avitiṇṇaparalokā āmisacakkhukā jīvikatthāya pabbajitā,
atk-s0502a:1587_14: kasmā amhe ovadasī’ti evaṃ mukhasattīhi vijjhantānaṃ appiyo hotī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1588_1: Sāriputtamoggallānāpi tattha gantvā te bhikkhū ovadiṃsu anusāsiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1588_2: Tesu ekacce ovādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sammā vattiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1591_0: Na bhaje pāpake mitteti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto channattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1592_0: So kira āyasmā “ahaṃ amhākaṃ ayyaputtena saddhiṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto tadā aññaṃ ekampi na passāmi,
atk-s0502a:1592_3: mayaṃ aggasāvakamhā’ti vatvā ime vicarantī”ti dve aggasāvake akkosati.
atk-s0502a:1592_4: Satthā bhikkhūnaṃ santikā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā channattheraṃ pakkosāpetvā ovadati.
atk-s0502a:1592_5: So taṅkhaṇeyeva tuṇhī hutvā puna gantvā there akkosatiyeva.
atk-s0502a:1592_6: Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ akkosantaṃ pakkosāpetvā satthā ovaditvā “channa,
atk-s0502a:1592_7: dve aggasāvakā nāma tuyhaṃ kalyāṇamittā uttamapurisā,
atk-s0502a:1592_8: evarūpe kalyāṇamitte sevassu bhajassū”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1594_0: “Na bhaje pāpake mitte, na bhaje purisādhame;
atk-s0502a:1596_2: Sandhicchedanādike vā ekavīsatianesanādibhede vā aṭṭhāne niyojakā purisādhamā nāma.
atk-s0502a:1596_3: Ubhopi vā ete pāpamittā ceva purisādhamā ca,
atk-s0502a:1596_5: viparītā pana kalyāṇamittā ceva sappurisā ca,
atk-s0502a:1598_0: Channatthero pana taṃ ovādaṃ sutvāpi purimanayeneva bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati.
atk-s0502a:1598_3: mayi dharante channaṃ sikkhāpetuṃ na sakkhissatha,
atk-s0502a:1598_4: mayi pana parinibbute sakkhissathā”ti vatvā parinibbānakāle āyasmatā ānandena, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1598_7: So satthari parinibbute ānandattherena ārocitaṃ brahmadaṇḍaṃ sutvā dukkhī dummano tikkhattuṃ mucchito patitvā “mā maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1598_8: nāsayitthā”ti yācitvā sammā vattaṃ pūrento na cirasseva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:1601_0: Dhammapīti sukhaṃ setīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahākappinattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1602_1: atīte kira āyasmā mahākappino padumuttarabuddhassa pādamūle katābhinīhāro saṃsāre saṃsaranto bārāṇasito
atk-s0502a:1602_2: avidūre ekasmiṃ pesakāragāme jeṭṭhakapesakāro hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:1602_3: Tadā sahassamattā paccekabuddhā aṭṭha māse himavante vasitvā vassike cattāro māse janapade vasanti.
atk-s0502a:1602_4: Te ekavāraṃ bārāṇasiyā avidūre otaritvā “senāsanakaraṇatthāya hatthakammaṃ yācathā”ti rañño santikaṃ aṭṭha paccekabuddhe pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1602_6: So “paccekabuddhā kira āgatā”ti sutvā tasmiṃ khaṇe nikkhamitvā āgatakāraṇaṃ pucchitvā “ajja, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1602_9: tatiyadivase karissāmī”ti vatvā paccekabuddhe animantetvāva pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1602_11: Tasmiṃ khaṇe jeṭṭhapesakārassa bhariyā kenacideva karaṇīyena bārāṇasiṃ gacchantī te paccekabuddhe disvā vanditvā “kiṃ, bhante, avelāya, ayyā,
atk-s0502a:1602_13: Taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā saddhāsampannā ñāṇasampannā itthī “sve, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1603_4: Gāmamajjhe maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā āsanāni paññāpetvā punadivase paccekabuddhe nisīdāpetvā paṇītena khādanīyena
atk-s0502a:1603_5: bhojanīyena parivisitvā bhattakiccāvasāne tasmiṃ gāme sabbā itthiyo ādāya tāhi saddhiṃ paccekabuddhe vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1603_6: temāsaṃ vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ dethā”ti tesaṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā puna gāme ugghosesi –
atk-s0502a:1603_8: ekekakulato ekeko puriso pharasuvāsiādīni gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā dabbasambhāre āharitvā ayyānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ karotū”ti.
atk-s0502a:1603_9: Gāmavāsino tassāyeva vacanaṃ sutvā ekeko ekekaṃ katvā saddhiṃ rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānehi paṇṇasālasahassaṃ
atk-s0502a:1603_10: kāretvā attano attano paṇṇasālāyaṃ vassūpagate paccekabuddhe “ahaṃ sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1603_12: Vassaṃvuṭṭhakāle “attano attano paṇṇasālāya vassaṃvuṭṭhānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ cīvarasāṭake sajjethā”ti
atk-s0502a:1604_0: Gāmavāsinopi idaṃ puññakammaṃ katvā ito cutā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattitvā gaṇadevaputtā nāma ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1604_1: Te tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā kassapasammāsambuddhakāle bārāṇasiyaṃ kuṭumbikagehesu nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1604_4: Tā sabbāpi vayappattā parakulaṃ gacchantiyo tesaṃ tesaṃyeva gehāni agamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1604_6: “Satthā dhammaṃ desessatī”ti sutvā sabbepi te kuṭumbikā “dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti bhariyāhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1604_8: Yesaṃ kulūpakā vā ñātisāmaṇerādayo vā atthi,
atk-s0502a:1604_21: Te taṃ dhanaṃ saṃharitvā sahassakūṭāgāraparivāraṃ satthu vasanatthāya mahāpariveṇaṃ nāma ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1604_22: Navakammassa mahantatāya dhane appahonte pubbe dinnadhanato puna upaḍḍhūpaḍḍhaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1604_23: Niṭṭhite pariveṇe vihāramahaṃ karontā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ cīvarāni sajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1605_0: Jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa pana bhariyā sabbehi samānaṃ akatvā attano paññāya ṭhitā “atirekataraṃ katvā satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:1605_1: pūjessāmī”ti anojapupphavaṇṇena sahassamūlena sāṭakena saddhiṃ anojapupphacaṅkoṭakaṃ gahetvā anumodanakāle
atk-s0502a:1605_2: satthāraṃ anojapupphehi pūjetvā taṃ sāṭakaṃ satthu pādamūle ṭhapetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1605_4: anojā eva ca me nāmaṃ hotū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:1605_6: Te sabbepi yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde devalokā cavitvā jeṭṭhakakuṭumbiko
atk-s0502a:1605_7: kukkuṭavatīnagare rājakule nibbattitvā vayappatto mahākappinarājā nāma ahosi,
atk-s0502a:1605_9: Jeṭṭhakakuṭumbikassa bhariyā maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagare rājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:1605_12: Sā vayappattā mahākappinarañño gehaṃ gantvā anojādevī nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1605_13: Sesitthiyopi amaccakulesu nibbattitvā vayappattā tesaṃyeva amaccaputtānaṃ gehāni agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1605_14: Te sabbe rañño sampattisadisaṃ sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1605_15: Yadā rājā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito hatthiṃ abhiruhitvā vicari,
atk-s0502a:1605_17: Tasmiṃ assena vā rathena vā vicarante tepi tatheva vicaranti?
atk-s0502a:1605_18: Evaṃ te ekato hutvā katānaṃ puññānaṃ ānubhāvena ekatova sampattiṃ anubhaviṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1605_23: Rājā tesu supattaṃ assaṃ sayaṃ ārohati,
atk-s0502a:1605_25: Rājā te pātova bhojetvā “gacchatha dve vā tīṇi vā yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa
atk-s0502a:1605_26: vā uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā mayhaṃ sukhasāsanaṃ āharathā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a:1605_27: Te catūhi dvārehi nikkhamitvā tīṇi yojanāni āhiṇḍitvā sāsanaṃ alabhitvā paccāgacchanti.
atk-s0502a:1606_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā supattaṃ assaṃ āruyha amaccasahassaparivuto uyyānaṃ gacchanto kilantarūpe pañcasatavāṇijake
atk-s0502a:1606_2: addhā imesaṃ santikā ekaṃ bhaddakaṃ sāsanaṃ sossāmī”ti te pakkosāpetvā “kuto āgacchathā”ti pucchi. “Atthi, deva,
atk-s0502a:1606_5: “Atthi pana vo padese kiñci sāsanaṃ uppanna”nti. “Deva,
atk-s0502a:1606_8: Rājā tāvadeva pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro kiñci sallakkhetuṃ asakkonto muhuttaṃ vītināmetvā, “tātā,
atk-s0502a:1606_11: Rājā dutiyampi tatiyampi tatheva vītināmetvā catutthe vāre “kiṃ vadetha,
atk-s0502a:1606_14: vo satasahassaṃ dadāmī”ti vatvā “aññampi kiñci sāsanaṃ atthī”ti pucchi. “Atthi, deva,
atk-s0502a:1606_16: Rājā tampi sutvā purimanayeneva tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthe vāre “dhammo uppanno”ti vutte “idhāpi
atk-s0502a:1606_17: vo satasahassaṃ dammī”ti vatvā “aparampi sāsanaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:1606_20: Rājā tampi sutvā tayo vāre vītināmetvā catutthe vāre “saṅgho”ti pade vutte “idhāpi vo satasahassaṃ dammī”ti vatvā amaccasahassaṃ oloketvā, “tātā,
atk-s0502a:1606_25: saṅgho uppanno’ti sutvā na puna nivattissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1606_26: satthāraṃ uddissa gantvā tassa santike pabbajissāmī”ti. “Mayampi, deva,
atk-s0502a:1606_28: Rājā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe akkharāni likhāpetvā vāṇijake āha –
atk-s0502a:1606_29: “anojā nāma devī tumhākaṃ tīṇi satasahassāni dassati,
atk-s0502a:1606_30: evañca pana naṃ vadeyyātha ‘rañño kira te issariyaṃ vissaṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1606_34: Amaccāpi attano attano bhariyānaṃ tatheva sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1606_35: Rājā vāṇijake uyyojetvā assaṃ abhiruyha amaccasahassaparivuto taṃ khaṇaṃyeva nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:1607_0: Satthāpi taṃ divasaṃ paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento mahākappinarājānaṃ saparivāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ mahākappino
atk-s0502a:1607_1: vāṇijakānaṃ santikā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ sutvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ tīhi satasahassehi pūjetvā rajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:1607_2: pahāya amaccasahassehi parivuto maṃ uddissa pabbajitukāmo sve nikkhamissati.
atk-s0502a:1607_3: So saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati,
atk-s0502a:1607_4: paccuggamanamassa karissāmī”ti punadivase cakkavattī viya khuddakagāmabhojakaṃ paccuggacchanto sayameva
atk-s0502a:1607_5: pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vīsayojanasataṃ maggaṃ paccuggantvā candabhāgāya nadiyā tīre nigrodharukkhamūle
atk-s0502a:1607_7: “Rājāpi āgacchanto ekaṃ nadiṃ patvā “kā nāmesā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1607_12: “Atthi panettha nāvā vā uḷumpo vā”ti? “Natthi, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1607_15: Ahaṃ nibbematiko hutvā tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhanto,
atk-s0502a:1607_16: tesaṃ me ānubhāvena imaṃ udakaṃ udakaṃ viya mā ahosī”ti tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ āvajjetvā “itipi so bhagavā
atk-s0502a:1607_17: arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti buddhānussatiṃ anussaranto saparivāro assasahassena udakapiṭṭhiṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:1608_0: So taṃ uttaritvā purato gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā “ayaṃ kā nāmā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1608_5: Taṃ pana nadiṃ disvā “svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo”ti dhammānussatiṃ anussaranto pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:1608_6: Tampi atikkamitvā gacchanto aparampi nadiṃ disvā “ayaṃ kā nāmā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1608_11: Imaṃ pana nadiṃ disvā “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”ti saṅghānussatiṃ anussaranto pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:1608_12: Taṃ pana nadiṃ atikkamitvā gacchanto satthu sarīrato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo addasa.
atk-s0502a:1608_18: addhā ahaṃ satthāraṃ uddissa āgacchanto mahāgotamabuddhena diṭṭho bhavissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1608_19: So tāvadeva assapiṭṭhito otaritvā onatasarīro rasmianusārena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā manosilārase nimujjanto
atk-s0502a:1608_20: viya buddharasmīnaṃ anto pavisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi saddhiṃ amaccasahassena,
atk-s0502a:1608_24: Satthā “āgamissati nu kho imesaṃ kulaputtānaṃ iddhimayapattacīvara”nti upadhārento “ime kulaputtā paccekabuddhasahassassa cīvarasahassaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1608_26: Anacchariyaṃ imesaṃ iddhimayapattacīvarāgamana”nti ñatvā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “etha,
atk-s0502a:1608_28: caratha brahmacariyaṃ sammā dukkhassa antakiriyāyā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1608_29: Te tāvadeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya hutvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā paccorohitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1609_0: Tepi vāṇijakā rājakulaṃ gantvā raññā pahitabhāvaṃ ārocāpetvā deviyā “āgacchantū”ti vutte pavisitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1609_7: kismiṃ vo rājā pasanno ettakaṃ dhanaṃ dāpesī”ti? “Devi,
atk-s0502a:1609_14: Sāpi “taṃ sutvā purimanayeneva pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā tikkhattuṃ kiñci asallakkhetvā catutthe vāre ‘buddho’ti padaṃ sutvā, tātā,
atk-s0502a:1609_17: ananucchavikaṃ raññā kataṃ evarūpaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā tumhākaṃ satasahassaṃ dadamānena.
atk-s0502a:1609_18: Ahañhi vo mama duggatapaṇṇākāre tīṇi satasahassāni dammi,
atk-s0502a:1609_20: Te idañcidañcāti itarānipi dve sāsanāni ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1609_21: Devī purimanayeneva pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā tikkhattuṃ kiñci asallakkhetvā catutthe vāre tatheva sutvā tīṇi tīṇi satasahassāni dāpesi,
atk-s0502a:1609_22: evaṃ te sabbānipi dvādasa satasahassāni labhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1610_11: “Kiṃ pana tehi amhākaṃ sāsanaṃ pahitaṃ, devī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1610_13: tumhe kira taṃ sampattiṃ yathāruci paribhuñjathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1610_16: so tāva rājā sāsanaṃ sutvā magge ṭhitakova tīhi satasahassehi tīṇi ratanāni pūjetvā kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya sampattiṃ pahāya ‘pabbajissāmī’ti nikkhanto,
atk-s0502a:1610_17: mayā pana tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā tīṇi ratanāni navahi satasahassehi pūjitāni,
atk-s0502a:1610_18: na kho panesā sampatti nāma raññoyeva dukkhā,
atk-s0502a:1610_20: Ko raññā chaḍḍitakheḷapiṇḍaṃ jāṇukehi patiṭṭhahitvā mukhena gaṇhissati,
atk-s0502a:1610_25: tena hi ethā”ti rathasahassaṃ yojāpetvā rathaṃ āruyha tāhi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā antarāmagge paṭhamaṃ nadiṃ disvā yathā raññā puṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1610_26: tatheva pucchitvā sabbapavattiṃ sutvā “rañño gatamaggaṃ olokethā”ti vatvā “sindhavānaṃ padavalañjaṃ na passāma,
atk-s0502a:1610_27: devī”ti vutte “rājā tīṇi ratanāni uddissa nikkhanto saccakiriyaṃ katvā gato bhavissati.
atk-s0502a:1610_29: tesameva anubhāvena idaṃ udakaṃ viya mā ahosī”ti tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ anussaritvā rathasahassaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a:1610_32: Eteneva upāyena itarā dve nadiyo uttari.
atk-s0502a:1611_0: Atha satthā tassāgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā yathā attano santike nisinnā bhikkhū na paññāyanti,
atk-s0502a:1611_2: Sāpi gacchantī gacchantī satthu sarīrato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo disvā tatheva cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1611_3: mahākappino tumhākaṃ uddissa nikkhanto āgatettha maññe, kahaṃ so,
atk-s0502a:1611_7: Tā sabbāpi tuṭṭhacittā “idheva kira nisinnā sāmike passissāmā”ti nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1611_10: Mahākappinatthero tāsaṃ vaḍḍhitadhammadesanaṃ suṇanto saparivāro saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1611_11: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā tāsaṃ te bhikkhū arahattappatte dassesi.
atk-s0502a:1611_12: Tāsaṃ kira āgatakkhaṇeyeva attano sāmike kāsāvadhare muṇḍakasīse disvā cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a:1611_14: Tasmā acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhitakāle tāsaṃ te bhikkhū arahattappatteyeva dassesi.
atk-s0502a:1612_1: tumhākaṃ tāva pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ patta”nti vatvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā pabbajjaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1612_2: Evaṃ kira vutte “satthā uppalavaṇṇāya āgamanaṃ cintesī”ti ekacce vadanti.
atk-s0502a:1612_5: Tā anupubbena janapadacārikaṃ caramānā antarāmagge mahājanena abhihaṭasakkārasammānā padasāva vīsayojanasatikaṃ
atk-s0502a:1612_7: Satthāpi bhikkhusahassaṃ ādāya ākāseneva jetavanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1612_8: Tatra sudaṃ āyasmā mahākappino rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānādīsu “aho sukhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1612_13: attano kāmasukhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ ārabbha kathesi maññe”ti.
atk-s0502a:1612_14: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, kappina,
atk-s0502a:1612_17: taṃ ārabbha udānabhāvaṃ vā anudānabhāvaṃ vā jānātī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1612_20: mama putto kāmasukhaṃ rajjasukhaṃ ārabbha udānaṃ udāneti,
atk-s0502a:1612_21: puttassa pana me dhammapīti nāma dhammarati nāma uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:1612_22: so amatamahānibbānaṃ ārabbha eva udānaṃ udānesī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1616_2: Dhammo ca nāmesa na sakkā bhājanena yāguādīni viya pātuṃ?
atk-s0502a:1616_3: Navavidhaṃ pana lokuttaradhammaṃ nāmakāyena phusanto ārammaṇato sacchikaronto pariññābhisamayādīhi dukkhādīni
atk-s0502a:1616_8: Ariyappavediteti buddhādīhi ariyehi pavedite satipaṭṭhānādibhede bodhipakkhiyadhamme.
atk-s0502a:1616_9: Sadā ramatīti evarūpo dhammapīti vippasannena cetasā viharanto paṇḍiccena samannāgato sadā ramati abhiramatīti.
atk-s0502a:1620_0: Udakañhi nayantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paṇḍitasāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1621_0: Atīte kira kassapasammāsambuddho vīsatikhīṇāsavasahassaparivāro bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1621_1: Manussā attano balaṃ sallakkhetvā aṭṭhapi dasapi ekato hutvā agantukadānādīni adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1622_1: kiṃ parena samādapitenā’ti attanāva dānaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a:1622_8: no bhogasampadaṃ ekacco attanāpi na deti,
atk-s0502a:1623_0: Taṃ sutvā samīpe ṭhito eko paṇḍitapuriso cintesi –
atk-s0502a:1623_9: sabbehi saddhiṃ svātanāya mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1623_15: tattakānaṃ dānaṃ dethā”ti ārocetvā vicaranto attano attano balaṃ sallakkhetvā “mayaṃ dasannaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0502a:1623_18: mayaṃ pañcasatāna”nti vutte sabbesaṃ vacanaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya paṇṇe āropesi.
atk-s0502a:1624_0: Tena ca samayena tasmiṃ nagare atiduggatabhāveneva “mahāduggato”ti paññāto eko puriso atthi.
atk-s0502a:1624_8: mayhaṃ pana sve yāguatthāya taṇḍulanāḷimattampi natthi,
atk-s0502a:1624_12: Tasmā so tena “natthī”ti vuttepi tuṇhībhūto ahutvā evamāha –
atk-s0502a:1624_14: imasmiṃ nagare subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā sukhumavatthaṃ nivāsetvā nānābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitā sirisayane sayamānā bahū janā sampattiṃ anubhavanti,
atk-s0502a:1624_15: tvaṃ pana divasaṃ bhatiṃ katvā kucchipūraṇamattampi na labhasi,
atk-s0502a:1624_16: evaṃ santepi ‘ahaṃ pubbe puññaṃ akatattā kiñci na labhāmī’ti na jānāsī”ti? “Jānāmi, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1624_19: kiṃ tayā bhatiṃ katvāpi yathābalaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:1624_20: So tasmiṃ kathenteyeva saṃvegappatto hutvā “mayhampi ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ paṇṇe āropehi,
atk-s0502a:1624_21: kiñcideva bhatiṃ katvā ekassa bhikkhaṃ dassāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1624_22: Itaro “kiṃ ekena bhikkhunā paṇṇe āropitenā”ti na āropesi?
atk-s0502a:1624_30: mayaṃ pubbepi kiñci adatvā idāni duggatā jātā,
atk-s0502a:1624_31: mayaṃ ubhopi bhatiṃ katvā ekassa bhikkhaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0502a:1624_32: sāmī”ti vatvā ubhopi gehā nikkhamitvā bhatiṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1625_6: “Tena hi mayaṃ sve dve tīṇi bhikkhusatāni bhojessāma, ehi,
atk-s0502a:1625_8: Mahāduggato daḷhaṃ kacchaṃ bandhitvā mahussāhappatto vāsiṃ pahāya pharasuṃ gaṇhanto,
atk-s0502a:1625_9: pharasuṃ pahāya vāsiṃ gaṇhanto dārūni phāleti.
atk-s0502a:1625_11: tvaṃ ajja ativiya ussāhappatto kammaṃ karosi,
atk-s0502a:1625_16: ‘ahaṃ duggato’ti tuṇhībhāvaṃ anāpajjitvā ‘bhatiṃ katvā ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhojessāmī’ti vadatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1625_18: kiṃ kammaṃ karissasī”ti pucchitvā “yaṃ tumhe kāressatha,
atk-s0502a:1625_19: taṃ karomī”ti vutte udukkhalasālaṃ pavesetvā suppamusalādīni dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1625_20: Sā naccantī viya tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhā vīhiṃ koṭṭeti ceva ophuṇāti ca.
atk-s0502a:1625_24: imaṃ bhatiṃ katvā mayampi ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhojessāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1625_25: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhibhariyāpi tassaṃ “aho vatāyaṃ dukkarakārikā”ti pasīdi.
atk-s0502a:1625_26: Seṭṭhi mahāduggatassa dārūnaṃ phālitakāle “ayaṃ te bhatī”ti sālīnaṃ catasso nāḷiyo dāpetvā “ayaṃ te tuṭṭhidāyo”ti aparāpi catasso nāḷiyo dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1626_4: Seṭṭhibhariyāpi puna tassā ekaṃ sappikaroṭikañceva dadhibhājanañca kaṭukabhaṇḍañca suddhataṇḍuḷināḷiñca dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1626_5: Iti ca ubhinnampi nava taṇḍulanāḷiyo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1626_6: Te “deyyadhammo no laddho”ti tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā pātova uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1626_9: So antarāpaṇe paṇṇaṃ adisvā nadītīraṃ gantvā “ajja ayyānaṃ bhojanaṃ dātuṃ labhissāmī”ti pahaṭṭhamānaso gāyanto paṇṇaṃ uccinati.
atk-s0502a:1626_10: Mahājālaṃ khipitvā ṭhito kevaṭṭo “mahāduggatassa saddena bhavitabba”nti taṃ pakkositvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:1626_22: “Ime macche gahetvā pādagghanakāni aḍḍhagghanakāni kahāpaṇagghanakāni ca uddānāni karohī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1626_24: Baddhabaddhe macche nagaravāsino nimantitanimantitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya hariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1626_30: “Tena hi mayā attano atthāya vālukāya nikhaṇitvā cattāro rohitamacchā ṭhapitā,
atk-s0502a:1626_32: ime gahetvā gacchā”ti te macche tassa adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1627_0: Taṃ divasaṃ pana satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento mahāduggataṃ attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:1627_1: “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti āvajjento “mahāduggato ‘ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhojessāmī’ti bhariyāya saddhiṃ hiyyo
atk-s0502a:1627_3: kataraṃ nu kho bhikkhuṃ labhissatī”ti cintetvā “manussā paṇṇe āropitasaññāya bhikkhū gahetvā attano attano gehesu nisīdāpessanti,
atk-s0502a:1627_4: mahāduggato maṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ na labhissatī”ti upadhāresi.
atk-s0502a:1627_6: Tasmā satthā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā “mahāduggataṃ saṅgaṇhissāmī”ti gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1627_7: Mahāduggatepi macche gahetvā gehaṃ pavisante sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:1627_9: mahāduggato ‘ekassa bhikkhuno bhikkhaṃ dassāmī’ti attano bhariyāya saddhiṃ bhatiṃ akāsi,
atk-s0502a:1627_10: kataraṃ nu kho bhikkhuṃ labhissatī”ti cintetvā “natthetassa añño bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a:1627_11: satthā pana mahāduggatassa saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinno.
atk-s0502a:1627_12: Mahāduggato attano upakappanakaṃ yāgubhattaṃ paṇṇasūpeyyampi tathāgatassa dadeyya,
atk-s0502a:1627_13: “yaṃnūnāhaṃ mahāduggatassa gehaṃ gantvā bhattakārakakammaṃ kareyya”nti aññātakavesena tassa gehasamīpaṃ
atk-s0502a:1627_14: gantvā “atthi nu kho kassaci kiñci bhatiyā kātabba”nti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1627_21: tuyhaṃ pana kiñci dātabbaṃ bhatiṃ na passāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1627_30: So tassa gehaṃ pavisitvā telataṇḍulādīni āharāpetvā “gaccha,
atk-s0502a:1627_32: Dānaveyyāvaṭikopi paṇṇe āropitaniyāmeneva tesaṃ tesaṃ gehāni bhikkhū pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:1628_0: Mahāduggato tassa santikaṃ gantvā “mayhaṃ pattabhikkhuṃ dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1628_1: So tasmiṃ khaṇe satiṃ labhitvā “ahaṃ tava bhikkhuṃ pamuṭṭho”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1628_2: Mahāduggato tikhiṇāya sattiyā kucchiyaṃ pahaṭo viya, “sāmi,
atk-s0502a:1628_4: ahaṃ tayā hiyyo samādapito bhariyāya saddhiṃ divasaṃ bhatiṃ katvā ajja pātova paṇṇatthāya nadītīre āhiṇḍitvā āgato,
atk-s0502a:1628_5: dehi me ekaṃ bhikkhu”nti bāhā paggayha paridevi.
atk-s0502a:1628_11: tayā esa ‘bhatiṃ katvā ekassa bhikkhussa bhikkhaṃ dehī’ti samādapito”ti? “Āma, ayyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1628_13: yo tvaṃ ettake bhikkhū saṃvidahanto etassa ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ nādāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1628_14: So tesaṃ vacanena maṅkubhūto taṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:1628_18: manussā paṇṇe āropitaniyāmena attano attano pattabhikkhū nayiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1628_19: attano gehe nisinnabhikkhuṃ nīharitvā dento nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:1628_20: satthā pana mukhaṃ dhovitvā gandhakuṭiyameva nisinno,
atk-s0502a:1628_21: rājayuvarājasenāpatiādayo satthu gandhakuṭito nikkhamanaṃ olokentā nisinnā satthu pattaṃ gahetvā ‘gamissāmā’ti.
atk-s0502a:1629_1: Atha naṃ aññesu divasesu vihāre vighāsādabhāvena diṭṭhattā rājayuvarājādayo,
atk-s0502a:1629_7: Satthāraṃ pana vandituṃ āgacchāmī”ti vadanto gantvā gandhakuṭiyā ummāre sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1629_11: Satthā gandhakuṭidvāraṃ vivaritvā pattaṃ nīharitvā tassa hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:1629_14: Satthārā dinnapattañhi koci issariyavasena gahetuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:1629_17: satthu pattaṃ amhākaṃ dehi ettakaṃ nāma te dhanaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0502a:1629_23: Avasesā taṃ yācitvā pattaṃ alabhitvā nivattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1629_24: Rājā pana “mahāduggato dhanena palobhiyamānopi satthu pattaṃ na deti,
atk-s0502a:1629_25: satthārā ca sayaṃ dinnapattaṃ koci gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:1629_27: iminā deyyadhammassa dinnakāle satthāraṃ ādāya gehaṃ netvā mayhaṃ sampāditaṃ āhāraṃ dassāmī”ti cintetvā satthārā saddhiṃyeva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1629_28: Sakkopi devarājā yāgukhajjakabhattasūpeyyapaṇṇādīni sampādetvā satthu nisīdanārahaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1630_4: Buddhā ca nāma gehaṃ pavisantā na onamitvā pavisanti.
atk-s0502a:1630_5: Gehañhi pavisanakāle mahāpathavī vā heṭṭhā ogacchati,
atk-s0502a:1630_8: Puna nikkhamitvā gatakāle sabbaṃ pākatikameva hoti.
atk-s0502a:1630_9: Tasmā satthā ṭhitakova gehaṃ pavisitvā sakkena paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1630_12: tayā amhākaṃ yācantānampi satthu patto na dinno,
atk-s0502a:1630_19: iminā deyyadhamme dinne satthāraṃ gehaṃ netvā attano sampāditaṃ āhāraṃ dassāmī’ti cintetvā āgato,
atk-s0502a:1630_23: Sakkopi satthāraṃ yāguādīni datvā sakkaccaṃ parivisi.
atk-s0502a:1630_24: Satthāpi katabhattakicco anumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:1631_2: Sakko nivattitvā mahāduggatassa gehadvāre ṭhito ākāsaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0502a:1631_3: Tāvadeva ākāsato sattaratanavassaṃ vassitvā tassa gehe sabbabhājanāni pūretvā sakalaṃ gehaṃ pūresi.
atk-s0502a:1631_5: Tassa bhariyā dārake hatthesu gahetvā nīharitvā bahi aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1631_6: So satthāraṃ anugantvā nivatto dārake bahi disvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchi. “Sāmi,
atk-s0502a:1631_7: sakalaṃ no gehaṃ sattahi ratanehi puṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1631_9: So “ajjeva me dānena vipāko dinno”ti cintetvā rañño santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā,
atk-s0502a:1631_14: ajjeva matthakaṃ patta”nti cintetvā taṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:1631_17: Rājā sakaṭasahassaṃ pesetvā dhanaṃ āharāpetvā rājaṅgaṇe okirāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1631_19: Rājā nagare sannipātāpetvā “imasmiṃ nagare atthi kassaci ettakaṃ dhana”nti pucchi. “Natthi, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1631_22: Rājā tassa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1632_0: Athassa pubbe ekassa seṭṭhino gehaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā “ettha jāte gacche harāpetvā gehaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā vasāhī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1632_1: Tassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ sodhetvā samaṃ katvā bhūmiyā khaññamānāya aññamaññaṃ āhacca nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1632_4: So gehaṃ kāretvā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1632_5: Tato parampi yāvatāyukaṃ tiṭṭhanto puññāni karitvā āyupariyosāne devaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0502a:1633_0: Ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde tato cuto sāvatthiyaṃ sāriputtattherassūpaṭṭhākakule
atk-s0502a:1633_2: Athassā mātāpitaro gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā gabbhaparihāraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1633_3: Tassā aparena samayena evarūpo dohaḷo uppajji –
atk-s0502a:1633_4: “aho vatāhaṃ dhammadesanāpatiṃ ādiṃ katvā pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ rohitamaccharasena dānaṃ datvā kāsāyāni
atk-s0502a:1633_5: vatthāni nivāsetvā āsanapariyante nisinnā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ucchiṭṭhabhattaṃ paribhuñjeyya”nti.
atk-s0502a:1633_8: Athassā tato aparesupi sattasu maṅgalesu rohitamaccharaseneva dhammasenāpatittherappamukhāni pañca bhikkhusatāni bhojesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1633_10: Ayamassa pana mahāduggatakāle dinnassa rohitamaccharasadānasseva nissando.
atk-s0502a:1633_12: dāsassa vo sikkhāpadāni dethā”ti mātarā vutte thero āha –
atk-s0502a:1633_14: imassa dārakassa kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya imasmiṃ gehe jaḷā eḷamūgāpi paṇḍitā jātā,
atk-s0502a:1633_15: tasmā me puttassa paṇḍitotveva nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1633_17: Jātadivasato paṭṭhāya panassa “nāhaṃ mama puttassa ajjhāsayaṃ bhindissāmī”ti mātu cittaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0502a:1633_20: ‘ahaṃ tava ajjhāsayaṃ na bhindissāmicceva manaṃ uppādesi”’nti vatvā theraṃ nimantetvā bhojetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1633_22: ahaṃ imaṃ sāyanhasamaye vihāraṃ ānessāmī”ti theraṃ uyyojetvā ñātake sannipātāpetvā “mama puttassa gihikāle
atk-s0502a:1633_23: kattabbasakkāraṃ ajjeva karissāmā”ti mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ kāretvā taṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā “imaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1634_1: tumhākaṃ ovāda”nti vutte “tena hi ehī”ti kese temetvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhitvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:1634_2: Mātāpitaropissa sattāhaṃ vihāreyeva vasantā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa rohitamaccharaseneva dānaṃ datvā sattame divase sāyaṃ gehaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1634_3: Thero aṭṭhame divase antogāmaṃ gacchanto taṃ ādāya gacchati,
atk-s0502a:1634_6: Na tāvassa pattacīvaraggahaṇāni vā iriyāpatho vā pāsādiko hoti,
atk-s0502a:1634_8: Thero hi bhikkhusaṅghe antogāmaṃ paviṭṭhe sakalavihāraṃ vicaranto asammajjanaṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā tucchabhājanesu
atk-s0502a:1634_9: pānīyaparibhojanīyāni upaṭṭhapetvā dunnikkhittāni mañcapīṭhādīni paṭisāmetvā pacchā gāmaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0502a:1634_10: Apica “aññatitthiyā tucchavihāraṃ pavisitvā ‘passatha samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakānaṃ nisinnaṭṭhānānī’ti
atk-s0502a:1634_11: vattuṃ mā labhiṃsū”ti sakalavihāraṃ paṭijaggitvā pacchā gāmaṃ pavisati.
atk-s0502a:1634_12: Tasmā taṃ divasampi sāmaṇerena pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā divātaraṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1635_0: Sāmaṇero upajjhāyena saddhiṃ gacchanto antarāmagge mātikaṃ disvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1635_5: “Ito cito ca udakaṃ āharitvā attano sassakammaṃ sampādentī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1635_13: “sace evarūpampi acittakaṃ attano icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ haritvā kammaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a:1635_14: kasmā sacittakāpi cittaṃ attano vase vattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1635_15: Atheso purato gacchanto usukāre saradaṇḍakaṃ aggimhi tāpetvā akkhikoṭiyā oloketvā ujukaṃ karonte disvā, “ime, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1635_23: “sace acittakaṃ gahetvā aggimhi tāpetvā ujuṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a:1635_24: kasmā sacittakāpi attano cittaṃ vase vattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1635_25: Atheso purato gacchanto dārūni araneminābhiādīni tacchante disvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:1635_35: kasmā sacittakā attano cittaṃ vase vattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1635_39: Thero “ayaṃ adhunā pabbajito daharasāmaṇero maṃ anubandhamāno evaṃ vadetī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvāva “āhara,
atk-s0502a:1636_1: mayhaṃ āhāraṃ āharanto rohitamaccharaseneva āhareyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1636_3: attano puññena alabhantā mama puññena labhissathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1636_4: Thero “daharasāmaṇerassa bahi nisinnakassa paripanthopi bhaveyyā”ti kuñjikaṃ datvā “mayhaṃ vasanagabbhassa
atk-s0502a:1636_5: dvāraṃ vivaritvā anto pavisitvā nisīdeyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1636_6: So tathā katvā attano karajakāye ñāṇaṃ otāretvā attabhāvaṃ sammasanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1636_7: Athassa guṇatejena sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:1636_8: So “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti upadhārento “paṇḍitasāmaṇero upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti nivatto,
atk-s0502a:1636_9: mayāpi tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā cattāro mahārāje āmantetvā “vihārassa upavane vasante sakuṇe
atk-s0502a:1636_10: palāpetvā samantato ārakkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā candadevaputtaṃ “candamaṇḍalaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā gaṇhāhī”ti,
atk-s0502a:1636_11: sūriyadevaputtaṃ “sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā gaṇhāhī”ti vatvā sayaṃ gantvā āviñchanarajjuṭṭhāne ārakkhaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0502a:1636_14: So antarābhatteyeva attabhāvaṃ sammasitvā tīṇi phalāni pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1637_1: tassa upakappanakaṃ bhojanaṃ asukakule nāma sakkā laddhu”nti ekaṃ pemagāravayuttaṃ upaṭṭhākakulaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1637_2: Tattha ca manussā taṃ divasaṃ rohitamacche labhitvā therasseva āgamanaṃ olokento nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1637_4: bhaddakaṃ vo kataṃ idhāgacchantehī”ti antogehe pavesetvā yāgukhajjakādīni datvā rohitamaccharasenassa piṇḍapātaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1637_7: haraṇakabhattampi labhissathā”ti vatvā therassa bhattakiccāvasāne pattaṃ rohitamaccharasabhojanassa pūretvā adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1637_9: Satthāpi taṃ divasaṃ kālasseva bhuñjitvā vihāraṃ gantvā evaṃ āvajjesi –
atk-s0502a:1637_11: nipphajjissati nu kho assa pabbajitakicca”nti upadhārento tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ pattabhāvaṃ ñatvā “arahattassa upanissayo atthi,
atk-s0502a:1637_12: natthī”ti āvajjento “atthī”ti disvā “purebhattameva arahattaṃ pattuṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0502a:1637_16: antarāyampissa kareyya dvārakoṭṭhake ārakkhaṃ gahetvā nisīdissāmi,
atk-s0502a:1637_18: tasmiṃ pañhe vissajjiyamāne sāmaṇero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1637_19: Tato gantvā dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā sampattaṃ theraṃ cattāro pañhe pucchi,
atk-s0502a:1638_15: “jighacchitena hi paribhutto āhāro tassa khuddaṃ pariharitvā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ āharati.
atk-s0502a:1638_16: Āhāraparibhogena sukhitassa sukhāya vedanāya uppajjamānāya sarīre vaṇṇasampatti hoti.
atk-s0502a:1638_18: Sukhito pana āhārajarūpavasena uppannasukhasomanasso ‘idāni me assādo jāto’ti nippajjanto vā nisīdanto vā sukhasamphassaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1639_0: Evaṃ imesu catūsu pañhesu vissajjikesu sāmaṇero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0502a:1639_5: Sāmaṇero nikkhamitvā therassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhapetvā tālavaṇṭena theraṃ bīji.
atk-s0502a:1639_13: Sattavassikadārako pabbajitvā aṭṭhame divase taṃ khaṇaṃ vikasitapadumuppalasadiso arahattaṃ patto,
atk-s0502a:1639_15: Tena pattaṃ dhovitvā paṭisāmitakāle candadevaputto candamaṇḍalaṃ vissajjesi,
atk-s0502a:1640_5: Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā āgantvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:1640_13: cattāro mahārājāno vihāropavane catuddisaṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1640_16: gantvā dvārakoṭṭhake mama puttassa ārakkhaṃ aggahesiṃ,
atk-s0502a:1640_19: tacchake ca dārūni tacchante disvā ettakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā paṇḍitā attānaṃ dametvā arahattaṃ gaṇhantiyevā”ti
atk-s0502a:1640_20: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1643_0: Dāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti paṇḍitā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1644_0: Tattha udakanti pathaviyā thalaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā āvāṭaṭṭhānaṃ pūretvā mātikaṃ vā katvā rukkhadoṇiṃ vā ṭhapetvā attanā icchiticchitaṭṭhānaṃ udakaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1644_5: usukārāpi tāpetvā tejanaṃ namayanti usuṃ ujuṃ karonti.
atk-s0502a:1644_6: Tacchakāpi nemiādīnaṃ atthāya tacchantā dāruṃ namayanti attano ruciyā ujuṃ vā vaṅkaṃ vā karonti.
atk-s0502a:1644_7: Evaṃ ettakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paṇḍitā sotāpattimaggādīni uppādentā attānaṃ damayanti,
atk-s0502a:1648_0: Selo yathāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1649_0: Puthujjanā kira sāmaṇerādayo theraṃ disvā sīsepi kaṇṇesupi nāsāyapi gahetvā “kiṃ, cūḷapita,
atk-s0502a:1649_15: Ghanaselasadisā hete acalā akampiyā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1653_0: Tattha nindāpasaṃsāsūti kiñcāpi idha dve lokadhammā vuttā,
atk-s0502a:1653_2: Yathā hi ekaghano asusiro selo puratthimādibhedena vātena na samīrati na iñjati na calati,
atk-s0502a:1653_3: evaṃ aṭṭhasupi lokadhammesu ajjhottharantesu paṇḍitā na samiñjanti,
atk-s0502a:1653_4: paṭighavasena vā anunayavasena vā na calanti na kampanti.
atk-s0502a:1657_0: Yathāpi rahadoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kāṇamātaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1658_0: Tadā pana kāṇamātarā atucchahatthaṃ dhītaraṃ patikulaṃ pesetuṃ pakkesu pūvesu catukkhattuṃ catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:1658_1: dinnakāle satthārā tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ sikkhāpade paññatte kāṇāya sāmikena aññāya pajāpatiyā ānītāya kāṇā
atk-s0502a:1658_2: taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “imehi me gharāvāso nāsito”ti diṭṭhadiṭṭhe bhikkhū akkosati paribhāsati.
atk-s0502a:1658_3: Bhikkhū taṃ vīthiṃ paṭipajjituṃ na visahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1658_4: Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1658_5: Kāṇamātā satthāraṃ vanditvā paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1658_10: tasmā tumhe disvā maṅkubhūtā rodamānā ṭhitā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1658_12: kasmā maṃ disvā maṅkubhūtā nilīyitvā rodasī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1658_15: “kiṃ pana kāṇamāte mama sāvakā tayā dinnakaṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1658_19: “Sace mama sāvakā piṇḍāya carantā tava gehadvāraṃ pattā tayā dinnakaṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1658_24: mayhaṃ kira sāvakā piṇḍāya caramānā gehadvāraṃ āgatā,
atk-s0502a:1658_25: atha nesaṃ tava mātarā pūvā dinnā,
atk-s0502a:1658_26: ko nāmettha mama sāvakānaṃ doso”ti? “Natthi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1659_2: Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ gacchanto rājaṅgaṇena pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:1659_5: mama āgantvā vandanabhāvaṃ ārocethā”ti pesetvā rājaṅgaṇe ṭhitaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā “kahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1659_18: ahaṃ pana naṃ lokiyakuṭumbasāminiṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā rājā satthāraṃ vanditvā paṭinivatto paṭicchannamahāyoggaṃ
atk-s0502a:1659_19: pahiṇitvā kāṇaṃ pakkosāpetvā sabbābharaṇehi alaṅkaritvā jeṭṭhadhītuṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā “mama dhītaraṃ posetuṃ
atk-s0502a:1659_21: Atheko sabbatthakamahāmatto “ahaṃ devassa dhītaraṃ posessāmī”ti taṃ attano gehaṃ netvā sabbaṃ issariyaṃ
atk-s0502a:1659_23: Tato paṭṭhāya kāṇā catūsu dvāresu purise ṭhapetvā attanā upaṭṭhātabbe bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca pariyesamānāpi na labhati.
atk-s0502a:1659_24: Kāṇāya gehadvāre paṭiyādetvā ṭhapitaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ mahogho viya pavattati.
atk-s0502a:1659_27: sā evaṃ vippaṭisārinī hutvāpi satthāraṃ āgamma saddhāsampadaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a:1659_28: Satthārā puna tassā gehadvāraṃ bhikkhūnaṃ upasaṅkamanārahaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0502a:1659_29: Idāni upaṭṭhātabbe bhikkhū vā bhikkhuniyo vā pariyesamānāpi na labhati,
atk-s0502a:1659_33: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:1659_35: idāneva tehi mahallakabhikkhūhi kāṇāya vippaṭisāro kato,
atk-s0502a:1659_37: Na ca idāneva mayā kāṇā mama vacanakārikā katā,
atk-s0502a:1659_38: pubbepi katāyevā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ sotukāmehi bhikkhūhi yācito –
atk-s0502a:1661_0: Tatiyo ca catuttho ca, idaṃ te babbukā bila”nti. –
atk-s0502a:1662_0: Idaṃ babbujātakaṃ vitthārena kathetvā “tadā cattāro mahallakabhikkhū cattāro biḷārā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:1662_4: atītepi kāṇā dummanā āvilacittā vikkhittacittā hutvā mama vacanena pasannaudakarahado viya vippasannacittā
atk-s0502a:1662_5: ahosī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1666_0: Tattha rahadoti yo caturaṅginiyāpi senāya ogāhantiyā nakhubhati evarūpo udakaṇṇavo,
atk-s0502a:1666_1: sabbākārena pana caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro nīlamahāsamuddo rahado nāma.
atk-s0502a:1666_2: Tassa hi heṭṭhā cattālīsayojanasahassamatte ṭhāne udakaṃ macchehi calati,
atk-s0502a:1666_3: upari tāvattakeyeva ṭhāne udakaṃ vātena calati,
atk-s0502a:1666_4: majjhe catuyojanasahassamatte ṭhāne udakaṃ niccalaṃ tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0502a:1666_10: evaṃ mama desanādhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattimaggādivasena nirupakkilesacittataṃ āpajjantā vippasīdanti paṇḍitā,
atk-s0502a:1670_0: Sabbattha ve sappurisā cajantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1671_0: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi bhagavā verañjaṃ gantvā verañjena brāhmaṇena nimantito pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vassaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0502a:1671_1: Verañjo brāhmaṇo mārāvaṭṭanena āvaṭṭo ekadivasampi satthāraṃ ārabbha satiṃ na uppādesi.
atk-s0502a:1671_3: bhikkhū santarabāhiraṃ verañjaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātaṃ alabhantā kilamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1671_5: Te kilamante disvā mahāmoggallānatthero pathavojaṃ bhojetukāmo,
atk-s0502a:1671_8: Bhikkhūnaṃ ekadivasampi piṇḍapātaṃ ārabbha parittāso nāhosi,
atk-s0502a:1671_10: Satthā tattha temāsaṃ vasitvā verañjaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ apaloketvā tena katasakkārasammāno taṃ saraṇesu patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0502a:1671_11: tato nikkhanto anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno ekasmiṃ samaye sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavane vihāsi,
atk-s0502a:1671_13: Tadā pana pañcasatamattā vighāsādā bhikkhū nissāya antovihāreyeva vasanti.
atk-s0502a:1671_14: Te bhikkhūnaṃ bhuttāvasesāni paṇītabhojanāni bhuñjitvā niddāyitvā uṭṭhāya nadītīraṃ gantvā nadantā vaggantā
atk-s0502a:1671_15: mallamuṭṭhiyuddhaṃ yujjhantā kīḷantā antovihārepi bahivihārepi anācārameva carantā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a:1671_17: ime vighāsādā dubbhikkhakāle verañjāyaṃ kañci vikāraṃ na dassesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:1671_18: idāni pana evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni bhuñjitvā anekappakāraṃ vikāraṃ dassentā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a:1671_19: Bhikkhū pana verañjāyampi upasantarūpā viharitvā idānipi upasantupasantāva viharantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1671_22: kiṃ kathethā”ti pucchitvā “idaṃ nāmā”ti vutte “pubbepete gadrabhayoniyaṃ nibbattā pañcasatā gadrabhā
atk-s0502a:1671_23: hutvā pañcasatānaṃ ājānīyasindhavānaṃ allarasamuddikapānakapītāvasesaṃ ucchiṭṭhakasaṭaṃ udakena madditvā
atk-s0502a:1671_24: makacipilotikāhi parissāvitattā ‘volodaka’nti saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ apparasaṃ nihīnaṃ pivitvā madhumattā viya
