atk-s0502a:1774_3: Tasmā mahātherā nisīdantā mahākaccāyanattherassa āsanaṃ ṭhapetvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1774_4: Sakko devarājā dvīhi devalokehi devaparisāya saddhiṃ āgantvā dibbagandhamālādīhi satthāraṃ pūjetvā ṭhito mahākaccāyanattheraṃ adisvā kiṃ nu kho mama, ayyo,
atk-s0502a:1774_7: Theropi taṃ khaṇaññeva āgantvā attano āsane nisinnameva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:1774_8: Sakko theraṃ disvā gopphakesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā “sādhu vata me, ayyo, āgato,
atk-s0502a:1774_9: ahaṃ ayyassa āgamanameva paccāsīsāmī”ti vatvā ubhohi hatthehi pāde sambāhitvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:1774_12: avasesamahāsāvakānaṃ evarūpaṃ sakkāraṃ akaritvā mahākaccāyanaṃ disvā vegena gopphakesu gahetvā ‘sādhu vata me, ayyo, āgato,
atk-s0502a:1774_13: ahaṃ ayyassa āgamanameva paccāsīsāmī’ti vatvā ubhohi hatthehi pāde sambāhitvā pūjetvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito”ti.
atk-s0502a:1774_16: mama puttena mahākaccāyanena sadisā indriyesu guttadvārā bhikkhū devānampi manussānampi piyāyevā”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:1774_17: anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1780_1: yassa bhikkhuno chekena sārathinā sudantā assā viya cha indriyāni samathaṃ dantabhāvaṃ nibbisevanabhāvaṃ gatāni,
atk-s0502a:1780_2: tassa navavidhaṃ mānaṃ pahāya ṭhitattā pahīnamānassa catunnaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavassa.
atk-s0502a:1784_0: Pathavisamoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1785_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye āyasmā sāriputto vuṭṭhavasso cārikaṃ pakkamitukāmo bhagavantaṃ āpucchitvā vanditvā attano parivārena saddhiṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:1785_2: Thero ca nāmagottavasena paññāyamāne bhikkhū nāmagottavasena kathetvā nivattāpesi.
atk-s0502a:1785_4: “aho vata mampi nāmagottavasena paggaṇhanto kathetvā nivattāpeyyā”ti thero mahābhikkhusaṅghassa antare taṃ na sallakkhesi.
atk-s0502a:1785_5: So “aññe viya bhikkhū na maṃ paggaṇhātī”ti there āghātaṃ bandhi.
atk-s0502a:1785_6: Therassapi saṅghāṭikaṇṇo tassa bhikkhuno sarīraṃ phusi,
atk-s0502a:1785_8: So “dāni thero vihārūpacāraṃ atikkanto bhavissatī”ti ñatvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “āyasmā maṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1785_9: sāriputto tumhākaṃ aggasāvakomhīti kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ bhindanto viya paharitvā akhamāpetvāva cārikaṃ pakkanto”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1786_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe mahāmoggallānatthero ca ānandatthero ca cintesuṃ –
atk-s0502a:1786_1: “amhākaṃ aggajeṭṭhabhātarā imassa bhikkhuno apahaṭabhāvaṃ satthā no na jānāti,
atk-s0502a:1786_2: sīhanādaṃ pana nadāpetukāmo bhavissatīti parisaṃ sannipātāpessāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1786_5: idānāyasmā sāriputto bhagavato sammukhā sīhanādaṃ nadissatī”ti mahābhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:1786_8: Thero “nāyaṃ bhikkhu mayā pahaṭo”ti avatvāva attano guṇakathaṃ kathento “yassa nūna, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1786_10: so idha aññataraṃ sabrahmacāriṃ āsajja appaṭinissajja cārikaṃ pakkameyyā”ti vatvā “seyyathāpi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1786_12: asucimpi nikkhipantī”tiādinā nayena attano pathavīsamacittatañca āpotejovāyo rajoharaṇacaṇḍālakumārakausabhachinnavisāṇasamacittatañca
atk-s0502a:1786_13: ahikuṇapādīhi viya attano kāyena aṭṭiyanañca medakathālikā viya attano kāyapariharaṇañca pakāsesi.
atk-s0502a:1786_14: Imāhi ca pana navahi upamāhi there attano guṇe kathente navasupi ṭhānesu udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī kampi.
atk-s0502a:1786_15: Rajoharaṇacaṇḍālakumārakamedakathāliko pamānaṃ pana āharaṇakāle puthujjanā bhikkhū assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:1787_0: There attano guṇaṃ kathenteyeva abbhācikkhanakassa bhikkhuno sakalasarīre ḍāho uppajji,
atk-s0502a:1787_1: so tāvadeva bhagavato pādesu patitvā attano abbhācikkhanadosaṃ pakāsetvā accayaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a:1787_5: yāvassa sattadhā muddhā na phalatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:1787_6: Thero ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggayha “khamāmahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1787_12: evarūpassa nāma musāvādena abbhācikkhanakassa bhikkhuno upari appamattakampi kopaṃ vā dosaṃ vā akatvā
atk-s0502a:1787_13: sayameva ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggayha khamāpetī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1787_19: sakkā sāriputtasadisānaṃ kopaṃ vā dosaṃ vā uppādetuṃ,
atk-s0502a:1787_22: indakhīlasadisaṃ pasannaudakarahadasadisañca sāriputtassa citta”nti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1793_2: yathā nāma pathaviyaṃ sucīni gandhamālādīnipi nikkhipanti,
atk-s0502a:1793_4: yathā nāma nagaradvāre nikhātaṃ indakhīlaṃ dārakādayo omuttentipi ūhadantipi,
atk-s0502a:1793_6: Tattha pathaviyā indakhīlassa ca neva anurodho uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:1793_8: evameva yvāyaṃ khīṇāsavo bhikkhu aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akampiyabhāvena tādi,
atk-s0502a:1793_11: ime pana na sakkarontī”ti sakkārañca asakkārañca karontesu neva anurujjhati,
atk-s0502a:1793_13: atha kho pathavisamo ca indakhilupamo eva ca hoti.
atk-s0502a:1793_14: Yathā ca apagatakaddamo rahado pasannodako hoti,
atk-s0502a:1793_15: evaṃ apagatakilesatāya rāgakaddamādīhi akaddamo vippasannova hoti.
atk-s0502a:1793_16: Tādinoti tassa pana evarūpassa sugatiduggatīsu saṃsaraṇavasena saṃsārā nāma na hontīti.
atk-s0502a:1794_0: Desanāvasāne nava bhikkhusahassāni saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:1797_0: Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tissattherassa sāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1798_0: Eko kira kosambivāsī kulaputto satthu sāsane pabbajitvā laddhupasampado “kosambivāsītissatthero”ti paññāyi.
atk-s0502a:1798_1: Tassa kosambiyaṃ vuṭṭhavassassa upaṭṭhāko ticīvarañceva sappiphāṇitañca āharitvā pādamūle ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:1798_6: amhākañca vihāre vuṭṭhavassā imaṃ lābhaṃ labhanti, gaṇhatha,
atk-s0502a:1798_11: “Mama santike kappiyakārako sāmaṇeropi natthi, āvuso”ti. “Sace, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1798_13: mama putto ayyassa santike sāmaṇero bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1798_15: Upāsako sattavassikaṃ attano puttaṃ therassa santikaṃ netvā “imaṃ pabbājethā”ti adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1798_16: Athassa thero kese temetvā tacapañcakakammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:1798_17: So khuraggeyeva saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1799_0: Thero taṃ pabbājetvā aḍḍhamāsaṃ tattha vasitvā “satthāraṃ passissāmī”ti sāmaṇeraṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ gāhāpetvā gacchanto antarāmagge ekaṃ vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1799_4: Atha naṃ upaṭṭhānavelāyaṃ āgantvā nisinnaṃ thero pucchi –
atk-s0502a:1799_9: dukkhaṃ te āgantukaṭṭhāne bahi vasitu”nti taṃ gahetvāva senāsanaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:1799_10: Thero pana puthujjano nipannamattova niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0502a:1799_12: “ajja me upajjhāyena saddhiṃ tatiyo divaso ekasenāsane vasantassa,
atk-s0502a:1799_14: thero sahaseyyaṃ āpajjeyyā’ti nisinnakova vītināmessāmī”ti upajjhāyassa mañcakasamīpe pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinnakova rattiṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0502a:1799_15: Thero paccūsakāle paccuṭṭhāya “sāmaṇeraṃ nikkhamāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti mañcakapasse ṭhapitabījaniṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:1799_16: bījanipattassa aggena sāmaṇerassa kaṭasārakaṃ paharitvā bījaniṃ uddhaṃ ukkhipanto “sāmaṇera,
atk-s0502a:1799_20: bhante”ti vatvā uṭṭhāya “bahi nikkhamā”ti vutte “akkhi me, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1799_21: bhinna”nti avatvā ekena hatthena paṭicchādetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:1799_22: Vattakaraṇakāle ca pana “akkhi me bhinna”nti tuṇhī anisīditvā ekena hatthena akkhiṃ gahetvā ekena hatthena
atk-s0502a:1799_23: muṭṭhisammuñjaniṃ ādāya vaccakuṭiñca mukhadhovanaṭṭhānañca sammajjitvā mukhadhovanodakañca ṭhapetvā pariveṇaṃ sammajji.
atk-s0502a:1799_24: So upajjhāyassa dantakaṭṭhaṃ dadamāno ekeneva hatthena adāsi.
atk-s0502a:1800_2: ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ ekena hatthena dantakaṭṭhaṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:1800_5: eko pana me hattho na tucchoti.
atk-s0502a:1800_7: So ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:1800_8: Thero sutvāva saṃviggamānaso “aho vata mayā bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti vatvā “khamāhi me,
atk-s0502a:1800_11: avassayo me hohī”ti añjaliṃ paggayha sattavassikadārakassa pādamūle ukkuṭikaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:1800_14: tumhākaṃ cittaṃ anurakkhantena mayā evaṃ vuttaṃ nevettha tumhākaṃ doso atthi,
atk-s0502a:1800_19: Thero sāmaṇerena assāsiyamānopi anassāsitvā uppannasaṃvego sāmaṇerassa bhaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā satthu santikaṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:1800_21: So gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā satthārā saddhiṃ paṭisammodanaṃ katvā “khamanīyaṃ te bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a:1800_22: kiñci atirekaṃ aphāsukaṃ atthī”ti pucchito āha –
atk-s0502a:1800_25: apica kho pana me ayaṃ daharasāmaṇero viya añño atirekaguṇo na diṭṭhapubbo”ti.
atk-s0502a:1800_27: So ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ bhagavato ārocento āha – “evaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:1800_28: mayā khamāpiyamāno maṃ evaṃ vadesi ‘nevettha tumhākaṃ doso atthi,
atk-s0502a:1800_36: Atha naṃ satthā “bhikkhu khīṇāsavā nāma na kassaci kuppanti,
atk-s0502a:1800_38: santindriyā santamānasāva hontī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1802_0: “Santaṃ tassa manaṃ hoti, santā vācā ca kamma ca;
atk-s0502a:1804_0: Tattha santaṃ tassāti tassa khīṇāsavasāmaṇerassa abhijjhādīnaṃ abhāvena manaṃ santameva hoti upasantaṃ nibbutaṃ.
atk-s0502a:1804_1: Tathā musāvādādīnaṃ abhāvena vācā ca pāṇātipātādīnaṃ abhāvena kāyakammañca santameva hoti.
atk-s0502a:1804_2: Sammadaññā vimuttassāti nayena hetunā jānitvā pañcahi vimuttīhi vimuttassa.
atk-s0502a:1805_0: Desanāvasāne kosambivāsītissatthero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:1808_0: Assaddhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1809_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye tiṃsamattā āraññakā bhikkhū satthu santikaṃ āgantvā vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1809_1: Satthā tesaṃ saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattassūpanissayaṃ disvā sāriputtattheraṃ āmantetvā “saddahasi tvaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1809_3: saddhindriyaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ amatogadhaṃ hoti amatapariyosāna”nti evaṃ pañcindriyāni ārabbha pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1809_9: aññātaṃ assa adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ aphassitaṃ paññāya,
atk-s0502a:1809_13: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “sāriputtatthero micchāgahaṇaṃ neva vissajjesi,
atk-s0502a:1809_17: Ahañhi ‘pañcindriyāni abhāvetvā samathavipassanaṃ avaḍḍhetvā maggaphalāni sacchikātuṃ samattho nāma atthīti saddahasi tvaṃ sāriputto’ti pucchiṃ.
atk-s0502a:1809_18: So ‘evaṃ sacchikaronto atthi nāmāti na saddahāmi,
atk-s0502a:1809_20: Na dinnassa vā katassa vā phalaṃ vipākaṃ na saddahati,
atk-s0502a:1809_22: Eso pana attanā paṭividdhesu jhānavipassanāmaggaphaladhammesu paresaṃ saddhāya na gacchati.
atk-s0502a:1809_23: Tasmā anupavajjo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:1811_0: “Assaddho akataññū ca, sandhicchedo ca yo naro,
atk-s0502a:1813_1: attano paṭividdhaguṇaṃ paresaṃ kathāya na saddahatīti assaddho.
atk-s0502a:1813_6: Kusalākusalakammabījassa khīṇattā nibbattanāvakāso hato assāti hatāvakāso.
atk-s0502a:1813_7: Catūhi maggehi kattabbakiccassa katattā,sabbā āsā iminā vantāti vantāso.
atk-s0502a:1814_0: Gāthāvasāne te āraññakā tiṃsamattā bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1817_0: Gāme vāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto khadiravaniyarevatattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:1818_0: Āyasmā hi sāriputto sattāsītikoṭidhanaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā cālā, upacālā,
atk-s0502a:1818_2: cundo upasenoti ime dve ca bhātaro pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:1818_5: “mama putto upatisso ettakaṃ dhanaṃ pahāya pabbajitvā tisso ca bhaginiyo dve ca bhātaro pabbājesi,
atk-s0502a:1818_16: ahameva tassa mātā ca pitā cā”ti.
atk-s0502a:1818_17: Mātāpissa revatakumāraṃ sattavassikameva gharabandhanena bandhitukāmā samānajātike kule dārikaṃ vāretvā
atk-s0502a:1818_18: divasaṃ vavatthapetvā kumāraṃ maṇḍetvā pasādhetvā mahatā parivārena saddhiṃ ādāya kumārikāya ñātigharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1818_19: Atha nesaṃ katamaṅgalānaṃ dvinnampi ñātakesu sannipatitesu udakapātiyaṃ hatthe otāretvā maṅgalāni vatvā
atk-s0502a:1818_20: kumārikāya vuḍḍhiṃ ākaṅkhamānā ñātakā “tava ayyikāya diṭṭhadhammaṃ passa,
atk-s0502a:1818_23: Revatakumāro “ko nu kho imissā ayyikāya diṭṭhadhammo”ti cintetvā “katarā imissā ayyikā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:1818_25: kiṃ na passasi imaṃ vīsavassasatikaṃ khaṇḍadantaṃ palitakesaṃ valittacaṃ tilakāhatagattaṃ gopānasivaṅkaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1818_31: “evarūpampi nāma sarīraṃ jarāya imaṃ vippakāraṃ pāpuṇissati,
atk-s0502a:1818_32: imaṃ me bhātarā upatissena diṭṭhaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:1818_34: Atha naṃ ñātakā kumārikāya saddhiṃ ekayānaṃ āropetvā ādāya pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1819_0: So thokaṃ gantvā sarīrakiccaṃ apadisitvā “ṭhapetha tāva yānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:1819_1: otaritvā āgamissāmī”ti yānā otaritvā ekasmiṃ gumbe thokaṃ papañcaṃ katvā agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:1819_2: Punapi thokaṃ gantvā teneva apadesena otaritvā abhiruhi,
atk-s0502a:1819_4: Athassa ñātakā “addhā imassa uṭṭhānāni vattantī”ti sallakkhetvā nātidaḷhaṃ ārakkhaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1819_5: So punapi thokaṃ gantvā teneva apadesena otaritvā “tumhe pājento purato gacchatha,
atk-s0502a:1819_6: mayaṃ pacchato saṇikaṃ āgamissāmā”ti vatvā otaritvā gumbābhimukho ahosi.
atk-s0502a:1819_7: Ñātakāpissa “pacchato āgamissatī”ti saññāya yānaṃ pājentā gamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1819_8: Sopi tato palāyitvā ekasmiṃ padese tiṃsamattā bhikkhū vasanti,
atk-s0502a:1819_13: mayaṃ te rājaputtabhāvaṃ vā amaccaputtabhāvaṃ vā na jānāma,
atk-s0502a:1819_25: bhātarā te anuññātamevā”ti vatvā bhikkhū tassa ābharaṇāni omuñcāpetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhapetvā taṃ pabbājetvā therassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:1820_1: ñātakā maṃ anubandhitvā pakkosissantī”ti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santike yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0502a:1820_2: pattacīvaramādāya cārikaṃ caramāno tato tiṃsayojanike ṭhāne khadiravanaṃ gantvā antovasseyeva temāsabbhantare
atk-s0502a:1820_4: Theropi pavāretvā satthāraṃ puna tattha gamanatthāya āpucchi.
atk-s0502a:1820_7: Thokaṃ gatakāle ānandatthero dvedhāpathe ṭhatvā satthāraṃ āha – “bhante,

atk-s0502a:2055_7: Sā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tuṇhī hutvā punappunaṃ tehi vuccamānā “puttā maṃ paṭijaggissanti,

atk-s0502a:2055_9: Atha naṃ katipāhaccayena jeṭṭhaputtassa bhariyā “aho amhākaṃ, ayyā,

atk-s0502a:2055_13: Sā avamānappattā hutvā “kiṃ imesaṃ santike vuṭṭhena,

atk-s0502a:2055_22: Atha satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova obhāsaṃ pharitvā sammukhe nisinno viya tāya saddhiṃ kathento “bahuputtike

atk-s0502a:2055_24: muhuttampi jīvitaṃ seyyo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –

atk-s0502a:2081_0: Pāpañca purisoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto seyyasakattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.

atk-s0502a:2103_15: Atha seṭṭhi naṃ disvā “ko eso”ti āha.

atk-s0502a:2103_19: Mahāseṭṭhi tayā pacchimakālaṃ anoloketvāva samaṇassa gotamassa sāsane bahuṃ dhanaṃ vippakiṇṇaṃ,

atk-s0502a:2103_21: evaṃ vattamāno katipāheneva ghāsacchādanamattampi na labhissasi,

atk-s0502a:2138_0: Vāṇijovāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahādhanavāṇijaṃ ārabbha kathesi.

atk-s0502a:2139_1: Aparena samayena vāṇijo pañca sakaṭasatāni bhaṇḍassa pūretvā bhikkhūnaṃ ārocāpesi –

atk-s0502a:2139_6: Taṃ sutvā pañcasatā bhikkhū tena saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.

atk-s0502a:2139_28: “Tena hi ‘kiṃ me etto gatenā’ti nivattitvā gehameva gamissāmī”ti āha.

atk-s0502a:2139_33: So tesaṃ tattha ṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā puna vāṇijassa ārocesi.

atk-s0502a:2139_45: mahādhanavāṇijena saddhiṃ na gamitthā”ti pucchitvā “āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2139_46: mahādhanavāṇijassa vilumpanatthāya dvīsupi maggesu corā pariyuṭṭhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2139_48: mayaṃ pana taṃ āpucchitvā āgatā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:2139_51: jīvitukāmo viya puriso halāhalaṃ visaṃ parivajjeti,
atk-s0502a:2139_52: bhikkhunāpi ‘tayo bhavā corehi pariyuṭṭhitamaggasadisā’ti ñatvā pāpaṃ parivajjetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2143_4: yathā ca jīvitukāmo halāhalaṃ visaṃ parivajjeti,
atk-s0502a:2143_5: evaṃ paṇḍito bhikkhu appamattakānipi pāpāni parivajjeyyāti.
atk-s0502a:2144_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2147_0: Pāṇimhi ceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto kukkuṭamittaṃ nāma nesādaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2148_0: Rājagahe kira ekā seṭṭhidhītā vayappattā sattabhūmikapāsādassa upari sirigabbhe ārakkhaṇatthāya ekaṃ
atk-s0502a:2148_1: paricārikaṃ datvā mātāpitūhi vāsiyamānā ekadivasaṃ sāyanhasamaye vātapānena antaravīthiṃ olokentī pañca
atk-s0502a:2148_2: pāsasatāni pañca sūlasatāni ādāya mige vadhitvā jīvamānaṃ ekaṃ kukkuṭamittaṃ nāma nesādaṃ pañca migasatāni
atk-s0502a:2148_3: vadhitvā tesaṃ maṃsena mahāsakaṭaṃ pūretvā sakaṭadhure nisīditvā maṃsavikkiṇanatthāya nagaraṃ pavisantaṃ
atk-s0502a:2148_4: disvā tasmiṃ paṭibaddhacittā paricārikāya hatthe paṇṇākāraṃ datvā “gaccha,
atk-s0502a:2148_5: etassa paṇṇākāraṃ datvā gamanakālaṃ ñatvā ehī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a:2148_6: Sā gantvā tassa paṇṇākāraṃ datvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:2148_8: So “ajja maṃsaṃ vikkiṇitvā pātova asukadvārena nāma nikkhamitvā gamissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2148_9: Sā tena kathitakathaṃ sutvā āgantvā tassā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2148_10: Seṭṭhidhītā attanā gahetabbayuttakaṃ vatthābharaṇajātaṃ saṃvidahitvā pātova malinavatthaṃ nivāsetvā kuṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:2148_11: ādāya dāsīhi saddhiṃ udakatitthaṃ gacchantī viya nikkhamitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā tassāgamanaṃ olokentī aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2148_14: So taṃ disvā “ahaṃ taṃ ‘asukassa nāma dhītā’ti na jānāmi,
atk-s0502a:2148_19: tvaṃ tuṇhī hutvā attano sakaṭaṃ pājehīti.
atk-s0502a:2148_22: sirī nāma attano santikaṃ āgacchantī nivāretuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2148_23: So tassā nissaṃsayena āgamanakāraṇaṃ ñatvā taṃ sakaṭaṃ āropetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2148_24: Tassā mātāpitaro ito cito ca pariyesāpetvā apassantā “matā bhavissatī”ti matakabhattaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2148_25: Sāpi tena saddhiṃ saṃvāsamanvāya paṭipāṭiyā satta putte vijāyitvā te vayappatte gharabandhanena bandhi.
atk-s0502a:2149_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ volokento kukkuṭamittaṃ saputtaṃ sasuṇisaṃ attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:2149_1: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti upadhārento tesaṃ pannarasannampi sotāpattimaggassa upanissayaṃ disvā pātova pattacīvaraṃ ādāya tassa pāsaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2149_2: Taṃ divasaṃ pāse baddho ekamigopi nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:2149_3: Satthā tassa pāsamūle padavalañjaṃ dassetvā purato ekassa gumbassa heṭṭhā chāyāyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2149_4: Kukkuṭamitto pātova dhanuṃ ādāya pāsaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya pāse olokayamāno pāse baddhaṃ ekampi migaṃ adisvā satthu padavalañjaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a:2149_7: So satthari āghātaṃ bandhitvā gacchanto gumbamūle nisinnaṃ satthāraṃ disvā,
atk-s0502a:2149_10: Satthā dhanuṃ ākaḍḍhituṃ datvā vissajjetuṃ nādāsi.
atk-s0502a:2149_11: So saraṃ vissajjetumpi oropetumpi asakkonto phāsukāhi bhijjantīhi viya mukhato kheḷena paggharantena kilantarūpo aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2149_12: Athassa puttā gehaṃ gantvā “pitā no cirāyati,
atk-s0502a:2149_13: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti vatvā “gacchatha, tātā,
atk-s0502a:2149_14: pitu santika”nti mātarā pesitā dhanūni ādāya gantvā pitaraṃ tathāṭhitaṃ disvā “ayaṃ no pitu paccāmitto
atk-s0502a:2149_15: bhavissatī”ti sattapi janā dhanūni ākaḍḍhitvā buddhānubhāvena yathā nesaṃ pitā ṭhito,
atk-s0502a:2149_17: Atha nesaṃ mātā “kiṃ nu kho me puttāpi cirāyantī”ti vatvā sattahi suṇisāhi saddhiṃ gantvā te tathāṭhite
atk-s0502a:2149_18: disvā “kassa nu kho ime dhanūni ākaḍḍhitvā ṭhitā”ti olokentī satthāraṃ disvā bāhā paggayha –
atk-s0502a:2149_29: Atha te nesaṃ mātā seṭṭhidhītā “khippaṃ dhanūni chaḍḍetvā pitaraṃ me khamāpethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2150_0: Satthā tesaṃ muducittataṃ ñatvā dhanuṃ otāretuṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2150_3: Atha nesaṃ satthā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2150_4: Desanāvasāne kukkuṭamitto saddhiṃ puttehi ceva suṇisāhi ca attapañcadasamo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:2150_5: Satthā piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2150_11: so attapañcadasamo acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhāya tīsu ratanesu nikkaṅkho hutvā pāṇātipātakammassa akārako jātoti.
atk-s0502a:2150_15: sā kulagehe kumārikā hutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0502a:2150_16: Bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “kukkuṭamittassa kira bhariyā kumārikakāle eva sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā tassa gehaṃ gantvā satta putte labhi,
atk-s0502a:2150_22: Sopi tāya dinnāni ādāya gantvā pāṇātipātaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:2150_23: kiṃ nu kho sotāpannāpi pāṇātipātaṃ karontī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2150_26: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte, “na,
atk-s0502a:2150_29: sā pana ‘sāmikassa vacanaṃ karomī’ti tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:2150_30: ‘Idaṃ gahetvā esa gantvā pāṇātipātaṃ karotū’ti tassā cittaṃ natthi.
atk-s0502a:2150_31: Pāṇitalasmiñhi vaṇe asati visaṃ gaṇhantassa taṃ visaṃ anuḍahituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:2150_32: evamevaṃ akusalacetanāya abhāvena pāpaṃ akarontassa dhanuādīni nīharitvā dadatopi pāpaṃ nāma na hotī”ti
atk-s0502a:2150_33: vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2152_0: “Pāṇimhi ce vaṇo nāssa, hareyya pāṇinā visaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2154_3: Yasmā nābbaṇaṃ visamanveti avaṇañhi pāṇiṃ visaṃ anvetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:2154_4: evameva dhanuādīni nīharitvā dentassāpi akusalacetanāya abhāvena pāpaṃ akubbato pāpaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:2154_5: avaṇaṃ pāṇiṃ visaṃ viya nāssa cittaṃ pāpaṃ anugacchatīti.
atk-s0502a:2156_1: “ko nu kho kukkuṭamittassa saputtassa sasuṇisassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayo,
atk-s0502a:2156_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:2156_8: “kiṃ nu kho imassa cetiyassa mattikā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:2156_13: Te haritālamanosilā koṭṭetvā tilatelena saṃsanditvā iṭṭhakāya ghaṭetvā suvaṇṇena khacitvā anto ciniṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2156_16: Te yāva dhātunidhānā cetiye niṭṭhite cintayiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:2157_0: Atheko gāmavāsiko seṭṭhi “ahaṃ jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti dhātunidhāne ekaṃ hiraññakoṭiṃ pakkhipi.
atk-s0502a:2157_1: Taṃ disvā raṭṭhavāsino “ayaṃ nagaraseṭṭhi dhanameva saṃharati,
atk-s0502a:2157_2: evarūpe cetiye jeṭṭhako bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:2157_3: gāmavāsī pana koṭidhanaṃ pakkhipitvā jeṭṭhako jāto”ti ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2157_4: So tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ahaṃ dve koṭiyo datvā jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti dve koṭiyo adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2157_5: Itaro “ahameva jeṭṭhako bhavissāmī”ti tisso koṭiyo adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2157_6: Evaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vaḍḍhetvā nagaravāsī aṭṭha koṭiyo adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2157_15: saputtadāro ca cetiyassa dāso bhavissāmī”ti satta putte satta suṇisāyo bhariyañca gahetvā attanā saddhiṃ cetiyassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a:2157_18: ayameva jeṭṭhako hotū”ti taṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2157_19: Iti te soḷasapi janā cetiyassa dāsā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2157_21: Evaṃ santepi cetiyameva paṭijaggitvā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2157_22: Tesu ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke vasantesu imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhariyā tato cavitvā rājagahe seṭṭhino dhītā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:2157_24: Adiṭṭhasaccassa pana paṭisandhi nāma bhāriyāti tassā sāmiko samparivattamāno gantvā nesādakule nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:2157_25: Tassa saha dassaneneva seṭṭhidhītaraṃ pubbasineho ajjhotthari.
atk-s0502a:2159_0: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodake”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:2160_1: Puttāpissā devalokā cavitvā tassā eva kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2160_2: suṇisāyopissā tattha tattha nibbattitvā vayappattā tesaṃyeva gehaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2160_3: Evaṃ te sabbepi tadā cetiyaṃ paṭijaggitvā tassa kammassānubhāvena sotāpattiphalaṃ pattāti.
atk-s0502a:2163_0: Yo appaduṭṭhassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kokaṃ nāma sunakhaluddakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2164_0: So kira ekadivasaṃ pubbaṇhasamaye dhanuṃ ādāya sunakhaparivuto araññaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge ekaṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:2164_1: pavisantaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā kujjhitvā “kāḷakaṇṇi me diṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:2164_2: ajja kiñci na labhissāmī”ti cintetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:2164_3: Theropi gāme piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco puna vihāraṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:2164_4: Itaropi araññe vicaritvā kiñci alabhitvā paccāgacchanto puna theraṃ disvā “ajjāhaṃ imaṃ kāḷakaṇṇiṃ disvā araññaṃ gato kiñci na labhiṃ,
atk-s0502a:2164_6: sunakhehi naṃ khādāpessāmī”ti saññaṃ datvā sunakhe vissajjesi.
atk-s0502a:2164_11: Thero vegena ekaṃ rukkhaṃ abhiruhitvā purisappamāṇe ṭhāne nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2164_13: Luddako gantvā “rukkhaṃ abhiruhatopi te mokkho natthī”ti taṃ saratuṇḍena pādatale vijjhi.
atk-s0502a:2164_15: Itaro tassa yācanaṃ anādiyitvā punappunaṃ vijjhiyeva.
atk-s0502a:2164_16: Thero ekasmiṃ pādatale vijjhiyamāne taṃ ukkhipitvā dutiyaṃ pādaṃ olambitvā tasmiṃ vijjhiyamāne tampi ukkhipati,
atk-s0502a:2164_17: evamassa so yācanaṃ anādiyitvāva dvepi pādatalāni vijjhiyeva.
atk-s0502a:2164_18: Therassa sarīraṃ ukkāhi ādittaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2164_19: So vedanānuvattiko hutvā satiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a:2164_21: Taṃ patamānaṃ kokaṃ sīsato paṭṭhāya parikkhipantameva pati.
atk-s0502a:2164_22: Sunakhā “thero patito”ti saññāya cīvarantaraṃ pavisitvā attano sāmikaṃ luñjitvā khādantā aṭṭhimattāvasesaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2165_0: Atha nesaṃ thero ekaṃ sukkhadaṇḍakaṃ bhañjitvā khipi.
atk-s0502a:2165_1: Sunakhā theraṃ disvā “sāmikova amhehi khādito”ti ñatvā araññaṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2165_2: Thero kukkuccaṃ uppādesi “mama cīvarantaraṃ pavisitvā esa naṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:2165_4: So rukkhā otaritvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2165_5: mama cīvaraṃ nissāya so upāsako naṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:2165_8: Satthā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “bhikkhu arogaṃ te sīlaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2165_12: atītepi appaduṭṭhānaṃ padussitvā vināsaṃ pattoyevā”ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pakāsento atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:2166_0: Atīte kireko vejjo vejjakammatthāya gāmaṃ vicaritvā kiñci kammaṃ alabhitvā chātajjhatto nikkhamitvā gāmadvāre
atk-s0502a:2166_1: sambahule kumārake kīḷante disvā “ime sappena ḍaṃsāpetvā tikicchitvā āhāraṃ labhissāmī”ti ekasmiṃ rukkhabile
atk-s0502a:2166_5: Atheko kumārako sappaṃ gīvāyaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā nīharitvā tassa sappabhāvaṃ ñatvā viravanto avidūre ṭhitassa vejjassa matthake khipi.
atk-s0502a:2166_6: Sappo vejjassa khandhaṭṭhikaṃ parikkhipitvā daḷhaṃ ḍaṃsitvā tattheva jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesi,
atk-s0502a:2166_7: evamesa koko sunakhaluddako pubbepi appaduṭṭhassa padussitvā vināsaṃ pattoyevāti.
atk-s0502a:2167_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2169_0: “Yo appaduṭṭhassa narassa dussati, suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassa;
atk-s0502a:2170_0: Tameva bālaṃ pacceti pāpaṃ, sukhumo rajo paṭivātaṃva khitto”ti.
atk-s0502a:2171_0: Tattha appaduṭṭhassāti attano vā sabbasattānaṃ vā aduṭṭhassa.
atk-s0502a:2171_7: Paṭivātanti yathā ekena purisena paṭivāte ṭhitaṃ paharitukāmatāya khitto sukhumo rajoti tameva purisaṃ pacceti,
atk-s0502a:2171_9: evameva yo puggalo apaduṭṭhassa purisassa pāṇippaharādīni dadanto padussati,
atk-s0502a:2171_11: samparāye vā nirayādīsu vipaccamānaṃ taṃ pāpaṃ vipākadukkhavasena paccetīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2172_0: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2175_0: Gabbhameketi imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto maṇikārakulūpakaṃ tissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2176_0: So kira thero ekassa maṇikārassa kule dvādasa vassāni bhuñji.
atk-s0502a:2176_1: Tasmiṃ kule jayampatikā mātāpituṭṭhāne ṭhatvā theraṃ paṭijaggiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2176_2: Athekadivasaṃ so maṇikāro therassa purato maṃsaṃ chindanto nisinno hoti.
atk-s0502a:2176_3: Tasmiṃ khaṇe rājā pasenadi kosalo ekaṃ maṇiratanaṃ “imaṃ dhovitvā vijjhitvā pahiṇatū”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a:2176_4: Maṇikāro salohiteneva hatthena taṃ paṭiggahetvā peḷāya upari ṭhapetvā hatthadhovanatthaṃ anto pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:2176_6: So lohitagandhena maṃsasaññāya taṃ maṇiṃ therassa passantasseva gili.
atk-s0502a:2176_7: Maṇikāro āgantvā maṇiṃ apassanto “maṇi kena gahito”ti bhariyañca puttake ca paṭipāṭiyā pucchitvā tehi
atk-s0502a:2176_12: ettakaṃ kālaṃ mayā therassa na kiñci vajjaṃ diṭṭhapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2176_21: So tasmiṃ asampaṭicchante puna bhariyaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:2176_27: So “sabbeva mayaṃ dāsattaṃ upagacchantā maṇimūlaṃ na agghāmā”ti rajjuṃ gahetvā therassa sīsaṃ veṭhetvā daṇḍena ghaṭṭesi.
atk-s0502a:2176_28: Therassa sīsato ca kaṇṇanāsāhi ca lohitaṃ pagghari,
atk-s0502a:2176_32: Atha naṃ maṇikāro there uppannakodhavegena “tvaṃ kiṃ karosī”ti pādena paharitvā khipi.
atk-s0502a:2177_1: sīse veṭhanaṃ tāva me sithilaṃ katvā imaṃ koñcaṃ olokehi “mato vā, no vā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2177_6: na te ahaṃ marantopi maṇiṃ ācikkhissanti.
atk-s0502a:2177_7: So tassa udaraṃ phāletvā maṇiṃ disvā pavedhento saṃviggamānaso therassa pādamūle nipajjitvā “khamatha, me, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2177_14: pakatiniyāmeneva me gehe nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathāti. “Upāsaka,
atk-s0502a:2177_15: na dānāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya paresaṃ gehassa antochadanaṃ pavisissāmi,
atk-s0502a:2177_17: ito paṭṭhāya pādesu āvahantesu gehadvāre ṭhitova bhikkhaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā dhutaṅgaṃ samādāya imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2178_0: “Paccati munino bhattaṃ, thokaṃ thokaṃ kule kule;
atk-s0502a:2180_0: Idañca pana vatvā thero teneva byādhinā na cirasseva parinibbāyi.
atk-s0502a:2180_1: Koñco maṇikārassa bhariyāya kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:2180_3: Maṇikārassa bhariyā there muducittatāya kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:2180_4: Bhikkhū satthāraṃ tesaṃ abhisamparāyaṃ pucchiṃsu. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:2180_9: anāsavā pana parinibbāyantī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2184_0: Tattha gabbhanti idha manussagabbhova adhippeto. Sesamettha uttānatthameva.
atk-s0502a:2188_0: Na antalikkheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tayo jane ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2189_0: Satthari kira jetavane viharante sambahulā bhikkhū satthu dassanatthāya āgacchantā ekaṃ gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2189_1: Gāmavāsino te sampatte ādāya āsanasālāya nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā piṇḍapātavelaṃ āgamayamānā dhammaṃ suṇantā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2189_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhattaṃ pacitvā sūpabyañjanaṃ dhūpayamānāya ekissā itthiyā bhājanato aggijālā uṭṭhahitvā chadanaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:2189_3: Tato ekaṃ tiṇakaraḷaṃ uṭṭhahitvā jalamānaṃ ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:2189_4: Tasmiṃ khaṇe eko kāko ākāsena gacchanto tattha gīvaṃ pavesetvā tiṇavalliveṭhito jhāyitvā gāmamajjhe pati.
atk-s0502a:2189_8: iminā katakammaṃ aññatra satthārā ko jānissati,
atk-s0502a:2190_0: Aparesampi bhikkhūnaṃ satthu dassanatthāya nāvaṃ abhiruyha gacchantānaṃ nāvā samudde niccalā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2190_2: Nāvikassa ca bhariyā paṭhamavaye ṭhitā dassanīyā pāsādikā,
atk-s0502a:2190_8: Nāviko “na sakkā ekissā atthāya mahājanaṃ nāsetuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2190_10: Sā gahetvā udake khipiyamānā maraṇabhayatajjitā viravaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:2190_11: Taṃ sutvā nāviko ko attho imissā ābharaṇehi naṭṭhehi,
atk-s0502a:2190_12: sabbābharaṇāni omuñcitvā ekaṃ pilotikaṃ nivāsāpetvā chaḍḍetha naṃ,
atk-s0502a:2190_13: ahaṃ panetaṃ udakapiṭṭhe plavamānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na sakkhissāmī tasmā yathā naṃ ahaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0502a:2190_14: tathā ekaṃ vālukakuṭaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā samudde khipathāti.
atk-s0502a:2190_17: Bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā “ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ ko añño etissā itthiyā katakammaṃ jānissati,
atk-s0502a:2190_18: satthāraṃ tassā kammaṃ pucchissāmā”ti icchitaṭṭhānaṃ patvā nāvāto oruyha pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2191_0: Aparepi satta bhikkhū satthu dassanatthāya gacchantā sāyaṃ ekaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2191_2: Tesaṃ tadeva labhitvā tattha nipannānaṃ rattibhāge kūṭāgāramatto pāsāṇo pavaṭṭamāno āgantvā leṇadvāraṃ pidahi.
atk-s0502a:2191_3: Nevāsikā bhikkhū “mayaṃ imaṃ leṇaṃ āgantukabhikkhūnaṃ pāpayimhā,
atk-s0502a:2191_5: apanessāma na”nti samantā sattahi gāmehi manusse sannipātetvā vāyamantāpi ṭhānā cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2191_7: Evaṃ santepi sattāhaṃ pāsāṇaṃ cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2191_9: Sattame divase pāsāṇo sayameva pavaṭṭitvā apagato.
atk-s0502a:2191_10: Bhikkhū nikkhamitvā “amhākaṃ imaṃ pāpaṃ aññatra satthārā ko jānissati,
atk-s0502a:2191_12: Te purimehi saddhiṃ antarāmagge samāgantvā sabbe ekatova satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā
atk-s0502a:2191_13: satthārā katapaṭisanthārā attanā attanā diṭṭhānubhūtāni kāraṇāni paṭipāṭiyā pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2192_2: so tāva kāko attanā katakammameva anubhosi.
atk-s0502a:2192_3: Atītakāle hi bārāṇasiyaṃ eko kassako attano goṇaṃ damento dametuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:2192_4: So hissa goṇo thokaṃ gantvā nipajji,
atk-s0502a:2192_5: pothetvā uṭṭhāpitopi thokaṃ gantvā punapi tatheva nipajji.
atk-s0502a:2192_6: So vāyamitvā taṃ dametuṃ asakkonto kodhābhibhūto hutvā ‘ito dāni paṭṭhāya sukhaṃ nipajjissasī’ti palālapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:2192_7: viya karonto palālena tassa gīvaṃ paliveṭhetvā aggimadāsi,
atk-s0502a:2192_11: So tassa vipākena dīgharattaṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena sattakkhattuṃ kākayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā evameva ākāse jhāyitvāva mato”ti.
atk-s0502a:2193_3: Sā hi atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ ekassa gahapatikassa bhariyā udakaharaṇakoṭṭanapacanādīni sabbakiccāni sahattheneva akāsi.
atk-s0502a:2193_4: Tassā eko sunakho taṃ gehe sabbakiccāni kurumānaṃ olokentova nisīdati.
atk-s0502a:2193_5: Khette bhattaṃ harantiyā dārupaṇṇādīnaṃ vā atthāya araññaṃ gacchantiyā tāya saddhiṃyeva gacchati.
atk-s0502a:2193_8: Sā tesaṃ kathāya maṅku hutvā sunakhaṃ leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharitvā palāpeti,
atk-s0502a:2193_10: So kirassā tatiye attabhāve bhattā ahosi,
atk-s0502a:2193_12: Kiñcāpi hi anamatagge saṃsāre jāyā vā pati vā abhūtapubbā nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:2193_13: avidūre pana attabhāve ñātakesu adhimatto sineho hoti,
atk-s0502a:2193_14: tasmā so sunakho taṃ vijahituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0502a:2193_15: Sā tassa kujjhitvā khettaṃ sāmikassa yāguṃ haramānā rajjuṃ ucchaṅge ṭhapetvā agamāsi,
atk-s0502a:2193_17: Sā sāmikassa yāguṃ datvā tucchakuṭaṃ ādāya ekaṃ udakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kuṭaṃ vālukāya pūretvā samīpe oloketvā ṭhitassa sunakhassa saddamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:2193_18: Sunakho “cirassaṃ vata me ajja madhurakathā laddhā”ti naṅguṭṭhaṃ cālento taṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0502a:2193_19: Sā taṃ gīvāyaṃ daḷhaṃ gahetvā ekāya rajjukoṭiyā kuṭaṃ bandhitvā ekaṃ rajjukoṭiṃ sunakhassa gīvāyaṃ bandhitvā kuṭaṃ udakābhimukhaṃ pavaṭṭesi.
atk-s0502a:2193_20: Sunakho kuṭaṃ anubandhanto udake patitvā tattheva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:2193_21: Sā tassa kammassa vipākena dīgharattaṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate vālukakuṭaṃ gīvāyaṃ bandhitvā udake pakkhittā kālamakāsīti.
atk-s0502a:2194_3: Atītasmiñhi bārāṇasivāsino satta gopālakadārakā ekasmiṃ aṭavipadese sattāhavārena gāviyo vicarantā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:2194_4: gāviyo vicāretvā āgacchantā ekaṃ mahāgodhaṃ disvā anubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2194_8: sve āgantvā gaṇhissāmā”ti ekeko ekekaṃ sākhabhaṅgamuṭṭhiṃ ādāya sattapi janā satta chiddāni pidahitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2194_9: Te punadivase taṃ godhaṃ amanasikatvā aññasmiṃ padese gāviyo vicāretvā sattame divase gāviyo ādāya gacchantā
atk-s0502a:2194_10: taṃ vammikaṃ disvā satiṃ paṭilabhitvā “kā nu kho tassā godhāya pavattī”ti attanā attanā pidahitāni chiddāni
atk-s0502a:2194_12: Godhā jīvite nirālayā hutvā aṭṭhicammāvasesā pavedhamānā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:2194_13: Te taṃ disvā anukampaṃ katvā “mā naṃ māretha,
atk-s0502a:2194_14: sattāhaṃ chinnabhattā jātā”ti tassā piṭṭhiṃ parimajjitvā “sukhena gacchāhī”ti vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2194_15: Te godhāya amāritattā niraye tāva na pacciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2194_16: Te pana satta janā ekato hutvā cuddasasu attabhāvesu satta satta divasāni chinnabhattā ahesuṃ. Tadā,
atk-s0502a:2194_18: tumhehi sattahi gopālakehi hutvā taṃ kammaṃ katanti.
atk-s0502a:2194_19: Evaṃ satthā tehi puṭṭhapuṭṭhaṃ pañhaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0502a:2195_2: pāpakammaṃ katvā ākāse uppatitassapi samuddaṃ pakkhandassāpi pabbatantaraṃ paviṭṭhassāpi mokkho natthī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2195_6: yattha ṭhito pāpakammato mucceyyā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2197_0: “Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa;
atk-s0502a:2198_0: Na vijjatī so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya pāpakammā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2199_1: sace hi koci “iminā upāyena pāpakammato muccissāmī”ti antalikkhe vā nisīdeyya,
atk-s0502a:2199_5: Puratthimādīsu jagatipadesesu pathavībhāgesu na so vālaggamattopi okāso atthi,
atk-s0502a:2203_0: Na antalikkheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā nigrodhārāme viharanto suppabuddhaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2204_0: So kira “ayaṃ mama dhītaraṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhanto ca,
atk-s0502a:2204_1: mama puttaṃ pabbājetvā tassa veriṭṭhāne ṭhito cā”ti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi satthari āghātaṃ bandhitvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0502a:2204_2: “na dānissa nimantanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhuñjituṃ dassāmī”ti gamanamaggaṃ pidahitvā antaravīthiyaṃ suraṃ
atk-s0502a:2204_4: Athassa satthari bhikkhusaṅghaparivute taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgate “satthā āgato”ti ārocesuṃ. So āha –
atk-s0502a:2204_7: nāssa maggaṃ dassāmī”ti punappunaṃ vuccamānopi tatheva vatvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2204_8: Satthā mātulassa santikā maggaṃ alabhitvā tato nivatti.
atk-s0502a:2204_11: Satthāpi nivattanto sitaṃ katvā ānandattherena “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2204_12: sitassa pātukammassa paccayo”ti puṭṭho āha – “passasi, ānanda,
atk-s0502a:2204_14: Bhāriyaṃ tena kammaṃ kataṃ mādisassa buddhassa maggaṃ adentena,
atk-s0502a:2204_15: ito sattame divase heṭṭhāpāsāde sopānapādamūle pathaviṃ pavisissatīti.
atk-s0502a:2204_16: Carapuriso taṃ kathaṃ sutvā suppabuddhassa santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ mama bhāgineyyena nivattantena vutta”nti puṭṭho yathāsutaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2204_17: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “na dāni mama bhāgineyyassa kathāya doso atthi,
atk-s0502a:2204_20: Evaṃ santepi naṃ idāni musāvādena niggaṇhissāmi.
atk-s0502a:2204_21: So hi maṃ ‘sattame divase pathaviṃ pavisissatī’ti aniyamena avatvā ‘heṭṭhāpāsāde sopānapādamūle pathaviṃ pavisissatī”’ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2204_22: “Ito dāni paṭṭhāyāhaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ na gamissāmi,
atk-s0502a:2204_23: atha naṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne pathaviṃ apavisitvā musāvādena niggaṇhissāmī”ti attano upabhogajātaṃ sabbaṃ sattabhūmikapāsādassa
atk-s0502a:2204_24: upari āropetvā sopānaṃ harāpetvā dvāraṃ pidahāpetvā ekekasmiṃ dvāre dve dve malle ṭhapetvā “sacāhaṃ pamādena
atk-s0502a:2204_26: nivāreyyātha ma”nti vatvā sattame pāsādatale sirigabbhe nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2204_29: suppabuddho na kevalaṃ pāsādatale vehāsaṃ uppatitvā ākāse vā nisīdatu,
atk-s0502a:2204_33: mayā vuttaṭṭhāneyeva so pathaviṃ pavisissatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2206_0: “Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe, na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa;
atk-s0502a:2207_0: Na vijjatī so jagatippadeso, yatthaṭṭhitaṃ nappasaheyya maccū”ti.
atk-s0502a:2208_1: maccūti yasmiṃ padese ṭhitaṃ maraṇaṃ nappasaheyya nābhibhaveyya,
atk-s0502a:2210_0: Sattame divase satthu bhikkhācāramaggassa niruddhavelāya heṭṭhāpāsāde suppabuddhassa maṅgalasso uddāmo hutvā taṃ taṃ bhittiṃ pahari.
atk-s0502a:2210_1: So upari nisinnovassa saddaṃ sutvā “kimeta”nti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:2210_4: Atha naṃ so gaṇhitukāmo hutvā nisinnaṭṭhānā uṭṭhāya dvārābhimukho ahosi,
atk-s0502a:2210_7: Dvāre ṭhitā mallā taṃ gīvāyaṃ gahetvā heṭṭhābhimukhaṃ khipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2210_8: Etenupāyena sattasupi talesu dvārāni sayameva vivaṭāni,
atk-s0502a:2210_10: Tattha tattha mallā taṃ gīvāyameva gahetvā heṭṭhābhimukhaṃ khipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2210_11: Atha naṃ heṭṭhāpāsāde sopānapādamūlaṃ sampattameva mahāpathavī vivaramānā bhijjitvā sampaṭicchi,
atk-s0502a:2216_0: Sabbe tasantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2217_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye sattarasavaggiyehi senāsane paṭijaggite chabbaggiyā bhikkhū “nikkhamatha,
atk-s0502a:2217_2: amhākaṃ etaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti vatvā tehi “na mayaṃ dassāma,
atk-s0502a:2217_3: amhehi paṭhamaṃ paṭijaggita”nti vutte te bhikkhū pahariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2217_5: Satthā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā “idaṃ nāmā”ti ārocite “na,
atk-s0502a:2217_7: ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā nāma evaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2217_9: so imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti pahāradānasikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā,
atk-s0502a:2217_13: maccuno bhāyantī’ti ñatvā paro na paharitabbo,
atk-s0502a:2217_14: na ghātetabbo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2220_0: Attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye”ti.
atk-s0502a:2221_0: Tattha sabbe tasantīti sabbepi sattā attani daṇḍe patante tassa daṇḍassa tasanti.
atk-s0502a:2221_4: Yathā hi raññā “sabbe sannipatantū”ti bheriyā carāpitāyapi rājamahāmatte ṭhapetvā sesā sannipatanti,
atk-s0502a:2221_5: evamidha “sabbe tasantī”ti vuttepi hatthājāneyyo assājāneyyo usabhājāneyyo khīṇāsavoti ime cattāro ṭhapetvā avasesāva tasantīti veditabbā.
atk-s0502a:2221_6: Imesu hi khīṇāsavo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā maraṇakasattaṃ apassanto na bhāyati,
atk-s0502a:2221_7: itare tayo sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavattā attano paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sattaṃ apassantā na bhāyantīti.
atk-s0502a:2221_8: Na haneyya na ghātayeti yathā ahaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2221_9: evaṃ aññepi sattāti neva paraṃ pahareyya na paharāpeyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:2225_0: Sabbe tasantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2226_0: Teyeva ekasmiñhi samaye teneva kāraṇena purimasikkhāpade sattarasavaggiye pahariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2226_2: Idhāpi satthā tesaṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā “idaṃ nāmā”ti ārocite “na,
atk-s0502a:2226_4: ito paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā nāma evaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2226_6: so imaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti talasattikasikkhāpadaṃ paññāpetvā,
atk-s0502a:2226_11: tatheva nesaṃ jīvitaṃ piya’nti ñatvā paro na paharitabbo na ghāṭetabbo”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2229_0: Attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā, na haneyya na ghātaye”ti.
atk-s0502a:2230_0: Tattha sabbesaṃ jīvitaṃ piyanti khīṇāsavaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ piyaṃ madhuraṃ,
atk-s0502a:2230_1: khīṇāsavo pana jīvite vā maraṇe vā upekkhakova hoti.
atk-s0502a:2234_0: Sukhakāmāni bhūtānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule kumārake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2235_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto antarāmagge sambahule kumārake ekaṃ gharasappajātikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2235_1: ahiṃ daṇḍakena paharante disvā “kumārakā kiṃ karothā”ti pucchitvā “ahiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2235_2: daṇḍakena paharāmā”ti vutte “kiṃ kāraṇā”ti puna pucchitvā “ḍaṃsanabhayena,
atk-s0502a:2235_3: bhante”ti vutte “tumhe ‘attano sukhaṃ karissāmā’ti imaṃ paharantā nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne sukhalābhino na bhavissatha.
atk-s0502a:2235_4: Attano sukhaṃ patthentena hi paraṃ paharituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2238_0: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so na labhate sukhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2241_0: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so labhate sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a:2242_0: Tattha yo daṇḍenāti yo puggalo daṇḍena vā leḍḍuādīhi vā viheṭheti.
atk-s0502a:2242_1: Pecca so na labhate sukhanti so puggalo paraloke manussasukhaṃ vā dibbasukhaṃ vā paramatthabhūtaṃ vā nibbānasukhaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0502a:2242_2: Dutiyagāthāya pecca so labhateti so puggalo paraloke vuttappakāraṃ tividhampi sukhaṃ labhatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2243_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi te kumārakā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:2246_0: Māvoca pharusaṃ kañcīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto koṇḍadhānattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2247_0: Tassa kira pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya ekaṃ itthirūpaṃ therena saddhiṃyeva vicarati.
atk-s0502a:2247_3: Antogāmaṃ piṇḍāya caratopissa manussā ekaṃ bhikkhaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2247_5: ayaṃ pana tumhākaṃ sahāyikāyā”ti vatvā dutiyampi dadanti.
atk-s0502a:2248_1: Kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kira dve sahāyakā bhikkhū ekamātukucchito nikkhantasadisā ativiya samaggā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2248_2: Dīghāyukabuddhakāle ca anusaṃvaccharaṃ vā anuchamāsaṃ vā bhikkhū uposathatthāya sannipatanti.
atk-s0502a:2248_4: Te ekā tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattadevatā disvā “ime bhikkhū ativiya samaggā,
atk-s0502a:2248_5: sakkā nu kho ime bhinditu”nti cintetvā attano bālatāya cintitasamanantarameva āgantvā tesu ekena, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2248_7: sarīrakiccenamhi atthiko”ti vutte sā devatā ekaṃ manussitthivaṇṇaṃ māpetvā therassa gacchantaraṃ pavisitvā nikkhamanakāle ekena hatthena kesakalāpaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2248_8: ekena nivāsanaṃ saṇṭhāpayamānā tassa piṭṭhito nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:2248_10: tamāgamayamāno pana purato ṭhitabhikkhu nivattitvā olokayamāno taṃ tathā katvā nikkhamantaṃ passi.
atk-s0502a:2248_12: Itaro taṃ bhikkhuṃ attano santikaṃ āgatakāle āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2248_16: Idāneva te mayā pacchato nikkhamamānā taruṇaitthī idaṃ nāma karontī diṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a:2248_18: So asaniyā matthake avatthaṭo viya mā maṃ, āvuso, nāsehi,
atk-s0502a:2248_21: kiṃ tava saddahissāmī”ti daṇḍako viya bhijjitvā pakkāmi,
atk-s0502a:2248_22: uposathaggepi “nāhaṃ iminā saddhiṃ uposathaṃ karissāmī”ti nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2248_24: sīle aṇumattampi kāḷaṃ natthī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2248_26: Devatā taṃ tena saddhiṃ uposathaṃ kātuṃ anicchantaṃ disvā “bhāriyaṃ mayā kammaṃ kata”nti cintetvā – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2248_30: So tassā ākāse ṭhatvā kathentiyā saddahitvā uposathaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0502a:2248_31: na pana there pubbe viya muducitto ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2249_0: Āyupariyosāne pana te therā yathāsukhaṃ devaloke nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2249_1: Devatā apīcimhi nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tattha paccitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a:2249_3: Tassa pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya taṃ itthirūpaṃ tatheva paññāyi.
atk-s0502a:2249_5: Taṃ tathāvicarantaṃ disvā bhikkhū anāthapiṇḍikaṃ āhaṃsu –
atk-s0502a:2249_8: Imañhi nissāya sesabhikkhūnaṃ ayaso uppajjissatī”ti. Kiṃ pana, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2250_2: koṇḍadhānatthero ekaṃ itthiṃ gahetvā vicaranto sabbesaṃ ayasaṃ uppādesi,
atk-s0502a:2250_10: ahaṃ taṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti so sāyanhasamaye vihāraṃ gantvā taṃ senāsanaṃ purisehi parikkhipāpetvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2250_11: Thero mahāsaddaṃ sutvā vihārā nikkhamitvā pamukhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2250_12: Tampissa itthirūpaṃ piṭṭhipasse ṭhitaṃ rājā addasa.
atk-s0502a:2250_13: Thero rañño āgamanaṃ ñatvā vihāraṃ abhiruhitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2250_16: So dvārantarepi heṭṭhāmañcepi olokento adisvāva theraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2250_21: “Idāni mayā tumhākaṃ piṭṭhipasse ṭhitā diṭṭhā”ti vuttepi “ahaṃ na passāmi”ccevāha.
atk-s0502a:2250_24: There nikkhamitvā pamukhe ṭhite puna sā therassa piṭṭhipasse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2250_25: Rājā taṃ disvā puna uparitalaṃ abhiruhi,
atk-s0502a:2250_27: Puna rājā taṃ sabbaṭṭhānesu olokentopi adisvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2250_28: kahaṃ sā itthī”ti puna theraṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:2250_31: mayā idāneva tumhākaṃ piṭṭhipasse ṭhitā diṭṭhā”ti āha. Āma, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:2250_32: mahājanopi “me pacchato pacchato itthī vicaratī”ti vadati,
atk-s0502a:2250_35: ito tāva otarathā”ti vatvā there otaritvā pamukhe ṭhite puna taṃ tassa piṭṭhipasse ṭhitaṃ disvā uparitalaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0502a:2250_37: So puna theraṃ pucchitvā tena “na passāmi”cceva vutte “paṭirūpakameveta”nti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā theraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2250_38: evarūpe saṃkilese tumhākaṃ piṭṭhito vicarante añño koci tumhākaṃ bhikkhaṃ na dassati,
atk-s0502a:2250_40: ahameva catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti theraṃ nimantetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:2251_2: ‘etaṃ vihārato nīharā’ti vutte āgantvā catūhi paccayehi nimantetvā gato”ti ujjhāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2251_5: Sopi pubbe bhikkhū kiñci vattuṃ asakkonto “tumhe dussīlā,
atk-s0502a:2251_9: koṇḍadhānatthero amhehi vutto amhe ‘dussīlā’tiādīni vatvā akkosatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2251_20: “Ime kira tayā saddhiṃ itthiṃ vicarantiṃ disvā vadanti,
atk-s0502a:2251_23: Tvaṃ adisvāva imehi saddhiṃ kasmā kathesi,
atk-s0502a:2251_24: nanu pubbe taveva pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya idaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2251_25: idāni kasmā puna pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2251_28: Atha nesaṃ satthā tassa pubbakammaṃ kathetvā “bhikkhu idaṃ pāpakammaṃ nissāya tvaṃ imaṃ vippakāraṃ patto,
atk-s0502a:2251_29: idāni te puna tathārūpaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ gahetuṃ na yuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2251_30: mā puna bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ kiñci kathehi,
atk-s0502a:2251_32: evaṃ karonto nibbānappatto nāma bhavissatī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2254_0: Dukkhā hi sārambhakathā, paṭidaṇḍā phuseyyu taṃ.
atk-s0502a:2257_0: Esa pattosi nibbānaṃ, sārambho te na vijjatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2258_0: Tattha māvoca pharusaṃ kañcīti kañci ekapuggalampi pharusaṃ mā avaca.
atk-s0502a:2258_3: Sārambhakathāti esā karaṇuttarā yugaggāhakathā nāma dukkhā.
atk-s0502a:2258_4: Paṭidaṇḍāti kāyadaṇḍādīhi paraṃ paharantassa tādisā paṭidaṇḍā ca tava matthake pateyyuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2258_5: Sace neresīti sace attānaṃ niccalaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasi.
atk-s0502a:2258_6: Kaṃso upahato yathāti mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ chinditvā talamattaṃ katvā ṭhapitakaṃsathālaṃ viya.
atk-s0502a:2258_7: Tañhi hatthapādehi vā daṇḍakena vā pahaṭampi saddaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0502a:2258_8: esa pattosīti sace evarūpo bhavituṃ sakkhissasi,
atk-s0502a:2258_9: imaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrayamāno idāni appattopi eso nibbānappatto nāma.
atk-s0502a:2258_10: Sārambho te na vijjatīti evaṃ sante ca pana “tvaṃ dussīlo,
atk-s0502a:2258_11: tumhe dussīlā”tievamādiko uttarakaraṇavācālakkhaṇo sārambhopi te na vijjati,
atk-s0502a:2259_1: koṇḍadhānattheropi satthārā dinnaovāde ṭhatvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a:2259_2: na cirasseva ākāse uppatitvā paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhīti.
atk-s0502a:2262_0: Yathā daṇḍenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto visākhādīnaṃ upāsikānaṃ uposathakammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2263_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira ekasmiṃ mahāuposathadivase pañcasatamattā itthiyo uposathikā hutvā vihāraṃ agamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2263_6: tāhi “taruṇabhāveyeva patikulagamanatthāyā”ti vutte taṃ sabbampi tāsaṃ kathaṃ sutvā tā ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā paṭipāṭiyā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2263_7: Taṃ sutvā satthā “visākhe imesaṃ sattānaṃ jātiādayo nāma daṇḍahatthakagopālakasadisā,
atk-s0502a:2263_10: byādhi maraṇassa santikaṃ pesetvā maraṇaṃ kuṭhāriyā chindantā viya jīvitaṃ chindati,
atk-s0502a:2263_11: evaṃ santepi vivaṭṭaṃ patthentā nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:2263_12: vaṭṭameva pana patthentī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2266_0: Evaṃ jarā ca maccu ca, āyuṃ pājenti pāṇina”nti.
atk-s0502a:2267_0: Tattha pājetīti cheko gopālo kedārantaraṃ pavisantiyo gāvo daṇḍena nivāretvā teneva pothento sulabhatiṇodakaṃ gocaraṃ neti.
atk-s0502a:2267_2: Gopālako viya hi jarā ca maccu ca,
atk-s0502a:2267_5: Tattha jāti tāva sattānaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ jarāya santikaṃ pesesi,
atk-s0502a:2267_8: Tameva maraṇaṃ kuṭhāriyā chedaṃ viya chinditvā gacchatīti idamettha opammasampaṭipādanaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2271_0: Atha pāpāni kammānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ajagarapetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2272_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye mahāmoggallānatthero lakkhaṇattherena saddhiṃ gijjhakūṭato otaranto dibbena cakkhunā pañcavīsatiyojanikaṃ ajagarapetaṃ nāma addasa.
atk-s0502a:2272_1: Tassa sīsato aggijālā uṭṭhahitvā pariyantaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0502a:2272_7: satthu santike maṃ puccheyyāsī”ti vatvā rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā satthu santikaṃ gatakāle lakkhaṇattherena puṭṭho āha –
atk-s0502a:2272_11: ahaṃ taṃ disvā ‘na vata me evarūpo attabhāvo diṭṭhapubbo’ti sitaṃ pātvākāsi”nti.
atk-s0502a:2272_14: sāvakā viharantī”tiādīni vadanto therassa kathaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā “mayāpi eso,
atk-s0502a:2272_17: ‘ye ca pana me vacanaṃ na saddaheyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2272_18: tesaṃ taṃ ahitāya assā’ti na kathesiṃ,
atk-s0502a:2272_19: idāni moggallānaṃ sakkhiṃ labhitvā kathemī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi tassa pubbakammaṃ puṭṭho byākāsi –
atk-s0502a:2273_0: Kassapabuddhakāle kira sumaṅgalaseṭṭhi nāma suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi bhūmiṃ santharitvā vīsatiusabhaṭṭhāne tattakeneva
atk-s0502a:2273_1: dhanena vihāraṃ kāretvā tāvattakeneva vihāramahaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a:2273_2: So ekadivasaṃ pātova satthu santikaṃ gacchanto nagaradvāre ekissā sālāya kāsāvaṃ sasīsaṃ pārupitvā kalalamakkhitehi
atk-s0502a:2273_3: pādehi nipannaṃ ekaṃ coraṃ disvā “ayaṃ kalalamakkhitapādo rattiṃ vicaritvā divā nipannamanusso bhavissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2273_5: jānissāmi te kattabba”nti āghātaṃ bandhitvā sattakkhattuṃ khettaṃ jhāpesi,
atk-s0502a:2273_8: so ettakenāpi kopaṃ nibbāpetuṃ asakkonto tassa cūḷūpaṭṭhākena saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ katvā “kiṃ te seṭṭhino
atk-s0502a:2273_9: piya”nti puṭṭho “gandhakuṭito aññaṃ tassa piyataraṃ natthī”ti sutvā “hotu,
atk-s0502a:2273_10: gandhakuṭiṃ jhāpetvā kopaṃ nibbāpessāmī”ti satthari piṇḍāya paviṭṭhe pānīyaparibhojanīyaghaṭe bhinditvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ aggiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2273_11: Seṭṭhi “gandhakuṭi kira jhāyatī”ti sutvā āgacchanto jhāmakāle āgantvā gandhakuṭiṃ jhāmaṃ olokento vālaggamattampi
atk-s0502a:2273_12: domanassaṃ akatvā vāmabāhuṃ samañjitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena mahāapphoṭanaṃ apphoṭesi.
atk-s0502a:2273_13: Atha naṃ samīpe ṭhitā pucchiṃsu – “kasmā, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2273_14: ettakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjetvā katagandhakuṭiyā jhāmakāle apphoṭesī”ti? So āha –
atk-s0502a:2273_16: aggiādīhi asādhāraṇe buddhassa sāsane dhanaṃ nidahituṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2273_17: ‘punapi ettakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjetvā satthu gandhakuṭiṃ kātuṃ labhissāmī’ti tuṭṭhamānaso apphoṭesi”nti.
atk-s0502a:2273_18: So puna tattakaṃ dhanaṃ vissajjetvā gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā vīsatisahassabhikkhuparivārassa satthuno dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2273_20: “ahaṃ imaṃ amāretvā maṅkukātuṃ na sakkhissāmi, hotu,
atk-s0502a:2273_21: māressāmi na”nti nivāsanantare churikaṃ bandhitvā sattāhaṃ vihāre vicarantopi okāsaṃ na labhi.
atk-s0502a:2273_22: Mahāseṭṭhipi satta divasāni buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā satthāraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2273_23: mama ekena purisena sattakkhattuṃ khettaṃ jhāpitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2273_27: ahaṃ imasmiṃ dāne paṭhamaṃ pattiṃ tassa dammī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2274_0: Taṃ sutvā coro “bhāriyaṃ vata me kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:2274_1: evaṃ aparādhakārake mayi imassa kopamattampi natthi,
atk-s0502a:2274_2: imasmimpi dāne mayhameva paṭhamaṃ pattiṃ deti,
atk-s0502a:2274_4: evarūpaṃ me purisaṃ akhamāpentassa devadaṇḍopi me matthake pateyyā”ti gantvā seṭṭhissa pādamūle nipajjitvā “khamāhi me,
atk-s0502a:2274_8: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “tayā me idañcidañca kata”nti sabbaṃ pucchitvā “āma,
atk-s0502a:2274_12: So ekadivasaṃ nagarā nikkhantena tena vuttavacanaṃ sāretvā “iminā me kāraṇena kopo uppādito”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2274_15: taṃ me khamāhī”ti coraṃ khamāpetvā “uṭṭhehi, tāta,
atk-s0502a:2274_17: tātā”ti āha. Sace me, sāmi, khamasi,
atk-s0502a:2274_18: saputtadāraṃ maṃ gehe dāsaṃ karohīti. Tāta,
atk-s0502a:2274_19: tvaṃ mayā ettake kathite evarūpaṃ chedanaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0502a:2274_20: gehe vasantena pana saddhiṃ na sakkā kiñci kathetuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2274_21: na me tayā gehe vasantena kiccaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:2274_23: Coro taṃ kammaṃ katvā āyupariyosāne avīcimhi nibbatto dīgharattaṃ tattha paccitvā vipākāvasesena idāni gijjhakūṭe pabbate paccatīti.
atk-s0502a:2275_2: bālā nāma pāpāni kammāni karontā na bujjhanti,
atk-s0502a:2275_3: pacchā pana attanā katakammehi ḍayhamānā attanāva attano dāvaggisadisāva hontī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2277_0: “Atha pāpāni kammāni, karaṃ bālo na bujjhati;
atk-s0502a:2279_0: Tattha atha pāpānīti na kevalaṃ bālo kodhavasena pāpāni karoti,
atk-s0502a:2279_2: Pāpaṃ karonto ca “pāpaṃ karomī”ti abujjhanako nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:2279_3: “Imassa kammassa evarūpo nāma vipāko”ti ajānanatāya “na bujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2279_4: Sehīti so tehi attano santakehi kammehi dummedho nippañño puggalo niraye nibbattitvā aggiḍaḍḍhova tappatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2283_0: Yo daṇḍenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahāmoggallānattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2284_2: ‘kena kāraṇena samaṇassa gotamassa lābhasakkāro mahā hutvā nibbatto’ti.
atk-s0502a:2284_6: So hi devalokaṃ gantvā devatāhi katakammaṃ pucchitvā āgantvā manussānaṃ katheti ‘idaṃ nāma katvā evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labhantī’ti.
atk-s0502a:2284_7: Niraye nibbattānampi kammaṃ pucchitvā āgantvā manussānaṃ katheti ‘idaṃ nāma katvā evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantī’ti.
atk-s0502a:2284_8: Manussā tassa kathaṃ sutvā mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ abhiharanti,
atk-s0502a:2284_11: Te “attheko upāyo”ti sabbe ekacchandā hutvā “yaṃkiñci katvā taṃ mārāpessāmā”ti attano upaṭṭhāke samādapetvā
atk-s0502a:2284_12: kahāpaṇasahassaṃ labhitvā purisaghātakammaṃ katvā carante core pakkosāpetvā “mahāmoggallānatthero nāma
atk-s0502a:2284_14: tattha gantvā taṃ mārethā”ti tesaṃ kahāpaṇe adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2284_15: Corā dhanalobhena sampaṭicchitvā “theraṃ māressāmā”ti gantvā tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2284_16: Thero tehi parikkhittabhāvaṃ ñatvā kuñcikacchiddena nikkhamitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:2284_17: Te corā taṃ divasaṃ theraṃ adisvā punekadivasaṃ gantvā parikkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2284_18: Thero ñatvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandi.
atk-s0502a:2284_19: Evaṃ te paṭhamamāsepi majjhimamāsepi theraṃ gahetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2284_20: Pacchimamāse pana sampatte thero attanā katakammassa ākaḍḍhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā na apagacchi.
atk-s0502a:2284_21: Corā gantvā theraṃ gahetvā taṇḍulakaṇamattānissa aṭṭhīni karontā bhindiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2284_22: Atha naṃ “mato”ti saññāya ekasmiṃ gumbapiṭṭhe khipitvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2285_0: Thero “satthāraṃ passitvāva parinibbāyissāmī”ti attabhāvaṃ jhānaveṭhanena veṭhetvā thiraṃ katvā ākāsena satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2285_10: Tādisassa hi me sāvakassa idāni dassanaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0502a:2285_12: bhante”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā ākāsaṃ uppatitvā parinibbānadivase sāriputtatthero viya nānappakārā iddhiyo
atk-s0502a:2285_13: katvā dhammaṃ kathetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā kāḷasilāṭaviṃ gantvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0502a:2285_14: “Theraṃ kira corā māresu”nti ayampi kathā sakalajambudīpe patthari.
atk-s0502a:2285_15: Rājā ajātasattu core pariyesanatthāya carapurise payojesi.
atk-s0502a:2285_16: Tesupi coresu surāpāne suraṃ pivantesu eko ekassa piṭṭhiṃ paharitvā pātesi.
atk-s0502a:2285_18: tvaṃ kasmā me piṭṭhiṃ pātesī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2285_21: Kiṃ pana mayā pahaṭabhāvaṃ tvaṃ na jānāsīti?
atk-s0502a:2285_23: mayā pahaṭo”ti vadantānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā te carapurisā te sabbe core gahetvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2285_28: Rājā pañcasate naggasamaṇake gāhāpetvā pañcasatehi corehi saddhiṃ rājaṅgaṇe nābhippamāṇesu āvāṭesu nikhaṇāpetvā palālehi paṭicchādāpetvā aggiṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2285_29: Atha nesaṃ jhāmabhāvaṃ ñatvā ayanaṅgalehi kasāpetvā sabbe khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2286_4: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:2286_6: moggallāno imasseva attabhāvassa ananurūpaṃ maraṇaṃ patto,
atk-s0502a:2286_7: pubbe pana tena katassa kammassa anurūpameva maraṇaṃ patto”ti vatvā “kiṃ panassa, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2287_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasivāsī eko kulaputto sayameva koṭṭanapacanādīni kammāni karonto mātāpitaro paṭijaggi.
atk-s0502a:2287_2: tvaṃ ekakova gehe ca araññe ca kammaṃ karonto kilamasi,
atk-s0502a:2287_7: tāva vo sahatthā upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti tena paṭikkhittā punappunaṃ taṃ yācitvā kumārikaṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2287_8: Sā katipāhameva te upaṭṭhahitvā pacchā tesaṃ dassanampi anicchantī “na sakkā tava mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:2287_9: ekaṭṭhāne vasitu”nti ujjhāyitvā tasmiṃ attano kathaṃ aggaṇhante tassa bahigatakāle makacivākakhaṇḍāni
atk-s0502a:2287_10: ca yāgupheṇañca gahetvā tattha tattha ākiritvā tenāgantvā “kiṃ ida”nti puṭṭhā āha –
atk-s0502a:2287_13: na sakkā etehi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne vasitu”nti.
atk-s0502a:2287_14: Evaṃ tāya naṃ punappunaṃ kathayamānāya evarūpopi pūritapāramī satto mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ bhijji. So “hotu,
atk-s0502a:2287_17: asukaṭṭhāne nāma tumhākaṃ ñātakā āgamanaṃ paccāsīsanti,
atk-s0502a:2287_18: tattha gamissāmā”ti te yānakaṃ āropetvā ādāya gacchanto aṭavimajjhaṃ pattakāle, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:2287_22: ahaṃ otarāmī”ti pitu hatthe rasmiyo datvā otaritvā gacchanto saddaṃ parivattetvā corānaṃ uṭṭhitasaddamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:2287_26: So mātāpitaro tathāviravantepi corasaddaṃ karonto koṭṭetvā māretvā aṭaviyaṃ khipitvā paccāgami.
atk-s0502a:2288_2: moggallāno ettakaṃ kammaṃ katvā anekavassasatasahassāni niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate evameva koṭṭetvā saṃcuṇṇito maraṇaṃ patto.
atk-s0502a:2288_3: Evaṃ moggallānena attano kammānurūpameva maraṇaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2288_5: Appaduṭṭhesu hi padussanto dasahi kāraṇehi anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇātiyevā”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2294_0: Garukaṃ vāpi ābādhaṃ, cittakkhepaṃ va pāpuṇe.
atk-s0502a:2297_0: Parikkhayaṃ va ñātīnaṃ, bhogānaṃ va pabhaṅguraṃ.
atk-s0502a:2301_1: Appaduṭṭhesūti paresu vā attani vā niraparādhesu.
atk-s0502a:2301_2: Dasannamaññataraṃ ṭhānanti dasasu dukkhakāraṇesu aññataraṃ kāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2301_10: idaṃ vā rājāparādhitakammaṃ tayā kata”nti evarūpaṃ dāruṇaṃ abbhakkhānaṃ vā.
atk-s0502a:2301_11: Parikkhayaṃ va ñātīnanti attano avassayo bhavituṃ samatthānaṃ ñātīnaṃ parikkhayaṃ vā.
atk-s0502a:2301_19: Aggi ḍahatīti ekasaṃvacchare dvattikkhattuṃ aññasmiṃ ḍāhake avijjamānepi asaniaggi vā patitvā ḍahati,
atk-s0502a:2301_20: attanova dhammatāya uṭṭhito pāvako vā ḍahatiyeva.
atk-s0502a:2301_21: Nirayanti diṭṭheva dhamme imesaṃ dasannaṃ ṭhānānaṃ aññataraṃ patvāpi ekaṃsena samparāye pattabbaṃ dassetuṃ “nirayaṃ sopapajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2305_0: Na naggacariyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto bahubhaṇḍikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2306_0: Sāvatthivāsī kireko kuṭumbiko bhariyāya kālakatāya pabbaji.
atk-s0502a:2306_1: So pabbajanto attano pariveṇañca aggisālañca bhaṇḍagabbhañca kāretvā sabbampi bhaṇḍagabbhaṃ sappimadhutelādīhi pūretvā pabbaji,
atk-s0502a:2306_2: pabbajitvā ca pana attano dāse pakkosāpetvā yathārucikaṃ āhāraṃ pacāpetvā bhuñjati.
atk-s0502a:2306_7: Tassekadivasaṃ cīvarapaccattharaṇāni sukkhāpentassa senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā bhikkhū passitvā “kassimāni,
atk-s0502a:2306_10: tvañca pana evaṃ appicchassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā evaṃ bahuparikkhāro jāto”ti taṃ satthu santikaṃ netvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2306_15: mayā appicchatāya dhamme desite evaṃ bahubhaṇḍo jāto”ti.
atk-s0502a:2306_16: So tāvattakeneva kupito “iminā dāni nīhārena carissāmī”ti pārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā parisamajjhe ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2306_17: Atha naṃ satthā upatthambhayamāno nanu tvaṃ bhikkhu pubbe hirottappagavesako dakarakkhasakālepi hirottappaṃ gavesamāno dvādasa vassāni vihāsi,
atk-s0502a:2306_18: kasmā idāni evaṃ garuke buddhasāsane pabbajitvā catuparisamajjhe pārupanaṃ chaḍḍetvā hirottappaṃ pahāya ṭhitosīti.
atk-s0502a:2306_19: So satthu vacanaṃ sutvā hirottappaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā taṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2306_20: Bhikkhū tassa atthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ bhagavantaṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2307_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasirañño aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ bodhisatto paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:2307_3: Tesaṃ mātari kālakatāya rājā aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:2307_6: Taṃ disvā rājā tuṭṭho “puttassa te varaṃ dammī”ti āha. Sāpi kho, “deva,
atk-s0502a:2307_7: icchitakāle gaṇhissāmī”ti vatvā puttassa vayappattakāle rājānaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:2307_10: Rājā “mama dve puttā aggikkhandhā viya jalantā vicaranti,
atk-s0502a:2307_11: na sakkā tassa rajjaṃ dātu”nti paṭikkhipitvāpi taṃ punappunaṃ yācamānameva disvā “ayaṃ me puttānaṃ anatthampi kareyyā”ti putte pakkosāpetvā, “tātā,
atk-s0502a:2307_17: araññe vasitvā mamaccayenāgantvā rajjaṃ gaṇhathā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:2307_18: Te pitaraṃ vanditvā pāsādā otarante rājaṅgaṇe kīḷamāno sūriyakumāro disvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā tehi saddhiṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:2307_19: Tesaṃ himavantaṃ paviṭṭhakāle bodhisatto maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīditvā sūriyakumāraṃ āha – “tāta,
atk-s0502a:2307_20: etaṃ saraṃ gantvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca amhākampi paduminipaṇṇehi udakaṃ āharā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2307_21: So pana saro vessavaṇṇassa santikā ekena dakarakkhasena laddho hoti.
atk-s0502a:2307_23: “ṭhapetvā devadhammajānanake ye ca aññe imaṃ saraṃ otaranti,
atk-s0502a:2307_25: Tato paṭṭhāya so taṃ saraṃ otiṇṇotiṇṇe devadhamme pucchitvā ajānante khādati,
atk-s0502a:2307_27: tena ca “devadhamme jānāsī”ti pucchito “devadhammā nāma candimasūriyā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2307_28: Atha naṃ “tvaṃ devadhamme na jānāsī”ti udakaṃ pavesetvā attano bhavane ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:2307_29: Bodhisattopi taṃ cirāyantaṃ disvā candakumāraṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a:2307_30: Sopi tena “devadhamme jānāsī”ti pucchito “devadhammā nāma catasso disā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2307_31: Dakarakkhaso tampi udakaṃ pavesetvā tattheva ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:2308_0: Bodhisatto tasmimpi cirāyante “antarāyena bhavitabba”nti sayaṃ gantvā dvinnampi otaraṇapadaṃyeva disvā
atk-s0502a:2308_1: “ayaṃ saro rakkhasapariggahito”ti ñatvā khaggaṃ sannayhitvā dhanuṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2308_2: Rakkhaso taṃ anotarantaṃ disvā vanakammikapurisavesenāgantvā āha –
atk-s0502a:2308_5: kasmā imaṃ saraṃ otaritvā nhatvā ca pivitvā ca bhisamulālaṃ khāditvā pupphāni pilandhitvā na gacchasī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2308_6: Bodhisatto taṃ disvāva “esa so yakkho”ti ñatvā “tayā me bhātaro gahitā”ti āha. Āma,
atk-s0502a:2308_12: Atthi pana te devadhammehi atthoti? Āma, atthīti.
atk-s0502a:2308_16: Yakkho bodhisattaṃ nhāpetvā pānīyaṃ pāyetvā alaṅkaritvā alaṅkatamaṇḍapamajjhe pallaṅkaṃ āropetvā sayamassa pādamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2308_17: Atha naṃ bodhisatto “sakkaccaṃ suṇāhī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2311_0: Yakkho imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasanno bodhisattaṃ āha – “paṇḍita,
atk-s0502a:2311_8: Yasmā jeṭṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā kaniṭṭhaṃ āharāpento jeṭṭhāpacāyikakammaṃ na karosīti,
atk-s0502a:2311_11: Mayañhi etaṃ nissāya imaṃ araññaṃ paviṭṭhā.
atk-s0502a:2311_12: Etassa hi atthāya amhākaṃ pitaraṃ etassa mātā rajjaṃ yāci,
atk-s0502a:2311_13: amhākaṃ pana pitā taṃ varaṃ adatvā amhākaṃ anurakkhaṇatthāya araññe vāsaṃ anujāni,
atk-s0502a:2311_14: so kumāro anivattitvā amhehi saddhiṃ āgato.
atk-s0502a:2311_15: “Taṃ araññe eko yakkho khādī”ti vuttepi na koci saddahissati.
atk-s0502a:2311_19: devadhammesu ca vattasī”ti dve bhātaro ānetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2311_20: Atha naṃ bodhisatto yakkhabhāve ādīnavaṃ kathetvā pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2311_21: So tena susaṃvihitārakkho tasmiṃ araññe vasitvā pitari kālakate yakkhaṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gantvā rajjaṃ gahetvā candakumārassa uparajjaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2311_22: sūriyakumārassa senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ datvā yakkhassa ramaṇīye ṭhāne āyatanaṃ kārāpetvā yathā so lābhaggappatto hoti,
atk-s0502a:2312_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi “tadā rakkhaso bahubhaṇḍikabhikkhu ahosi,
atk-s0502a:2312_4: Evaṃ satthā jātakaṃ kathetvā “evaṃ tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0502a:2312_5: pubbe devadhamme gavesamāno hiriottappasampanno vicaritvā idāni catuparisamajjhe iminā nīhārena ṭhatvā
atk-s0502a:2312_7: Na hi sāṭakapaṭikkhepādimattena samaṇo nāma hotī”ti vatvā anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2314_0: “Na naggacariyā na jaṭā na paṅkā, nānāsakā thaṇḍilasāyikā vā;
atk-s0502a:2316_6: yo hi macco “evaṃ ahaṃ lokanissaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ suddhiṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti imesu naggacariyādīsu yaṃ kiñci samādāya vatteyya,
atk-s0502a:2316_9: Na hi etāni susamādinnānipi aṭṭhavatthukāya kaṅkhāya avitiṇṇabhāvena avitiṇṇakaṅkhaṃ maccaṃ sodhentīti.
atk-s0502a:2320_0: Alaṅkato cepīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto santatimahāmattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2321_0: So hi ekasmiṃ kāle rañño pasenadikosalassa paccantaṃ kupitaṃ vūpasametvā āgato.
atk-s0502a:2321_1: Athassa rājā tuṭṭho satta divasāni rajjaṃ datvā ekaṃ naccagītakusalaṃ itthiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2321_2: So satta divasāni surāmadamatto hutvā sattame divase sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhavaragato nhānatitthaṃ
atk-s0502a:2321_3: gacchanto satthāraṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ dvārantare disvā hatthikkhandhavaragatova sīsaṃ cāletvā vanditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:2321_4: Satthā sitaṃ katvā “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2321_5: sitapātukaraṇe hetū”ti ānandattherena puṭṭho sitakāraṇaṃ ācikkhanto āha –
atk-s0502a:2321_8: ajja sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitova mama santikaṃ āgantvā catuppadikagāthāvasāne arahattaṃ patvā sattatālamatte ākāse nisīditvā parinibbāyissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2321_9: Mahājano therena saddhiṃ kathentassa satthu vacanaṃ assosi.
atk-s0502a:2321_13: ajja kira esa evaṃ surāmadamatto yathālaṅkatova etassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā parinibbāyissati,
atk-s0502a:2322_0: Santatimahāmattopi nhānatitthe divasabhāgaṃ udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitvā uyyānaṃ gantvā āpānabhūmiyaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2322_1: Sāpi itthī raṅgamajjhaṃ otaritvā naccagītaṃ dassetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:2322_2: Tassā sarīralīḷāya dassanatthaṃ sattāhaṃ appāhāratāya taṃ divasaṃ naccagītaṃ dassayamānāya antokucchiyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2322_4: Sā taṅkhaṇaññeva mukhena ceva akkhīhi ca vivaṭehi kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:2322_6: sāmī”ti ca vuttamatteyeva balavasokena abhibhūto taṅkhaṇaññevassa sattāhaṃ pītasurā tattakapāle udakabindu viya parikkhayaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2322_7: So “na me imaṃ sokaṃ aññe nibbāpetuṃ sakkhissanti aññatra tathāgatenā”ti balakāyaparivuto sāyanhasamaye satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā evamāha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2322_9: taṃ me tumhe nibbāpetuṃ sakkhissathā’ti āgatomhi,
atk-s0502a:2322_11: Atha naṃ satthā “sokaṃ nibbāpetuṃ samatthasseva santikaṃ āgatosi.
atk-s0502a:2322_12: Imissā hi itthiyā imināva ākārena matakāle tava rodantassa paggharitaassūni catunnaṃ mahāsamuddānaṃ udakato atirekatarānī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2323_0: “Yaṃ pubbe taṃ visosehi, pacchā te māhu kiñcanaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2324_0: Majjhe ce no gahessasi, upasanto carissasī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:2325_0: Gāthāpariyosāne santatimahāmatto arahattaṃ patvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokento tassa appavattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā satthāraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2325_2: Satthā tena katakammaṃ jānantopi “musāvādena niggaṇhanatthaṃ sannipatitā micchādiṭṭhikā okāsaṃ na labhissanti,
atk-s0502a:2325_3: ‘buddhalīḷañceva santatimahāmattalīḷañca passissāmā’ti sannipatitā sammādiṭṭhikā iminā katakammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0502a:2325_4: puññesu ādaraṃ karissantī”ti sallakkhetvā “tena hi tayā katakammaṃ mayhaṃ kathehi,
atk-s0502a:2325_5: kathento ca bhūmiyaṃ ṭhito akathetvā sattatālamatte ākāse ṭhito kathehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2325_7: bhante”ti satthāraṃ vanditvā ekatālappamāṇaṃ uggamma orohitvā puna satthāraṃ vanditvā uggacchanto paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0502a:2325_8: sattatālappamāṇe ākāse pallaṅkena nisīditvā “suṇātha me, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2326_0: Ito ekanavutikappe vipassīsammāsambuddhakāle ahaṃ bandhumatinagare ekasmiṃ kule nibbattitvā cintesiṃ –
atk-s0502a:2326_1: “kiṃ nu kho paresaṃ chedaṃ vā pīḷaṃ vā akaraṇakamma”nti upadhārento dhammaghosakakammaṃ disvā tato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:2326_2: taṃ kammaṃ karonto mahājanaṃ samādapetvā “puññāni karotha,
atk-s0502a:2326_7: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sakkāraṃ karothā”ti ugghosento vicarāmi.
atk-s0502a:2326_8: Tassa mayhaṃ saddaṃ sutvā buddhapitā bandhumatimahārājā maṃ pakkosāpetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:2326_10: tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsetvā mahājanaṃ puññakammesu samādapento vicarāmī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:2326_14: imaṃ pupphadāmaṃ pilandhitvā assapiṭṭhe nisinnova vicarā”ti mayhaṃ muttādāmasadisaṃ pupphadāmaṃ datvā dantaṃ assaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2326_15: Atha maṃ raññā dinnaparihārena tatheva ugghosetvā vicarantaṃ puna rājā pakkosāpetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:2326_20: Tatiyavārepi me rājā saddaṃ sutvā pakkosāpetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:2326_23: rathopi te nānucchaviko”ti mayhaṃ mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ mahāpasādhanañca datvā ekañca hatthiṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2326_24: Svāhaṃ sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhe nisinno asīti vassasahassāni dhammaghosakakammaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a:2326_25: tassa me ettakaṃ kālaṃ kāyato candanagandho vāyati,
atk-s0502a:2327_0: Evaṃ so attano pubbakammaṃ kathetvā ākāse nisinnova tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0502a:2327_5: Tā patte pakkhipitvā catumahāpathe thūpaṃ kāresi “mahājano vanditvā puññabhāgī bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2327_7: santatimahāmatto gāthāvasāne arahattaṃ patvā alaṅkatapaṭiyattoyeva ākāse nisīditvā parinibbuto,
atk-s0502a:2327_8: kiṃ nu kho etaṃ ‘samaṇo’ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati udāhu brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0502a:2327_11: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:2327_14: ‘brāhmaṇo’tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2332_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”ti.
atk-s0502a:2333_2: vatthālaṅkārādīhi alaṅkato cepi puggalo kāyādīhi samaṃ careyya,
atk-s0502a:2333_3: rāgādivūpasamena santo indriyadamanena danto catumagganiyamena niyato seṭṭhacariyāya brahmacārī kāyadaṇḍādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:2333_5: So evarūpo bāhitapāpattā brāhmaṇotipi samitapāpattā samaṇotipi bhinnakilesattā bhikkhūtipi vattabboyevāti.
atk-s0502a:2337_0: Hirīnisedhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pilotikattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2338_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye ānandatthero ekaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍanivatthaṃ kapālaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya carantaṃ dārakaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:2338_1: “kiṃ te evaṃ vicaritvā jīvanato pabbajjā na uttaritarā”ti vatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2338_2: ko maṃ pabbājessatī”ti vutte “ahaṃ pabbājessāmī”ti taṃ ādāya gantvā sahatthā nhāpetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:2338_3: Tañca pana nivatthapilotikakhaṇḍaṃ pasāretvā olokento parissāvanakaraṇamattampi gayhūpagaṃ kañci padesaṃ
atk-s0502a:2338_4: adisvā kapālena saddhiṃ ekissā rukkhasākhāya ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:2338_5: So pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado buddhānaṃ uppannalābhasakkāraṃ paribhuñjamāno mahagghāni cīvarāni acchādetvā
atk-s0502a:2338_6: vicaranto thūlasarīro hutvā ukkaṇṭhitvā “kiṃ me janassa saddhādeyyaṃ nivāsetvā vicaraṇena,
atk-s0502a:2338_7: attano pilotikameva nivāsessāmī”ti taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā pilotikaṃ gahetvā “ahirika nillajja evarūpānaṃ vatthānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2338_8: acchādanaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya imaṃ pilotikakhaṇḍaṃ nivāsetvā kapālahattho bhikkhāya carituṃ gacchasī”ti taṃ
atk-s0502a:2338_11: So taṃ pilotikaṃ tattheva paṭisāmetvā nivattitvā vihārameva gato.
atk-s0502a:2338_12: So katipāhaccayena punapi ukkaṇṭhitvā tatheva vatvā nivatti,
atk-s0502a:2338_14: Taṃ evaṃ aparāparaṃ vicarantaṃ disvā bhikkhū “kahaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2338_16: So “ācariyassa santikaṃ gacchāmāvuso”ti vatvā eteneva nīhārena attano pilotikakhaṇḍameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:2338_30: mama putto saṃsagge sati ācariyassa santikaṃ gato,
atk-s0502a:2338_32: attanāva attānaṃ nisedhetvā arahattaṃ patto”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2341_0: Yo niddaṃ apabodheti, asso bhadro kasāmiva.
atk-s0502a:2349_0: Tattha anto uppannaṃ akusalavitakkaṃ hiriyā nisedhetīti hirīnisedho.
atk-s0502a:2349_3: Yo niddanti appamatto samaṇadhammaṃ karonto attano uppannaṃ niddaṃ apaharanto bujjhatīti apabodheti.
atk-s0502a:2349_4: Kasāmivāti yathā bhadro asso attani patamānaṃ kasaṃ apaharati,
atk-s0502a:2350_2: yathā bhadro asso pamādamāgamma kasāya niviṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:2350_3: ahampi nāma kasāya pahaṭo”ti aparabhāge ātappaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:2350_5: evaṃbhūtā lokiyalokuttarāya duvidhāya saddhāya ca catupārisuddhisīlena ca kāyikacetasikavīriyena ca aṭṭhasamāpattisamādhinā
atk-s0502a:2350_6: ca kāraṇākāraṇajānanalakkhaṇena dhammavinicchayena ca samannāgatā hutvā tissannaṃ vā aṭṭhannaṃ vā vijjānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2350_8: Upaṭṭhitasatitāya patissatā hutvā idaṃ anappakaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ pajahissathāti.
atk-s0502a:2354_0: Udakañhi nayantīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sukhasāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2355_0: Atītasmiñhi bārāṇasiseṭṭhino gandhakumāro nāma putto ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2355_1: Rājā tassa pitari kālakate taṃ pakkosāpetvā samassāsetvā mahantena sakkārena tasseva seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2355_7: “kiṃ pana te imaṃ dhanaṃ gahetvā na gamiṃsū”ti. “Sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2355_9: Attanā kataṃ kusalākusalameva hi ādāya sattā gacchantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2355_14: pūjaṃ vā karissāmī”ti acintetvā “idaṃ sabbaṃ khāditvāva gamissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:2355_15: So satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā phalikamayaṃ nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ kāresi,
atk-s0502a:2355_25: taṃ bhattaṃ bhuñjanadivase satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā nagaraṃ alaṅkaritvā bheriṃ carāpesi –
atk-s0502a:2356_1: Sopi satasahassagghanake nhānakoṭṭhake satasahassagghanake phalake nisīditvā soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi
atk-s0502a:2356_2: nhatvā taṃ sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā tasmiṃ pallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2356_3: Athassa tasmiṃ āsittakūpadhāne taṃ pātiṃ ṭhapetvā satasahassagghanakaṃ bhojanaṃ vaḍḍhesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2356_4: So nāṭakaparivuto evarūpāya sampattiyā taṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjati.
atk-s0502a:2356_5: Aparena samayena eko gāmikamanusso attano paribbayāharaṇatthaṃ dāruādīni yānake pakkhipitvā nagaraṃ gantvā sahāyakassa gehe nivāsaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:2356_13: etassa mahāsampattiṃ passāmā”ti nagaravāsī janapadavāsiṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2356_16: “mayhaṃ etāya pātiyā bhattapiṇḍe pipāsā jātā”ti. Samma,
atk-s0502a:2356_20: So taṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkonto parisapariyante ṭhatvā “paṇamāmi te,
atk-s0502a:2356_21: sāmī”ti tikkhattuṃ mahāsaddaṃ nicchāretvā “ko eso”ti vutte ahaṃ, sāmīti.
atk-s0502a:2356_23: “Ayaṃ eko gāmavāsī tumhākaṃ pātiyaṃ bhattapiṇḍe pipāsaṃ upādesi,
atk-s0502a:2356_37: tassa tassa dadamāno ahaṃ kiṃ bhuñjissāmīti? Sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2356_42: tīṇi saṃvaccharāni mama gehe bhatiṃ karotu,
atk-s0502a:2356_45: sammā”ti sahāyakaṃ vatvā puttadāraṃ pahāya “bhattapātiatthāya tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ karissāmī”ti seṭṭhissa gehaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:2356_46: So bhatiṃ karonto sabbakiccāni sakkaccaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:2356_47: Gehe vā araññe vā rattiṃ vā divā vā sabbāni kattabbakammāni katāneva paññāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2356_51: dukkaraṃ tena kataṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ karontena,
atk-s0502a:2357_0: Athassa seṭṭhi attano sāyapātarāsatthāya dve sahassāni,
atk-s0502a:2357_1: tassa pātarāsatthāya sahassanti tīṇi sahassāni dāpetvā āha –
atk-s0502a:2357_3: Vatvā ca pana ṭhapetvā ekaṃ cintāmaṇiṃ nāma piyabhariyaṃ avasesajanampi “ajja tameva parivārethā”ti vatvā sabbasampattiṃ tassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a:2357_4: So seṭṭhino nhānodakena tasseva koṭṭhake tasmiṃ phalake nisinno nhatvā tasseva nivāsanasāṭake nivāsetvā tasseva pallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2357_6: “bhattabhatiko gandhaseṭṭhissa gehe tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ katvā pātiṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a:2357_12: Athassa hatthadhovanavelāya gandhamādane eko paccekabuddho sattame divase samāpattito vuṭṭhāya “kattha
atk-s0502a:2357_13: nu kho ajja bhikkhācāratthāya gacchāmī”ti upadhārento bhattabhatikaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a:2357_14: Atha so “ayaṃ tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ katvā bhattapātiṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a:2357_16: natthī”ti upadhārento “atthī”ti ñatvā “saddhāpi ekacce saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:2357_17: sakkhissati nu kho me saṅgahaṃ kātu”nti cintetvā “sakkhissati ceva mama ca saṅgahakaraṇaṃ nissāya mahāsampattiṃ
atk-s0502a:2357_18: labhissatī”ti ñatvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā parisantarena gantvā tassa purato
atk-s0502a:2358_1: “ahaṃ pubbe adinnabhāvena ekissā bhattapātiyā atthāya tīṇi saṃvaccharāni paragehe bhatiṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a:2358_2: idāni me idaṃ bhattaṃ ekaṃ rattindivaṃ rakkheyya,
atk-s0502a:2358_6: So tīṇi saṃvaccharāni bhatiṃ katvā laddhabhattapātito ekapiṇḍampi mukhe aṭṭhapetvā taṇhaṃ vinodetvā sayameva
atk-s0502a:2358_7: pātiṃ ukkhipitvā paccekabuddhassa santikaṃ gantvā pātiṃ aññassa hatthe datvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā
atk-s0502a:2358_8: pātiṃ vāmahatthena gahetvā dakkhiṇahatthena tassa patte bhattaṃ ākiri.
atk-s0502a:2358_9: Paccekabuddho bhattassa upaḍḍhasesakāle pattaṃ hatthena pidahi.
atk-s0502a:2358_11: ekova paṭiviso na sakkā dvidhā kātuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2358_15: Attano hi thokampi anavasesetvā dinnaṃ niravasesadānaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a:2358_17: So tathā karonto sabbaṃ datvā puna vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2358_18: ekaṃ bhattapātiṃ nissāya tīṇi saṃvaccharāni me paragehe bhatiṃ karontena dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2358_22: cintāmaṇi viya te sabbakāmadado manosaṅkappā puṇṇacando viya pūrentū”ti anumodanaṃ karonto –
atk-s0502a:2360_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā.
atk-s0502a:2362_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, maṇi jotiraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2363_0: Vatvā “ayaṃ mahājano yāva gandhamādanapabbatagamanā maṃ passanto tiṭṭhatū”ti adhiṭṭhāya ākāsena gandhamādanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2364_1: So tattha gantvā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ vibhajitvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2364_6: Mahājano paccekabuddhānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vibhajitvā diyyamānaṃ disvā sādhukārasahassāni pavattesi,
atk-s0502a:2364_10: tenāyaṃ mahājano parihāsaṃ karonto sannipatito nadatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2364_13: evaṃ hontū”ti vatvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2364_14: Seṭṭhi taṃ sutvāva pañcavaṇṇāya pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā “aho dukkaraṃ tena kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:2364_15: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ evarūpāya sampattiyā ṭhito kiñci dātuṃ nāsakkhi”nti taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tayā idaṃ nāma kata”nti pucchitvā “āma,
atk-s0502a:2364_17: sahassaṃ gahetvā tava dāne mayhampi pattiṃ dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2364_19: Seṭṭhipissa sabbaṃ attano santakaṃ majjhe bhinditvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2365_5: Tattha nirodhasamāpattiraho arahā vā anāgāmī vā dakkhiṇeyyo vatthusampadā nāma.
atk-s0502a:2365_6: Paccayānaṃ dhammena samena uppatti paccayasampadā nāma.
atk-s0502a:2365_7: Dānato pubbe dānakāle pacchā bhāgeti tīsu kālesu cetanāya somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttabhāvo cetanāsampadā nāma.
