atk-s0502a:2365_10: bhatiṃ katvā laddhabhāvena paccayo dhammato uppanno,
atk-s0502a:2365_12: samāpattito vuṭṭhitamatto paccekabuddho guṇātirekoti catassopi sampadā nipphannā.
atk-s0502a:2365_13: Etāsaṃ ānubhāvena diṭṭheva dhamme mahāsampattiṃ pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0502a:2365_14: Tasmā so seṭṭhino santikā sampattiṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a:2365_15: Aparabhāge ca rājāpi iminā katakammaṃ sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā sahassaṃ datvā pattiṃ gahetvā tuṭṭhamānaso
atk-s0502a:2365_18: So gandhaseṭṭhinā saddhiṃ sahāyo hutvā ekato khādanto pivanto yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā
atk-s0502a:2365_19: ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavitvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthiyaṃ sāriputtattherassūpaṭṭhākakule
atk-s0502a:2365_21: Athassa mātā laddhagabbhaparihārā katipāhaccayena “aho vatāhaṃ pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0502a:2365_22: satarasabhojanaṃ datvā kāsāyavatthanivatthā suvaṇṇasarakaṃ ādāya āsanapariyante nisinnā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0502a:2365_23: ucchiṭṭhāvasesakaṃ paribhuñjeyya”nti dohaḷinī hutvā tatheva katvā dohaḷaṃ paṭivinodesi.
atk-s0502a:2365_24: Sā sesamaṅgalesupi tathārūpameva dānaṃ datvā puttaṃ vijāyitvā nāmaggahaṇadivase “puttassa me, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2365_27: puttassa me paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya imasmiṃ gehe kassaci dukkhaṃ nāma na bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2365_28: tenevassa sukhakumāroti nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti vutte tadevassa nāmaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpadāni adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2366_0: Tadā evañcassa mātu “nāhaṃ mama puttassa ajjhāsayaṃ bhindissāmī”ti cittaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0502a:2366_1: Sā tassa kaṇṇavijjhanamaṅgalādīsupi tatheva dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2366_5: nāhaṃ tava ajjhāsayaṃ bhindissāmī”ti theraṃ nimantetvā bhojetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2366_7: imāhaṃ sāyanhasamaye vihāraṃ ānessāmī”ti theraṃ uyyojetvā ñātake sannipātetvā “puttassa me gihikāle kattabbaṃ
atk-s0502a:2366_8: kiccaṃ ajjeva karissāmā”ti vatvā puttaṃ alaṅkaritvā mahantena sirisobhaggena vihāraṃ netvā therassa niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a:2366_13: Mātāpitaropissa pabbajjāya sakkāraṃ karontā antovihāreyeva sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:2366_14: satarasabhojanaṃ datvā sāyaṃ attano gehaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2366_15: Aṭṭhame divase sāriputtatthero bhikkhusaṅghe gāmaṃ paviṭṭhe vihāre kattabbakiccaṃ katvā sāmaṇeraṃ pattacīvaraṃ gāhāpetvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:2366_16: Sāmaṇero antarāmagge mātikādīni disvā paṇḍitasāmaṇero viya pucchi.
atk-s0502a:2366_18: Sāmaṇero tāni kāraṇāni sutvā “sace tumhe attano pattacīvaraṃ gaṇheyyātha,
atk-s0502a:2366_19: ahaṃ nivatteyya”nti vatvā therena tassa ajjhāsayaṃ abhinditvā,
atk-s0502a:2366_21: dehi mama pattacīvara”nti pattacīvare gahite theraṃ vanditvā nivattamāno, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2366_22: mayhaṃ āhāraṃ āharamāno satarasabhojanaṃ āhareyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2366_24: Attano puññena alabhanto mama puññena labhissatha, bhanteti.
atk-s0502a:2366_25: Athassa thero kuñcikaṃ datvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:2366_26: Sopi vihāraṃ āgantvā therassa gabbhaṃ vivaritvā pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya attano kāye ñāṇaṃ otāretvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2367_0: Tassa guṇatejena sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:2367_1: Sakko “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti olokento sāmaṇeraṃ disvā “sukhasāmaṇero attano upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti nivatto,
atk-s0502a:2367_2: mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā cattāro mahārāje pakkosāpetvā “gacchatha, tātā,
atk-s0502a:2367_4: Te tathā katvā sāmantā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2367_9: Sāmaṇero ekaggacittena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tīṇi maggaphalāni pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:2367_11: kassa nu kho ghare sakkā laddhu”nti olokento ekaṃ ajjhāsayasampannaṃ upaṭṭhākatulaṃ disvā tattha gantvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2367_12: sādhu vo kataṃ ajja idhāgacchantehī”ti tehi tuṭṭhamānasehi pattaṃ gahetvā nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:2367_13: yāva bhattakālaṃ dhammakathaṃ yācito tesaṃ sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ kathetvā kālaṃ sallakkhetvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2367_14: Athassa satarasabhojanaṃ datvā taṃ ādāya gantukāmaṃ theraṃ disvā “bhuñjatha, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2367_15: aparampi te dassāmā”ti theraṃ bhojetvā puna pattapūraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2367_16: Thero taṃ ādāya “sāmaṇero me chāto”ti turitaturito vihāraṃ pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:2367_17: Taṃ divasaṃ satthā pātova nikkhamitvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova āvajjesi –
atk-s0502a:2367_18: “ajja sukhasāmaṇero upajjhāyassa pattacīvaraṃ datvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti nivatto,
atk-s0502a:2367_20: So tiṇṇaṃyeva maggaphalānaṃ pattabhāvaṃ disvā uttaripi upadhārento “sakkhissatāyaṃ ajja arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0502a:2367_21: sāriputto pana ‘sāmaṇero me chāto’ti vegena bhattaṃ ādāya nikkhamati,
atk-s0502a:2367_22: sace imasmiṃ arahattaṃ appatte bhattaṃ āharissati,
atk-s0502a:2367_24: mayā gantvā dvārakoṭṭhake ārakkhaṃ gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:2368_1: Atha naṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva cattāro pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0502a:2368_7: Sāmaṇeropi nikkhamitvā upajjhāyassa vattaṃ katvā “bhattakiccaṃ karohī”ti vutte therassa bhattena anatthikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:2368_8: ñatvā sattavassikakumāro taṅkhaṇaññeva arahattaṃ patto nīcāsanaṭṭhānaṃ paccavekkhanto bhattakiccaṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:2368_10: Tasmiṃ kāle cattāro mahārājāno ārakkhaṃ vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2368_16: kiṃ nu kho ajja pubbaṇho balavā jāto,
atk-s0502a:2368_24: atha ca pana sūriyo nabhamajjhaṃ atikkantoyeva paññāyatī”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:2368_27: Ajja hi cattāro mahārājāno sāmantā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2368_33: tacchake cakkādīni karonte disvā attānaṃ dametvā arahattaṃ patto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2371_0: Dāruṃ namayanti tacchakā, attānaṃ damayanti subbatā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2372_0: Tattha subbatāti suvadā, sukhena ovaditabbā anusāsitabbāti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0502a:2379_0: Ko nu hāso kimānandoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto visākhāya sahāyikāyo ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2380_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kira pañcasatā kulaputtā “evaṃ imā appamādavihāriniyo bhavissantī”ti attano attano bhariyāyo visākhaṃ mahāupāsikaṃ sampaṭicchāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2380_1: Tā uyyānaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā gacchantiyo tāya saddhiṃyeva gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:2380_2: Tā ekasmiṃ kāle “sattāhaṃ surāchaṇo bhavissatī”ti chaṇe saṅghuṭṭhe attano attano sāmikānaṃ suraṃ paṭiyādesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2380_3: Te sattāhaṃ surāchaṇaṃ kīḷitvā aṭṭhame divase kammantabheriyā nikkhantāya kammante agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2380_4: Tāpi itthiyo “mayaṃ sāmikānaṃ sammukhā suraṃ pātuṃ na labhimhā,
atk-s0502a:2380_7: tathā pivissāmā”ti visākhāya santikaṃ gantvā “icchāma, ayye,
atk-s0502a:2380_9: tena hi kattabbakiccāni katvā nikkhamathā”ti vutte tāya saddhiṃ gantvā paṭicchannākārena suraṃ nīharāpetvā uyyāne pivitvā mattā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2380_11: idāni maṃ ‘samaṇassa gotamassa sāvikā visākhā suraṃ pivitvā vicaratī’ti titthiyāpi garahissantī”ti cintetvā tā itthiyo āha –
atk-s0502a:2380_19: Atha tāsaṃ sāmikā “itthannāmā ca itthannāmā ca kaha”nti pucchitvā “gilānā”ti sutvā “addhā etāhi avasesasurā
atk-s0502a:2380_20: pītā bhavissantī”ti sallakkhetvā tā pothetvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2380_21: Tā aparasmimpi chaṇavāre tatheva suraṃ pivitukāmā visākhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “ayye,
atk-s0502a:2380_22: uyyānaṃ no nehī”ti vatvā “pubbepi me tumhehi ayaso uppādito,
atk-s0502a:2380_24: na vo ahaṃ nessāmī”ti tāya paṭikkhittā “idāni evaṃ na karissāmā”ti sammantayitvā puna taṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhaṃsu, “ayye,
atk-s0502a:2380_30: Tā caṅkoṭakehi gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā surāpuṇṇe muṭṭhivārake hatthehi olambetvā mahāpaṭe pārupitvā
atk-s0502a:2380_31: visākhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā tāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ pavisamānā ekamantaṃ gantvā muṭṭhivārakeheva suraṃ pivitvā
atk-s0502a:2380_32: vārake chaḍḍetvā dhammasabhāyaṃ satthu purato nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2381_4: Athekā mārakāyikā devatā “imāsaṃ sarīre adhimuccitvā samaṇassa gotamassa purato vippakāraṃ dassessāmī”ti cintetvā tāsaṃ sarīre adhimucci.
atk-s0502a:2381_5: Tāsu ekaccā satthu purato pāṇiṃ paharitvā hasituṃ,
atk-s0502a:2381_7: Satthā “kiṃ ida”nti āvajjento taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā “na idāni mārakāyikānaṃ otāraṃ labhituṃ dassāmi.
atk-s0502a:2381_8: Na hi mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ pāramiyo pūrentena mārakāyikānaṃ otāralābhatthāya pūritā”ti tā saṃvejetuṃ bhamukalomato rasmiyo vissajjesi,
atk-s0502a:2381_12: Satthā nisinnapallaṅke antarahito sinerumuddhani ṭhatvā uṇṇālomato rasmiṃ vissajjesi,
atk-s0502a:2381_14: Atha satthā tā itthiyo āmantetvā “tumhehi mama santikaṃ āgacchamānāhi pamattāhi āgantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0502a:2381_15: Tumhākañhi pamādeneva mārakāyikā devatā otāraṃ labhitvā tumhe hasādīnaṃ akaraṇaṭṭhāne hasādīni kārāpesi,
atk-s0502a:2381_16: idāni tumhehi rāgādīnaṃ aggīnaṃ nibbāpanatthāya ussāhaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2383_0: “Ko nu hāso kimānando, niccaṃ pajjalite sati;
atk-s0502a:2385_2: imasmiṃ lokasannivāse rāgādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi niccaṃ pajjalite sati ko nu tumhākaṃ hāso vā tuṭṭhi vā?
atk-s0502a:2385_4: Aṭṭhavatthukena hi avijjāndhakārena onaddhā tumhe tasseva andhakārassa vidhamanatthāya kiṃ kāraṇā ñāṇappadīpaṃ na gavesatha na karothāti.
atk-s0502a:2386_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi tā itthiyo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2387_0: Satthā tāsaṃ acalasaddhāya patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā sinerumatthakā otaritvā buddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2387_3: Evarūpā hi nāma imā itthiyo tumhādisassa buddhassa purato nisīditvā iriyāpathamattampi saṇṭhāpetuṃ asakkontiyo
atk-s0502a:2387_7: Etañhi nissāya aneke sattā anayabyasanaṃ pattā”ti vatvā “kadā panesā, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2387_8: uppannā”ti vutte tassā uppattiṃ vitthārena kathetuṃ atītaṃ āharitvā kumbhajātakaṃ kathesīti.
atk-s0502a:2390_0: Passa cittakatanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sirimaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2391_1: Ekasmiṃ pana antovasse sumanaseṭṭhiputtassa bhariyāya puṇṇakaseṭṭhissa dhītāya uttarāya nāma upāsikāya
atk-s0502a:2391_2: aparajjhitvā taṃ pasādetukāmā tassā gehe bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ katabhattakiccaṃ satthāraṃ khamāpetvā
atk-s0502a:2394_3: Evaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā pana sirimā dasabalaṃ nimantetvā punadivase mahādānaṃ datvā saṅghassa aṭṭhakabhattaṃ nibaddhaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2394_4: Ādito paṭṭhāya nibaddhaṃ aṭṭha bhikkhū gehaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:2394_6: khīraṃ gaṇhathā”tiādīni vatvā tesaṃ patte pūreti.
atk-s0502a:2394_9: Athekadivasaṃ eko bhikkhu tassā gehe aṭṭhakabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā tiyojanamatthake ekaṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2394_10: Atha naṃ sāyaṃ therupaṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ pucchiṃsu – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2394_18: Sā hi itthī evarūpā ca evarūpā cā”ti tassā guṇe vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0502a:2395_0: Atheko bhikkhu tassā guṇakathaṃ sutvā adassaneneva sinehaṃ uppādetvā “mayā gantvā taṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:2395_1: attano vassaggaṃ kathetvā taṃ bhikkhuṃ ṭhitikaṃ pucchitvā “sve, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2395_2: tasmiṃ gehe tvaṃ saṅghatthero hutvā aṭṭhakabhattaṃ labhissasī”ti sutvā taṅkhaṇaññeva pattacīvaraṃ ādāya
atk-s0502a:2395_3: pakkantopi pātova aruṇe uggate salākaggaṃ pavisitvā ṭhito saṅghatthero hutvā tassā gehe aṭṭhakabhattaṃ labhi.
atk-s0502a:2395_4: Yo pana bhikkhu hiyyo bhuñjitvā pakkāmi,
atk-s0502a:2395_5: tassa gatavelāyameva assā sarīre rogo uppajji.
atk-s0502a:2395_7: Athassā dāsiyo aṭṭhakabhattaṃ labhitvā āgate bhikkhū disvā ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2395_8: Sā sahatthā patte gahetvā nisīdāpetuṃ vā parivisituṃ vā asakkontī dāsiyo āṇāpesi –
atk-s0502a:2395_10: nisīdāpetvā yāguṃ pāyetvā khajjakaṃ datvā bhattavelāya patte pūretvā dethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2395_12: ayye”ti bhikkhū pavesetvā yāguṃ pāyetvā khajjakaṃ datvā bhattavelāya bhattassa patte pūretvā tassā ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2395_14: vandissāmī”ti vatvā tāhi pariggahetvā bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ nītā vedhamānena sarīrena bhikkhū vandi.
atk-s0502a:2395_17: arogakāle pana sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitāya imissā kīdisī rūpasampattī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2395_19: so aññāṇī hutvā bhattaṃ bhuñjituṃ asakkonto pattamādāya vihāraṃ gantvā pattaṃ pidhāya ekamante ṭhapetvā cīvaraṃ pattharitvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a:2396_0: Atha naṃ eko sahāyako bhikkhu yācantopi bhojetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:2396_6: Satthā taṃ sutvā rañño sāsanaṃ pahiṇi “sirimāya jhāpanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:2396_7: āmakasusāne taṃ yathā kākasunakhādayo na khādanti,
atk-s0502a:2396_15: “ṭhapetvā geharakkhake dārake sirimāya dassanatthaṃ anāgacchantānaṃ aṭṭha kahāpaṇāni daṇḍo”ti.
atk-s0502a:2396_20: Sopi daharabhikkhu cattāro divase kassaci vacanaṃ aggahetvā chinnabhattova nipajji.
atk-s0502a:2396_23: Atha naṃ so sahāyako bhikkhu upasaṅkamitvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2396_25: So tathā chātajjhattopi “sirimā”ti vuttapadeyeva sahasā uṭṭhahitvā “kiṃ bhaṇasī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2396_28: gamissāmī”ti bhattaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattaṃ dhovitvā thavikāya pakkhipitvā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2396_30: bhikkhunisaṅghopi rājaparisāpi upāsakaparisāpi upāsikāparisāpi ekekapasse aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2397_2: jīvakassa bhaginī, sirimā, nāmāti. Sirimā, esāti. Āma, bhanteti.
atk-s0502a:2397_3: Tena hi nagare bheriṃ carāpehi “sahassaṃ datvā sirimaṃ gaṇhantū”ti.
atk-s0502a:2397_5: Ekopi ‘ha’nti vā ‘hu’nti vā vadanto nāma nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:2397_10: Rājā “pañcasatāni datvā gaṇhantū”ti bheriṃ carāpetvā kañci gaṇhanakaṃ adisvā “aḍḍhateyyāni satāni,
atk-s0502a:2397_16: kākaṇikaṃ datvā sirimaṃ gaṇhantū”ti bheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2397_25: imasmiṃyeva nagare sahassaṃ datvā pubbe ekadivasaṃ labhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2400_0: Āturaṃ bahusaṅkappaṃ, yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhitī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2401_2: Bimbanti dīghādiyuttaṭṭhānesu dīghādīhi aṅgapaccaṅgehi saṇṭhitaṃ attabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2401_3: Arukāyanti navannaṃ vaṇamukhānaṃ vasena arubhūtaṃ kāyaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2401_7: Yassa natthi dhuvaṃ ṭhitīti yassa dhuvabhāvo vā ṭhitibhāvo vā natthi,
atk-s0502a:2405_0: Parijiṇṇamidanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uttarātheriṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2406_0: Therī kira vīsavassasatikā jātiyā piṇḍāya caritvā laddhapiṇḍapātā antaravīthiyaṃ ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:2406_1: piṇḍapātena āpucchitvā tassa apaṭikkhipitvā gaṇhantassa sabbaṃ datvā nirāhārā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2406_2: Evaṃ dutiyepi tatiyepi divase tasseva bhikkhuno tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne bhattaṃ datvā nirāhārā ahosi,
atk-s0502a:2406_3: catutthe divase pana piṇḍāya carantī ekasmiṃ sambādhaṭṭhāne satthāraṃ disvā paṭikkamantī olambantaṃ attano
atk-s0502a:2406_4: cīvarakaṇṇaṃ akkamitvā saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontī parivattitvā pati.
atk-s0502a:2406_6: parijiṇṇo te attabhāvo na cirasseva bhijjissatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2410_1: bhagini idaṃ tava sarīrasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ mahallakabhāvena parijiṇṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2410_3: yathā kho pana taruṇopi siṅgālo “jarasiṅgālo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0502a:2410_5: evaṃ tadahujātaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇampi samānaṃ niccaṃ paggharaṇaṭṭhena pūtitāya pabhaṅguraṃ,
atk-s0502a:2410_6: so esa pūtiko samāno tava deho bhijjati,
atk-s0502a:2410_9: Maraṇantañhi jīvitaṃ yasmā sabbasattānaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇapariyosānamevāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a:2411_0: Desanāvasāne sā therī sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2414_0: Yānimānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule adhimānike bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2415_0: Pañcasatā kira bhikkhū satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭentā vāyamantā jhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2415_3: Satthā tesaṃ bahidvārakoṭṭhakaṃ pattakāleyeva ānandattheraṃ āha – “ānanda,
atk-s0502a:2415_4: etesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pavisitvā mayā diṭṭhena kammaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:2415_5: āmakasusānaṃ gantvā tato āgantvā maṃ passantū”ti.
atk-s0502a:2415_7: Te “kiṃ amhākaṃ āmakasusānenā”ti avatvāva “dīghadassinā buddhena kāraṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ bhavissatī”ti āmakasusānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2415_8: gantvā tattha kuṇapāni passantā ekāhadvīhapatitesu kuṇapesu āghātaṃ paṭilabhitvā taṃ khaṇaṃ patitesu
atk-s0502a:2415_11: Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova obhāsaṃ pharitvā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sammukhe kathento viya “nappatirūpaṃ nu kho,
atk-s0502a:2415_13: tumhākaṃ evarūpaṃ aṭṭhisaṅghātaṃ disvā rāgaratiṃ uppādetu”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2418_0: Kāpotakāni aṭṭhīni, tāni disvāna kā ratī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2419_1: Sāradeti saradakāle vātātapapahatāni tattha tattha vippakiṇṇaalābūni viya.
atk-s0502a:2419_3: Tāni disvānāti tāni evarūpāni aṭṭhīni disvā tumhākaṃ kā rati,
atk-s0502a:2419_4: nanu appamattakampi kāmaratiṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a:2420_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū yathāṭhitāva arahattaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ abhitthavamānā āgantvā vandiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:2423_0: Aṭṭhīnaṃ nagaraṃ katanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto janapadakalyāṇiṃ rūpanandātheriṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2424_1: “mayhaṃ jeṭṭhabhātiko rajjasiriṃ pahāya pabbajitvā loke aggapuggalo buddho jāto,
atk-s0502a:2424_5: ahampi ettake ñātijane pabbajite gehe kiṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0502a:2424_10: “Satthā kira ‘rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā…
atk-s0502a:2424_11: viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā’ti vadetī”ti sutvā sā evaṃ dassanīye pāsādike mamapi rūpe dosaṃ katheyyāti satthu sammukhībhāvaṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0502a:2424_12: Sāvatthivāsino pātova dānaṃ datvā samādinnuposathā suddhuttarāsaṅgā gandhamālādihatthā sāyanhasamaye jetavane sannipatitvā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
atk-s0502a:2424_13: Bhikkhunisaṅghopi satthu dhammadesanāya uppannacchando vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0502a:2424_14: Dhammaṃ sutvā nagaraṃ pavisanto satthu guṇakathaṃ kathentova pavisati.
atk-s0502a:2425_0: Catuppamāṇike hi lokasannivāse appakāva te sattā,
atk-s0502a:2425_1: yesaṃ tathāgataṃ passantānaṃ pasādo na uppajjati.
atk-s0502a:2425_2: Rūpappamāṇikāpi hi tathāgatassa lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ disvā pasīdanti,
atk-s0502a:2425_3: ghosappamāṇikāpi anekāni jātisatāni nissāya pavattaṃ satthu guṇaghosañceva aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ dhammadesanāghosañca sutvā pasīdanti,
atk-s0502a:2425_8: bhagavā sīlādīhi guṇehi asamo appaṭipuggalo”ti pasīdanti.
atk-s0502a:2425_9: Tesaṃ tathāgatassa guṇaṃ kathentānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti.
atk-s0502a:2425_10: Rūpanandā bhikkhunīnañceva upāsikānañca santikā tathāgatassa guṇakathaṃ sutvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a:2425_12: Ekadivasampi me rūpe dosaṃ kathento kittakaṃ kathessati.
atk-s0502a:2425_13: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ gantvā attānaṃ adassetvāva tathāgataṃ passitvā dhammamassa suṇitvā āgaccheyya”nti.
atk-s0502a:2425_14: Sā “ahampi ajja dhammassavanaṃ gamissāmī”ti bhikkhunīnaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2426_0: Bhikkhuniyo “cirassaṃ vata rūpanandāya satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ gantukāmatā uppannā,
atk-s0502a:2426_1: ajja satthā imaṃ nissāya vicitradhammadesanaṃ nānānayaṃ desessatī”ti tuṭṭhamānasā taṃ ādāya nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2426_2: Sā nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya “ahaṃ attānaṃ neva dassessāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:2426_4: kīdisī nu kho tassā dhammadesanā sappāyā”ti cintetvā “rūpagarukā esā attabhāve balavasinehā,
atk-s0502a:2426_5: kaṇṭakena kaṇṭakuddharaṇaṃ viya rūpenevassā rūpamadanimmadanaṃ sappāya”nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tassā vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_6: pavisanasamaye ekaṃ pana abhirūpaṃ itthiṃ soḷasavassuddesikaṃ rattavatthanivatthaṃ sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_7: bījaniṃ gahetvā attano santike ṭhatvā bījayamānaṃ iddhibalena abhinimmini.
atk-s0502a:2426_8: Taṃ kho pana itthiṃ satthā ceva passati rūpanandā ca.
atk-s0502a:2426_9: Sā bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ vihāraṃ pavisitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ piṭṭhipasse ṭhatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_10: vanditvā bhikkhunīnaṃ antare nisinnā pādantato paṭṭhāya satthāraṃ olokentī lakkhaṇavicittaṃ anubyañjanasamujjalaṃ
atk-s0502a:2426_11: byāmappabhāparikkhittaṃ satthu sarīraṃ disvā puṇṇacandasassirikaṃ mukhaṃ olokentī samīpe ṭhitaṃ itthirūpaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a:2426_12: Sā taṃ oloketvā attabhāvaṃ olokentī suvaṇṇarājahaṃsiyā purato kākīsadisaṃ attānaṃ avamaññi.
atk-s0502a:2426_13: Iddhimayarūpaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāyeva hi tassā akkhīni bhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2426_15: aho nalāṭaṃ sobhana”nti sabbesaṃ sārīrappadesānaṃ rūpasiriyā samākaḍḍhitacittā tasmiṃ rūpe balavasinehā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2427_0: Satthā tassā tattha abhiratiṃ ñatvā dhammaṃ desentova taṃ rūpaṃ soḷasavassuddesikabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā vīsativassuddesikaṃ katvā dassesi.
atk-s0502a:2427_1: Rūpanandā oloketvā “na vatidaṃ rūpaṃ purimasadisa”nti thokaṃ virattacittā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2427_2: Satthā anukkameneva tassā itthiyā sakiṃ vijātavaṇṇaṃ majjhimitthivaṇṇaṃ jarājiṇṇamahallikitthivaṇṇañca dassesi.
atk-s0502a:2427_4: idampi antarahita”nti jarājiṇṇakāle taṃ virajjamānā khaṇḍadantiṃ palitasiraṃ obhaggaṃ gopānasivaṅkaṃ
atk-s0502a:2427_6: Atha satthā taṃ byādhinā abhibhūtaṃ katvā dassesi.
atk-s0502a:2427_7: Sā taṅkhaṇaññeva daṇḍañca tālavaṇṭañca chaḍḍetvā mahāviravaṃ viravamānā bhūmiyaṃ patitvā sake muttakarīse nimuggā aparāparaṃ parivatti.
atk-s0502a:2427_11: navahi vaṇamukhehi pubbavaṭṭiyo ceva puḷavā ca pagghariṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2427_13: Rūpanandāpi taṃ oloketvā “ayaṃ itthī imasmiṃyeva ṭhāne jaraṃ pattā,
atk-s0502a:2427_16: imassāpi me attabhāvassa evameva jarābyādhimaraṇāni āgamissantī”ti attabhāvaṃ aniccato passi.
atk-s0502a:2427_17: Aniccato diṭṭhattā eva pana dukkhato anattato diṭṭhoyeva hoti.
atk-s0502a:2427_18: Athassā tayo bhavā ādittā gehā viya gīvāya baddhakuṇapaṃ viya ca upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2427_20: Satthā tāya aniccato diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sakkhissati nu kho sayameva attano patiṭṭhaṃ kātu”nti olokento “na sakkhissati,
atk-s0502a:2427_21: bahiddhā paccayaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tassā sappāyavasena dhammaṃ desento āha –
atk-s0502a:2430_0: “Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2431_0: Dhātuto suññato passa, mā lokaṃ punarāgami;
atk-s0502a:2433_0: Itthaṃ sudaṃ bhagavā nandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
atk-s0502a:2433_1: Nandā desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:2433_2: Athassā upari tiṇṇaṃ maggaphalānaṃ vipassanāparivāsatthāya suññatākammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetuṃ, “nande,
atk-s0502a:2433_3: mā ‘imasmiṃ sarīre sāro atthī’ti saññaṃ kari.
atk-s0502a:2433_5: tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni ussāpetvā kataṃ aṭṭhinagarameta”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2436_0: Yattha jarā ca maccu ca, māno makkho ca ohito”ti.
atk-s0502a:2437_1: yatheva hi pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇādīnaṃ odahanatthāya kaṭṭhāni ussāpetvā vallīhi bandhitvā mattikāya vilimpetvā nagarasaṅkhātaṃ bahiddhā gehaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a:2437_2: evamidaṃ ajjhattikampi tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni ussāpetvā nhāruvinaddhaṃ maṃsalohitalepanaṃ tacapaṭicchannaṃ
atk-s0502a:2437_3: jīraṇalakkhaṇāya jarāya maraṇalakkhaṇassa maccuno ārohasampadādīni paṭicca maññanalakkhaṇassa mānassa
atk-s0502a:2437_4: sukatakāraṇavināsanalakkhaṇassa makkhassa ca odahanatthāya nagaraṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0502a:2437_5: Evarūpo eva hi ettha kāyikacetasiko ābādho ohito,
atk-s0502a:2438_0: Desanāvasāne sā therī arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2441_0: Jīranti veti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mallikaṃ deviṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2442_0: Sā kira ekadivasaṃ nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ paviṭṭhā mukhaṃ dhovitvā onatasarīrā jaṅghaṃ dhovituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:2442_1: Tāya ca saddhiṃyeva paviṭṭho eko vallabhasunakho atthi.
atk-s0502a:2442_2: So taṃ tathā onataṃ disvā asaddhammasanthavaṃ kātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:2442_4: Rājāpi uparipāsāde vātapānena olokento taṃ disvā tato āgatakāle “nassa, vasali,
atk-s0502a:2442_12: yo koci imaṃ koṭṭhakaṃ paviṭṭho iminā vātapānena olokentassa ekova dvidhā paññāyatī”ti abhūtaṃ kathesi. Deva,
atk-s0502a:2442_16: Rājā mūḷhadhātuko tassā vacanaṃ saddahitvā koṭṭhakaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:2442_17: Sāpi kho devī vātapāne ṭhatvā olokentī “andhabāla, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:2442_19: ajikāya saddhiṃ santhavaṃ karosī”ti āha. “Nāhaṃ, bhadde,
atk-s0502a:2442_20: evarūpaṃ karomī”ti ca vuttepi “mayā sāmaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2443_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā “addhā imaṃ koṭṭhakaṃ paviṭṭho ekova dvidhā paññāyatī”ti saddahi.
atk-s0502a:2443_7: aho vata me bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ kata”nti.
atk-s0502a:2443_8: Ayaṃ kira rañño asadisadāne sahāyikā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2443_9: Tattha ca ekadivasaṃ katapariccāgo dhanassa cuddasakoṭiagghanako ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2443_10: Tathāgatassa setacchattaṃ nisīdanapallaṅko ādhārako pādapīṭhanti imāni pana cattāri anagghāneva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2443_11: Sā maraṇakāle evarūpaṃ mahāpariccāgaṃ nānussaritvā tadeva pāpakammaṃ anussarantī kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:2443_12: Rañño pana sā ativiya piyā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2443_13: So balavasokābhibhūto tassā sarīrakiccaṃ kāretvā “nibbattaṭṭhānamassā pucchissāmī”ti satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2443_14: Satthā yathā so āgatakāraṇaṃ na sarati,
atk-s0502a:2443_16: So satthu santike sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ sutvā gehaṃ paviṭṭhakāle saritvā “ahaṃ bhaṇe mallikāya nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2443_19: Satthāpi paṭipāṭiyā satta divasāni yathā so na sarati,
atk-s0502a:2443_21: Sāpi sattāhameva niraye paccitvā aṭṭhame divase tato cutā tusitabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:2443_23: Sā kira tassa ativiya piyā ahosi manāpā,
atk-s0502a:2443_24: tasmā tassā niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ sutvā “sace evarūpā saddhāsampannā niraye nibbattā,
atk-s0502a:2443_25: dānaṃ datvā kiṃ karissāmī”ti micchādiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ gehe pavattaṃ niccabhattaṃ harāpetvā niraye nibbatteyya,
atk-s0502a:2443_26: tenassa satthā sattāhaṃ asaraṇabhāvaṃ katvā aṭṭhame divase piṇḍāya caranto sayameva rājakuladvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2444_0: Rājā “satthā āgato”ti sutvā nikkhamitvā pattaṃ ādāya pāsādaṃ abhiruhituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:2444_1: Satthā pana rathasālāya nisīdituṃ ākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:2444_2: Rājā satthāraṃ tattheva nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakena paṭimānetvā vanditvā nisinnova ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2444_3: mallikāya deviyā nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ pucchissāmīti gantvā pamuṭṭho,
atk-s0502a:2444_8: tāya tusitabhavane anibbattantiyā ko añño nibbattissati, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2444_10: Tassā hi nisinnaṭṭhānādīsu “sve tathāgatassa idaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0502a:2444_11: idaṃ karissāmī”ti dānasaṃvidhānaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kiccameva natthi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2444_12: tassā paralokaṃ gatakālato paṭṭhāya sarīraṃ me na vahatīti.
atk-s0502a:2444_16: Taṃ sutvā rājā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā “pitāmahassa me,
atk-s0502a:2444_24: tava pitāmahassa ratho tenevākārena tava pitu rathaṃ na pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a:2444_25: tava pitu ratho tava rathaṃ na pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a:2444_29: sattā pana ajīrakā nāma natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2450_1: Sucittāti sattahi ratanehi aparehi ca rathālaṅkārehi suṭṭhu cittitā rājūnaṃ rathāpi jīranti.
atk-s0502a:2450_3: idaṃ suppaṭijaggitaṃ sarīrampi khaṇḍiccādīni pāpuṇantaṃ jaraṃ upeti.
atk-s0502a:2450_4: Satañcāti buddhādīnaṃ pana santānaṃ navavidho lokuttaradhammo ca kiñci upaghātaṃ na upetīti na jaraṃ upeti nāma.
atk-s0502a:2450_5: Pavedayantīti evaṃ santo buddhādayo sabbhi paṇḍitehi saddhiṃ kathentīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2454_0: Appassutāyanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lāḷudāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2455_0: So kira maṅgalaṃ karontānaṃ gehaṃ gantvā “tirokuṭṭesu tiṭṭhantī”tiādinā nayena avamaṅgalaṃ katheti,
atk-s0502a:2455_1: avamaṅgalaṃ karontānaṃ gehaṃ gantvā tirokuṭṭādīsu kathetabbesu “dānañca dhammacariyā cā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0502a:2455_2: maṅgalagāthā vā “yaṃ kiñci vittaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā”ti ratanasuttaṃ vā katheti.
atk-s0502a:2455_3: Evaṃ tesu tesu ṭhānesu “aññaṃ kathessāmī”ti aññaṃ kathentopi “aññaṃ kathemī”ti na jānāti.
atk-s0502a:2455_4: Bhikkhū tassa kathaṃ sutvā satthu ārocesuṃ – “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2455_10: pubbepi aññasmiṃ kathetabbe aññameva kathesī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:2456_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ aggidattassa nāma brāhmaṇassa putto somadattakumāro nāma rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:2456_7: rājānaṃ me yācitvā ekaṃ goṇaṃ āharā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2456_15: So taṃ ādāya bīraṇatthambhakaṃ nāma susānaṃ gantvā tiṇakalāpe bandhitvā “ayaṃ rājā,
atk-s0502a:2456_17: ayaṃ senāpatī”ti nāmāni katvā paṭipāṭiyā pitu dassetvā “tumhehi rājakulaṃ gantvā evaṃ abhikkamitabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2456_22: mahārājā’ti vatvā evaṃ ṭhatvā imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā goṇaṃ yāceyyāthā”ti gāthaṃ uggaṇhāpesi –
atk-s0502a:2457_0: “Dve me goṇā mahārāja, yehi khettaṃ kasāmase;
atk-s0502a:2458_0: Tesu eko mato deva, dutiyaṃ dehi khattiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2459_0: So hi saṃvaccharamattena taṃ gāthaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā paguṇabhāvaṃ puttassa ārocetvā “tena hi, tāta,
atk-s0502a:2459_2: ahaṃ purimataraṃ gantvā rañño santike ṭhassāmī”ti vutte “sādhu,
atk-s0502a:2459_3: tātā”ti paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā somadattassa rañño santike ṭhitakāle ussāhappatto rājakulaṃ gantvā raññā tuṭṭhacittena katapaṭisammodano, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:2460_0: “Dve me goṇā mahārāja, yehi khettaṃ kasāmase;
atk-s0502a:2461_0: Tesu eko mato deva, dutiyaṃ gaṇha khattiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2462_1: puna vadehī”ti vuttepi tameva gāthaṃ āha.
atk-s0502a:2462_2: Rājā tena virajjhitvā kathitabhāvaṃ ñatvā sitaṃ katvā,
atk-s0502a:2462_4: tumhākaṃ gehe bahū maññe goṇā”ti vatvā “tumhehi dinnā bahū bhavissanti,
atk-s0502a:2462_5: devā”ti vutte bodhisattassa tussitvā brāhmaṇassa soḷasa goṇe alaṅkārabhaṇḍakaṃ nivāsagāmañcassa brahmadeyyaṃ
atk-s0502a:2463_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “tadā rājā ānando ahosi,
atk-s0502a:2463_4: pubbepesa attano appassutatāya aññasmiṃ vattabbe aññameva vadati.
atk-s0502a:2463_5: Appassutapuriso hi balibaddasadiso nāma hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2466_0: Maṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhanti, paññā tassa na vaḍḍhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2467_0: Tattha appassutāyanti ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā paṇṇāsakānaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2467_1: Atha vā pana vaggānaṃ sabbantimena paricchedena ekassa vā dvinnaṃ vā suttantānaṃ vāpi abhāvena appassuto ayaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2467_3: Balibaddova jīratīti yathā hi balibaddo jīramāno vaḍḍhamāno neva mātu, na pitu,
atk-s0502a:2467_11: maṃsāni tassa vaḍḍhantīti yathā balibaddassa “yuganaṅgalādīni vahituṃ asamattho eso”ti araññe vissaṭṭhassa
atk-s0502a:2467_12: tattheva vicarantassa khādantassa pivantassa maṃsāni vaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0502a:2467_13: evameva imassāpi upajjhāyādīhi vissaṭṭhassa saṅghaṃ nissāya cattāro paccaye labhitvā uddhavirecanādīni katvā kāyaṃ posentassa maṃsāni vaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0502a:2467_15: Paññā tassāti lokiyalokuttarā panassa paññā ekaṅgulamattāpi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a:2467_16: araññe pana gacchalatādīni viya cha dvārāni nissāya taṇhā ceva navavidhamāno ca vaḍḍhatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2471_0: Anekajātisaṃsāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bodhirukkhamūle nisinno udānavasena udānetvā aparabhāge ānandattherena puṭṭho kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2472_0: So hi bodhirukkhamūle nisinno sūriye anatthaṅgateyeva mārabalaṃ viddhaṃsetvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsapaṭicchādakaṃ
atk-s0502a:2472_1: tamaṃ padāletvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca paccayākāre
atk-s0502a:2472_2: ñāṇaṃ otāretvā taṃ anulomapaṭilomavasena sammasanto aruṇuggamanavelāya sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā
atk-s0502a:2472_3: anekehi buddhasatasahassehi avijahitaṃ udānaṃ udānento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2478_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0502a:2480_0: Tattha gahakāraṃ gavesantoti ahaṃ imassa attabhāvasaṅkhātassa gehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena ñāṇena sakkā taṃ daṭṭhuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2480_1: tassa bodhiñāṇassatthāya dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhāro ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisaṃsāraṃ anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0502a:2480_2: imaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ anibbisaṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ avindanto alabhantoyeva sandhāvissaṃ saṃsariṃ,
atk-s0502a:2480_4: Dukkhā jāti punappunanti idaṃ gahakārakagavesanassa kāraṇavacanaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2480_5: Yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissitāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā,
atk-s0502a:2480_6: na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati.
atk-s0502a:2480_8: Diṭṭhosīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantena mayā idāni diṭṭhosi.
atk-s0502a:2480_9: Puna gehanti puna imasmiṃ saṃsāravaṭṭe attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ na kāhasi.
atk-s0502a:2480_10: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggāti tava sabbā avasesā kilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā.
atk-s0502a:2480_11: Gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhatanti imassa tayā katassa attabhāvagehassa avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ kaṇṇikamaṇḍalampi mayā viddhaṃsitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2480_12: Visaṅkhāragataṃ cittanti idāni mama cittaṃ visaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gataṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2480_13: Taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagāti taṇhānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ adhigatosmīti.
atk-s0502a:2483_0: Acaritvāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā isipatane migadāye viharanto mahādhanaseṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2484_0: So kira bārāṇasiyaṃ asītikoṭivibhave kule nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:2484_3: puttassa no hatthe ṭhapetvā yathāsukhaṃ paribhogaṃ karissāma,
atk-s0502a:2484_6: Tasmiṃyeva nagare aññasmiṃ asītikoṭivibhave kule ekā dhītāpi nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:2484_7: Tassāpi mātāpitaro tatheva cintetvā taṃ naccagītavāditamattameva sikkhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2484_11: Seṭṭhiputto divasassa tikkhattuṃ rañño upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0502a:2484_16: Te suraṃ ādāya khajjakamaṃse ceva loṇasakkharā ca dussante bandhitvā mūlakande gahetvā tassa rājakulato
atk-s0502a:2484_17: āgacchantassa maggaṃ olokayamānā nisīditvā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā suraṃ pivitvā loṇasakkharaṃ mukhe khipitvā
atk-s0502a:2484_20: taṃ nissāya mayaṃ khādanapivanasamatthā bhaveyyāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2484_21: So tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā pacchato āgacchantaṃ cūḷūpaṭṭhākaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a:2484_25: imasmiṃ jīvaloke iminā sadisaṃ pātabbayuttakaṃ nāma natthīti.
atk-s0502a:2484_26: So “evaṃ sante mayāpi pātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti thokaṃ thokaṃ āharāpetvā pivati.
atk-s0502a:2484_27: Athassa nacirasseva te dhuttā pivanabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2484_29: So satenapi satadvayenapi suraṃ āharāpetvā pivanto iminā anukkameneva nisinnaṭṭhānādīsu kahāpaṇarāsiṃ ṭhapetvā suraṃ pivanto “iminā mālā āharatha,
atk-s0502a:2484_36: imassa dve sahassānī”ti evaṃ vikiranto nacirasseva attano santakaṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ khepetvā “khīṇaṃ te, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2484_37: dhana”nti vutte kiṃ bhariyāya me santakaṃ natthīti. Atthi, sāmīti.
atk-s0502a:2484_39: Tampi tatheva khepetvā anupubbena khettaārāmuyyānayoggādikampi antamaso bhājanabhaṇḍakampi attharaṇapāvuraṇanisīdanampi
atk-s0502a:2484_41: Atha naṃ mahallakakāle yehissa kulasantakaṃ gehaṃ vikkiṇitvā gahitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2484_43: So bhariyaṃ ādāya parajanassa gehabhittiṃ nissāya vasanto kapālakhaṇḍaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya caritvā janassa ucchiṭṭhakaṃ bhuñjituṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:2485_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ āsanasālāya dvāre ṭhatvā daharasāmaṇerehi diyyamānaṃ ucchiṭṭhakabhojanaṃ paṭiggaṇhantaṃ disvā satthā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0502a:2485_3: imaṃ mahādhanaseṭṭhiputtaṃ imasmiṃ nagare dveasītikoṭidhanaṃ khepetvā bhariyaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya carantaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2485_4: Sace hi ayaṃ paṭhamavaye bhoge akhepetvā kammante payojayissa,
atk-s0502a:2485_9: Sace majjhimavaye bhoge akhepetvā kammante payojayissa,
atk-s0502a:2485_13: Sace pacchimavaye bhoge akhepetvā kammante payojayissa,
atk-s0502a:2485_18: Parihāyitvā ca pana sukkhapallale koñcasakuṇo viya jāto”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2492_1: Yobbaneti anuppanne vā bhoge uppādetuṃ uppanne vā bhoge rakkhituṃ samatthakāle dhanampi alabhitvā.
atk-s0502a:2492_2: Khīṇamaccheti te evarūpā bālā udakassa abhāvā khīṇamacche pallale parikkhīṇapattā jiṇṇakoñcā viya avajhāyanti.
atk-s0502a:2492_4: pallale udakassa abhāvo viya hi imesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānassa abhāvo,
atk-s0502a:2492_5: macchānaṃ khīṇabhāvo viya imesaṃ bhogānaṃ abhāvo,
atk-s0502a:2492_6: khīṇapattānaṃ koñcānaṃ uppatitvā gamanābhāvo viya imesaṃ idāni jalathalapathādīhi bhoge saṇṭhāpetuṃ asamatthabhāvo.
atk-s0502a:2492_7: Tasmā te khīṇapattā koñcā viya ettheva bajjhitvā avajhāyantīti.
atk-s0502a:2492_11: yathā cāpā vinimuttā sarā yathāvegaṃ gantvā patitā,
atk-s0502a:2492_12: taṃ gahetvā ukkhipante asati tattheva upacikānaṃ bhattaṃ honti,
atk-s0502a:2492_13: evaṃ imepi tayo vaye atikkantā idāni attānaṃ uddharituṃ asamatthatāya maraṇaṃ upagamissanti.
atk-s0502a:2492_16: Purāṇāni anutthunanti “iti amhehi khāditaṃ iti pīta”nti pubbe katāni khāditapivitanaccagītavāditādīni anutthunantā socantā anusocantā sentīti.
atk-s0502a:2499_0: Attānañceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bhesakaḷāvane viharanto bodhirājakumāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2500_0: So kira pathavītale aññehi pāsādehi asadisarūpaṃ ākāse uppatamānaṃ viya kokanudaṃ nāma pāsādaṃ kāretvā vaḍḍhakiṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a:2500_7: Imaṃ mayā māretuṃ vā hatthapāde vāssa chindituṃ akkhīni vā uppāṭetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:2500_9: So tamatthaṃ attano piyasahāyakassa sañjīvakaputtassa nāma māṇavakassa kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2500_15: So taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “pāsāde te kammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2500_16: no”ti pucchitvā “niṭṭhita”nti vutte “rājakumāro taṃ nāsetukāmo attānaṃ rakkheyyāsī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2500_20: amhākaṃ pāsāde kammaṃ niṭṭhita”nti rājakumārena puṭṭho “na tāva, deva,
atk-s0502a:2500_23: Kiṃ kammaṃ nāma avasiṭṭhanti? Pacchā, deva,
atk-s0502a:2500_30: te ito paṭṭhāya mama santikaṃ nāgantabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2500_32: Sukhumakammaṃ karontassa hi aññehi saddhiṃ sallapantassa me kammavikkhepo hoti,
atk-s0502a:2500_33: āhāravelāyaṃ pana me bhariyāva āhāraṃ āharissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2500_35: Sopi ekasmiṃ gabbhe nisīditvā tāni dārūni tacchetvā attano puttadārassa anto nisīdanayoggaṃ garuḷasakuṇaṃ katvā āhāravelāya pana bhariyaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:2500_37: Rājakumāropi vaḍḍhakissa anikkhamanatthāya gehaṃ parikkhipitvā ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:2500_38: Vaḍḍhakīpi sakuṇassa niṭṭhitakāle “ajja sabbepi dārake gahetvā āgaccheyyāsī”ti bhariyaṃ vatvā bhuttapātarāso
atk-s0502a:2500_39: puttadāraṃ sakuṇassa kucchiyaṃ nisīdāpetvā vātapānena nikkhamitvā palāyi. So tesaṃ, “deva,
atk-s0502a:2500_40: vaḍḍhakī palāyatī”ti kandantānaṃyeva gantvā himavante otaritvā ekaṃ nagaraṃ māpetvā kaṭṭhavāhanarājā nāma jāto.
atk-s0502a:2501_0: Rājakumāropi “pāsādamahaṃ karissāmī”ti satthāraṃ nimantetvā pāsāde catujjātiyagandhehi paribhaṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2501_3: tasmā “sacāhaṃ puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā lacchāmi,
atk-s0502a:2501_5: So satthari āgate satthāraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pattaṃ gahetvā “pavisatha,
atk-s0502a:2501_10: Thero olokitasaññāyeva vatthānaṃ anakkamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ “saṃharatu,
atk-s0502a:2501_14: So dussāni saṃharitvā satthāraṃ antonivesanaṃ pavesatvā yāgukhajjakena sammānetvā ekamantaṃ nisinno vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2501_15: ahaṃ tumhākaṃ upakārako tikkhattuṃ saraṇaṃ gato,
atk-s0502a:2501_16: kucchigato ca kiramhi ekavāraṃ saraṇaṃ gato,
atk-s0502a:2501_19: Tassa me kasmā celapaṭikaṃ na akkamitthā”ti?
atk-s0502a:2501_23: satthā me celapaṭikaṃ akkamissatī”ti idaṃ cintetvā, bhanteti.
atk-s0502a:2501_26: puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā neva lacchāmī”ti? “Āma,
atk-s0502a:2502_0: Atīte kira anekasatā manussā mahatiyā nāvāya samuddaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2502_2: Dve jayampatikā ekaṃ phalakaṃ gahetvā antaradīpakaṃ pavisiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2502_4: Tasmiṃ kho pana dīpake mahāsakuṇasaṅgho vasati.
atk-s0502a:2502_5: Te aññaṃ khāditabbakaṃ adisvā chātajjhattā sakuṇaaṇḍāni aṅgāresu pacitvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2503_0: Satthā idaṃ tassa pubbakammaṃ dassetvā “sace hi tvaṃ, kumāra,
atk-s0502a:2503_1: tadā ekasmimpi vaye bhariyāya saddhiṃ appamādaṃ āpajjissa,
atk-s0502a:2503_2: ekasmimpi vaye putto vā dhītā vā uppajjeyya.
atk-s0502a:2503_3: Sace pana vo ekopi appamatto abhavissa,
atk-s0502a:2503_4: taṃ paṭicca putto vā dhītā vā uppajjissa. Kumāra,
atk-s0502a:2503_5: attānañhi piyaṃ maññamānena tīsupi vayesu appamattena attā rakkhitabbo,
atk-s0502a:2503_6: evaṃ asakkontena ekavayepi rakkhitabboyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2507_0: Tattha yāmanti satthā attano dhammissaratāya desanākusalatāya ca idha tiṇṇaṃ vayānaṃ aññataraṃ vayaṃ yāmanti katvā desesi,
atk-s0502a:2507_3: rakkheyya naṃ surakkhitanti yathā so surakkhito hoti,
atk-s0502a:2507_5: Tattha sace gīhī samāno “attānaṃ rakkhissāmī”ti uparipāsādatale susaṃvutaṃ gabbhaṃ pavisitvā sampannārakkho hutvā vasantopi,
atk-s0502a:2507_6: pabbajito hutvā susaṃvute pihitadvāravātapāne leṇe viharantopi attānaṃ na rakkhatiyeva.
atk-s0502a:2507_7: Gihī pana samāno yathābalaṃ dānasīlādīni puññāni karonto,
atk-s0502a:2507_8: pabbajito vā pana vattapaṭivattapariyattimanasikāresu ussukkaṃ āpajjanto attānaṃ rakkhati nāma.
atk-s0502a:2507_9: Evaṃ tīsu vayesu asakkonto aññatarasmimpi vaye paṇḍitapuriso attānaṃ paṭijaggatiyeva.
atk-s0502a:2507_10: Sace hi gihibhūto paṭhamavaye khiḍḍāpasutatāya kusalaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:2507_12: Sace majjhimavaye puttadāraṃ posento kusalaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:2507_15: Evaṃ akarontassa pana attā piyo nāma na hoti,
atk-s0502a:2507_17: Sace pana pabbajito paṭhamavaye sajjhāyaṃ karonto dhārento vācento vattapaṭivattaṃ karonto pamādaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0502a:2507_19: Sace paṭhamavaye uggahitapariyattiyā aṭṭhakathaṃ vinicchayaṃ kāraṇākāraṇañca pucchanto majjhimavaye pamādaṃ āpajjati,
atk-s0502a:2507_22: Evaṃ akarontassa pana attā piyo nāma na hoti,
atk-s0502a:2511_0: Attānameva paṭhamanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto upanandaṃ sakyaputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2512_0: So kira thero dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ cheko.
atk-s0502a:2512_1: Tassa appicchatādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā bahū bhikkhu taṃ ticīvarehi pūjetvā dhutaṅgāni samādiyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2512_3: So ekasmiṃ antovasse upakaṭṭhe janapadaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2512_4: Atha naṃ ekasmiṃ vihāre daharasāmaṇerā dhammakathikapemena, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2512_6: “Idha kittakaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ labbhatī”ti pucchitvā tehi “ekeko sāṭako”ti vutte tattha upāhanā ṭhapetvā aññaṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2512_7: Dutiyaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā “idha kiṃ labbhatī”ti pucchitvā “dve sāṭakā”ti vutte kattarayaṭṭhiṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:2512_8: Tatiyaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā “idha kiṃ labbhatī”ti pucchitvā “tayo sāṭakā”ti vutte tattha udakatumbaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:2512_9: Catutthaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā “idha kiṃ labbhatī”ti pucchitvā “cattāro sāṭakā”ti vutte “sādhu idha vasissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:2512_10: tattha vassaṃ upagantvā gahaṭṭhānañceva bhikkhūnañca dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2512_11: Te naṃ bahūhi vatthehi ceva cīvarehi ca pūjesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2512_12: So vuṭṭhavasso itaresupi vihāresu sāsanaṃ pesetvā “mayā parikkhārassa ṭhapitattā vassāvāsikaṃ laddhabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2512_13: taṃ me pahiṇantū”ti sabbaṃ āharāpetvā yānakaṃ pūretvā pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:2513_0: Athekasmiṃ vihāre dve daharabhikkhū dve sāṭake ekañca kambalaṃ labhitvā “tuyhaṃ sāṭakā hontu,
atk-s0502a:2513_1: mayhaṃ kambalo”ti bhājetuṃ asakkontā maggasamīpe nisīditvā vivadanti.
atk-s0502a:2513_7: Tena hi mama vacane ṭhassathāti. Āma,
atk-s0502a:2513_9: “Tena hi sādhū”ti tesaṃ dve sāṭake datvā “ayaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathentānaṃ amhākaṃ pārupanāraho”ti mahagghaṃ kambalaṃ ādāya pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:2513_10: Daharabhikkhū vippaṭisārino hutvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2513_13: idāneva tumhākaṃ santakaṃ gahetvā tumhe vippaṭisārino karoti,
atk-s0502a:2514_0: Atītasmiṃ anutīracārī ca gambhīracārī cāti dve uddā mahantaṃ rohitamacchaṃ labhitvā “mayhaṃ sīsaṃ hotu,
atk-s0502a:2514_1: tava naṅguṭṭha”nti vivādāpannā bhājetuṃ asakkontā ekaṃ siṅgālaṃ disvā āhaṃsu – “mātula,
atk-s0502a:2514_9: “Tena hi sādhū”ti so sīsaṃ chinditvā ekamante akāsi,
atk-s0502a:2514_16: Ayaṃ pana majjhimo khaṇḍo mama vinicchayadhamme ṭhitassa bhavissatī”ti te saññāpento –
atk-s0502a:2517_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā majjhimakhaṇḍaṃ ādāya pakkāmi. Tepi vippaṭisārino taṃ oloketvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2518_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ dassetvā “evamesa atītepi tumhe vippaṭisārino akāsiyevā”ti te bhikkhū saññāpetvā upanandaṃ garahanto,
atk-s0502a:2518_2: paraṃ ovadantena nāma paṭhamameva attā patirūpe patiṭṭhāpetabbo”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2522_0: Tattha patirūpe nivesayeti anucchavike guṇe patiṭṭhāpeyya.
atk-s0502a:2522_2: yo appicchatādiguṇehi vā ariyavaṃsapaṭipadādīhi vā paraṃ anusāsitukāmo,
atk-s0502a:2522_3: so attānameva paṭhamaṃ tasmiṃ guṇe patiṭṭhāpeyya.
atk-s0502a:2522_4: Evaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā athaññaṃ tehi guṇehi anusāseyya.
atk-s0502a:2522_5: Attānañhi tattha anivesetvā kevalaṃ parameva anusāsamāno parato nindaṃ labhitvā kilissati nāma,
atk-s0502a:2522_6: tattha attānaṃ nivesetvā anusāsamāno parato pasaṃsaṃ labhati,
atk-s0502a:2523_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2526_0: Attānañceti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto padhānikatissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2527_0: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā pañcasate bhikkhū ādāya araññe vassaṃ upagantvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2527_1: dharamānakassa buddhassa santike vo kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2527_2: appamattāva samaṇadhammaṃ karothā”ti ovaditvā sayaṃ gantvā nipajjitvā supati.
atk-s0502a:2527_3: Te bhikkhū paṭhamayāme caṅkamitvā majjhimayāme vihāraṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0502a:2527_4: So niddāyitvā pabuddhakāle tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ tumhe ‘nipajjitvā niddāyissāmā’ti āgatā,
atk-s0502a:2527_5: sīghaṃ nikkhamitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karothā”ti vatvā sayaṃ gantvā tatheva supati.
atk-s0502a:2527_6: Itare majjhimayāme bahi caṅkamitvā pacchimayāme vihāraṃ pavisanti.
atk-s0502a:2527_7: So punapi pabujjhitvā tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā te vihārā nīharitvā sayaṃ puna gantvā tatheva supati.
atk-s0502a:2527_8: Tasmiṃ niccakālaṃ evaṃ karonte te bhikkhū sajjhāyaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā manasikātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2527_11: pariggaṇhissāma na”nti pariggaṇhantā tassa kiriyaṃ disvā “naṭṭhamhā, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2527_13: Tesaṃ ativiya niddāya kilamantānaṃ ekabhikkhupi visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:2527_14: Te vuṭṭhavassā satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthārā katapaṭisanthārā “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:2527_16: appamattā hutvā samaṇadhammaṃ karitthā”ti pucchitā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2527_19: pubbepesa tumhākaṃ antarāyamakāsiyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito –
atk-s0502a:2529_0: Nāyaṃ kālaṃ akālaṃ vā, abhijānāti kukkuṭo”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2530_1: “Tadā hi so kukkuṭo ayaṃ padhānikatissatthero ahosi,
atk-s0502a:2530_2: ime pañca satā bhikkhū te māṇavā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:2530_3: disāpāmokkho ācariyo ahamevā”ti satthā imaṃ jātakaṃ vitthāretvā,
atk-s0502a:2530_5: paraṃ ovadantena nāma attā sudanto kātabbo.
atk-s0502a:2530_6: Evaṃ ovadanto hi sudanto hutvā dameti nāmā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2533_0: Sudanto vata dametha, attā hi kira duddamo”ti.
atk-s0502a:2534_1: yo hi bhikkhu “paṭhamayāmādīsu caṅkamitabba”nti vatvā paraṃ ovadati,
atk-s0502a:2534_2: sayaṃ caṅkamanādīni adhiṭṭhahanto attānañce tathā kayirā,
atk-s0502a:2534_4: evaṃ sante sudanto vata damethāti yena guṇena paraṃ anusāsati,
atk-s0502a:2534_6: Attā hi kira duddamoti ayañhi attā nāma duddamo.
atk-s0502a:2535_0: Desanāvasāne pañca satāpi te bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:2538_0: Attā hi attano nāthoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kumārakassapattherassa mātaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2539_0: Sā kira rājagahanagare seṭṭhidhītā viññutaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a:2539_1: Atha sā punappunaṃ yācamānāpi mātāpitūnaṃ santikā pabbajjaṃ alabhitvā vayappattā patikulaṃ gantvā patidevatā hutvā agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0502a:2539_2: Athassā na cirasseva kucchismiṃ gabbho patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:2539_3: Sā gabbhassa patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ ajānitvāva sāmikaṃ ārādhetvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a:2539_4: Atha naṃ so mahantena sakkārena bhikkhunupassayaṃ netvā ajānanto devadattapakkhikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ santike pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:2539_5: Aparena samayena bhikkhuniyo tassā gabbhinibhāvaṃ ñatvā tāhi “kiṃ ida”nti vuttā nāhaṃ, ayye,
atk-s0502a:2539_8: Bhikkhuniyo taṃ devadattassa santikaṃ netvā “ayaṃ bhikkhunī saddhāpabbajitā,
atk-s0502a:2539_12: Devadatto “mā mayhaṃ ovādakārikānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ ayaso uppajjatū”ti ettakameva cintetvā “uppabbājetha na”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:2539_13: Taṃ sutvā sā daharā mā maṃ, ayye, nāsetha,
atk-s0502a:2539_16: Tā taṃ ādāya jetavanaṃ gantvā satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2539_17: Satthā “tassā gihikāle gabbho patiṭṭhito”ti jānantopi paravādamocanatthaṃ rājānaṃ pasenadikosalaṃ mahāanāthapiṇḍikaṃ
atk-s0502a:2539_18: cūḷaanāthapiṇḍikaṃ visākhāupāsikaṃ aññāni ca mahākulāni pakkosāpetvā upālittheraṃ āṇāpesi – “gaccha,
atk-s0502a:2539_19: imissā daharāya bhikkhuniyā catuparisamajjhe kammaṃ parisodhehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2539_20: Thero rañño purato visākhaṃ pakkosāpetvā taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ paṭicchāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2539_21: Sā sāṇipākāraṃ parikkhipāpetvā antosāṇiyaṃ tassā hatthapādanābhiudarapariyosānāni oloketvā māsadivase
atk-s0502a:2539_22: samānetvā “gihibhāve imāya gabbho laddho”ti ñatvā therassa tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2539_24: Sā aparena samayena padumuttarabuddhassa pādamūle patthitapatthanaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0502a:2540_0: Athekadivasaṃ rājā bhikkhunupassayasamīpena gacchanto dārakasaddaṃ sutvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchitvā, “deva,
atk-s0502a:2540_2: tassesa saddo”ti vutte taṃ kumāraṃ attano gharaṃ netvā dhātīnaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:2540_3: Nāmaggahaṇadivase cassa kassapoti nāmaṃ katvā kumāraparihārena vaḍḍhitattā kumārakassapoti sañjāniṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2540_4: So kīḷāmaṇḍale dārake paharitvā “nimmātāpitikenamhā pahaṭā”ti vutte rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “deva,
atk-s0502a:2540_6: mātaraṃ me ācikkhathā”ti pucchitvā raññā dhātiyo dassetvā “imā te mātaro”ti vutte “na ettikā me mātaro,
atk-s0502a:2540_9: Rājā “na sakkā imaṃ vañcetu”nti cintetvā, tāta,
atk-s0502a:2540_15: tātā”ti taṃ mahantena sakkārena satthu santike pabbājesi.
atk-s0502a:2540_17: So satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā vāyamitvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto “puna
atk-s0502a:2540_18: kammaṭṭhānaṃ visesetvā gahessāmī”ti satthu santikaṃ gantvā andhavane vihāsi.
atk-s0502a:2541_0: Atha naṃ kassapabuddhakāle ekato samaṇadhammaṃ katvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā brahmaloke nibbattabhikkhu brahmalokato
atk-s0502a:2541_1: āgantvā pannarasa pañhe pucchitvā “ime pañhe ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ añño byākātuṃ samattho nāma natthi, gaccha,
atk-s0502a:2541_2: satthu santike imesaṃ atthaṃ uggaṇhā”ti uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:2541_3: So tathā katvā pañhavissajjanāvasāne arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:2541_4: Tassa pana nikkhantadivasato paṭṭhāya dvādasa vassāni mātubhikkhuniyā akkhīhi assūni pavattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2541_5: Sā puttaviyogadukkhitā assutinteneva mukhena bhikkhāya caramānā antaravīthiyaṃ theraṃ disvāva, “putta,
atk-s0502a:2541_6: puttā”ti viravantī taṃ gaṇhituṃ upadhāvamānā parivattitvā pati.
atk-s0502a:2541_7: Sā thanehi khīraṃ muñcantehi uṭṭhahitvā allacīvarā gantvā theraṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:2541_15: Sā “aho kakkhaḷā therassa kathā”ti cintetvā “kiṃ vadesi,
atk-s0502a:2541_16: tātā”ti vatvā punapi tena tatheva vuttā cintesi –
atk-s0502a:2541_17: “ahaṃ imassa kāraṇā dvādasa vassāni assūni sandhāretuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0502a:2541_19: kiṃ me iminā”ti puttasinehaṃ chinditvā taṃdivasameva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:2542_1: devadattena evaṃ upanissayasampanno kumārakassapo ca therī ca nāsitā,
atk-s0502a:2542_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:2542_8: idāneva ahaṃ imesaṃ paccayo patiṭṭhā jāto,
atk-s0502a:2542_9: pubbepi nesaṃ ahaṃ patiṭṭhā ahosiṃyevā”ti vatvā –
atk-s0502a:2544_0: Nigrodhasmiṃ mataṃ seyyo, yañce sākhasmi jīvita”nti. –
atk-s0502a:2545_0: Imaṃ nigrodhajātakaṃ vitthārena kathetvā “tadā sākhamigo devadatto ahosi,
atk-s0502a:2545_4: gabbhinīmigiyā jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā gato nigrodhamigarājā pana ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānetvā puttasinehaṃ
atk-s0502a:2545_5: chinditvā theriyā attanāva attano patiṭṭhānakatabhāvaṃ pakāsento,
atk-s0502a:2545_7: yasmā parassa attani ṭhitena saggaparāyaṇena vā maggaparāyaṇena vā bhavituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0502a:2545_9: paro kiṃ karissatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2547_0: “Attā hi attano nātho, ko hi nātho paro siyā;
atk-s0502a:2548_0: Attanā hi sudantena, nāthaṃ labhati dullabha”nti.
atk-s0502a:2549_2: yasmā attani ṭhitena attasampannena kusalaṃ katvā saggaṃ vā pāpuṇituṃ,
atk-s0502a:2549_5: Tasmā hi attāva attano patiṭṭhā hoti,
atk-s0502a:2549_6: paro ko nāma kassa patiṭṭhā siyā.
atk-s0502a:2549_7: Attanā eva hi sudantena nibbisevanena arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ dullabhaṃ nāthaṃ labhati.
atk-s0502a:2549_8: Arahattañhi sandhāya idha “nāthaṃ labhati dullabha”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2553_0: Attanā hi kataṃ pāpanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ mahākālaṃ nāma sotāpannaupāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2554_0: So kira māsassa aṭṭhadivasesu uposathiko hutvā vihāre sabbarattiṃ dhammakathaṃ suṇāti.
atk-s0502a:2554_1: Atha rattiṃ corā ekasmiṃ gehe sandhiṃ chinditvā bhaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā lohabhājanasaddena pabuddhehi sāmikehi anubaddhā gahitabhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2554_4: Eko pana vihāramaggaṃ gahetvā mahākālassa rattiṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā pātova pokkharaṇitīre mukhaṃ dhovantassa purato bhaṇḍikaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyi.
atk-s0502a:2554_5: Core anubandhitvā āgatamanussā bhaṇḍikaṃ disvā “tvaṃ no gehasandhiṃ chinditvā bhaṇḍikaṃ haritvā dhammaṃ
atk-s0502a:2554_6: suṇanto viya vicarasī”ti taṃ gahetvā pothetvā māretvā chaḍḍetvā agamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2554_7: Atha naṃ pātova pānīyaghaṭaṃ ādāya gatā daharasāmaṇerā disvā “vihāre dhammakathaṃ sutvā sayitaupāsako
atk-s0502a:2554_8: ayuttaṃ maraṇaṃ labhatī”ti vatvā satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2554_11: imasmiṃ attabhāve kālena appatirūpaṃ maraṇaṃ laddhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2554_12: pubbe katakammassa pana tena yuttameva laddha”nti vatvā tehi yācito tassa pubbakammaṃ kathesi –
atk-s0502a:2555_0: Atīte kira bārāṇasirañño vijite ekassa paccantagāmassa aṭavimukhe corā paharanti.
atk-s0502a:2555_2: so bhatiṃ gahetvā manusse orato pāraṃ neti,
atk-s0502a:2555_4: Atheko manusso abhirūpaṃ attano bhariyaṃ cūḷayānakaṃ āropetvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2555_5: Rājabhaṭo taṃ itthiṃ disvāva sañjātasineho tena “aṭaviṃ no, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2555_10: amhākaṃyeva gehe āhāro ca nivāso ca bhavissatīti.
atk-s0502a:2555_12: Itaro purisānaṃ saññaṃ datvā yānakaṃ nivattāpetvā anicchantasseva dvārakoṭṭhake nivāsaṃ datvā āhāraṃ paṭiyādāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2555_13: Tassa pana gehe ekaṃ maṇiratanaṃ atthi.
atk-s0502a:2555_14: So taṃ tassa yānakantare pakkhipāpetvā paccūsakāle corānaṃ paviṭṭhasaddaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a:2555_17: So gāmadvāresu ārakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā “antogāmato nikkhamante vicinathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2555_19: Athassa yānakaṃ sodhentā attanā ṭhapitaṃ maṇiratanaṃ disvā santajjetvā “tvaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā palāyasī”ti pothetvā “gahito no, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2555_21: So “bhatakassa vata me gehe nivāsaṃ datvā bhattaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2555_23: gaṇhatha naṃ pāpapurisa”nti pothāpetvā māretvā chaḍḍāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2555_25: So tato cuto avīcimhi nibbattitvā tattha dīgharattaṃ paccitvā vipākāvasesena attabhāvasate tatheva pothito maraṇaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:2556_2: evaṃ ime satte attanā katapāpakammameva catūsu apāyesu abhimatthatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2560_0: Tattha vajiraṃvasmamayaṃ maṇinti vajiraṃva asmamayaṃ maṇiṃ.
atk-s0502a:2560_2: yathā pāsāṇamayaṃ pāsāṇasambhavaṃ vajiraṃ tameva asmamayaṃ maṇiṃ attano uṭṭhānaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ pāsāṇamaṇiṃ
atk-s0502a:2560_3: khāditvā chiddaṃ chiddaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ katvā aparibhogaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:2560_4: evameva attanā kataṃ attani jātaṃ attasambhavaṃ pāpaṃ dummedhaṃ nippaññaṃ puggalaṃ catūsu apāyesu abhimatthati kantati viddhaṃsetīti.
atk-s0502a:2564_0: Yassa accantadussīlyanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto devadattaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2565_0: Ekasmiñhi divase bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2565_1: devadatto dussīlo pāpadhammo dussīlyakāraṇena vaḍḍhitāya taṇhāya ajātasattuṃ saṅgaṇhitvā mahantaṃ lābhasakkāraṃ
atk-s0502a:2565_2: nibbattetvā ajātasattuṃ pituvadhe samādapetvā tena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā nānappakārena tathāgatassa vadhāya
atk-s0502a:2565_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:2565_8: pubbepi devadatto nānappakārena mayhaṃ vadhāya parisakkatī”ti vatvā kuruṅgamigajātakādīni kathetvā,
atk-s0502a:2565_10: accantadussīlapuggalaṃ nāma dussīlyakāraṇā uppannā taṇhā māluvā viya sālaṃ pariyonandhitvā sambhañjamānā
atk-s0502a:2568_0: Karoti so tathattānaṃ, yathā naṃ icchatī diso”ti.
atk-s0502a:2569_1: Gihī vā jātito paṭṭhāya dasa akusalakammapathe karonto,
atk-s0502a:2569_2: pabbajito vā upasampannadivasato paṭṭhāya garukāpattiṃ āpajjamāno accantadussīlo nāma.
atk-s0502a:2569_3: Idha pana yo dvīsu tīsu attabhāvesu dussīlo,
atk-s0502a:2569_4: etassa gatiyā āgataṃ dussīlabhāvaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2569_5: Dussīlabhāvoti cettha dussīlassa cha dvārāni nissāya uppannā taṇhā veditabbā.
atk-s0502a:2569_6: Māluvā sālamivotthatanti yassa puggalassa taṃ taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ yathā nāma māluvā sālaṃ ottharantī
atk-s0502a:2569_7: deve vassante pattehi udakaṃ sampaṭicchitvā sambhañjanavasena sabbatthakameva pariyonandhati,
atk-s0502a:2569_9: So māluvāya sambhañjitvā bhūmiyaṃ pātiyamāno rukkho viya tāya dussīlyasaṅkhātāya taṇhāya sambhañjitvā apāyesu pātiyamāno,
atk-s0502a:2573_0: Sukarānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto saṅghabhedaparisakkanaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2574_0: Ekadivasañhi devadatto saṅghabhedāya parisakkanto āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ piṇḍāya carantaṃ disvā attano adhippāyaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2574_1: Taṃ sutvā thero satthu santikaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “idhāhaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2574_2: pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ.
atk-s0502a:2574_9: aññatreva bhagavatā aññatra bhikkhusaṅghena uposathaṃ karissāmi saṅghakammañcā’ti.
atk-s0502a:2580_0: Yaṃ ve hitañca sādhuñca, taṃ ve paramadukkara”nti.
atk-s0502a:2581_1: yāni kammāni asādhūni sāvajjāni apāyasaṃvattanikattāyeva attano ahitāni ca honti,
atk-s0502a:2581_3: Yaṃ pana sugatisaṃvattanikattā attano hitañca anavajjatthena sādhuñca sugatisaṃvattanikañceva nibbānasaṃvattanikañca kammaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2581_4: taṃ pācīnaninnāya gaṅgāya ubbattetvā pacchāmukhakaraṇaṃ viya atidukkaranti.
atk-s0502a:2585_0: Yo sāsananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kālattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2586_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kirekā itthī mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā taṃ theraṃ upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:2586_1: Tassā paṭivissakagehe manussā satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā āgantvā “aho buddhā nāma acchariyā,
atk-s0502a:2586_4: ahampi satthu dhammadesanaṃ sotukāmā”ti tassa ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2586_6: Sā punadivase punadivasepīti yāvatatiyaṃ tena nivāriyamānāpi sotukāmāva ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2586_10: Sā ekadivasaṃ pātova bhuttapātarāsā uposathaṃ samādiyitvā, “amma,
atk-s0502a:2586_11: sādhukaṃ ayyaṃ pariviseyyāsī”ti dhītaraṃ āṇāpetvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2586_12: Dhītāpissā taṃ bhikkhuṃ āgatakāle parivisitvā “kuhiṃ mahāupāsikā”ti vuttā “dhammassavanāya vihāraṃ gatā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2586_13: So taṃ sutvāva kucchiyaṃ uṭṭhitena ḍāhena santappamāno “idāni sā mayi bhinnā”ti vegena gantvā satthu santike dhammaṃ suṇamānaṃ disvā satthāraṃ āha, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2586_14: ayaṃ itthī dandhā sukhumaṃ dhammakathaṃ na jānāti,
atk-s0502a:2586_15: imissā khandhādipaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sukhumaṃ dhammakathaṃ akathetvā dānakathaṃ vā sīlakathaṃ vā kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2586_16: Satthā tassajjhāsayaṃ viditvā “tvaṃ duppañño pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ paṭikkosasi.
atk-s0502a:2591_1: yo dummedho puggalo attano sakkārahānibhayena pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nissāya “dhammaṃ vā sossāma,
atk-s0502a:2591_2: dānaṃ vā dassāmā”ti vadante paṭikkosanto arahataṃ ariyānaṃ dhammajīvinaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ paṭikkosati,
atk-s0502a:2591_3: tassa taṃ paṭikkosanaṃ sā ca pāpikā diṭṭhi veḷusaṅkhātassa kaṭṭhakassa phalāni viya hoti.
atk-s0502a:2591_4: Tasmā yathā kaṭṭhako phalāni gaṇhanto attaghātāya phallati,
atk-s0502a:2592_0: “Phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti, phalaṃ veḷuṃ phalaṃ naḷaṃ;
atk-s0502a:2593_0: Sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti, gabbho assatariṃ yathā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:2594_0: Desanāvasāne upāsikā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2597_0: Attanā hi katanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷakālaṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2598_0: Ekadivasañhi mahākālavatthusmiṃ vuttanayeneva umaṅgacorā sāmikehi anubaddhā rattiṃ vihāre dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:2598_1: sutvā pātova vihārā nikkhamitvā sāvatthiṃ āgacchantassa tassa upāsakassa purato bhaṇḍikaṃ chaḍḍetvā palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2598_2: Manussā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ rattiṃ corakammaṃ katvā dhammaṃ suṇanto viya carati,
atk-s0502a:2598_4: Kumbhadāsiyo udakatitthaṃ gacchamānā taṃ disvā “apetha, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2598_8: kumbhadāsiyo me nissāya jīvitaṃ laddha”nti bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2598_14: Ime hi nāma sattā attanā pāpakammaṃ katvā nirayādīsu attanāva kilissanti,
atk-s0502a:2598_15: kusalaṃ katvā pana sugatiñceva nibbānañca gacchantā attanāva visujjhantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2602_0: Suddhī asuddhi paccattaṃ, nāñño aññaṃ visodhaye”ti.
atk-s0502a:2603_2: so catūsu apāyesu dukkhaṃ anubhavanto attanāva saṃkilissati.
atk-s0502a:2603_4: so sugatiñceva nibbānañca gacchanto attanāva visujjhati.
atk-s0502a:2603_5: Kusalakammasaṅkhātā suddhi akusalakammasaṅkhātā ca asuddhi paccattaṃ kārakasattānaṃ attaniyeva vipaccati.
atk-s0502a:2603_6: Añño puggalo aññaṃ puggalaṃ na visodhaye neva visodheti,
atk-s0502a:2604_0: Desanāvasāne cūḷakālo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2607_0: Attadatthanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attadatthattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2608_2: ahaṃ ito catumāsaccayena parinibbāyissāmī”ti vutte uppannasaṃvegā sattasatā puthujjanā bhikkhū satthu santikaṃ avijahitvā “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2608_11: na kiñci mantesī”ti vatvā satthu santikaṃ netvā “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2608_13: So satthārāpi “kasmā evaṃ karosī”ti vutte “tumhe kira, bhante,
atk-s0502a:2608_20: Na hi gandhādīhi pūjentā maṃ pūjenti,
atk-s0502a:2608_22: Tasmā aññenapi attadatthasadiseneva bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2612_1: gihibhūtā tāva kākaṇikamattampi attano atthaṃ sahassamattenāpi parassa atthena na hāpaye.
atk-s0502a:2612_2: Kākaṇikamattenāpi hissa attadatthova khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā nipphādeyya,
atk-s0502a:2612_4: Idaṃ pana evaṃ akathetvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena kathitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2612_5: tasmā “attadatthaṃ na hāpemī”ti bhikkhunā nāma saṅghassa uppannaṃ cetiyapaṭisaṅkharaṇādikiccaṃ vā upajjhāyādivattaṃ vā na hāpetabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2612_8: Yo pana accāraddhavipassako “ajja vā suve vā”ti paṭivedhaṃ patthayamāno vicarati,
atk-s0502a:2612_9: tena upajjhāyavattādīnipi hāpetvā attano kiccameva kātabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2612_10: Evarūpañhi attadatthamabhiññāya “ayaṃ me attano attho”ti sallakkhetvā,
atk-s0502a:2612_11: sadatthapasuto siyāti tasmiṃ sake atthe uyyuttapayutto bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0502a:2613_0: Desanāvasāne so thero arahatte patiṭṭhahi, sampattabhikkhūnampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2619_0: Hīnaṃ dhammanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ daharabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2620_0: Aññataro kira thero daharabhikkhunā saddhiṃ pātova visākhāya gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2620_1: Visākhāya gehe pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhuvayāgu niccapaññattā hoti.
atk-s0502a:2620_2: Thero tattha yāguṃ pivitvā daharabhikkhuṃ nisīdāpetvā sayaṃ aññaṃ gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2620_3: Tena ca samayena visākhāya puttassa dhītā ayyikāya ṭhāne ṭhatvā bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:2620_4: Sā tassa daharassa udakaṃ parissāventī cāṭiyaṃ attano mukhanimittaṃ disvā hasi,
atk-s0502a:2620_6: Sā taṃ hasamānaṃ disvā “chinnasīso hasatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2620_9: Sā rodamānā mahānase ayyikāya santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ idaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2620_13: na etaṃ chinnakesanakhassa chinnanivāsanapārupanassa majjhe chinnakapālaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya carantassa ayyassa agaruka”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:2620_19: Tasmiṃ khaṇe thero āgantvā “kimidaṃ upāsike”ti pucchitvā tamatthaṃ sutvā daharaṃ ovadanto āha – “apehi, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2620_20: nāyaṃ chinnakesanakhavatthassa majjhe chinnakapālaṃ ādāya bhikkhāya carantassa akkoso,
atk-s0502a:2620_22: kiṃ tumhe attano upaṭṭhāyikaṃ atajjetvā maṃ tajjetha,
atk-s0502a:2620_24: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā āgantvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:2620_25: Visākhā ādito paṭṭhāya taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2620_26: Satthā tassa daharassa sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ disvā “mayā imaṃ daharaṃ anuvattituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā visākhaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:2620_27: “kiṃ pana visākhe tava dārikāya chinnakesādimattakeneva mama sāvake chinnasīse katvā akkosituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2620_30: amhākaṃ upajjhāyo ca upāsikā ca suṭṭhu na jānantī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2620_31: Satthā daharassa attano anukulabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kāmaguṇaṃ ārabbha hasanabhāvo nāma hīno dhammo,
atk-s0502a:2620_32: hīnañca nāma dhammaṃ sevituṃ pamādena saddhiṃ saṃvasituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2622_0: “Hīnaṃ dhammaṃ na seveyya, pamādena na saṃvase;
atk-s0502a:2623_0: Micchādiṭṭhiṃ na seveyya, na siyā lokavaḍḍhano”ti.
atk-s0502a:2624_1: So hi hīno dhammo na antamaso oṭṭhagoṇādīhipi paṭisevitabbo.
atk-s0502a:2624_2: Hīnesu ca nirayādīsu ṭhānesu nibbattāpetīti hīno nāma,
atk-s0502a:2624_8: Tasmā evaṃ akaraṇena na siyā lokavaḍḍhanoti.
atk-s0502a:2625_0: Desanāvasāne so daharo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2628_0: Uttiṭṭheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā nigrodhārāme viharanto pitaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2629_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā paṭhamagamanena kapilapuraṃ gantvā ñātīhi katapaccuggamano nigrodhārāmaṃ patvā
atk-s0502a:2629_1: ñātīnaṃ mānabhindanatthāya ākāse ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpetvā tattha caṅkamanto dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a:2629_2: Ñātī pasannacittā suddhodanamahārājānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vandiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2629_6: pubbepi mayhaṃ ñātisamāgame pokkharavassaṃ vassiyevā”ti vatvā vessantarajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2629_7: Dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pakkamantesu ñātīsu ekopi satthāraṃ na nimantesi.
atk-s0502a:2629_8: Rājāpi “mayhaṃ putto mama gehaṃ anāgantvā kahaṃ gamissatī”ti animantetvāva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2629_9: Gantvā ca pana gehe vīsatiyā bhikkhusahassānaṃ yāguādīni paṭiyādāpetvā āsanāni paññāpesi.
atk-s0502a:2629_10: Punadivase satthā piṇḍāya pavisanto “kiṃ nu kho atītabuddhā pitu nagaraṃ patvā ujukameva ñātikulaṃ pavisiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:2629_11: udāhu paṭipāṭiyā piṇḍāya cariṃsū”ti āvajjento “paṭipāṭiyā cariṃsū”ti disvā paṭhamagehato paṭṭhāya piṇḍāya caranto pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:2629_12: Rāhulamātā pāsādatale nisinnāva disvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:2629_13: Rājā sāṭakaṃ saṇṭhāpento vegena nikkhamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā – “putta,
atk-s0502a:2629_15: ativiya te piṇḍāya carantena lajjā uppāditā,
atk-s0502a:2629_16: yuttaṃ nāma vo imasmiṃyeva nagare suvaṇṇasivikādīhi vicaritvā piṇḍāya carituṃ,
atk-s0502a:2629_22: piṇḍāya caritvā jīvanavaṃso mama vaṃso”ti? “Neso, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:2629_25: Anekāni hi buddhasahassāni piṇḍāya caritvāva jīviṃsū”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:2632_0: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
atk-s0502a:2634_0: “Dhammaṃ care sucaritaṃ, na naṃ duccaritaṃ care;
atk-s0502a:2635_0: Dhammacārī sukhaṃ seti, asmiṃ loke paramhi cā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2636_0: Tattha uttiṭṭheti uṭṭhahitvā paresaṃ gharadvāre ṭhatvā gahetabbapiṇḍe.
atk-s0502a:2636_1: Nappamajjeyyāti piṇḍacārikavattañhi hāpetvā paṇītabhojanāni pariyesanto uttiṭṭhe pamajjati nāma,
atk-s0502a:2636_2: sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caranto pana na pamajjati nāma.
atk-s0502a:2636_4: Dhammanti anesanaṃ pahāya sapadānaṃ caranto tameva bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ sucaritaṃ care.
atk-s0502a:2636_6: evaṃ panetaṃ bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ caranto dhammacārī idha loke catūhi iriyāpathehi sukhaṃ viharatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2636_7: Na naṃ duccaritanti vesiyādibhede agocare caranto bhikkhācariyadhammaṃ duccaritaṃ carati nāma.
atk-s0502a:2637_0: Desanāvasāne rājā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2640_0: Yathā pubbuḷakanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate vipassake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2641_0: Te kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā ghaṭentā vāyamantā appavisesā “visesetvā
atk-s0502a:2641_1: kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahessāmā”ti satthu santikaṃ āgacchantā antarāmagge marīcikammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāventāva āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2641_3: Te tattha tattha pamukhesu ṭhatvā dhārāvegena uṭṭhahitvā bhijjante pubbaḷake disvā “ayampi attabhāvo
atk-s0502a:2641_5: Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova te bhikkhū oloketvā tehi saddhiṃ kathento viya obhāsaṃ pharitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2644_0: Evaṃ lokaṃ avekkhantaṃ, maccurājā na passatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2645_1: Te hi dūratova gehasaṇṭhānādivasena upaṭṭhitāpi upagacchantānaṃ agayhūpagā rittakā tucchakāva.
atk-s0502a:2645_2: Tasmā yathā uppajjitvā bhijjanatthena pubbuḷakaṃ rittatucchādibhāveneva passeyya,
atk-s0502a:2645_3: evaṃ khandhādilokaṃ avekkhantaṃ maccurājā na passatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2646_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū ṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:2649_0: Etha passathimaṃ lokanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto abhayarājakumāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2650_0: Tassa kira paccantaṃ vūpasametvā āgatassa pitā bimbisāro tussitvā ekaṃ naccagītakusalaṃ nāṭakitthiṃ datvā sattāhaṃ rajjamadāsi.
atk-s0502a:2650_1: So sattāhaṃ gehā bahi anikkhantova rajjasiriṃ anubhavitvā aṭṭhame divase nadītitthaṃ gantvā nhatvā uyyānaṃ
atk-s0502a:2650_2: pavisitvā santatimahāmatto viya tassā itthiyā naccagītaṃ passanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:2650_3: Sāpi taṅkhaṇaññeva santatimahāmattassa nāṭakitthī viya satthakavātānaṃ vasena kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:2650_4: Kumāro tassā kālakiriyāya uppannasoko “na me imaṃ sokaṃ ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ añño nibbāpetuṃ sakkhissatī”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2650_7: imissā itthiyā evameva matakāle rodantena pavattitānaṃ assūnaṃ anamatagge saṃsāre pamāṇaṃ natthī”ti vatvā tāya desanāya sokassa tanubhāvaṃ ñatvā, “kumāra, mā soci,
atk-s0502a:2653_0: Yattha bālā visīdanti, natthi saṅgo vijānata”nti.
atk-s0502a:2654_3: Yattha bālāti yasmiṃ attabhāve bālā evaṃ visīdanti.
atk-s0502a:2654_4: Vijānatanti vijānantānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ ettha rāgasaṅgādīsu ekopi saṅgo natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2655_0: Desanāvasāne rājakumāro sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2658_0: Yo ca pubbeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sammajjanattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2659_0: So kira pāto vā sāyaṃ vāti velaṃ pamāṇaṃ akatvā abhikkhaṇaṃ sammajjantova vicarati.
atk-s0502a:2659_1: So ekadivasaṃ sammajjaniṃ gahetvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnassa revatattherassa santikaṃ gantvā “ayaṃ mahākusīto
atk-s0502a:2659_3: kiṃ nāmetassa sammajjaniṃ gahetvā ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ sammajjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:2659_4: Thero “ovādamassa dassāmī”ti cintetvā ehāvusoti. Kiṃ, bhanteti?
atk-s0502a:2659_7: Atha naṃ thero ekamantaṃ nisīdāpetvā ovadanto āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:2659_8: bhikkhunā nāma na sabbakālaṃ sammajjantena vicarituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:2659_9: pāto eva pana sammajjitvā piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena āgantvā rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne vā
atk-s0502a:2659_10: nisinnena dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyitvā attabhāve khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā sāyanhe uṭṭhāya sammajjituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:2659_11: niccakālaṃ asammajjitvā attanopi nāma okāso kātabbo”ti.
atk-s0502a:2659_12: So therassa ovāde ṭhatvā na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:2659_16: taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ uklāpaṃ kasmā na sammajjasī”ti? “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:2659_19: Bhikkhū “ayaṃ thero aññaṃ byākarotī”ti satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2659_22: mama putto pubbe pamādakāle sammajjanto vicari,
atk-s0502a:2659_23: idāni pana maggaphalasukhena vītināmento na sammajjatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2661_0: “Yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā, pacchā so nappamajjati;
atk-s0502a:2662_0: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2663_1: yo puggalo pubbe vattapaṭivattakaraṇena vā sajjhāyādīhi vā pamajjitvā pacchā maggaphalasukhena vītināmento nappamajjati,
atk-s0502a:2663_2: so abbhādīhi mutto candova okāsalokaṃ maggañāṇena imaṃ khandhādilokaṃ obhāseti,
atk-s0502a:2667_0: Yassa pāpanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aṅgulimālattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2668_0: Thero pana satthu santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:2668_1: Atha kho āyasmā aṅgulimālo rahogato paṭisallīno vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedī.
atk-s0502a:2669_0: “Yo ca pubbe pamajjitvā, pacchā so nappamajjati;
atk-s0502a:2670_0: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:2671_0: Ādinā nayena udānaṃ udānetvā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbuto.
atk-s0502a:2671_11: so pubbe ekaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ alabhitvā ettakaṃ pāpamakāsi,
atk-s0502a:2671_12: pacchā pana kalyāṇamittapaccayaṃ labhitvā appamatto ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2671_13: Tenassa taṃ pāpakammaṃ kusalena pihita”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2674_0: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2675_0: Tattha kusalenāti arahattamaggaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0502a:2679_0: Andhabhūtoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā aggāḷave cetiye viharanto ekaṃ pesakāradhītaraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2680_0: Ekadivasañhi āḷavivāsino satthari āḷaviṃ sampatte nimantetvā dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2680_1: Satthā bhattakiccāvasāne anumodanaṃ karonto “addhuvaṃ me jīvitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:2680_8: te pacchime kāle āsīvisaṃ disvā bhītaadaṇḍapuriso viya santāsappattā bheravaravaṃ ravantā kālaṃ karonti.
atk-s0502a:2680_10: te dūratova āsīvisaṃ disvā daṇḍakena gahetvā chaḍḍetvā ṭhitapuriso viya pacchime kāle na santasanti,
atk-s0502a:2680_12: Taṃ dhammadesanaṃ sutvā avasesajanā sakiccappasutāva ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:2680_13: Ekā pana soḷasavassuddesikā pesakāradhītā “aho buddhānaṃ kathā nāma acchariyā,
atk-s0502a:2680_14: mayā pana maraṇassatiṃ bhāvetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti rattindivaṃ maraṇassatimeva bhāvesi.
atk-s0502a:2680_16: Sāpi kumārikā tīṇi vassāni maraṇassatiṃ bhāvesiyeva.
atk-s0502a:2681_0: Athekadivasaṃ satthā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento taṃ kumārikaṃ attano ñāṇajālassa antopaviṭṭhaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:2681_1: “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti upadhārento “imāya kumārikāya mama dhammadesanāya sutadivasato paṭṭhāya tīṇi
atk-s0502a:2681_3: idānāhaṃ tattha gantvā imaṃ kumārikaṃ cattāro pañhe pucchitvā tāya vissajjentiyā catūsu ṭhānesu sādhukāraṃ datvā imaṃ gāthaṃ bhāsissāmi.
atk-s0502a:2681_5: taṃ nissāya mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā bhavissatī”ti ñatvā pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro jetavanā nikkhamitvā anupubbena aggāḷavavihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2681_6: Āḷavivāsino “satthā āgato”ti sutvā taṃ vihāraṃ gantvā nimantayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2681_7: Tadā sāpi kumārikā satthu āgamanaṃ sutvā “āgato kira mayhaṃ pitā, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:2681_8: ācariyo puṇṇacandamukho mahāgotamabuddho”ti tuṭṭhamānasā “ito me tiṇṇaṃ saṃvaccharānaṃ matthake suvaṇṇavaṇṇo satthā diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0502a:2681_9: idānissa suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ daṭṭhuṃ madhurojañca varadhammaṃ sotuṃ labhissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:2681_18: Kiṃ nu kho satthu dhammaṃ suṇāmi,
atk-s0502a:2681_20: Athassā etadahosi “pitā maṃ tasare anāhariyamāne potheyyapi pahareyyapi,
atk-s0502a:2681_21: tasmā tasaraṃ vaṭṭetvā tassa datvā pacchā dhammaṃ sossāmī”ti pīṭhake nisīditvā tasaraṃ vaṭṭesi.
atk-s0502a:2682_0: Āḷavivāsinopi satthāraṃ parivisitvā pattaṃ gahetvā anumodanatthāya aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2682_3: Tāya okāse laddhe anumodanaṃ karissāmī”ti tuṇhībhūto ahosi.
atk-s0502a:2682_4: Evaṃ tuṇhībhūtampi satthāraṃ sadevake loke koci kiñci vattuṃ na visahati.
atk-s0502a:2682_5: Sāpi kho kumārikā tasaraṃ vaṭṭetvā pacchiyaṃ ṭhapetvā pitu santikaṃ gacchamānā parisapariyante ṭhatvā satthāraṃ olokayamānāva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2682_8: “satthā evarūpāya parisāya majjhe nisīditvāva maṃ olokento mamāgamanaṃ paccāsīsati,
atk-s0502a:2682_10: Sā tasarapacchiṃ ṭhapetvā satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:2682_12: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “esā ettova gacchamānā puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ katvā aniyatagatikā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:2682_13: mama santikaṃ āgantvā gacchamānā sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā niyatagatikā hutvā tusitavimāne nibbattissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2682_14: Tassā kira taṃ divasaṃ maraṇato mutti nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:2682_15: Sā olokitasaññāṇeneva satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsīnaṃ antaraṃ pavisitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2682_16: Tathārūpāya parisāya majjhe nisīditvā tuṇhībhūtaṃ satthāraṃ vanditvā ṭhitakkhaṇeyeva taṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:2682_29: Iti naṃ satthā cattāro pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0502a:2682_31: ayaṃ pesakāradhītā sammāsambuddhena saddhiṃ icchiticchitaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0502a:2682_32: nanu nāma imāya ‘kuto āgacchasī’ti vutte ‘pesakāragehato’ti vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:2683_2: tvaṃ kuto āgacchasī”ti vutte “kasmā na jānāmīti vadesī”ti pucchi. Bhante,
atk-s0502a:2683_4: “kuto āgatāsī”ti pucchantā pana “kuto āgantvā idha nibbattāsī”ti pucchatha.
atk-s0502a:2683_5: Ahaṃ pana na jānāmi “kuto ca āgantvā idha nibbattāmhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2683_7: mayā pucchitapañhova tayā vissajjito”ti paṭhamaṃ sādhukāraṃ datvā uttarimpi pucchi –
atk-s0502a:2683_8: “kattha gamissasīti puna puṭṭhā kasmā ‘na jānāmī’ti vadesī”ti? Bhante,
atk-s0502a:2683_9: tumhe maṃ tasarapacchiṃ gahetvā pesakārasālaṃ gacchantiṃ jānātha,
atk-s0502a:2683_11: Ahañca ito cutā na jānāmi “kattha gantvā nibbattissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:2683_12: Athassā satthā “mayā pucchitapañhoyeva tayā vissajjito”ti dutiyaṃ sādhukāraṃ datvā uttarimpi pucchi –
atk-s0502a:2683_16: Athassā satthā “mayā pucchitapañhoyeva tayā vissajjito”ti tatiyaṃ sādhukāraṃ datvā uttarimpi pucchi –
atk-s0502a:2683_19: “rattindivapubbaṇhādīsu pana asukakāle nāma marissāmī”ti na jānāmi,
atk-s0502a:2683_21: Athassā satthā “mayā pucchitapañhoyeva tayā vissajjito”ti catutthaṃ sādhukāraṃ datvā parisaṃ āmantetvā “ettakaṃ nāma tumhe imāya kathitaṃ na jānātha,
atk-s0502a:2683_26: te eva cakkhumanto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2687_0: Tattha andhabhūto ayaṃ lokoti ayaṃ lokiyamahājano paññācakkhuno abhāvena andhabhūto.
atk-s0502a:2687_3: Jālamuttovāti yathā chekena sākuṇikena jālena ottharitvā gayhamānesu vaṭṭakesu kocideva jālato muccati.
atk-s0502a:2687_5: Tathā maraṇajālena otthaṭesu sattesu bahū apāyagāmino honti,
atk-s0502a:2687_7: sugatiṃ vā nibbānaṃ vā pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0502a:2688_0: Desanāvasāne kumārikā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:2689_0: Sāpi tasarapacchiṃ gahetvā pitu santikaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0502a:2689_2: Tassā asallakkhetvāva tasarapacchiṃ upanāmentiyā tasarapacchi vemakoṭiyaṃ paṭihaññitvā saddaṃ kurumānā pati.
atk-s0502a:2689_4: Vemakoṭi gantvā taṃ kumārikaṃ ure pahari,
atk-s0502a:2689_5: sā tattheva kālaṃ katvā tusitabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:2689_6: Athassā pitā taṃ olokento sakalasarīrena lohitamakkhitena patitvā mataṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a:2689_8: So “na mama sokaṃ añño nibbāpetuṃ sakkhissatī”ti rodanto satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:2689_11: Anamataggasmiñhi saṃsāre tava evameva dhītu maraṇakāle paggharitaassu catunnaṃ mahāsamuddānaṃ udakato atirekatara”nti vatvā anamataggakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2689_12: So tanubhūtasoko satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā laddhūpasampado na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:2692_0: Haṃsādiccapatheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tiṃsa bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2693_0: Ekasmiñhi divase tiṃsamattā disāvāsikā bhikkhū satthāraṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2693_1: Ānandatthero satthu vattakaraṇavelāya āgantvā te bhikkhū disvā “satthārā imehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāre kate vattaṃ karissāmī”ti dvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:2693_2: Satthāpi tehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā tesaṃ sāraṇīyadhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2693_3: Taṃ sutvā te sabbepi arahattaṃ patvā uppatitvā ākāsena agamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2693_14: mama santike dhammaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ pattā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2693_15: Tasmiṃ pana khaṇe ākāsena haṃsā āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2693_18: so haṃsā viya ākāsena gacchatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:2696_0: Nīyanti dhīrā lokamhā, jetvā māraṃ savāhini”nti.
atk-s0502a:2697_4: Dhīrā paṇḍitā savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā imamhā vaṭṭalokā nīyanti,
atk-s0502a:2701_0: Ekaṃ dhammanti dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ciñcamāṇavikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:2702_0: Paṭhamabodhiyañhi dasabalassa puthubhūtesu sāvakesu appamāṇesu devamanussesu ariyabhūmiṃ okkantesu patthaṭe guṇasamudaye mahālābhasakkāro udapādi.
atk-s0502a:2702_2: Te antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvā “kiṃ samaṇo gotamova buddho,
atk-s0502a:2702_6: amhākampi detha sakkarothā”ti evaṃ manusse viññāpentāpi lābhasakkāraṃ alabhitvā raho sannipatitvā “kena
atk-s0502a:2702_7: nu kho upāyena samaṇassa gotamassa manussānaṃ antare avaṇṇaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nāseyyāmā”ti cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:2703_0: Tadā sāvatthiyaṃ ciñcamāṇavikā nāmekā paribbājikā uttamarūpadharā sobhaggappattā devaccharā viya.
atk-s0502a:2703_3: “ciñcamāṇavikaṃ paṭicca samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nāsessāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:2703_5: Atha sā titthiyārāmaṃ gantvā vanditvā aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0502a:2703_7: Sā “ko nu kho me doso”ti yāvatatiyaṃ “vandāmi,
atk-s0502a:2703_10: kiṃ mayā saddhiṃ na kathethā”ti āha. “Bhagini,
atk-s0502a:2703_11: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ amhe viheṭhayantaṃ hatalābhasakkāre katvā vicarantaṃ na jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0502a:2703_16: attānaṃ paṭicca samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāraṃ nāsehī”ti.
