atk-s0502a:3114_7: Athassa ekadivasaṃ pitari bahi gate mātā “puttaṃ rakkhissāmī”ti ekaṃ dvārabāhaṃ nissāya ekaṃ pādehi uppīḷetvā chamāya nisinnā suttaṃ kantati.
atk-s0502a:3114_10: sarīravalañjaṃ karissāmī”ti vatvā tāya pāde samiñjite nikkhamitvā vegena vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā “pabbājetha maṃ,
atk-s0502a:3115_3: So “kahaṃ nu kho me putto”ti olokento taṃ adisvā “vihāraṃ gato bhavissatī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā puttaṃ pabbajitaṃ disvā kanditvā roditvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:3115_4: kiṃ maṃ nāsesī”ti vatvā “mama putte pabbajite ahaṃ idāni gehe kiṃ karissāmī”ti sayampi bhikkhū yācitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0502a:3115_5: Athassa mātāpi “kiṃ nu kho me putto ca pati ca cirāyanti,
atk-s0502a:3115_6: kacci vihāraṃ gantvā pabbajitā”ti te olokentī vihāraṃ gantvā ubhopi pabbajite disvā “imesaṃ pabbajitakāle
atk-s0502a:3115_7: mama gehena ko attho”ti sayampi bhikkhuniupassayaṃ gantvā pabbaji.
atk-s0502a:3115_8: Te pabbajitvāpi vinā bhavituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:3115_9: vihārepi bhikkhuniupassayepi ekatova nisīditvā sallapantā divasaṃ vītināmenti.
atk-s0502a:3116_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhikkhū nesaṃ kiriyaṃ satthuṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3116_1: Satthā te pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tumhe evaṃ karothā”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “kasmā evaṃ karotha?
atk-s0502a:3116_7: Tasmā sattesu ca saṅkhāresu ca kañci piyaṃ vā appiyaṃ vā kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3124_0: “Tasmā piyaṃ na kayirātha, piyāpāyo hi pāpako;
atk-s0502a:3125_0: Ganthā tesaṃ na vijjanti, yesaṃ natthi piyāppiya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3126_1: Vesiyāgocarādibhedassa hi chabbidhassa agocarassa sevanaṃ idha ayonisomanasikāro nāma,
atk-s0502a:3126_3: Yogasminti tabbiparīte ca yonisomanasikāre ayuñjantoti attho.
atk-s0502a:3126_4: Atthaṃ hitvāti pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya adhisīlādisikkhattayaṃ attho nāma,
atk-s0502a:3126_7: Pihetattānuyoginanti tāya paṭipattiyā sāsanato cuto gihibhāvaṃ patvā pacchā ye attānuyogaṃ anuyuttā sīlādīni
atk-s0502a:3127_0: Mā piyehīti piyehi sattehi vā saṅkhārehi vā kudācanaṃ ekakkhaṇepi na samāgaccheyya,
atk-s0502a:3127_3: Piyā nañhi viyogavasena adassanaṃ appiyānañca upasaṅkamanavasena dassanaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3127_5: tasmā kañci sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ vā piyaṃ nāma na kareyya.
atk-s0502a:3127_8: Ganthā tesaṃ na vijjantīti yesaṃ piyaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:3127_12: Tesu pana dvīsu pahīnesu sesaganthā pahīnā honti.
atk-s0502a:3127_13: Tasmā piyaṃ vā appiyaṃ vā na kattabbanti attho.
atk-s0502a:3128_1: Tena pana tayo janā “mayaṃ vinā bhavituṃ na sakkomā”ti vibbhamitvā gehameva agamiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:3131_0: Piyato jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ kuṭumbikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3132_0: So hi attano putte kālakate puttasokābhibhūto āḷāhanaṃ gantvā rodati,
atk-s0502a:3132_2: Satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento tassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayaṃ disvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto ekaṃ pacchāsamaṇaṃ gahetvā tassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3132_3: So satthu āgatabhāvaṃ sutvā “mayā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ kātukāmo bhavissatī”ti satthāraṃ pavesetvā gehamajjhe
atk-s0502a:3132_4: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā satthari nisinne āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3132_5: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ nu kho, upāsaka,
atk-s0502a:3132_8: idaṃ maraṇaṃ nāma na ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne,
atk-s0502a:3132_17: bhijjanadhammaṃ bhinna’nti sokaṃ akatvā maraṇassatimeva bhāvayiṃsū”ti vatvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3132_20: ācikkhatha me”ti yācito tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3133_0: “Uragova tacaṃ jiṇṇaṃ, hitvā gacchati saṃ tanuṃ;
atk-s0502a:3134_0: Evaṃ sarīre nibbhoge, pete kālakate sati.
atk-s0502a:3136_0: Tasmā etaṃ na socāmi, gato so tassa yā gatī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:3137_0: Imaṃ pañcakanipāte uragajātakaṃ vitthāretvā “evaṃ pubbe paṇḍitā piyaputte kālakate yathā etarahi tvaṃ kammante vissajjetvā nirāhāro rodanto vicarasi,
atk-s0502a:3137_1: tathā avicaritvā maraṇassatibhāvanābalena sokaṃ akatvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3137_4: Uppajjamāno hi soko vā bhayaṃ vā piyameva nissāya uppajjatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3140_0: Piyato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3141_0: Tattha piyatoti vaṭṭamūlako hi soko vā bhayaṃ vā uppajjamānaṃ piyameva sattaṃ vā saṅkhāraṃ vā nissāya uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:3141_1: tato pana vippamuttassa ubhayampetaṃ natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3142_0: Desanāvasāne kuṭumbiko sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3145_0: Pemato jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto visākhaṃ upāsikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3146_0: Sā kira puttassa dhītaraṃ sudattaṃ nāma kumārikaṃ attano ṭhāne ṭhapetvā gehe bhikkhusaṅghassa veyyāvaccaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a:3146_2: Sā tassā sarīranikkhepaṃ kāretvā sokaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkontī dukkhinī dummanā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3146_3: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ nu kho tvaṃ, visākhe,
atk-s0502a:3146_4: dukkhinī dummanā assumukhā rodamānā nisinnā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3146_11: “Sace panāyaṃ ettako jano tava nattāya sadiso bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a:3146_14: “Kati pana janā sāvatthiyaṃ devasikaṃ kālaṃ karontī”ti? “Bahū,
atk-s0502a:3146_20: Atha naṃ satthā “tena hi mā soci,
atk-s0502a:3146_21: soko vā bhayaṃ vā pematova jāyatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3149_0: Pemato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3150_0: Tattha pematoti puttadhītādīsu kataṃ pemameva nissāya soko jāyatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3154_0: Ratiyā jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā vesāliṃ nissāya kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto licchavī ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3155_0: Te kira ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase aññamaññaṃ asadisehi alaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā uyyānagamanatthāya nagarā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3155_1: Satthā piṇḍāya pavisanto te disvā bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0502a:3155_6: te ime olokentū”ti vatvā nagaraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:3155_7: Tepi uyyānaṃ gacchantā ekaṃ nagarasobhiniṃ itthiṃ ādāya gantvā taṃ nissāya issābhibhūtā aññamaññaṃ paharitvā lohitaṃ nadiṃ viya pavattayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3155_10: Bhikkhūpi licchavayo tathā nīyamāne disvā satthāraṃ āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3155_11: licchavirājāno pātova alaṅkatapaṭiyattā devā viya nagarā nikkhamitvā idāni ekaṃ itthiṃ nissāya imaṃ byasanaṃ pattā”ti. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:3155_13: soko vā bhayaṃ vā uppajjamānaṃ ratiṃ nissāya uppajjatiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3158_0: Ratiyā vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3159_0: Tattha ratiyāti pañcakāmaguṇaratito, taṃ nissāyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3163_0: Kāmatoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anitthigandhakumāraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3164_0: So kira brahmalokā cutasatto sāvatthiyaṃ mahābhogakule nibbatto jātadivasato paṭṭhāya itthisamīpaṃ upagantuṃ na icchati,
atk-s0502a:3164_4: āvāhaṃ te karissāmā”ti vutte “na me itthiyā attho”ti paṭikkhipitvā punappunaṃ yāciyamāno pañcasate suvaṇṇakāre
atk-s0502a:3164_5: pakkosāpetvā rattasuvaṇṇanikkhasahassaṃ dāpetvā ativiya pāsādikaṃ ghanakoṭṭimaṃ itthirūpaṃ kāretvā puna
atk-s0502a:3164_7: tayi āvāhaṃ akaronte kulavaṃso na patiṭṭhahissati,
atk-s0502a:3164_8: kumārikaṃ te ānessāmā”ti vutte “tena hi sace me evarūpaṃ kumārikaṃ ānessatha,
atk-s0502a:3164_9: karissāmi vo vacana”nti taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0502a:3164_10: Athassa mātāpitaro abhiññāte brāhmaṇe pakkosāpetvā “amhākaṃ putto mahāpuñño,
atk-s0502a:3164_11: avassaṃ iminā saddhiṃ katapuññā kumārikā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:3164_12: gacchatha imaṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ gahetvā evarūpaṃ kumārikaṃ āharathā”ti pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3164_13: Te “sādhū”ti cārikaṃ carantā maddaraṭṭhe sāgalanagaraṃ gatā.
atk-s0502a:3164_14: Tasmiñca nagare ekā soḷasavassuddesikā abhirūpā kumārikā ahosi,
atk-s0502a:3164_16: Tepi kho brāhmaṇā “sace idha evarūpā kumārikā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:3164_17: imaṃ disvā ‘ayaṃ asukassa kulassa dhītā viya abhirūpā’ti vakkhantī”ti taṃ suvaṇṇarūpakaṃ titthamagge ṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3165_0: Athassa kumārikāya dhātī taṃ kumārikaṃ nhāpetvā sayampi nhāyitukāmā hutvā titthaṃ āgatā taṃ rūpakaṃ disvā “dhītā me”ti saññāya “dubbinītāsi,
atk-s0502a:3165_2: tvaṃ mayā puretaraṃ idhāgatāsī”ti hatthena paharitvā thaddhabhāvañceva nibbikāratañca ñatvā “ahaṃ me,
atk-s0502a:3165_5: Atha naṃ te brāhmaṇā “evarūpā te, amma,
atk-s0502a:3165_7: Ayaṃ mama dhītu santike kiṃ agghatīti?
atk-s0502a:3165_8: Tena hi te dhītaraṃ amhākaṃ dassehīti.
atk-s0502a:3165_9: Sā tehi saddhiṃ gehaṃ gantvā sāmikānaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:3165_10: Te brāhmaṇehi saddhiṃ katapaṭisammodanā dhītaraṃ otāretvā heṭṭhāpāsāde suvaṇṇarūpakassa santike ṭhapesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3165_13: Brāhmaṇā taṃ tesaṃ datvā kumārikaṃ paṭicchāpetvā gantvā anitthigandhakumārassa mātāpitūnaṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3165_15: naṃ sīghaṃ ānethā”ti mahantena sakkārena pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3166_0: Kumāropi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “kañcanarūpatopi kira abhirūpatarā dārikā atthī”ti savanavaseneva sinehaṃ uppādetvā “sīghaṃ ānentū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3166_1: Sāpi kho yānaṃ āropetvā ānīyamānā atisukhumālatāya yānugghātena samuppāditavātarogā antarāmaggeyeva kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:3166_3: tassa atisinehena pucchantassa sahasāva anārocetvā katipāhaṃ vikkhepaṃ katvā tamatthaṃ ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3166_4: So “tathārūpāya nāma itthiyā saddhiṃ samāgamaṃ nālattha”nti uppannadomanasso pabbatena viya sokadukkhena ajjhotthaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3166_5: Satthā tassūpanissayaṃ disvā piṇḍāya caranto taṃ gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3166_6: Athassa mātāpitaro satthāraṃ antogehaṃ pavesetvā sakkaccaṃ parivisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3166_10: So āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3166_13: ‘evarūpā nāma itthī antarāmagge kālakatā’ti sutvā balavasoko uppanno,
atk-s0502a:3166_15: Atha naṃ satthā “jānāsi pana tvaṃ, kumāra,

atk-s0502a:3169_0: Kāmato vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3170_0: Tattha kāmatoti vatthukāmakilesakāmato, duvidhampetaṃ kāmaṃ nissāyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3174_0: Taṇhāya jāyatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3175_0: So kira micchādiṭṭhiko ekadivasaṃ nadītīraṃ gantvā khettaṃ sodheti.
atk-s0502a:3175_1: Satthā tassa upanissayasampattiṃ disvā tassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3175_2: So satthāraṃ disvāpi sāmīcikammaṃ akatvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3175_9: Punadivasepi tassa khettaṃ kasituṃ āgatassa santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0502a:3175_15: khettaṃ vapāmi niddemi rakkhāmī”ti sutvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:3175_22: ito dāni paṭṭhāya tvaṃ mama sahāyo”ti.
atk-s0502a:3176_2: sve dāni lāyāpessāmī”ti lāyanatthaṃ kattabbakiccassa rattiṃ mahāmegho vassitvā sabbaṃ sassaṃ hari,
atk-s0502a:3176_4: Satthā pana paṭhamadivasaṃyeva “taṃ sassaṃ na sampajjissatī”ti aññāsi.
atk-s0502a:3176_5: Brāhmaṇo pātova “khettaṃ olokessāmī”ti gato tucchaṃ khettaṃ disvā uppannabalavasoko cintesi –
atk-s0502a:3176_7: ahampi naṃ ‘imasmiṃ sasse nipphanne tuyhampi saṃvibhāgaṃ karissāmi,
atk-s0502a:3176_9: ito paṭṭhāya dāni tvaṃ mama sahāyo’ti avacaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3176_10: Sopi me manoratho matthakaṃ na pāpuṇī”ti āhārūpacchedaṃ katvā mañcake nipajji.
atk-s0502a:3176_12: So satthu āgamanaṃ sutvā “sahāyaṃ me ānetvā idha nisīdāpethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3176_14: Satthā nisīditvā “kahaṃ brāhmaṇo”ti pucchitvā “gabbhe nipanno”ti vutte “pakkosatha na”nti pakkosāpetvā āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ āha “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:3176_18: ahampi “sasse nipphanne tumhākaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ karissāmī”ti avacaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3176_23: kiṃ te nissāya soko uppanno”ti pucchitvā “na jānāmi,
atk-s0502a:3176_26: uppajjamāno soko vā bhayaṃ vā taṇhaṃ nissāya uppajjatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3179_0: Taṇhāya vippamuttassa, natthi soko kuto bhaya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3180_0: Tattha taṇhāyāti chadvārikāya taṇhāya, etaṃ taṇhaṃ nissāya uppajjatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3184_0: Sīladassanasampannanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto antarāmagge pañcasatadārake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3185_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā asītimahātherehi saddhiṃ pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto ekasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:3185_1: chaṇadivase pañcasate dārake pūvapacchiyo ukkhipāpetvā nagarā nikkhamma uyyānaṃ gacchante addasa.
atk-s0502a:3185_3: te ekaṃ bhikkhumpi “pūvaṃ gaṇhathā”ti na vadiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3185_8: “Kiṃ na passatha te dārake pūvapacchiyo ukkhipāpetvā atikkante”ti? “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:3185_9: evarūpā nāma dārakā kassaci pūvaṃ na dentī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3185_11: kiñcāpi ete maṃ vā tumhe vā pūvehi na nimantayiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3185_14: Buddhānañhi ekapuggalepi issā vā doso vā natthi,
atk-s0502a:3185_15: tasmā imaṃ vatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ādāya ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle chāyāya nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3185_16: Dārakā mahākassapattheraṃ pacchato āgacchantaṃ disvā uppannasinehā pītivegena paripuṇṇasarīrā hutvā pacchiyo
atk-s0502a:3185_17: otāretvā theraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pūve pacchīhi saddhiṃyeva ukkhipitvā “gaṇhatha,
atk-s0502a:3185_21: tumhākaṃ deyyadhammaṃ ādāya gantvā bhikkhusaṅghassa saṃvibhāgaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3185_23: bhante”ti nivattitvā therena saddhiṃyeva gantvā pūve datvā olokayamānā ekamante ṭhatvā paribhogāvasāne udakaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3185_25: sammāsambuddhaṃ vā mahāthere vā pūvehi anāpucchitvā mahākassapattheraṃ disvā pacchīhi saddhiṃyeva ādāya āgamiṃsū”ti.
atk-s0502a:3185_28: mama puttena mahākassapena sadiso bhikkhu devamanussānaṃ piyo hoti,
atk-s0502a:3185_29: te ca tassa catupaccayena pūjaṃ karontiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3188_0: Attano kamma kubbānaṃ, taṃ jano kurute piya”nti.
atk-s0502a:3189_0: Tattha sīladassanasampannanti catupārisuddhisīlena ceva maggaphalasampayuttena ca sammādassanena sampannaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3189_3: Saccavedinanti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ soḷasahākārehi sacchikatattā saccañāṇena saccavedinaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3189_4: Attano kamma kubbānanti attano kammaṃ nāma tisso sikkhā,
atk-s0502a:3189_6: Taṃ janoti taṃ puggalaṃ lokiyamahājano piyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:3189_7: daṭṭhukāmo vanditukāmo paccayena pūjetukāmo hotiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3190_0: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te dārakā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:3193_0: Chandajātoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ anāgāmittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3194_4: arahattaṃ pattakāleyeva tehi saddhiṃ kathessāmī”ti harāyamāno kiñci akathetvāva kālakato suddhāvāsadevaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3194_5: Athassa saddhivihārikā roditvā paridevitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā rodantāva ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3194_22: arahattaṃ patvāva nesaṃ kathessāmī’ti harāyanto tumhākaṃ kiñci akathetvā kālaṃ katvā suddhāvāse nibbatto,
atk-s0502a:3194_25: upajjhāyo vo kāmesu appaṭibaddhacittataṃ patto”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3198_2: Tañhi “asukena kataṃ vā nīlādīsu evarūpaṃ vā”ti avattabbatāya anakkhātaṃ nāma.
atk-s0502a:3198_3: Manasā ca phuṭo siyāti heṭṭhimehi tīhi maggaphalacittehi phuṭo pūrito bhaveyya.
atk-s0502a:3198_5: Uddhaṃsototi evarūpo bhikkhu avihesu nibbattitvā tato paṭṭhāya paṭisandhivasena akaniṭṭhaṃ gacchanto uddhaṃsototi vuccati,
atk-s0502a:3199_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahattaphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3202_0: Cirappavāsinti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā isipatane viharanto nandiyaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3203_0: Bārāṇasiyaṃ kira saddhāsampannassa kulassa nandiyo nāma putto ahosi,
atk-s0502a:3203_1: so mātāpitūnaṃ anurūpo saddhāsampanno saṅghupaṭṭhāko ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3203_2: Athassa mātāpitaro vayappattakāle sammukhagehato mātuladhītaraṃ revatiṃ nāma ānetukāmā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3203_6: tvaṃ imasmiṃ gehe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisajjanaṭṭhānaṃ upalimpitvā āsanāni paññāpehi,
atk-s0502a:3203_8: bhikkhūnaṃ āgatakāle pattaṃ gahetvā nisīdāpetvā dhammakaraṇena pānīyaṃ parissāvetvā bhuttakāle patte dhova,
atk-s0502a:3203_11: Atha naṃ “ovādakkhamā jātā”ti puttassa ārocetvā tena sādhūti sampaṭicchite divasaṃ ṭhapetvā āvāhaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3204_4: Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā katipāhaṃ saddhā viya hutvā bhattāraṃ upaṭṭhahantī dve putte vijāyi.
atk-s0502a:3204_7: Nandiyopi mātāpitūnaṃ kālakiriyato paṭṭhāya mahādānapati hutvā bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3204_9: So aparabhāge satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā āvāsadāne ānisaṃsaṃ sallakkhetvā isipatane mahāvihāre catūhi
atk-s0502a:3204_10: gabbhehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ catusālaṃ kāretvā mañcapīṭhādīni attharāpetvā taṃ āvāsaṃ niyyādento buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0502a:3204_11: bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā tathāgatassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3204_12: Satthu hatthe dakkhiṇodakapatiṭṭhānena saddhiṃyeva tāvatiṃsadevaloke sabbadisāsu dvādasayojaniko uddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3205_0: Athekadivase mahāmoggallānatthero devacārikaṃ gantvā tassa pāsādassa avidūre ṭhito attano santike āgate devaputte pucchi –
atk-s0502a:3205_3: yena nandiyena nāma gahapatiputtena isipatane satthu vihāraṃ kāretvā dinno,
atk-s0502a:3205_5: Accharāsaṅghopi naṃ disvā pāsādato orohitvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3205_8: mattikapātiṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇapātigahaṇaṃ viya manussasampattiṃ jahitvā dibbasampattigahaṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3205_10: Thero tato āgantvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:3205_14: nanu te devaloke nandiyassa nibbattā dibbasampatti sāmaṃ diṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a:3206_0: Atha naṃ satthā “moggallānaṃ kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3206_1: Yathā hi cirappavuṭṭhaṃ puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā vippavāsato āgacchantaṃ gāmadvāre ṭhito kocideva disvā
atk-s0502a:3206_2: vegena gehaṃ āgantvā ‘asuko nāma āgato’ti āroceyya,
atk-s0502a:3206_3: athassa ñātakā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhā vegena nikkhamitvā ‘āgatosi, tāta, arogosi,
atk-s0502a:3206_5: evameva idha katakalyāṇaṃ itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā imaṃ lokaṃ jahitvā paralokaṃ gataṃ dasavidhaṃ dibbapaṇṇākāraṃ ādāya ‘ahaṃ purato,
atk-s0502a:3206_6: ahaṃ purato’ti paccuggantvā devatā abhinandantī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3213_1: Dūrato sotthimāgatanti vaṇijjaṃ vā rājaporisaṃ vā katvā laddhalābhaṃ nipphannasampattiṃ anupaddavena dūraṭṭhānato āgataṃ.
atk-s0502a:3213_2: Ñātimittā suhajjā cāti kulasambandhavasena ñātī ca sandiṭṭhādibhāvena mittā ca suhadayabhāvena suhajjā ca.
atk-s0502a:3213_3: Abhinandanti āgatanti naṃ disvā āgatanti vacanamattena vā añjalikaraṇamattena vā gehasampattaṃ pana nānappakārapaṇṇākārābhiharaṇavasena abhinandanti.
atk-s0502a:3213_4: Tathevāti tenevākārena katapuññampi puggalaṃ imasmā lokā paralokaṃ gataṃ dibbaṃ āyuvaṇṇasukhayasaādhipateyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3213_5: dibbaṃ rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbanti imaṃ dasavidhaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya mātāpituṭṭhāne ṭhitāni puññāni abhinandantāni paṭiggaṇhanti.
atk-s0502a:3213_6: Piyaṃ ñātīvāti idhaloke piyañātakaṃ āgataṃ sesañātakā viyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3220_0: Kodhaṃ jaheti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā nigrodhārāme viharanto rohiniṃ nāma khattiyakaññaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3221_0: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye āyasmā anuruddho pañcasatehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ kapilavatthuṃ agamāsi.

atk-s0502a:3221_8: Thero “pakkosatha na”nti pakkosāpetvā paṭakañcukaṃ paṭimuñcitvā āgataṃ evamāha – “rohini,
atk-s0502a:3221_13: “Kiṃ pana te puññaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti?
atk-s0502a:3221_22: “Tena hi taṃ vissajjetvā āsanasālaṃ kārehī”ti. “Ko me, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3221_24: Thero samīpe ṭhitañātake oloketvā “tumhākaṃ bhāro hotū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3222_1: “dvibhūmikaṃ āsanasālaṃ kāretvā upari padarānaṃ dinnakālato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhāsālaṃ nibaddhaṃ sammajjitvā āsanāni paññāpehi,
atk-s0502a:3222_4: bhante”ti pasādhanabhaṇḍakaṃ vissajjetvā dvibhūmikaāsanasālaṃ kāretvā upari padarānaṃ dinnakālato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhāsālaṃ sammajjanādīni akāsi.
atk-s0502a:3222_7: Sā āsanasālāya niṭṭhitāya buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā āsanasālaṃ pūretvā nisinnassa buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0502a:3222_17: Āgantvā ca pana vanditvā nisinnaṃ āha – “rohini,
atk-s0502a:3222_22: “Jānāsi pana kiṃ te nissāya esa uppanno”ti?
atk-s0502a:3223_0: Atīte bārāṇasirañño aggamahesī ekissā rañño nāṭakitthiyā āghātaṃ bandhitvā “dukkhamassā uppādessāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:3223_1: cintetvā mahākacchuphalāni āharāpetvā taṃ nāṭakitthiṃ attano santikaṃ pakkosāpetvā yathā sā na jānāti,
atk-s0502a:3223_2: evamassā sayane ceva pāvārakojavādīnañca antaresu kacchucuṇṇāni ṭhapāpesi,
atk-s0502a:3223_3: keḷiṃ kurumānā viya tassā sarīrepi okiri.
atk-s0502a:3223_4: Taṃ khaṇaṃyeva tassā sarīraṃ uppakkuppakkaṃ gaṇḍāgaṇḍajātaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3223_6: tatrāpissā kacchucuṇṇehi khādiyamānāya kharatarā vedanā uppajji.
atk-s0502a:3224_2: Appamattakopi hi kodho vā issā vā kātuṃ na yuttarūpo evā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3230_0: Tattha kodhanti sabbākārampi kodhaṃ navavidhampi mānaṃ jaheyya.
atk-s0502a:3230_3: Yo hi “mama rūpaṃ mama vedanā”tiādinā nayena nāmarūpaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a:3230_6: Evaṃ aggaṇhanto avihaññanto na sajjati nāma.
atk-s0502a:3230_7: Taṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ asajjamānaṃ rāgādīnaṃ abhāvena akiñcanaṃ dukkhā nāma nānupatantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3231_0: Sā tato cutā tāvatiṃsabhavane catunnaṃ devaputtānaṃ sīmantare nibbattitvā pāsādikā rūpasobhaggappattā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3231_1: Cattāropi devaputtā taṃ disvā uppannasinehā hutvā “mama sīmāya anto nibbattā,
atk-s0502a:3231_2: mama sīmāya anto nibbattā”ti vivadantā sakkassa devarañño santikaṃ gantvā, “deva,
atk-s0502a:3231_5: Sakkopi taṃ oloketvāva uppannasineho hutvā evamāha –

atk-s0502a:3231_18: tumhākaṃ maraṇena attho natthī”ti taṃ sakkassa vissajjetvā pakkamiṃsu.

atk-s0502a:3267_11: Tāsupi tatheva niguhitvā theraṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkontīsu ekā tāva āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3267_12: mayā neva dānādīsu kataṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0502a:3267_13: ahaṃ pana kassapabuddhakāle parassa dāsī ahosiṃ,
atk-s0502a:3267_14: tassā me sāmiko ativiya caṇḍo pharuso,
atk-s0502a:3267_15: gahitaggahiteneva kaṭṭhena vā kaliṅgarena vā sīsaṃ bhindati.
atk-s0502a:3267_16: Sāhaṃ uppanne kope ‘esa tava sāmiko lakkhaṇāhataṃ vā kātuṃ nāsādīni vā chindituṃ issaro,
atk-s0502a:3267_17: mā kujjhī’ti attānameva paribhāsetvā kopaṃ nāma na akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a:3267_20: ucchukhettaṃ rakkhamānā ekassa bhikkhuno ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ adāsiṃ”.
atk-s0502a:3267_25: Aparā “nimbamuṭṭhi”ntiādinā nayena attanā attanā kataṃ parittadānaṃ ārocetvā “iminā iminā kāraṇena amhehi ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3268_0: Thero tāhi katakammaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:3268_7: nanu te devatāhi ayaṃ attho kathito”ti? “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3268_10: saccamattaṃ kathetvāpi kopamattaṃ jahitvāpi parittakaṃ dānaṃ datvāpi devalokaṃ gacchatiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3270_0: “Saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyya, dajjā appampi yācito;
atk-s0502a:3271_0: Etehi tīhi ṭhānehi, gacche devāna santike”ti.
atk-s0502a:3272_0: Tattha saccaṃ bhaṇeti saccaṃ dīpeyya vohareyya,
atk-s0502a:3272_4: Te hi kiñcāpi “dethā”ti ayācitvāva gharadvāre tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0502a:3272_6: Evaṃ sīlavantehi yācito appasmiṃ deyyadhamme vijjamāne appamattakampi dadeyya.
atk-s0502a:3272_7: Etehi tīhīti etesu tīsu ekenāpi kāraṇena devalokaṃ gaccheyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3276_0: Ahiṃsakā yeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāketaṃ nissāya añjanavane viharanto bhikkhūhi paṭṭhapañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3277_0: Bhagavato kira bhikkhusaṅghaparivutassa sāketaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanakāle eko sāketavāsī mahallakabrāhmaṇo
atk-s0502a:3277_1: nagarato nikkhamanto antaragharadvāre dasabalaṃ disvā pādesu nipatitvā gopphakesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:3277_2: nanu nāma puttehi jiṇṇakāle mātāpitaro paṭijaggitabbā,
atk-s0502a:3277_3: kasmā ettakaṃ kālaṃ amhākaṃ attānaṃ na dassesi.
atk-s0502a:3277_5: mātarampi passituṃ ehī”ti satthāraṃ gahetvā attano gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3277_6: Satthā tattha gantvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena.
atk-s0502a:3277_9: nanu nāma mātāpitaro mahallakakāle upaṭṭhātabbā”ti vatvā puttadhītaro “etha bhātaraṃ vandathā”ti vandāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3277_10: Te ubhopi tuṭṭhamānasā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3277_11: idheva nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vatvā “buddhā nāma ekaṭṭhāneyeva nibaddhaṃ bhikkhaṃ na gaṇhantī”ti vutte, “tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3277_14: Satthā tato paṭṭhāya nimantetuṃ āgate “gantvā brāhmaṇassa āroceyyāthā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a:3277_15: Te gantvā “mayaṃ svātanāya satthāraṃ nimantemā”ti brāhmaṇaṃ vadanti.
atk-s0502a:3277_16: Brāhmaṇo punadivase attano gehato bhattabhājanasūpeyyabhājanāni ādāya satthu nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0502a:3277_17: Aññatra pana nimantane asati satthā brāhmaṇasseva gehe bhattakiccaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:3277_18: Te ubhopi attano deyyadhammaṃ niccakālaṃ tathāgatassa dentā dhammakathaṃ suṇantā anāgāmiphalaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3278_3: jānantova saddhiṃ brāhmaṇiyā tathāgataṃ ‘amhākaṃ putto’ti vadati,
atk-s0502a:3278_8: ubhopi te attano puttameva puttoti vadantī”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a:3279_2: ayaṃ brāhmaṇo nirantaraṃ pañca jātisatāni mayhaṃ pitā ahosi,
atk-s0502a:3279_5: Sāpi me brāhmaṇī nirantarameva pañca jātisatāni mātā ahosi,
atk-s0502a:3279_9: diyaḍḍhajātisahassaṃ brāhmaṇiyā hattheti tīṇi jātisahassāni tesaṃ puttabhāvaṃ dassetvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3283_0: Evaṃ taṃ jāyate pemaṃ, uppalaṃva yathodake”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:3284_0: Satthā temāsameva taṃ kulaṃ nissāya vihāsi.
atk-s0502a:3284_2: Atha nesaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ katvā ubhopi ekakūṭāgārameva āropetvā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3284_3: Satthāpi pañcasatabhikkhuparivāro tehi saddhiṃyeva āḷāhanaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3284_5: Satthāpi āḷāhanasamīpe ekaṃ sālaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3284_7: ‘mātāpitaro vo kālakatā’ti mā cintayitthā”ti satthārā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karonti.
atk-s0502a:3284_8: Satthā te “mā evaṃ avacutthā”ti appaṭikkhipitvā parisāya āsayaṃ oloketvā taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desento –
atk-s0502a:3289_2: Bhikkhū brāhmaṇassa ca brāhmaṇiyā ca parinibbutabhāvaṃ ajānantā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3289_6: Evarūpā hi accutaṃ amataṃ mahānibbānameva pāpuṇantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3292_0: Te yanti accutaṃ ṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare”ti.
atk-s0502a:3293_5: Yatthāti yasmiṃ nibbāne gantvā na socare na socanti na vihaññanti,
atk-s0502a:3297_0: Sadā jāgaramānānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā gijjhakūṭe viharanto puṇṇaṃ nāma rājagahaseṭṭhino dāsiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3298_0: Tassā kira ekadivasaṃ koṭṭanatthāya bahuvīhiṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3298_1: Sā rattimpi dīpaṃ jāletvā vīhiṃ koṭṭentī vissamanatthāya sedatintena gattena bahivāte aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3298_2: Tasmiṃ samaye dabbo mallaputto bhikkhūnaṃ senāsanapaññāpako ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3298_3: So dhammassavanaṃ sutvā attano attano senāsanaṃ gacchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aṅguliṃ jāletvā purato purato
atk-s0502a:3298_5: Puṇṇā tenālokena pabbate vicarante bhikkhū disvā “ahaṃ tāva attano dukkhena upaddutā imāyapi velāya niddaṃ na upemi,
atk-s0502a:3298_6: bhaddantā kiṃ kāraṇā na niddāyantī”ti cintetvā “addhā kassaci bhikkhuno aphāsukaṃ vā bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:3298_7: dīghajātikena vā upaddavo bhavissatī”ti saññaṃ katvā pātova kuṇḍakaṃ ādāya udakena temetvā hatthatale
atk-s0502a:3298_8: pūvaṃ katvā aṅgāresu pacitvā ucchaṅge katvā titthamagge khādissāmīti ghaṭaṃ ādāya titthābhimukhī pāyāsi.
atk-s0502a:3298_9: Satthāpi gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisituṃ tameva maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0502a:3299_1: “aññesu divasesu satthari diṭṭhepi mama deyyadhammo na hoti,
atk-s0502a:3299_5: Sace lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vāti acintetvā gaṇheyya,
atk-s0502a:3299_6: dadeyyāhaṃ imaṃ pūva”nti ghaṭaṃ ekamante nikkhipitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3299_7: imaṃ lūkhaṃ dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhantā mama saṅgahaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3299_8: Satthā ānandattheraṃ oloketvā tena nīharitvā dinnaṃ mahārājadattiyaṃ pattaṃ upanāmetvā pūvaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:3299_9: Puṇṇāpi taṃ satthu patte patiṭṭhapetvāva pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3300_1: “kiñcāpi me satthā saṅgahaṃ karonto pūvaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a:3300_3: Addhā purato kākassa vā sunakhassa vā datvā rañño vā rājaputtassa vā gehaṃ gantvā paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3300_4: Satthāpi “kiṃ nu kho esā cintesī”ti tassā cittācāraṃ ñatvā ānandattheraṃ oloketvā nisīdanākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:3300_7: Devatā sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe devamanussānaṃ upakappanakaṃ ojaṃ madhupaṭalaṃ viya pīḷetvā tattha pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3300_10: Satthā katabhattakicco puṇṇaṃ āmantetvā “kasmā tvaṃ puṇṇe mama sāvake paribhavasī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3300_12: Atha tayā mama sāvake oloketvā kiṃ kathitanti?
atk-s0502a:3300_13: “Ahaṃ tāva iminā dukkhupaddavena niddaṃ na upemi,
atk-s0502a:3300_16: dīghajātikena vā upaddavo bhavissatī”ti ettakaṃ mayā, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3300_18: Satthā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “puṇṇe tvaṃ na tāva dukkhupaddavena niddāyasi,
atk-s0502a:3300_19: mama sāvakā sadā jāgariyamanuyuttatāya na niddāyantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3304_0: Tattha ahorattānusikkhinanti divā ca rattiñca tisso sikkhā sikkhamānānaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3304_2: Atthaṃ gacchantīti evarūpānaṃ sabbepi āsavā atthaṃ vināsaṃ natthibhāvaṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3306_0: Satthā kuṇḍakaaṅgārapūvena bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3306_2: sammāsambuddhena kataṃ puṇṇāya dinnena kuṇḍakaaṅgārapūvena bhattakiccaṃ karontenā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3306_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:3306_7: pubbepi mayā imāya dinnakuṇḍakaṃ paribhuttamevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3308_0: Etaṃ te bhojanaṃ āsi, kasmā dāni na bhuñjasi.
atk-s0502a:3309_0: “Yattha posaṃ na jānanti, jātiyā vinayena vā;
atk-s0502a:3312_0: Jānanto jānamāgamma, na te bhakkhāmi kuṇḍaka”nti. –
atk-s0502a:3316_0: Porāṇametanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto atulaṃ nāma upāsakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3317_0: So hi sāvatthivāsī upāsako pañcasataupāsakaparivāro ekadivasaṃ te upāsake ādāya dhammassavanatthāya vihāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3317_1: gantvā revatattherassa santike dhammaṃ sotukāmo hutvā revatattheraṃ vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3317_2: So panāyasmā paṭisallānārāmo sīho viya ekacāro,
atk-s0502a:3317_3: tasmā tena saddhiṃ na kiñci kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3317_4: So “ayaṃ thero na kiñci kathesī”ti kuddho uṭṭhāya sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ gantvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito therena “kenatthena āgatatthā”ti vutte “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3317_5: ime upāsake ādāya dhammassavanatthāya revatattheraṃ upasaṅkamiṃ,
atk-s0502a:3317_6: tassa me thero na kiñci kathesi,
atk-s0502a:3317_9: Atha thero “tena hi upāsakā nisīdathā”ti vatvā bahukaṃ katvā abhidhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3317_12: amhākaṃ iminā ko attho”ti kujjhitvā parisaṃ ādāya ānandattherassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3318_2: tassa santike ālāpasallāpamattampi alabhitvā kuddhā sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ agamimhā,
atk-s0502a:3318_3: sopi no atisaṇhaṃ bahuṃ abhidhammameva kathesi,
atk-s0502a:3318_4: ‘iminā amhākaṃ ko attho’ti etassāpi kujjhitvā idhāgamimhā,
atk-s0502a:3318_7: Tena hi nisīditvā suṇāthāti thero tesaṃ suviññeyyaṃ katvā appakameva dhammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3318_8: Te therassapi kujjhitvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3318_15: so amhehi saddhiṃ na kiñci kathesi,
atk-s0502a:3319_3: Ekantaṃ garahitabboyeva vā hi pasaṃsitabboyeva vā natthi.
atk-s0502a:3319_6: Mahāpathavimpi candimasūriyepi ākāsādayopi catuparisamajjhe nisīditvā dhammaṃ kathentampi sammāsambuddhaṃ ekacce garahanti,
atk-s0502a:3319_8: Andhabālānañhi nindā vā pasaṃsā vā appamāṇā,
atk-s0502a:3319_9: paṇḍitena pana medhāvinā nindito nindito nāma,
atk-s0502a:3319_10: pasaṃsito ca pasaṃsito nāma hotī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3325_0: “Na cāhu na ca bhavissati, na cetarahi vijjati;
atk-s0502a:3326_0: Ekantaṃ nindito poso, ekantaṃ vā pasaṃsito.
atk-s0502a:3328_0: “Yaṃ ce viññū pasaṃsanti, anuvicca suve suve;
atk-s0502a:3333_2: Netaṃ ajjatanāmivāti idaṃ nindanaṃ vā pasaṃsanaṃ vā ajjatanaṃ adhunā uppannaṃ viya na hoti.
atk-s0502a:3333_3: Tuṇhimāsīnanti kiṃ eso mūgo viya badhiro viya kiñci ajānanto viya tuṇhī hutvā nisinnoti nindanti.
atk-s0502a:3333_4: Bahubhāṇinanti kiṃ esa vātāhatatālapaṇṇaṃ viya taṭataṭāyati,
atk-s0502a:3333_6: Mitabhāṇimpīti kiṃ esa suvaṇṇahiraññaṃ viya attano vacanaṃ maññamāno ekaṃ vā dve vā vatvā tuṇhī ahosīti nindanti.
atk-s0502a:3333_7: Evaṃ sabbathāpi imasmiṃ loke anindito nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3334_0: Yaṃ ce viññūti bālānaṃ nindā vā pasaṃsā vā appamāṇā,
atk-s0502a:3334_1: yaṃ pana paṇḍitā divase divase anuvicca nindakāraṇaṃ vā pasaṃsakāraṇaṃ vā jānitvā pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0502a:3334_2: acchiddāya vā sikkhāya acchiddāya vā jīvitavuttiyā samannāgatattā acchiddavuttiṃ dhammojapaññāya samannāgatattā
atk-s0502a:3334_3: medhāviṃ lokiyalokuttarapaññāya ceva catupārisuddhisīlena ca samannāgatattā paññāsīlasamāhitaṃ pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0502a:3334_4: taṃ suvaṇṇadosavirahitaṃ ghaṭṭanamajjanakkhamaṃ jambonadanikkhaṃ viya ko ninditumarahatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3334_5: Devāpīti devatāpi paṇḍitamanussāpi taṃ bhikkhuṃ upaṭṭhāya thomenti pasaṃsanti.
atk-s0502a:3338_0: Kāyappakopanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto chabbaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3339_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā veḷuvane viharanto tesaṃ chabbaggiyānaṃ ubhohi hatthehi yaṭṭhiyo gahetvā kaṭṭhapādukā
atk-s0502a:3339_2: kiṃ saddo nāmeso”ti pucchitvā “chabbaggiyānaṃ pādukā āruyha caṅkamantānaṃ khaṭakhaṭasaddo”ti sutvā sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0502a:3339_3: paññāpetvā “bhikkhunā nāma kāyādīni rakkhituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3351_0: Manasā saṃvutā dhīrā, te ve suparisaṃvutā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3352_1: Kāyena saṃvutoti kāyadvāre duccaritapavesanaṃ nivāretvā saṃvuto pihitadvāro siyā.
atk-s0502a:3352_2: Yasmā pana kāyaduccaritaṃ hitvā kāyasucaritaṃ caranto ubhayampetaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:3352_6: Kāyena saṃvutā dhīrāti ye paṇḍitā pāṇātipātādīni akarontā kāyena,
atk-s0502a:3352_9: te idha lokasmiṃ susaṃvutā surakkhitā sugopitā supihitadvārāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3359_0: Paṇḍupalāsova dānisīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ goghātakaputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3360_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko goghātako gāvo vadhitvā varamaṃsāni gahetvā pacāpetvā puttadārehi saddhiṃ nisīditvā maṃsañca khādati,
atk-s0502a:3360_2: So evaṃ pañcapaṇṇāsa vassāni goghātakakammaṃ karonto dhuravihāre viharantassa satthu ekadivasampi kaṭacchumattampi yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā na adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3360_3: So ca vinā maṃsena bhattaṃ na bhuñjati.
atk-s0502a:3360_4: So ekadivasaṃ divasabhāge maṃsaṃ vikkiṇitvā attano atthāya pacituṃ ekaṃ maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ bhariyāya datvā nhāyituṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3360_5: Athassa sahāyako gehaṃ gantvā bhariyaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:3360_9: sahāyako te maṃsaṃ vikkiṇitvā idāni nhāyituṃ gatoti.
atk-s0502a:3360_12: Sahāyakassa te nikkhittamaṃsaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ natthīti.
atk-s0502a:3360_13: So “sahāyakassa me atthāya ṭhapitamaṃsato aññaṃ maṃsaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:3360_14: so ca vinā maṃsena na bhuñjati,
atk-s0502a:3360_15: nāyaṃ dassatī”ti sāmaṃyeva taṃ maṃsaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:3361_0: Goghātakopi nhatvā āgato tāya attano pakkapaṇṇena saddhiṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhatte upanīte āha “kahaṃ maṃsa”nti? “Natthi, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3361_1: Nanu ahaṃ paccanatthāya maṃsaṃ datvā gatoti.
atk-s0502a:3361_3: vikkiṇiyamaṃsaṃ dehī”ti vatvā mayā “sahāyakassa te ṭhapitamaṃsato aññaṃ maṃsaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:3361_4: so ca vinā maṃsena na bhuñjatī”ti vuttepi balakkārena taṃ maṃsaṃ sāmaṃyeva gahetvā gatoti.
atk-s0502a:3361_5: Ahaṃ vinā maṃsena bhattaṃ na bhuñjāmi,
atk-s0502a:3361_8: So “nāhaṃ bhuñjāmī”ti taṃ bhattaṃ harāpetvā satthaṃ ādāya pacchāgehe ṭhito goṇo atthi,
atk-s0502a:3361_9: tassa santikaṃ gantvā mukhe hatthaṃ pakkhipitvā jivhaṃ nīharitvā satthena mūle chinditvā ādāya gantvā
atk-s0502a:3361_10: aṅgāresu pacāpetvā bhattamatthake ṭhapetvā nisinno ekaṃ bhattapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjitvā ekaṃ maṃsakhaṇḍaṃ mukhe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3361_13: Sopi kho goṇo viya lohitadhārāya mukhato paggharantiyā antogehaṃ pavisitvā jaṇṇukehi vicaranto viravi.
atk-s0502a:3362_0: Tasmiṃ samaye goghātakassa putto pitaraṃ olokento samīpe ṭhito hoti.
atk-s0502a:3362_2: imaṃ goghātakaṃ goṇaṃ viya gehamajjhe jaṇṇukehi vicaritvā viravantaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3362_4: mamampi anoloketvā attano sotthiṃ karonto palāyassū”ti.
atk-s0502a:3362_7: Goghātakopi goṇo viya gehamajjhe viravanto vicaritvā kālakato avīcimhi nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3362_10: Athassācariyo gāmaṃ gacchanto “evarūpaṃ nāma alaṅkāraṃ kareyyāsī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:3362_12: Athassācariyo āgantvā alaṅkāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ yattha katthaci gantvā jīvituṃ samattho”ti vayappattaṃ attano dhītaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3363_0: Athassa puttā vayappattā sippaṃ uggaṇhitvā aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ gantvā tattha gharāvāsaṃ saṇṭhapetvā vasantā saddhā pasannā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3363_1: Pitāpi nesaṃ takkasilāyaṃ kiñci kusalaṃ akatvāva jaraṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:3363_2: Athassa puttā “pitā no mahallako”ti attano santikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “pitu atthāya dānaṃ dassāmā”ti buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3363_3: Te punadivase antogehe buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nisīdāpetvā sakkaccaṃ parivisitvā bhattakiccāvasāne satthāraṃ āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3363_11: mā bālo”ti anumodanaṃ karonto imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3374_1: tvaṃ idāni chijjitvā bhūmiyaṃ patitapaṇḍupalāso viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3374_7: Pātheyyanti gamikassa taṇḍulādipātheyyaṃ viya paralokaṃ gacchantassa tava kusalapātheyyampi natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3374_8: So karohīti so tvaṃ samudde nāvāya bhinnāya dīpasaṅkhātaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ viya attano kusalapatiṭṭhaṃ karohi.
atk-s0502a:3374_12: Yo hi maraṇamukhaṃ appatvā kātuṃ samatthakāleva kusalaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:3374_16: Dibbaṃ ariyabhūminti evaṃ vīriyaṃ karonto rāgādīnaṃ malānaṃ nīhaṭatāya niddhantamalo aṅgaṇābhāvena anaṅgaṇo
atk-s0502a:3374_17: nikkileso hutvā pañcavidhaṃ suddhāvāsabhūmiṃ pāpuṇissasīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3375_0: Desanāvasāne upāsako sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3376_0: Te punadivasatthāyapi satthāraṃ nimantetvā dānaṃ datvā katabhattakiccaṃ satthāraṃ anumodanakāle āhaṃsu – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3376_3: Satthā tassa anumodanaṃ karonto imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3387_2: tvañcasi dāni tayo vaye atikkamitvā maraṇamukhe ṭhitoti attho.
atk-s0502a:3387_3: Sampayātosi yamassa santikanti maraṇamukhaṃ gantuṃ sajjo hutvā ṭhitosīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3387_4: Vāso te natthi antarāti yathā maggaṃ gacchantā tāni tāni kiccāni karontā antarāmagge vasanti,
atk-s0502a:3387_6: Na hi sakkā paralokaṃ gacchantena “adhivāsetha katipāhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3387_9: Ito pana cavitvā paraloke nibbattova hoti.
atk-s0502a:3387_12: upāsakassa pana punappunaṃ daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ idhāpi satthārā kathitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3387_16: Evaṃ santepi yathā nāma raññā attano mukhapamāṇena kabaḷaṃ vaḍḍhetvā puttassa upanīte so kumāro attano mukhapamāṇeneva gaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a:3387_17: evameva satthārā uparimaggavasena dhamme desitepi upāsako attano upanissayavasena heṭṭhā sotāpattiphalaṃ
atk-s0502a:3387_18: patvā imissā anumodanāya avasāne anāgāmiphalaṃ patto.
atk-s0502a:3390_0: Anupubbenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññatarabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3391_0: So kira ekadivasaṃ pātova nikkhamitvā bhikkhūnaṃ cīvarapārupanaṭṭhāne bhikkhū cīvaraṃ pārupante olokento aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3391_2: Athekassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ pārupantassa cīvarakaṇṇo tiṇesu pavaṭṭento ussāvabindūhi temi.
atk-s0502a:3391_3: Brāhmaṇo “imaṃ ṭhānaṃ appaharitaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti punadivase kuddālaṃ ādāya gantvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ tacchetvā khalamaṇḍalasadisaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:3391_4: Punadivasepi taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā bhikkhūsu cīvaraṃ pārupantesu ekassa cīvarakaṇṇaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patitvā paṃsumhi
atk-s0502a:3391_5: pavaṭṭamānaṃ disvā “idha vālukaṃ okirituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā vālukaṃ āharitvā okiri.
atk-s0502a:3392_1: tadāpi bhikkhūnaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupantānaṃ gattato sede muccante disvā “idha mayā maṇḍapaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā maṇḍapaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a:3392_4: Tadāpi brāhmaṇo bhikkhū olokentova ṭhito tintacīvarake bhikkhū disvā “ettha mayā sālaṃ kāretuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3392_5: sālaṃ kāretvā “idāni sālamahaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā anto ca
atk-s0502a:3392_6: bahi ca bhikkhū nisīdāpetvā bhattakiccāvasāne anumodanatthāya satthu pattaṃ gahetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3392_7: ahaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cīvarapārupanakāle imasmiṃ ṭhāne olokento ṭhito idañcidañca disvā idañcidañca kāresi”nti ādito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:3392_10: paṇḍitā nāma khaṇe khaṇe thokaṃ kusalaṃ karontā anupubbena attano akusalamalaṃ nīharantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3396_2: Khaṇe khaṇeti okāse okāse kusalaṃ karonto.
atk-s0502a:3396_3: Kammāro rajatassevāti yathā suvaṇṇakāro ekavārameva suvaṇṇaṃ tāpetvā koṭṭetvā malaṃ nīharitvā pilandhanavikatiṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:3396_4: punappunaṃ tāpento koṭṭento pana malaṃ nīharati,
atk-s0502a:3396_6: evameva punappunaṃ kusalaṃ karonto paṇḍito attano rāgādimalaṃ niddhameyya,
atk-s0502a:3397_0: Desanāvasāne brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhati, mahājanassāpi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3400_0: Ayasāva malanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tissattheraṃ nāma bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3401_0: Eko kira sāvatthivāsī kulaputto pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado tissattheroti paññāyi.
atk-s0502a:3401_1: So aparabhāge janapadavihāre vassūpagato aṭṭhahatthakaṃ thūlasāṭakaṃ labhitvā vutthavasso pavāretvā taṃ ādāya gantvā bhaginiyā hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3401_2: Sā “na me eso sāṭako bhātu anucchaviko”ti taṃ tikhiṇāya vāsiyā chinditvā hīrahīraṃ katvā udukkhale koṭṭetvā
atk-s0502a:3401_3: pavisetvā pothetvā vaṭṭetvā sukhumasuttaṃ kantitvā sāṭakaṃ vāyāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3401_4: Theropi suttañceva sūciyo ca saṃvidahitvā cīvarakārake daharasāmaṇere sannipātetvā bhaginiyā santikaṃ gantvā “taṃ me sāṭakaṃ detha,
atk-s0502a:3401_6: Sā navahatthaṃ sāṭakaṃ nīharitvā kaniṭṭhabhātikassa hatthe ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3401_7: So taṃ gahetvā vitthāretvā oloketvā “mama sāṭako thūlo aṭṭhahattho,
atk-s0502a:3401_19: So taṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā cīvarakammaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3402_0: Athassa bhaginī cīvarakārānaṃ atthāya yāgubhattādīni sampādesi.
atk-s0502a:3402_2: So cīvaraṃ oloketvā tasmiṃ uppannasineho “sve dāni naṃ pārupissāmī”ti saṃharitvā cīvaravaṃse ṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:3402_3: taṃ rattiṃ bhuttāhāraṃ jirāpetuṃ asakkonto kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva cīvare ūkā hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3402_4: Bhaginīpissa kālakiriyaṃ sutvā bhikkhūnaṃ pādesu pavattamānā rodi.
atk-s0502a:3402_5: Bhikkhū tassa sarīrakiccaṃ katvā gilānupaṭṭhākassa abhāvena saṅghasseva taṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0502a:3402_7: Sā ūkā “ime mama santakaṃ vilumpantī”ti viravantī ito cito ca sandhāvi.
atk-s0502a:3402_8: Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova dibbāya sotadhātuyā taṃ saddaṃ sutvā, “ānanda,
atk-s0502a:3402_9: tissassa cīvaraṃ abhājetvā sattāhaṃ nikkhipituṃ vadehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3402_11: Sāpi sattame divase kālaṃ katvā tusitavimāne nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3402_12: Satthā “aṭṭhame divase tissassa cīvaraṃ bhājetvā gaṇhathā”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3403_0: Bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “kasmā nu kho satthā tissassa cīvaraṃ satta divase ṭhapāpetvā aṭṭhame divase gaṇhituṃ anujānī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3403_3: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:3403_5: tisso attano cīvare ūkā hutvā nibbatto,
atk-s0502a:3403_6: tumhehi tasmiṃ bhājiyamāne ‘ime mama santakaṃ vilumpantī’ti viravantī ito cito ca dhāvi.
atk-s0502a:3403_7: Sā tumhehi cīvare gayhamāne tumhesu manaṃ padussitvā niraye nibbatteyya,
atk-s0502a:3403_10: tena vo mayā cīvaragahaṇaṃ anuññāta”nti vatvā puna tehi “bhāriyā vata ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3403_14: Yathā ayato malaṃ uṭṭhahitvā ayameva khādati vināseti aparibhogaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:3403_15: evamevāyaṃ taṇhā imesaṃ sattānaṃ abbhantare uppajjitvā te satte nirayādīsu nibbattāpeti,
atk-s0502a:3409_2: Atidhonacārinanti dhonā vuccati cattāro paccaye “idamatthaṃ ete”ti paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanapaññā,
atk-s0502a:3409_5: yathā ayato malaṃ samuṭṭhāya tato samuṭṭhitaṃ tameva khādati,
atk-s0502a:3409_6: evamevaṃ catupaccaye apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjantaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ sāni kammāni attani ṭhitattā attano santakāneva tāni kammāni duggatiṃ nayantīti.
atk-s0502a:3413_0: Asajjhāyamalāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lāludāyittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3414_2: Tesu ariyasāvakā purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ sappitelamadhuphāṇitavatthādīni gahetvā vihāraṃ gantvā dhammakathaṃ suṇanti.
atk-s0502a:3414_3: Dhammaṃ sutvā gamanakāle ca sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ guṇakathaṃ kathenti.
atk-s0502a:3414_4: Udāyitthero tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “etesaṃ tāva dhammaṃ sutvā tumhe evaṃ kathetha,
atk-s0502a:3414_5: mama dhammakathaṃ sutvā kiṃ nu kho na kathessathā”ti vadati.
atk-s0502a:3414_6: Manussā tassa kathaṃ sutvā “ayaṃ eko dhammakathiko bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:3414_7: imassapi amhehi dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti te ekadivasaṃ theraṃ yācitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3414_8: ajja amhākaṃ dhammassavanadivaso”ti saṅghassa dānaṃ datvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3414_9: tumhe amhākaṃ divā dhammakathaṃ katheyyāthā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3415_1: no dhammaṃ kathethā”ti vutte lāludāyitthero āsane nisīditvā cittabījaniṃ gahetvā cālento ekampi dhammapadaṃ adisvā “ahaṃ sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇissāmi,
atk-s0502a:3415_3: Te aññena dhammakathaṃ kathāpetvā sarabhāṇatthāya puna taṃ āsanaṃ āropayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3415_4: So punapi kiñci adisvā “ahaṃ rattiṃ kathessāmi,
atk-s0502a:3415_5: añño sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇatū”ti vatvā āsanā otari.
atk-s0502a:3415_6: Te aññena sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇāpetvā puna rattiṃ theraṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3415_7: So rattimpi kiñci adisvā “ahaṃ paccūsakāle kathessāmi,
atk-s0502a:3415_9: Te aññena rattiṃ kathāpetvā puna paccūse taṃ ānayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3415_13: tvaṃ sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ vaṇṇe kathiyamāne evañcevañca vadesi,
atk-s0502a:3415_14: idāni kasmā na kathesī”ti santajjetvā palāyantaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0502a:3416_1: “ajja lāludāyī sāriputtamoggallānānaṃ guṇakathāya pavattamānāya ussūyanto attano dhammakathikabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:3416_2: pakāsetvā manussehi sakkāraṃ katvā ‘dhammaṃ suṇomā’ti vutte catukkhattuṃ āsane nisīditvā kathetabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0502a:3416_3: kiñci apassanto ‘tvaṃ amhākaṃ ayyehi sāriputtamoggallānattherehi saddhiṃ yugaggāhaṃ gaṇhāsī’ti leḍḍudaṇḍādīni
atk-s0502a:3416_7: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:3416_9: pubbepi eso gūthakūpe nimuggoyevā”ti vatvā atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3418_0: Ehi samma nivattassu, kiṃ nu bhīto palāyasi.
atk-s0502a:3420_0: Sace yujjhitukāmosi, jayaṃ samma dadāmi te”ti. –
atk-s0502a:3421_7: kiñci pariyattiṃ uggahetvā tassā asajjhāyakaraṇaṃ malamevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3424_0: Malaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajjaṃ, pamādo rakkhato mala”nti.
atk-s0502a:3425_0: Tattha asajjhāyamalāti yākāci pariyatti vā sippaṃ vā yasmā asajjhāyantassa ananuyuñjantassa vinassati vā nirantaraṃ vā na upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0502a:3425_2: Yasmā pana gharāvāsaṃ vasantassa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇādīni akarontassa gharaṃ nāma vinassati,
atk-s0502a:3425_4: Yasmā gihissa vā pabbajitassa vā kosajjavasena sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ vā parikkhārapaṭijagganaṃ vā akarontassa kāyo dubbaṇṇo hoti,
atk-s0502a:3425_6: Yasmā gāvo rakkhantassa pamādavasena niddāyantassa vā kīḷantassa vā tā gāvo atitthapakkhandanādinā vā
atk-s0502a:3425_7: vāḷamigacorādiupaddavena vā paresaṃ sālikhettādīni otaritvā khādanavasena vināsaṃ āpajjanti,
atk-s0502a:3425_8: sayampi daṇḍaṃ vā paribhāsaṃ vā pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0502a:3425_9: pabbajitaṃ vā pana cha dvārāni arakkhantaṃ pamādavasena kilesā otaritvā sāsanā cāventi,
atk-s0502a:3425_11: So hissa vināsāvahanena malaṭṭhāniyattā malanti attho.
atk-s0502a:3429_0: Malitthiyā duccaritanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto aññataraṃ kulaputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3430_2: So kulaputto tassā aticārena lajjito kassaci sammukhībhāvaṃ upagantuṃ asakkonto buddhupaṭṭhānādīni pacchinditvā
atk-s0502a:3430_3: katipāhaccayena satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinno “kiṃ, upāsaka,
atk-s0502a:3430_7: tāsu paṇḍitena kodho na kātabbo’ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3430_8: tvaṃ pana bhavapaṭicchannattā na sallakkhesī”ti vatvā tena yācito –
atk-s0502a:3431_0: “Yathā nadī ca pantho ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā;
atk-s0502a:3432_0: Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjatī”ti. –
atk-s0502a:3433_4: avijjā pana sabbamalānaṃ uttamamala”nti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3436_0: Malā ve pāpakā dhammā, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
atk-s0502a:3439_0: Etaṃ malaṃ pahantvāna, nimmalā hotha bhikkhavo”ti.
atk-s0502a:3440_7: Yassa hi khettakasanakāle “imasmiṃ khette sampanne salākabhattādīni dassāmī”ti cintetvā nipphanne sassepi maccheraṃ uppajjitvā cāgacittaṃ nivāreti,
atk-s0502a:3440_8: so maccheravasena cāgacitte avirūhante manussasampattiṃ dibbasampattiṃ nibbānasampattinti tisso sampattiyo na labhati.
atk-s0502a:3440_12: Pāpakā dhammāti akusaladhammā pana idhaloke ca paraloke ca malameva.
atk-s0502a:3445_0: Sujīvanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷasāriṃ nāma sāriputtattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3446_0: So kira ekadivase vejjakammaṃ katvā paṇītabhojanaṃ labhitvā ādāya nikkhamanto antarāmagge theraṃ disvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3446_2: tumhe aññattha evarūpaṃ bhojanaṃ na labhissatha,
atk-s0502a:3446_4: ahaṃ te vejjakammaṃ katvā niccakālaṃ evarūpaṃ āhāraṃ āharissāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3446_5: Thero tassa vacanaṃ sutvā tuṇhībhūtova pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:3446_6: Bhikkhū vihāraṃ gantvā satthu tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:3446_8: ahiriko nāma pagabbho kākasadiso hutvā ekavīsatividhāya anesanāya ṭhatvā sukhaṃ jīvati,
atk-s0502a:3446_9: hiriottappasampanno pana dukkhaṃ jīvatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3453_1: Evarūpena hi amātarameva “mātā me”ti apitādayo eva ca “pitā me”tiādinā nayena vatvā ekavīsatividhāya anesanāya patiṭṭhāya sukhena jīvatuṃ sakkā.
atk-s0502a:3453_3: Yathā hi sūrakāko kulagharesu yāguādīni gaṇhitukāmo bhittiādīsu nisīditvā attano olokanabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0502a:3453_4: anolokento viya aññavihitako viya niddāyanto viya ca hutvā manussānaṃ pamādaṃ sallakkhetvā anupatitvā
atk-s0502a:3453_6: evamevaṃ ahirikapuggalopi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā yāgubhattaṭṭhānādīni vavatthapeti.
atk-s0502a:3453_7: Tattha bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā yāpanamattaṃ ādāya āsanasālaṃ gantvā paccavekkhantā yāguṃ pivitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3454_0: So hi bhikkhūhi “passathima”nti olokiyamānopi anolokento viya aññavihito viya niddāyanto viya gaṇṭhikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3454_1: paṭimuñcanto viya cīvaraṃ saṃvidahanto viya hutvā “asukaṃ nāma me kammaṃ atthī”ti vadanto uṭṭhāyāsanā
atk-s0502a:3454_2: gāmaṃ pavisitvā pātova vavatthapitagehesu aññataraṃ gehaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gharamānusakesu thokaṃ kavāṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:3454_3: pidhāya dvāre nisīditvā kandantesupi ekena hatthena kavāṭaṃ paṇāmetvā anto pavisati.
atk-s0502a:3454_4: Atha naṃ disvā akāmakāpi āsane nisīdāpetvā yāguādīsu yaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:3454_6: So yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā avasesaṃ pattenādāya pakkamati.
atk-s0502a:3455_1: “kiṃ pana mayaṃ na appicchā”tiādivacanena paresaṃ guṇadhaṃsanatāya dhaṃsinā.
atk-s0502a:3455_2: Tathārūpassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ayampi appicchatādiguṇe yutto”ti maññamānā manussā dātabbaṃ maññanti.
atk-s0502a:3455_3: So pana tato paṭṭhāya viññūpurisānaṃ cittaṃ ārādhetuṃ asakkonto tamhāpi lābhā parihāyati.
atk-s0502a:3455_4: Evaṃ dhaṃsipuggalo attanopi parassapi lābhaṃ nāsetiyeva.
atk-s0502a:3456_1: Paresaṃ kiccānipi attano kiccāni viya dassento pātova bhikkhūsu cetiyaṅgaṇādīsu vattaṃ katvā kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena
atk-s0502a:3456_2: thokaṃ nisīditvā uṭṭhāya gāmaṃ pavisantesu mukhaṃ dhovitvā paṇḍukāsāvapārupanaakkhiañjanasīsamakkhanādīhi
atk-s0502a:3456_3: attabhāvaṃ maṇḍetvā sammajjanto viya dve tayo sammajjanipahāre datvā dvārakoṭṭhakābhimukho hoti.
atk-s0502a:3456_5: mālāpūjaṃ karissāmā”ti āgatā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ vihāro imaṃ daharaṃ nissāya paṭijagganaṃ labhati,
atk-s0502a:3456_6: imaṃ mā pamajjitthā”ti vatvā tassa dātabbaṃ maññanti.
atk-s0502a:3456_9: Saṃkiliṭṭhena jīvitanti evaṃ jīvikaṃ kappetvā jīvantena hi puggalena saṃkiliṭṭhena hutvā jīvitaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0502a:3457_1: So hi amātādayova “mātā me”tiādīni avatvā adhammike paccaye gūthaṃ viya jigucchanto dhammena samena pariyesanto
atk-s0502a:3457_2: sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā jīvikaṃ kappento lūkhaṃ jīvikaṃ jīvatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3457_5: Suddhājīvena passatāti evarūpo hi puggalo suddhājīvo nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a:3457_6: Tena evaṃ suddhājīvena tameva suddhājīvaṃ sārato passatā lūkhajīvitavasena dujjīvaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3461_0: Yo pāṇanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañca upāsake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3462_3: dukkaraṃ rakkhāmī”ti vivādāpannā satthu santikaṃ gantvā vanditvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3462_4: Satthā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā ekasīlampi kaniṭṭhakaṃ akatvā “sabbāneva durakkhānī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3468_0: Idheva meso lokasmiṃ, mūlaṃ khaṇati attano.
atk-s0502a:3471_0: Mā taṃ lobho adhammo ca, ciraṃ dukkhāya randhayu”nti.
atk-s0502a:3472_0: Tattha yo pāṇamatipātetīti yo sāhatthikādīsu chasu payogesu ekapayogenāpi parassa jīvitindriyaṃ upacchindati.
atk-s0502a:3472_2: Loke adinnamādiyatīti imasmiṃ sattaloke theyyāvahārādīsu ekenapi avahārena parapariggahitaṃ ādiyati.
atk-s0502a:3472_3: Paradārañca gacchatīti parassa rakkhitagopitesu bhaṇḍesu aparajjhanto uppathacāraṃ carati.
atk-s0502a:3472_4: Surāmerayapānanti yassa kassaci surāya ceva merayassa ca pānaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3472_7: so pana puggalo idha lokasmiṃyeva yena khettavatthuādinā mūlena patiṭṭhapeyya,
atk-s0502a:3472_8: tampi aṭṭhapetvā vā vissajjetvā vā suraṃ pivanto attano mūlaṃ khaṇati,
atk-s0502a:3472_15: Lobho adhammo cāti lobho ceva doso ca.
atk-s0502a:3472_17: Ciraṃ dukkhāya randhayunti cirakālaṃ nirayadukkhādīnaṃ atthāya taṃ ete dhammā mā randhentu mā matthentūti attho.
atk-s0502a:3473_0: Desanāvasāne te pañca upāsakā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3476_0: Dadāti veti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto tissadaharaṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3477_0: So kira anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatino visākhāya upāsikāyāti pañcannaṃ ariyasāvakakoṭīnaṃ dānaṃ nindanto vicari,
atk-s0502a:3477_2: Tesaṃ tesaṃ dānagge sītalaṃ labhitvā “sītala”nti nindi,
atk-s0502a:3477_4: Appaṃ dentepi “kiṃ ime appamattakaṃ dentī”ti nindi,
atk-s0502a:3477_5: bahuṃ dentepi “imesaṃ gehe ṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ maññe natthi,
atk-s0502a:3477_8: Attano pana ñātake ārabbha “aho amhākaṃ ñātakānaṃ gehaṃ catūhi disāhi āgatāgatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ opānabhūta”ntiādīni vatvā pasaṃsaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0502a:3477_9: So panekassa dovārikassa putto janapadaṃ vicarantehi vaḍḍhakīhi saddhiṃ vicaranto sāvatthiṃ patvā pabbajito.
atk-s0502a:3477_10: Atha naṃ bhikkhū evaṃ manussānaṃ dānādīni nindantaṃ disvā “pariggaṇhissāma na”nti cintetvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:3477_11: tava ñātakā kahaṃ vasantī”ti pucchitvā “asukagāme nāmā”ti sutvāva katipaye dahare pesesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3477_12: Te tattha gantvā gāmavāsikehi āsanasālāya nisīdāpetvā katasakkārā pucchiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:3477_13: “imamhā gāmā nikkhamitvā pabbajito tisso nāma daharo atthi.
atk-s0502a:3477_16: kiṃ nu kho ime vadantī”ti cintetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3477_17: eko dovārikaputto vaḍḍhakīhi saddhiṃ vicaritvā pabbajitoti suṇoma,
atk-s0502a:3477_19: Daharabhikkhū tissassa tattha issarañātakānaṃ abhāvaṃ ñatvā sāvatthiṃ gantvā “akāraṇameva, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3477_20: tisso vilapanto vicaratī”ti taṃ pavattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3478_3: pubbepi vikatthakova ahosī”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3481_2: yo hi puggalo parehi appake vā bahuke vā lūkhe vā paṇīte vā dinne aññesaṃ vā datvā attano adinne maṅku hoti,
atk-s0502a:3481_3: tassa jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ vā maggaphalādīni vā na uppajjantī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3484_0: Tattha yo ca maṅku hoti, paresaṃ pānabhojane;
atk-s0502a:3485_0: Na so divā vā rattiṃ vā, samādhimadhigacchati.
atk-s0502a:3488_0: Sa ve divā vā rattiṃ vā, samādhimadhigacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3489_0: Tattha dadāti ve yathāsaddhanti lūkhapaṇītādīsu yaṃkiñci dento jano yathāsaddhaṃ attano saddhānurūpameva deti.
atk-s0502a:3489_1: Yathāpasādananti theranavādīsu cassa yasmiṃ yasmiṃ pasādo uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:3489_2: tassa dento yathāpasādanaṃ attano pasādānurūpameva deti.
atk-s0502a:3489_3: Tatthāti tasmiṃ parassa dāne “mayā appaṃ vā laddhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3489_5: Samādhinti so puggalo divā vā rattiṃ vā upacārappanāvasena vā maggaphalavasena vā samādhiṃ nādhigacchati.
atk-s0502a:3489_6: Yassa cetanti yassa puggalassa etaṃ ekesu ṭhānesu maṅkubhāvasaṅkhātaṃ akusalaṃ samucchinnaṃ mūlaghaccaṃ katvā arahattamaggañāṇena samūhataṃ,
atk-s0502a:3493_0: Natthi rāgasamo aggīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañca upāsake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3494_0: Te kira dhammaṃ sotukāmā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3494_7: Yaṃkiñci ārabbha dhammaṃ desento dhammagāravaṃ purakkhatvā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya deseti.
atk-s0502a:3494_8: Evaṃ desentassa pana tathāgatassa santike nisinnānaṃ tesaṃ eko nisinnakova niddāyi,
atk-s0502a:3495_0: Ānandatthero satthāraṃ bījayamāno tesaṃ ākāraṃ olokento satthāraṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3495_1: tumhe imesaṃ mahāmeghagajjitaṃ gajjantā viya dhammaṃ desetha,
atk-s0502a:3495_2: ete pana tumhesupi dhammaṃ kathentesu idañcidañca karontā nisinnā”ti. “Ānanda,
atk-s0502a:3495_6: Etesu hi yo esa niddāyanto nisinno,
atk-s0502a:3495_7: esa pañca jātisatāni sappayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā bhogesu sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā niddāyi,
atk-s0502a:3495_9: nāssa kaṇṇaṃ mama saddo pavisatīti. Kiṃ pana, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3495_14: kālena nāgattanti evaṃ antarantarā uppajjantassa upapattiyo sabbaññutaññāṇenāpi na sakkā paricchindituṃ.
atk-s0502a:3495_15: Paṭipāṭiyā panesa pañca jātisatāni nāgayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā niddāyantopi niddāya atittoyeva.
atk-s0502a:3495_16: Aṅguliyā bhūmiṃ likhanto nisinnapurisopi pañca jātisatāni gaṇḍuppādayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā bhūmiṃ khaṇi,
atk-s0502a:3495_17: idānipi bhūmiṃ khaṇantova mama saddaṃ na suṇāti.
atk-s0502a:3495_18: Esa rukkhaṃ cālento nisinnapurisopi paṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni makkaṭayoniyaṃ nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:3495_21: Esa ākāsaṃ ulloketvā nisinnapurisopi pañca jātisatāni nakkhattapāṭhako hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:3495_24: Esa sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇanto nisinnapuriso pana paṭipāṭiyā pañca jātisatāni tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū mantajjhāyakabrāhmaṇo hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:3495_25: idānipi mantaṃ saṃsandanto viya sakkaccaṃ suṇātīti.
atk-s0502a:3496_1: tumhākaṃ dhammadesanā chaviādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0502a:3496_2: kasmā ime tumhesupi dhammaṃ desentesu sakkaccaṃ na suṇantī”ti? “Ānanda,
atk-s0502a:3496_3: mama dhammo sussavanīyoti saññaṃ karosi maññe”ti.
atk-s0502a:3496_8: buddhoti vā dhammoti vā saṅghoti vā padaṃ imehi sattehi anekesupi kappakoṭisatasahassesu asutapubbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3496_9: Yasmā imaṃ dhammaṃ sotuṃ na sakkontā anamatagge saṃsāre ime sattā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃyeva suṇantā āgatā,
atk-s0502a:3497_1: rāgaṃ nissāya dosaṃ nissāya mohaṃ nissāya taṇhaṃ nissāya na sakkonti.
atk-s0502a:3497_4: Kiñcāpi sattasūriyapātubhāvaṃ nissāya uppanno kappavināsako aggipi kiñci anavasesetvāva lokaṃ dahati,
atk-s0502a:3497_7: tasmā rāgasamo vā aggi dosasamo vā gaho mohasamaṃ vā jālaṃ taṇhāsamā vā nadī nāma natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3500_0: Natthi mohasamaṃ jālaṃ, natthi taṇhāsamā nadī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3501_0: Tattha rāgasamoti dhūmādīsu kiñci adassetvā antoyeva uṭṭhāya jhāpanavasena rāgena samo aggi nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:3501_1: Dosasamoti yakkhagahaajagaragahakumbhilagahādayo ekasmiṃyeva attabhāve gaṇhituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:3501_2: dosagaho pana sabbattha ekantameva gaṇhātīti dosena samo gaho nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:3501_3: Mohasamanti onandhanapariyonandhanaṭṭhena pana mohasamaṃ jālaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:3501_4: Taṇhāsamāti gaṅgādīnaṃ nadīnaṃ puṇṇakālopi ūnakālopi sukkhakālopi paññāyati,
atk-s0502a:3501_5: taṇhāya pana puṇṇakālo vā sukkhakālo vā natthi,
atk-s0502a:3501_6: niccaṃ ūnāva paññāyatīti duppūraṇaṭṭhena taṇhāya samā nadī nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3502_0: Desanāvasāne sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ suṇanto upāsako sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi,
atk-s0502a:3505_0: Sudassaṃ vajjanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bhaddiyanagaraṃ nissāya jātiyāvane viharanto meṇḍakaseṭṭhiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3506_0: Satthā kira aṅguttarāpesu cārikaṃ caranto meṇḍakaseṭṭhino ca,
atk-s0502a:3506_5: dāsassa ca puṇṇassāti imesaṃ sotāpattiphalūpanissayaṃ disvā bhaddiyanagaraṃ gantvā jātiyāvane vihāsi.
atk-s0502a:3506_8: Tassa kira pacchimagehe aṭṭhakarīsamatte ṭhāne hatthiassausabhapamāṇā suvaṇṇameṇḍakā pathaviṃ bhinditvā piṭṭhiyā piṭṭhiṃ paharamānā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3506_9: Tesaṃ mukhesu pañcavaṇṇānaṃ suttānaṃ geṇḍukā pakkhittā honti.
atk-s0502a:3506_10: Sappitelamadhuphāṇitādīhi vā vatthacchādanahiraññasuvaṇṇādīhi vā atthe sati tesaṃ mukhato geṇḍuke apanenti,
atk-s0502a:3506_11: ekassāpi meṇḍakassa mukhato jambudīpavāsīnaṃ pahonakaṃ sappitelamadhuphāṇitavatthacchādanahiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ nikkhamati.
atk-s0502a:3507_1: Vipassībuddhakāle kira esa avarojassa nāma kuṭumbikassa bhāgineyyo mātulena samānanāmo avarojo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3507_2: Athassa mātulo satthu gandhakuṭiṃ kātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:3507_4: ubhopi saheva karomā”ti vatvā “ahaṃ aññehi saddhiṃ asādhāraṇaṃ katvā ekakova karissāmī”ti tena pana paṭikkhittakāle
atk-s0502a:3507_5: “imasmiṃ ṭhāne gandhakuṭiyā katāya imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kuñjarasālaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā araññato
atk-s0502a:3507_10: kāretvā gandhakuṭiyā sammukhaṭṭhāne tathāgatassa sattaratanamayaṃ kuñjarasālaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a:3507_11: Tassā upari ghanarattasuvaṇṇamayā kambalā pavāḷamayā sikharathūpikāyo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3507_12: Kuñjarasālāya majjhe ṭhāne ratanamaṇḍapaṃ kāretvā dhammāsanaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3507_15: Cattāro pana suvaṇṇameṇḍake kārāpetvā āsanassa catunnaṃ pādānaṃ heṭṭhā ṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a:3507_16: dve meṇḍake kārāpetvā pādapīṭhakāya heṭṭhā ṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a:3507_17: cha suvaṇṇameṇḍake kārāpetvā maṇḍapaṃ parikkhipento ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3507_18: Dhammāsanaṃ paṭhamaṃ suttamayehi rajjukehi vāyāpetvā majjhe suvaṇṇasuttamayehi upari muttamayehi suttehi vāyāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3507_20: Evaṃ kuñjarasālaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā sālāmahaṃ karonto aṭṭhasaṭṭhīhi bhikkhusatasahassehi saddhiṃ satthāraṃ
atk-s0502a:3507_21: nimantetvā cattāro māse dānaṃ datvā osānadivase ticīvaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3508_0: Evaṃ vipassībuddhakāle puññakammaṃ katvā tato cuto devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaranto imasmiṃ bhaddakappe
atk-s0502a:3508_1: bārāṇasiyaṃ mahābhogakule nibbattitvā bārāṇasiseṭṭhi nāma ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3508_2: So ekadivasaṃ rājūpaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto purohitaṃ disvā “kiṃ, ācariya,
atk-s0502a:3508_13: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhi bahuṃ kasikammaṃ kāretvā gehe vijjamānadhanenāpi dhaññameva gahetvā aḍḍhaterasāni koṭṭhasatāni
atk-s0502a:3508_15: Koṭṭhesu appahontesu cāṭiādīni pūretvā avasesaṃ bhūmiyaṃ āvāṭe katvā nikhaṇi.
atk-s0502a:3508_16: Nidhānāvasesaṃ mattikāya saddhiṃ madditvā bhittiyo limpāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3509_0: So aparena samayena chātakabhaye sampatte yathānikkhittaṃ dhaññaṃ paribhuñjanto koṭṭhesu ca cāṭiādīsu
atk-s0502a:3509_1: ca nikkhittadhaññe parikkhīṇe parijane pakkosāpetvā āha –
atk-s0502a:3509_3: pabbatapādaṃ pavisitvā jīvantā subhikkhakāle mama santikaṃ āgantukāmā āgacchatha,
atk-s0502a:3509_5: Te rodamānā assumukhā hutvā seṭṭhiṃ vanditvā khamāpetvā sattāhaṃ nisīditvā tathā akaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3509_6: Tassa pana santike veyyāvaccakaro ekova puṇṇo nāma dāso ohīyi,
atk-s0502a:3509_7: tena saddhiṃ seṭṭhijāyā seṭṭhiputto seṭṭhisuṇisāti pañceva janā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3509_8: Te bhūmiyaṃ āvāṭesu nihitadhaññepi parikkhīṇe bhittimattikaṃ pātetvā temetvā tato laddhadhaññena yāpayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3509_9: Athassa jāyā chātake avattharante mattikāya khīyamānāya bhittipādesu avasiṭṭhamattikaṃ pātetvā temetvā
atk-s0502a:3509_10: aḍḍhāḷhakamattaṃ vīhiṃ labhitvā koṭṭetvā ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃ gahetvā “chātakakāle corā bahū hontī”ti corabhayena
atk-s0502a:3509_11: ekasmiṃ kuṭe pakkhipitvā pidahitvā bhūmiyaṃ nikhaṇitvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3509_12: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi rājūpaṭṭhānato āgantvā āha – “bhadde, chātomhi,
atk-s0502a:3509_14: Sā vijjamānaṃ “natthī”ti avatvā “ekā taṇḍulanāḷi atthī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3509_27: Sā bhattaṃ pacitvā pañca koṭṭhāse katvā seṭṭhino koṭṭhāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purato ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3510_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe gandhamādanapabbate paccekabuddho samāpattito vuṭṭhāti.
atk-s0502a:3510_1: Antosamāpattiyaṃ kira samāpattibalena jighacchā na bādhati.
atk-s0502a:3510_2: Samāpattito vuṭṭhitānaṃ pana balavatī hutvā udarapaṭalaṃ ḍayhantī viya uppajjati.
atk-s0502a:3510_4: Taṃ divasañca tesaṃ dānaṃ datvā senāpatiṭṭhānādīsu aññatarasampattiṃ labhanti.
atk-s0502a:3510_5: Tasmā sopi dibbena cakkhunā olokento “sakalajambudīpe chātakabhayaṃ uppannaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3510_6: seṭṭhigehe ca pañcannaṃ janānaṃ nāḷikodanova pakko,
atk-s0502a:3510_8: sakkhissanti vā mama saṅgahaṃ kātu”nti tesaṃ saddhabhāvañca saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ samatthabhāvañca disvā pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a:3510_9: mahāseṭṭhissa purato dvāre ṭhitameva attānaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:3510_10: So taṃ disvā pasannacitto “pubbepi mayā dānassa adinnattā evarūpaṃ chātakaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3510_11: idaṃ kho pana bhattaṃ maṃ ekadivasameva rakkheyya.
atk-s0502a:3510_12: Ayyassa pana dinnaṃ anekāsu kappakoṭīsu mama hitasukhāvahaṃ bhavissatī”ti taṃ bhattapātiṃ apanetvā paccekabuddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:3510_13: upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā gehaṃ pavesetvā āsane nisinnassa pāde dhovitvā suvaṇṇapādapīṭhe
atk-s0502a:3510_15: Upaḍḍhāvasese bhatte paccekabuddho hatthena pattaṃ pidahi. Atha naṃ, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3510_16: ekāya taṇḍulanāḷiyā pañcannaṃ janānaṃ pakkaodanassa ayaṃ eko koṭṭhāso,
atk-s0502a:3510_19: ahaṃ niravasesaṃ dātukāmomhī”ti vatvā sabbaṃ bhattamadāsi.
atk-s0502a:3510_20: Datvā ca pana patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, “mā, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3510_22: ito paṭṭhāya sakalajambudīpavāsīnaṃ bījabhattaṃ dātuṃ samattho bhaveyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3510_23: sahatthena kammaṃ katvā jīvikaṃ na kappeyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3510_24: aḍḍhaterasa koṭṭhasatāni sodhāpetvā sīsaṃ nhāyitvā tesaṃ dvāre nisīditvā uddhaṃ olokitakkhaṇeyeva me rattasālidhārā patitvā sabbakoṭṭhe pūreyyuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3511_0: Bhariyāpissa “mama sāmike jighacchāya pīḷiyamāne na sakkā mayā bhuñjitu”nti cintetvā attano koṭṭhāsaṃ paccekabuddhassa datvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3511_1: idāni nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne evarūpaṃ chātakabhayaṃ na passeyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3511_2: bhattathālikaṃ purato katvā sakalajambudīpavāsīnaṃ bhattaṃ dentiyāpi ca me yāva na uṭṭhahissāmi,
atk-s0502a:3511_8: Puttopissa attano koṭṭhāsaṃ paccekabuddhassa datvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3511_9: ito paṭṭhāya evarūpaṃ chātakabhayaṃ na passeyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3511_10: ekañca me sahassathavikaṃ gahetvā sakalajambudīpavāsīnaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ dentassāpi ayaṃ sahassathavikā paripuṇṇāva hotu,
atk-s0502a:3512_0: Suṇisāpissa attano koṭṭhāsaṃ paccekabuddhassa datvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a:3512_2: ekañca me dhaññapiṭakaṃ purato ṭhapetvā sakalajambudīpavāsīnaṃ bījabhattaṃ dentiyāpi khīṇabhāvo mā paññāyittha,
atk-s0502a:3512_6: Dāsopi attano koṭṭhāsaṃ paccekabuddhassa datvā patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0502a:3512_11: majjhe ekāti dāruambaṇamattā satta satta sītāyo gacchantū”ti.
atk-s0502a:3512_12: So taṃ divasaṃ senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ patthetvā laddhuṃ samatthopi sāmikesu sinehena “imeyeva me sāmikā hontū”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3514_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā.
atk-s0502a:3516_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, maṇi jotiraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0502a:3517_0: Paccekabuddhagāthāhi anumodanaṃ katvā “mayā imesaṃ cittaṃ pasādetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā “yāva gandhamādanapabbatā
atk-s0502a:3517_3: So gantvā taṃ bhattaṃ pañcahi paccekabuddhasatehi saddhiṃ saṃvibhaji.
atk-s0502a:3518_0: Atikkante pana majjhanhike seṭṭhibhariyā ukkhaliṃ dhovitvā pidahitvā ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:3518_1: Seṭṭhipi jighacchāya pīḷito nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0502a:3518_4: atthi nu kho ukkhaliyā tale jhāmakasitthānī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3518_5: Sā dhovitvā ukkhaliyā ṭhapitabhāvaṃ jānantīpi “natthī”ti avatvā “ukkhaliṃ vivaritvā ācikkhissāmī”ti uṭṭhāya ukkhalimūlaṃ gantvā ukkhaliṃ vivari,
atk-s0502a:3518_6: tāvadeva sumanamakulasadisavaṇṇassa bhattassa pūrā ukkhali pidhānaṃ ukkhipitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3518_7: Sā taṃ disvāva pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīrā seṭṭhiṃ āha – “uṭṭhehi, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:3518_14: Tesu sutvā uṭṭhitesu suṇisāya saddhiṃ nisīditvā bhuñjitvā puṇṇassa bhattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3518_17: Taṃdivasameva koṭṭhādayo pubbe pūritaniyāmeneva puna pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3518_19: bījabhattehi atthikā āgantvā gaṇhantū”ti nagare ghosanaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a:3519_0: So tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devamanussesu saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde bhaddiyanagare seṭṭhikule nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3519_1: Bhariyāpissa mahābhogakule nibbattitvā vayappattā tasseva gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3519_2: Tassa taṃ pubbakammaṃ nissāya pacchāgehe pubbe vuttappakārā meṇḍakā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3519_6: Athekadivasaṃ seṭṭhi attano puññaṃ vīmaṃsitukāmo aḍḍhaterasāni koṭṭhasatāni sodhāpetvā sīsaṃ nhāto dvāre nisīditvā uddhaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0502a:3519_8: So sesānampi puññāni vīmaṃsitukāmo bhariyañca puttādayo ca “tumhākampi puññāni vīmaṃsissathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3520_0: Athassa bhariyā sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā mahājanassa passantasseva taṇḍule mināpetvā tehi bhattaṃ pacāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3520_1: dvārakoṭṭhake paññattāsane nisīditvā suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ ādāya “bhattena atthikā āgacchantū”ti ghosāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3520_4: Tassā pana purimabuddhānampi bhikkhusaṅghassa vāmahatthena ukkhaliṃ dakkhiṇahatthena kaṭacchuṃ gahetvā
atk-s0502a:3520_5: evameva patte pūretvā bhattassa dinnattā vāmahatthatalaṃ pūretvā padumalakkhaṇaṃ nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:3520_7: Yasmā pana vāmahatthato dhammakaraṇaṃ ādāya bhikkhusaṅghassa udakaṃ parissāvetvā dadamānā aparāparaṃ vicari,
atk-s0502a:3520_10: Tassā iminā kāraṇena candapadumāti nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3521_0: Puttopissa sīsaṃ nhāto sahassathavikaṃ ādāya “kahāpaṇehi atthikā āgacchantū”ti vatvā āgatāgatānaṃ gahitabhājanāni pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3521_2: Suṇisāpissa sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā vīhipiṭakaṃ ādāya ākāsaṅgaṇe nisinnā “bījabhattehi atthikā āgacchantū”ti
atk-s0502a:3521_5: Dāsopissa sabbālaṅkārehi alaṅkaritvā suvaṇṇayugesu suvaṇṇayottehi goṇe yojetvā suvaṇṇapatodayaṭṭhiṃ ādāya
atk-s0502a:3521_6: dvinnaṃ goṇānaṃ gandhapañcaṅgulikāni datvā visāṇesu suvaṇṇakosake paṭimuñcitvā khettaṃ gantvā pājesi.
atk-s0502a:3521_9: majjhe ekāti satta sītā bhijjitvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3522_0: Evaṃ mahānubhāvo seṭṭhi “satthā kira āgato”ti sutvā “satthu paccuggamanaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamanto antarāmagge titthiye disvā tehi “kasmā taṃ, gahapati,
atk-s0502a:3522_1: kiriyavādo samāno akiriyavādassa samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gacchasī”ti nivāriyamānopi tesaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3522_2: anādiyitvā gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3522_4: So desanāvasāne sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā satthu titthiyehi avaṇṇaṃ vatvā attano nivāritabhāvaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:3522_7: ime sattā nāma mahantampi attano dosaṃ na passanti,
atk-s0502a:3522_8: avijjamānampi paresaṃ dosaṃ vijjamānaṃ katvā tattha tattha bhusaṃ viya opunantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3525_0: Paresañhi so vajjāni, opunāti yathā bhusaṃ;
atk-s0502a:3526_0: Attano pana chādeti, kaliṃva kitavā saṭho”ti.
atk-s0502a:3527_0: Tattha sudassaṃ vajjanti parassa aṇumattampi vajjaṃ khalitaṃ sudassaṃ sukheneva passituṃ sakkā,
atk-s0502a:3527_2: Paresaṃ hīti teneva kāraṇena so puggalo saṅghamajjhādīsu paresaṃ vajjāni uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā bhusaṃ opunanto viya opunāti.
atk-s0502a:3527_3: Kaliṃva kitavā saṭhoti ettha sakuṇesu aparajjhanabhāvena attabhāvo kali nāma,
atk-s0502a:3527_6: Yathā sakuṇaluddako sakuṇe gahetvā māretukāmo kitavā viya attabhāvaṃ paṭicchādeti,
atk-s0502a:3531_0: Paravajjānupassissāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ujjhānasaññiṃ nāma ekaṃ theraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3532_1: evaṃ pārupatī”ti bhikkhūnaṃ antarameva gavesanto vicarati.
atk-s0502a:3532_3: thero evaṃ karotī”ti satthu ārocesuṃ. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:3532_6: Yo pana niccaṃ ujjhānasaññitāya paresaṃ antaraṃ pariyesamāno evaṃ vatvā vicarati,
atk-s0502a:3532_8: kevalaṃ āsavāyeva vaḍḍhantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3535_0: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3536_0: Tattha ujjhānasaññinoti evaṃ nivāsetabbaṃ evaṃ pārupitabbanti paresaṃ antaragavesitāya ujjhānabahulassa puggalassa jhānādīsu ekadhammopi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a:3536_2: Teneva kāraṇena so arahattamaggasaṅkhātā āsavakkhayā ārā dūraṃ gatova hotīti.
atk-s0502a:3540_0: Ākāseti idaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane parinibbānamañcake nipanno subhaddaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3541_0: So kira atīte kaniṭṭhabhātari ekasmiṃ sasse navakkhattuṃ aggadānaṃ dente dānaṃ dātuṃ anicchanto osakkitvā avasāne adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3541_1: Tasmā paṭhamabodhiyampi majjhimabodhiyampi satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ nālattha.
atk-s0502a:3541_2: Pacchimabodhiyaṃ pana satthu parinibbānakāle “ahaṃ tīsu pañhesu attano kaṅkhaṃ mahallake paribbājake
atk-s0502a:3541_3: pucchitvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ ‘daharo’ti saññāya na pucchiṃ,
atk-s0502a:3541_5: pacchā me samaṇassa gotamassa apucchitakāraṇā vippaṭisāro uppajjeyyā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ānandattherena nivāriyamānopi satthārā okāsaṃ katvā, “ānanda,
atk-s0502a:3541_7: pucchatu maṃ pañha”nti vutte antosāṇiṃ pavisitvā heṭṭhāmañcake nisinno,
atk-s0502a:3541_9: kiṃ nu kho ākāse padaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0502a:3541_11: saṅkhārā sassatā nāma atthī”ti ime pañhe pucchi.
atk-s0502a:3541_12: Athassa satthā tesaṃ abhāvaṃ ācikkhanto imāhi gāthāhi dhammaṃ desesi –
atk-s0502a:3548_0: Tattha padanti imasmiṃ ākāse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavasena evarūpanti paññāpetabbaṃ kassaci padaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:3548_1: Bāhireti mama sāsanato bahiddhā maggaphalaṭṭho samaṇo nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:3548_2: Pajāti ayaṃ sattalokasaṅkhātā pajā taṇhādīsu papañcesuyevābhiratā.
atk-s0502a:3548_3: Nippapañcāti bodhimūleyeva sabbapapañcānaṃ samucchinnattā nippapañcā tathāgatā.
atk-s0502a:3548_5: Tesu hi ekopi sassato nāma natthi.
atk-s0502a:3548_6: Iñjitanti buddhānaṃ pana taṇhāmānādīsu iñjitesu yena saṅkhārā sassatāti gaṇheyya,
atk-s0502a:3548_7: taṃ ekaṃ iñjitampi nāma natthīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3549_0: Desanāvasāne subhaddo anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattaparisāyapi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3555_0: Na tena hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto vinicchayamahāmatte ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3556_0: Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū sāvatthiyaṃ uttaradvāragāme piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā nagaramajjhena vihāraṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0502a:3556_2: Te sammukhāgataṃ vinicchayasālaṃ pavisitvā vinicchayamahāmatte lañjaṃ gahetvā sāmike asāmike karonte disvā “aho ime adhammikā,
atk-s0502a:3556_3: mayaṃ pana ‘ime dhammena vinicchayaṃ karontī’ti saññino ahumhā”ti cintetvā vasse vigate vihāraṃ gantvā
atk-s0502a:3556_4: satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisinnā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3556_7: chandādivasikā hutvā sāhasena atthaṃ vinicchinantā dhammaṭṭhā nāma honti,
atk-s0502a:3556_8: aparādhaṃ pana anuvijjitvā aparādhānurūpaṃ asāhasena vinicchayaṃ karontā eva dhammaṭṭhā nāma hontī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3558_0: “Na tena hoti dhammaṭṭho, yenatthaṃ sāhasā naye;
atk-s0502a:3559_0: Yo ca atthaṃ anatthañca, ubho niccheyya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a:3563_1: Dhammaṭṭhoti rājā hi attano kātabbe vinicchayadhamme ṭhitopi dhammaṭṭho nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a:3563_4: Sāhasā nayeti chandādīsu patiṭṭhito sāhasena musāvādena viniccheyya.
atk-s0502a:3563_5: Yo hi chande patiṭṭhāya ñātīti vā mittoti vā musā vatvā asāmikameva sāmikaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:3563_6: dose patiṭṭhāya attano verīnaṃ musā vatvā sāmikameva asāmikaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:3563_7: mohe patiṭṭhāya lañjaṃ gahetvā vinicchayakāle aññavihito viya ito cito ca olokento musā vatvā “iminā jitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3563_9: bhaye patiṭṭhāya kassacideva issarajātikassa parājayaṃ pāpuṇantassāpi jayaṃ āropeti,
atk-s0502a:3563_11: Eso dhammaṭṭho nāma na hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3563_13: Ubho niccheyyāti yo pana paṇḍito ubho atthānatthe vinicchinitvā vadati.

atk-s0502a:3582_7: ayaṃ vanasaṇḍo dhammassavanadivase devatānaṃ sādhukārasaddena ekaninnādo hotīti.
atk-s0502a:3582_12: dhammassavanadivase imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe devatā mahantena saddena sādhukāraṃ dentīti vadesi,

atk-s0502a:3582_15: na ajja pana jānāmi “kimeta”nti. “Tena hi, āvuso,

atk-s0502a:3582_19: Atha nesaṃ parivārā bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu “imasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe devatā mukholokanena sādhukāraṃ dadanti,

atk-s0502a:3582_22: Tepi vihāraṃ gantvā satthu tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3583_2: yo bahumpi uggaṇhati vā bhāsati vā,

atk-s0502a:3598_0: “Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṃsā saṃyamo damo;
atk-s0502a:3599_0: Sa ve vantamalo dhīro, thero iti pavuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3600_2: Moghajiṇṇoti anto therakarānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhāvena tucchajiṇṇo nāma.

atk-s0502a:3604_0: Na vākkaraṇamattenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3605_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye dahare ceva sāmaṇere ca attano dhammācariyānameva cīvararajanādīni veyyāvaccāni karonte disvā ekacce therā cintayiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:3605_3: Yaṃnūna mayaṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadeyyāma, ‘bhante,
atk-s0502a:3605_5: aññesaṃ santike dhammaṃ uggaṇhitvāpi imesaṃ santike asodhetvā mā sajjhāyitthāti daharasāmaṇere āṇāpethā’ti.
atk-s0502a:3606_0: Satthā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “imasmiṃ sāsane paveṇivaseneva evaṃ vattuṃ labhati,
atk-s0502a:3606_1: ime pana lābhasakkāre nissitāti ñatvā ahaṃ tumhe vākkaraṇamattena sādhurūpāti na vadāmi.
atk-s0502a:3606_2: Yassa panete issādayo dhammā arahattamaggena samucchinnā,
atk-s0502a:3606_3: eso eva sādhurūpo”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3609_0: Sādhurūpo naro hoti, issukī maccharī saṭho.
atk-s0502a:3613_2: Naroti ettakeneva kāraṇena paralābhādīsu issāmanako pañcavidhena maccherena samannāgato kerāṭikabhāvena saṭho naro sādhurūpo na hoti.
atk-s0502a:3613_3: Yassa cetanti yassa ca puggalassetaṃ issādidosajātaṃ arahattamaggañāṇena samūlakaṃ chinnaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3613_5: so vantadoso dhammojapaññāya samannāgato sādhurūpoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3617_0: Na muṇḍakena samaṇoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto hatthakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3618_0: So kira vādakkhitto “tumhe asukavelāya asukaṭṭhānaṃ nāma āgaccheyyātha,
atk-s0502a:3618_1: vādaṃ karissāmā”ti vatvā puretarameva tattha gantvā “passatha,
atk-s0502a:3618_3: esova pana nesaṃ parājayo”tiādīni vatvā vādakkhitto aññenaññaṃ paṭicaranto vicarati.
atk-s0502a:3618_4: Satthā “hatthako kira evaṃ karotī”ti sutvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, hatthaka,
atk-s0502a:3618_7: Evarūpañhi musāvādaṃ karonto sīsamuṇḍanādimatteneva samaṇo nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a:3618_8: Yo pana aṇūni vā thūlāni vā pāpāni sametvā ṭhito,
atk-s0502a:3618_9: ayameva samaṇo”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3623_0: “Yo ca sameti pāpāni, aṇuṃ thūlāni sabbaso;
atk-s0502a:3625_1: Abbatoti sīlavatena ca dhutaṅgavatena ca virahito.
atk-s0502a:3625_2: Alikaṃ bhaṇanti musāvādaṃ bhaṇanto asampattesu ārammaṇesu icchāya pattesu ca lobhena samannāgato samaṇo nāma kiṃ bhavissati?
atk-s0502a:3625_3: Sametīti yo ca parittāni vā mahantāni vā pāpāni vūpasameti,
atk-s0502a:3625_4: so tesaṃ samitattā samaṇoti pavuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3629_0: Na tena bhikkhu so hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3630_0: So kira bāhirasamaye pabbajitvā bhikkhaṃ caranto cintesi –
atk-s0502a:3630_1: “samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake bhikkhāya caraṇena ‘bhikkhū’ti vadati,
atk-s0502a:3630_9: Na hi vissaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya vattanto bhikkhu nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a:3630_11: so bhikkhu nāmā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3632_0: “Na tena bhikkhu so hoti, yāvatā bhikkhate pare;
atk-s0502a:3633_0: Vissaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
atk-s0502a:3636_0: Saṅkhāya loke carati, sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3637_1: tena bhikkhanamattena bhikkhu nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a:3637_3: vissagandhaṃ vā kāyakammādikaṃ dhammaṃ samādāya caranto bhikkhu nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a:3637_4: Yodhāti yo idha sāsane ubhayampetaṃ puññañca pāpañca maggabrahmacariyena bāhetvā panuditvā brahmacariyavā hoti.

atk-s0502a:3641_0: Na monenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto titthiye ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3642_5: evarūpaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”tiādinā nayena maṅgalaṃ vatvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0502a:3642_6: Bhikkhū pana paṭhamabodhiyaṃ anumodanādīnaṃ ananuññātakāle bhattagge manussānaṃ anumodanaṃ akatvā pakkamanti.

atk-s0502a:3643_7: pāpavūpasamena pana muni nāma hotī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3646_0: Yo ca tulaṃva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a:3648_0: “Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa munī tena so muni;
