atk-s0502a:3650_0: Tattha na monenāti kāmañhi moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātena maggañāṇamonena muni nāma hoti,
atk-s0502a:3650_4: Evarūpo hi tuṇhībhūtopi muni nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a:3650_5: Atha vā monena muni nāma na hoti,
atk-s0502a:3650_6: tucchasabhāvo pana aviññū ca hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3650_7: Yo ca tulaṃva pagayhāti yathā hi tulaṃ gahetvā ṭhito atirekaṃ ce hoti, harati.
atk-s0502a:3650_10: Evameva yo atirekaṃ haranto viya pāpaṃ harati parivajjeti,
atk-s0502a:3650_12: Evañca pana karonto sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanasaṅkhātaṃ varaṃ uttamameva ādāya pāpāni akusalakammāni parivajjeti.
atk-s0502a:3650_13: Sa munīti so muni nāmāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3650_14: Tena so munīti kasmā pana so munīti ce?
atk-s0502a:3650_17: So munāti ubho loketi yo puggalo imasmiṃ khandhādiloke tulaṃ āropetvā minanto viya “ime ajjhattikā khandhā,
atk-s0502a:3650_18: ime bāhirā”tiādinā nayena ime ubho atthe munāti.
atk-s0502a:3650_19: Muni tena pavuccatīti tena kāraṇena munīti vuccatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3654_0: Na tena ariyo hotīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ ariyaṃ nāma bālisikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3655_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā tassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayaṃ disvā sāvatthiyā uttaradvāragāme piṇḍāya caritvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tato āgacchati.
atk-s0502a:3655_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe so bālisiko balisena macche gaṇhanto buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā balisayaṭṭhiṃ chaḍḍetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3655_2: Satthā tassa avidūre ṭhāne nivattitvā ṭhito “tvaṃ kiṃ nāmosī”ti sāriputtattherādīnaṃ nāmāni pucchi.
atk-s0502a:3655_3: Tepi “ahaṃ sāriputto ahaṃ moggallāno”ti attano attano nāmāni kathayiṃsu.

atk-s0502a:3657_0: “Na tena ariyo hoti, yena pāṇāni hiṃsati;
atk-s0502a:3659_4: Yo pana sabbapāṇānaṃ pāṇiādīhi ahiṃsanena mettādibhāvanāya patiṭṭhitattā hiṃsato ārāva ṭhito,
atk-s0502a:3660_0: Desanāvasāne bālisiko sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3663_0: Na sīlabbatamattenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule sīlādisampanne bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.

atk-s0502a:3665_2: bhikkhunā nāma parisuddhasīlādimattakena vā anāgāmisukhappattamattakena vā ‘appakaṃ no bhavadukkha’nti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati,

atk-s0502a:3672_0: Tattha sīlabbatamattenāti catupārisuddhisīlamattena vā terasadhutaṅgamattena vā.

atk-s0502a:3672_9: bhikkhu iminā sampannasīlādibhāvamattakeneva “mayhaṃ bhavo appako parittako”ti āsavakkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ
atk-s0502a:3672_10: appatto hutvā bhikkhu nāma vissāsaṃ nāpajjeyya.
atk-s0502a:3672_11: Yathā hi appamattakopi gūtho duggandho hoti,
atk-s0502a:3673_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahaṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3679_0: Maggānaṭṭhaṅgikoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3680_0: Te kira satthari janapadacārikaṃ caritvā puna sāvatthiṃ āgate upaṭṭhānasālāya nisīditvā “asukagāmato asukagāmassa maggo samo,

atk-s0502a:3680_4: Satthā tesaṃ arahattassūpanissayaṃ disvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ āgantvā paññattāsane nisinno “kāya nuttha,

atk-s0502a:3680_9: bhikkhunā nāma ariyamagge kammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:3680_10: evañhi karonto bhikkhu sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3689_0: Akkhāto vo mayā maggo, aññāya sallakantanaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3693_0: Tattha maggānaṭṭhaṅgikoti jaṅghamaggādayo vā hontu dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatamaggā vā,
atk-s0502a:3693_1: tesaṃ sabbesampi maggānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi micchādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ pahānaṃ karonto
atk-s0502a:3693_2: nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsupi saccesu dukkhaparijānanādikiccaṃ sādhayamāno aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seṭṭho uttamo.
atk-s0502a:3693_3: Saccānaṃ caturo padāti “saccaṃ bhaṇe na kujjheyyā”ti āgataṃ vacīsaccaṃ vā hotu,
atk-s0502a:3693_4: “sacco brāhmaṇo sacco khattiyo”tiādibhedaṃ sammutisaccaṃ vā “idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti diṭṭhisaccaṃ
atk-s0502a:3693_6: sabbesampi imesaṃ saccānaṃ parijānitabbaṭṭhena sacchikātabbaṭṭhena pahātabbaṭṭhena bhāvetabbaṭṭhena ekapaṭivedhaṭṭhena
atk-s0502a:3693_7: ca tathapaṭivedhaṭṭhena ca dukkhaṃ ariyasaccantiādayo caturo padā seṭṭhā nāma.
atk-s0502a:3693_11: virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”ti vacanato sabbadhammānaṃ nibbānasaṅkhāto virāgo seṭṭho.
atk-s0502a:3693_12: Dvipadānañca cakkhumāti sabbesaṃ devamanussādibhedānaṃ dvipadānaṃ pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā tathāgatova seṭṭho. Ca-
atk-s0502a:3694_0: Dassanassa visuddhiyāti maggaphaladassanassa visuddhatthaṃ yo mayā “seṭṭho”ti vutto,
atk-s0502a:3694_3: Etañhi tumheti tasmā tumhe etameva paṭipajjatha.
atk-s0502a:3694_4: Mārassetaṃ pamohananti etaṃ māramohanaṃ māramanthananti vuccati.
atk-s0502a:3694_5: Dukkhassantanti sakalassapi vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ paricchedaṃ karissathāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3694_6: Aññāya sallakantananti rāgasallādīnaṃ kantanaṃ nimmathanaṃ abbūhaṇaṃ etaṃ maggaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3694_7: mayā vinā anussavādīhi attapaccakkhato ñatvāva ayaṃ maggo akkhāto,
atk-s0502a:3694_8: idāni tumhehi kilesānaṃ ātāpanena “ātappa”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ tassa adhigamatthāya sammappadhānavīriyaṃ kiccaṃ karaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3694_10: Tasmā tehi akkhātavasena ye paṭipannā dvīhi jhānehi jhāyino,
atk-s0502a:3695_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3698_0: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcasate bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3699_0: Te kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gantvā araññe vāyamantāpi arahattaṃ appatvā “visesetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3699_2: Satthā “kiṃ nu kho imesaṃ sappāya”nti vīmaṃsanto “ime kassapabuddhakāle vīsati vassasahassāni aniccalakkhaṇe anuyuñjiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3699_3: tasmā aniccalakkhaṇeneva tesaṃ ekaṃ gāthaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0502a:3699_5: kāmabhavādīsu sabbepi saṅkhārā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā evā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3702_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3703_0: Tattha sabbe saṅkhārāti kāmabhavādīsu uppannā khandhā tattha tattheva nirujjhanato aniccāti yadā vipassanāpaññāya passati,
atk-s0502a:3703_3: Esa maggo visuddhiyāti visuddhatthāya vodānatthāya esa maggoti attho.
atk-s0502a:3704_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattaparisānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3707_1: Tadā hi bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇe katābhiyogabhāvaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0502a:3707_3: sabbepi khandhā paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā evā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3710_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3711_0: Tattha dukkhāti paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena dukkhā. Sesaṃ purimasadisameva.
atk-s0502a:3714_1: Kevalañhi ettha bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pubbe anattalakkhaṇe anuyuttabhāvaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0502a:3714_3: sabbepi khandhā avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā evā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3717_0: Atha nibbindati dukkhe, esa maggo visuddhiyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3718_0: Tattha sabbe dhammāti pañcakkhandhā eva adhippetā.
atk-s0502a:3718_1: Anattāti “mā jīyantu mā mīyantū”ti vase vattetuṃ na sakkāti avasavattanaṭṭhena anattā attasuññā assāmikā anissarāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3721_0: Uṭṭhānakālamhīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto padhānakammikatissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3722_0: Sāvatthivāsino kira pañcasatā kulaputtā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3722_2: Avasesā araññe samaṇadhammaṃ karontā arahattaṃ patvā “paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ satthu ārocessāmā”ti puna sāvatthiṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3722_3: Te sāvatthito yojanamatte ekasmiṃ gāmake piṇḍāya carante disvā eko upāsako yāgubhattādīhi patimānetvā anumodanaṃ sutvā punadivasatthāyapi nimantesi.
atk-s0502a:3722_4: Te tadaheva sāvatthiṃ gantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā sāyanhasamaye satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3722_5: Satthā tehi saddhiṃ ativiya tuṭṭhiṃ pavedayamāno paṭisanthāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:3723_0: Atha nesaṃ tattha ohīno sahāyakabhikkhu cintesi –
atk-s0502a:3723_1: “satthu imehi saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karontassa mukhaṃ nappahoti,
atk-s0502a:3723_2: mayhaṃ pana maggaphalābhāvena mayā saddhiṃ na katheti,
atk-s0502a:3723_3: ajjeva arahattaṃ patvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā mayā saddhiṃ kathāpessāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3723_5: mayaṃ āgamanamagge ekena upāsakena svātanāya nimantitā,
atk-s0502a:3723_7: Atha nesaṃ sahāyako bhikkhu sabbarattiṃ caṅkamanto niddāvasena caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ ekasmiṃ pāsāṇaphalake pati,
atk-s0502a:3723_10: Tassa te sahāyakā bhikkhū saddaṃ sañjānitvā ito cito ca upadhāviṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3723_11: Tesaṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā tassa kattabbakiccaṃ karontānaṃyeva aruṇo uṭṭhahi,
atk-s0502a:3723_12: te taṃ gāmaṃ gantuṃ okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3723_20: pubbepi akāsiyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3726_1: Tadā kira te bhikkhū pañcasatā māṇavakā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:3727_2: yo hi uṭṭhānakāle uṭṭhānaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0502a:3727_4: kusīto so jhānādibhedaṃ visesaṃ nādhigacchatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3733_1: Yuvā balīti paṭhamayobbane ṭhito balasampannopi hutvā alasabhāvena upeto hoti,
atk-s0502a:3733_5: Alasoti mahāalaso paññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ ariyamaggaṃ apassanto na vindati,
atk-s0502a:3737_0: Vācānurakkhīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sūkarapetaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3738_0: Ekasmiñhi divase mahāmoggallānatthero lakkhaṇattherena saddhiṃ gijjhakūṭā orohanto ekasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0502a:3738_2: hetu sitassa pātukammāyā”ti lakkhaṇattherena puṭṭho “akālo, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:3738_4: satthu santike maṃ puccheyyāthā”ti vatvā lakkhaṇattherena saddhiṃyeva rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto
atk-s0502a:3738_6: Atha naṃ lakkhaṇatthero tamatthaṃ pucchi. So āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:3738_13: Svāhaṃ ‘na me evarūpo satto diṭṭhapubbo’ti taṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi”nti.
atk-s0502a:3738_16: mama sāvakā viharantī”ti vatvā “ahampetaṃ sattaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva addasaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3738_18: tesaṃ ahitāya assā’ti paresaṃ anukampāya na kathesiṃ.
atk-s0502a:3738_19: Idāni moggallānaṃ sakkhiṃ katvā kathemi. Saccaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3738_27: suṇāthā”ti atītaṃ āharitvā tassa pubbakammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3739_0: Kassapabuddhakāle kira ekasmiṃ gāmakāvāse dve therā samaggavāsaṃ vasiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3739_5: Tesaṃ ekamātukucchiyaṃ vutthabhātūnaṃ viya samaggavāsaṃ vasantānaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ eko dhammakathiko āgami.
atk-s0502a:3739_7: Therā naṃ saṅgaṇhitvā “dhammakathaṃ no kathehi sappurisā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3739_9: Therā “dhammakathiko no laddho”ti tuṭṭhacittā punadivase taṃ ādāya dhuragāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā tattha katabhattakiccā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:3739_10: hiyyo kathitaṭṭhānatova thokaṃ dhammaṃ kathehī”ti manussānaṃ dhammaṃ kathāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3739_12: Evaṃ samantā bhikkhācāragāmesu dve dve divase taṃ ādāya piṇḍāya cariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3740_2: mayā ubhopete palāpetvā imasmiṃ vihāre vasituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3740_3: So sāyaṃ therūpaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ uṭṭhāya gatakāle nivattitvā mahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3740_6: kathā nāmesā mahāsāvajjā”ti vatvā akathetvāva pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:3740_8: So dutiyadivase tatheva katvā tatiyadivase tesaṃ ativiya kotuhale uppanne mahātheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3740_10: tumhākaṃ pana santike vattuṃ na visahāmī”ti vatvā therena “hotu, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:3740_19: Mayā etassa ettakaṃ kālaṃ aguṇo nāma na diṭṭhapubboti? Evaṃ, bhanteti.
atk-s0502a:3740_24: ayaṃ mahāthero lajjī pesaloti etena saddhiṃ saṃbhogaṃ karonto upaparikkhitvā kareyyāsī”ti evamesa maṃ āgatadivasato paṭṭhāya vadatīti.
atk-s0502a:3741_0: Mahāthero taṃ sutvāva kuddhamānaso daṇḍābhihataṃ kulālabhājanaṃ viya bhijji.
atk-s0502a:3741_1: Itaropi uṭṭhāya anutherassa santikaṃ gantvā tatheva avoca,
atk-s0502a:3741_3: Tesu kiñcāpi ettakaṃ kālaṃ ekopi visuṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhapubbo nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:3741_4: punadivase pana visuṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā anuthero puretaraṃ āgantvā upaṭṭhānasālāya aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0502a:3741_11: mayā attano vattaṃ hāpetuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti cittaṃ mudukaṃ katvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3741_15: na tvaṃ mama pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yuttarūpo”ti accharaṃ paharitvā tenapi “āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3741_16: ahampi tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ na paṭiggaṇhāmīti cintesi”nti vutte,
atk-s0502a:3741_19: mama imasmiṃ vihāre koci saṅgo atthī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3741_21: kiṃ evaṃ maññatha ‘mama imasmiṃ vihāre koci saṅgo atthī’ti,
atk-s0502a:3741_22: eso te vihāro”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:3741_24: Te ubhopi ekamaggenāpi agantvā eko pacchimadvārena maggaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a:3741_28: mā evaṃ karothā”ti vatvā “tiṭṭhāvuso”ti vutte nivatti.
atk-s0502a:3741_32: tumhākaṃ kulupakā hiyyo kalahaṃ katvā nikkhamiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3741_35: Paṇḍitā pana “amhehi ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhaddantānaṃ kiñci khalitaṃ nāma na diṭṭhapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3741_36: tesaṃ bhayaṃ imaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ bhavissatī”ti domanassappattā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3742_0: Tepi therā gataṭṭhāne cittasukhaṃ nāma na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3742_9: Tesaṃ neva sajjhāyo na manasikāro ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3742_10: Te vassasataccayena pacchimadisāya ekaṃ vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3742_12: Mahāthere pavisitvā mañcake nisinne itaropi pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:3742_13: Mahāthero taṃ disvāva sañjānitvā assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:3742_14: Itaropi mahātheraṃ sañjānitvā assupuṇṇehi nettehi “kathemi nu kho mā kathemī”ti cintetvā “na taṃ saddheyyarūpa”nti theraṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3742_15: ettakaṃ kālaṃ tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vicariṃ,
atk-s0502a:3742_16: api nu kho me kāyadvārādīsu tumhehi kiñci asāruppaṃ diṭṭhapubba”nti.
atk-s0502a:3742_18: Atha kasmā dhammakathikaṃ avacuttha “mā etena saddhiṃ saṃbhogamakāsī”ti? “Nāhaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:3742_20: tayā kira mama antare evaṃ vutta”nti. “Ahampi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3742_22: Te tasmiṃ khaṇe “tena amhe bhinditukāmena evaṃ vuttaṃ bhavissatī”ti ñatvā aññamaññaṃ accayaṃ desayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3742_23: Te vassasataṃ cittassādaṃ alabhantā taṃ divasaṃ samaggā hutvā “āyāma,
atk-s0502a:3742_24: naṃ tato vihārā nikkaḍḍhissāmā”ti pakkamitvā anupubbena taṃ vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3743_0: Dhammakathikopi there disvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetuṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0502a:3743_1: Therā “na tvaṃ imasmiṃ vihāre vasituṃ yuttarūpo”ti accharaṃ pahariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3743_2: So saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto tāvadeva nikkhamitvā palāyi.
atk-s0502a:3743_3: Atha naṃ vīsati vassasahassāni kato samaṇadhammo sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0502a:3743_4: tato cavitvā avīcimhi nibbatto ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ paccitvā idāni gijjhakūṭe vuttappakārena attabhāvena dukkhaṃ anubhotīti.
atk-s0502a:3744_2: bhikkhunā nāma kāyādīhi upasantarūpena bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3750_1: catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ vajjanena vācānurakkhī abhijjhādīnaṃ anuppādanena manasā ca suṭṭhu saṃvuto
atk-s0502a:3750_2: pāṇātipātādayo pajahanto kāyena ca akusalaṃ na kayirā.
atk-s0502a:3750_4: Evaṃ visodhento hi sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esakehi buddhādīhi isīhi paveditaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ ārādheyyāti.
atk-s0502a:3754_0: Yogā veti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto poṭṭhilaṃ nāma theraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3755_0: So kira sattannampi buddhānaṃ sāsane tepiṭako pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ dhammaṃ vācesi.
atk-s0502a:3755_2: “imassa bhikkhuno ‘attano dukkhanissaraṇaṃ karissāmī’ti cittampi natthi saṃvejessāmi na”nti.
atk-s0502a:3755_3: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ theraṃ attano upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatakāle “ehi,
atk-s0502a:3755_11: pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ aṭṭhārasa mahāgaṇe dhammaṃ vācemi,
atk-s0502a:3755_14: addhā maṃ satthā jhānādīnaṃ abhāvena evaṃ vadetī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3755_15: So uppannasaṃvego “dāni araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī”ti sayameva pattacīvaraṃ saṃvidahitvā
atk-s0502a:3755_16: paccūsakāle sabbapacchā dhammaṃ uggaṇhitvā nikkhamantena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:3755_17: Pariveṇe nisīditvā sajjhāyantā naṃ “ācariyo”ti na sallakkhesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3755_18: So vīsayojanasatamaggaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ araññāvāse tiṃsa bhikkhū vasanti,
atk-s0502a:3755_22: amhehi nāma taṃ nissāya kiñci jānitabbaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a:3755_27: Atha naṃ mahāthero “imassa uggahaṃ nissāya māno atthiyevā”ti anutherassa santikaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:3755_29: Iminā nīhārena sabbepi taṃ pesentā divāṭṭhāne nisīditvā sūcikammaṃ karontassa sabbanavakassa sattavassikasāmaṇerassa santikaṃ pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3756_0: So nihatamāno sāmaṇerassa santike añjaliṃ paggahetvā “avassayo me hohi sappurisā”ti āha. Aho, ācariya,
atk-s0502a:3756_3: tumhākaṃ santike mayā kiñci kāraṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ bhaveyyāti.
atk-s0502a:3756_11: Atha naṃ so avidūre ekaṃ saraṃ dassetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3756_13: So hissa mahagghānaṃ dupaṭṭacīvarānaṃ nivatthapārutabhāvaṃ ñatvāpi “ovādakkhamo nu kho”ti vīmaṃsanto evamāha.
atk-s0502a:3756_16: bhante”ti vatvā ekavacaneneva āgantvā ṭhitaṃ āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3756_18: tattha ekena chiddena godhā anto paviṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a:3756_19: taṃ gaṇhitukāmo itarāni pañca chiddāni thaketvā chaṭṭhaṃ bhinditvā paviṭṭhachiddeneva gaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a:3756_20: evaṃ tumhepi chadvārikesu ārammaṇesu sesāni pañcadvārāni pidhāya manodvāre kammaṃ paṭṭhapethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3756_21: Bahussutassa bhikkhuno ettakeneva padīpujjalanaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3756_22: So “ettakameva hotu sappurisā”ti karajakāye ñāṇaṃ otāretvā samaṇadhammaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:3757_0: Satthā vīsayojanasatamatthake nisinnova taṃ bhikkhuṃ oloketvā “yathevāyaṃ bhikkhu bhūripañño,
atk-s0502a:3757_1: evamevaṃ anena attānaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā tena saddhiṃ kathento viya obhāsaṃ pharitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3760_0: Etaṃ dvedhāpathaṃ ñatvā, bhavāya vibhavāya ca;
atk-s0502a:3762_0: Tattha yogāti aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu yoniso manasikārā.
atk-s0502a:3762_4: Bhavāya vibhavāya cāti vuddhiyā ca avuddhiyā ca.
atk-s0502a:3762_5: Tathāti yathā ayaṃ bhūrisaṅkhātā paññā pavaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a:3766_0: Vanaṃ chindathāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule mahallake bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3767_0: Te kira gihikāle sāvatthiyaṃ kuṭumbikā mahaddhanā aññamaññasahāyakā ekato puññāni karontā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā “mayaṃ mahallakā,
atk-s0502a:3767_1: kiṃ no gharāvāsenā”ti satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā pabbajiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3767_2: mahallakabhāvena pana dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇituṃ asakkontā vihārapariyante paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā ekatova vasiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3767_3: Piṇḍāya carantāpi yebhuyyena puttadārasseva gehaṃ gantvā bhuñjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3767_6: Kasmā sabbepi attanā laddhāhāraṃ gahetvā tassā eva gehe nisīditvā bhuñjanti?
atk-s0502a:3767_9: Atha te mahallakattherā sahāyakassa therassa paṇṇasālāya sannipatitvā aññamaññaṃ gīvāsu gahetvā “madhurapācikā upāsikā kālakatā”ti vilapantā rodiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3767_14: Idāni kuto tathārūpiṃ labhissāmāti iminā kāraṇena rodāmā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3768_3: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:3768_5: pubbepi te kākayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā samuddatīre caramānā samuddaūmiyā samuddaṃ pavesetvā māritāya kākiyā
atk-s0502a:3768_6: roditvā paridevitvā taṃ nīharissāmāti mukhatuṇḍakehi mahāsamuddaṃ ussiñcantā kilamiṃsū”ti atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:3771_0: Imaṃ kākajātakaṃ vitthāretvā te bhikkhū āmantetvā,
atk-s0502a:3771_2: rāgadosamohavanaṃ nissāya tumhehi idaṃ dukkhaṃ pattaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3771_4: evaṃ niddukkhā bhavissathā”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3773_0: “Vanaṃ chindatha mā rukkhaṃ, vanato jāyate bhayaṃ;
atk-s0502a:3774_0: Chetvā vanañca vanathañca, nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo.
atk-s0502a:3780_0: Tattha mā rukkhanti satthārā hi “vanaṃ chindathā”ti vutte tesaṃ acirapabbajitānaṃ “satthā amhe vāsiādīni
atk-s0502a:3780_1: gahetvā vanaṃ chindāpetī”ti rukkhaṃ chinditukāmatā uppajji.
atk-s0502a:3780_6: Vanañca vanathañcāti ettha mahantā rukkhā vanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a:3780_7: khuddakā tasmiṃ vane ṭhitattā vanathā nāma.
atk-s0502a:3780_10: Evameva mahantamahantā bhavākaḍḍhanakā kilesā vanaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a:3780_18: Yāva hi vanathoti yāva esa aṇumattopi kilesavanatho narassa nārīsu na chijjati,
atk-s0502a:3780_19: tāva so khīrapako vaccho mātari viya paṭibaddhamano laggacittova hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3781_0: Desanāvasāne pañcapi te mahallakattherā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3784_0: Ucchindāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattherassa saddhivihārikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3785_0: Eko kira suvaṇṇakāraputto abhirūpo sāriputtattherassa santike pabbaji.
atk-s0502a:3785_1: Thero “taruṇānaṃ rāgo ussanno hotī”ti cintetvā tassa rāgapaṭighātāya asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3785_3: Tasmā araññaṃ pavisitvā temāsaṃ vāyamanto cittekaggamattampi alabhitvā puna therassa santikaṃ āgantvā therena “upaṭṭhitaṃ te, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:3785_5: Athassa thero “kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjatīti vosānaṃ āpajjituṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā puna tadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ sādhukaṃ kathetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3785_6: So dutiyavārepi kiñci visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto āgantvā therassa ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:3785_7: Athassa theropi sakāraṇaṃ saupamaṃ katvā tadeva kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0502a:3785_8: So punapi āgantvā kammaṭṭhānassa asampajjanabhāvaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3785_10: “kārako bhikkhu attani vijjamāne kāmacchandādayo vijjamānāti avijjamāne avijjamānāti pajānāti.
atk-s0502a:3785_16: buddhaveneyyo eso bhavissatī”ti taṃ ādāya sāyanhasamaye satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3785_18: imassa mayā iminā kāraṇena idaṃ nāma kammaṭṭhānaṃ dinna”nti sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:3786_0: Atha naṃ satthā “āsayānusayañāṇaṃ nāmetaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā dasasahassilokadhātuṃ unnādetvā sabbaññutaṃ
atk-s0502a:3786_1: pattānaṃ buddhānaṃyeva visayo”ti vatvā “katarakulā nu kho esa pabbajito”ti āvajjento “suvaṇṇakārakulā”ti
atk-s0502a:3786_2: ñatvā atīte attabhāve olokento tassa suvaṇṇakārakuleyeva paṭipāṭiyā nibbattāni pañca attabhāvasatāni
atk-s0502a:3786_3: disvā “iminā daharena dīgharattaṃ suvaṇṇakārakammaṃ karontena kaṇikārapupphapadumapupphādīni karissāmīti
atk-s0502a:3786_8: tayā kammaṭṭhānaṃ datvā cattāro māse kilamitaṃ bhikkhuṃ ajja pacchābhatteyeva arahattaṃ pattaṃ passissasi,
atk-s0502a:3786_9: gaccha tva”nti theraṃ uyyojetvā iddhiyā cakkamattaṃ suvaṇṇapadumaṃ māpetvā pattehi ceva nālehi ca udakabindūni
atk-s0502a:3786_10: muñcantaṃ viya katvā “bhikkhu imaṃ padumaṃ ādāya vihārapaccante vālukarāsimhi ṭhapetvā sammukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0502a:3786_11: pallaṅkena nisīditvā ‘lohitakaṃ lohitaka’nti parikammaṃ karohī”ti adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3786_12: Tassa satthuhatthato padumaṃ gaṇhantasseva cittaṃ pasīdi.
atk-s0502a:3786_13: So vihārapaccantaṃ gantvā vālukaṃ ussāpetvā tattha padumanālaṃ pavesetvā sammukhe pallaṅkena nisinno “lohitakaṃ lohitaka”nti parikammaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0502a:3786_16: Tadanantaraṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā pañcahākārehi vasībhāvaṃ pāpetvā yathānisinnova dutiyajjhānādīnipi
atk-s0502a:3786_17: patvā vasībhūto catutthajjhānena jhānakīḷaṃ kīḷanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3787_0: Satthā tassa jhānānaṃ uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā “sakkhissati nu kho esa attano dhammatāya uttari visesaṃ nibbattetu”nti
atk-s0502a:3787_1: olokento “na sakkhissatī”ti ñatvā “taṃ padumaṃ milāyatū”ti adhiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:3787_2: Taṃ hatthehi madditapadumaṃ milāyantaṃ viya kāḷavaṇṇaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3787_3: So jhānā vuṭṭhāya taṃ oloketvā “kiṃ nu kho imaṃ padumaṃ jarāya pahaṭaṃ paññāyati,
atk-s0502a:3787_4: anupādiṇṇakepi evaṃ jarāya abhibhuyyamāne upādiṇṇake kathāva natthi.
atk-s0502a:3787_5: Idampi hi jarā abhibhavissatī”ti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ passi.
atk-s0502a:3787_6: Tasmiṃ pana diṭṭhe dukkhalakkhaṇañca anattalakkhaṇañca diṭṭhameva hoti.
atk-s0502a:3787_7: Tassa tayo bhavā ādittā viya kaṇḍe baddhakuṇapā viya ca khāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3787_8: Tasmiṃ khaṇe tassa avidūre kumārakā ekaṃ saraṃ otaritvā kumudāni bhañjitvā thale rāsiṃ karonti.
atk-s0502a:3787_9: So jale ca thale ca kumudāni olokesi.
atk-s0502a:3787_10: Athassa jale kumudāni abhirūpāni udakapaggharantāni viya upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3787_13: upādiṇṇakaṃ kiṃ pana na paharissatī”ti suṭṭhutaraṃ aniccalakkhaṇādīni addasa.
atk-s0502a:3787_14: Satthā “pākaṭībhūtaṃ idāni imassa bhikkhuno kammaṭṭhāna”nti ñatvā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnakova obhāsaṃ muñci,
atk-s0502a:3787_16: Athassa “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti olokentassa satthā āgantvā sammukhe ṭhito viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3787_18: Athassa satthā sappāyaṃ sallakkhetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3795_0: Idha vassanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahādhanavāṇijaṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3796_0: So kira bārāṇasito kusumbharattānaṃ vatthānaṃ pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā vaṇijjāya sāvatthiṃ āgato nadītīraṃ
atk-s0502a:3796_1: patvā “sve nadiṃ uttarissāmī”ti tattheva sakaṭāni mocetvā vasi.
atk-s0502a:3796_10: Idheva vassañca hemantañca gimhañca mama kammaṃ karonto vasitvā imāni vikkiṇissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3796_11: Satthā nagare piṇḍāya caranto tassa cittaṃ ñatvā sitaṃ pātukaritvā ānandattherena sitakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho āha –
atk-s0502a:3796_15: So attano jīvitantarāyaṃ ajānitvā imaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ idheva vasitvā bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇituṃ cittamakāsīti.
atk-s0502a:3796_19: sattāhameva jīvitvā so maccumukhe patissatī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3798_0: Na hi no saṅgaraṃ tena, mahāsenena maccunā.
atk-s0502a:3800_0: Taṃ ve bhaddekarattoti, santo ācikkhate munī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:3801_10: imaṃ saṃvaccharaṃ idha vasitvā bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā gamissāmīti. Upāsaka,
atk-s0502a:3801_16: So saṃviggamānaso hutvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā anumodanatthāya pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:3801_19: idañcidañca kammaṃ payojessāmī’ti cintetuṃ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:3801_20: attano pana jīvitantarāyameva cintetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3804_0: Iti bālo vicinteti, antarāyaṃ na bujjhatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3805_0: Tattha idha vassanti imasmiṃ ṭhāne idañcidañca karonto catumāsaṃ vassaṃ vasissāmi.
atk-s0502a:3805_1: Hemantagimhisūti hemantagimhesupi “cattāro māse idañcidañca karonto idheva vasissāmī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ
atk-s0502a:3805_3: Antarāyanti “asukasmiṃ nāma kāle vā dese vā vaye vā marissāmī”ti attano jīvitantarāyaṃ na bujjhatīti.
atk-s0502a:3806_2: Vāṇijopi satthāraṃ anugantvā nivattitvā “sīsarogo viya me uppanno”ti sayane nipajji,
atk-s0502a:3809_0: Taṃ puttapasusammattanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kisāgotamiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3810_0: “Yo ca vassasataṃ jīve, apassaṃ amataṃ padaṃ;
atk-s0502a:3811_0: Ekāhaṃ jīvitaṃ seyyo, passato amataṃ pada”nti. –
atk-s0502a:3812_1: Tadā hi satthā “kisāgotami laddhā te ekaccharamattā siddhatthakā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3812_3: sakalagāme jīvantehi kira matakā eva bahutarā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3812_4: Atha naṃ satthā “tvaṃ ‘mameva putto mato’ti sallakkhesi,
atk-s0502a:3812_6: Maccurājā hi sabbasatte aparipuṇṇajjhāsaye eva mahogho viya parikaḍḍhamāno apāyasamudde pakkhipatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3815_0: Suttaṃ gāmaṃ mahoghova, maccu ādāya gacchatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3816_0: Tattha taṃ puttapasusammattanti taṃ rūpabalādisampanne putte ca pasū ca labhitvā “mama puttā abhirūpā balasampannā paṇḍitā sabbakiccasamatthā,
atk-s0502a:3816_2: mama gāvī bahukhīrā”ti evaṃ puttehi ca pasūhi ca sammattaṃ naraṃ.
atk-s0502a:3816_3: Byāsattamanasanti hiraññasuvaṇṇādīsu vā pattacīvarādīsu vā kiñcideva labhitvā tato uttaritaraṃ patthanatāya āsattamānasaṃ vā,
atk-s0502a:3816_4: cakkhuviññeyyādīsu ārammaṇesu vuttappakāresu vā parikkhāresu yaṃ yaṃ laddhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:3816_7: Mahoghovāti yathā evarūpaṃ gāmaṃ gambhīravitthato mahanto mahānadīnaṃ ogho antamaso sunakhampi asesetvā sabbaṃ ādāya gacchati,
atk-s0502a:3816_8: evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ naraṃ maccu ādāya gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3817_0: Desanāvasāne kisāgotamī sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3820_0: Na santi puttāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto paṭācāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3823_1: Tadā pana satthā paṭācāraṃ tanubhūtasokaṃ ñatvā “paṭācāre puttādayo nāma paralokaṃ gacchantassa tāṇaṃ vā leṇaṃ vā saraṇaṃ vā bhavituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:3823_3: Paṇḍitena pana sīlaṃ visodhetvā attano nibbānagāmimaggameva sodhetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3825_0: “Na santi puttā tāṇāya, na pitā nāpi bandhavā;
atk-s0502a:3830_1: Bandhavāti putte ca mātāpitaro ca ṭhapetvā avasesā ñātisuhajjā.
atk-s0502a:3830_3: Pavattiyañhi puttādayo annapānādidānena ceva uppannakiccanittharaṇena ca tāṇā hutvāpi maraṇakāle kenaci
atk-s0502a:3830_4: upāyena maraṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asamatthatāya tāṇatthāya leṇatthāya na santi nāma.
atk-s0502a:3830_7: Etamatthavasanti evaṃ tesaṃ aññamaññassa tāṇaṃ bhavituṃ asamatthabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ jānitvā paṇḍito
atk-s0502a:3830_8: catupārisuddhisīlena saṃvuto rakkhitagopito hutvā nibbānagamanaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ sīghaṃ sīghaṃ visodheyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3831_0: Desanāvasāne paṭācārā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, aññe ca bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:3837_0: Mattāsukhapariccāgāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto attano pubbakammaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3838_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye vesālī iddhā ahosi phītā bahujanā ākiṇṇamanussā.
atk-s0502a:3838_1: Tattha hi vārena vārena rajjaṃ kārentānaṃ khattiyānaṃyeva sattasatādhikāni sattasahassāni satta ca khattiyā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3838_2: Tesaṃ vasanatthāya tattakāyeva pāsādā tattakāneva kūṭāgārāni uyyāne vihāratthāya tattakāyeva ārāmā ca pokkharaṇiyo ca ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3838_3: Sā aparena samayena dubbhikkhā ahosi dussassā.
atk-s0502a:3838_5: Tesaṃ tesaṃ tattha tattha chaḍḍitānaṃ kuṇapānaṃ gandhena amanussā nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3838_8: Evaṃ dubbhikkhabhayaṃ amanussabhayaṃ rogabhayanti tīṇi bhayāni uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3839_3: ito pubbe yāva sattamā rājaparivaṭṭā evarūpaṃ bhayaṃ nāma na uppannapubbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3839_5: Rājā santhāgāre sabbesaṃ sannipātaṃ kāretvā “sace me adhammikabhāvo atthi,
atk-s0502a:3839_7: Vesālivāsino sabbaṃ paveṇi vicinantā rañño kañci dosaṃ adisvā,
atk-s0502a:3839_9: natthi te doso”ti vatvā “kathaṃ nu kho idaṃ amhākaṃ bhayaṃ vūpasamaṃ gaccheyyā”ti mantayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3839_10: Tattha ekaccehi “balikammena āyācanāya maṅgalakiriyāyā”ti vutte sabbampi taṃ vidhiṃ katvā paṭibāhituṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3839_15: So hi bhagavā sabbasattahitāya dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0502a:3839_17: Tasmiṃ idha āgate imāni bhayāni vūpasameyyu”nti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3839_18: Tesaṃ vacanaṃ sabbepi abhinanditvā “kahaṃ nu kho so bhagavā etarahi viharatī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3839_19: Tadā pana satthā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya rañño bimbisārassa paṭiññaṃ datvā veḷuvane viharati.
atk-s0502a:3839_20: Tena ca samayena bimbisārasamāgame bimbisārena saddhiṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ patto mahāli nāma licchavī tassaṃ parisāyaṃ nisinno hoti.
atk-s0502a:3840_0: Vesālivāsino mahantaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ sajjetvā rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ saññāpetvā “satthāraṃ idhānethā”ti mahāliñceva licchaviṃ purohitaputtañca pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3840_1: Te gantvā rañño paṇṇākāraṃ datvā taṃ pavattiṃ nivedetvā,
atk-s0502a:3840_7: tāni tumhesu āgatesu vūpasamissanti, etha, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3840_9: Satthā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā āvajjento “vesāliyaṃ ratanasutte vutte sā rakkhā cakkavāḷānaṃ koṭisatasahassaṃ pharissati,
atk-s0502a:3840_11: tāni ca bhayāni vūpasamissantī”ti ñatvā tesaṃ vacanaṃ sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0502a:3841_0: Rājā bimbisāro “satthārā kira vesāligamanaṃ sampaṭicchita”nti sutvā nagare ghosanaṃ kāretvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3841_3: tāva maggaṃ paṭiyādessāmī”ti vatvā rājagahassa ca gaṅgāya ca antare pañcayojanabhūmiṃ samaṃ kāretvā yojane
atk-s0502a:3841_4: yojane vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā satthu gamanakālaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:3841_5: Satthā pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ paṭipajji.
atk-s0502a:3841_6: Rājā yojanantare jaṇṇumattena odhinā pañcavaṇṇāni pupphāni okirāpetvā dhajapaṭākakadalīādīni ussāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3841_7: bhagavato chattātichattaṃ katvā dve setacchattāni ekamekassa bhikkhuno ekamekaṃ setacchattaṃ upari dhāretvā
atk-s0502a:3841_8: saparivāro pupphagandhādīhi pūjaṃ karonto satthāraṃ ekekasmiṃ vihāre vasāpetvā mahādānādīni datvā pañcahi
atk-s0502a:3841_9: divasehi gaṅgātīraṃ pāpetvā tattha nāvaṃ alaṅkaronto vesālikānaṃ sāsanaṃ pesesi –
atk-s0502a:3841_11: Te “diguṇaṃ pūjaṃ karissāmā”ti vesāliyā ca gaṅgāya ca antare tiyojanabhūmiṃ samaṃ kāretvā bhagavato catūhi
atk-s0502a:3841_12: setacchattehi ekamekassa bhikkhuno dvīhi dvīhi setacchattehi chattātichattāni sajjetvā pūjaṃ kurumānā
atk-s0502a:3841_14: Bimbisāro dve nāvā saṅghāṭetvā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā pupphadāmādīhi alaṅkārāpetvā sabbaratanamayaṃ buddhāsanaṃ paññāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3841_16: Bhikkhūpi nāvaṃ abhiruhitvā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3841_17: Rājā anugacchanto galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ otaritvā “yāva, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3841_19: tāvāhaṃ idheva gaṅgātīre vasissāmī”ti vatvā nāvaṃ uyyojetvā nivatti.
atk-s0502a:3841_20: Satthā yojanamattaṃ addhānaṃ gaṅgāya gantvā vesālikānaṃ sīmaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:3842_0: Licchavīrājāno satthāraṃ paccuggantvā galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ otaritvā nāvaṃ tīraṃ upanetvā satthāraṃ nāvāto otārayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3842_1: Satthārā otaritvā tīre akkantamatteyeva mahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā pokkharavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0502a:3842_2: Sabbattha jaṇṇuppamāṇaūruppamāṇakaṭippamāṇādīni udakāni sandantāni sabbakuṇapāni gaṅgaṃ pavesayiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3842_4: Licchavīrājāno satthāraṃ yojane yojane vasāpetvā mahādānaṃ datvā diguṇaṃ pūjaṃ karontā tīhi divasehi vesāliṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3842_6: mahesakkhānaṃ devānaṃ sannipātena amanussā yebhuyyena palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3842_7: Satthā sāyaṃ nagaradvāre ṭhatvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “imaṃ, ānanda,
atk-s0502a:3842_8: ratanasuttaṃ uggaṇhitvā licchavīkumārehi saddhiṃ vicaranto vesāliyā tiṇṇaṃ pākārānaṃ antare parittaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3843_0: Thero satthārā dinnaṃ ratanasuttaṃ uggaṇhitvā satthu selamayapattena udakaṃ ādāya nagaradvāre ṭhito paṇidhānato
atk-s0502a:3843_1: paṭṭhāya tathāgatassa dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo pañca
atk-s0502a:3843_2: mahāpariccāge lokatthacariyā ñātatthacariyā buddhatthacariyāti tisso cariyāyo pacchimabhave gabbhavokkantiṃ
atk-s0502a:3843_3: jātiṃ abhinikkhamanaṃ padhānacariyaṃ bodhipallaṅke māravijayaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇapaṭivedhaṃ dhammacakkapavattanaṃ
atk-s0502a:3843_4: navalokuttaradhammeti sabbepime buddhaguṇe āvajjetvā nagaraṃ pavisitvā tiyāmarattiṃ tīsu pākārantaresu
atk-s0502a:3843_6: Tena “yaṃkiñcī”ti vuttamatteyeva uddhaṃ khittaudakaṃ amanussānaṃ upari pati.
atk-s0502a:3843_7: “Yānīdha bhūtānī”ti gāthākathanato paṭṭhāya rajatavaṭaṃsakā viya udakabindūni ākāsena gantvā gilānamanussānaṃ upari patiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3843_8: Tāvadeva vūpasantarogā manussā uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya theraṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3843_9: “Yaṃkiñcī”ti vuttapadato paṭṭhāya pana udakaphusitehi phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā sabbe apalāyantā saṅkārakūṭabhittipadesādinissitā
atk-s0502a:3843_12: Te okāsaṃ alabhantā pākāraṃ bhinditvāpi palāyiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3844_0: Mahājano nagaramajjhe santhāgāraṃ sabbagandhehi upalimpetvā upari suvaṇṇatārakādivicittaṃ vitānaṃ bandhitvā buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā satthāraṃ ānesi.
atk-s0502a:3844_3: Sakko devarājā devagaṇaparivuto patirūpe okāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3844_4: Theropi sakalanagaraṃ anuvicaritvā vūpasantarogena mahājanena saddhiṃ āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3844_5: Satthā parisaṃ oloketvā tadeva ratanasuttaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3844_7: Evaṃ punadivasepīti sattāhaṃ tadeva ratanasuttaṃ desetvā sabbabhayānaṃ vūpasantabhāvaṃ ñatvā licchavīgaṇaṃ āmantetvā vesālito nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:3844_8: Licchavīrājāno diguṇaṃ sakkāraṃ karontā puna tīhi divasehi satthāraṃ gaṅgātīraṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3845_3: Te suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimayā nāvāyo māpetvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimaye pallaṅke paññāpetvā pañcavaṇṇapadumasañchannaṃ udakaṃ karitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:3845_4: amhākampi anuggahaṃ karothā”ti attano attano nāvaṃ abhiruhaṇatthāya satthāraṃ yāciṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3845_5: “Manussā ca nāgā ca tathāgatassa pūjaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a:3845_6: mayaṃ pana kiṃ na karomā”ti bhūmaṭṭhakadevepi ādiṃ katvā yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā sabbe devā sakkāraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3845_8: Evaṃ heṭṭhā nāgā bhūmitale rukkhagacchapabbatādīsu bhūmaṭṭhakā devatā,
atk-s0502a:3845_9: antalikkhe ākāsaṭṭhadevāti nāgabhavanaṃ ādiṃ katvā cakkavāḷapariyantena yāva brahmalokā chattātichattāni ussāpitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3845_13: Sabbalaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā devaputtā chaṇavesaṃ gahetvā ugghosayamānā ākāse vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3845_14: Tayo eva kira samāgamā mahantā ahesuṃ –
atk-s0502a:3846_0: Paratīre bimbisāropi licchavīhi katasakkārato diguṇaṃ sakkāraṃ sajjetvā bhagavato āgamanaṃ udikkhamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3846_1: Satthā gaṅgāya ubhosu passesu rājūnaṃ mahantaṃ pariccāgaṃ oloketvā nāgādīnañca ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā ekekāya
atk-s0502a:3846_3: So ekekassa setacchattassa ceva kapparukkhassa ca pupphadāmassa ca heṭṭhā nāgagaṇaparivuto nisinno hoti.
atk-s0502a:3846_4: Bhūmaṭṭhakadevatādīsupi ekekasmiṃ okāse saparivāraṃ ekekaṃ nimmitabuddhaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0502a:3846_5: Evaṃ sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe ekālaṅkāre ekussave ekachaṇeyeva ca jāte satthā nāgānamanuggahaṃ karonto ekaṃ ratananāvaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0502a:3846_7: Nāgarājāno buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ pavesetvā sabbarattiṃ satthu santike dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0502a:3846_8: sutvā dutiyadivase dibbena khādanīyena bhojanīyena buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ parivisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3846_9: Satthā anumodanaṃ katvā nāgabhavanā nikkhamitvā sakalacakkavāḷadevatāhi pūjiyamāno pañcahi nāvāsatehi gaṅgānadiṃ atikkami.
atk-s0502a:3847_0: Rājā paccuggantvā satthāraṃ nāvāto otāretvā āgamanakāle licchavīti katasakkārato diguṇaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā
atk-s0502a:3847_2: Dutiyadivase bhikkhū piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā sāyanhasamaye dhammasabhāyaṃ sannisinnā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ –
atk-s0502a:3847_5: gaṅgāya nāma orato ca pārato ca aṭṭhayojane magge buddhagatena pasādena rājūhi samatalaṃ bhūmiṃ katvā vālukā okiṇṇā,
atk-s0502a:3847_7: gaṅgāya udakaṃ nāgānubhāvena pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3847_12: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:3847_16: Atīte pana appamattakapariccāgānubhāvena nibbatto”ti vatvā bhikkhūhi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a:3848_0: Atīte takkasilāyaṃ saṅkho nāma brāhmaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3848_1: Tassa putto susīmo nāma māṇavo soḷasavassuddesiko ekadivasaṃ pitaraṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha –
atk-s0502a:3848_4: Atha naṃ pitā āha – “tena hi, tāta,
atk-s0502a:3848_7: So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ gantvā taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pitarā pahitabhāvamācikkhi.
atk-s0502a:3848_8: Atha naṃ so “sahāyakassa me putto”ti sampaṭicchitvā paṭipassaddhadarathaṃ bhaddakena divasena mante vācetumārabhi.
atk-s0502a:3848_9: So lahuñca gaṇhanto bahuñca gaṇhanto attano uggahituggahitaṃ suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhatelamiva avinassamānaṃ
atk-s0502a:3848_10: dhārento na cirasseva ācariyassa sammukhato uggaṇhitabbaṃ sabbaṃ uggaṇhitvā sajjhāyaṃ karonto attano
atk-s0502a:3849_0: So ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ahaṃ imassa sippassa ādimajjhameva passāmi,
atk-s0502a:3849_6: tesaṃ santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchassū”ti ācariyena vutte paccekabuddhe upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:3849_14: Athassa te “idaṃ tāva sikkhassū”ti vatvā “evaṃ te nivāsetabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3849_16: So tattha sikkhanto upanissayasampannattā nacirasseva paccekasambodhiṃ abhisambujjhitvā sakalabārāṇasinagare
atk-s0502a:3849_17: gaganatale puṇṇacando viya pākaṭo lābhaggayasaggappatto ahosi,
atk-s0502a:3849_18: so appāyukasaṃvattanikassa kammassa katattā na cirasseva parinibbāyi.
atk-s0502a:3849_19: Athassa paccekabuddhā ca mahājano ca sarīrakiccaṃ katvā dhātuyo ca gahetvā nagaradvāre thūpaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3850_1: pavattimassa jānissāmī”ti taṃ daṭṭhukāmo takkasilāto nikkhamitvā anupubbena bārāṇasiṃ patvā mahājanakāyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3850_2: sannipatitaṃ disvā “addhā imesu ekopi me puttassa pavattiṃ jānissatī”ti upasaṅkamitvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:3850_4: api nu kho tassa pavattiṃ jānāthā”ti? “Āma, brāhmaṇa, jānāma,
atk-s0502a:3850_5: asukassa brāhmaṇassa santike tayo vede sajjhāyitvā pabbajitvā paccekasambodhiṃ sacchikatvā parinibbuto,
atk-s0502a:3850_7: So bhūmiṃ hatthena paharitvā roditvā kanditvā taṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā tiṇāni uddharitvā uttarasāṭakena
atk-s0502a:3850_8: vālukaṃ āharitvā cetiyaṅgaṇe ākiritvā kamaṇḍaluto udakena paripphositvā vanapupphehi pūjaṃ katvā sāṭakena
atk-s0502a:3850_9: paṭākaṃ āropetvā thūpassa upari attano chattakaṃ bandhitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:3851_3: Mayā susīmassa paccekabuddhassa cetiyaṅgaṇe tiṇāni uddhaṭāni,
atk-s0502a:3851_4: tassa me kammassa nissandena aṭṭhayojanamaggaṃ vihatakhāṇukakaṇṭakaṃ katvā suddhaṃ samatalaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3851_6: tassa me nissandena aṭṭhayojanamagge vālukaṃ okiriṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3851_8: tassa me nissandena aṭṭhayojanamagge nānāvaṇṇāni pupphāni okiṇṇāni,
atk-s0502a:3851_9: ekayojanaṭṭhāne gaṅgāya udakaṃ pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi sañchannaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3851_11: tassa me nissandena vesāliyaṃ pokkharavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0502a:3851_14: tassa me nissandena yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā dhajapaṭākachattātichattādīhi sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ ekussavaṃ viya jātaṃ. Iti kho,
atk-s0502a:3851_16: esa pūjāsakkāro mayhaṃ neva buddhānubhāvena nibbatto,
atk-s0502a:3851_18: atīte pana appamattakapariccāgānubhāvenā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3854_0: Caje mattāsukhaṃ dhīro, sampassaṃ vipulaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a:3855_0: Tattha mattāsukhapariccāgāti mattāsukhanti pamāṇayuttakaṃ parittasukhaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0502a:3855_2: Vipulaṃ sukhanti uḷāraṃ sukhaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0502a:3855_5: ekañhi bhojanapātiṃ sajjāpetvā bhuñjantassa mattāsukhaṃ nāma uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:3855_6: taṃ pana pariccajitvā uposathaṃ vā karontassa dānaṃ vā dadantassa vipulaṃ uḷāraṃ nibbānasukhaṃ nāma nibbattati.
atk-s0502a:3855_7: Tasmā sace evaṃ tassa mattāsukhassa pariccāgā vipulaṃ sukhaṃ passati,
atk-s0502a:3855_8: athetaṃ vipulaṃ sukhaṃ sammā passanto paṇḍito taṃ mattāsukhaṃ cajeyyāti.
atk-s0502a:3859_0: Paradukkhūpadhānenāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ kukkuṭaaṇḍakhādikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3860_0: Sāvatthiyā kira avidūre paṇḍuraṃ nāma eko gāmo,
atk-s0502a:3860_2: So sāvatthiṃ gacchanto aciravatiyaṃ kacchapaaṇḍāni disvā tāni ādāya sāvatthiṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ gehe pacāpetvā
atk-s0502a:3860_3: khādanto tasmiṃ gehe kumārikāyapi ekaṃ aṇḍaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3860_4: Sā taṃ khāditvā tato paṭṭhāya aññaṃ khādanīyaṃ nāma na icchi.
atk-s0502a:3860_5: Athassā mātā kukkuṭiyā vijātaṭṭhānato ekaṃ aṇḍaṃ gahetvā adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3860_6: Sā taṃ khāditvā rasataṇhāya baddhā tato paṭṭhāya sayameva kukkuṭiyā aṇḍāni gahetvā khādati.
atk-s0502a:3860_7: Kukkuṭī vijātavijātakāle taṃ attano aṇḍāni gahetvā khādantiṃ disvā tāya upaddutā āghātaṃ bandhitvā “ito
atk-s0502a:3860_8: dāni cutā yakkhinī hutvā tava jātadārake khādituṃ samatthā hutvā nibbatteyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0502a:3860_9: kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva gehe majjārī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3860_10: Itarāpi kālaṃ katvā tattheva kukkuṭī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3860_12: majjārī āgantvā tāni khāditvā dutiyampi tatiyampi khādiyeva.
atk-s0502a:3860_13: Kukkuṭī “tayo vāre mama aṇḍāni khāditvā idāni mampi khāditukāmāsi,
atk-s0502a:3860_14: ito cutā saputtakaṃ taṃ khādituṃ labheyya”nti patthanaṃ katvā tato cutā dīpinī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3860_15: Itarāpi kālaṃ katvā migī hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:3860_16: Tassā vijātakāle dīpinī āgantvā taṃ saddhiṃ puttehi khādi.
atk-s0502a:3860_17: Evaṃ khādantā pañcasu attabhāvasatesu aññamaññassa dukkhaṃ uppādetvā avasāne ekā yakkhinī hutvā nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:3860_19: Ito paraṃ “na hi verena verānī”ti gāthāya vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3860_21: no verenā”ti vatvā ubhinnampi dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3864_2: Verasaṃsaggasaṃsaṭṭhoti yo puggalo akkosanapaccakkosanapaharaṇapaṭiharaṇādīnaṃ vasena aññamaññaṃ katena verasaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho.
atk-s0502a:3864_3: Verā so na parimuccatīti niccakālaṃ veravasena dukkhameva pāpuṇātīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3865_0: Desanāvasāne yakkhinī saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya pañca sīlāni samādiyitvā verato mucci,
atk-s0502a:3868_0: Yañhi kiccanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bhaddiyaṃ nissāya jātiyāvane viharanto bhaddiye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3869_0: Te kira pādukamaṇḍane uyyuttā ahesuṃ. Yathāha –
atk-s0502a:3869_1: “tena kho pana samayena bhaddiyā bhikkhū anekavihitaṃ pādukamaṇḍanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti,
atk-s0502a:3869_4: pabbajapādukaṃ hintālapādukaṃ kamalapādukaṃ kambalapādukaṃ karontipi kārāpentipi,
atk-s0502a:3869_5: riñcanti uddesaṃ paripucchaṃ adhisīlaṃ adhicittaṃ adhipañña”nti.
atk-s0502a:3869_6: Bhikkhū tesaṃ tathākaraṇabhāvaṃ jānitvā ujjhāyitvā satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3869_9: tumhe aññena kiccena āgatā aññasmiṃyeva kicce uyyuttā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3875_0: Akiccaṃ te na sevanti, kicce sātaccakārino;
atk-s0502a:3877_0: Tattha yañhi kiccanti bhikkhuno hi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanaṃ araññāvāso dhutaṅgapariharaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:3877_4: Akiccanti bhikkhuno chattamaṇḍanaṃ upāhanamaṇḍanaṃ pādukapattathālakadhammakaraṇakāyabandhanaaṃsabaddhakamaṇḍanaṃ akiccaṃ nāma.
atk-s0502a:3877_6: tesaṃ mānanaḷaṃ ukkhipitvā caraṇena unnaḷānaṃ sativossaggena pamattānaṃ cattāro āsavā vaḍḍhantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3877_9: Akiccanti te etaṃ chattamaṇḍanādikaṃ akiccaṃ na sevanti na karontīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3877_10: Kicceti pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya kattabbe aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanādike karaṇīye.
atk-s0502a:3877_12: Tesaṃ satiyā avippavāsena satānaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññanti
atk-s0502a:3877_13: catūhi sampajaññehi sampajānānaṃ cattāropi āsavā atthaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0502a:3878_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3881_0: Mātaranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3882_0: Ekadivasañhi sambahulā āgantukā bhikkhū satthāraṃ divāṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3882_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe lakuṇḍakabhaddiyatthero bhagavato avidūre atikkamati.
atk-s0502a:3882_2: Satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cittācāraṃ ñatvā oloketvā “passatha,
atk-s0502a:3882_4: ayaṃ bhikkhu mātāpitaro hantvā niddukkho hutvā yātī”ti vatvā tehi bhikkhūhi “kiṃ nu kho satthā vadatī”ti
atk-s0502a:3882_6: kiṃ nāmetaṃ vadethā”ti vutte tesaṃ dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3884_0: “Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā, rājāno dve ca khattiye;
atk-s0502a:3885_0: Raṭṭhaṃ sānucaraṃ hantvā, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0502a:3886_1: Ettha hi “taṇhā janeti purisa”nti vacanato tīsu bhavesu sattānaṃ jananato taṇhā mātā nāma.
atk-s0502a:3886_2: “Ahaṃ asukassa nāma rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā putto”ti pitaraṃ nissāya asmimānassa uppajjanato asmimāno pitā nāma.
atk-s0502a:3886_3: Loko viya rājānaṃ yasmā sabbadiṭṭhigatāni dve sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo bhajanti,
atk-s0502a:3886_4: tasmā dve sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo dve khattiyarājāno nāma.
atk-s0502a:3886_6: Āyasādhako āyuttakapuriso viya tannissito nandirāgo anucaro nāma.
atk-s0502a:3886_9: Etesaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ arahattamaggañāṇāsinā hatattā khīṇāsavo niddukkho hutvā yātīti ayametthattho.
atk-s0502a:3888_1: Tadā hi satthā lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattherameva ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3890_0: “Mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hantvā, rājāno dve ca sotthiye;
atk-s0502a:3892_0: Tattha dve ca sotthiyeti dve ca brāhmaṇe.
atk-s0502a:3892_1: Imissā gāthāya satthā attano dhammissaratāya ca desanāvidhikusalatāya ca sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo dve brāhmaṇarājāno ca katvā kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3892_2: Veyagghapañcamanti ettha byagghānucarito sappaṭibhayo duppaṭipanno maggo veyaggho nāma,
atk-s0502a:3892_4: taṃ pañcamaṃ assāti nīvaraṇapañcakaṃ veyagghapañcamaṃ nāma.
atk-s0502a:3892_5: Idañca veyagghapañcamaṃ arahattamaggañāṇāsinā nissesaṃ hantvā anīghova yāti brāhmaṇoti ayametthattho.
atk-s0502a:3895_0: Suppabuddhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto dārusākaṭikassa puttaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3896_0: Rājagahasmiñhi sammādiṭṭhikaputto micchādiṭṭhikaputtoti dve dārakā abhikkhaṇaṃ guḷakīḷaṃ kīḷanti.
atk-s0502a:3896_1: Tesu sammādiṭṭhikaputto guḷaṃ khipamāno buddhānussatiṃ āvajjetvā “namo buddhassā”ti vatvā vatvā guḷaṃ khipati.
atk-s0502a:3896_2: Itaro titthiyaguṇe uddisitvā “namo arahantāna”nti vatvā vatvā khipati.
atk-s0502a:3896_5: So tassa kiriyaṃ disvā “ayaṃ evaṃ anussaritvā evaṃ vatvā guḷaṃ khipanto mamaṃ jināti,
atk-s0502a:3896_7: Athekadivasaṃ tassa pitā sakaṭaṃ yojetvā dārūnaṃ atthāya gacchanto tampi dārakaṃ ādāya gantvā aṭaviyaṃ
atk-s0502a:3896_8: dārūnaṃ sakaṭaṃ pūretvā āgacchanto bahinagare susānasāmante udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne goṇe mocetvā bhattavissaggamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:3896_9: Athassa te goṇā sāyanhasamaye nagaraṃ pavisantena gogaṇena saddhiṃ nagarameva pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3896_10: Sākaṭikopi goṇe anubandhanto nagaraṃ pavisitvā sāyaṃ goṇe disvā ādāya nikkhamanto dvāraṃ na sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:3897_0: Athassa putto ekakova rattibhāge sakaṭassa heṭṭhā nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0502a:3897_10: So tena nivāriyamānopi tassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā dārakaṃ pādesu gahetvā ākaḍḍhi.
atk-s0502a:3897_11: So buddhānussatiyā paricitattā tasmiṃ khaṇe “namo buddhassā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3897_14: daṇḍakammaṃ tassa karomā”ti vatvā taṃ rakkhamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3897_15: Micchādiṭṭhiko nagaraṃ pavisitvā rañño bhojanapātiṃ pūretvā bhojanaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a:3897_16: Atha naṃ ubhopi tassa mātāpitaro viya hutvā upaṭṭhāpetvā bhojetvā “imāni akkharāni rājāva passatu,
atk-s0502a:3897_17: mā añño”ti taṃ pavattiṃ pakāsentā yakkhānubhāvena bhojanapātiyaṃ akkharāni chinditvā pātiṃ dārusakaṭe
atk-s0502a:3898_0: Punadivase “rājakulato corehi bhojanabhaṇḍaṃ avahaṭa”nti kolāhalaṃ karontā dvārāni pidahitvā olokentā
atk-s0502a:3898_1: tattha apassantā nagarā nikkhamitvā ito cito ca olokentā dārusakaṭe suvaṇṇapātiṃ disvā “ayaṃ coro”ti
atk-s0502a:3898_5: mātāpitaro me āgantvā rattiṃ bhojetvā rakkhamānā aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3898_6: ahampi mātāpitaro maṃ rakkhantīti nibbhayova niddaṃ upagato.
atk-s0502a:3898_9: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā te tayopi jane ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā sabbaṃ ārocetvā “kiṃ nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a:3898_16: tesaṃ aññena rakkhāvaraṇena vā mantosadhehi vā kiccaṃ natthī”ti vatvā cha ṭhānāni dassento imā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3901_0: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ buddhagatā sati.
atk-s0502a:3904_0: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ dhammagatā sati.
atk-s0502a:3907_0: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ saṅghagatā sati.
atk-s0502a:3910_0: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṃ kāyagatā sati.
atk-s0502a:3913_0: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, ahiṃsāya rato mano.
atk-s0502a:3916_0: Yesaṃ divā ca ratto ca, bhāvanāya rato mano”ti.
atk-s0502a:3917_0: Tattha suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhantīti buddhagataṃ satiṃ gahetvā supantā,
atk-s0502a:3917_1: gahetvāyeva ca pabujjhantā suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti nāma.
atk-s0502a:3917_2: Sadā gotamasāvakāti gotamagottassa buddhassa savanante jātattā tasseva anusāsaniyā savanatāya gotamasāvakā.
atk-s0502a:3917_3: Buddhagatā satīti yesaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādippabhede buddhaguṇe ārabbha uppajjamānā sati niccakālaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:3917_5: Tathā asakkontā pana ekadivasaṃ tīsu kālesu dvīsu kālesu ekasmimpi kāle buddhānussatiṃ manasi karontā suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhantiyeva nāma.
atk-s0502a:3917_6: Dhammagatā satīti “svākhāto bhagavatā dhammo”tiādippabhede dhammaguṇe ārabbha uppajjamānā sati.
atk-s0502a:3917_7: Saṅghagatā satīti “suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādippabhede saṅghaguṇe ārabbha uppajjamānā sati.
atk-s0502a:3917_8: Kāyagatā satīti dvattiṃsākāravasena vā navasivathikāvasena vā catudhātuvavatthānavasena vā ajjhattanīlakasiṇādirūpajjhānavasena vā uppajjamānā sati.
atk-s0502a:3917_9: Ahiṃsāya ratoti “so karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya karuṇābhāvanāya rato.
atk-s0502a:3917_11: Kiñcāpi heṭṭhā karuṇābhāvanāya vuttattā idha sabbāpi avasesā bhāvanā nāma,
atk-s0502a:3918_0: Desanāvasāne dārako saddhiṃ mātāpitūhi sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:3918_1: Pacchā pana pabbajitvā sabbepi arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:3921_0: Duppabbajjanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā vesāliṃ nissāya mahāvane viharanto aññataraṃ vajjiputtakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3921_2: aññataro vajjiputtako bhikkhu vesāliyaṃ viharati aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe,
atk-s0502a:3921_3: tena kho pana samayena vesāliyaṃ sabbarattichaṇo hoti.
atk-s0502a:3921_4: Atha kho so bhikkhu vesāliyā tūriyatāḷitavāditanigghosasaddaṃ sutvā paridevamāno tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:3926_0: So kira vajjiraṭṭhe rājaputto vārena sampattaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajito vesāliyaṃ cātumahārājikehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3926_1: ekābaddhaṃ katvā sakalanagare dhajapaṭākādīhi paṭimaṇḍite komudiyā puṇṇamāya sabbarattiṃ chaṇavāre vattamāne
atk-s0502a:3926_2: bheriyādīnaṃ tūriyānaṃ tāḷitānaṃ nigghosaṃ vīṇādīnañca vāditānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā yāni vesāliyaṃ satta rājasahassāni
atk-s0502a:3926_5: tesu alaṅkatapaṭiyattesu nakkhattakīḷanatthāya vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu saṭṭhihatthe mahācaṅkame caṅkamamāno gaganamajjhe
atk-s0502a:3926_6: ṭhitaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ disvā caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ phalakaṃ nissāya ṭhito veṭhanālaṅkāravirahitattā vane chaḍḍitadārukaṃ
atk-s0502a:3926_7: viya attabhāvaṃ oloketvā “atthi nu kho añño amhehi lāmakataro”ti cintento pakatiyā āraññakādiguṇayuttopi
atk-s0502a:3926_9: So tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthāya devatāya “imaṃ bhikkhuṃ saṃvejessāmī”ti adhippāyena –
atk-s0502a:3927_0: “Ekakova tvaṃ araññe viharasi, apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukaṃ;
atk-s0502a:3928_0: Tassa te bahukā pihayanti, nerayikā viya saggagāmina”nti. –
atk-s0502a:3929_0: Vuttaṃ imaṃ gāthaṃ sutvā punadivase satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:3929_1: Satthā taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā gharāvāsassa dukkhataṃ pakāsetukāmo pañca dukkhāni samodhānetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3933_0: Tasmā na caddhagū siyā, na ca dukkhānupatito siyā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3934_0: Tattha duppabbajjanti appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhañceva ñātiparivaṭṭañca pahāya imasmiṃ sāsane uraṃ datvā pabbajjaṃ nāma dukkhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:3934_1: Durabhiramanti evaṃ pabbajitenāpi bhikkhācariyāya jīvitavuttiṃ ghaṭentena aparimāṇasīlakkhandhagopanadhammānudhammappaṭipattipūraṇavasena
atk-s0502a:3934_3: Durāvāsāti yasmā pana gharaṃ āvasantena rājūnaṃ rājakiccaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3934_5: parijanā ceva dhammikā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca saṅgahitabbā.
atk-s0502a:3934_6: Evaṃ santepi gharāvāso chiddaghaṭo viya mahāsamuddo viya ca duppūro.
atk-s0502a:3934_7: Tasmā gharāvāsā nāmete durāvāsā dukkhā āvasituṃ,
atk-s0502a:3934_9: Dukkho samānasaṃvāsoti gihino vā hi ye jātigottakulabhogehi pabbajitā vā sīlācārabāhusaccādīhi samānāpi hutvā “kosi tvaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3934_13: Dukkhānupatitaddhagūti ye vaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ addhānaṃ paṭipannattā addhagū,
atk-s0502a:3934_15: Tasmā na caddhagūti yasmā dukkhānupatitabhāvopi dukkho addhagūbhāvopi,
atk-s0502a:3934_16: tasmā vaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ addhānaṃ gamanatāya addhagū na bhaveyya,
atk-s0502a:3934_17: vuttappakārena dukkhena anupatitopi na bhaveyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:3935_0: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu pañcasu ṭhānesu dassite dukkhe nibbindanto pañcorambhāgiyāni pañca uddhambhāgiyāni
atk-s0502a:3938_0: Saddhoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cittagahapatiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3939_1: etassa tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgacchantassevāyaṃ lābhasakkāro uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:3939_3: mama santikaṃ āgacchantassāpi aññattha gacchantassāpi tassa uppajjateva.
atk-s0502a:3939_5: evarūpo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati,
atk-s0502a:3939_6: tattha tatthevassa lābhasakkāro nibbattatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3942_0: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:3943_6: tādiseneva yasena dhanadhaññādiko ceva sattavidhaariyadhanasaṅkhāto cāti duvidho bhogo,
atk-s0502a:3943_8: Yaṃ yaṃ padesanti puratthimādīsu disāsu evarūpo kulaputto yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati,
atk-s0502a:3943_9: tattha tattha evarūpena lābhasakkārena pūjitova hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3947_0: Dūre santoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikassa dhītaraṃ cūḷasubhaddaṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3948_0: Anāthapiṇḍikassa kira daharakālato paṭṭhāya ugganagaravāsī uggo nāma seṭṭhiputto sahāyako ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3948_1: Te ekācariyakule sippaṃ uggaṇhantā aññamaññaṃ katikaṃ kariṃsu “amhākaṃ vayappattakāle puttadhītāsu jātāsu yo puttassa dhītaraṃ vāreti,
atk-s0502a:3948_3: Te ubhopi vayappattā attano attano nagare seṭṭhiṭṭhāne patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3948_4: Athekasmiṃ samaye uggaseṭṭhi vaṇijjaṃ payojento pañcahi sakaṭasatehi sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3948_7: tassa kattabbakiccaṃ sabbaṃ tava bhāro”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3948_8: Sā “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā tassa āgatadivasato paṭṭhāya sahattheneva sūpabyañjanādīni sampādeti,
atk-s0502a:3948_10: bhojanakāle tassa nhānodakaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā nhānakālato paṭṭhāya sabbakiccāni sādhukaṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:3949_0: Uggaseṭṭhi tassā ācārasampattiṃ disvā pasannacitto ekadivasaṃ anāthapiṇḍikena saddhiṃ sukhakathāya sannisinno
atk-s0502a:3949_1: “mayaṃ daharakāle evaṃ nāma katikaṃ karimhā”ti sāretvā cūḷasubhaddaṃ attano puttassatthāya vāresi.
atk-s0502a:3949_3: Tasmā dasabalassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā satthārā uggaseṭṭhissūpanissayaṃ disvā anuññāto bhariyāya saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:3949_4: mantetvā tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā divasaṃ vavatthapetvā dhītaraṃ visākhaṃ datvā uyyojento dhanañcayaseṭṭhi
atk-s0502a:3949_5: viya mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā subhaddaṃ āmantetvā, “amma,
atk-s0502a:3949_6: sasurakule vasantiyā nāma antoaggi bahi na nīharitabbo”ti dhanañcayaseṭṭhinā visākhāya dinnanayeneva
atk-s0502a:3949_7: dasa ovāde datvā “sace me gataṭṭhāne dhītu doso uppajjati,
atk-s0502a:3949_8: tumhehi sodhetabbo”ti aṭṭha kuṭumbike pāṭibhoge gahetvā tassā uyyojanadivase buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0502a:3949_9: mahādānaṃ datvā purimabhave dhītarā katānaṃ sucaritānaṃ phalavibhūtiṃ lokassa pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento
atk-s0502a:3949_11: Tassā anupubbena ugganagaraṃ pattakāle sasurakulena saddhiṃ mahājano paccuggamanamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:3950_0: Sāpi attano sirivibhavaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ visākhā viya sakalanagarassa attānaṃ dassentī rathe ṭhatvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0502a:3950_1: pavisitvā nāgarehi pesite paṇṇākāre gahetvā anurūpavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ pesentī sakalanagaraṃ attano guṇehi
atk-s0502a:3950_3: Maṅgaladivasādīsu panassā sasuro acelakānaṃ sakkāraṃ karonto “āgantvā amhākaṃ samaṇe vandatū”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a:3950_4: Sā lajjāya nagge passituṃ asakkontī gantuṃ na icchati.
atk-s0502a:3950_5: So punappunaṃ pesetvāpi tāya paṭikkhitto kujjhitvā “nīharatha na”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:3950_6: Sā “na sakkā mama akāraṇena dosaṃ āropetu”nti kuṭumbike pakkosāpetvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:3950_7: Te tassā niddosabhāvaṃ ñatvā seṭṭhiṃ saññāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3950_8: So “ayaṃ mama samaṇe ahirikāti na vandī”ti bhariyāya ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:3950_10: ativiya tesaṃ pasaṃsatī”ti taṃ pakkosāpetvā āha –
atk-s0502a:3951_0: “Kīdisā samaṇā tuyhaṃ, bāḷhaṃ kho ne pasaṃsasi;
atk-s0502a:3952_0: Kiṃsīlā kiṃsamācārā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchitā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:3953_0: Athassā subhaddā buddhānañceva buddhasāvakānañca guṇe pakāsentī –
atk-s0502a:3959_0: Puṇṇā suddhehi dhammehi, tādisā samaṇā mama.
atk-s0502a:3969_0: Atha naṃ “sakkā tava samaṇe amhākampi dassetu”nti vatvā “sakkā”ti vutte “tena hi yathā mayaṃ te passāma,
atk-s0502a:3969_1: tathā karohī”ti vutte sā “sādhū”ti buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ sajjetvā uparipāsādatale
atk-s0502a:3969_2: ṭhatvā jetavanābhimukhī sakkaccaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā buddhaguṇe āvajjetvā gandhavāsapupphadhumehi
atk-s0502a:3969_5: iminā me saññāṇena satthā nimantitabhāvaṃ jānātū”ti sumanapupphānaṃ aṭṭha muṭṭhiyo ākāse khipi.
atk-s0502a:3969_6: Pupphāni gantvā catuparisamajjhe dhammaṃ desentassa satthuno upari mālāvitānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3969_7: Tasmiṃ khaṇe anāthapiṇḍikopi dhammakathaṃ sutvā svātanāya satthāraṃ nimantesi.
atk-s0502a:3969_11: kassa nu kho vo adhivuttha”nti vutte “cūḷasubhaddāya, gahapati,
atk-s0502a:3969_13: cūḷasubhaddā dūre vasati ito vīsatiyojanasatamatthake”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:3969_15: dūre vasantāpi hi sappurisā abhimukhe ṭhitā viya pakāsentī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3972_0: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3973_0: Tattha santoti rāgādīnaṃ santatāya buddhādayo santā nāma.
atk-s0502a:3973_1: Idha pana pubbabuddhesu katādhikārā ussannakusalamūlā bhāvitabhāvanā sattā santoti adhippetā.
atk-s0502a:3973_2: Pakāsentīti dūre ṭhitāpi buddhānaṃ ñāṇapathaṃ āgacchantā pākaṭā honti.
atk-s0502a:3973_3: Himavanto vāti yathā hi tiyojanasahassavitthato pañcayojanasatubbedho caturāsītiyā kūṭasahassehi paṭimaṇḍito
atk-s0502a:3973_4: himavantapabbato dūre ṭhitānampi abhimukhe ṭhito viya pakāseti,
atk-s0502a:3973_6: Asantetthāti diṭṭhadhammagarukā vitiṇṇaparalokā āmisacakkhukā jīvikatthāya pabbajitā bālapuggalā asanto nāma,
atk-s0502a:3973_7: te ettha buddhānaṃ dakkhiṇassa jāṇumaṇḍalassa santike nisinnāpi na dissanti na paññāyanti.
atk-s0502a:3973_8: Rattiṃ khittāti rattiṃ caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre khittasarā viya tathārūpassa upanissayabhūtassa pubbahetuno abhāvena na paññāyantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3975_0: Sakko devarājā “satthārā subhaddāya nimantanaṃ adhivāsita”nti ñatvā vissakammadevaputtaṃ āṇāpesi –
atk-s0502a:3975_1: “pañca kūṭāgārasatāni nimminitvā sve buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ugganagaraṃ nehī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3975_2: So punadivase pañcasatāni kūṭāgārāni nimminitvā jetavanadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:3975_3: Satthā uccinitvā visuddhakhīṇāsavānaṃyeva pañcasatāni ādāya saparivāro kūṭāgāresu nisīditvā ugganagaraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3975_4: Uggaseṭṭhipi saparivāro subhaddāya dinnanayeneva tathāgatassa āgatamaggaṃ olokento satthāraṃ mahantena
atk-s0502a:3975_5: sirivibhavena āgacchantaṃ disvā pasannamānaso mālādīhi mahantaṃ sakkāraṃ karonto saparivāro sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0502a:3975_6: vanditvā mahādānaṃ datvā punappunaṃ nimantetvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:3975_8: Taṃ ādiṃ katvā caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:3975_9: Satthā “cūḷasubhaddāya anuggahaṇatthaṃ tvaṃ idheva hohī”ti anuruddhattheraṃ nivattāpetvā sāvatthimeva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:3975_10: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ nagaraṃ saddhāsampannaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:3978_0: Ekāsananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekavihārittheraṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3979_0: So kira thero ekakova seyyaṃ kappeti,
atk-s0502a:3979_6: Satthā “sādhu sādhū”ti tassa sādhukāraṃ datvā “bhikkhunā nāma pavivittena bhavitabba”nti viveke ānisaṃsaṃ kathetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3983_0: Tattha ekāsanaṃ ekaseyyanti bhikkhusahassamajjhepi mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahitvā teneva manasikārena nisinnassa āsanaṃ ekāsanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0502a:3983_1: Lohapāsādasadisepi ca pāsāde bhikkhusahassamajjhepi paññatte vicitrapaccattharaṇūpadhāne mahārahe sayane
atk-s0502a:3983_2: satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā dakkhiṇena passena mūlakammaṭṭhānamanasikārena nipannassa bhikkhuno seyyā ekaseyyā nāma.
atk-s0502a:3983_4: Atanditoti jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya jīvitakappanena akusīto hutvā sabbīriyāpathesu ekakova carantoti attho.
atk-s0502a:3983_5: Eko damayanti rattiṭṭhānādīsu kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjitvā maggaphalādhigamavasena ekova hutvā attānaṃ damentoti attho.
atk-s0502a:3983_6: Vanante ramito siyāti evaṃ attānaṃ damento itthipurisasaddādīhi pavivitte vananteyeva abhiramito bhaveyya.
atk-s0502a:3983_7: Na hi sakkā ākiṇṇavihārinā evaṃ attānaṃ dametunti attho.
atk-s0502a:3984_0: Desanāvasāne bahū sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇiṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya mahājano ekavihārikameva patthesīti.
atk-s0502a:3990_0: Abhūtavādīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sundariṃ paribbājikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:3991_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito”ti vatthu vitthārato udāne āgatameva.
atk-s0502a:3991_2: bhagavato kira bhikkhusaṅghassa ca pañcannaṃ mahānadīnaṃ mahoghasadise lābhasakkāre uppanne hatalābhasakkārā
atk-s0502a:3991_3: aññatitthiyā sūriyuggamanakāle khajjopanakā viya nippabhā hutvā ekato sannipatitvā mantayiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:3991_6: kena nu kho saddhiṃ ekato hutvā samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ uppādetvā lābhasakkāramassa antaradhāpeyyāmā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3991_9: Te ekadivasaṃ sundariṃ titthiyārāmaṃ pavisitvā vanditvā ṭhitaṃ nālapiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3991_10: Sā punappunaṃ sallapantīpi paṭivacanaṃ alabhitvā “api panayyā,
atk-s0502a:3991_12: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ amhe viheṭhetvā hatalābhasakkāre katvā vicarantaṃ na passasī”ti?
atk-s0502a:3991_16: samaṇassa gotamassa ayasaṃ āropetvā mahājanaṃ tava kathaṃ gāhāpetvā hatalābhasakkāraṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0502a:3991_17: Sā taṃ sutvā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pakkantā tato paṭṭhāya mālāgandhavilepanakappūrakaṭukaphalādīni
atk-s0502a:3991_18: gahetvā sāyaṃ mahājanassa satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā nagaraṃ pavisanakāle jetavanābhimukhī gacchati,
atk-s0502a:3991_19: “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti ca puṭṭhā “samaṇassa gotamassa santikaṃ gamissāmi,
atk-s0502a:3991_20: ahañhi tena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasāmī”ti vatvā aññatarasmiṃ titthiyārāme vasitvā pātova jetavanamaggaṃ otaritvā nagarābhimukhī āgacchantī “kiṃ, sundari,
atk-s0502a:3991_21: kahaṃ gatāsī”ti puṭṭhā “samaṇena gotamena saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā taṃ kilesaratiyā ramāpetvā āgatāmhī”ti vadati.
atk-s0502a:3992_0: Atha te katipāhaccayena dhuttānaṃ kahāpaṇe datvā “gacchatha sundariṃ māretvā samaṇassa gotamassa gandhakuṭiyā
atk-s0502a:3992_3: Tato titthiyā “sundariṃ na passāmā”ti kolāhalaṃ katvā rañño ārocetvā “kahaṃ vo āsaṅkā”ti vuttā “imesu divasesu jetavane vasati,
atk-s0502a:3992_4: tatthassā pavattiṃ na jānāmā”ti vatvā “tena hi gacchatha,
atk-s0502a:3992_5: naṃ vicinathā”ti raññā anuññātā attano upaṭṭhāke gahetvā jetavanaṃ gantvā vicinantā mālākacavarantare
atk-s0502a:3992_6: taṃ disvā mañcakaṃ āropetvā nagaraṃ pavesetvā “samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā ‘satthārā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ
atk-s0502a:3992_7: paṭicchādessāmā’ti sundariṃ māretvā mālākacavarantare nikkhipiṃsū”ti rañño ārocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3992_10: Te nagaravīthīsu “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni vatvā puna rañño nivesanadvāraṃ āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3992_11: Rājā sundariyā sarīraṃ āmakasusāne aṭṭakaṃ āropetvā rakkhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:3992_12: Sāvatthivāsino ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sesā yebhuyyena “passatha samaṇānaṃ sakyaputtiyānaṃ kamma”ntiādīni
atk-s0502a:3992_13: vatvā antonagarepi bahinagarepi bhikkhū akkosantā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a:3992_15: Satthā “tena hi tumhepi te manusse evaṃ paṭicodethā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:3998_0: Tattha abhūtavādīti parassa dosaṃ adisvāva musāvādaṃ katvā tucchena paraṃ abbhācikkhanto.
atk-s0502a:3998_1: Katvāti yo vā pana pāpakammaṃ katvā “nāhaṃ etaṃ karomī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:3998_2: Pecca samā bhavantīti te ubhopi janā paralokaṃ gantvā nirayaṃ upagamanena gatiyā samā bhavanti.
atk-s0502a:3998_5: Bahukañhi pāpakammaṃ katvā ciraṃ niraye paccanti,
atk-s0502a:3998_7: Yasmā pana nesaṃ ubhinnampi lāmakameva kammaṃ,
atk-s0502a:3998_10: Paratthāti imassa pana padassa purato peccapadena sambandho.
atk-s0502a:3998_11: Pecca parattha ito gantvā te nihīnakammā paraloke samā bhavantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:3999_0: Rājā “sundariyā aññehi māritabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti purise uyyojesi.
atk-s0502a:3999_1: Atha te dhuttā tehi kahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivantā aññamaññaṃ kalahaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:3999_3: “tvaṃ sundariṃ ekappahāreneva māretvā mālākacavarantare nikkhipitvā tato laddhakahāpaṇehi suraṃ pivasi,
atk-s0502a:3999_5: Rājapurisā te dhutte gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:3999_6: Atha ne rājā “tumhehi sā māritā”ti pucchi. “Āma, devā”ti.
atk-s0502a:3999_11: Tena hi gacchatha tumhe evaṃ vadantā nagaraṃ āhiṇḍatha –
atk-s0502a:3999_12: “ayaṃ sundarī samaṇassa gotamassa avaṇṇaṃ āropetukāmehi amhehi mārāpitā,
atk-s0502a:3999_19: Tato paṭṭhāya buddhānaṃ sakkāro mahā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4002_0: Kāsāvakaṇṭhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto duccaritaphalānubhāvena pīḷite satte ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4003_0: Āyasmā hi moggallāno lakkhaṇattherena saddhiṃ gijjhakūṭā orohanto aṭṭhisaṅkhalikapetādīnaṃ attabhāve
atk-s0502a:4003_1: disvā sitaṃ karonto lakkhaṇattherena sitakāraṇaṃ puṭṭho “akālo, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4003_3: tathāgatassa santike maṃ puccheyyāsī”ti vatvā tathāgatassa santike therena puṭṭho aṭṭhisaṅkhalikapetādīnaṃ diṭṭhabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā “idhāhaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4003_4: gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ bhikkhuṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ,

atk-s0502a:4003_7: Satthā tesaṃ kassapadasabalassa sāsane pabbajitvā pabbajjāya anurūpaṃ kātuṃ asakkontānaṃ pāpabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā
atk-s0502a:4003_8: tasmiṃ khaṇe tattha nisinnānaṃ bahūnaṃ pāpabhikkhūnaṃ duccaritakammassa vipākaṃ dassento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4006_0: Pāpā pāpehi kammehi, nirayaṃ te upapajjare”ti.
atk-s0502a:4007_3: tathārūpā pāpapuggalā attanā katehi akusalakammehi nirayaṃ upapajjanti,
atk-s0502a:4007_4: te tattha paccitvā tato cutā vipākāvasesena petesupi evaṃ paccantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4011_0: Seyyo ayoguḷoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā vesāliṃ upanissāya mahāvane viharanto vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4012_0: Tadā hi satthā te bhikkhū “kiṃ pana tumhe,
atk-s0502a:4012_2: udarassatthāya gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsitthā”ti vatvā tehi “āma,
atk-s0502a:4012_3: bhante”ti vutte te bhikkhū anekapariyāyena garahitvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4016_0: Tattha yañce bhuñjeyyāti yaṃ dussīlo nissīlapuggalo kāyādīhi asaññato raṭṭhavāsīhi saddhāya dinnaṃ raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ
atk-s0502a:4016_2: tatto āditto aggivaṇṇo ayoguḷova bhutto seyyo sundarataro.
atk-s0502a:4016_5: dussīlo pana saddhādeyyaṃ bhuñjitvā anekānipi jātisatāni niraye pacceyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4020_0: Cattāri ṭhānānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto anāthapiṇḍikassa bhāgineyyaṃ khemakaṃ nāma seṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4021_1: yebhuyyena itthiyo taṃ disvā rāgābhibhūtā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
