atk-s0502a:4021_6: Atha naṃ dutiyampi tatiyampi rājapurisā gahetvā rañño dassesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4021_9: taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā taṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4021_11: Satthā tassa saṃvegakathaṃ vatvā paradārasevanāya dosaṃ dassento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4032_6: evaṃ seyyaṃ alabhitvā anicchitaṃ parittakameva kālaṃ seyyaṃ labhati.
atk-s0502a:4032_7: Apuññalābho cāti evaṃ tassa ayañca apuññalābho,
atk-s0502a:4032_8: tena ca apuññena nirayasaṅkhātā pāpikā gati hoti.
atk-s0502a:4032_9: Ratī ca thokikāti yā tassa bhītassa bhītāya itthiyā saddhiṃ rati,
atk-s0502a:4032_11: Garukanti rājā ca hatthacchedādivasena garukaṃ daṇḍaṃ paṇeti.
atk-s0502a:4032_12: Tasmāti yasmā paradāraṃ sevanto etāni apuññādīni pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0502a:4033_3: So kira kassapabuddhakāle uttamamallo hutvā dve suvaṇṇapaṭākā dasabalassa kañcanathūpe āropetvā patthanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4033_4: paṭṭhapesi “ṭhapetvā ñātisālohititthiyo avasesā maṃ disvā rajjantū”ti.
atk-s0502a:4033_6: Tena taṃ nibbattanibbattaṭṭhāne disvā paresaṃ itthiyo sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ nāsakkhiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4036_0: Kuso yathāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ dubbacabhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4037_0: Eko kira bhikkhu asañcicca ekaṃ tiṇaṃ chinditvā kukkucce uppanne ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4037_2: tassa kiṃ hotī”ti taṃ attanā katabhāvaṃ ārocetvā pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4037_3: Atha naṃ itaro “tvaṃ tiṇassa chinnakāraṇā kiñci hotīti saññaṃ karosi,
atk-s0502a:4037_5: desetvā pana muccatī”ti vatvā sayampi ubhohi hatthehi tiṇaṃ luñcitvā aggahesi.
atk-s0502a:4037_7: Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4042_0: “Yaṃ kiñci sithilaṃ kammaṃ, saṃkiliṭṭhañca yaṃ vataṃ;
atk-s0502a:4043_0: Saṅkassaraṃ brahmacariyaṃ, na taṃ hoti mahapphalaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4046_0: Sithilo hi paribbājo, bhiyyo ākirate raja”nti.
atk-s0502a:4047_0: Tattha kusoti yaṃ kiñci tikhiṇadhāraṃ tiṇaṃ antamaso tālapaṇṇampi,
atk-s0502a:4047_3: evameva samaṇadhammasaṅkhātaṃ sāmaññampi khaṇḍasīlāditāya dupparāmaṭṭhaṃ nirayāyupakaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a:4047_5: Sithilanti olīyitvā karaṇena sithilagāhaṃ katvā kataṃ yaṃkiñci kammaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4047_8: uposathakiccādīsu aññatarakiccena sannipatitampi saṅghaṃ disvā “addhā ime mama cariyaṃ ñatvā maṃ ukkhipitukāmāva
atk-s0502a:4047_9: sannipatitā”ti evaṃ attano āsaṅkāhi saritaṃ ussaṅkitaṃ parisaṅkitaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4047_10: Na taṃ hotīti taṃ evarūpaṃ samaṇadhammasaṅkhātaṃ brahmacariyaṃ tassa puggalassa mahapphalaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0502a:4047_11: tassa mahapphalābhāveneva bhikkhadāyakānampissa na mahapphalaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4047_12: Kayirā ceti tasmā yaṃ kammaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0502a:4047_14: Daḷhamenaṃ parakkameti thirakatameva katvā avattasamādāno hutvā enaṃ kayirā.
atk-s0502a:4047_16: Bhiyyo ākirate rajanti abbhantare vijjamānaṃ rāgarajādiṃ evarūpo samaṇadhammo apanetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:4047_17: atha kho tassa upari aparampi rāgarajādiṃ ākiratīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4048_1: sopi bhikkhu saṃvare ṭhatvā pacchā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:4051_0: Akatanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ issāpakataṃ itthiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4052_0: Tassā kira sāmiko ekāya gehadāsiyā saddhiṃ santhavaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:4052_1: Sā issāpakatā taṃ dāsiṃ hatthapādesu bandhitvā tassā kaṇṇanāsaṃ chinditvā ekasmiṃ guḷhagabbhe pakkhipitvā
atk-s0502a:4052_2: dvāraṃ pidahitvā tassa kammassa attanā katabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetuṃ “ehi, ayya,
atk-s0502a:4052_3: vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇissāmā”ti sāmikaṃ ādāya vihāraṃ gantvā dhammaṃ suṇantī nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:4052_4: Athassā āgantukañātakā gehaṃ āgantvā dvāraṃ vivaritvā taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā dāsiṃ mocayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4052_5: Sā vihāraṃ gantvā catuparisamajjhe ṭhitā tamatthaṃ dasabalassa ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:4052_6: Satthā tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “duccaritaṃ nāma ‘idaṃ me aññe na jānantī’ti appamattakampi na kātabbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4052_8: Paṭicchādetvā katampi hi duccaritaṃ nāma pacchānutāpaṃ karoti,
atk-s0502a:4052_9: sucaritaṃ pāmojjameva janetī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4055_0: Katañca sukataṃ seyyo, yaṃ katvā nānutappatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4056_0: Tattha dukkaṭanti sāvajjaṃ apāyasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ akatameva seyyo varaṃ uttamaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4056_2: Sukatanti anavajjaṃ pana sukhadāyakaṃ sugatisaṃvattanikameva kammaṃ kataṃ seyyo.
atk-s0502a:4056_3: Yaṃ katvāti yaṃ kammaṃ katvā pacchā anussaraṇakāle na tappati nānutappati,
atk-s0502a:4057_0: Desanāvasāne upāsako ca sā ca itthī sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4057_1: Tañca pana dāsiṃ tattheva bhujissaṃ katvā dhammacāriniṃ kariṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4060_0: Nagaraṃ yathāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule āgantuke bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4061_0: Te kira ekasmiṃ paccante vassaṃ upagantvā paṭhamamāse sukhaṃ vihariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4061_1: Majjhimamāse corā āgantvā tesaṃ gocaragāmaṃ paharitvā karamare gahetvā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4061_2: Tato paṭṭhāya manussā corānaṃ paṭibāhanatthāya taṃ paccantanagaraṃ abhisaṅkharontā te bhikkhū sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4061_3: Te aphāsukaṃ vassaṃ vasitvā vutthavassā satthu dassanāya sāvatthiṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4061_9: tato paṭṭhāya manussā nagaraṃ abhisaṅkharontā sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4061_14: bhikkhunā nāma yathā te manussā nagaraṃ gopayiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:4061_15: evaṃ attabhāvameva gopayituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4064_0: Evaṃ gopetha attānaṃ, khaṇo vo mā upaccagā;
atk-s0502a:4066_2: yathā tehi manussehi taṃ paccantanagaraṃ dvārapākārādīni thirāni karontehi saantaraṃ,
atk-s0502a:4066_3: aṭṭālakaparikhādīni thirāni karontehi sabāhiranti santarabāhiraṃ suguttaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0502a:4066_4: evaṃ tumhepi satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ajjhattikāni cha dvārāni pidahitvā dvārarakkhikaṃ satiṃ avissajjetvā
atk-s0502a:4066_5: yathā gayhamānāni bāhirāni cha āyatanāni ajjhattikānaṃ upaghātāya saṃvattanti,
atk-s0502a:4066_6: tathā aggahaṇena tānipi thirāni katvā tesaṃ appavesāya dvārarakkhikaṃ satiṃ appahāya vicarantā attānaṃ gopethāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4066_7: Khaṇo vo mā upaccagāti yo hi evaṃ attānaṃ na gopeti,
atk-s0502a:4066_8: taṃ puggalaṃ ayaṃ buddhuppādakhaṇo majjhimadese uppattikhaṇo sammādiṭṭhiyā paṭiladdhakhaṇo channaṃ āyatanānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4066_11: Khaṇātītāti ye hi taṃ khaṇaṃ atītā,
atk-s0502a:4066_12: te ca puggale so ca khaṇo atīto,
atk-s0502a:4066_13: te nirayamhi samappitā hutvā tattha nibbattitvā socantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4067_0: Desanāvasāne te bhikkhū uppannasaṃvegā arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4070_0: Alajjitāyeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto nigaṇṭhe ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4071_0: Ekasmiñhi divase bhikkhū nigaṇṭhe disvā kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4071_1: sabbaso appaṭicchannehi acelakehi ime nigaṇṭhā varatarā,
atk-s0502a:4071_4: Taṃ sutvā nigaṇṭhā “na mayaṃ etena kāraṇena paṭicchādema,
atk-s0502a:4071_7: te no bhikkhābhājanesu mā patiṃsūti iminā kāraṇena paṭicchādemā”ti vatvā tehi saddhiṃ vādapaṭivādavasena bahuṃ kathaṃ kathesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4071_8: Bhikkhū satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā nisinnakāle taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:4071_10: alajjitabbena lajjitvā lajjitabbena alajjamānā nāma duggatiparāyaṇāva hontī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4078_2: te pana taṃ paṭicchādetvā vicarantā tena lajjanti nāma.
atk-s0502a:4078_4: Te pana taṃ apaṭicchādetvā vicarantā lajjitāye na lajjanti nāma.
atk-s0502a:4078_5: Tena tesaṃ alajjitabbena lajjitaṃ lajjitabbena alajjitaṃ tucchagahaṇabhāvena ca aññathāgahaṇabhāvena ca micchādiṭṭhi hoti.
atk-s0502a:4078_6: Taṃ samādiyitvā vicarantā pana te micchādiṭṭhisamādānā sattā nirayādibhedaṃ duggatiṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4078_7: Abhayeti bhikkhābhājanaṃ nissāya rāgadosamohamānadiṭṭhikilesaduccaritabhayānaṃ anuppajjanato bhikkhābhājanaṃ abhayaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a:4078_8: bhayena taṃ paṭicchādentā pana abhaye bhayadassino nāma.
atk-s0502a:4078_9: Hirikopīnaṅgaṃ pana nissāya rāgādīnaṃ uppajjanato taṃ bhayaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a:4078_11: Tassa taṃ ayathāgahaṇassa samādinnattā micchādiṭṭhisamādānā sattā duggahiṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4079_0: Desanāvasāne bahū nigaṇṭhā saṃviggamānasā pabbajiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4082_0: Avajjeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto titthiyasāvake ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4083_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye aññatitthiyasāvakā attano putte sammādiṭṭhikānaṃ upāsakānaṃ puttehi saddhiṃ saparivāre
atk-s0502a:4083_1: kīḷamāne disvā gehaṃ āgatakāle “na vo samaṇā sakyaputtiyā vanditabbā,
atk-s0502a:4083_2: nāpi tesaṃ vihāraṃ pavisitabba”nti sapathaṃ kārayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4083_3: Te ekadivasaṃ jetavanavihārassa bahidvārakoṭṭhakasāmante kīḷantā pipāsitā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4083_4: Athekaṃ upāsakadārakaṃ “tvaṃ ettha gantvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā amhākampi āharāhī”ti pahiṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4083_5: So vihāraṃ pavisitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pānīyaṃ pivitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:4083_6: Atha naṃ satthā “tvameva pānīyaṃ pivitvā gantvā itarepi pānīyapivanatthāya idheva pesehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4083_9: Satthā te pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ sappāyaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetvā te acalasaddhe katvā saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4083_10: Te sakāni gehāni gantvā tamatthaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4083_11: Atha nesaṃ mātāpitaro “puttakā no vipannadiṭṭhikā jātā”ti domanassappattā parideviṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4083_12: Atha tesaṃ chekā sambahulā paṭivissakā manussā āgantvā domanassavūpasamanatthāya dhammaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4083_13: Te tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “ime dārake samaṇassa gotamasseva niyyādessāmā”ti mahantena ñātigaṇena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4083_14: Satthā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4090_3: Dasavatthukāya micchādiṭṭhiyā pana tassā upanissayabhūte dhamme ca avajjadassino,
atk-s0502a:4090_4: etissā avajjaṃ vajjato vajjañca avajjato ñatvā gahaṇasaṅkhātāya micchādiṭṭhiyā samādinnattā micchādiṭṭhisamādānā sattā duggatiṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4091_0: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya aparāparaṃ dhammaṃ suṇantā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4097_0: Ahaṃ nāgo vāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kosambiyaṃ viharanto attānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4098_0: Māgaṇḍiyā tāsaṃ kiñci kātuṃ asakkuṇitvā “samaṇassa gotamasseva kattabbaṃ karissāmī”ti nāgarānaṃ lañjaṃ
atk-s0502a:4098_1: datvā “samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ antonagaraṃ pavisitvā carantaṃ dāsakammakaraporisehi saddhiṃ akkosetvā paribhāsetvā
atk-s0502a:4098_3: Micchādiṭṭhikā tīsu ratanesu appasannā antonagaraṃ paviṭṭhaṃ satthāraṃ anubandhitvā “corosi bālosi mūḷhosi
atk-s0502a:4098_4: thenosi oṭṭhosi goṇosi gadrabhosi nerayikosi tiracchānagatosi,
atk-s0502a:4098_6: duggatiyeva tuyhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā”ti dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanti paribhāsanti.
atk-s0502a:4098_7: Taṃ sutvā āyasmā ānando satthāraṃ etadavoca – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4098_13: “Tattha manussesu akkosantesu paribhāsantesu puna kattha gamissāmānandā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4098_21: tattheva tasmiṃ vūpasante aññattha gantuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:4098_26: Saṅgāmaṃ otiṇṇahatthino hi catūhi disāhi āgate sare sahituṃ bhāro,
atk-s0502a:4098_27: tatheva bahūhi dussīlehi kathitakathānaṃ sahanaṃ nāma mayhaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā attānaṃ ārabbha dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4107_0: Kuñjarā ca mahānāgā, attadanto tato vara”nti.
atk-s0502a:4108_3: Titikkhissanti yathā saṅgāmāvacaro sudanto mahānāgo khamo sattipahārādīni cāpato muccitvā attani patite sare avihaññamāno titikkhati,
atk-s0502a:4108_6: Dussīlo hīti ayañhi lokiyamahājano bahudussīlo attano attano rucivasena vācaṃ nicchāretvā ghaṭṭento carati,
atk-s0502a:4108_8: Samitinti uyyānakīḷamaṇḍalādīsu mahājanamajjhaṃ gacchantā dantameva goṇajātiṃ vā assajātiṃ vā yāne yojetvā nayanti.
atk-s0502a:4108_9: Rājāti tathārūpeheva vāhanehi gacchanto rājāpi dantameva abhirūhati.
atk-s0502a:4108_10: Manussesūti manussesupi catūhi ariyamaggehi danto nibbisevanova seṭṭho.
atk-s0502a:4108_11: Yotivākyanti yo evarūpaṃ atikkamavacanaṃ punappunaṃ vuccamānampi titikkhati na paṭippharati na vihaññati,
atk-s0502a:4109_5: Attadantoti ete assatarā ca sindhavā ca kuñjarā ca dantāva varaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4109_7: Yo pana catūhi ariyamaggehi attano dantatāya attadanto nibbisevano,
atk-s0502a:4110_0: Desanāvasāne lañjaṃ gahetvā vīthisiṅghāṭakādīsu ṭhatvā akkosanto paribhāsanto sabbopi so mahājano sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:4113_0: Na hi etehīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ hatthācariyapubbakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4114_0: So kira ekadivasaṃ aciravatīnadītīre hatthidamakaṃ “ekaṃ hatthiṃ damessāmī”ti attanā icchitaṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4114_1: sikkhāpetuṃ asakkontaṃ disvā samīpe ṭhite bhikkhū āmantetvā āha – “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4114_2: sace ayaṃ hatthācariyo imaṃ hatthiṃ asukaṭṭhāne nāma vijjheyya,
atk-s0502a:4114_4: So tassa kathaṃ sutvā tathā katvā taṃ hatthiṃ sudantaṃ damesi.
atk-s0502a:4114_5: Te bhikkhū taṃ pavattiṃ satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4114_6: Satthā taṃ bhikkhuṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tayā evaṃ vutta”nti pucchitvā “saccaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4114_10: Na hi etehi yānehi agatapubbaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ samatthā nāma atthi,
atk-s0502a:4114_11: attanā pana sudantena sakkā agatapubbaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantuṃ,
atk-s0502a:4114_13: kiṃ te etesaṃ damanenā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4116_0: “Na hi etehi yānehi, gaccheyya agataṃ disaṃ;
atk-s0502a:4118_2: na hi etehi yānehi koci puggalo supinantenapi agatapubbattā “agata”nti saṅkhātaṃ nibbānadisaṃ tathā gaccheyya,
atk-s0502a:4118_3: yathā pubbabhāge indriyadamena aparabhāge ariyamaggabhāvanāya sudantena danto nibbisevano sappañño puggalo taṃ agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0502a:4122_0: Dhanapāloti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā sāvatthiyaṃ viharanto aññatarassa parijiṇṇabrāhmaṇassa putte ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4123_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko brāhmaṇo aṭṭhasatasahassavibhavo vayappattānaṃ catunnaṃ puttānaṃ āvāhaṃ katvā cattāri satasahassāni adāsi.
atk-s0502a:4123_3: tassā kucchiyaṃ nibbattānaṃ vasena kulasantakaṃ bhijjissati,
atk-s0502a:4123_4: handa naṃ mayaṃ saṅgaṇhissāmā”ti te taṃ paṇītehi ghāsacchādanādīhi upaṭṭhahantā hatthapādasambāhanādīni
atk-s0502a:4123_5: karontā upaṭṭhahitvā ekadivasamassa divā niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa hatthapāde sambāhantā pāṭiyekkaṃ gharāvāse
atk-s0502a:4123_6: ādīnavaṃ vatvā “mayaṃ tumhe iminā nīhārena yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhahissāma,
atk-s0502a:4123_8: Brāhmaṇo puna ekekassa satasahassaṃ datvā attano nivatthapārupanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ upabhogaparibhogaṃ cattāro koṭṭhāse katvā niyyādesi.
atk-s0502a:4123_10: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ nhatvā āgacchantaṃ dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā suṇhā evamāha –
atk-s0502a:4123_11: “kiṃ tayā jeṭṭhaputtassa sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā atirekaṃ dinnaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:4123_12: nanu sabbesaṃ dve dve satasahassāni dinnāni,
atk-s0502a:4123_13: kiṃ sesaputtānaṃ gharassa maggaṃ na jānāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4123_14: Sopi “nassa vasalī”ti kujjhitvā aññassa gharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4123_15: Tatopi katipāhaccayena imināva upāyena palāpito aññassāti evaṃ ekagharampi pavesanaṃ alabhamāno paṇḍaraṅgapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0502a:4123_16: pabbajitvā bhikkhāya caranto kālānamaccayena jarājiṇṇo dubbhojanadukkhaseyyāhi milātasarīro bhikkhāya
atk-s0502a:4123_17: caranto āgamma pīṭhikāya nipanno niddaṃ okkamitvā uṭṭhāya nisinno attānaṃ oloketvā puttesu attano patiṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4123_19: “samaṇo kira gotamo abbhākuṭiko uttānamukho sukhasambhāso paṭisanthārakusalo,
atk-s0502a:4123_20: sakkā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ labhitu”nti.
atk-s0502a:4123_21: So nivāsanapārupanaṃ saṇṭhāpetvā bhikkhabhājanaṃ gahetvā daṇḍamādāya bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4124_0: Atha kho aññataro brāhmaṇamahāsālo lūkho lūkhapāvuraṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
atk-s0502a:4124_2: Satthā ekamantaṃ nisinnena tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā etadavoca –
atk-s0502a:4124_7: te maṃ dārehi saṃpuccha gharā nikkhāmentīti.
atk-s0502a:4124_9: imā gāthāyo pariyāpuṇitvā sabhāyaṃ mahājanakāye sannipatite puttesu ca sannisinnesu bhāsassu –
atk-s0502a:4126_0: Te maṃ dārehi saṃpuccha, sāva vārenti sūkaraṃ.
atk-s0502a:4127_0: “Asantā kira maṃ jammā, tāta tātāti bhāsare;
atk-s0502a:4131_0: “Daṇḍova kira me seyyo, yañce puttā anassavā;
atk-s0502a:4132_0: Caṇḍampi goṇaṃ vāreti, atho caṇḍampi kukkuraṃ.
atk-s0502a:4135_0: So bhagavato santike tā gāthāyo uggaṇhitvā tathārūpe brāhmaṇānaṃ samāgamadivase sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitesu
atk-s0502a:4135_1: puttesu taṃ sabhaṃ ogāhitvā brāhmaṇānaṃ majjhe mahārahesu āsanesu nisinnesu “ayaṃ me kālo”ti sabhāya
atk-s0502a:4135_6: Tena ca samayena manussānaṃ vattaṃ hoti “yo mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ khādanto mātāpitaro na poseti,
atk-s0502a:4135_8: Tasmā te brāhmaṇaputtā pitu pādesu patitvā “jīvitaṃ no, tāta,
atk-s0502a:4135_14: ajja paṭṭhāya pitaraṃ na sammā paṭijaggissatha,
atk-s0502a:4135_16: Te bhītā pitaraṃ pīṭhe nisīdāpetvā sayaṃ ukkhipitvā gehaṃ netvā sarīraṃ telena abbhañjitvā ubbaṭṭetvā

atk-s0502a:4136_1: “ayaṃ me sampatti samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nissāya laddhā”ti paṇṇākāratthāya ekaṃ dussayugaṃ ādāya bhagavato santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4136_2: gantvā katapaṭisanthāro ekamantaṃ nisinno taṃ dussayugaṃ bhagavato pādamūle ṭhapetvā “mayaṃ,

atk-s0502a:4144_0: Tattha dhanapālo nāmāti tadā kāsikaraññā hatthācariyaṃ pesetvā ramaṇīye nāgavane gāhāpitassa hatthino etaṃ nāmaṃ.

atk-s0502a:4144_8: Baddho kabaḷaṃ na bhuñjatīti so baddho hatthisālaṃ pana netvā vicitrasāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā katagandhaparibhaṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:4144_9: upari baddhavicitravitānāya bhūmiyā ṭhapito raññā rājārahena nānaggarasena bhojanena upaṭṭhāpitopi kiñci

atk-s0502a:4144_16: Taṃ pana yasmā tasmiṃ nāgavaneyeva ṭhito sakkā pūretuṃ,

atk-s0502a:4145_0: Desanāvasāne saddhiṃ puttehi ceva suṇisāhi ca brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahīti.

atk-s0502a:4149_8: atibahubhojanaṃ evaṃ dukkhaṃ hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4155_3: Gharasūkaro hi daharakālato paṭṭhāya posiyamāno thūlasarīrakāle gehā bahi nikkhamituṃ alabhanto heṭṭhāmañcādīsu

atk-s0502a:4158_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā uttaramāṇavaṃ uggaṇhāpetvā “imaṃ gāthaṃ rañño bhojanavelāya pavedeyyāsi,

atk-s0502a:4158_3: Rājā aparena samayena nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhito susallahukasarīro sukhappatto satthari uppannavissāso sattāhaṃ asadisadānaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0502a:4161_0: Idaṃ pureti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sānuṃ nāma sāmaṇeraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4162_0: So kira ekissā upāsikāya ekaputtako ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4162_2: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sīlavā ahosi vattasampanno,
atk-s0502a:4162_4: Māsassa aṭṭhame divase pātova uṭṭhāya udakamāḷake udakaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā dhammassavanaggaṃ sammajjitvā āsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4162_5: paññāpetvā dīpaṃ jāletvā madhurassarena dhammassavanaṃ ghoseti.
atk-s0502a:4162_6: Bhikkhū tassa thāmaṃ ñatvā “sarabhaññaṃ bhaṇa sāmaṇerā”ti ajjhesanti.
atk-s0502a:4162_8: kāyo vā bādhatī”ti kiñci paccāhāraṃ akatvā dhammāsanaṃ abhirūhitvā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya sarabhaññaṃ
atk-s0502a:4162_9: vatvā otaranto “mayhaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ imasmiṃ sarabhaññe pattiṃ dammī”ti vadati.
atk-s0502a:4162_10: Tassa manussā mātāpitaro pattiyā dinnabhāvaṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0502a:4162_11: Anantarattabhāve panassa mātā yakkhinī hutvā nibbattā,
atk-s0502a:4162_12: sā devatāhi saddhiṃ āgantvā dhammaṃ sutvā “sāmaṇerena dinnapattiṃ anumodāmi,
atk-s0502a:4162_14: “Sīlasampanno ca nāma bhikkhu sadevakassa lokassa piyo hotī”ti tasmiṃ sāmaṇere devatā salajjā sagāravā
atk-s0502a:4162_15: mahābrahmānaṃ viya aggikkhandhaṃ viya ca naṃ maññanti.
atk-s0502a:4162_16: Sāmaṇere gāravena tañca yakkhiniṃ garukaṃ katvā passanti.
atk-s0502a:4162_17: Tā dhammassavanayakkhasamāgamādīsu “sānumātā sānumātā”ti yakkhiniyā aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ denti.
atk-s0502a:4162_18: Mahesakkhāpi yakkhā taṃ disvā maggā okkamanti,
atk-s0502a:4163_0: Atha kho sāmaṇero vuḍḍhimanvāya paripakkindriyo anabhiratiyā pīḷito anabhiratiṃ vinodetuṃ asakkonto paruḷhakesanakho
atk-s0502a:4163_1: kiliṭṭhanivāsanapārupano kassaci anārocetvā pattacīvaramādāya ekakova mātugharaṃ agamāsi.

atk-s0502a:4163_6: Sā upāsikā nānappakārena gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ dassetvā puttaṃ ovadamānāpi saññāpetuṃ asakkontī “appeva

atk-s0502a:4163_9: yāguṃ pivitvā katabhattakiccassa te manāpāni vatthāni nīharitvā dassāmī”ti vatvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.

atk-s0502a:4163_16: gacchāmissa vibbhamane antarāyaṃ karissāmī”ti āgantvā tassa sarīre adhimuccitvā gīvaṃ parivattetvā kheḷena paggharantena bhūmiyaṃ nipati.
atk-s0502a:4163_17: Upāsikā puttassa taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā vegena gantvā puttaṃ āliṅgetvā ūrūsu nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4163_19: Upāsikā pana paridevamānā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4167_0: Na tehi yakkhā kīḷanti, iti me arahataṃ sutaṃ;
atk-s0502a:4168_0: Sā dāni ajja passāmi, yakkhā kīḷanti sānunā”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4173_0: Na tehi yakkhā kīḷanti, sāhu te arahataṃ suta”nti. –
atk-s0502a:4176_0: Mākāsi pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho.
atk-s0502a:4177_0: “Sace ca pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, karissasi karosi vā;
atk-s0502a:4178_0: Na te dukkhā pamutyatthi, uppaccāpi palāyato”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4179_0: Evaṃ pāpakaṃ kammaṃ katvā sakuṇassa viya uppatitvā palāyatopi te mokkho natthīti vatvā sā yakkhinī sāmaṇeraṃ muñci.
atk-s0502a:4179_1: So akkhīni ummīletvā mātaraṃ kese vikiriya assasantiṃ passasantiṃ rodamānaṃ sakalagāmavāsino ca sannipatite

atk-s0502a:4179_3: mātā me avidūre nisīditvā taṇḍule dhovi,
atk-s0502a:4179_5: kiṃ nu kho eta”nti nipannakova mātaraṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:4180_0: “Mataṃ vā amma rodanti, yo vā jīvaṃ na dissati;
atk-s0502a:4181_0: Jīvantaṃ amma passantī, kasmā maṃ amma rodasī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4182_0: Athassa mātā vatthukāmakilesakāme pahāya pabbajitassa puna vibbhamanatthaṃ āgamane ādīnavaṃ dassentī āha –

atk-s0502a:4192_3: tātā”ti pucchitvā paripuṇṇavassabhāvaṃ ñatvā ticīvaraṃ paṭiyādesi.
atk-s0502a:4192_5: Athassa acirūpasampannassa satthā cittaniggahe ussāhaṃ janento “cittaṃ nāmetaṃ nānārammaṇesu dīgharattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4192_6: cārikaṃ carantaṃ aniggaṇhantassa sotthibhāvo nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:4192_7: tasmā aṅkusena mattahatthino viya cittassa niggaṇhane yogo karaṇīyo”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4198_1: idaṃ cittaṃ nāma ito pubbe rūpādīsu ca ārammaṇesu rāgādīnaṃ yena kāraṇena icchati,

atk-s0502a:4198_4: tatheva vicaraṇato yathāsukhaṃ dīgharattaṃ cārikaṃ cari,
atk-s0502a:4198_5: taṃ ajja ahaṃ pabhinnaṃ mattahatthiṃ hatthācariyasaṅkhāto cheko aṅkusaggaho aṅkusena viya yonisomanasikārena niggahessāmi,
atk-s0502a:4199_0: Desanāvasāne sānunā saddhiṃ dhammassavanāya upasaṅkamantānaṃ bahūnaṃ devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4199_1: Sopāyasmā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā mahādhammakathiko hutvā vīsavassasataṃ ṭhatvā sakalajambudīpaṃ saṅkhobhetvā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0502a:4202_0: Appamādaratāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kosalarañño pāveyyakaṃ nāma hatthiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4203_0: So kira hatthī taruṇakāle mahābalo hutvā aparena samayena jarāvātavegabbhāhato hutvā ekaṃ mahantaṃ saraṃ oruyha kalale laggitvā uttarituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:4203_1: Mahājano taṃ disvā “evarūpopi nāma hatthī imaṃ dubbalabhāvaṃ patto”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4203_2: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā hatthācariyaṃ āṇāpesi – “gaccha, ācariya,
atk-s0502a:4203_4: So gantvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne saṅgāmasīsaṃ dassetvā saṅgāmabheriṃ ākoṭāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4203_6: Bhikkhū taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā satthu ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4203_11: Tasmā yoniso padahitvā tumhepi tato attānaṃ uddharathā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4207_0: Tattha appamādaratāti satiyā avippavāse abhiratā hotha.
atk-s0502a:4207_1: Sacittanti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu attano cittaṃ yathā vītikkamaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0502a:4207_3: Duggāti yathā so paṅke sanno kuñjaro hatthehi ca pādehi ca vāyāmaṃ katvā paṅkaduggato attānaṃ uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhito,
atk-s0502a:4211_0: Sace labhethāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pālileyyakaṃ nissāya rakkhitavanasaṇḍe viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4211_1: Vatthu yamakavagge “pare ca na vijānantī”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya āgatameva.

atk-s0502a:4212_1: Sāvatthinagarato “anāthapiṇḍiko visākhā mahāupāsikā”ti evamādīni mahākulāni ānandattherassa sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “satthāraṃ no, bhante,
atk-s0502a:4212_3: Disāvāsinopi pañcasatā bhikkhū vuṭṭhavassā ānandattheraṃ upasaṅkamitvā “cirassutā no,

atk-s0502a:4212_9: Thero te bhikkhū ādāya tattha gantvā “temāsaṃ ekavihārino tathāgatassa santikaṃ ettakehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0502a:4212_10: upasaṅkamanaṃ ayutta”nti cintetvā te bhikkhū bahi ṭhapetvā ekakova satthāraṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0502a:4212_16: So tattheva daṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā pattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaṃ āpucchi.
atk-s0502a:4212_19: satthu nisīdanapāsāṇaphalake attano parikkhāraṃ na ṭhapessatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:4212_21: Vattasampannā hi garūnaṃ āsane vā sayane vā attano parikkhāraṃ na ṭhapenti.

atk-s0502a:4227_0: Eko care na ca pāpāni kayirā,

atk-s0502a:4229_3: paṭicchannaparissaye cāti sabbeva parissaye abhibhavitvā tena saddhiṃ attamano upaṭṭhitasatī hutvā careyya,

atk-s0502a:4230_2: yathā vijitabhūmipadeso rājā “idaṃ rajjaṃ nāma mahantaṃ pamādaṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4230_3: kiṃ me rajjena kāritenā”ti vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ pahāya ekakova mahāraññaṃ pavisitvā tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā catūsu iriyāpathesu ekakova carati,
atk-s0502a:4230_5: Mātaṅgaraññeva nāgoti yathā ca “ahaṃ kho ākiṇṇo viharāmi hatthīhi hatthinīhi hatthikaḷabhehi hatthicchāpehi,
atk-s0502a:4230_9: ogāhā ca me uttiṇṇassa hatthiniyo kāyaṃ upanighaṃsantiyo gacchanti,
atk-s0502a:4230_10: yaṃnūnāhaṃ ekakova gaṇamhā vūpakaṭṭho vihareyya”nti evaṃ paṭisañcikkhitvā gamanato mātaṅgoti laddhanāmo
atk-s0502a:4230_11: imasmiṃ araññe ayaṃ hatthināgo yūthaṃ pahāya sabbiriyāpathesu ekakova sukhaṃ carati,
atk-s0502a:4231_0: Ekassāti pabbajitassa hi pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya ekībhāvābhiratassa ekakasseva caritaṃ seyyo.
atk-s0502a:4231_1: Natthi bāle sahāyatāti cūḷasīlaṃ majjhimasīlaṃ mahāsīlaṃ dasa kathāvatthūni terasa dhutaṅgaguṇāni vipassanāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4231_2: cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso vijjā cha abhiññā amatamahānibbānanti ayañhi sahāyatā nāma.
atk-s0502a:4231_3: Sā bāle nissāya adhigantuṃ na sakkāti natthi bāle sahāyatā.
atk-s0502a:4231_4: Ekoti iminā kāraṇena sabbiriyāpathesu ekakova careyya,
atk-s0502a:4231_6: Yathā so appossukko nirālayo imasmiṃ araññe mātaṅganāgo icchiticchitaṭṭhāne sukhaṃ carati,
atk-s0502a:4231_8: appamattakānipi na ca pāpāni kareyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4231_9: Tasmā tumhehi patirūpaṃ sahāyaṃ alabhantehi ekacārīheva bhavitabbanti imamatthaṃ dassento satthā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ desesi.
atk-s0502a:4232_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4235_0: Atthamhīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā himavantapadese araññakuṭikāyaṃ viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4236_0: Tasmiṃ kira kāle rājāno manusse pīḷetvā rajjaṃ kārenti.
atk-s0502a:4236_1: Atha bhagavā adhammikarājūnaṃ rajje daṇḍakaraṇapīḷite manusse disvā kāruññena evaṃ cintesi –
atk-s0502a:4236_2: “sakkā nu kho rajjaṃ kāretuṃ ahanaṃ aghātayaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4236_5: māro pāpimā taṃ bhagavato parivitakkaṃ ñatvā “samaṇo gotamo ‘sakkā nu kho rajjaṃ kāretu’nti cintesi,
atk-s0502a:4236_9: gacchāmi ussāhamassa janessāmī”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha – “kāretu, bhante,
atk-s0502a:4236_14: Atha naṃ satthā “kiṃ pana me tvaṃ, pāpima, passasi,
atk-s0502a:4236_15: yaṃ maṃ tvaṃ evaṃ vadesī”ti vatvā “bhagavatā kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a:4236_17: Ākaṅkhamāno hi bhagavā himavantaṃ pabbatarājaṃ ‘suvaṇṇa’nti adhimucceyya,
atk-s0502a:4236_20: tumhe dhammena rajjaṃ kāressathā”ti tena vutte –
atk-s0502a:4243_0: Imāhi gāthāhi saṃvejetvā “añño eva kho, pāpima,
atk-s0502a:4243_4: ahañhi evaṃ ovadāmī”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4256_0: Sukho paññāya paṭilābho, pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ sukha”nti.
atk-s0502a:4257_0: Tattha atthamhīti pabbajitassāpi hi cīvarakaraṇādike vā adhikaraṇavūpasamādike vā gihinopi kasikammādike
atk-s0502a:4257_1: vā balavapakkhasannissitehi abhibhavanādike vā kicce uppanne ye taṃ kiccaṃ nipphādetuṃ vā vūpasametuṃ
atk-s0502a:4257_4: Tuṭṭhī sukhāti yasmā pana gihinopi sakena asantuṭṭhā sandhicchedādīni ārabhanti,
atk-s0502a:4257_7: Tasmā yā itarītarena parittena vā vipulena vā attano santakena santuṭṭhi,
atk-s0502a:4257_9: Puññanti maraṇakāle pana yathājjhāsayena pattharitvā katapuññakammameva sukhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4257_10: Sabbassāti sakalassapi pana vaṭṭadukkhassa pahānasaṅkhātaṃ arahattameva imasmiṃ loke sukhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0502a:4258_3: Mātāpitaro hi puttānaṃ anupaṭṭhahanabhāvaṃ ñatvā attano santakaṃ bhūmiyaṃ vā nidahanti,
atk-s0502a:4258_14: Ubhayenapi tesaṃ catūhi paccayehi paṭijagganabhāvo kathito,
atk-s0502a:4259_0: Sīlanti maṇikuṇḍalarattavatthādayo hi alaṅkārā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vaye ṭhitānaṃyeva sobhanti.
atk-s0502a:4259_3: “ummattako esa maññe”ti garahuppādanena pana dosameva janeti.
atk-s0502a:4259_4: Pañcasīladasasīlādibhedaṃ pana sīlaṃ daharassāpi mahallakassāpi sabbavayesu sobhatiyeva,
atk-s0502a:4259_8: Saddhā patiṭṭhitāti lokiyalokuttarato duvidhāpi saddhā niccalā hutvā patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0502a:4259_9: Sukho paññāya paṭilābhoti lokiyalokuttarapaññāya paṭilābho sukho.
atk-s0502a:4259_10: Pāpānaṃ akaraṇanti setughātavasena pana pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ imasmiṃ loke sukhanti attho.
atk-s0502a:4266_0: Manujassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto kapilamacchaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4267_0: Atīte kira kassapabhagavato parinibbutakāle dve kulabhātaro nikkhamitvā sāvakānaṃ santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4267_6: Evaṃ tesu pabbajitesu ubho bhātaro ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ vattapaṭivattaṃ katvā viharantā ekadivasaṃ, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4267_7: imasmiṃ sāsane kati dhurānī”ti pucchitvā “ganthadhuraṃ vipassanādhurañcāti dve dhurānī”ti sutvā jeṭṭho
atk-s0502a:4267_8: “vipassanādhuraṃ pūressāmī”ti pañca vassāni ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santike vasitvā yāva arahattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4267_9: gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā vāyamanto arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:4267_11: vuḍḍhakāle vipassanādhuraṃ pūressāmī”ti ganthadhuraṃ paṭṭhapetvā tīṇi piṭakāni uggaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:4267_14: So bāhusaccamadena matto lābhataṇhāya abhibhūto atipaṇḍitamānitāya parehi vuttaṃ kappiyampi “akappiya”nti vadeti,
atk-s0502a:4267_20: evaṃ avacā”ti vatvā dhammañca vinayañca dassetvā ovadiyamānopi “tumhe kiṃ jānātha,
atk-s0502a:4267_22: Athassa bhātu sāgatattherassāpi bhikkhū tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4267_26: tasmā paṭipattiṃ pahāya kappiyādīni paṭibāhanto mā evaṃ avacā”ti ovadi.
atk-s0502a:4267_28: Evaṃ santepi thero dvattikkhattuṃ ovaditvā ovādaṃ agaṇhantaṃ “nāyaṃ mama vacanaṃ karotī”ti ñatvā “tena, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4267_30: Tato paṭṭhāya naṃ aññe pesalā bhikkhū chaḍḍayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4268_0: So durācāro hutvā durācāraparivuto viharanto ekadivasaṃ uposathagge “pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”ti bījaniṃ ādāya dhammāsane nisīditvā “vattati, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4268_1: ettha sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti pucchitvā “ko attho imassa paṭivacanena dinnenā”ti tuṇhībhūte bhikkhū disvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4268_3: pātimokkhena sutena vā asutena vā ko attho”ti vatvā āsanā vuṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:4268_4: Evaṃ so kassapassa bhagavato pariyattisāsanaṃ osakkāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4268_7: Sāpissa mātā ca bhaginī ca tasseva diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjitvā pesale bhikkhū akkositvā paribhāsitvā tattheva nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4269_0: Tasmiṃ pana kāle pañcasatā purisā gāmaghātakādīni katvā corikāya jīvantā janapadamanussehi anubaddhā
atk-s0502a:4269_1: palāyamānā araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha kiñci paṭisaraṇaṃ apassantā aññataraṃ āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā vanditvā
atk-s0502a:4269_12: Atha ne janapadamanussā taṃ ṭhānaṃ patvā ito cito ca pariyesamānā te core disvā sabbe te jīvitā voropesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4270_0: Te anulomapaṭilomavasena ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ devaloke saṃsaritvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde sāvatthinagaradvāre pañcasatakulike kevaṭṭagāme nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4270_3: Evaṃ tesaṃ ekadivaseyeva paṭisandhigahaṇañca mātukucchito nikkhamanañca ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4270_4: Kevaṭṭajeṭṭhako “atthi nu kho imasmiṃ gāme aññepi dārakā ajja jātā”ti pariyesāpetvā tesaṃ jātabhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:4270_5: ñatvā “ete mama puttassa sahāyakā bhavissantī”ti sabbesaṃ posāvanikaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4270_6: Te sabbepi sahapaṃsukīḷakā sahāyakā hutvā anupubbena vayappattā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4270_7: Tesaṃ kevaṭṭajeṭṭhakaputtova yasato ca tejato ca aggapuriso ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4271_0: Kapilopi ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ niraye paccitvā vipākāvasesena tasmiṃ kāle aciravatiyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇo duggandhamukho maccho hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:4271_1: Athekadivasaṃ te sahāyakā “macche bandhissāmā”ti jālādīni gahetvā nadiyā khipiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4271_2: Atha nesaṃ antojālaṃ so maccho pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:4271_4: “puttā no paṭhamaṃ macche bandhantā suvaṇṇamacchaṃ bandhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:4271_6: Tepi kho sahāyakā macchaṃ nāvāya pakkhipitvā nāvaṃ ukkhipitvā rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4271_9: Rājā suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ macchaṃ disvā “satthā etassa suvaṇṇavaṇṇakāraṇaṃ jānissatī”ti macchaṃ gāhāpetvā bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4271_10: Macchena mukhe vivaṭamatteyeva sakalajetavanaṃ ativiya duggandhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4272_1: kassapabhagavato pāvacane kapilo nāma bhikkhu ahosi bahussuto mahāparivāro lābhataṇhāya abhibhūto attano vacanaṃ agaṇhantānaṃ akkosakaparibhāsako,
atk-s0502a:4272_3: so tena kammena avīcimhi nibbattitvā vipākāvasesena idāni maccho hutvā jāto.
atk-s0502a:4272_4: Yaṃ pana so dīgharattaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vācesi,
atk-s0502a:4272_30: bhante”ti vatvā vippaṭisārābhibhūto nāvaṃ sīsena paharitvā tāvadeva kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:4273_0: Atha bhagavā tasmiṃ khaṇe sannipatitāya parisāya cittācāraṃ oloketvā taṅkhaṇānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ “dhammacariyaṃ brahmacariyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4273_1: etadāhu vasuttama”nti suttanipāte kapilasuttaṃ kathetvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4276_0: So plavatī hurā huraṃ, phalamicchaṃva vanasmi vānaro.
atk-s0502a:4278_0: “Yaṃ esā sahate jammī, taṇhā loke visattikā;
atk-s0502a:4281_0: “Yo cetaṃ sahate jammiṃ, taṇhaṃ loke duraccayaṃ;
atk-s0502a:4284_0: “Taṃ vo vadāmi bhaddaṃ vo, yāvantettha samāgatā;
atk-s0502a:4286_0: Mā vo naḷaṃva sotova, māro bhañji punappuna”nti.
atk-s0502a:4287_0: Tattha pamattacārinoti sativossaggalakkhaṇena pamādena pamattacārissa puggalassa neva jhānaṃ na vipassanā na maggaphalāni vaḍḍhanti.
atk-s0502a:4287_1: Yathā pana rukkhaṃ saṃsibbantī pariyonandhantī tassa vināsāya māluvālatā vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a:4287_2: evamassa cha dvārāni nissāya punappunaṃ uppajjanato taṇhā vaḍḍhatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4287_3: So plavatī hurā huranti so taṇhāvasiko puggalo bhave bhave uplavati dhāvati.
atk-s0502a:4287_6: yathā rukkhaphalaṃ icchanto vānaro vanasmiṃ dhāvati,
atk-s0502a:4287_11: evameva taṇhāvasiko puggalo hurā huraṃ dhāvanto “ārammaṇaṃ alabhitvā taṇhāya apavattaṃ patto”ti vattabbataṃ nāpajjati.
atk-s0502a:4288_0: Yanti yaṃ puggalaṃ esā lāmakabhāvena jammī visāhāratāya visapupphatāya visaphalatāya visaparibhogatāya
atk-s0502a:4288_1: rūpādīsu visattatāya āsattatāya visattikāti saṅkhyaṃ gatā chadvārikataṇhā abhibhavati.
atk-s0502a:4288_2: Yathā nāma vassāne punappunaṃ vassantena devena abhivaṭṭhaṃ bīraṇatiṇaṃ vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a:4288_3: evaṃ tassa puggalassa anto vaṭṭamūlakā sokā abhivaḍḍhantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4289_0: Duraccayanti yo pana puggalo evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ atikkamituṃ pajahituṃ dukkaratāya duraccayaṃ taṇhaṃ sahati abhibhavati,
atk-s0502a:4289_2: Yathā nāma pokkhare padumapatte patitaṃ udakabindu na patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0502a:4290_0: Taṃ vo vadāmīti tena kāraṇena ahaṃ tumhe vadāmi.
atk-s0502a:4290_2: mā ahaṃ kapilo viya vināsaṃ pāpuṇathāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4290_3: Mūlanti imissā chadvārikataṇhāya arahattamaggañāṇena mūlaṃ khaṇatha.
atk-s0502a:4290_6: yathā usīrena atthiko puriso mahantena kudālena bīraṇaṃ khaṇati,
atk-s0502a:4290_9: māro bhañji punappunanti mā tumhe nadīsote jātaṃ naḷaṃ mahāvegena āgato nadīsoto viya kilesamāro maraṇamāro
atk-s0502a:4291_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatāpi kevaṭṭaputtā saṃvegaṃ āpajjitvā dukkhassantakiriyaṃ patthayamānā satthu santike
atk-s0502a:4291_1: pabbajitvā na cirasseva dukkhassantaṃ katvā satthārā saddhiṃ āneñjavihārasamāpattidhammaparibhogena ekaparibhogā ahesunti.
atk-s0502a:4294_0: Yathāpi mūleti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto gūthasūkarapotikaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4295_0: Ekasmiṃ kira samaye satthā rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pavisanto ekaṃ sūkarapotikaṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0502a:4295_1: Tassa sitaṃ karontassa mukhavivaraniggataṃ dantobhāsamaṇḍalaṃ disvā ānandatthero “ko nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0502a:4295_7: Esā kakusandhassa bhagavato sāsane ekāya āsanasālāya sāmantā kukkuṭī ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4295_8: Sā ekassa yogāvacarassa vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ sajjhāyantassa dhammaghosaṃ sutvā tato cutā rājakule nibbattitvā ubbarī nāma rājadhītā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4295_9: Sā aparabhāge sarīravalañjaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhā puḷavakarāsiṃ disvā tattha puḷavakasaññaṃ uppādetvā paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0502a:4295_10: Sā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā brahmaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:4295_11: Tato cavitvā puna gativasena ālulamānā idāni sūkarayoniyaṃ nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:4295_12: idaṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā mayā sitaṃ pātukatanti.
atk-s0502a:4295_13: Taṃ sutvā ānandattherappamukhā bhikkhū mahantaṃ saṃvegaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4295_14: Satthā tesaṃ saṃvegaṃ uppādetvā bhavataṇhāya ādīnavaṃ pakāsento antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhitakova imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4306_0: Tañca disvā lataṃ jātaṃ, mūlaṃ paññāya chindatha.
atk-s0502a:4322_0: Tattha mūleti yassa rukkhassa catūsu disāsu catudhā heṭṭhā ca ujukameva gate pañcavidhamūle chedanaphālanapācanavijjhanādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:4322_1: kenaci upaddavena anupaddave thirapattatāya daḷhe so rukkho uparicchinnopi sākhānaṃ vasena punadeva rūhati,
atk-s0502a:4322_2: evameva chadvārikāya taṇhāya anusaye arahattamaggañāṇena anuhate asamucchinne tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave jātiādibhedaṃ
atk-s0502a:4323_0: Yassāti yassa puggalassa “iti ajjhattikassūpādāya aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni bāhirassūpādāya aṭṭhārasa
atk-s0502a:4323_1: taṇhāvicaritānī”ti imesaṃ taṇhāvicaritānaṃ vasena chattiṃsatiyā sotehi samannāgatā manāpesu rūpādīsu
atk-s0502a:4323_2: āsavati pavattatīti manāpasavanā taṇhā bhusā balavatī hoti,
atk-s0502a:4323_3: taṃ puggalaṃ vipannañāṇatāya duddiṭṭhiṃ punappunaṃ uppajjanato mahantabhāvena mahā hutvā jhānaṃ vā vipassanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4323_4: vā anissāya rāganissitā saṅkappā vahantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4324_0: Savanti sabbadhi sotāti ime taṇhāsotā cakkhudvārādīnaṃ vasena sabbesu rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu savanato,
atk-s0502a:4324_2: dhammataṇhāti sabbabhavesu vā savanato sabbadhi savanti nāma.
atk-s0502a:4324_3: Latāti paliveṭhanaṭṭhena saṃsibbanaṭṭhena ca latā viyāti latā.
atk-s0502a:4324_4: Uppajja tiṭṭhatīti chahi dvārehi uppajjitvā rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0502a:4324_5: Tañca disvāti taṃ pana taṇhālataṃ “etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti jātaṭṭhānavasena disvā.
atk-s0502a:4324_6: Paññāyāti satthena vane jātaṃ lataṃ viya maggapaññāya mūle chindathāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4325_3: Somanassānīti taṇhāvasikassa jantuno evarūpāni somanassāni bhavanti.
atk-s0502a:4325_4: Te sātasitāti te taṇhāvasikā puggalā sātanissitā sukhanissitā ca hutvā sukhesino sukhapariyesino bhavanti.
atk-s0502a:4325_6: te jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni upagacchantiyevāti jātijarūpagā nāma honti.
atk-s0502a:4325_7: Pajāti ime sattā tāsakaraṇena tasiṇāti saṅkhyaṃ gatāya taṇhāya purakkhatā parivāritā hutvā.
atk-s0502a:4326_0: Bandhitoti luddena araññe baddho saso viya parisappanti bhāyanti.
atk-s0502a:4326_1: Saṃyojanasaṅgasattakāti dasavidhena saṃyojanasaṅgena ceva sattavidhena rāgasaṅgādinā ca sattā baddhā tasmiṃ vā laggā hutvā.
atk-s0502a:4326_2: Cirāyāti ciraṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ punappunaṃ jātiādikaṃ dukkhaṃ upagacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4326_3: Tasmāti yasmā tasiṇāya purakkhatā paliveṭhitā sattā,
atk-s0502a:4326_4: tasmā attano virāgaṃ rāgādivigamaṃ nibbānaṃ patthento ākaṅkamāno bhikkhu arahattamaggenetaṃ tasiṇaṃ vinodaye panuditvā nīharitvā chaḍḍeyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4328_0: Sāpi kho sūkarapotikā tato cavitvā suvaṇṇabhūmiyaṃ rājakule nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:4328_3: tato cutā kāvīrapaṭṭane nāvikassa gehe nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:4328_5: tato cutā tasseva dakkhiṇadisāya bhokkantagāme sumanassa nāma kuṭumbikassa dhītā nāmena sumanā eva hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:4328_6: Athassā pitā tasmiṃ gāme chaḍḍite dīghavāpiraṭṭhaṃ gantvā mahāmunigāme nāma vasi.
atk-s0502a:4328_7: Tattha naṃ duṭṭhagāmaṇirañño amacco lakuṇḍakaatimbaro nāma kenacideva karaṇīyena gato disvā mahantaṃ maṅgalaṃ katvā ādāya mahāpuṇṇagāmaṃ gato.
atk-s0502a:4328_8: Atha naṃ koṭipabbatamahāvihāravāsī mahāanuruddhatthero nāma tattha piṇḍāya caritvā tassā gehadvāre ṭhito disvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ kathesi, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4328_11: Sā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā atītabhave ugghāṭetvā jātissarañāṇaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0502a:4328_12: Taṅkhaṇaññeva uppannasaṃvegā sāmikaṃ yācitvā mahantena issariyena pañcabalakattherīnaṃ santike pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:4328_14: Pacchā damiḷamaddane kate ñātīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ bhokkantagāmameva gantvā tattha vasantī kallamahāvihāre āsīvisopamasuttantaṃ sutvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:4329_0: Sā parinibbānadivase bhikkhubhikkhunīhi pucchitā bhikkhunisaṅghassa sabbaṃ imaṃ pavattiṃ nirantaraṃ kathetvā
atk-s0502a:4329_1: sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe maṇḍalārāmavāsinā dhammapadabhāṇakamahātissattherena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā
atk-s0502a:4329_2: “ahaṃ pubbe manussayoniyaṃ nibbattitvā tato cutā kukkuṭī hutvā tattha senassa santikā sīsacchedaṃ patvā
atk-s0502a:4329_4: paribbājikāsu pabbajitvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ nibbattitvā tato cutā seṭṭhikule nibbattā nacirasseva
atk-s0502a:4329_5: cavitvā sūkarayoniṃ gantvā tato cutā suvaṇṇabhūmiṃ,
atk-s0502a:4329_10: tato cutā bhokkantagāma”nti evaṃ samavisame terasa attabhāve patvā “idāni ukkaṇṭhitvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pattā,
atk-s0502a:4329_11: sabbepi appamādena sampādethā”ti vatvā catasso parisā saṃvejetvā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0502a:4332_0: Yo nibbanathoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto ekaṃ vibbhantakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4333_0: Eko kira mahākassapattherassa saddhivihāriko hutvā cattāri jhānāni uppādetvāpi attano mātulassa suvaṇṇakārassa
atk-s0502a:4333_1: gehe visabhāgārammaṇaṃ disvā tattha paṭibaddhacitto vibbhami.
atk-s0502a:4333_2: Atha naṃ manussā alasabhāvena kammaṃ kātuṃ anicchantaṃ gehā nīhariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4333_3: So pāpamittasaṃsaggena corakammena jīvikaṃ kappento vicari.
atk-s0502a:4333_4: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ gahetvā pacchābāhaṃ gāḷhabandhanaṃ bandhitvā catukke catukke kasāhi tāḷentā āghātanaṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4333_5: Thero piṇḍāya carituṃ pavisanto taṃ dakkhiṇena dvārena nīhariyamānaṃ disvā bandhanaṃ sithilaṃ kāretvā
atk-s0502a:4333_7: So tena ovādena satuppādaṃ labhitvā puna catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattesi.
atk-s0502a:4333_8: Atha naṃ “āghātanaṃ netvā ghātessāmā”ti sūle uttāsesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4333_10: Athassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge ṭhitā manussā asisattitomarādīni āvudhāni ukkhipitvāpi taṃ asantasantameva disvā “passatha, bho,
atk-s0502a:4333_12: anekasatānañhi āvudhahatthānaṃ purisānaṃ majjhe neva chambhati na vedhati,
atk-s0502a:4333_13: aho acchariya”nti acchariyabbhutajātā mahānādaṃ naditvā rañño taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4333_14: Rājā taṃ kāraṇaṃ sutvā “vissajjetha na”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:4333_16: Satthā obhāsaṃ pharitvā tassa dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4339_1: yo puggalo gihibhāve ālayasaṅkhātaṃ vanathaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajitatāya nibbanatho dibbavihārasaṅkhāte tapovane
atk-s0502a:4339_2: adhimutto gharāvāsabandhanasaṅkhātā taṇhāvanā mutto hutvā puna gharāvāsabandhanasaṅkhātaṃ taṇhāvanameva dhāvati,
atk-s0502a:4340_0: Imaṃ pana desanaṃ sutvā so rājapurisānaṃ antare sūlagge nisinnova udayabbayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tilakkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4340_1: āropetvā saṅkhāre sammasanto sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā samāpattisukhaṃ anubhavanto vehāsaṃ uppatitvā ākāseneva
atk-s0502a:4340_2: satthu santikaṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā sarājikāya parisāya majjheyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti.
atk-s0502a:4343_0: Na taṃ daḷhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto bandhanāgāraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4344_0: Ekasmiṃ kira kāle bahū sandhicchedakapanthaghātakamanussaghātake core ānetvā kosalarañño dassayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4344_2: Tiṃsamattāpi kho jānapadā bhikkhū satthāraṃ daṭṭhukāmā āgantvā disvā vanditvā punadivase sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:4344_3: carantā bandhanāgāraṃ gantvā te core disvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā sāyanhasamaye tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā,  “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4344_4: ajja amhehi piṇḍāya carantehi bandhanāgāre bahū corā andubandhanādīhi baddhā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantā diṭṭhā,
atk-s0502a:4344_5: te tāni bandhanāni chinditvā palāyituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:4344_7: tehi bandhanehi thirataraṃ aññaṃ bandhanaṃ nāmā”ti pucchiṃsu. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:4344_11: etaṃ etehi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena satasahassaguṇena thirataraṃ,
atk-s0502a:4344_12: evaṃ mahantampi panetaṃ ducchindaniyaṃ bandhanaṃ porāṇakapaṇḍitā chinditvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā pabbajiṃsū”ti vatvā atītaṃ āhari –
atk-s0502a:4345_0: Atīte bārāṇasiyaṃ brahmadatte rajjaṃ kārente bodhisatto ekasmiṃ duggatagahapatikule nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:4345_3: Athassa mātā anicchamānasseva ekaṃ kuladhītaraṃ gehe katvā aparabhāge kālamakāsi.
atk-s0502a:4345_9: mayi vijātāya dārakaṃ disvā pabbajissasī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4345_13: Atha naṃ sā “puttassa tāva thanapānato apagamanakālaṃ āgamehī”ti vatvā puna gabbhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:4345_17: So tassā anācikkhitvāva rattibhāge uṭṭhāya palāyi.
atk-s0502a:4345_18: Atha naṃ nagaraguttikā aggahesuṃ. So “ahaṃ, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:4345_20: vissajjetha ma”nti attānaṃ vissajjāpetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññāsamāpattiyo labhitvā jhānakīḷāya kīḷanto vihāsi.
atk-s0502a:4345_21: So tattha vasantoyeva “evarūpampi nāma me ducchindaniyaṃ puttadārabandhanaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ chinna”nti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0502a:4346_0: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā tena udānitaṃ udānaṃ pakāsento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4357_0: Tattha dhīrāti buddhādayo paṇḍitapurisā yaṃ saṅkhalikasaṅkhātaṃ ayasā nibbattaṃ āyasaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4357_2: yañca pabbajatiṇehi vā aññehi vā vākādīhi rajjuṃ katvā kataṃ rajjubandhanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4357_3: taṃ asiādīhi chindituṃ sakkuṇeyyabhāvena thiranti na vadantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4357_9: tesaṃ so rāgo ca yā puttadāresu apekkhā taṇhā,
atk-s0502a:4357_10: etaṃ kilesamayaṃ bandhanañca paṇḍitapurisā daḷhanti vadanti.
atk-s0502a:4357_11: Ohārinanti ākaḍḍhitvā catūsu apāyesu pātanato avaharati heṭṭhā haratīti ohārinaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4357_14: bandhanabhāvampi ajānāpetvā thalapathajalapathādīsu kammāni kātuṃ detīti sithilaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4357_15: Duppamuñcanti lobhavasena hi ekavārampi uppannaṃ kilesabandhanaṃ daṭṭhaṭṭhānato kacchapo viya dummociyaṃ hotīti duppamuñcaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4357_16: Etampi chetvānāti etaṃ daḷhampi kilesabandhanaṃ ñāṇakhaggena chinditvā anapekkhino hutvā kāmasukhaṃ pahāya paribbajanti,
atk-s0502a:4361_0: Ye rāgarattāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto khemaṃ nāma rañño bimbisārassa aggamahesiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4362_0: Sā kira padumuttarapādamūle patthitapatthanā ativiya abhirūpā pāsādikā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4362_1: “Satthā kira rūpassa dosaṃ kathetī”ti sutvā pana satthu santikaṃ gantuṃ na icchi.
atk-s0502a:4362_2: Rājā tassā rūpamadamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā veḷuvanavaṇṇanāpaṭisaṃyuttāni gītāni kāretvā naṭādīnaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4362_3: Tesaṃ tāni gāyantānaṃ saddaṃ sutvā tassā veḷuvanaṃ adiṭṭhapubbaṃ viya asutapubbaṃ viya ca ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4362_5: tumhākaṃ veḷuvanuyyānamevā”ti vutte uyyānaṃ gantukāmā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4362_6: Satthā tassā āgamanaṃ ñatvā parisamajjhe nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentova tālavaṇṭaṃ ādāya attano passe ṭhatvā bījamānaṃ abhirūpaṃ itthiṃ nimmini. Khemā,
atk-s0502a:4362_7: devīpi pavisamānāva taṃ itthiṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a:4362_12: satthāraṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti maññe”ti cintetvā tathāgatassa kathāsaddampi anisāmetvā tameva itthiṃ olokayamānā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4362_13: Satthā tassā tasmiṃ rūpe uppannabahumānataṃ ñatvā taṃ rūpaṃ paṭhamavayādivasena dassetvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0502a:4362_15: Khemā taṃ disvā “evarūpampi nāmetaṃ rūpaṃ muhutteneva khayavayaṃ sampattaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4362_16: natthi vata imasmiṃ rūpe sāro”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:4362_19: passa dānissa asārabhāva”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4365_2: ime sattā rāgarattā dosapaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā attano taṇhāsotaṃ samatikkamituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0502a:4365_3: tattheva laggantī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4371_0: Tattha makkaṭakova jālanti yathā nāma makkaṭako suttajālaṃ katvā majjhe ṭhāne nābhimaṇḍale nipanno pariyante
atk-s0502a:4371_1: patitaṃ paṭaṅgaṃ vā makkhikaṃ vā vegena gantvā vijjhitvā tassa rasaṃ pivitvā puna gantvā tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne
atk-s0502a:4371_3: evameva ye sattā rāgarattā dosapaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā sayaṃkataṃ taṇhāsotaṃ anupatanti,
atk-s0502a:4371_6: Etampi chetvāna vajanti dhīrāti paṇḍitā etaṃ bandhanaṃ chetvā anapekkhino nirālayā hutvā arahattamaggena sabbadukkhaṃ pahāya vajanti,
atk-s0502a:4372_4: khemāya pabbajituṃ vā parinibbāyituṃ vā vaṭṭatī”ti. Bhante,
atk-s0502a:4375_0: Muñca pureti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto uggasenaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4376_0: Pañcasatā kira naṭā saṃvacchare vā chamāse vā patte rājagahaṃ gantvā rañño sattāhaṃ samajjaṃ katvā bahuṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ labhanti,
atk-s0502a:4376_3: Athekā laṅghikadhītā vaṃsaṃ abhiruyha tassa upari parivattitvā tassa pariyante ākāse caṅkamamānā naccati ceva gāyati ca.
atk-s0502a:4376_4: Tasmiṃ samaye uggaseno nāma seṭṭhiputto sahāyakena saddhiṃ mañcātimañce ṭhito taṃ oloketvā tassā hatthapādavikkhepādīsu
atk-s0502a:4376_6: alabhantassa me idheva maraṇa”nti āhārūpacchedaṃ katvā mañcake nipajji.
atk-s0502a:4376_8: kiṃ te rujjatī”ti pucchitopi “taṃ me naṭadhītaraṃ labhantassa jīvitaṃ atthi,
atk-s0502a:4376_11: aññaṃ te amhākaṃ kulassa ca bhogānañca anurūpaṃ kumārikaṃ ānessāmā”ti vuttepi tatheva vatvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a:4376_12: Athassa pitā bahuṃ yācitvāpi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkonto tassa sahāyaṃ pakkosāpetvā kahāpaṇasahassaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:4376_13: “ime kahāpaṇe gahetvā attano dhītaraṃ mayhaṃ puttassa detū”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:4376_15: sace pana so imaṃ alabhitvā jīvituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:4376_19: So “ahaṃ tehi saddhiṃ vicarissāmī”ti vatvā yācantānampi tesaṃ kathaṃ anādiyitvā nikkhamitvā nāṭakassa santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4376_20: So tassa dhītaraṃ datvā tena saddhiṃyeva gāmanigamarājadhānīsu sippaṃ dassento vicari.
atk-s0502a:4377_0: Sāpi tena saddhiṃ saṃvāsamanvāya nacirasseva puttaṃ labhitvā kīḷāpayamānā “sakaṭagopakassa putta,
atk-s0502a:4377_3: Sopi nesaṃ sakaṭaparivattakaṃ katvā ṭhitaṭṭhāne goṇānaṃ tiṇaṃ āharati,
atk-s0502a:4377_5: Tadeva kira sandhāya sā itthī puttaṃ kīḷāpayamānā tathā vadati.
atk-s0502a:4377_6: So attānaṃ ārabbha tassā gāyanabhāvaṃ ñatvā taṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a:4377_10: Sā “kiṃ pana mayhaṃ tayā palāyitena vā āgatena vā”ti punappunaṃ tadeva gītaṃ gāyati.
atk-s0502a:4377_11: Sā kira attano rūpasampattiñceva dhanalābhañca nissāya taṃ kismiñci na maññati.
atk-s0502a:4377_12: So “kiṃ nu kho nissāya imissā ayaṃ māno”ti cintento “sippaṃ nissāyā”ti ñatvā “hotu,
atk-s0502a:4377_13: sippaṃ uggaṇhissāmī”ti sasuraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tassa jānanakasippaṃ uggaṇhitvā gāmanigamādīsu sippaṃ dassento
atk-s0502a:4377_14: anupubbena rājagahaṃ āgantvā “ito sattame divase uggaseno seṭṭhiputto nagaravāsīnaṃ sippaṃ dassessatī”ti
atk-s0502a:4378_0: Nagaravāsino mañcātimañcādayo bandhāpetvā sattame divase sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4378_1: Sopi saṭṭhihatthaṃ vaṃsaṃ abhiruyha tassa matthake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4378_2: Taṃ divasaṃ satthā paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento taṃ attano ñāṇajālassa anto paviṭṭhaṃ disvā “kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0502a:4378_3: bhavissatī”ti āvajjento “sve seṭṭhiputto sippaṃ dassessāmīti vaṃsamatthake ṭhassati,
atk-s0502a:4378_6: taṃ sutvā caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayo bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:4378_8: Satthā punadivase kālaṃ sallakkhetvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:4378_9: Uggasenopi satthari antonagaraṃ apaviṭṭheyeva unnādanatthāya mahājanassa aṅgulisaññaṃ datvā vaṃsamatthake
atk-s0502a:4378_10: patiṭṭhāya ākāseyeva satta vāre parivattitvā oruyha vaṃsamatthake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4378_11: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā nagaraṃ pavisanto yathā taṃ parisā na oloketi,
atk-s0502a:4378_13: Uggaseno parisaṃ oloketvā “na maṃ parisā oloketī”ti domanassappatto “idaṃ mayā saṃvacchare kattabbaṃ sippaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4378_14: satthari nagaraṃ pavisante parisā maṃ anoloketvā satthārameva oloketi,
atk-s0502a:4378_15: moghaṃ vata me sippadassanaṃ jāta”nti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:4379_0: Satthā tassa cittaṃ ñatvā mahāmoggallānaṃ āmantetvā “gaccha,
atk-s0502a:4379_3: Thero gantvā vaṃsassa heṭṭhā ṭhito seṭṭhiputtaṃ āmantetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4382_0: So therassa kathaṃ sutvā tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā “satthā maññe mama sippaṃ passitukāmo”ti vaṃsamatthake ṭhitakova imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4385_0: Evañca pana vatvā vaṃsamatthakato vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā ākāseva cuddasakkhattuṃ parivattitvā oruyha vaṃsamatthakeva aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4385_3: paṇḍitena nāma atītānāgatapaccuppannesu khandhesu ālayaṃ pahāya jātiādīhi muccituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4391_0: Tattha muñca pureti atītesu khandhesu ālayaṃ nikantiṃ ajjhosānaṃ patthanaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ gāhaṃ parāmāsaṃ taṇhaṃ muñca.
atk-s0502a:4391_3: Bhavassa pāragūti evaṃ sante tividhassāpi bhavassa abhiññāpariññāpahānabhāvanāsacchikiriyavasena pāragū
atk-s0502a:4391_4: pāraṅgato hutvā khandhadhātuāyatanādibhede sabbasaṅkhate vimuttamānaso viharanto puna jātijarāmaraṇāni
atk-s0502a:4392_1: Seṭṭhiputtopi vaṃsamatthake ṭhitakova saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ patvā vaṃsato oruyha satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:4392_2: āgantvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena satthāraṃ vanditvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a:4392_3: Atha naṃ satthā dakkhiṇahatthaṃ pasāretvā “ehi bhikkhū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4392_4: So tāvadeva aṭṭhaparikkhāradharo saṭṭhivassikatthero viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4392_7: saṭṭhihatthassa te vaṃsassa matthakato otarantassa bhayaṃ nāma nāhosī”ti pucchitvā “natthi me, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4392_13: mama puttena uggasenena sadisā chinnasaṃyojanā bhikkhū bhāyanti,
atk-s0502a:4392_14: na tasantī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇavagge imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4395_1: Punekadivasaṃ bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4395_2: evaṃ arahattūpanissayasampannassa bhikkhuno naṭadhītaraṃ nissāya naṭehi saddhiṃ vicaraṇakāraṇaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4395_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:4395_8: ubhayampetaṃ iminā eva kata”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0502a:4396_0: Atīte kira kassapadasabalassa suvaṇṇacetiye kariyamāne bārāṇasivāsino kulaputtā bahuṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4396_1: yānakesu āropetvā “hatthakammaṃ karissāmā”ti cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantā antarāmagge ekaṃ theraṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:4396_3: Athekā kuladhītā theraṃ oloketvā sāmikaṃ āha – “sāmi, ayyo,
atk-s0502a:4396_5: yānake ca no bahuṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4396_8: So taṃ pattaṃ āharitvā khādanīyabhojanīyassa pūretvā therassa hatthe patiṭṭhapetvā ubhopi patthanaṃ kariṃsu, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4396_11: tasmā olokento tesaṃ patthanāya samijjhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā sitaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:4396_12: Taṃ disvā sā itthī sāmikaṃ āha – “amhākaṃ, ayyo,
atk-s0502a:4396_18: Te tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devaloke nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sā itthī naṭagehe nibbatti,
atk-s0502a:4396_20: bhavissatī”ti tassā paṭivacanassa dinnattā naṭehi saddhiṃ vicari.
atk-s0502a:4396_23: mayhampi sā eva gatī”ti pabbajitvā arahatte patiṭṭhahīti.
atk-s0502a:4399_0: Vitakkamathitassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍitaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4400_0: Eko kira daharabhikkhu salākagge attano pattasalākaṃ gahetvā salākayāguṃ ādāya āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivi.
atk-s0502a:4400_1: Tattha udakaṃ alabhitvā udakatthāya ekaṃ gharaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4400_2: Tattha taṃ ekā kumārikā disvāva uppannasinehā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4400_3: puna pānīyena atthe sati idheva āgaccheyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4400_4: So tato paṭṭhāya yadā pānīyaṃ na labhati,
atk-s0502a:4400_7: Evaṃ gacchante kāle yāgumpi datvā punekadivasaṃ tattheva nisīdāpetvā bhattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:4400_9: imasmiṃ gehe na kiñci natthi nāma,
atk-s0502a:4400_10: kevalaṃ mayaṃ vicaraṇakamanussameva na labhāmā”ti kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4400_11: So kathipāheneva tassā kathaṃ sutvā ukkaṇṭhi.
atk-s0502a:4400_12: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ āgantukā bhikkhū disvā “kasmā tvaṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4400_15: Tepi naṃ satthu santikaṃ netvā tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4400_17: ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchitvā “sacca”nti vutte “kasmā tvaṃ mādisassa āraddhavīriyassa buddhassa sāsane pabbajitvā
atk-s0502a:4400_19: bhāriyaṃ te kammaṃ kata”nti vatvā “kiṃ kāraṇā ukkaṇṭhitosī”ti pucchi. “Bhante,
atk-s0502a:4400_22: Sā hi pubbe sakalajambudīpe aggadhanuggahapaṇḍitaṃ pahāya taṃmuhuttadiṭṭhake ekasmiṃ sinehaṃ uppādetvā
atk-s0502a:4400_23: taṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpesī”ti vatvā tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ bhikkhūhi yācito –
atk-s0502a:4401_0: Atīte cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍitakāle takkasilāyaṃ disāpāmokkhassa ācariyassa santike sippaṃ uggahetvā tena
atk-s0502a:4401_1: tuṭṭhena dinnaṃ dhītaraṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ gacchantassa ekasmiṃ aṭavimukhe ekūnapaññāsāya kaṇḍehi ekūnapaññāsacore
atk-s0502a:4401_2: māretvā kaṇḍesu khīṇesu corajeṭṭhakaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā, “bhadde,
atk-s0502a:4401_3: asiṃ āharā”ti vutte tāya taṅkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhacore sinehaṃ katvā corassa hatthe asitharuṃ ṭhapetvā corena
atk-s0502a:4401_4: dhanuggahapaṇḍitassa māritabhāvaṃ āvikatvā corena ca taṃ ādāya gacchantena “mampi esā aññaṃ disvā attano
atk-s0502a:4401_6: kiṃ me imāyā”ti ekaṃ nadiṃ disvā orimatīre taṃ ṭhapetvā tassā bhaṇḍakaṃ ādāya “tvaṃ idheva hohi,
atk-s0502a:4401_7: yāvāhaṃ bhaṇḍikaṃ uttāremī”ti tattheva taṃ pahāya gamanabhāvañca āvikatvā –
atk-s0502a:4403_0: Paccāgaccha lahuṃ khippaṃ, mampi tārehi dānito.
atk-s0502a:4409_0: Nayīdha naccaṃ vā gītaṃ vā, tāḷaṃ vā susamāhitaṃ;
atk-s0502a:4410_0: Anamhikāle susoṇi, kiṃ nu jagghasi sobhane.
atk-s0502a:4412_0: Jīno macchañca pesiñca, kapaṇo viya jhāyasi.
atk-s0502a:4414_0: Jīnā patiñca jārañca, maññe tvaññeva jhāyasi.
atk-s0502a:4416_0: Sā nūnāhaṃ ito gantvā, bhattu hessaṃ vasānugā.
atk-s0502a:4417_0: “Yo hare mattikaṃ thālaṃ, kaṃsathālampi so hare;
atk-s0502a:4419_0: Imaṃ pañcakanipāte cūḷadhanuggahajātakaṃ vitthāretvā “tadā cūḷadhanuggahapaṇḍito tvaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0502a:4419_2: siṅgālarūpena āgantvā tassā niggahakārako sakko devarājā ahamevā”ti vatvā “evaṃ sā itthī taṃmuhuttadiṭṭhake
atk-s0502a:4419_3: ekasmiṃ sinehena sakalajambudīpe aggapaṇḍitaṃ jīvitā voropesi,
atk-s0502a:4419_4: taṃ itthiṃ ārabbha uppannaṃ tava taṇhaṃ chinditvā viharāhi bhikkhū”ti taṃ ovaditvā uttarimpi dhammaṃ desento imā dve gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4430_2: Subhānupassinoti iṭṭhārammaṇe subhanimittagāhādivasena vissaṭṭhamānasatāya subhanti anupassantassa.
atk-s0502a:4430_3: Taṇhāti evarūpassa jhānādīsu ekampi na vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0502a:4430_4: atha kho chadvārikā taṇhāyeva bhiyyo vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0502a:4430_5: Esa khoti eso puggalo taṇhābandhanaṃ daḷhaṃ suthiraṃ karoti.
atk-s0502a:4430_6: Vitakkūpasameti micchāvitakkādīnaṃ vūpasamasaṅkhāte dasasu asubhesu paṭhamajjhāne.
atk-s0502a:4430_7: Sadā satoti yo ettha abhirato hutvā niccaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya sato taṃ asubhajhānaṃ bhāveti.
atk-s0502a:4430_8: Byanti kāhitīti esa bhikkhu tīsu bhavesu uppajjanakaṃ taṇhaṃ vigatantaṃ karissati.
atk-s0502a:4430_9: Mārabandhananti eso tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ mārabandhanampi chindissatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4431_0: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4434_0: Niṭṭhaṅgatoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4435_0: Ekadivasañhi vikāle sambahulā therā jetavanavihāraṃ pavisitvā rāhulattherassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ uṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4435_1: So aññattha vasanaṭṭhānaṃ apassanto tathāgatassa gandhakuṭiyā pamukhe nipajji.
atk-s0502a:4435_2: Tadā so āyasmā arahattaṃ patto avassikova hoti.
atk-s0502a:4435_3: Māro vasavattibhavane ṭhitoyeva taṃ āyasmantaṃ gandhakuṭipamukhe nipannaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a:4435_7: So mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā āgamma soṇḍāya therassa matthakaṃ parikkhipitvā mahantena saddena koñcanādaṃ ravi.
atk-s0502a:4435_8: Satthā gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinnova tassa mārabhāvaṃ ñatvā, “māra,
atk-s0502a:4435_9: tādisānaṃ satasahassenāpi mama puttassa bhayaṃ uppādetuṃ na sakkā.
atk-s0502a:4435_10: Putto hi me asantāsī vītataṇho mahāvīriyo mahāpañño”ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4444_0: Tattha niṭṭhaṅgatoti imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitānaṃ arahattaṃ niṭṭhaṃ nāma,
atk-s0502a:4444_3: Acchindi bhavasallānīti sabbānipi bhavagāmīni sallāni acchindi.
atk-s0502a:4445_1: Niruttipadakovidoti niruttiyañca sesapadesu cāti catūsupi paṭisambhidāsu chekoti attho.
atk-s0502a:4445_3: jaññā pubbāparāni cāti akkharānaṃ sannipātasaṅkhātaṃ akkharapiṇḍañca jānāti,
atk-s0502a:4445_7: ādimhi paññāyamāne majjhapariyosānesu apaññāyamānesupi “imesaṃ akkharānaṃ idaṃ majjhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4445_10: ante paññāyamāne ādimajjhesu apaññāyamānesu “imesaṃ akkharānaṃ idaṃ majjhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4445_15: Sa ve antimasārīroti esa koṭiyaṃ ṭhitasarīro,
atk-s0502a:4445_16: mahantānaṃ atthadhammaniruttipaṭibhānānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnañca pariggāhikāya paññāya samannāgatattā mahāpañño,
atk-s0502a:4445_19: mahāpurisoti vadāmī”ti vacanato vimuttacittatāya ca mahāpurisoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4446_1: Māropi pāpimā “jānāti maṃ samaṇo gotamo”ti tatthevantaradhāyīti.
atk-s0502a:4449_0: Sabbābhibhūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā antarāmagge upakaṃ ājīvakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4450_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye satthā pattasabbaññutaññāṇo bodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā attano pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0502a:4450_1: dhammacakkapavattanatthaṃ bārāṇasiṃ sandhāya aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ paṭipanno antarāmagge upakaṃ ājīvakaṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a:4450_2: Sopi satthāraṃ disvā “vippasannāni kho te, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4450_8: kassa vā tvaṃ dhammaṃ rocesī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4450_9: Athassa satthā “mayhaṃ upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā natthī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4456_0: Tattha sabbābhibhūti sabbesaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ abhibhavanato sabbābhibhū.
atk-s0502a:4456_2: Sabbesu dhammesūti sabbesupi tebhūmakadhammesu taṇhādiṭṭhīhi anūpalitto.
atk-s0502a:4456_4: Taṇhakkhaye vimuttoti taṇhakkhayante uppādite taṇhakkhayasaṅkhāte arahatte asekhāya vimuttiyā vimutto.
atk-s0502a:4456_5: Sayaṃ abhiññāyāti abhiññeyyādibhede dhamme sayameva jānitvā.
atk-s0502a:4456_6: Kamuddiseyyanti “ayaṃ me upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā”ti kaṃ nāma uddiseyyanti.
atk-s0502a:4457_0: Desanāvasāne upako ājīvako tathāgatassa vacanaṃ nevābhinandi,
atk-s0502a:4457_2: Sīsaṃ pana cāletvā jivhaṃ nillāḷetvā ekapadikamaggaṃ gahetvā aññataraṃ luddakanivāsanaṭṭhānaṃ agamāsīti.
atk-s0502a:4460_0: Sabbadānanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4461_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye tāvatiṃsadevaloke devatā sannipatitvā cattāro pañhe samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “kataraṃ dānaṃ nu kho dānesu,
atk-s0502a:4461_4: Te pañhe ekā devatāpi vinicchituṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0502a:4461_6: sopi aparanti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ pucchantā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu dvādasa saṃvaccharāni vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4461_7: Ettakenāpi kālena pañhānaṃ atthaṃ adisvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā catunnaṃ mahārājānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0502a:4461_8: mahādevatāsannipāto”ti vutte “cattāro pañhe samuṭṭhāpetvā vinicchituṃ asakkontā tumhākaṃ santikaṃ āgatamhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4461_11: taṇhakkhayova kasmā seṭṭho”ti ime pañhe vinicchituṃ asakkontā āgatamhāti. Tātā,
atk-s0502a:4461_13: amhākaṃ pana rājā janasahassena cintite atthe cintetvā taṅkhaṇeneva jānāti,
atk-s0502a:4461_14: so amhehi paññāya ca puññena ca visiṭṭho, etha,
atk-s0502a:4461_15: tassa santikaṃ gacchāmāti tameva devagaṇaṃ ādāya sakkassa devarañño santikaṃ gantvā tenāpi “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0502a:4461_17: imesaṃ pañhānaṃ atthaṃ aññopi jānituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0502a:4461_19: Satthā panetarahi kahaṃ viharatī”ti pucchitvā “jetavane”ti sutvā “etha,
atk-s0502a:4461_20: tassa santikaṃ gamissāmā”ti devagaṇena saddhiṃ rattibhāge sakalaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “kiṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:4461_23: añño imesaṃ atthaṃ jānituṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:4462_1: mayā hi pāramiyo pūretvā mahāpariccāge pariccajitvā tumhādisānaṃ kaṅkhacchedanatthameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4462_2: tayā pucchitapañhesu hi sabbadānānaṃ dhammadānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4462_5: taṇhakkhayo pana arahattaṃ sampāpakattā seṭṭhoyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4468_0: Tattha sabbadānaṃ dhammadānanti sacepi hi cakkavāḷagabbhe yāva brahmalokā nirantaraṃ katvā sannisinnānaṃ
atk-s0502a:4468_2: tasmiṃ samāgame catuppadikāya gāthāya katānumodanāva seṭṭhā.
atk-s0502a:4468_3: Tañhi dānaṃ tassā gāthāya soḷasiṃ kalaṃ nāgghati.
atk-s0502a:4468_4: Evaṃ dhammassa desanāpi vācanampi savanampi mahantaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4468_5: Yena ca puggalena bahūnaṃ taṃ dhammassavanaṃ kāritaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4468_7: Tathārūpāya eva parisāya paṇītapiṇḍapātassa patte pūretvā dinnadānatopi sappitelādīnaṃ patte pūretvā
atk-s0502a:4468_8: dinnabhesajjadānatopi mahāvihārasadisānaṃ vihārānañca lohapāsādasadisānañca pāsādānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni
atk-s0502a:4468_9: kāretvā dinnasenāsanadānatopi anāthapiṇḍikādīhi vihāre ārabbha katapariccāgatopi antamaso catuppadikāya
atk-s0502a:4468_10: gāthāya anumodanāvasenāpi pavattitaṃ dhammadānameva varaṃ seṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4468_12: Evarūpāni hi puññāni karontā dhammaṃ sutvāva karonti,
atk-s0502a:4468_14: Sace hi ime sattā dhammaṃ na suṇeyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a:4468_15: uḷuṅkamattaṃ yāgumpi kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattampi na dadeyyuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4468_17: Apica ṭhapetvā buddhe ca paccekabuddhe ca sakalakappaṃ deve vassante udakabindūni gaṇetuṃ samatthāya
atk-s0502a:4468_18: paññāya samannāgatā sāriputtādayopi attano dhammatāya sotāpattiphalādīni adhigantuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:4469_0: Sabbe pana gandharasādayopi rasā ukkaṃsato devatānaṃ sudhābhojanarasopi saṃsāravaṭṭe pātetvā dukkhānubhavanasseva paccayo.
atk-s0502a:4469_1: Yo panesa sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammasaṅkhāto ca navalokuttaradhammasaṅkhāto ca dhammaraso,
atk-s0502a:4469_7: Yā panesā dhammaṃ kathentassa vā suṇantassa vā vācentassa vā anto uppajjamānā pīti udaggabhāvaṃ janeti,
atk-s0502a:4469_10: sāyaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭassa antaṃ katvā arahattapariyosānā hoti.

atk-s0502a:4473_0: Hananti bhogāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aputtakaseṭṭhiṃ nāma ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4474_0: Tassa kira kālakiriyaṃ sutvā rājā pasenadi kosalo “aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ kassa pāpuṇātī”ti pucchitvā “rañño”ti
atk-s0502a:4474_1: sutvā sattahi divasehi tassa gehato dhanaṃ rājakulaṃ abhiharāpetvā satthu santikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “handa

atk-s0502a:4475_0: So kira suvaṇṇapātiyā nānaggarasabhojane upanīte “evarūpaṃ nāma manussā bhuñjanti,

atk-s0502a:4475_3: Vatthayānachattesupi manāpesu upaṭṭhāpitesu te manusse leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi paharanto palāpetvā sāṇāni dhāreti,
atk-s0502a:4475_4: jajjararathakena yāti paṇṇachattakena dhāriyamānenāti evaṃ raññā ārocite satthā tassa pubbakammaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4476_2: “Detha samaṇassa piṇḍa”nti vatvā so uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:4476_3: Tasmiṃ kira assaddhe bāle evaṃ vatvā pakkante tassa bhariyā saddhā pasannā “cirassaṃ vata me imassa mukhato ‘dehī’ti vacanaṃ sutaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4476_4: ajja mama manorathaṃ pūrentī piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmī”ti paccekabuddhassa pattaṃ gahetvā paṇītabhojanassa pūretvā adāsi.

atk-s0502a:4476_16: gīvāya gahetvā mūlakandaṃ viya gīvaṃ phāletvā māretvā tattheva chaḍḍesi.

atk-s0502a:4477_6: tassa kammassa vipākena nāssuḷārāya bhattabhogāya cittaṃ namati,
atk-s0502a:4477_9: nāssuḷārānaṃ pañcannaṃ kāmaguṇānaṃ bhogāya cittaṃ namati.
atk-s0502a:4477_10: Yaṃ kho so, mahārāja, seṭṭhi, gahapati,

atk-s0502a:4486_0: Tiṇadosānīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ viharanto aṅkuraṃ ārabbha kathesi.

atk-s0502a:4509_0: Desanāvasāne aṅkuro ca indako ca sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,

atk-s0502a:4516_2: ahaṃ durakkhaṃ rakkhāmī”ti vivaditvā “satthāraṃ pucchitvā imamatthaṃ jānissāmā”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā, “bhante,

atk-s0502a:4516_11: bhante”ti tehi yācito atīte takkasilajātakassa vatthuṃ vitthāretvā rakkhasīnaṃ vasena rājakule jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0502a:4516_12: patte pattābhisekena mahāsattena setacchattassa heṭṭhā rājāsane nisinnena attano sirisampattiṃ oloketvā
atk-s0502a:4521_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ dassetvā “tadāpi tumheva pañca janā takkasilāyaṃ rajjagahaṇatthāya nikkhantaṃ mahāsattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4521_1: āvudhahatthā parivāretvā maggaṃ gacchantā antarāmagge rakkhasīhi cakkhudvārādivasena upanītesu rūpārammaṇādīsu
atk-s0502a:4521_2: asaṃvutā paṇḍitassa ovāde avattitvā olīyantā rakkhasīhi khāditā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇittha.
atk-s0502a:4521_3: Tesu pana ārammaṇesu susaṃvuto piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhantiṃ devavaṇṇiṃ yakkhiniṃ anādiyitvā sotthinā
atk-s0502a:4521_4: takkasilaṃ gantvā rajjaṃ patto rājā ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānetvā,
atk-s0502a:4521_7: Etāni hi saṃvaranto eva sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4524_0: Ghānena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu jivhāya saṃvaro.
atk-s0502a:4527_0: Manasā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu sabbattha saṃvaro;
atk-s0502a:4529_0: Tattha cakkhunāti yadā hi bhikkhuno cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇaṃ āpāthamāgacchati,
atk-s0502a:4529_1: tadā iṭṭhārammaṇe arajjantassa aniṭṭhārammaṇe adussantassa asamapekkhanena mohaṃ anuppādentassa tasmiṃ
atk-s0502a:4529_2: dvāre saṃvaro thakanaṃ pidahanaṃ gutti katā nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a:4529_3: Tassa so evarūpo cakkhunā saṃvaro sādhu.
atk-s0502a:4529_5: Cakkhudvārādīsuyeva pana saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā nuppajjati,
atk-s0502a:4529_7: Tadā hi asaṃvaro uppajjanto assaddhā akkhanti kosajjaṃ muṭṭhasaccaṃ aññāṇanti akusalavīthiyaṃ ayaṃ pañcavidho labbhati.
atk-s0502a:4529_8: Saṃvaro uppajjanto saddhā khanti vīriyaṃ sati ñāṇanti kusalavīthiyaṃ ayaṃ pañcavidho labbhati.
atk-s0502a:4530_0: Kāyena saṃvaroti ettha pana pasādakāyopi copanakāyopi labbhati.
atk-s0502a:4530_4: Tehi pana saddhiṃ akusalavīthiyaṃ uppajjantehi taṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:4530_7: Tāya saddhiṃ uppajjantehi musāvādādīhi taṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:4530_9: Manasā saṃvaroti etthāpi javanamanato aññena manena saddhiṃ abhijjhādayo natthi.
atk-s0502a:4530_10: Manodvāre pana javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānehi abhijjhādīhi taṃ dvāraṃ asaṃvutaṃ hoti,
atk-s0502a:4530_12: Sādhu sabbatthāti tesu cakkhudvārādīsu sabbesupi saṃvaro sādhu.
atk-s0502a:4530_13: Ettāvatā hi aṭṭha saṃvaradvārāni aṭṭha ca asaṃvaradvārāni kathitāni.

atk-s0502a:4535_0: Sāvatthivāsino kira dve sahāyakā bhikkhūsu pabbajitvā laddhūpasampadā yebhuyyena ekato vicaranti.
atk-s0502a:4535_1: Te ekadivasaṃ aciravatiṃ gantvā nhatvā ātape tappamānā sāraṇīyakathaṃ kathentā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4535_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe dve haṃsā ākāsena gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:4535_3: Atheko daharabhikkhu sakkharaṃ gahetvā “ekassa haṃsapotakassa akkhiṃ paharissāmī”ti āha,
atk-s0502a:4535_8: “Tena hi upadhārehī”ti dutiyaṃ sakkharaṃ gahetvā haṃsassa pacchābhāge khipi,
atk-s0502a:4535_10: Atha naṃ itaraṃ vaṭṭasakkharaṃ gahetvā parapasse akkhimhi paharitvā orimakkhinā nikkhāmesi.
atk-s0502a:4535_11: Haṃso viravanto parivattitvā tesaṃ pādamūleyeva pati.
