atk-s0502a:4559_10: Te “sādhū”ti vatvā ekaṃ daṇḍakaṃ kacchapena ḍaṃsāpetvā sayaṃ tassa ubho koṭiyo ḍaṃsitvā ākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4559_11: Taṃ tathā haṃsehi nīyamānaṃ gāmadārakā disvā “dve haṃsā kacchapaṃ daṇḍena harantī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4559_13: tumhākaṃ ettha kiṃ hoti duṭṭhaceṭakā”ti vattukāmo haṃsānaṃ sīghavegatāya bārāṇasinagare rājanivesanassa
atk-s0502a:4559_14: uparibhāgaṃ sampattakāle daṭṭhaṭṭhānato daṇḍakaṃ vissajjetvā ākāsaṅgaṇe patitvā dvedhā bhijji.
atk-s0502a:4565_2: bhikkhunā nāma mukhasaṃyatena samacārinā anuddhatena nibbutacittena bhavitabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4568_0: Atthaṃ dhammañca dīpeti, madhuraṃ tassa bhāsita”nti.
atk-s0502a:4569_5: Atthaṃ dhammañca dīpetīti bhāsitatthañceva desanādhammañca katheti.
atk-s0502a:4569_6: Madhuranti evarūpassa bhikkhuno bhāsitaṃ madhuraṃ nāma.
atk-s0502a:4569_7: Yo pana atthameva sampādeti, na pāḷiṃ,
atk-s0502a:4569_11: tassa bhāsitaṃ madhuraṃ nāma na hotīti.
atk-s0502a:4573_0: Dhammārāmoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dhammārāmattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4574_0: Satthārā kira “ito me catumāsaccayena parinibbānaṃ bhavissatī”ti ārocite anekasahassā bhikkhū satthāraṃ parivāretvā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4574_1: Tattha puthujjanā bhikkhū assūni sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:4574_3: Sabbepi “kiṃ nu kho karissāmā”ti vaggabandhanena vicaranti.
atk-s0502a:4574_4: Eko pana dhammārāmo nāma bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ na upasaṅkamati.
atk-s0502a:4574_6: āvuso”ti vuccamāno paṭivacanampi adatvā “satthā kira catumāsaccayena parinibbāyissati,
atk-s0502a:4574_8: satthari dharamāneyeva vāyamitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti ekakova viharanto satthārā desitaṃ dhammaṃ āvajjeti cinteti anussarati.
atk-s0502a:4574_12: kiṃ nu kho karissāmā’ti amhehi saddhiṃ sammantanamattampi na karotī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4574_13: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ evaṃ karosī”ti pucchi. “Saccaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4574_18: tumhesu dharantesuyeva vāyamitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissāmīti tumhehi desitaṃ dhammaṃ āvajjāmi cintemi anussarāmīti.
atk-s0502a:4575_2: aññenāpi mayi sinehavantena bhikkhunā nāma dhammārāmasadiseneva bhavitabbaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4575_3: Na hi mayhaṃ mālāgandhādīhi pūjaṃ karontā mama pūjaṃ karonti nāma,
atk-s0502a:4575_4: dhammānudhammaṃ paṭipajjantāyeva pana maṃ pūjenti nāmā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4578_0: Dhammaṃ anussaraṃ bhikkhu, saddhammā na parihāyatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4579_0: Tattha nivāsanaṭṭhena samathavipassanādhammo ārāmo assāti dhammārāmo.
atk-s0502a:4579_2: Tasseva dhammassa punappunaṃ vicintanatāya dhammaṃ anuvicintayaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4579_5: Saddhammāti evarūpo bhikkhu sattatiṃsabhedā bodhipakkhiyadhammā navavidhalokuttaradhammā ca na parihāyatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4580_0: Desanāvasāne so bhikkhu arahatte patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4583_0: Salābhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto aññataraṃ vipakkhasevakaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4584_0: Tassa kireko devadattapakkhiko bhikkhu sahāyo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4584_1: So taṃ bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakiccaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “kuhiṃ gatosī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4584_7: So tassa vacanena katipāhaṃ tattha vasitvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4584_11: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ evamakāsī”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a:4584_12: ahaṃ tattha ekaṃ daharaṃ nissāya katipāhaṃ vasiṃ,
atk-s0502a:4584_13: na ca pana devadattassa laddhiṃ rocemī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4584_14: Atha naṃ bhagavā “kiñcāpi tvaṃ laddhiṃ na rocesi,
atk-s0502a:4584_15: diṭṭhadiṭṭhakānaṃyeva pana laddhiṃ rocento viya vicarasi.
atk-s0502a:4584_19: pubbe panesa kesaṃ laddhiṃ rocento viya vicari,
atk-s0502a:4584_20: ācikkhatha no”ti bhikkhūhi yācito atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:4589_4: Paralābhaṃ patthentassa hi jhānavipassanāmaggaphalesu ekadhammopi nuppajjati,
atk-s0502a:4589_5: sakalābhasantuṭṭhasseva pana jhānādīni uppajjantī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4595_0: Taṃ ve devā pasaṃsanti, suddhājīviṃ atandita”nti.
atk-s0502a:4596_1: Sapadānacārañhi parivajjetvā anesanāya jīvikaṃ kappento salābhaṃ atimaññati hīḷeti jigucchati nāma.
atk-s0502a:4596_3: Aññesaṃ pihayanti aññesaṃ lābhaṃ patthento na careyyāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4596_4: Samādhiṃ nādhigacchatīti aññesañhi lābhaṃ pihayanto tesaṃ cīvarādikaraṇe ussukkaṃ āpanno bhikkhu appanāsamādhiṃ vā upacārasamādhiṃ vā nādhigacchati.
atk-s0502a:4596_5: Salābhaṃ nātimaññatīti appalābhopi samāno uccanīcakule paṭipāṭiyā sapadānaṃ caranto bhikkhu salābhaṃ nātimaññati nāma.
atk-s0502a:4596_6: Taṃ veti taṃ evarūpaṃ bhikkhuṃ sārajīvitatāya suddhājīviṃ jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya jīvitakappanena akusītatāya atanditaṃ devā pasaṃsanti thomentīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4600_0: Sabbasoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pañcaggadāyakaṃ nāma brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4601_0: So kira sasse khette ṭhitakāleyeva khettaggaṃ nāma deti,
atk-s0502a:4601_4: pātiyaṃ vaḍḍhitakāle pātaggaṃ nāma detīti imāni pañca aggadānāni deti,
atk-s0502a:4601_7: Satthā tassa ca brāhmaṇiyā cassa tiṇṇaṃ phalānaṃ upanissayaṃ disvā brāhmaṇassa bhojanavelāyaṃ gantvā dvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4601_10: Brāhmaṇī pana taṃ parivisamānā satthāraṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0502a:4601_11: “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo pañcasu ṭhānesu aggaṃ datvā bhuñjati,
atk-s0502a:4601_12: idāni ca samaṇo gotamo āgantvā dvāre ṭhito.
atk-s0502a:4601_13: Sace brāhmaṇo etaṃ disvā attano bhattaṃ haritvā dassati,
atk-s0502a:4601_15: Sā “evaṃ ayaṃ samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ na passissatī”ti satthu piṭṭhiṃ datvā tassa pacchato taṃ paṭicchādentī
atk-s0502a:4601_16: onamitvā puṇṇacandaṃ pāṇinā paṭicchādentī viya aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4601_17: Tathā ṭhitā eva ca pana “gato nu kho no”ti satthāraṃ aḍḍhakkhikena olokesi.
atk-s0502a:4601_22: Lokagarunā buddhena “na gamissāmī”ti sīse cālite sā sandhāretuṃ asakkontī mahāhasitaṃ hasi.
atk-s0502a:4601_23: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā gehābhimukhaṃ obhāsaṃ muñci.
atk-s0502a:4601_24: Brāhmaṇopi piṭṭhiṃ datvā nisinnoyeva brāhmaṇiyā hasitasaddaṃ sutvā chabbaṇṇānañca rasmīnaṃ obhāsaṃ oloketvā satthāraṃ addasa.
atk-s0502a:4601_25: Buddhā hi nāma gāme vā araññe vā hetusampannānaṃ attānaṃ adassetvā na pakkamanti.
atk-s0502a:4601_28: rājaputtaṃ āgantvā dvāre ṭhitaṃ mayhaṃ anācikkhantiyā bhāriyaṃ te kammaṃ kata”nti vatvā aḍḍhabhuttaṃ bhojanapātiṃ ādāya satthu santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0502a:4601_30: ahaṃ pañcasu ṭhānesu aggaṃ datvāva bhuñjāmi,
atk-s0502a:4601_31: ito ca me majjhe bhinditvā ekova bhattakoṭṭhāso bhutto,
atk-s0502a:4601_34: Satthā “na me tava ucchiṭṭhabhattena attho”ti avatvā,
atk-s0502a:4606_0: Brāhmaṇo taṃ sutvāva pasannacitto hutvā “aho acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4606_1: dīpasāmiko nāma rājaputto ‘na me tava ucchiṭṭhabhattena attho’ti avatvā evaṃ vakkhatī”ti dvāre ṭhitakova satthāraṃ pañhaṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a:4606_5: Satthā “kathaṃrūpā nu kho imassa dhammadesanā sappāyā”ti upadhārento “ime dvepi janā kassapabuddhakāle ‘nāmarūpa’nti vadantānaṃ kathaṃ suṇiṃsu,
atk-s0502a:4606_6: nāmarūpaṃ avissajjitvāva nesaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti,
atk-s0502a:4606_8: nāme ca rūpe ca arajjanto asajjanto asocanto bhikkhu nāma hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4609_0: Asatā ca na socati, sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4610_1: rūpakkhandhassa cāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena pavatte nāmarūpe.
atk-s0502a:4610_2: Mamāyitanti yassa ahanti vā mamanti vā gāho natthi.
atk-s0502a:4610_3: Asatā ca na socatīti tasmiñca nāmarūpe khayavayaṃ patte “mama rūpaṃ khīṇaṃ…pe…
atk-s0502a:4610_4: mama viññāṇaṃ khīṇa”nti na socati na vihaññati,
atk-s0502a:4610_6: Sa veti so evarūpo vijjamānepi nāmarūpe mamāyitarahitopi asatāpi tena asocanto bhikkhūti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4614_0: Mettāvihārīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4615_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye āyasmante mahākaccāne avantijanapade kuraragharaṃ nissāya pavattapabbate viharante soṇo
atk-s0502a:4615_1: nāma koṭikaṇṇo upāsako therassa dhammakathāya pasīditvā therassa santike pabbajitukāmo therena “dukkaraṃ kho, soṇa,
atk-s0502a:4615_2: yāvajīvaṃ ekabhattaṃ ekaseyyaṃ brahmacariya”nti vatvā dve vāre paṭikkhittopi pabbajjāya ativiya ussāhajāto
atk-s0502a:4615_3: tatiyavāre theraṃ yācitvā pabbajitvā appabhikkhukattā dakkhiṇāpathe tiṇṇaṃ vassānaṃ accayena laddhūpasampado
atk-s0502a:4615_4: satthāraṃ sammukhā daṭṭhukāmo hutvā upajjhāyaṃ āpucchitvā tena dinnaṃ sāsanaṃ gahetvā anupubbena jetavanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4615_5: gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā katapaṭisanthāro satthārā ekagandhakuṭiyaṃyeva anuññātasenāsano bahudeva rattiṃ
atk-s0502a:4615_6: ajjhokāse vīthināmetvā rattibhāge gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā attano pattasenāsane taṃ rattibhāgaṃ vītināmetvā
atk-s0502a:4615_7: paccūsasamaye satthārā ajjhiṭṭho soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikāni sabbāneva sarabhaññena abhaṇi.
atk-s0502a:4615_11: Satthārā dinnasādhukāraṃ sutvā bhūmaṭṭhakadevā nāgā supaṇṇāti evaṃ yāva brahmalokā ekasādhukārameva ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4616_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe jetavanato vīsayojanasatamatthake kuraragharanagare therassa mātu mahāupāsikāya gehe adhivatthā
atk-s0502a:4616_7: Tvaṃ ito pubbe mayhaṃ sādhukāraṃ adatvā ajja kasmā desīti?
atk-s0502a:4616_12: Putto te ajja satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0502a:4616_13: satthā tava puttassa dhammaṃ sutvā pasanno sādhukāramadāsi.
atk-s0502a:4616_15: Sammāsambuddhassa hi sādhukāraṃ sampaṭicchitvā bhūmaṭṭhakadeve ādiṃ katvā yāva brahmalokā ekasādhukārameva jātanti. Kiṃ pana, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:4616_19: Evaṃ devatāya kathentiyāva upāsikāya pañcavaṇṇā pīti uppajjitvā sakalasarīraṃ phari.
atk-s0502a:4617_1: “sace me putto satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā satthu dhammaṃ kathetuṃ sakkhi,
atk-s0502a:4617_3: Puttassa āgatakāle dhammassavanaṃ kāretvā dhammakathaṃ suṇissāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4617_4: Soṇattheropi kho satthārā sādhukāre dinne “ayaṃ me upajjhāyena dinnasāsanaṃ ārocetuṃ kālo”ti bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0502a:4617_5: paccantimesu janapadesu vinayadharapañcamena gaṇena upasampadaṃ ādiṃ katvā pañca vare yācitvā katipāhaṃ
atk-s0502a:4617_6: satthu santikeyeva vasitvā “upajjhāyaṃ passissāmī”ti satthāraṃ āpucchitvā jetavanā nikkhamitvā anupubbena
atk-s0502a:4618_0: Thero punadivase taṃ ādāya piṇḍāya caranto mātu upāsikāya gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4618_1: Sāpi puttaṃ disvā tuṭṭhamānasā vanditvā sakkaccaṃ parivisitvā pucchi –
atk-s0502a:4618_3: satthārā saddhiṃ ekagandhakuṭiyaṃ vasitvā satthu dhammakathaṃ kathesī”ti. “Upāsike,
atk-s0502a:4618_5: imasmiṃ gehe adhivatthā devatā mahantena saddena sādhukāraṃ datvā mayā ‘ko eso’ti vutte ‘aha’nti vatvā evañca evañca kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4618_10: yato tayā satthu sammukhā dhammo kathito,
atk-s0502a:4618_12: Asukadivase nāma dhammassavanaṃ kāretvā tava dhammaṃ suṇissāmi, tātā”’ti.
atk-s0502a:4618_14: Upāsikā bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā pūjaṃ katvā “puttassa me dhammakathaṃ suṇissāmī”ti ekameva dāsiṃ
atk-s0502a:4618_15: geharakkhikaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ parijanaṃ ādāya antonagare dhammassavanatthāya kārite maṇḍape alaṅkatadhammāsanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4618_16: abhiruyha dhammaṃ desentassa puttassa dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4619_0: Tasmiṃ pana kāle navasatā corā tassā upāsikāya gehe otāraṃ olokentā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a:4619_1: Tassā pana gehaṃ sattahi pākārehi parikkhittaṃ sattadvārakoṭṭhakayuttaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4619_2: tattha tesu tesu ṭhānesu caṇḍasunakhe bandhitvā ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4619_3: Antogehe chadanassa udakapātaṭṭhāne pana parikhaṃ khaṇitvā tipunā pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4619_4: Taṃ divā ātapena vilīnaṃ pakkuthitaṃ viya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0502a:4619_6: Tassānantarā mahantāni ayasaṅghāṭakāni nirantaraṃ bhūmiyaṃ odahiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4619_7: Iti imañcārakkhaṃ upāsikāya ca antogehe ṭhitabhāvaṃ paṭicca te corā okāsaṃ alabhantā taṃ divasaṃ tassā
atk-s0502a:4619_8: gatabhāvaṃ ñatvā umaṅgaṃ bhinditvā tipuparikhāya ca ayasaṅghāṭakānañca heṭṭhābhāgeneva gehaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0502a:4619_9: corajeṭṭhakaṃ tassā santikaṃ pahiṇiṃsu “sace sā amhākaṃ idha paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ sutvā nivattitvā gehābhimukhī
atk-s0502a:4620_0: Corāpi antogehe dīpaṃ jāletvā kahāpaṇagabbhadvāraṃ vivariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4620_1: Sā dāsī core disvā upāsikāya santikaṃ gantvā, “ayye,
atk-s0502a:4620_2: bahū corā gehaṃ pavisitvā kahāpaṇagabbhadvāraṃ vivariṃsū”ti ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:4620_7: Corāpi kahāpaṇagabbhaṃ tucchaṃ katvā rajatagabbhaṃ vivariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4620_10: mā me antarāyaṃ karī”ti puna taṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:4620_11: Corā rajatagabbhampi tucchaṃ katvā suvaṇṇagabbhaṃ vivariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4620_12: Sā punapi gantvā upāsikāya tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:4620_14: “bhoti je tvaṃ anekavāraṃ mama santikaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0502a:4620_17: mā me antarāyaṃ karī’ti mayā vuttāpi mama kathaṃ anādiyitvā punappunaṃ āgacchasiyeva.
atk-s0502a:4621_0: Corajeṭṭhako tassā kathaṃ sutvā “evarūpāya itthiyā santakaṃ harantānaṃ asani patitvā matthakaṃ bhindeyyā”ti
atk-s0502a:4621_1: corānaṃ santikaṃ gantvā “sīghaṃ upāsikāya santakaṃ paṭipākatikaṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4626_1: Theropi dhammaṃ kathetvā vibhātāya rattiyā āsanā otari.
atk-s0502a:4626_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe corajeṭṭhako upāsikāya pādamūle nipajjitvā “khamāhi me,
atk-s0502a:4626_5: “Ahañhi tumhesu āghātaṃ katvā tumhe māretukāmo aṭṭhāsi”nti.
atk-s0502a:4626_11: puttassa vo santike amhākaṃ pabbajjaṃ dāpethā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4626_13: ime corā mama guṇesu tumhākañca dhammakathāya pasannā pabbajjaṃ yācanti,
atk-s0502a:4626_15: Thero “sādhū”ti vatvā tehi nivatthavatthānaṃ dasāni chindāpetvā tambamattikāya rajāpetvā te pabbājetvā sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4626_16: Upasampannakāle ca nesaṃ ekekassa visuṃ visuṃ kammaṭṭhānamadāsi.
atk-s0502a:4626_17: Te navasatā bhikkhū visuṃ visuṃ navasatakammaṭṭhānāni gahetvā ekaṃ pabbataṃ abhiruyha tassa tassa rukkhassa chāyāya nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4627_0: Satthā vīsayojanasatamatthake jetavanamahāvihāre nisinnova te bhikkhū oloketvā tesaṃ cariyavasena dhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4627_1: vavatthāpetvā obhāsaṃ pharitvā sammukhe nisīditvā kathento viya imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4632_0: “Siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, sittā te lahumessati;

atk-s0502a:4725_0: Sumanaseṭṭhinopi chatte adhivatthā devatā “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4725_2: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi “kiṃ maṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dadamānaṃ na passasī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4725_3: Nāhaṃ tava dānaṃ ārabbha sādhukāraṃ demi,
atk-s0502a:4725_4: annabhārena pana upariṭṭhassa dinnapiṇḍapāte pasīditvā mayā esa sādhukāro pavattitoti.
atk-s0502a:4725_6: ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ dānaṃ dadanto devataṃ sādhukāraṃ dāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃ,
atk-s0502a:4725_7: annabhāro maṃ nissāya jīvanto ekapiṇḍapāteneva sādhukāraṃ dāpesi,
atk-s0502a:4725_8: tassa dāne anucchavikaṃ katvā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ mama santakaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “ajja tayā kassaci kiñci dinna”nti pucchi. “Āma, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:4725_9: upariṭṭhapaccekabuddhassa me ajja bhāgabhattaṃ dinna”nti. “Handa, bho,
atk-s0502a:4725_10: kahāpaṇaṃ gahetvā etaṃ mayhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dehī”ti? “Na demi, sāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4725_15: sahassaṃ gahetvā pattiṃ me dehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4725_16: So “ayyena saddhiṃ mantetvā jānissāmī”ti vegena paccekabuddhaṃ sampāpuṇitvā,
atk-s0502a:4725_18: sahassaṃ datvā tumhākaṃ piṇḍapāte pattiṃ yācati,
atk-s0502a:4726_1: kulasatike gāme ekasmiṃ ghare dīpaṃ jāleyya,
atk-s0502a:4726_2: sesā attano telena vaṭṭiṃ temetvā jālāpetvā gaṇheyyuṃ,
atk-s0502a:4726_8: attano piṇḍapāte paresaṃ pattiṃ dentassa yattakānaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a:4726_11: seṭṭhissa pana pattiyā dinnāya dve piṇḍapātā honti eko tava,
atk-s0502a:4727_1: bhante”ti taṃ abhivādetvā seṭṭhissa santikaṃ gantvā “gaṇha, sāmi,
atk-s0502a:4727_7: ahampi tava guṇe pūjemi, gaṇha, tāta,
atk-s0502a:4727_8: ito paṭṭhāya ca pana mā sahatthā kammamakāsi,
atk-s0502a:4727_12: Nirodhā vuṭṭhitassa pana dinnapiṇḍapāto tadaheva vipākaṃ deti.
atk-s0502a:4727_13: Tasmā rājāpi taṃ pavattiṃ sutvā annabhāraṃ pakkosāpetvā pattiṃ gahetvā mahantaṃ bhogaṃ datvā tassa seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:4728_0: So sumanaseṭṭhissa sahāyako hutvā yāvajīvaṃ puññāni katvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā devamanussesu
atk-s0502a:4728_1: saṃsaranto imasmiṃ buddhuppāde kapilavatthunagare amitodanassa sakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a:4728_4: satthu cūḷapitu putto paramasukhumālo mahāpuñño ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4728_5: Ekadivasaṃ kira chasu khattiyesu pūve lakkhaṃ katvā guḷehi kīḷantesu anuruddho parājito pūvānaṃ atthāya mātu santikaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:4728_6: Sā mahantaṃ suvaṇṇathālaṃ pūretvā pūve pesesi.
atk-s0502a:4728_7: Pūve khāditvā puna kīḷanto parājito tatheva pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:4728_8: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ pūvesu āhaṭesu catutthe vāre mātā “idāni pūvā natthī”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:4728_9: Tassā vacanaṃ sutvā “natthī”ti padassa asutapubbatāya “natthipūvā nāma idāni bhavissantī”ti saññaṃ katvā “gaccha natthipūve āharā”ti pesesi.
atk-s0502a:4728_11: dethā”ti vutte “mama puttena natthīti padaṃ na sutapubbaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4728_12: kathaṃ nu kho natthibhāvaṃ jānāpeyya”nti suvaṇṇapātiṃ dhovitvā aparāya suvaṇṇapātiyā paṭikujjitvā “handa, tāta,
atk-s0502a:4728_14: Tasmiṃ khaṇe nagarapariggāhikā devatā “amhākaṃ sāminā annabhārakāle upariṭṭhassa paccekabuddhassa bhāgabhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4728_15: datvā ‘natthīti padameva na suṇeyya’nti patthanā nāma ṭhapitā.
atk-s0502a:4728_17: muddhāpi no sattadhā phaleyyā”ti cintetvā dibbapūvehi pātiṃ pūrayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4728_18: So puriso pātiṃ āharitvā tassa santike ṭhapetvā vivari.
atk-s0502a:4728_20: Pūvo pana mukhe ṭhapitamattova sattarasaharaṇisahassāni pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4729_1: “na maṃ maññe ito pubbe mātā piyāyati.
atk-s0502a:4729_2: Na hi me aññadā tāya natthipūvā nāma pakkapubbā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4729_6: mama akkhīhipi hadayamaṃsatopi tvaṃ piyataroti. Sacāhaṃ, amma,
atk-s0502a:4729_8: kasmā mama pubbe evarūpe natthipūve nāma na adāsīti.
atk-s0502a:4729_19: Sā tato paṭṭhāya tena “pūve khāditukāmomhī”ti vuttakāle suvaṇṇapātiṃ dhovitvā aññāya pātiyā paṭikujjitvā pahiṇati,
atk-s0502a:4729_21: Evaṃ so agāramajjhe vasanto natthīti padassa atthaṃ ajānitvā dibbapūveyeva paribhuñji.
atk-s0502a:4730_0: Satthu pana parivāratthaṃ kulapaṭipāṭiyā sākiyakumāresu pabbajantesu mahānāmena sakkena, “tāta,
atk-s0502a:4730_8: So hi bhattassa uṭṭhānaṭṭhānampi na jānāti,
atk-s0502a:4730_11: Ekadivasañhi anuruddho bhaddiyo kimiloti tayo janā “bhattaṃ nāma kahaṃ uṭṭhātī”ti mantayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4730_13: So kirekadivasaṃ vīhī koṭṭhamhi pakkhipante addasa,
atk-s0502a:4730_15: Atha naṃ bhaddiyo “tvaṃ na jānāsī”ti vatvā “bhattaṃ nāma ukkhaliyaṃ uṭṭhātī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4730_16: So kirekadivasaṃ ukkhalito bhattaṃ vaḍḍhente disvā “etthevetaṃ uppajjatī”ti saññamakāsi,
atk-s0502a:4730_18: Anuruddho te ubhopi “tumhe na jānāthā”ti vatvā “bhattaṃ nāma ratanubbedhamakuḷāya mahāsuvaṇṇapātiyaṃ uṭṭhātī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4730_24: Evaṃ bhattuṭṭhānaṭṭhānampi ajānanto mahāpuñño kulaputto kammante kiṃ jānissati.
atk-s0502a:4731_3: paṭhamaṃ khettaṃ kasāpetabba”ntiādinā nayena bhātarā vuttānaṃ kammantānaṃ apariyantabhāvaṃ sutvā “na
atk-s0502a:4731_4: me gharāvāsena attho”ti mātaraṃ āpucchitvā bhaddiyapamukhehi pañcahi sākiyakumārehi saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā
atk-s0502a:4731_6: Pabbajitvā ca pana sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno anupubbena tisso vijjā sacchikatvā dibbena cakkhunā ekāsane
atk-s0502a:4731_7: nisinnova hatthatale ṭhapitaāmalakāni viya sahassalokadhātuyo olokanasamattho hutvā –
atk-s0502a:4734_0: Udānaṃ udānetvā “kiṃ nu kho me katvā ayaṃ sampatti laddhā”ti olokento “padumuttarapādamūle patthanaṃ
atk-s0502a:4734_1: ṭhapesi”nti ñatvā puna “saṃsāre saṃsaranto asukasmiṃ nāma kāle bārāṇasiyaṃ sumanaseṭṭhiṃ nissāya jīvanto
atk-s0502a:4737_2: “yo so tadā mayā upariṭṭhassa dinnapiṇḍapātato kahāpaṇe datvā pattiṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0502a:4737_3: mama sahāyako sumanaseṭṭhi kahaṃ nu kho so etarahi nibbatto”ti.
atk-s0502a:4737_4: Atha naṃ “viñjhāṭaviyaṃ pabbatapāde muṇḍanigamo nāma atthi,
atk-s0502a:4737_5: tattha mahāmuṇḍassa nāma upāsakassa mahāsumano cūḷasumanoti dve puttā,
atk-s0502a:4737_6: tesu so cūḷasumano hutvā nibbatto”ti addasa.
atk-s0502a:4737_8: “atthi nu kho tattha mayi gate upakāro,
atk-s0502a:4737_10: So upadhārento idaṃ addasa “so tattha mayi gate sattavassikova nikkhamitvā pabbajissati,
atk-s0502a:4737_12: Disvā ca pana upakaṭṭhe antovasse ākāsena gantvā gāmadvāre otari.
atk-s0502a:4737_13: Mahāmuṇḍo pana upāsako therassa pubbepi vissāsiko eva.
atk-s0502a:4737_14: So theraṃ piṇḍapātakāle cīvaraṃ pārupantaṃ disvā puttaṃ mahāsumanaṃ āha – “tāta, ayyo,
atk-s0502a:4737_16: yāvassa añño koci pattaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0502a:4737_20: Upāsako theraṃ antonivesane sakkaccaṃ parivisitvā temāsaṃ vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a:4738_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ paṭijagganto viya temāsaṃ paṭijaggitvā mahāpavāraṇāya ticīvarañceva guḷatelataṇḍulādīni
atk-s0502a:4738_3: na me iminā attho”ti. “Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:4738_10: “Mayhaṃ santike kappiyakārako sāmaṇeropi natthī”ti. “Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:4738_11: mama putto mahāsumano sāmaṇero bhavissatī”ti. “Na me, upāsaka,
atk-s0502a:4738_16: Thero tena saddhiṃ aḍḍhamāsamattaṃ tattheva vasitvā “satthāraṃ passissāmī”ti tassa ñātake āpucchitvā
atk-s0502a:4739_1: tassa tattha pubbarattāpararattaṃ caṅkamantassa udaravāto samuṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:4739_2: Atha naṃ kilantarūpaṃ disvā sāmaṇero pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4739_10: “Anotattato pānīye laddhe phāsukaṃ hoti, āvuso”ti. “Tena hi, bhante,
atk-s0502a:4739_14: Tena hi anotatte pannago nāma nāgarājā maṃ jānāti,
atk-s0502a:4739_15: tassa ācikkhitvā bhesajjatthāya ekaṃ pānīyavārakaṃ āharāti.
atk-s0502a:4739_16: So sādhūti upajjhāyaṃ vanditvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pañcayojanasataṃ ṭhānaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4739_17: Taṃ divasaṃ pana nāgarājā nāganāṭakaparivuto udakakīḷaṃ kīḷitukāmo hoti.
atk-s0502a:4739_19: “ayaṃ muṇḍakasamaṇo attano pādapaṃsuṃ mama matthake okiranto vicarati,
atk-s0502a:4739_21: na dānissa pānīyaṃ dassāmī”ti paṇṇāsayojanikaṃ anotattadahaṃ mahāpātiyā ukkhaliṃ pidahanto viya phaṇena pidahitvā nipajji.
atk-s0502a:4739_22: Sāmaṇero nāgarājassa ākāraṃ oloketvāva “kuddho aya”nti ñatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4745_0: Taṃ sutvā sāmaṇero “ayaṃ nāgarājā attano icchāya na dassati,
atk-s0502a:4745_1: ahaṃ balakkāraṃ katvā ānubhāvaṃ jānāpetvā imaṃ abhibhavitvāva pānīyaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0502a:4745_5: mā maṃ vārehī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4747_0: Yadi te thāmabalaṃ atthi, nāgarāja nivārayā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4750_0: Abhinandāmi te vācaṃ, harassu pānīyaṃ mamā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4751_2: “tena hi suṭṭhu jānassū”ti tikkhattuṃ paṭiññaṃ gahetvā “buddhasāsanassa ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā mayā pānīyaṃ
atk-s0502a:4751_3: harituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā ākāsaṭṭhadevatānaṃ tāva santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4751_6: “Etasmiṃ anotattadahapiṭṭhe pannaganāgarājena saddhiṃ mama saṅgāmo bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:4751_8: So eteneva nīhārena cattāro lokapāle sakkasuyāmasantusitaparanimmitavasavattī ca upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:4751_9: Tato paraṃ paṭipāṭiyā yāva brahmalokaṃ gantvā tattha tattha brahmehi āgantvā vanditvā ṭhitehi “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:4751_11: Evaṃ so asaññe ca arūpibrahmāno ca ṭhapetvā sabbattha muhutteneva āhiṇḍitvā ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:4751_12: Tassa vacanaṃ sutvā sabbāpi devatā anotattadahapiṭṭhe nāḷiyaṃ pakkhittāni piṭṭhacuṇṇāni viya ākāsaṃ nirantaraṃ pūretvā sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4751_13: Sannipatite devasaṅghe sāmaṇero ākāse ṭhatvā nāgarājaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:4756_0: Abhinandāmi te vācaṃ, harassu pānīyaṃ mamā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4757_0: So tikkhattuṃ nāgarājassa paṭiññaṃ gahetvā ākāse ṭhitakova dvādasayojanikaṃ brahmattabhāvaṃ māpetvā ākāsato
atk-s0502a:4757_1: oruyha nāgarājassa phaṇe akkamitvā adhomukhaṃ nippīḷesi,
atk-s0502a:4757_2: tāvadeva balavatā purisena akkantaallacammaṃ viya nāgarājassa phaṇe akkantamatte ogalitvā dabbimattā phaṇapuṭakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4757_3: Nāgarājassa phaṇehi muttamuttaṭṭhānato tālakkhandhapamāṇā udakavaṭṭiyo uggañchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4757_8: So “ayaṃ maṃ devasaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā pānīyaṃ gahetvā lajjāpesi,
atk-s0502a:4757_9: etaṃ gahetvā mukhe hatthaṃ pakkhipitvā hadayamaṃsaṃ vāssa maddāmi,
atk-s0502a:4757_10: pāde vā naṃ gahetvā pāragaṅgāyaṃ khipāmī”ti vegena anubandhi.
atk-s0502a:4757_12: Sāmaṇero gantvā upajjhāyassa hatthe pānīyaṃ ṭhapetvā “pivatha,
atk-s0502a:4757_16: sāmaṇero mayā adinnameva pānīyaṃ gahetvā āgato,
atk-s0502a:4757_19: iminā me dinnaṃ pānīyaṃ āhaṭa”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:4757_20: Thero “khīṇāsavasāmaṇerassa musākathanaṃ nāma natthī”ti ñatvā pānīyaṃ pivi.
atk-s0502a:4757_25: pāde vā naṃ gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī”ti. Mahārāja,
atk-s0502a:4757_27: tumhe sāmaṇerena saddhiṃ saṅgāmetuṃ na sakkhissatha,
atk-s0502a:4757_31: Atha naṃ therassa vacanena khamāpetvā tena saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ katvā “ito paṭṭhāya anotattaudakena atthe sati tumhākaṃ āgamanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:4758_1: Satthā therassa āgamanabhāvaṃ ñatvā migāramātupāsāde therassa āgamanaṃ olokento nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:4758_2: Bhikkhūpi theraṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4758_3: Athekacce sāmaṇeraṃ sīsepi kaṇṇesupi bāhāyampi gahetvā sañcāletvā “kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:4758_7: “bhāriyaṃ vatimesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṃ āsīvisaṃ gīvāya gaṇhantā viya sāmaṇeraṃ gaṇhanti,
atk-s0502a:4758_9: ajja mayā sumanasāmaṇerassa guṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4758_11: Satthā tena saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ānandattheraṃ āmantesi – “ānanda,
atk-s0502a:4758_27: puthujjanā pana attano asamatthatāyeva na icchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4758_31: kuṭaṃ ādāya kira udakaṃ āharā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4758_33: anotattato kira maṃ udakaṃ āhārāpethā”ti āha. “Āma,
atk-s0502a:4758_35: So visākhāya kāritesu ghanasuvaṇṇakoṭṭimesu senāsanakuṭesu ekaṃ saṭṭhikuṭaudakagaṇhanakaṃ mahāghaṭaṃ
atk-s0502a:4758_36: hatthena gahetvā “iminā me ukkhipitvā aṃsakūṭe ṭhapitena attho natthī”ti olambakaṃ katvā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0502a:4759_0: Nāgarājā sāmaṇeraṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ disvā paccuggantvā kuṭaṃ aṃsakūṭena ādāya, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4759_1: tumhe mādise dāse vijjamāne kasmā sayaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0502a:4759_2: udakenatthe sati kasmā sāsanamattampi na pahiṇathā”ti kuṭena udakaṃ ādāya sayaṃ ukkhipitvā “purato hotha, bhante,
atk-s0502a:4759_5: ahameva sammāsambuddhena āṇatto”ti nāgarājānaṃ nivattāpetvā kuṭaṃ mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ hatthena gahetvā ākāsenāgañchi.
atk-s0502a:4759_6: Atha naṃ satthā āgacchantaṃ oloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0502a:4759_11: Sopi pānīyaghaṭaṃ ṭhapetvā satthāraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4759_16: ajja paṭṭhāya bhikkhu hohī”ti vatvā dāyajjaupasampadaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:4759_17: Dveyeva kira sāmaṇerā sattavassikā upasampadaṃ labhiṃsu –
atk-s0502a:4760_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ upasampanne dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ,
atk-s0502a:4760_2: evarūpo hi nāma daharasāmaṇerassa ānubhāvo hoti,
atk-s0502a:4760_3: na no ito pubbe evarūpo ānubhāvo diṭṭhapubbo”ti.
atk-s0502a:4760_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:4760_8: mama sāsane daharopi sammā paṭipanno evarūpaṃ sampattiṃ labhatiyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4763_0: Somaṃ lokaṃ pabhāseti, abbhā muttova candimā”ti.
atk-s0502a:4764_1: Pabhāsetīti so bhikkhu attano arahattamaggañāṇena abbhādīhi mutto candimā viya lokaṃ khandhādibhedaṃ lokaṃ obhāseti,
atk-s0502a:4771_0: Chinda sotanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pasādabahulaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4772_0: So kira brāhmaṇo bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasannacitto attano gehe soḷasamattānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ niccabhattaṃ
atk-s0502a:4772_1: paṭṭhapetvā bhikkhūnaṃ āgatavelāya pattaṃ gahetvā “āgacchantu bhonto arahanto,
atk-s0502a:4772_2: nisīdantu bhonto arahanto”ti yaṃkiñci vadanto arahantavādapaṭisaṃyuttameva vadati.
atk-s0502a:4772_5: Evaṃ te sabbepi kukkuccāyantā tassa gehaṃ nāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4772_7: nāgacchantī”ti vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:4772_9: bhikkhave”ti pucchitvā tehi tasmiṃ atthe ārocite “sādiyatha pana tumhe,
atk-s0502a:4772_17: api ca kho pana brāhmaṇassa arahantesu adhimattaṃ pemaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4772_18: tasmā tumhehipi taṇhāsotaṃ chetvā arahattameva pattuṃ yutta”nti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4776_0: Tattha parakkammāti taṇhāsotaṃ nāma na appamattakena vāyāmena chindituṃ sakkā,
atk-s0502a:4776_1: tasmā ñāṇasampayuttena mahantena parakkamena parakkamitvā taṃ sotaṃ chinda.
atk-s0502a:4776_5: Akataññūti evaṃ sante tvaṃ suvaṇṇādīsu kenaci akatassa nibbānassa jānanato akataññū nāma hosīti.
atk-s0502a:4780_0: Yadā dvayesūti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4781_0: Ekadivasañhi tiṃsamattā disāvāsikā bhikkhū āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4781_1: Sāriputtatthero tesaṃ arahattassa upanissayaṃ disvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā ṭhitakova imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4784_0: Athassa sabbe saṃyogā, atthaṃ gacchanti jānato”ti.
atk-s0502a:4785_0: Tattha yadāti yasmiṃ kāle dvidhā ṭhitesu samathavipassanādhammesu abhiññāpāragādivasena ayaṃ khīṇāsavo pāragū hoti,
atk-s0502a:4785_1: athassa vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojanasamatthā sabbe kāmayogādayo saṃyogā evaṃ jānantassa atthaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchantīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4786_0: Desanāvasāne sabbepi te bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsūti.
atk-s0502a:4789_0: Yassa pāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto māraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4790_0: So kirekasmiṃ divase aññataro puriso viya hutvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pucchi – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4790_5: tañhi vītarāgehi pattabba”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4792_0: “Yassa pāraṃ apāraṃ vā, pārāpāraṃ na vijjati;
atk-s0502a:4794_3: Na vijjatīti yassa sabbampetaṃ “aha”nti vā “mama”nti vā gahaṇābhāvena natthi,
atk-s0502a:4794_4: taṃ kilesadarathānaṃ vigamena vītaddaraṃ sabbakilesehi visaṃyuttaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4798_0: Jhāyinti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4799_4: mampi nu kho evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4799_7: uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ anuppattameva panevaṃ vadāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4803_0: Tattha jhāyinti duvidhena jhānena jhāyantaṃ kāmarajena virajaṃ vane ekakamāsīnaṃ catūhi maggehi soḷasannaṃ
atk-s0502a:4803_1: kiccānaṃ katattā katakiccaṃ āsavānaṃ abhāvena anāsavaṃ uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ anuppattaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ
atk-s0502a:4804_0: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4807_0: Divā tapatīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā migāramātupāsāde viharanto ānandattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4808_0: Pasenadi kosalo kira mahāpavāraṇāya sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito gandhamālādīni ādāya vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4808_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kāḷudāyitthero jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā parisapariyante nisinno hoti,
atk-s0502a:4808_6: Ānandatthero atthamentassa ca sūriyassa uggacchantassa ca candassa obhāsaṃ olokento rañño sarīrobhāsaṃ
atk-s0502a:4808_7: therassa sarīrobhāsaṃ tathāgatassa ca sarīrobhāsaṃ olokesi.
atk-s0502a:4808_10: ajja mama ime obhāse olokentassa tumhākameva obhāso ruccati.
atk-s0502a:4808_11: Tumhākañhi sarīraṃ sabbobhāse atikkamitvā virocatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4808_17: buddhā pana rattimpi divāpi pañcavidhena tejena virocantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4811_0: Sannaddho khattiyo tapati, jhāyī tapati brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0502a:4813_2: Candimāti candopi abbhādīhi vimutto rattimeva virocati, no divā.
atk-s0502a:4813_3: Sannaddhoti suvaṇṇamaṇivicittehi sabbābharaṇehi paṭimaṇḍito caturaṅginiyā senāya parikkhittova rājā virocati,
atk-s0502a:4813_5: Jhāyīti khīṇāsavo pana gaṇaṃ vinodetvā jhāyantova virocati.
atk-s0502a:4813_10: dhammatejena adhammatejaṃ pariyādiyitvā iminā pañcavidhena tejasā niccakālameva virocatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4817_0: Bāhitapāpoti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇapabbajitaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4818_0: Eko kira brāhmaṇo bāhirakapabbajjāya pabbajitvā “samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake ‘pabbajitā’ti vadati,
atk-s0502a:4818_2: mampi kho evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4818_4: kilesamalānaṃ pana pabbājitattā pabbajito nāma hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4822_3: tasmā yo attano rāgādimalaṃ pabbājayanto vinodento carati,
atk-s0502a:4822_4: sopi tena pabbājanena pabbajitoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4826_0: Na brāhmaṇassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4827_0: Ekasmiṃ kira ṭhāne sambahulā manussā “aho amhākaṃ, ayyo,
atk-s0502a:4827_2: aññesu akkosantesu vā paharantesu vā kopamattampi natthī”ti therassa guṇe kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4827_3: Atheko micchādiṭṭhiko brāhmaṇo “ko esa na kujjhatī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4827_11: jānissāmissa kattabba”nti theraṃ bhikkhāya paviṭṭhaṃ disvā pacchābhāgena gantvā piṭṭhimajjhe mahantaṃ pāṇippahāramadāsi.
atk-s0502a:4827_16: bhante”ti vatvā “kiṃ eta”nti ca vutte “ahaṃ vīmaṃsanatthāya tumhe pahari”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:4827_18: mama geheyeva nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti therassa pattaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a:4828_0: Manussā kujjhitvā “iminā amhākaṃ niraparādho ayyo pahaṭo,
atk-s0502a:4828_2: ettheva naṃ māressāmā”ti leḍḍudaṇḍādihatthā brāhmaṇassa gehadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4828_3: Thero uṭṭhāya gacchanto brāhmaṇassa hatthe pattaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:4828_4: Manussā taṃ therena saddhiṃ gacchantaṃ disvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4828_5: tumhākaṃ pattaṃ gahetvā brāhmaṇaṃ nivattethā”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4828_12: gacchatha tumhe”ti manusse uyyojetvā brāhmaṇaṃ nivattāpetvā thero vihārameva gato.
atk-s0502a:4828_13: Bhikkhū ujjhāyiṃsu “kiṃ nāmetaṃ sāriputtatthero yena brāhmaṇena pahaṭo,
atk-s0502a:4828_14: tasseva gehe nisīditvā bhikkhaṃ gahetvā āgato.
atk-s0502a:4828_15: Therassa pahaṭakālato paṭṭhāya idāni so kassa lajjissati,
atk-s0502a:4828_19: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:4828_23: kodho nāmesa anāgāmimaggena samugghātaṃ gacchatī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a:4831_0: Dhī brāhmaṇassa hantāraṃ, tato dhī yassa muñcati.
atk-s0502a:4833_0: “Na brāhmaṇassetadakiñci seyyo, yadā nisedho manaso piyehi;
atk-s0502a:4834_0: Yato yato hiṃsamano nivattati, tato tato sammatimeva dukkha”nti.
atk-s0502a:4835_0: Tattha pahareyyāti “khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇohamasmī”ti jānanto khīṇāsavassa vā aññatarassa vā jātibrāhmaṇassa na pahareyya.
atk-s0502a:4835_1: Nāssa muñcethāti sopi pahaṭo khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo assa paharitvā ṭhitassa veraṃ na muñcetha,
atk-s0502a:4835_4: Tato dhīti yo pana taṃ paharantaṃ paṭipaharanto tassa upari veraṃ muñcati,
atk-s0502a:4836_0: Etadakiñci seyyoti yaṃ khīṇāsavassa akkosantaṃ vā apaccakkosanaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4836_2: etaṃ tassa khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇassa na kiñci seyyo,
atk-s0502a:4836_5: Yadā nisedho manaso piyehīti kodhanassa hi kodhuppādova manaso piyo nāma.
atk-s0502a:4836_6: Kodho hi panesa mātāpitūsupi buddhādīsupi aparajjhati.
atk-s0502a:4836_7: Tasmā yo assa tehi manaso nisedho kodhavasena uppajjamānassa cittassa niggaho,
atk-s0502a:4836_10: So tassa yato yato vatthuto anāgāmimaggena samugghātaṃ gacchanto nivattati.
atk-s0502a:4836_11: Tato tatoti tato tato vatthuto sakalampi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ nivattatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a:4840_0: Yassa kāyena vācāyāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4841_0: Bhagavatā hi anuppanne vatthusmiṃ paññatte aṭṭha garudhamme maṇḍanakajātiyo puriso surabhipupphadāmaṃ
atk-s0502a:4841_1: viya sirasā sampaṭicchitvā saparivārā mahāpajāpati gotamī upasampadaṃ labhi,
atk-s0502a:4841_2: añño tassā upajjhāyo vā ācariyo vā natthi.
atk-s0502a:4841_3: Evaṃ laddhūpasampadaṃ theriṃ ārabbha aparena samayena kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā ācariyupajjhāyā na paññāyanti,
atk-s0502a:4841_5: Evañca pana vatvā bhikkhuniyo kukkuccāyantiyo tāya saddhiṃ neva uposathaṃ na pavāraṇaṃ karonti,
atk-s0502a:4841_7: Satthā tāsaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “mayā mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā aṭṭha garudhammā dinnā,
atk-s0502a:4841_10: Kāyaduccaritādivirahitesu khīṇāsavesu kukkuccaṃ nāma na kātabba”nti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4844_0: Saṃvutaṃ tīhi ṭhānehi, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:4845_0: Tattha dukkaṭanti sāvajjaṃ dukkhudrayaṃ apāyasaṃvattanikaṃ kammaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4845_1: Tīhi ṭhānehīti etehi kāyādīhi tīhi kāraṇehi kāyaduccaritādipavesanivāraṇatthāya dvāraṃ pihitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4849_0: Yamhāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4850_0: So kirāyasmā assajittherassa santike dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattakālato paṭṭhāya “yassaṃ disāyaṃ thero vasatī”ti suṇāti,
atk-s0502a:4850_1: tato añjaliṃ paggayha tatova sīsaṃ katvā nipajjati.
atk-s0502a:4850_3: ajjāpi disā namassamāno vicaratī”ti tamatthaṃ tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4850_7: mama disā namassanabhāvaṃ vā anamassanabhāvaṃ vā tumheva jānāthā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:4850_10: assajittherassa pana santikā dhammaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphalaṃ pattatāya attano ācariyaṃ namassati.
atk-s0502a:4850_11: Yañhi ācariyaṃ nissāya bhikkhu dhammaṃ vijānāti,
atk-s0502a:4850_12: tena so brāhmaṇena aggi viya sakkaccaṃ namassitabboyevā”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4854_0: Tattha aggihuttaṃvāti yathā brāhmaṇo aggihuttaṃ sammā paricaraṇena ceva añjalikammādīhi ca sakkaccaṃ namassati,
atk-s0502a:4854_1: evaṃ yamhā ācariyā tathāgatapaveditaṃ dhammaṃ vijāneyya,
atk-s0502a:4858_0: Na jaṭāhīti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ jaṭilabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4859_0: So kira “ahaṃ mātito ca pitito ca sujāto brāhmaṇakule nibbatto.
atk-s0502a:4859_1: Sace samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake brāhmaṇāti vadati,
atk-s0502a:4859_2: mampi nu kho tathā vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4859_6: paṭividdhasaccameva panāhaṃ brāhmaṇoti vadāmī”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4861_0: “Na jaṭāhi na gottena, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
atk-s0502a:4862_0: Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, so sucī so ca brāhmaṇo”ti.
atk-s0502a:4863_0: Tattha saccanti yasmiṃ puggale cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ saccañāṇañceva navavidho ca lokuttaradhammo atthi, so suci,
atk-s0502a:4867_0: Kiṃ teti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kūṭāgārasālāyaṃ viharanto ekaṃ vaggulivataṃ kuhakabrāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4868_0: So kira vesālinagaradvāre ekaṃ kakudharukkhaṃ āruyha dvīhi pādehi rukkhasākhaṃ gaṇhitvā adhosiro olambanto “kapilānaṃ me sataṃ detha,
atk-s0502a:4868_4: ito patitvā maranto nagaraṃ anagaraṃ karissāmī”ti vadati.
atk-s0502a:4868_5: Tathāgatassa bhikkhusaṅghaparivutassa nagaraṃ pavisanakāle bhikkhū taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā nikkhamanakālepi naṃ tatheva olambantaṃ passiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4868_6: Nāgarāpi “ayaṃ pātova paṭṭhāya evaṃ olambanto patitvā maranto nagaraṃ anagaraṃ kareyyā”ti cintetvā nagaravināsabhītā “yaṃ so yācati,
atk-s0502a:4868_9: Bhikkhū vihārūpacāre taṃ gāviṃ viya viravitvā gacchantaṃ disvā sañjānitvā “laddhaṃ te, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0502a:4868_11: laddhaṃ me”ti sutvā antovihāraṃ gantvā tathāgatassa tamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4868_17: tadā pana paṇḍite vañcetuṃ nāsakkhī”ti vatvā tehi yācito atītamāhari.
atk-s0502a:4869_0: Atīte ekaṃ kāsikagāmaṃ nissāya eko kuhakatāpaso vāsaṃ kappesi.
atk-s0502a:4869_2: Divā uppannakhādanīyabhojanīyato attano puttānaṃ viya tassapi ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ deti,
atk-s0502a:4869_4: Athekadivasaṃ sāyaṃ godhamaṃsaṃ labhitvā sādhukaṃ pacitvā tato koṭṭhāsaṃ ṭhapetvā dutiyadivase tassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4869_5: Tāpaso maṃsaṃ khāditvāva rasataṇhāya baddho “kiṃ maṃsaṃ nāmeta”nti pucchitvā “godhamaṃsa”nti sutvā bhikkhāya
atk-s0502a:4869_6: caritvā sappidadhikaṭukabhaṇḍādīni gahetvā paṇṇasālaṃ gantvā ekamantaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:4869_7: Paṇṇasālāya pana avidūre ekasmiṃ vammike godharājā viharati.
atk-s0502a:4869_8: So kālena kālaṃ tāpasaṃ vandituṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0502a:4869_9: Taṃdivasaṃ panesa “taṃ vadhissāmī”ti daṇḍaṃ paṭicchādetvā tassa vammikassa avidūre ṭhāne niddāyanto viya nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:4869_10: Godharājā vammikato nikkhamitvā tassa santikaṃ āgacchantova ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā “na me ajja ācariyassa ākāro ruccatī”ti tatova nivatti.
atk-s0502a:4869_11: Tāpaso tassa nivattanabhāvaṃ ñatvā tassa māraṇatthāya daṇḍaṃ khipi,
atk-s0502a:4869_13: Godharājāpi dhammikaṃ pavisitvā tato sīsaṃ nīharitvā āgatamaggaṃ olokento tāpasaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:4871_0: So maṃ daṇḍena pāhāsi, yathā asamaṇo tathā.
atk-s0502a:4872_0: “Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
atk-s0502a:4874_0: Atha naṃ tāpaso attano santakena palobhetuṃ evamāha –
atk-s0502a:4876_0: Telaṃ loṇañca me atthi, pahūtaṃ mayha pipphalī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4877_0: Taṃ sutvā godharājā “yathā yathā tvaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0502a:4877_1: tathā tathā me palāyitukāmatāva hotī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4879_0: Telaṃ loṇañca kittesi, ahitaṃ mayha pipphalī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4880_0: Evañca pana vatvā “ahaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ tayi samaṇasaññaṃ akāsiṃ,
atk-s0502a:4880_1: idāni pana te maṃ paharitukāmatāya daṇḍo khitto,
atk-s0502a:4880_7: Satthā imaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā “tadā esa kuhako tāpaso ahosi,
atk-s0502a:4880_8: godharājā pana ahamevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānetvā tadā godhapaṇḍitena tassa niggahitakāraṇaṃ dassento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4882_0: “Kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā;
atk-s0502a:4884_0: Tattha kiṃ te jaṭāhīti ambho duppañña tava baddhāhipi imāhi jaṭāhi sakhurāya nivatthāyapi imāya ajinacammasāṭikāya ca kimatthoti.
atk-s0502a:4884_2: kevalaṃ hatthilaṇḍaṃ assalaṇḍaṃ viya maṭṭhaṃ bāhiraṃ parimajjasīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4888_0: Paṃsukūladharanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā gijjhakūṭe pabbate viharanto kisāgotamiṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4889_0: Tadā kira sakko paṭhamayāmāvasāne devaparisāya saddhiṃ satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā ekamante sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ suṇanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:4889_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe kisāgotamī “satthāraṃ passissāmī”ti ākāsenāgantvā sakkaṃ disvā nivatti.
atk-s0502a:4889_2: So taṃ vanditvā nivattantiṃ disvā satthāraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0502a:4889_6: mama dhītā paṃsukūlikattherīnaṃ aggā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4892_0: Ekaṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:4893_0: Tattha kisanti paṃsukūlikā hi attano anurūpaṃ paṭipadaṃ pūrentā appamaṃsalohitā ceva honti dhamanisanthatagattā ca,
atk-s0502a:4893_2: Ekaṃ vanasminti vivittaṭṭhāne ekakaṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4897_0: Na cāhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4898_0: So kira “samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake brāhmaṇāti vadati ahañcamhi brāhmaṇayoniyaṃ nibbatto,
atk-s0502a:4898_1: mampi nu kho evaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā tamatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4898_5: tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4901_0: Bhovādi nāma so hoti, sace hoti sakiñcano;
atk-s0502a:4903_1: Mattisambhavanti brāhmaṇiyā mātu santake udarasmiṃ sambhūtaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4903_3: bho”ti vatvā vicaranto bhovādi nāma hoti,
atk-s0502a:4903_5: Ahaṃ pana rāgādīhi akiñcanaṃ catūhi upādānehi anādānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4904_0: Desanāvasāne so brāhmaṇo sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4907_0: Sabbasaṃyojananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto uggasenaṃ nāma seṭṭhiputtaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4907_1: Vatthu “muñca pure muñca pacchato”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāritameva.
atk-s0502a:4908_2: abhūtena maññe aññaṃ byākarotī”ti bhikkhūhi vutte,
atk-s0502a:4908_4: mama puttasadisā chinnasaṃyojanā na bhāyantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4912_2: Tamahanti taṃ ahaṃ rāgādīnaṃ saṅgānaṃ atītattā saṅgātigaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4912_3: catunnampi yogānaṃ abhāvena visaṃyuttaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4916_0: Chetvā naddhinti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto dve brāhmaṇe ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4917_0: Tesu kirekassa cūḷarohito nāma goṇo ahosi,
atk-s0502a:4917_3: mama goṇo balavā”ti vivaditvā “kiṃ no vivādena,
atk-s0502a:4917_4: pājetvā jānissāmā”ti aciravatītīre sakaṭaṃ vālukāya pūretvā goṇe yojayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4917_5: Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhūpi nhāyituṃ tattha gatā honti.
atk-s0502a:4917_9: Bhikkhū disvā vihāraṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ satthu ārocayiṃsu. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:4917_13: bhikkhunā pana ajjhattikaṃ kodhanaddhiñceva taṇhāvarattañca chindituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4921_3: idaṃ sabbampi chinditvā ṭhitaṃ avijjāpalighassa ukkhittattā ukkhittapalighaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4921_4: catunnaṃ saccānaṃ buddhattā buddhaṃ taṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4922_0: Desanāvasāne pañcasatā bhikkhū arahatte patiṭṭhahiṃsu, sampattānampi sātthikā dhammadesanā ahosīti.
atk-s0502a:4925_0: Akkosanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto akkosakabhāradvājaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4926_0: Tassa hi bhātu bhāradvājassa dhanañjānī nāma brāhmaṇī sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:4926_1: Sā khīpitvāpi kāsitvāpi pakkhalitvāpi “namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0502a:4926_2: Sā ekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇaparivesanāya pavattamānāya pakkhalitvā tatheva mahāsaddena udānaṃ udānesi.
atk-s0502a:4926_3: Brāhmaṇo kujjhitvā “evamevāyaṃ vasalī yattha vā tattha vā pakkhalitvā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”ti vatvā “idāni te, vasali,
atk-s0502a:4926_4: gantvā tassa satthuno vādaṃ āropessāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4926_8: api ca gantvā taṃ bhagavantaṃ pañhaṃ pucchassū”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4926_9: So satthu santikaṃ gantvā avanditvāva ekamantaṃ ṭhito pañhaṃ pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4927_0: “Kiṃsu chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kiṃsu chetvā na socati;
atk-s0502a:4929_0: Athassa pañhaṃ byākaronto satthā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4930_0: “Kodhaṃ chetvā sukhaṃ seti, kodhaṃ chetvā na socati;
atk-s0502a:4932_0: Vadhaṃ ariyā pasaṃsanti, tañhi chetvā na socatī”ti. ;
atk-s0502a:4933_0: So satthari pasīditvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:4933_1: Athassa kaniṭṭho akkosakabhāradvājo “bhātā kira me pabbajito”ti sutvā kuddho āgantvā satthāraṃ asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi akkosi.
atk-s0502a:4933_2: Sopi satthārā atithīnaṃ khādanīyādidānaopammena saññatto satthari pasanno pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:4933_3: Aparepissa sundarikabhāradvājo biliṅgakabhāradvājoti dve kaniṭṭhabhātaro satthāraṃ akkosantāva satthārā vinītā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4934_2: catūsu nāma bhātikesu akkosantesu satthā kiñci avatvā tesaṃyeva patiṭṭhā jāto”ti.
atk-s0502a:4934_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:4934_7: ahaṃ mama khantibalena samannāgatattā duṭṭhesu adussanto mahājanassa patiṭṭhā homiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4938_0: Tattha aduṭṭhoti etaṃ dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosañca pāṇiādīhi pothanañca andubandhanādīhi bandhanañca yo akuddhamānaso hutvā adhivāseti,
atk-s0502a:4938_2: punappunaṃ uppattiyā anīkabhūtena teneva khantibalena samannāgatattā balānīkaṃ taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4942_0: Akkodhananti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4943_0: Tadā kira thero pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ piṇḍāya caranto nālakagāme mātu gharadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4943_1: Atha naṃ sā nisīdāpetvā parivisamānā akkosi – “ambho,
atk-s0502a:4943_2: ucchiṭṭhakhādaka ucchiṭṭhakañjiyaṃ alabhitvā paragharesu uḷuṅkapiṭṭhena ghaṭṭitakañjiyaṃ paribhuñjituṃ asītikoṭidhanaṃ pahāya pabbajitosi,
atk-s0502a:4943_5: Bhikkhūnampi bhattaṃ dadamānā “tumhehi mama putto attano cūḷupaṭṭhāko kato,
atk-s0502a:4943_22: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4943_27: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:4943_29: khīṇāsavā nāma akkodhanāva hontī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4947_4: koṭiyaṃ ṭhitena attabhāvena antimasarīraṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4951_0: Vāri pokkharapattevāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto uppalavaṇṇatheriṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4952_0: Aparena samayena mahājano dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi “khīṇāsavāpi maññe kāmasukhaṃ sādiyanti,
atk-s0502a:4952_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:4952_13: Yathā hi padumapatte patitaṃ udakabindu na limpati na saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0502a:4952_15: Yathā ca āragge sāsapo na upalimpati na saṇṭhāti,
atk-s0502a:4952_17: evaṃ khīṇāsavassa citte duvidhopi kāmo na limpati na saṇṭhātī”ti anusandhiṃ ghaṭetvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4955_0: Yo na limpati kāmesu, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:4956_0: Tattha yo na limpatīti evamevaṃ yo abbhantare duvidhepi kāme na upalimpati,
atk-s0502a:4960_0: Yo dukkhassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4961_0: Tassa kireko dāso apaññatte sikkhāpade palāyitvā pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:4961_1: Brāhmaṇo taṃ olokento adisvā ekadivasaṃ satthārā saddhiṃ piṇḍāya pavisantaṃ dvārantare disvā cīvaraṃ daḷhaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0502a:4965_1: Pannabhāranti ohitakhandhabhāraṃ catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi vā visaṃyuttaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4968_0: Gambhīrapaññanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā gijjhakūṭe viharanto khemaṃ nāma bhikkhuniṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4969_0: Ekadivasañhi paṭhamayāmasamanantare sakko devarājā parisāya saddhiṃ āgantvā satthu santike sāraṇīyadhammakathaṃ suṇanto nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:4969_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe khemā bhikkhunī “satthāraṃ passissāmī”ti āgantvā sakkaṃ disvā ākāse ṭhitāva satthāraṃ vanditvā nivatti.
atk-s0502a:4969_3: āgacchamānā ākāse ṭhitāva satthāraṃ vanditvā nivattī”ti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:4969_5: mama dhītā khemā nāma mahāpaññā maggāmaggakovidā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4973_0: Tattha gabbhīrapaññanti gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya paññāya samannāgataṃ dhammojapaññāya samannāgataṃ medhāviṃ “ayaṃ duggatiyā maggo,
atk-s0502a:4973_3: ayaṃ amaggo”ti evaṃ magge ca amagge ca chekatāya maggāmaggassa kovidaṃ arahattasaṅkhātaṃ uttamatthaṃ anuppattaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4977_0: Asaṃsaṭṭhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto pabbhāravāsītissattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4978_0: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññaṃ pavisitvā sappāyaṃ senāsanaṃ olokento ekaṃ leṇapabbhāraṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0502a:4978_2: So “ahaṃ idha vasanto pabbajitakiccaṃ nipphādetuṃ sakkhissāmī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:4978_5: Ayaṃ pana idha ekarattimeva vasitvā pakkamissatī”ti cintetvā putte ādāya nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:4978_6: Thero punadivase pātova gocaragāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:4978_7: Atha naṃ ekā upāsikā disvāva puttasinehaṃ paṭilabhitvā gehe nisīdāpetvā bhojetvā attānaṃ nissāya temāsaṃ vasanatthāya yāci.
atk-s0502a:4978_8: Sopi “sakkā mayā imaṃ nissāya bhavanissaraṇaṃ kātu”nti adhivāsetvā tameva leṇaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:4978_9: Devatā taṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā “addhā kenaci nimantito bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:4978_10: sve vā parasuve vā gamissatī”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:4979_0: Evaṃ aḍḍhamāsamatte atikkante “ayaṃ idheva maññe antovassaṃ vasissati,
atk-s0502a:4979_1: sīlavatā pana saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne puttakehi saddhiṃ vasituṃ dukkaraṃ,
atk-s0502a:4979_3: atthi nu kho imassa sīle khalita”nti dibbena cakkhunā olokentī upasampadamāḷakato paṭṭhāya tassa sīle khalitaṃ adisvā “parisuddhamassa sīlaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4979_4: kiñcidevassa katvā ayasaṃ uppādessāmī”ti tassa upaṭṭhākakule upāsikāya jeṭṭhaputtassa sarīre adhimuccitvā gīvaṃ parivattesi.
atk-s0502a:4979_11: tumhākaṃ pana kulūpakaṃ theraṃ laṭṭhimadhukaṃ yācitvā tena telaṃ pacitvā imassa natthukammaṃ detha,
atk-s0502a:4979_18: Tena hissa pādadhovanaudakaṃ ādāya sīse āsiñcathāti.
atk-s0502a:4979_19: Upāsikā “sakkā idaṃ kātu”nti velāya āgataṃ theraṃ nisīdāpetvā yāgukhajjakaṃ datvā antarabhatte nisinnassa pāde dhovitvā udakaṃ gahetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4979_20: idaṃ udakaṃ dārakassa sīse āsiñcāmā”ti āpucchitvā “tena hi āsiñcathā”ti vutte tathā akāsi.
atk-s0502a:4979_21: Sā devatā tāvadeva taṃ muñcitvā gantvā leṇadvāre aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:4980_0: Theropi bhattakiccāvasāne uṭṭhāyāsanā avissaṭṭhakammaṭṭhānatāya dvattiṃsākāraṃ sajjhāyantova pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:4980_1: Atha naṃ leṇadvāraṃ pattakāle sā devatā “mahāvejja mā idha pavisā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:4980_4: Thero “atthi nu kho mayā vejjakammassa kataṭṭhāna”nti upasampadamāḷakato paṭṭhāya olokento attano sīle
atk-s0502a:4980_5: tilakaṃ vā kāḷakaṃ vā adisvā “ahaṃ mayā vejjakammassa kataṭṭhānaṃ na passāmi,
atk-s0502a:4980_12: ajjeva tayā amanussagahitassa upaṭṭhākaputtassa pādadhovanaudakaṃ sīse āsittaṃ,
atk-s0502a:4980_21: devatāpi mama catupārisuddhisīle tilakaṃ vā kāḷakaṃ vā adisvā dārakassa sīse āsittapādadhovanamattaṃ addasā”ti tassa sīlaṃ ārabbha balavapīti uppajji.
atk-s0502a:4980_22: So taṃ vikkhambhetvā pāduddhārampi akatvā tattheva arahattaṃ patvā “mādisaṃ parisuddhaṃ samaṇaṃ dūsetvā mā idha vanasaṇḍe vasi,
atk-s0502a:4980_23: tvameva nikkhamāhī”ti devataṃ ovadanto imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi –
atk-s0502a:4981_0: “Visuddho vata me vāso, nimmalaṃ maṃ tapassinaṃ;
atk-s0502a:4982_0: Mā tvaṃ visuddhaṃ dūsesi, nikkhama pavanā tuva”nti.
atk-s0502a:4983_0: So tattheva temāsaṃ vasitvā vutthavasso satthu santikaṃ gantvā bhikkhūhi “kiṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4983_1: pabbajitakiccaṃ te matthakaṃ pāpita”nti puṭṭho tasmiṃ leṇe vassūpagamanato paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ārocetvā, “āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4983_2: tvaṃ devatāya evaṃ vuccamāno na kujjhī”ti vutte “na kujjhi”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:4983_5: devatāya idaṃ nāma vuccamānopi na kujjhinti vadatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:4983_9: etassa gihīhi vā pabbajitehi vā saṃsaggo nāma natthi,
atk-s0502a:4983_10: asaṃsaṭṭho esa appiccho santuṭṭho”ti vatvā dhammaṃ desento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4987_1: Ubhayanti gihīhi ca anāgārehi cāti ubhayehipi asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:4987_2: Anokasārinti anālayacāriṃ taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:4991_0: Nidhāya daṇḍanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:4992_0: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā araññe vāyamanto arahattaṃ patvā “paṭiladdhaguṇaṃ satthu ārocessāmī”ti tato nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:4992_1: Atha naṃ ekasmiṃ gāme ekā itthī sāmikena saddhiṃ kalahaṃ katvā tasmiṃ bahi nikkhante “kulagharaṃ gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0502a:4992_2: maggaṃ paṭipannā antarāmagge disvā “imaṃ theraṃ nissāya gamissāmī”ti piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhi.
atk-s0502a:4992_4: Athassā sāmiko gehaṃ āgato taṃ adisvā “kulagāmaṃ gatā bhavissatī”ti anubandhanto taṃ disvā “na sakkā imāya ekikāya imaṃ aṭaviṃ paṭipajjituṃ,
atk-s0502a:4992_5: kaṃ nu kho nissāya gacchatī”ti olokento theraṃ disvā “ayaṃ imaṃ gaṇhitvā nikkhanto bhavissatī”ti cintetvā theraṃ santajjesi.
atk-s0502a:4992_6: Atha naṃ sā itthī “neva maṃ esa bhadanto passati,
atk-s0502a:4992_9: So “kiṃ pana tvaṃ attānaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ mama ācikkhissasi,
atk-s0502a:4992_10: tuyhameva anucchavikaṃ imassa karissāmī”ti uppannakodho itthiyā āghātena theraṃ pothetvā taṃ ādāya nivatti.
atk-s0502a:4992_12: Athassa vihāraṃ gatakāle bhikkhū sarīraṃ sambāhantā gaṇḍe disvā “kiṃ ida”nti pucchiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:4992_15: tasmiṃ purise evaṃ paharante tvaṃ kiṃ avaca,
atk-s0502a:4992_16: kiṃ vā te kodho uppanno”ti. “Na me, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4992_17: kodho uppajjī”ti vutte satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:4992_18: esa bhikkhu ‘kodho te uppajjatī’ti vuccamāno ‘na me, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:4992_19: kodho uppajjatī’ti abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarotī”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:4992_23: te paharantesupi kodhaṃ na karontiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:4995_0: Yo na hanti na ghāteti, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:4996_3: Yo na hantīti yo evaṃ sabbasattesu vigatapaṭighatāya nikkhittadaṇḍo neva kañci sayaṃ hanati,
atk-s0502a:5000_0: Aviruddhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto cattāro sāmaṇere ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5001_0: Ekā kira brāhmaṇī catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ uddesabhattaṃ sajjetvā brāhmaṇaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:5001_2: So vihāraṃ gantvā “cattāro me brāhmaṇe uddisitvā dethā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5001_3: Tassa saṃkicco paṇḍito sopāko revatoti sattavassikā cattāro khīṇāsavasāmaṇerā pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5001_4: Brāhmaṇī mahārahāni āsanāni paññāpetvā ṭhitā sāmaṇere disvāva kupitā uddhane pakkhittaloṇaṃ viya taṭataṭāyamānā
atk-s0502a:5001_5: “tvaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā attano nattumattepi appahonte cattāro kumārake gahetvā āgatosī”ti vatvā tesaṃ tesu
atk-s0502a:5001_6: āsanesu nisīdituṃ adatvā nīcapīṭhakāni attharitvā “etesu nisīdathā”ti vatvā “gaccha, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0502a:5001_10: Thero āgantvā sāmaṇere disvā “imehi brāhmaṇehi bhattaṃ laddha”nti pucchitvā “na laddha”nti vutte catunnameva
atk-s0502a:5001_11: bhattassa paṭiyattabhāvaṃ ñatvā “āhara me patta”nti pattaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:5001_12: Brāhmaṇīpi “kiṃ iminā vutta”nti pucchitvā “etesaṃ nisinnānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a:5001_13: āhara me patta”nti attano pattaṃ gahetvā gato,
atk-s0502a:5001_16: Brāhmaṇo gantvā mahāmoggallānattheraṃ disvā tatheva vatvā ānesi.
atk-s0502a:5001_17: Sopi sāmaṇere disvā tatheva vatvā pattaṃ gahetvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:5002_0: Sāmaṇerāpi pātova paṭṭhāya kiñci alabhamānā jighacchāya pīḷitā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5002_1: Atha nesaṃ guṇatejena sakkassa āsanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:5002_2: So āvajjento tesaṃ pātova paṭṭhāya nisinnānaṃ kilantabhāvaṃ ñatvā “mayā tattha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti jarājiṇṇo
atk-s0502a:5002_3: mahallakabrāhmaṇo hutvā tasmiṃ brāhmaṇavādake brāhmaṇānaṃ aggāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:5002_4: Brāhmaṇo taṃ disvā “idāni me brāhmaṇī attamanā bhavissatī”ti ehi gehaṃ gamissāmā”ti taṃ ādāya gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:5002_5: Brāhmaṇī taṃ disvāva tuṭṭhacittā dvīsu āsanesu attharaṇaṃ ekasmiṃyeva attharitvā, “ayya,
atk-s0502a:5002_7: Sakko gehaṃ pavisitvā cattāro sāmaṇere pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā tesaṃ āsanapariyante bhūmiyaṃ pallaṅkena nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:5002_8: Atha naṃ disvā brāhmaṇī brāhmaṇaṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:5002_14: So khandhepi hatthepi kacchāyapi gahetvā nikkaḍḍhiyamāno uṭṭhātumpi na icchati.
atk-s0502a:5002_17: ahaṃ ekasmiṃ hatthe gaṇhissāmī”ti ubhopi dvīsu hatthesu gahetvā piṭṭhiyaṃ pothentā gehadvārato bahi akaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5002_19: Te nivattitvā taṃ nisinnameva disvā bhītaravaṃ ravantā vissajjesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:5002_20: Tasmiṃ khaṇe sakko attano sakkabhāvaṃ jānāpesi.
atk-s0502a:5002_22: Pañcapi janā āhāraṃ gahetvā eko kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ vinivijjhitvā,
atk-s0502a:5002_26: sakkopi ekena ṭhānena nikkhamīti evaṃ pañcadhā agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5002_27: Tato paṭṭhāya ca pana taṃ gehaṃ pañcachiddagehaṃ kira nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5003_3: amhākaṃ diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇī kodhābhibhūtā paññattāsanesu no nisīditumpi adatvā “sīghaṃ sīghaṃ mahallakabrāhmaṇaṃ ānehī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5003_4: Amhākaṃ upajjhāyo āgantvā amhe disvā “imesaṃ nisinnabrāhmaṇānaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pattaṃ āharāpetvā nikkhami.
atk-s0502a:5003_5: “Aññaṃ mahallakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ānesī”ti vutte brāhmaṇo mahāmoggallānattheraṃ ānesi,
atk-s0502a:5003_6: sopi amhe disvā tatheva vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:5003_8: gaccha brāhmaṇavādakato ekaṃ mahallakabrāhmaṇaṃ ānehī”ti brāhmaṇaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:5003_9: So tattha gantvā brāhmaṇavesena āgataṃ sakkaṃ ānesi,
atk-s0502a:5003_11: Evaṃ karontānaṃ pana tesaṃ tumhe na kujjhitthāti?
atk-s0502a:5003_14: ime ‘na kujjhimhā’ti abhūtaṃ vatvā aññaṃ byākarontī”ti. Satthā,
atk-s0502a:5003_16: khīṇāsavā nāma viruddhesupi na virujjhantiyevā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5007_0: Tattha aviruddhanti āghātavasena viruddhesupi lokiyamahājanesu āghātābhāvena aviruddhaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5007_1: Hatthagate daṇḍe vā satthe vā avijjamānepi paresaṃ pahāradānato aviratattā attadaṇḍesu janesu nibbutaṃ nikkhittadaṇḍaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5007_2: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ ahaṃ mamanti gahitattā sādānesu tassa gahaṇassa abhāvena anādānaṃ taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5011_0: Yassa rāgo cāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto mahāpanthakaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5012_0: So hāyasmā cūḷapanthakaṃ catūhi māsehi ekaṃ gāthaṃ paguṇaṃ kātuṃ asakkontaṃ “tvaṃ sāsane abhabbo,
atk-s0502a:5012_3: ito nikkhamā”ti vihārā nikkaḍḍhitvā dvāraṃ thakesi.
atk-s0502a:5012_9: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:5012_12: mama puttena atthapurekkhāratāya ceva dhammapurekkhāratāya ca kata”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5014_0: “Yassa rāgo ca doso ca, māno makkho ca pātito;
atk-s0502a:5016_1: ayañca paraguṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo makkho āraggā sāsapo viya pātito,
atk-s0502a:5020_0: Akakkasanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto pilindavacchattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5021_1: vasalī”tiādīni vadanto gihīpi pabbajitepi vasalivādeneva samudācarati.
atk-s0502a:5021_2: Athekadivasaṃ sambahulā bhikkhū satthu ārocesuṃ – “āyasmā, bhante,
atk-s0502a:5021_4: Satthā taṃ pakkosāpetvā “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ pilindavaccha bhikkhū vasalivādena samudācarasī”ti pucchitvā “evaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5021_5: bhante”ti vutte tassāyasmato pubbenivāsaṃ manasikaritvā “mā kho tumhe,
atk-s0502a:5021_12: bhikkhuno pañca jātisatāni abbokiṇṇāni sabbāni tāni brāhmaṇakule paccājātāni,
atk-s0502a:5021_14: khīṇāsavassa nāma kakkasaṃ pharusaṃ paresaṃ mammaghaṭṭanavacanameva natthi.
atk-s0502a:5021_15: Āciṇṇavasena hi mama putto evaṃ kathetī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5024_0: Yāya nābhisaje kañci, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:5025_3: Nābhisajeti yāya girāya aññaṃ kujjhāpanavasena na laggāpeyya,
atk-s0502a:5029_0: Yodha dīghanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aññatarattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5030_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko micchādiṭṭhiko brāhmaṇo sarīragandhagahaṇabhayena uttarasāṭakaṃ apanetvā ekamante ṭhapetvā gehadvārābhimukho nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:5030_1: Atheko khīṇāsavo bhattakiccaṃ katvā vihāraṃ gacchanto taṃ sāṭakaṃ disvā ito cito ca oloketvā kañci apassanto
atk-s0502a:5030_3: Atha naṃ brāhmaṇo disvā akkosanto upasaṅkamitvā “muṇḍaka, samaṇa,
atk-s0502a:5030_7: gaṇha na”nti tassa datvā vihāraṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ tamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0502a:5030_8: Athassa vacanaṃ sutvā bhikkhū tena saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karontā “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso,
atk-s0502a:5030_9: sāṭako dīgho rasso thūlo saṇho”ti. Āvuso,
atk-s0502a:5030_10: dīgho vā hotu rasso vā thūlo vā saṇho vā,
atk-s0502a:5030_13: Taṃ sutvā bhikkhū tathāgatassa ārocesuṃ – “esa, bhante,
atk-s0502a:5030_18: khīṇāsavā nāma paresaṃ santakaṃ na gaṇhantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5032_0: “Yodha dīghaṃ va rassaṃ vā, aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhaṃ;
atk-s0502a:5033_0: Loke adinnaṃ nādiyati, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:5034_1: sāṭakābharaṇādīsu dīghaṃ vā rassaṃ vā maṇimuttādīsu aṇuṃ vā thūlaṃ vā mahagghaappagghavasena subhaṃ vā
atk-s0502a:5034_2: asubhaṃ vā yo puggalo imasmiṃ loke parapariggahitaṃ nādiyati,
atk-s0502a:5038_0: Āsā yassāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sāriputtattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5039_0: Thero kira pañcabhikkhusataparivāro janapade ekaṃ vihāraṃ gantvā vassaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0502a:5039_1: Manussā theraṃ disvā bahuṃ vassāvāsikaṃ paṭissuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5039_2: Thero pavāretvā sabbasmiṃ vassāvāsike asampatteyeva satthu santikaṃ gacchanto bhikkhū āha –
atk-s0502a:5039_3: “daharānañceva sāmaṇerānañca manussehi vassāvāsike āhaṭe gahetvā peseyyātha,
atk-s0502a:5039_5: Evaṃ vatvā ca pana satthu santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:5039_6: Bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “ajjāpi maññe sāriputtattherassa taṇhā atthiyeva.
atk-s0502a:5039_7: Tathā hi manussehi vassāvāsike dinne attano saddhivihārikānaṃ ‘vassāvāsikaṃ peseyyātha,
atk-s0502a:5039_8: ṭhapetvā vā sāsanaṃ pahiṇeyyāthā’ti bhikkhūnaṃ vatvā āgato”ti.
atk-s0502a:5039_11: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “na,
atk-s0502a:5039_14: manussānaṃ pana puññato daharasāmaṇerānañca dhammikalābhato parihāni mā ahosīti tenevaṃ kathita”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5041_0: “Āsā yassa na vijjanti, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca;
atk-s0502a:5043_2: Visaṃyuttanti sabbakilesehi visaṃyuttaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5047_0: Yassālayāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto mahāmoggallānattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5047_2: Idha pana satthā moggallānattherassa nittaṇhabhāvaṃ vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5051_1: Aññāya akathaṃkathīti aṭṭha vatthūni yathābhūtaṃ jānitvā aṭṭhavatthukāya vicikicchāya nibbicikiccho.
atk-s0502a:5051_2: Amatogadhamanuppattanti amataṃ nibbānaṃ ogāhetvā anuppattaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5055_0: Yodha puññañcāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā pubbārāme viharanto revatattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5055_1: Vatthu “gāme vā yadi vāraññe”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vitthāritameva.
atk-s0502a:5056_0: Puna ekadivasaṃ bhikkhū kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “aho sāmaṇerassa lābho,
atk-s0502a:5056_2: yena ekakena pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañcakūṭāgārasatāni katānī”ti.
atk-s0502a:5056_5: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte,
atk-s0502a:5056_7: mayhaṃ puttassa neva puññaṃ atthi, na pāpaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5059_0: Asokaṃ virajaṃ suddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:5060_0: Tattha ubhoti dvepi puññāni ca pāpāni ca chaḍḍetvāti attho.
atk-s0502a:5060_3: Vaṭṭamūlakasokābhāvena asokaṃ abbhantare rāgarajādīnaṃ abhāvena virajaṃ nirupakkilesatāya suddhaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5064_0: Candaṃ vāti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto candābhattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5065_1: atīte eko bārāṇasivāsī vāṇijo “paccantaṃ gantvā candanaṃ āharissāmī”ti bahūni vatthābharaṇādīni gahetvā
atk-s0502a:5065_2: pañcahi sakaṭasatehi paccantaṃ gantvā gāmadvāre nivāsaṃ gahetvā aṭaviyaṃ gopāladārake pucchi –
atk-s0502a:5065_3: “imasmiṃ gāme pabbatapādakammiko koci manusso atthī”ti? “Āma, atthī”ti.
atk-s0502a:5065_10: So tehi dinnasaññāya sukhayānake nisīditvā tassa gehadvāraṃ gantvā yānā oruyha gehaṃ pavisitvā “asukanāme”ti taṃ itthiṃ pakkosi.
atk-s0502a:5065_11: Sā “eko no ñātako bhavissatī”ti vegenāgantvā āsanaṃ paññāpesi.
atk-s0502a:5065_12: So tattha nisīditvā nāmaṃ vatvā “mama sahāyo kaha”nti pucchi.
atk-s0502a:5065_15: mama dhītā asukā nāma kaha”nti sabbesaṃ nāmaṃ kittentova pucchitvā “imāni nesaṃ vatthābharaṇāni dadeyyāsi,
atk-s0502a:5065_16: sahāyassāpi me aṭavito āgatakāle idaṃ vatthābharaṇaṃ dadeyyāsī”ti adāsi.
atk-s0502a:5065_17: Sā tassa uḷāraṃ sakkāraṃ katvā sāmikassa āgatakāle “sāmi,
atk-s0502a:5065_18: iminā āgatakālato paṭṭhāya sabbesaṃ nāmaṃ vatvā idañcidañca dinna”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:5066_0: Atha naṃ sāyaṃ sayane nisinno pucchi – “samma,
atk-s0502a:5066_1: pabbatapāde carantena te kiṃ bahuṃ diṭṭhapubba”nti?
atk-s0502a:5066_3: rattasākhā pana me bahū rukkhā diṭṭhā”ti.
atk-s0502a:5066_5: Tena hi te amhākaṃ dassehīti tena saddhiṃ gantvā rattacandanarukkhe chinditvā pañca sakaṭasatāni pūretvā āgacchanto taṃ āha – “samma,
atk-s0502a:5066_8: aññena ca me paṇṇākārena attho natthi,
atk-s0502a:5066_10: So “sādhū”ti vatvā kālena kālaṃ tassa santikaṃ āgacchanto rattacandanameva āharati,
atk-s0502a:5067_0: Tato aparena samayena parinibbute kassapadasabale patiṭṭhite kañcanathūpe so puriso bahuṃ candanaṃ ādāya bārāṇasiṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:5067_1: Athassa so sahāyako vāṇijo bahuṃ candanaṃ pisāpetvā pātiṃ pūretvā “ehi, samma,
atk-s0502a:5067_3: tāva cetiyakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā āgamissāmā”ti taṃ ādāya tattha gantvā candanapūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:5067_4: Sopissa paccantavāsī sahāyako cetiyakucchiyaṃ candanena candamaṇḍalaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:5068_0: So tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ tattha khepetvā imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahanagare brāhmaṇamahāsālakule nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:5068_6: Taṃ yāne nisīdāpetvā “yo imassa sarīraṃ hatthena parāmasati,
atk-s0502a:5068_7: so evarūpaṃ nāma issariyasampattiṃ labhatī”ti vatvā vicariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5068_8: Sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā dadamānā eva tassa sarīraṃ hatthena phusituṃ labhanti.
atk-s0502a:5068_9: Te evaṃ anuvicarantā sāvatthiṃ anuppattā nagarassa ca vihārassa ca antarā nivāsaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5068_10: Sāvatthiyampi pañcakoṭimattā ariyasāvakā purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ gandhamālavatthabhesajjādihatthā dhammassavanāya gacchanti.
atk-s0502a:5068_14: amhākaṃ candābhassa brāhmaṇassa ānubhāvasadiso ānubhāvo natthi.
atk-s0502a:5068_15: Etassa hi sarīraṃ phusantā idaṃ nāma labhanti,
atk-s0502a:5068_17: Tumhākaṃ candābhassa brāhmaṇassa ko ānubhāvo nāma,
atk-s0502a:5068_19: Te aññamaññaṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontā “vihāraṃ gantvā candābhassa vā amhākaṃ vā satthu ānubhāvaṃ jānissāmā”ti taṃ gahetvā vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5069_0: Satthā tasmiṃ attano santikaṃ upasaṅkamanteyeva candābhāya antaradhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:5069_1: So satthu santike aṅgārapacchiyaṃ kāko viya ahosi.
atk-s0502a:5069_6: Evaṃ tikkhattuṃ gantvā antaradhāyamānaṃ ābhaṃ disvā candābho cintesi –
atk-s0502a:5069_9: “kiṃ nu kho ābhāya antaradhānamantaṃ jānāthā”ti? Āma, jānāmīti.
atk-s0502a:5069_13: “etasmiṃ mante gahite ahaṃ sakalajambudīpe jeṭṭhako bhavissāmi,
atk-s0502a:5069_20: Brāhmaṇāpi antarantarā āgantvā “gahito te manto”ti pucchanti.
atk-s0502a:5069_22: So katipāheneva arahattaṃ patvā brāhmaṇehi āgantvā pucchitakāle “yātha tumhe,
atk-s0502a:5073_4: Nandībhavaparikkhīṇanti tīsu bhavesu parikkhīṇataṇhaṃ tamahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5077_0: Yo imanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā kuṇḍakoliyaṃ nissāya kuṇḍadhānavane viharanto sīvalittheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5078_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye suppavāsā nāma koliyadhītā sattavassāni gabbhaṃ dhāretvā sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā dukkhāhi
atk-s0502a:5078_1: tibbāhi kaṭukāhi vedanāhi phuṭṭhā “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā,
atk-s0502a:5078_2: yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti.
atk-s0502a:5078_4: yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno.
atk-s0502a:5078_6: yathidaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ na saṃvijjatī”ti imehi tīhi vitakkehi taṃ dukkhaṃ adhivāsentī sāmikaṃ satthu
atk-s0502a:5078_7: santikaṃ pesetvā tena tassā vacanena satthu vandanāya ārocitāya “sukhinī hotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā,
atk-s0502a:5078_8: arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyatū”ti satthārā vuttakkhaṇeyeva sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyitvā buddhappamukhaṃ
atk-s0502a:5078_10: Puttopissā jātadivasato paṭṭhāya dhammakaraṇaṃ ādāya saṅghassa udakaṃ parissāvesi.
atk-s0502a:5078_11: So aparabhāge nikkhamitvā pabbajito arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:5079_1: evarūpo nāma arahattassa upanissayasampanno bhikkhu ettakaṃ kālaṃ mātukucchismiṃ dukkhaṃ anubhosi,
atk-s0502a:5079_6: etarahi kathāya sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “āma,
atk-s0502a:5079_8: mama putto ettakā dukkhā muccitvā idāni nibbānaṃ sacchikatvā viharatī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5084_1: yo bhikkhu imaṃ rāgapalipathañceva kilesaduggañca saṃsāravaṭṭañca catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ appaṭivijjhanakamohañca atīto,
atk-s0502a:5084_2: cattāro oghe tiṇṇo hutvā pāraṃ anuppatto,
atk-s0502a:5088_0: Yodha kāmeti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto sundarasamuddattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5089_0: Sāvatthiyaṃ kireko kulaputto sundarasamuddakumāro nāma cattālīsakoṭivibhave mahākule nibbatto.
atk-s0502a:5089_1: So ekadivasaṃ pacchābhattaṃ gandhamālādihatthaṃ mahājanaṃ dhammassavanatthāya jetavanaṃ gacchantaṃ disvā
atk-s0502a:5089_2: “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “satthu santikaṃ dhammassavanatthāyā”ti vutte “ahampi gamissāmī”ti vatvā
atk-s0502a:5089_4: Satthā tassa āsayaṃ viditvā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5089_5: So “na sakkā agāraṃ ajjhāvasantena saṅkhalikhitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritu”nti satthu dhammakathaṃ nissāya
atk-s0502a:5089_6: pabbajjāya jātussāho parisāya pakkantāya satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yācitvā “mātāpitūhi ananuññātaṃ tathāgatā
atk-s0502a:5089_7: na pabbājentī”ti sutvā gehaṃ gantvā raṭṭhapālakulaputtādayo viya mahantena vāyāmena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā
atk-s0502a:5089_8: satthu santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado “kiṃ me idha vāsenā”ti tato nikkhamitvā rājagahaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:5090_0: Athekadivasaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ tassa mātāpitaro ekasmiṃ chaṇadivase mahantena sirisobhaggena tassa sahāyakakumārake
atk-s0502a:5090_1: kīḷamāne disvā “amhākaṃ puttassa idaṃ dullabhaṃ jāta”nti parideviṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5090_2: Tasmiṃ khaṇe ekā gaṇikā taṃ kulaṃ gantvā tassa mātaraṃ rodamānaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā “amma,
atk-s0502a:5090_13: Tena hi me paribbayaṃ dethāti paribbayaṃ gahetvā mahantena parivārena rājagahaṃ gantvā tassa piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:5090_14: caraṇavīthiṃ sallakkhetvā tatthekaṃ nivāsagehaṃ gahetvā pātova paṇītaṃ āhāraṃ paṭiyādetvā therassa piṇḍāya
atk-s0502a:5090_16: idheva nisīditvā bhattakiccaṃ karothā”ti pattaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:5091_1: idheva piṇḍāya carituṃ phāsuka”nti vatvā katipāhaṃ ālinde nisīdāpetvā bhojetvā dārake pūvehi saṅgaṇhitvā
atk-s0502a:5091_2: “etha tumhe therassa āgatakāle mayi vārentiyāpi idhāgantvā rajaṃ uṭṭhāpeyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5091_3: Te punadivase therassa bhojanavelāya tāya vāriyamānāpi rajaṃ uṭṭhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:5091_5: dārakā vāriyamānāpi mama vacanaṃ asuṇitvā idha rajaṃ uṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0502a:5091_6: antogehe nisīdathā”ti anto nisīdāpetvā katipāhaṃ bhojesi.
atk-s0502a:5091_7: Puna dārake saṅgaṇhitvā “tumhe mayā vāriyamānāpi therassa bhojanakāle mahāsaddaṃ kareyyāthā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5091_11: dārakā mayā vāriyamānāpi vacanaṃ na gaṇhanti,
atk-s0502a:5091_12: uparipāsādeyeva nisīdathā”ti vatvā therena adhivāsite theraṃ purato katvā pāsādaṃ abhiruhantī dvārāni pidahamānāva pāsādaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0502a:5091_13: Thero ukkaṭṭhasapadānacāriko samānopi rasataṇhāya baddho tassā vacanena sattabhūmikaṃ pāsādaṃ abhiruhi.
atk-s0502a:5092_1: puṇṇamukha ṭhānehi itthī purisaṃ accāvadati vijambhati vinamati gilasati vilajjati nakhena nakhaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
atk-s0502a:5092_14: naccena gītena vāditena roditena vilasitena vibhūsitena jagghati, pekkhati,
atk-s0502a:5092_29: sirasaṃ bandhatī”ti evaṃ āgataṃ itthikuttaṃ itthilīlaṃ dassetvā tassa purato ṭhitā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5094_0: Tuvampi daharo mama, ahampi daharā tava;
atk-s0502a:5096_0: Therassa “aho vata me bhāriyaṃ anupadhāretvā katakamma”nti mahāsaṃvego udapādi.
atk-s0502a:5096_1: Tasmiṃ khaṇe satthā pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake jetavane nisinnova taṃ kāraṇaṃ disvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0502a:5096_5: rājagahanagare sattabhūmikapāsādatale sundarasamuddassa ca bhikkhuno gaṇikāya ca saṅgāmo vattatīti.
atk-s0502a:5096_10: gaṇikāya parājayo”ti therassa jayaṃ pakāsetvā tattha nisinnakova obhāsaṃ pharitvā “bhikkhu ubhopi kāme nirapekkho pajahā”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5100_1: yo puggalo idha loke ubhopi kāme hitvā anāgāro hutvā paribbajati,
atk-s0502a:5100_2: taṃ parikkhīṇakāmañceva parikkhīṇabhavañca ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5101_0: Desanāvasāne so thero arahattaṃ patvā iddhibalena vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā kaṇṇikāmaṇḍalaṃ vinivijjhitvā
atk-s0502a:5101_1: satthu sarīraṃ thomentoyeva āgantvā satthāraṃ vandi.
atk-s0502a:5101_3: jivhāviññeyyaṃ rasaṃ nissāya manaṃ naṭṭho sundarasamuddatthero,
atk-s0502a:5101_7: pubbepāhaṃ etassa rasataṇhāya baddhamanassa avassayo jātoyevā”ti vatvā tehi yācito tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ atītaṃ āharitvā –
atk-s0502a:5106_0: Ekakanipāte imaṃ vātamigajātakaṃ vitthāretvā “tadā sundarasamuddo vātamigo ahosi,
atk-s0502a:5106_1: imaṃ pana gāthaṃ vatvā tassa vissajjāpetā rañño mahāmacco ahamevā”ti jātakaṃ samodhānesīti.
atk-s0502a:5109_0: Yodha taṇhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā veḷuvane viharanto jaṭilattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5110_1: atīte kira bārāṇasiyaṃ dve bhātaro kuṭumbikā mahantaṃ ucchukhettaṃ kāresuṃ.
atk-s0502a:5110_2: Athekadivasaṃ kaniṭṭhabhātā ucchukhettaṃ gantvā “ekaṃ jeṭṭhabhātikassa dassāmi,
atk-s0502a:5110_3: ekaṃ mayhaṃ bhavissatī”ti dve ucchuyaṭṭhiyo rasassa anikkhamanatthāya chinnaṭṭhāne bandhitvā gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:5110_4: Tadā kira ucchūnaṃ yantena pīḷanakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:5110_5: agge vā mūle vā chinditvā ukkhittakāle dhammakaraṇato udakaṃ viya sayameva raso nikkhamati.
atk-s0502a:5110_6: Tassa pana khettato ucchuyaṭṭhiyo gahetvā āgamanakāle gandhamādane paccekabuddho samāpattito vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0502a:5110_7: “kassa nu kho ajja anuggahaṃ karissāmī”ti upadhārento taṃ attano ñāṇajāle paviṭṭhaṃ disvā saṅgahaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0502a:5110_8: samatthabhāvañca ñatvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya iddhiyā āgantvā tassa purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:5110_9: So taṃ disvāva pasannacitto uttarasāṭakaṃ uccatare bhūmipadese attharitvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:5110_10: idha nisīdathā”ti paccekabuddhaṃ nisīdāpetvā “pattaṃ upanāmethā”ti ucchuyaṭṭhiyā bandhanaṭṭhānaṃ mocetvā pattassa upari akāsi,
atk-s0502a:5110_12: Paccekabuddhena tasmiṃ rase pīte “sādhukaṃ vata me ayyena raso pīto.
atk-s0502a:5110_17: pattaṃ me upanāmethā”ti dutiyampi ucchuyaṭṭhiṃ mocetvā rasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:5110_18: “Bhātā me ucchukhettato aññaṃ ucchuṃ āharitvā khādissatī”ti ettakampi kirassa vañcanacittaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:5110_19: Paccekabuddho pana paṭhamaṃ ucchurasassa pītattā taṃ ucchurasaṃ aññehipi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitukāmo hutvā gahetvāva nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:5110_20: So tassa ākāraṃ ñatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:5110_22: imassa nissandena devamanussesu sampattiṃ anubhavitvā pariyosāne tumhehi pattadhammameva pāpuṇeyya”nti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:5110_23: Paccekabuddhopissa “evaṃ hotū”ti vatvā “icchitaṃ patthitaṃ tuyha”nti dvīhi gāthāhi anumodanaṃ katvā yathā so passati,
atk-s0502a:5110_24: evaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā ākāsena gandhamādanaṃ gantvā pañcannaṃ paccekabuddhasatānaṃ taṃ rasaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:5111_0: So taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā bhātu santikaṃ gantvā “kahaṃ gatosī”ti vutte “ucchukhettaṃ oloketuṃ gatomhī”ti.
atk-s0502a:5111_2: nanu nāma ekaṃ vā dve vā ucchuyaṭṭhiyo ādāya āgantabbaṃ bhaveyyā”ti bhātarā vutto – “āma, bhātika,
atk-s0502a:5111_4: ekaṃ pana paccekabuddhaṃ disvā mama ucchuyaṭṭhito rasaṃ datvā ‘mūlaṃ vā pattiṃ vā dassāmī’ti tumhākampi me ucchuyaṭṭhito raso dinno,
atk-s0502a:5111_5: kiṃ nu kho tassa mūlaṃ gaṇhissatha,
atk-s0502a:5111_8: “Mama ucchuyaṭṭhito rasaṃ pivitvā tumhākaṃ ucchuyaṭṭhito rasaṃ ādāya ākāsena gandhamādanaṃ gantvā pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ adāsī”ti.
atk-s0502a:5111_9: So tasmiṃ kathenteyeva nirantaraṃ pītiyā phuṭṭhasarīro hutvā “tena me paccekabuddhena diṭṭhadhammasseva adhigamo bhaveyyā”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0502a:5111_11: jeṭṭhena pana ekapadeneva arahattaṃ patthitanti idaṃ tesaṃ pubbakammaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5112_0: Te yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cutā devaloke nibbattitvā ekaṃ buddhantaraṃ khepayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5112_1: Tesaṃ devaloke ṭhitakāleyeva vipassī sammāsambuddho loke uppajji.
atk-s0502a:5112_2: Tepi devalokato cavitvā bandhumatiyā ekasmiṃ kulagehe jeṭṭho jeṭṭhova,
atk-s0502a:5112_6: Tesu vayappattakāle kuṭumbaṃ saṇṭhāpetvā viharantesu “buddharatanaṃ loke uppannaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5112_15: dhammaṃ suṇāthā”ti dhammaghosakassa bandhumatīnagare ghosanaṃ sutvā mahājanaṃ purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā
atk-s0502a:5112_16: pacchābhattaṃ dhammassavanāya gacchantaṃ disvā senakuṭumbiko “kahaṃ gacchathā”ti pucchitvā “satthu santikaṃ
atk-s0502a:5112_17: dhammassavanāyā”ti vutte “ahampi gamissāmī”ti tehi saddhiṃyeva gantvā parisapariyante nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:5113_0: Satthā tassa ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā anupubbiṃ kathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5113_1: So satthu dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjāya ussāhajāto satthāraṃ pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0502a:5113_2: Atha naṃ satthā “atthi pana te apaloketabbā ñātakā”ti pucchi. Atthi, bhanteti.
atk-s0502a:5113_4: So kaniṭṭhassa santikaṃ gantvā “yaṃ imasmiṃ kule sāpateyyaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5113_10: pitari mate pitaraṃ viya tumhe alatthaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5113_15: na sakkā taṃ agāramajjhe ṭhitena pūretuṃ,
atk-s0502a:5113_18: Evaṃ so kaniṭṭhaṃ nivattāpetvā satthu santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado na cirasseva arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0502a:5113_19: Kaniṭṭhopi “bhātu pabbajitasakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā bhātaraṃ vanditvā āha – “bhante,
atk-s0502a:5113_21: ahaṃ pana pañcahi kāmaguṇehi baddho nikkhamitvā pabbajituṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0502a:5113_22: mayhaṃ gehe ṭhitasseva anucchavikaṃ mahantaṃ puññakammaṃ ācikkhathā”ti.
atk-s0502a:5113_25: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā nānādārūni āharāpetvā thambhādīnaṃ atthāya tacchāpetvā ekaṃ suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5113_27: ekaṃ maṇikhacitanti sabbāni sattaratanakhacitāni kāretvā tehi gandhakuṭiṃ kāretvā sattaratanakhacitāheva chadaniṭṭhakāhi chādāpesi.
atk-s0502a:5113_28: Gandhakuṭiyā karaṇakāleyeva pana taṃ attanā samānanāmako aparājitoyeva nāma bhāgineyyo upasaṅkamitvā “ahampi karissāmi,
atk-s0502a:5113_29: mayhampi pattiṃ detha mātulā”ti āha. Na demi, tāta,
atk-s0502a:5113_31: So bahumpi yācitvā pattiṃ alabhamāno “gandhakuṭiyā purato kuñjarasālaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti sattaratanamayaṃ kuñjarasālaṃ kāresi.
atk-s0502a:5113_32: So imasmiṃ buddhuppāde meṇḍakaseṭṭhi hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:5114_0: Gandhakuṭiyaṃ pana sattaratanamayāni tīṇi mahāvātapānāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:5114_1: Tesaṃ abhimukhe heṭṭhā sudhāparikammakatā tisso pokkharaṇiyo kāretvā catujjātikagandhodakassa pūretvā aparājito, gahapati,
atk-s0502a:5114_2: pañcavaṇṇāni kusumāni ropāpesi tathāgatassa anto nisinnakāle vātavegena samuṭṭhitāhi reṇuvaṭṭīhi sarīrassa okiraṇatthaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5114_6: Iti sā naccanto viya moro sobhamānā aṭṭhāsi.
