atk-s0502a:5114_7: Sattasu pana ratanesu koṭṭetabbayuttakaṃ koṭṭetvā itaraṃ sakalameva gahetvā jaṇṇumattena odhinā gandhakuṭiṃ parikkhipitvā pariveṇaṃ pūresi.
atk-s0502a:5115_6: iminā kira vo kuṭumbikena gandhakuṭi kāritā,
atk-s0502a:5115_8: Satthā uṭṭhāyāsanā gandhakuṭiabhimukhaṃ gantvā gandhakuṭiṃ parikkhipitvā parikkhittaratanarāsiṃ olokento dvārakoṭṭhake aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:5115_11: Satthā tattheva ṭhatvā tatiyavāre tassa bhātikattheraṃ olokesi.
atk-s0502a:5115_12: So olokitākāreneva ñatvā kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ āha – “ehi, tāta,
atk-s0502a:5115_15: So tassa vacanaṃ sutvā satthāraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, “bhante,
atk-s0502a:5115_16: yathā manussā rukkhamūle pavisitvā anapekkhā pakkamanti,
atk-s0502a:5115_17: yathā vā nadiṃ taritvā uḷumpaṃ anapekkhā pariccajanti,
atk-s0502a:5115_18: evaṃ anapekkhā hutvā tumhe vasathā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5115_22: tesu ratanāni ādāya pakkamantesu na sakkā amhehi vāretuṃ,
atk-s0502a:5115_23: pariveṇamhi ettake ratane vokiṇṇe attano upaṭṭhāke harantepi na vāretīti kuṭumbiko mayi āghātaṃ katvā apāyūpago bhaveyyā”ti iminā kāraṇena aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a:5116_0: Kuṭumbiko samantā rakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā manusse āha – “tātā,
atk-s0502a:5116_1: ucchaṅgena vā pacchipasibbakehi vā ādāya gacchante vāreyyātha,
atk-s0502a:5116_2: hatthena gahetvā gacchante pana mā vārayitthā”ti.
atk-s0502a:5116_3: Antonagarepi ārocāpesi “mayā gandhakuṭipariveṇe satta ratanāni okiṇṇāni,
atk-s0502a:5116_4: satthu santike dhammaṃ sutvā gacchantā duggatamanussā ubho hatthe pūretvā gaṇhantu,
atk-s0502a:5116_6: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “saddhā tāva dhammaṃ sotukāmā gamissantiyeva,
atk-s0502a:5116_7: assaddhāpi pana dhanalobhena gantvā dhammaṃ sutvā dukkhato muccissantī”ti.
atk-s0502a:5116_10: Sakiṃ okiṇṇaratanesu khīṇesu yāvatatiyaṃ jaṇṇumattena odhinā okirāpesiyeva.
atk-s0502a:5116_11: Satthu pana pādamūle tipusamattaṃ anagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:5116_13: “satthu sarīrato suvaṇṇavaṇṇāya pabhāya saddhiṃ maṇipabhaṃ olokentānaṃ titti nāma na bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0502a:5117_0: Athekadivasaṃ eko micchādiṭṭhikabrāhmaṇo “satthu kira pādamūle mahagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ nikkhittaṃ,
atk-s0502a:5117_1: harissāmi na”nti vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ vandituṃ āgatassa mahājanassa antarena pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:5117_2: Kuṭumbiko tassa pavisanākāreneva “maṇiṃ gaṇhitukāmo”ti sallakkhetvā “aho vata na gaṇheyyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0502a:5117_3: Sopi satthāraṃ vandanto viya pādamūle hatthaṃ upanāmetvā maṇiṃ gahetvā ovaṭṭikāya katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:5117_6: mayā tikkhattuṃ gandhakuṭiṃ parikkhipitvā jaṇṇumattena odhinā satta ratanāni okiṇṇāni,
atk-s0502a:5117_7: tāni me gaṇhantesu āghāto nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0502a:5117_9: Ajja pana ‘aho vatāyaṃ brāhmaṇo maṇiṃ na gaṇheyyā’ti cintetvā tasmiṃ maṇiṃ ādāya gate cittaṃ pasādetuṃ nāsakkhi”nti.
atk-s0502a:5117_11: attano santakaṃ parehi anāharaṇīyaṃ kātuṃ sakkosī”ti nayaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:5117_12: So satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā satthāraṃ vanditvā “ajja ādiṃ katvā mama santakaṃ dasikasuttamattampi maṃ
atk-s0502a:5117_13: abhibhavitvā anekasatāpi rājāno vā corā vā gaṇhituṃ samatthā nāma mā hontu,
atk-s0502a:5117_17: So gandhakuṭimahaṃ karonto aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyā bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ antovihāreyeva nava māse mahādānaṃ datvā dānapariyosāne sabbesaṃ ticīvaraṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:5118_0: So evaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ puññāni karitvā tato cuto devaloke nibbattitvā ettakaṃ kālaṃ devamanussesu saṃsaritvā
atk-s0502a:5118_1: imasmiṃ buddhuppāde rājagahe ekasmiṃ seṭṭhikule paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā aḍḍhamāsādhike nava māse mātukucchiyaṃ vasi.
atk-s0502a:5118_3: sabbesaṃ kāyarūḷhāni ābharaṇānipi pajjalitāni viya obhāsaṃ muñciṃsu,
atk-s0502a:5118_9: jānāsi nu kho ettha kāraṇa”nti? “Jānāmi, devā”ti. “Kiṃ,
atk-s0502a:5118_17: idamassa khīramūlaṃ hotū”ti devasikaṃ sahassaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:5118_18: Athassa nāmagahaṇadivase sakalanagarassa ekapajjotabhūtattā jotikotveva nāmaṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5119_0: Athassa vayappattakāle gehakaraṇatthāya bhūmitale sodhiyamāne sakkassa bhavanaṃ uṇhākāraṃ dassesi.
atk-s0502a:5119_1: Sakko “kiṃ nu kho ida”nti upadhārayamāno “jotikassa gehaṭṭhānaṃ gaṇhantī”ti ñatvā “nāyaṃ etehi katagehe vasissati,
atk-s0502a:5119_2: mayāpettha gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vaḍḍhakīvesena tattha gantvā “kiṃ karothā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5119_4: nāyaṃ tumhehi katagehe vasissatī”ti vatvā soḷasakarīsamattaṃ bhūmipadesaṃ olokesi,
atk-s0502a:5119_5: so tāvadeva kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ viya samo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:5119_6: Puna “imasmiṃ ṭhāne pathaviṃ bhinditvā sattaratanamayo sattabhūmikapāsādo uṭṭhahatū”ti cintetvā olokesi,
atk-s0502a:5119_8: Puna “imaṃ parikkhipitvā sattaratanamayā satta pākārā uṭṭhahantū”ti cintetvā olokesi,
atk-s0502a:5119_10: Atha “nesaṃ pariyante kapparukkhā uṭṭhahantū”ti cintetvā olokesi,
atk-s0502a:5119_12: “Pāsādassa catūsu kaṇṇesu catasso nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhahantū”ti cintetvā olokesi,
atk-s0502a:5119_22: Pāsādassa catūsu kaṇṇesu taruṇatālakkhandhappamāṇā catasso suvaṇṇamayā ucchuyaṭṭhiyo nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5120_0: Sattasu dvārakoṭṭhakesu satta yakkhā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5120_1: Paṭhame dvārakoṭṭhake yamakoḷī nāma yakkho attano parivārena yakkhasahassena saddhiṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0502a:5120_2: dutiye uppalo nāma attano parivārayakkhānaṃ dvīhi sahassehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a:5120_3: tatiye vajiro nāma tīhi sahassehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a:5120_4: catutthe vajirabāhu nāma catūhi sahassehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a:5120_5: pañcame kasakando nāma pañcahi sahassehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a:5120_6: chaṭṭhe kaṭattho nāma chahi sahassehi saddhiṃ,
atk-s0502a:5120_7: sattame disāmukho nāma sattahi sahassehi saddhiṃ ārakkhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:5120_8: Evaṃ pāsādassa anto ca bahi ca gāḷharakkhā ahosi.
atk-s0502a:5120_10: satta pākārā sattadvārakoṭṭhakā catasso nidhikumbhiyo uṭṭhitā”ti sutvā bimbisāro rājā seṭṭhicchattaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:5121_0: Tena pana saddhiṃ katapuññakammā itthī uttarakurūsu nibbatti.
atk-s0502a:5121_1: Atha naṃ devatā tato ānetvā sirigabbhe nisīdāpesuṃ.
atk-s0502a:5121_2: Sā āgacchamānā ekaṃ taṇḍulanāḷiṃ tayo ca jotipāsāṇe gaṇhi.
atk-s0502a:5121_3: Tesaṃ yāvajīvaṃ tāyeva taṇḍulanāḷiyā bhattaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0502a:5121_4: Sace kira te sakaṭasatampi taṇḍulānaṃ pūretukāmā honti,
atk-s0502a:5121_6: Bhattapacanakāle taṇḍule ukkhaliyaṃ pakkhipitvā tesaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari ṭhapeti,
atk-s0502a:5121_7: pāsāṇā tāvadeva pajjalitvā bhatte pakkamatte nibbāyanti.
atk-s0502a:5121_12: aggissa vā dīpassa vā obhāsaṃ neva jāniṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5121_13: “Jotikassa kira evarūpā sampattī”ti sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo ahosi.
atk-s0502a:5121_15: Jotikaseṭṭhi āgatāgatānaṃ uttarakurutaṇḍulānaṃ bhattaṃ pacāpetvā dāpesi.
atk-s0502a:5121_18: “Gāvutikanidhikumbhiyā mukhaṃ vivarāpetvā yāpanamattaṃ dhanaṃ gaṇhantū”ti āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a:5121_19: Sakalajambudīpavāsikesu dhanaṃ gahetvā gacchantesu nidhikumbhiyā aṅgulimattampi ūnaṃ nāhosi.
atk-s0502a:5121_20: Gandhakuṭipariveṇe vālukaṃ katvā okiṇṇaratanānaṃ kirassa eso nissando.
atk-s0502a:5122_0: Evaṃ mahājane vatthābharaṇāni ceva dhanañca yadicchakaṃ ādāya gacchante bimbisāro tassa pāsādaṃ daṭṭhukāmopi mahājane āgacchante okāsaṃ nālattha.
atk-s0502a:5122_1: Aparabhāge yadicchakaṃ ādāya gatattā manussesu mandībhūtesu rājā jotikassa pitaraṃ āha –
atk-s0502a:5122_8: Paṭhamadvārakoṭṭhake sammajjitvā kacavarachaḍḍikā dāsī rañño hatthaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0502a:5122_9: rājā “seṭṭhijāyā”ti saññāya lajjamāno tassā bāhāya hatthaṃ na ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:5122_10: Evaṃ sesadvārakoṭṭhakesupi dāsiyo “seṭṭhibhariyāyo”ti maññamāno tāsaṃ bāhāya hatthaṃ na ṭhapesi.
atk-s0502a:5122_11: Jotiko āgantvā rājānaṃ paccuggantvā vanditvā pacchato hutvā “purato yātha,
atk-s0502a:5122_13: Rañño maṇipathavī sataporisapapāto viya hutvā upaṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:5122_14: So “iminā mama gahaṇatthāya opāto khaṇito”ti maññamāno pādaṃ nikkhipituṃ na visahi.
atk-s0502a:5122_17: Rājā tena akkantakāle bhūmiṃ akkamitvā heṭṭhimatalato paṭṭhāya pāsādaṃ olokento vicari.
atk-s0502a:5122_18: Tadā ajātasattukumāropi pitu aṅguliṃ gahetvā vicaranto cintesi –
atk-s0502a:5122_20: gahapatike nāma sattaratanamaye pāsāde vasante esa rājā hutvā dārumaye gehe vasati,
atk-s0502a:5122_21: ahaṃ dāni rājā hutvā imassa imasmiṃ pāsāde vasituṃ na dassāmī”ti.
atk-s0502a:5123_5: So soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhatvā ratanamaye seṭṭhissa nisīdanamaṇḍape paññatte tasseva nisīdanapallaṅke nisīdi.
atk-s0502a:5123_6: Athassa hatthadhovanūdakaṃ datvā satasahassagghanikāya suvaṇṇapātiyā kilinnapāyāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purato ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5123_9: kilinnapāyāso eso”ti aññissā suvaṇṇapātiyā bhojanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā purimapātiyaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5123_10: Tato uṭṭhitautunā kira taṃ bhuñjituṃ sukhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a:5123_11: Rājā madhurabhojanaṃ bhuñjanto pamāṇaṃ na aññāsi.
atk-s0502a:5123_12: Atha naṃ seṭṭhi vanditvā añjaliṃ paggayha “alaṃ, deva,
atk-s0502a:5123_14: ito uttariṃ jirāpetuṃ na sakkā”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5123_16: garukaṃ katvā kathesi attano bhatta”nti? Deva,
atk-s0502a:5123_18: tumhākaṃ sabbassāpi hi balakāyassa idameva bhattaṃ idaṃ supeyyaṃ.
atk-s0502a:5123_19: Api ca kho ahaṃ ayasassa bhāyāmīti.
atk-s0502a:5123_23: seṭṭhinā kiñci kataṃ bhavissatī”ti vacanassa bhāyāmi, devāti.
atk-s0502a:5123_26: Rañño bhattakiccāvasāne sabbo rājaparivāro tadeva bhattaṃ paribhuñji.
atk-s0502a:5124_6: Kiñcāpi hi pātova rājā saparivāro āgato,
atk-s0502a:5124_8: Tato seṭṭhi “rājā me bhariyaṃ daṭṭhukāmo”ti tassā santikaṃ gantvā “rājā āgato,
atk-s0502a:5124_9: kiṃ tava rājānaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na vaṭṭatī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5124_11: rājā nāmā”ti vatvā “rājā nāma amhākaṃ issaro”ti vutte anattamanataṃ pavedentī “dukkaṭāni vata no puññakammāni,
atk-s0502a:5124_13: Assaddhāya nāma puññakammāni katvā mayaṃ sampattiṃ pāpuṇitvā aññassa issariyaṭṭhāne nibbattamhā.
atk-s0502a:5124_14: Addhā amhehi asaddahitvā dānaṃ dinnaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:5124_18: Tassā tālavaṇṭaṃ ādāya āgantvā rājānaṃ bījentiyā rañño veṭhanassa gandhavāto akkhīni pahari,
atk-s0502a:5124_23: ‘rājā me sāmikassa sampattiṃ gaṇheyyā’ti bhayena rodati maññe,
atk-s0502a:5124_24: assāsehi naṃ ‘na me tava sampattiyā attho”’ti. Na esā, deva, rodatīti.
atk-s0502a:5124_27: Ayañhi dīpobhāsaṃ vā aggiobhāsaṃ vā adisvā maṇiālokeneva bhuñjati ca nisīdati ca nipajjati ca,
atk-s0502a:5124_28: devo pana dīpālokena nisinno bhavissatīti? Āma, seṭṭhīti. Tena hi, deva,
atk-s0502a:5124_29: ajja paṭṭhāya maṇiālokena nisīdathāti mahantaṃ tipusamattaṃ anagghaṃ maṇiratanaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0502a:5124_30: Rājā gehaṃ oloketvā “mahatī vata jotikassa sampattī”ti vatvā agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:5125_2: taṃ pannarasasoḷasavassuddesikakāle rakkhaṇatthāya ekaṃ dāsiṃ datvā sattabhūmikassa pāsādassa uparimatale sirigabbhe vāsayiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5125_3: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ vātapānaṃ vivaritvā bahi olokayamānaṃ ākāsena gacchanto eko vijjādharo disvā uppannasineho
atk-s0502a:5125_5: Sā tena saddhiṃ saṃvāsamanvāya na cirasseva gabbhaṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0502a:5125_7: kiṃ ida”nti vatvā “hotu mā kassaci ācikkhī”ti tāya vuttā bhayena tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0502a:5125_8: Sāpi dasamāsaccayena puttaṃ vijāyitvā navabhājanaṃ āharāpetvā tattha taṃ dārakaṃ nipajjāpetvā taṃ bhājanaṃ
atk-s0502a:5125_9: pidahitvā upari pupphadāmāni ṭhapetvā “imaṃ sīsena ukkhipitvā gaṅgāya vissajjehi,
atk-s0502a:5125_10: ‘kiṃ ida’nti ca puṭṭhā ‘ayyāya me balikamma’nti vadeyyāsī”ti dāsiṃ āṇāpesi.
atk-s0502a:5126_0: Heṭṭhāgaṅgāyampi dve itthiyo nhāyamānā taṃ bhājanaṃ udakenāhariyamānaṃ disvā ekā “mayhetaṃ bhājana”nti āha.
atk-s0502a:5126_2: taṃ mayha”nti vatvā bhājane sampatte taṃ ādāya thale ṭhapetvā vivaritvā dārakaṃ disvā ekā “mama bhājananti vuttatāya dārako mameva hotī”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5126_4: taṃ mameva hotūti vuttatāya mama dārako”ti āha.
atk-s0502a:5126_5: Tā vivadamānā vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā amaccesu vinicchituṃ asakkontesu rañño santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5126_6: Rājā tāsaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā “tvaṃ dārakaṃ gaṇha,
atk-s0502a:5126_10: Tasmā sā dārakaṃ “imaṃ therassa santike pabbājessāmī”ti posesi.
atk-s0502a:5126_11: Tassa jātadivase gabbhamalassa dhovitvā anapanītatāya kesā jaṭitā hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0502a:5126_13: Tassa padasā vicaraṇakāle thero taṃ gehaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0502a:5126_15: Thero dārakaṃ disvā “kiṃ upāsike dārako laddho”ti pucchi. “Āma, bhante,
atk-s0502a:5126_16: imāhaṃ dārakaṃ tumhākaṃ santike pabbājessāmīti posesiṃ,
atk-s0502a:5126_18: Thero “sādhū”ti ādāya taṃ gacchanto “atthi nu kho imassa gihisampattiṃ anubhavituṃ puññakamma”nti olokento
atk-s0502a:5126_21: ñāṇampissa paripākaṃ na gacchatī”ti cintetvā taṃ ādāya takkasilāyaṃ ekassa upaṭṭhākassa gehaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0502a:5127_0: So theraṃ vanditvā ṭhito taṃ dārakaṃ disvā “dārako vo, bhante,
atk-s0502a:5127_7: Tassa pana gehe dvādasa vassāni bhaṇḍakaṃ ussannaṃ hoti.
atk-s0502a:5127_8: So gāmantaraṃ gacchanto sabbampi taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āpaṇaṃ haritvā dārakaṃ āpaṇe nisīdāpetvā tassa tassa bhaṇḍakassa
atk-s0502a:5127_9: mūlaṃ ācikkhitvā “idañca idañca ettakaṃ nāma dhanaṃ gahetvā dadeyyāsī”ti vatvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0502a:5127_10: Taṃdivasaṃ nagarapariggāhikā devatā antamaso maricajīrakamattenāpi atthike tasseva āpaṇābhimukhe kariṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5127_11: So dvādasa vassāni ussannaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ ekadivaseneva vikkiṇi.
atk-s0502a:5127_12: Kuṭumbiko āgantvā āpaṇe kiñci adisvā “sabbaṃ te, tāta,
atk-s0502a:5127_19: yattha katthaci jīvituṃ samattho”ti attano gehe vayappattaṃ dhītaraṃ tassa datvā “gehamassa karothā”ti purise āṇāpetvā niṭṭhite gehe “gacchatha,
atk-s0502a:5128_0: Athassa gehapavisanakāle ekena pādena ummāre akkantamatte gehassa pacchimabhāge bhūmiṃ bhinditvā asītihattho suvaṇṇapabbato uṭṭhahi.
atk-s0502a:5128_1: Rājā “jaṭilakumārassa kira gehe bhūmiṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇapabbato uṭṭhito”ti sutvāva tassa seṭṭhicchattaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0502a:5128_4: So tesaṃ vayappattakāle pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādetvā “sace amhehi samānabhogaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0502a:5128_7: Atthi nu kho jambudīpe amhehi samānabhogaṃ kula”nti vīmaṃsanatthāya suvaṇṇamayaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ
atk-s0502a:5128_8: patodalaṭṭhiṃ suvaṇṇamayaṃ pādukañca kārāpetvā purisānaṃ hatthe datvā “gacchatha,
atk-s0502a:5128_9: imāni ādāya kiñcideva olokayamānā viya jambudīpatale vicaritvā amhehi samānabhogassa seṭṭhikulassa atthibhāvaṃ
atk-s0502a:5128_10: vā natthibhāvaṃ vā ñatvā āgacchathā”ti pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:5129_2: kiṃ karontā vicarathā”ti pucchitvā “ekaṃ olokentā vicarāmā”ti vutte “imesaṃ imāni gahetvā kiñcideva oloketuṃ vicaraṇakiccaṃ natthi,
atk-s0502a:5129_5: Te tattha aṭṭhakarīsamatte ṭhāne hatthiassausabhappamāṇe piṭṭhiyā piṭṭhiṃ āhacca pathaviṃ bhinditvā uṭṭhite
atk-s0502a:5129_6: heṭṭhā vuttappakāre suvaṇṇameṇḍake disvā tesaṃ antarantarā vicaritvā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5129_11: Te tatova gantvā attano seṭṭhinā “kiṃ, tātā,
atk-s0502a:5129_12: diṭṭhaṃ vo amhākaṃ samānabhogaṃ seṭṭhikula”nti vutte, “sāmi,
atk-s0502a:5129_14: bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaseṭṭhino evarūpo nāma vibhavo”ti sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhiṃsu.
atk-s0502a:5129_15: Taṃ sutvā seṭṭhi attamano hutvā “ekaṃ tāva seṭṭhikulaṃ laddhaṃ,

atk-s0502a:5142_4: Paṭhame dvārakoṭṭhake ārakkhaṃ gahetvā ṭhito pana yamakoḷi nāma yakkho taṃ disvā “kahaṃ gacchasī”ti saparivāraṃ viddhaṃsetvā disāvidisāsu anubandhi.

atk-s0502a:5143_3: Kiṃ pana devo mama gehaṃ gaṇhituṃ gatoti? Āma,

atk-s0502a:5192_0: Usabhanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto aṅgulimālattheraṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5192_1: Vatthu “na ve kadariyā devalokaṃ vajantī”ti gāthāvaṇṇanāya vuttameva.
atk-s0502a:5193_3: duṭṭhahatthiṃ chattaṃ dhāretvā ṭhitaṃ disvā bhāyī”ti?
atk-s0502a:5193_11: Khīṇāsavausabhānañhi antare jeṭṭhakausabhā mama puttasadisā bhikkhū na bhāyantī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5196_0: Anejaṃ nhātakaṃ buddhaṃ, tamahaṃ brūmi brāhmaṇa”nti.
atk-s0502a:5197_1: acchambhitaṭṭhena usabhasadisatāya usabhaṃ uttamaṭṭhena pavaraṃ vīriyasampattiyā vīraṃ mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ
atk-s0502a:5197_2: esitattā mahesiṃ tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ vijitattā vijitāvinaṃ nhātakilesatāya nhātakaṃ catusaccabuddhatāya buddhaṃ
atk-s0502a:5197_3: taṃ evarūpaṃ ahaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti attho.
atk-s0502a:5201_0: Pubbenivāsanti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto devahitabrāhmaṇassa pañhaṃ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a:5202_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye bhagavā vātarogena ābādhiko hutvā upavāṇattheraṃ uṇhodakatthāya devahitabrāhmaṇassa santikaṃ pahiṇi.
atk-s0502a:5202_1: So gantvā satthu ābādhikabhāvaṃ ācikkhitvā uṇhodakaṃ yāci,
atk-s0502a:5202_2: taṃ sutvā brāhmaṇo tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā “lābhā vata me,
atk-s0502a:5202_3: yaṃ mama santikaṃ sammāsambuddho uṇhodakassatthāya sāvakaṃ pahiṇī”ti uṇhodakassa kājaṃ purisena gāhāpetvā phāṇitassa ca puṭaṃ upavāṇattherassa pādāsi.
atk-s0502a:5202_4: Thero taṃ gāhāpetvā vihāraṃ gantvā satthāraṃ uṇhodakena nhāpetvā uṇhodakena phāṇitaṃ āloḷetvā bhagavato pādāsi,
atk-s0502a:5202_7: “kassa nu kho deyyadhammo dinno mahapphalo hoti,
atk-s0502a:5202_8: satthāraṃ pucchissāmī”ti so satthu santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ pucchanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5205_0: Athassa satthā “evarūpassa brāhmaṇassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ hotī”ti vatvā brāhmaṇaṃ pakāsento imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a:5210_2: chabbīsatidevalokabhedaṃ saggañca catubbidhaṃ apāyañca dibbacakkhunā passati,
atk-s0502a:5210_4: abhiññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ abhijānitvā pariññeyyaṃ parijānitvā pahātabbaṃ pahāya sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikatvā vosiko niṭṭhānaṃ patto,
atk-s0502a:5210_7: tamahaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ vosānaṃ arahattamaggañāṇaṃ brahmacariyavāsaṃ vutthabhāvena sabbavositavosānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vadāmīti.
atk-s0502a:5211_1: Brāhmaṇopi pasannamānaso saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya upāsakattaṃ pavedesīti.
atk-s0502a:5216_25: brāhmaṇavagge cattālīsāti pañcādhikāni tīṇi vatthusatāni pakāsetvā nātisaṅkhepanātivitthāravasena uparacitā
atk-s0502a:5218_0: Gāthā dhammapade tena, bhāsitā yā mahesinā.
atk-s0502a:5227_0: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tena, kusalā sabbapāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0502a:5228_0: Sabbe ijjhantu saṅkappā, labhantu madhuraṃ phalanti.
atk-s0502a:5229_4: suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā
atk-s0502a:5229_5: buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena therena katāyaṃ dhammapadaṭṭhakathā –
